Ea' nasapa' anona aman soldia nafe' ipat kalabusanai natopa' bagato'w Joni nala balaga nala anona plet nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'ana kwafe' kwaso' mama'wakw.
Ea' amam alupumi Joni mafi'i mofa' alop si'ina mafe' mawana hi'agif. Ea' mafe' ma'ipa Jisasa amamaga amama.

Jisas name' basef amama, anan atona nafe' nakwaha wambel anama nofa' bot nafe' anagon wafiguma epes a'agoma. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi same' basefa Jisas nafe', sakwaha wambel hiagoma asasima sailana safe' eaf sa'i sotolona.
Jisas nafe' nataga akata nati esis hiesi nati uwahipis. Ea' nati epes asasisi awes nanda'asi nanda'as sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
Wambomota felefele'ma owamb alupumi ananimi mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wape na'ae wafiguma ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb. Ine' nesapa'as sofo'o wambel asasima setala gwa'aimi sonda'am sea'am.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina esapa'as sefe', owa'. Ipe' etipa pese'as gwa'aimi.”
Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aimi ina hiam. Bret lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof biam ea' ma'um ma'omafa.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fa'am fi'i pese' ae'.”

Ea' na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sape otalef bu'wami etap. Ea' nafela bret anama lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God ea' nawalam naso' alupumi ananimi mafe' mase'as sa'am dende' alihis andeande'. Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tu'wa'wanimi ma'ihi malo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleim si'im endilisi.
Epes sa' gwa'aimi amama hiesi. Esis seamba amam atom mataga 5,000-peleim. Ea' ina seamba awasi nematawa, owa'.
Ea' Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai anama mambo fisana. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa isima hiesi safe'.
Safe'ma ea', anan atona nandowasa' halaf nape nanda' beten nahali' God.
Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, anan atona ata' napani halaf ilif.
Ea' alupumi ananimi mape bot mali' mafe' mape walemb batupa'manai lu'unai la'afen, ea' uf lu'unai naluwi. Ea' naoh fepo mafi'i makwasa bot. Ea' uf wapoti' nalo nakoto'ma bot, nanda'am bumu boma nala.
Owamb ata' nail etin, felefele'ma lala, Jisas nailam natoma nafe' embel ilif nafe'ma amam.
Amam mati anan naitu nafi'i embel ilif, umbamaham kwapete' ma'i, anona gamba nailam nafe'. Ea' manda'am wige' ma'oh kwapete'am.
Ea' Jisas nalomam na'i mehip na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa umbamehepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai! I'i ine' ma'wina, ni'ipa ae' itu efe'mago ine' embel ilif.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i.”
Ea' Pita nakwaha bot natoma nafe' embel ilif nafe'ma Jisas.
Ea' anan nati naoh mohafel lu'um, umbamahana na'i nowala naoh. Ea' nofala Jisas na'i, “Dembinai! Nigiambame.”
Ea' mehip etin Jisas nowasa' lagel nahapilana na'ipana na'i, “Ine' owa' nembale'ef la'ifina ni'i ae' la'ifiwei, owa'. Dei' maina ine' nomonas mape biefim?”
Ea' amam biam malata bot, uf naloma embel mandahagas.
Ea' amam mape boti mati amamaga amama manda' lotuma Jisas mafela agel Godi lu'una ma'i, “Endilisi etis, ine' nogalomana Godi.”
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mowala mambo walemb batupa'manai anama mafe' mataga anagon etap hiagoma Genesaret.
Ea' enis epes sape etap anama sagawana sa'i anama Jisas. Ea' sasapa' enis safe' sa'ipa enis sape felefele'i hiagoma sofa'ai enis epes awes nanda'asi safi'mai anan.
Ea' sofa'ai isima awes nanda'asi sa'ipana saisailana sa'i anan ni'i a'e ma isima sohapila lowaf ananinai da'malifina atona. Ea' emi egafis sahapila lowaf ananinai sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
Nemaf anama anom Farisi esis Judai maloma anom amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi makwaha Jerusalem mafi'mai Jisas. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i,
“Dei' maina alupumi ine'imi mumbisila' waf ape'inai akupapa mase'apenai? Ama amam owa' measa'opa lagofa
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pawala mi'uli Godi ma paila waf ipe'inai atona?
Ipe' pawala basef God na'iam na'i, ‘Ipe' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pembale'efas pigiambamas. Emi egafis si'i basef awami ma ahapas mamasas asasisi, isima enis epes sohas soga'.’
Ea' ipe' pambaso'am pa'i anom basef na'ama pa'i, Emi epen nindaiwa'ma nigiambama mamasan ni'ipas ni'i, ‘Otamba maim ae'ami andaiwa'ma ese'epam. Ae' andandepama ese'anam God.’
Ea' ipe' Farisi paloma ipe' enipa pawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ipe' pa'i a'e ma epen inima nembaso'ma mamasan, ea' ina nagiambamas.
Ipe' panda' waf anama pesambala basef amama Godi na'i migiambama mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'inai atona lu'una.
Fowa' profet Aisaia nendela'wifa ipe' endilisi, ipe' pa'i basefa malogof biam. Anan nanda'am andeande' dende'ma ipe' na'iam na'ama na'i,
‘Amam nematawa isima safela agel ae'anai lu'una malogof asasimi atom ande', ea' opalef asasimi mape laogona ae'. Ukup asasimi ina sembale'efa ae', owa'.
Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'ami. Esis sawalapa mi'uli epes sape etapi sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mi'uli anama basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu safela agel ae'anai atona.’ ”
Ea' Jisas nofala esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' hipei peme' basef Ae'ami okokomam pegawam andeande'.
Amamaga gwa'aimi maim ande'ami ipe' pegwa'am mowala nomon, amama ina manda'epa awepa, owa'. Ea' amamaga mape ukup ipe'imi nomon mawisi ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai anan ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' negawa amam Farisi mame' basef amama ine'imi mandaiwa'mam opalef aoma ine'?”
Ea' nagwa basef womun etina amam na'ipam na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai nape heveni nawa amamaga anona aof. Ea' amamaga hiami anan owa' neawami, amama anona nemaf nigiam moloma nombalef masilimb.

Ipe' kwahowa amam Farisi ata' mopan. Amam si'i amam naep mase'ami ma'i mihi'amba eafa enis epes. I'i esis naep mase'asi si'i sihi'amba eaf enis epes isima naep mase'asi, atuwasi esis hiesi sondakolas dogwas sefe' sowala etin kwambiwag.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ine' ni'i basef amama ofagema womun etina amamaga awami ma afa' ata' weame'am.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' wapoti' nomonas ata' a'epa?
Ipe' owa' ata' pegawa! Amamaga ande'ami mawis malogofa mowala opalef, amama motanima mawisi ande' mafe' mowala dowah.
Ea' amamaga mape ipe' nomon, ukup awami maim mataga ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa.
Amamaga awami mape ukup nomon mawisi ande' amama. Ukup awami, waf soha enis seaga', waf sanda' so'a waulanai, ea' sonda' anona waf aonai si'i waf anama so'a waulanai, wal, baso'am, findiwa.
Waf anama atona nawisi ande' nanda' epes awes. Ea' epes owa' seasa'opa lagof andeande'ma sea' gwa'aimi si'i amam Farisi ma'iam, amama ina manda'as awes, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' gani wa'ol etap felefele'ma wambel anama biefina Tair Saidon.

Ea' ano'w nemata'w Kenani'wi kwafi'i kofalana na'ama kwa'i, “O, Dembinai, ine' akunamana Deviti, ine' niti ae' uwahipiwi. Ambal aonai nahambombaga nogame ae'akwi endilisi ea' kofa' nimanimi endilisi.”
Ea' Jisas ina nagwama'wa anom basef akwa'w, owa'. Ea' amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai anan ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Nemata'w akwama kwanda'am falafala kwagi'mafa. Ine' sapa'akw kotanima kofo'o!”
Ea' akwa'w kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa felefele'ma anan kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' nigiambama ae'.”
Ea' nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ape' ina mofa' gwa'aimi awasi ape'isi makwahom mafe'ma nombagw,
Ea' akwa'w kwagwamana basef anan kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i endilisi. Ea' nombagw mafe' owina tebol matatama gwa'aimi mowa etapi magwa'am.”
Ea' nogota anama atona nogama'w akwa'ukwi ambo'okw wapoti'.

Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i satagamana sofa'ai esis awes naninani nanda'asi safi'mai anan. Enis bo'wagah awamisi, enis naep mase'asi, bihiguf mondola'asi, enis malogof mase'asi, awes naninani nanda'asi. Esis sofa'as safi'i sambe'as sa'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi ea' nanda'as bo'wes.

Ea' esis gegelalasisa sati epes isima naep mase'asi satologon, malogof mase'as sa'i, bihiguf mondola'asi ea' usi'im, bo'wagah awamisi ea' bo'om safe'. Ea' dei' esis hiesi safela agel God Israeli lu'una.
Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipana na'ama ma'i, “Anae' wafiguma epes a'agoma. Atuwasi afa' ofa'ai bret eti ma weaso' amam nematawa isima hiesi?”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' bret ma'um ma'oh?”
Ea' amam ma'i, “Afa' bret 7-peleim ma'omafa maloma agof sa'umi kwasala'um.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa sope etap,
nafela bret 7-peleim maloma agof amama nanifela God nawalom naso' alupumi ananimi ma mease'asam esis amam nematawa hiesi. Amam mase'as hi'alas dende'.
Ea' sa'am dende' elihis andeande'. Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi makolasom maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 7-peleim si'im endilisi.
Esis amam nematawa sa' gwa'aimi amama, seamba amam atom mataga 4,000-peleim. Ea' esis ina seamba awasi nematawa wapoti', owa'.
Jisas nasapa'as safe' ea', anan nalata bot nafe' gani wa'ol walemb batupa'manai lu'unai anona etap lu'unai Magadan.
Ea' anom Farisi maloma anom Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas ma'i mogwambana ma anan ata' nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai si'i God nape heven ilifi nanda'anai ma ata' motolona.
Ea' anan nagwamam anom basef womun etin na'i, “Ipe' pati otaga wambomota felefele'ma owamb ea' pa'i, ‘Otaga nasa'of akwahina. Na'ama atuwasi nogota bo'otama owaf nilowata.’

Ea' kuhimbita pa'i, ‘Otaga ilagw ea' alialim. Manda'am na'ama ma atuwasi uf nuluwi asaf nolai.’ A'e, ipe' pati ikwaf hianai ilifanai etapanai andeande' ea' dei' ipe' owa' pegawa ikwaf nogota anae' andeande'.

Ipe' epes hiesi amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' panda' waf aonai pewa' alafugaha God. Dei' pa'i piti anona ikwaf la'ifinai. Ea' ae' owa'etina enda'ana potolona, owa'. Ikwaf anama la'ifinai fowa' God nihi'amba profet Jona atona nambimb ihi'ambepana ipe'.”
Jisas na'ipam ea', nakwahom nafe'.
Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mowala mambo walemb batupa'manai anama mataga fisana, ea' amam ukup mase'ama mofa' anona bret nolomam.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma yis amama amam Farisi maloma amam Sadyusi!”
Ea' amam mame' anan na'iam na'ama, amam manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ukup mase'afa bret na'ihi, dei' na'ipafa.”
Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamumi na'ipam na'i, “Bale'ef ipe'inai ina la'ifina. Dei' maina ipe' panda'ipama pa'i, ‘Afa' bret a'afa?’
Ipe' ukup ma'i ma bret anama wanifina biefina esis hiesi 5,000-peleis sa'ana ma tu'wanina na'ihi, o owa'? Pakolasom paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im? Ipe' ata' owa' pegawa?
Ipe' owa' ukup mi'i bret amama 7-peleim nemaf anama hiesi 4,000-peleis sagwa'anai tu'wanina na'ihi pakolasom paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im?
Dei' maina ipe' owa' peagawa? Ae' ina a'ipipa bret endilisinai, owa'. Ae' a'i ipe' pindumafuma yis amama amam Farisi maloma amam Sadyusi.”
Ea' dei' amam mogawa, anan ina na'ipama yis amama endilisimi, owa'. Anan na'i amam mundumafuma basef amam Farisi maloma amam Sadyusi mawalipasami.
Ea' Jisas nafe' naloma alupumi ananimi mataga felefele'ma wambel hiagoma Sisaria Filipai. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Amam nematawa esis sogawa ae' ataga epen endilisiwei sogawa maina agel sanda'meana?”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Enis sa'i ine' Jon aman napisi'as embeli. Enis sa'i ine' Elaija. Ea' enis sa'i ine' Jeremaia o enina profet.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i ae' emi?”
Ea' Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' Krais, aman anama God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i. Ine' nogalomana God ambal namunai napeinai.”
Dei' a'ipina endilisi, agel ine'inai Pita, agel anama na'i owap.

Ae' nambimb ese'ena ki utainai ine' ma kingdom heveni. Amamaga ine' nehapilam nape na'ae etapi, amama anona nemaf God nohapilam gani heven ilif wapoti'. Ea' maim amamaga ine' nekwahom na'ae etapi, amama anona nemaf God nokwahom gani heven ilif wapoti'.”

Nogota anama Jisas nali' nahafel nihi'amba alupumi ananimi ma nambimb nofe' niwis Jerusalem ama agufumi Judai mease'ana nimanimi lu'wami. Amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi moloma amam pris dambami nambimb mose'ana nimanimi lu'wami anona mohana noga'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilama anona neafe'ma wanomi ea' notanima nohafel wapoti'.
Ea' Pita nofa' Jisas nelefata nasa gemba ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, owa'etin. Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma amamaga amama mogatagama ine', owa', hapaimi!”

Ea' Jisas nandamboma na'ipa Pita na'i, “Ine' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ine' owa' okom ni'i okom Godi, owa'. Okom na'i nomonas epes sape etapi etis. Ine' nehopa eaf ae'anai, Si'amae nefe' alafuga ae'anai.”

Emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom si'i sihapilam tatala'im, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma ae' ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf God nofa'as sotanimani sopan andeande' la'ela'ef.

I'i emi egafis seanda' maol naninani ma sofa' gwa'aimi wiga amamaga hiami etapami atom hegilialami, esis wapoti' hegililas solomam. Dei' amamaga amama anona nemaf migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin. Amama nambimb sefa' amamaga maima seatal ambagof asasimi ma setanima seawambilai ambagof asasimi wapoti'? Owa'etin.

Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, anona nemaf ae' ifi'i elomai amamaga bu'wami pepel nafifili noloma amam ensel ae'ami. Ama nemaf anama, ae' egwamasa amamaga hiami esis amam nematawa hiesi mondahama waf esis sanda'anai hianai.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Enis epes dei' saitu na'ae, esis ina nambimb soga' ulal, ata' owa', siti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei eape si'i dembiwai king iefi'i.”
Nimeguf wanom mafe'ma hi'alam, Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma owalomana Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anona halaf launai. Nao'wa amam atom mape.
Ea' mati alop ananinai wanifigeina endilisi. Ea' naep ananimi wanefigeim endilisi si'i owaf nowala naso' ea' luwaguf ananimi mataga afitim si'i lamifah mafifil.
Ea' amam wanom mape dei' atef mati amam biam fowa'imi Moses naloma Elaija mataga maitu ma'i maloma Jisas.
Amam mati amam wanom, Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'ae andeande'. Ine' ni'i awi, afa' ola' aolah wanom na'ae, anona ine'inai anona Mosesi, anona Elaijai.”

Anan ata' na'i etin, anom elagw afitimi mafifil endilisi mafi'i mili'akwa amam. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai elagw amama na'i basef na'i, “Anan nogalome ae'anai, ae' okom nainailana endilisi ea' ae' okom nohafel naila waf ananinai. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi.”
Amam alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama, umbamaham endilisi ea' mande' nembawa motawa mande' amagah etap.
Ea' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amam nasa lagela amam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' hafel. Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'.”
Ea' amam masa'ma naep matologon ea', ina ata' mati enin epen, owa'. Mati Jisas atona naitu nalomam.

Ea' amam ata' makwaha halaf makini' etin, ea' Jisas na'ipam mehip na'i, “Ipe' ina pewalapa amamaga amama dei' patulumi, pi'ipa enin epen, owa'. Pefe' dahama dahama nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ma sehe ega' etanima ehafel hi'agif wapoti', pi'ipas.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' maina amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nifi'i?”
Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'i, “A'e endilisi, Elaija nifi'i nondondomba amamaga hiami motaga bo'om andeande'.

Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa, anona Elaija nafi'i ea'. Ea' esis amam nematawa ina sogawa anan, owa'. Sa'i anona epen. Esis saila ukup asasimi atom sanda'mana waf aonai endilisi. Ea' anona nemaf sonda'am na'ama etina sease'e nimanimi ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.”
Jisas na'iam na'ama, ea' alupumi ananimi mogawa anan na'ipama Elaija anan womun etina Jon napisi'as embeli.
Amam mafe' mataga ma esis amam nematawa hiesi, anona aman nafi'i natagama Jisas nindiwa nembawa notaoma Anan

na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' ni'i uwahipina so'uso'win aman ae'anai. Enin ambal aonai nanda'ana name' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi ma alop ananinai. La'ela'ef ambal anama nanda'ana newala nasef nif fandumi nafe' nowala embel la'ela'ef.
Ae' ao'wana wafe'ma alupumi ine'imi ea' amam ina la'ifima monda'ana bo'ona, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa owa' pembale'efa ae'. Ea' opalef ipe'imi owa' mope andeande'. Nimeguf ma'um ata' epe elomepa? Nimeguf ma'um wapoti' ma efa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipe' fa'an pifi'mai ae'.”
Ea' Jisas nagaola ambal anama aonai ea' nakwaha aman inima so'uso'win ea' dei' etef nataga bo'ona.
Alupumi Jisasi atom malomana mape, mahali'ana na'ama ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' la'ififa ma weatofa ambal anama aonai?”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Bale'ef ipe'inai ata' sa'ona, Amama atom dei' ipe' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. A'e, ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i bale'ef ipe'inai so'ona, nendahama si'i nalelef sa'umi mastetimi lawag, nambimb ipe' pi'ipa halaf nani pi'i, ine' degia nefe' newala gani wa'ol, nendegia nefe'. Ipe' pembale'efa ae' la'ifipa, na'ama dei' la'ifipei ma penda' maolan hianai naninani. [
Owa' anona eaf peatofa ambagof amama awami, owa'etin. Pekwaha gwa'aimi ma penda' beten, ea' amama atom.”]

Nemaf anama Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafi'i etin anama etap hiagoma Galili, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb felefele' anona aman nose'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amam naumbih ae'ami.
Ea' amam amama mohe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilam ea', anona neafe'ma wanomi, etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
Ea' opalef amam alupumi ananimi nimanim endilisi.
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mataga anona wambel Kaperneam. Ea' amam mofa' takisa ipat lu'unai Godi mafi'mai Pita mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa ipe'inai anan natala takisa ipat anama?”
Ea' Pita na'i “A'e.”

Pita notanima nafe' nawis anona ipat nomon, ea' Jisas nali' nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' okom na'imama? Amam king dambami etapami mofa' otamba ma takisa wiga maima emi? Amam mofa'asa epes hiesi esis amam nematawa amamisi etis a'a enis epes anona wambota?”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Ama enis amam nematawa anona wambota.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Na'ama esis epes hiesi kingi ina satala takis, owa'. Sape etin.

Ea' afa' undumafuma. Na'ama amam miti afa' owa' onda' takis, amam ukup numbutima afa' mi'i afa' epes aofai. Ea' dei' ine' fo'o la huk walemb batupa'manai anama ma niegiai aol anama nali'i ine' newala malogel aoli niti anona moni atona, moni anama dende' ma takisa afa' biafa. Ea' ine' nefa' moni anama nese'amana amam ama neatala takis isima afa' biafa.”
Nemaf anama amam alupumi Jisasi mafi'mai anan mahali'ana ma'i, “Emi nikila' enis nataga dembeni endilisi ma kingdom heveni?”
Ea' Jisas nofalai enin so'uso'win nafi'mai anan nahaponan naitu la'afena amam.

Ea' na'ipam, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Emi egafis si'i siowis kingdom heveni, ama sase'ana opalef God si'i awasi isima sa'i sase'ana opalef God, isima sanda'am na'ama anona nemaf siowis kingdom heveni. I'i owa', owa'etin.
Emi egafis seape sa'umbili owa' seafela agof asasimi lu'um setaga si'i awani inima, epes isima ea' sikila' enis epes seape dembesi ma kingdom heveni.
Emi egafis sese' opalefa sigiambama enin so'uso'win si'i ini' ma ukup asasimi mopoma ae', esis sase'e opalef ae' wapoti' sagiambame.

I'i emi egafis seanda' enin epen so'uso'win nembale'efa ae'i nefe' nenda' waf aonai, epes isima sepe na'ama. I'i enis epes sofa' epes isima sepa' owap lu'unai nil bagafowa asasimi sofa'as sefe' sokwahis sowala naoh mami lu'wami, esis sope andeande' kwaukwawie'. I'i epes isima senda' enin so'uso'win nekwaha nembale'efa ae', epes isima anona nemaf sope awes endilisi sikila' sowala naoh afisi.

Ipe' epes etapipei, ae' ati ipe' uwahipipa ma amamaga amama meagwambipei monda'epa penda' waf aonai. Endilisi amamaga amama anona nemaf meatagai, ea' emi egafis sonda'am meatagai, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, anona nemaf sefa' nimanimi.

I'i lagof o bo'wagah ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'am pekwahom mefe'. Andeande' ma lagof bo'wagah atom mope ma ambal nopeipa pepan andeande' la'ela'ef. Ea' sefa'epa sokwahipa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi la'ela'efi. Anama ina nambimb pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe aopa endilisi.

Ea' i'i naep ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, pigiam pekwahom. Atom etin mope ma pefa' ambal namunai napeipa peapan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Na'ama naep biam mapomepa mofa'epa mokwahepa pefe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi mape la'la'efi. Na'ama ina nambimb pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe aopa endilisi.

Ipe' pindumafuma! Na'ama pi'i enin epen atitin sa'wini pi'i inima enin falafini, owa'. Dei' main, amam ensel asasimi mape heveni mumafi awasi isima andeande'. Ensel amama la'ela'ef mape felefele'ma Ahalome God nape heveni. [
Ae' ataga epen endiliswei, ae' afi'i ma eagolopa epes higilalasi efa'as setanimani.]

Ipe' ukup ma'imama? I'i anona aman numafi anom sipsip 100-peleim ama anona atotona hegililana, aman amama ata' nokwaha sipsip amama 99-peleim mitu mea' otalef anagon dohotagw, anan ata' nefe' nogolopa anona hegilalanai.
I'i nefa'anai, a'ipipa endilisi, atuwasi nondanifamana. Danifel ananinai nikila' nandanifel ma sipsip amama 99-peleim maituwi.
Ea' na'ama etin Ahalomepa ipe'inai nape ilif heveni nandaiwa' ma enin epen so'uso'unai higililana, owa'.
I'i sahin owan sonda' waf aonai ma ine', ine' nefe' nitilin ipe' etipa pepe ea' nihi'amban waf aonai ananinai. I'i enin neme'ena, andeande', si'i ine' nofa'ai enin netanimani wapoti'.
Ea' i'i enin owa' neme' basef ine'ifi, ni'ipa enis epes bies wapoti' ea' pefe' etin. Ama ipe' bipa o wanipa pefe'ma peame' basef epen inima ma peawaloga basef amama pi'i endilisimi atom.

Ama i'i enin nindaiwa'ma neame' basef ipe'ifi, ine' ni'ipa esis Kristen hiesi sondatama etifigin ni'ipasan. Ama enin ni'i nindaiwa'ma neame' basefa esis Kristen hiesi wapoti', ine' nekwahin nepe si'i isima owa' seagawa Godi, o si'i amam amama awami mofa' takisi.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Amamaga ipe' pahapilam etap anae', amama anona nemaf God nohapilam mape gani ilif heven wapoti'. Ea' amamaga amama ipe' pekwahom etap anae, amama anona nemaf God nokwahom gani heven ilif wapoti'.

Ea' ae' a'iam endilisi ma ipe' wapoti'. I'i ipe' bipa pape etapi ukup mefe' atifigina anom amamaga, pi'i penda' beten pehali' Goda nease'epa amamaga amama, ea' andeande' Ahalome ae'anai napani ilif heveni nambimb nese'epam ipe'.
Dei' main, i'i epes bias o wenis ukup mapoma agel ae'anai ma sunduwa'anima sope etifigin, ae' ape alomas.”
Nemaf anama Pita nafi'i nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, nimeguf ma'uma'um sahin owan ae'asi sonda'me waf aonai ae', ma eakwahamasana? Nimeguf 7-peleim o ma'um?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'ama na'i, “Ae' ina a'ipina nimeguf amama atom 7-peleim, owa'. Ae' a'i ine' nekwaha waf aonai esis sanda'minanai nimeguf hiami 490-peleim.
Dei' main, esis siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona dembinai king na'i nogawa wialef mapoma amam manda' maol ananinai mapoma ma'um.
Ea' anan nanda'am nogawam andeande'ma nonda' amam meagwamana wiaf, ea' sofa' anona aman safe'ma anan. Ea' aman anama nowaola wiafa moni lu'unai 10 milian kina.

Ea' anan moni a'ana ma neagwan dende'ma niembi wiaf anama anan nowaolamasana. Ea' dembinai king na'ipas na'i esis setala aman anama noloma waulu'mana awasi ananisi ma sonda' maol akupi ea' setala amamaga asasimi wapoti' sofa' moni ma seagwa wiaf anama.
Ea' aman anama nowafa notawa etapa naep king anama dembinai na'ipana na'ama na'i, ‘Ine' niti ae' uwahipiwi nepe nehafa ae'. Anona nemaf ae' egwamena wiaf anama hi'ilana ma ine'.’
Ea' dembinai anama nati owahipina nakwahomana wiaf ananinai nafe' wafifina.

Ea' aman anama nawisi ande' nati anona amam atom manda' maol etini, anan nowaola wiafa moni kwawie'in si'i 10 kina. Ea' nombalo' aman anama nowa'ana sisihina bini'w anani'wi na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' negwame wiaf ine'inai hi'ilana!’
Ea' aman anama nowafa notawa etap ea' na'ipana basef la'ifimi na'i ‘Ine' niti ae' owahipiwi ea' nepe nehafa ae'! Nambimb egwamena wiaf ine'inai hi'ilana.’
Ea' anan nandaiwa'. Ea' nofa'ana nafe' nanda'ana nanda' kalabus, ama nepe neagwa wiaf anama.
Amam mandao'oma manda' maoli mati amama, opalef amamumi nimanim endilisi mafe' mawalapa amama ma dembinai amamunai.
Ea' dembinai nofalai aman anama nanda' maoli ea' na'ipana na'i, Ine' aman nanda' maol aonai. Do'ok ine' naloma ae' nalef, ea' akwaha wiaf anama lu'unai ine'inai hi'alana.
Ae' ati ine' owahipina, ea' dei' maina ine' owa' nie'i owahipina alupunai ine'inai panda' maol etini?
Ea' dembinai okom numbutina nase'amana amam amama mumafi kalabusi ma mease'ana nimanimi lu'wami nope nope neagwa wiaf ananinai hi'ialana.
I'i ukup ipe' hipei owa' peakwaha waf aonai endilisima sahin owan sanda'mipanai, anona nemaf Ahalome ae'anai nape ilif heveni wapoti' nonda'mepam ipe' na'ama etin si'i dembinai nanda'ama aman anama.”
Jisas na'i basef amama mafe' ea', nakwaha etap anama hiagoma Galili nafe' anona etap hiagoma Judia gani wa'ol walemb Jordan gani fisana.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sailana safe' ea' nanda' epes hiesi ambo'wes.
Ea' anom dambami Farisi mafi'mai anan mahali'ana anom basef magwambana ma'i, “Mi'uli ape'inai andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma nemata'w anani'wi nokwaho'wa okom ananinai atona o owa'?”
Ea' anan nagwamama basef amam na'i, “Ipe' patalifa basef amama Godi pagawam ea'. Basef amama ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' amamaga hiami nanda' epes sataga amam nematawa.’
Ea' God na'i, ‘Na'ama esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sape deindei, owa'. Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sope alop atotona.’
Ea' esis bias sondase'ama sotaga si'i alop etifina. Esis ina ata' sape biasa sape deindei, owa'. Ea' esis God nakolasis sape la'ifis, isima God na'i enin epen ina nehape'as, owa'.”
Ea' Farisi amama ma'ipana wapoti' ma'i, “Moses na'ipapa mi'uli anama na'i, aman nonda' anom basef mil okwatip nose'akwana nokwaho'w kofe'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam na'i, “Ipe' patopa' basefi. Dei' Moses na'i a'e ma eaf anama dei' pailana pagalo'ma wauhiamepa patopa' waf dase'amainai. Fowa' gani dambadamba ina anom basef mape na'ama, owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa a'i, I'i ano'w nemata'w anona amani owa' konda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, ma anan nogolo'makw noso' ano'w wapoti', anan nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama nali' nase'akwi.”
Ea' amam alupumi ananimi ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i waf anama endilisinai ma owa' neape la'ela'ef noloma akwa'w, dase'ama hapainai. Ea' andeande'ma nemata'w a'ana nope etin.”
Ea' anan na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ina nambimb amam nematawa hiesi la'ifis sofa' basef amama sombale'am, owa'. Epes isima God nase'as pepel ea', esis etis sofa'am.

Dei' main, amam na'amaimi mape amam owa' la'ifima mease' nematawai. Ea' anom mamalawa amamuwai olam ea' la'ela'ef mape na'ama. Ea' anom, amam matopa'am alop amamunai. Ea' amam ina la'ifima measo' nematawa, owa'. Ea' anom, okokoma miegiambama epes hiesi siowis kingdom heveni. Na'ama mandaiwa'ma mease' nematawa. Emi aman la'ifina niela basef amama, anan nilam andeande'.”

Nemaf anama esis sao'wamanai enis awasi sofa'as safi'mai anan, sa'i anan nowamona lagof ananimi ma awasi isima ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nefalo'mas. Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipa esis owa' sofa'as safi'mai anan.

Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipe' kwahowas awasi isima sifi'mai ae'. Ipe' ina pindaiwa'mas. Fa'asi sifi'mai Ae'. Dei' main, esis amam nematawa siowis kingdom heveni, esis same' basef Godi sailam si'i awasi isima.”
Ea' nawamona lagof ananimi balagah asasimi, nakwaha esis nafe'.
Ea' anona aman nafi'i na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' nambimb enda' maina waf bu'unai ma efa' ambal namunai epe andeande' la'ela'ef?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' nahali' ae' ma amamaga amama? Anona aman atotona nape ilifi Anan bu'unai. I'i ine' ni'i nefa' ambal namunai, andeande'ma nila basefa mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosasanai hianai.”
Ea' aman anama nahali' Jisas na'i, “Maina mi'uli?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Ina nenda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, neha enis epes sega' nenda' wal, owa'. Ina neambaso'ma enis epes,
ine' nepe owina mamasena ine'isi neme' basef asasimi nilam ea' nimafias andeande'. Ine' okom ninila enis sape felefele'ma ine'i, si'i ine' okom nainaila ine' etina ma nimafi ine'.”
Ea' aman anama ata' sa'unai awaminai na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Mi'uli anama hianai ae' embale'efana ailana afi'i ea'. Dei' maina waf ata' nape?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ine' ni'i neataga bu'winai endilisi, ine' fo'o nese'asa amamaga ine'imi ma enis epes sotalinama nefa' moni anama nenda'ana nese isima kwahusi. Nenda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf nefa' amamaga bu'wami gani ilif heven. Ea' ine' nifi'i nila ae'.”
Ea' aman anama sa'unai name' basef amama, okom ananinai nimanina ea' nandamboma megah atogah nafe'. Dei' main, anan amamaga hiamunai.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'ama na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epes isima wiga moni hianaisi, sanda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' siowis kingdom heveni. Atona etin sefe' siowis.

Ae' a'i i'ipipa wapoti', anona mafin lu'unai kamel nuwis nil nagala sagundisa luwagufanai, anama wila ma niowis. Ea' amam nematawa amamaga hiamisi sefe' siowis kingdom Godi, sonda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' siowis. Eaf anama ahifina endilisi nikila' maol kamel nuwis nil nagala.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama, amam gegelalasom kwapete'am endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “I'i na'ama, anona nemaf God nefa' emi egafis sotanimani seape andeande' la'ela'ef? Owa'etin.”
Ea' Jisas naniga nati amam na'ipam na'i, “Amamaga epes owa' la'ifisa seanda'ami, amama God atona la'ifinai ma nonda'am. Anan la'ifinai nonda' amamaga hiami.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' ea' wakwaha amamaga afa'imi hiami, ea' dei' wafi'i wambale'efa basef ine'imi wailina. Afa' anona nemaf ofa' maim amamaga?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Owagama nemaf anama neataga ma amamaga hiami meataga dambaim wapoti', nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, efa' pepel howalagon atoma balata king ae'anai. Nemaf anama ipe' amam ae'ipei pail ae'i ipe' 12-peleipa petoma siaifah bu'wami amam dambami kingi 12-peleim, ea' pewaloga wambotagw 12-peleim amam nematawa ape'isi Isrel.

Ea' emi egafis ukup asasimi mopoma ae' sokwaha ifagw moloma sahin owan ahapas mamasas batawisas moloma aof amamaga maim asasimi, anona nemaf sofa' amamaga hiami endilisi mikila' asasimi fowa'imi. Ea' anona nemaf sofa' ambagof namumi sopan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Ea' epes hiesi dei' sataga sali'i agof lu'womisi, anona nemaf owagama agof a'as sotaga sigi'. Ea' epes isima sataga sagi' owagama sofa' agof lu'wami sotaga sili'.”

“A'e, epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona aman nafamunagoma anona etap lu'wagoma. Ea' lala kuhimbita atona anan nafe'ma nufa'i anom amam monda' maol aof anama ananinai nawa su'utip mandelef wain napoma.
Anan nafe' na'i naloma anom manda' maoli ea' nalomam ukup etifima otamba atuwasi meafa'ami, mofa' wan kina atona etina nemaf anama. Ea' nasapa'am mafe' manda' maol aof ananinai.
Ea' anan nape ma aon nandegiai nape si'i 9 klok, anan nafe' ea' nati anom amam ata' tol maitu etin anama mondowa'anima mapoma.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' wapoti' fo'o penda' maol aof ae'anai ma ease'epa otamba mondendaepa mondahama waf bu'unai.’
Ea' amam mafe'.
Ea' aon nahagasom 12 klok anan nafe' wapoti' ea' nanda'am na'ama etin si'i do'ok nanda'am.
Ama aon nasa 3 klok, nafe' nanda'am wapoti' si'i do'ok nanda'am.
Ea' wambomota 5 klok, nafe' nati anom ata' maitu etin. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' ata' tol paitu etin na'ae nemaf anae' laona?’
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ina anona aman nase'afa maol afa', owa'.’
Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' wapoti' fo'o penda' maol aof ae'anai.’

Ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb aman anama nafomona aofi nafi'i na'ipa aman numafi amam manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ine' fala manda' maoli amama hiami ea' nese'ama moni amam. Ine' nili' nese amam amama magi' matagai, nese'aman nefe' nefe' netagama amam amama mali' mataga manda' maoli.’
Ea' amam amama mataga manda' maol wambomota 5 kloki, mataga mofa' wan kina atona etin.
Ea' amam amama mali' mohafel kuhimbita manda' maoli, mafi'i ukup mandanda' ma'i atuwasi amam mofa' moni lu'unai nikila' anom. Owa'etin. Amam wapoti' mofa' wan kina na'ama etin.
Ea' manda' megah mahana nafomona aofi.

Ea' ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Amam amama magi' matagai, amam mafi'i manda' maol nogota bandana si'i awa atitin, ea' ine' nase'ama moni anama na'ama etin si'i afa' ofa'anai. Ea' afa' wali' wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma nemaf launai, ea' owaf nahafa.’
Ea' anan nagwamana basef anona aman amamunai na'ipana na'ama na'i, ‘Alupinai, ae' ina anda'ena awena, owa'. Afa' biafa wali' wa'iam ea' nomonas atifima pefa' wan kina etin.
Ine' fa'a moni ine'inai ea' fo'o. Otamba ae' ase'enama ine'i, ea' ikwaf anama atona ae' ese'anama aman anama nagi' nafi'i nanda' maoli, pefa'am dende' etin.
Ae' anda' maol si'i okom ae'anai na'iana moni ae'anai. Na'ama andeande'. Ae' anda' waf bu'unai ma imafi amam magi' mafi'i wambomota. Na'ama dei' ine' kowalena ma otamba amamumi ma main?’
Anona nemaf na'ama etin, epes isima dei' sataga sagi'i agof a'asi sotaga agufisi sope sili', ea' epes isima sataga sali' agufisi, anona nemaf agof a'as sotaga sigi'.”
Jisas na'i nondowasa' Jerusalem, anan nao'wa alupumi ananimi 12-peleim atom mafe'. Amam ata' mafe' etin eaf ea' na'ipam na'i,

“Peme', dei' afa' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb anona aman nowalapa ae' ma amam pris dambami moloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ea' monda' kotimi ea' mi'i basef mondame'mam ma mohe eaga'.

Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sololama Godi ma sonda' findiwae ma basef awami sopagahowe sehe egaga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilam anona nefe'ma wanomi, God nefele ma hi'agif etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
Nemaf anama Sebedi waulu'mana mama'wana Jemsi Jon kwao'wai batawisa'w akwa'umi biam safi'mai Jisas. Ea' kwindiwa nembawa kotawa etap kwa'ipana anom basef.
Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' enda'mena main?”
Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ine' ni'i anona nemaf netaga dembinai, nemaf anama ae' a'i batawisi amama ae'ami biam mope dembem felefele'ma ine', anona nil wa'ol egagili, ea' anona nil wa'ol da'isinaima.”
Akwa'w kwa'iam na'ama, Jisas nagwama'w na'ipa amam na'i, “Ipe' ina pegawa andeande'ma amamaga ipe' pahali'imami, owa'! Ipe' bipa la'ifipama pegwa' embela kap anama dei' ae' egwa' embelanai, o owa'?”
Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wila la'ififa.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, ipe' bipa nambimb pegwa' embela kap anama ae' egwa' embelanai. Ea' pepe lagel da'isinai o egagili ae'ami, amama ina maol ae'anai, owa'. Ahalome atona ni'i esis isima nandandepas ea'i, esis etis sope lagof da'isinai o egagili ae'ami.”
Ea' alupumi Jisasi tu'wanim 10-peleim mame' amam biam ma'iam na'ama, manda' megah mahama amam sahalomana owalomana.

Ea' Jisas nofala alupumi Ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai anan, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa, anom king mape dambami ma isima sololama Godi, amam mape ilifa esis endilisi manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' amam dambami mape la'ifim endilisi ma manda' esis amam nematawa saila malogof amamumi.
Ea' waf anama ina nepoma ipe', hapainai. Emi aman nope dembinai ma ipe', anan ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maol etina ipe' hipei.
Ea' emi aman ni'i notaga dembeni ma ipe', anan ata' nopan si'i agel a'anai nanda' maol etin nape owina hiesi.

Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ae' wapoti' na'ama etin. Ina afi'i ma esis sonda'me maola siegiambame, owa'. Ae' afi'i enda' maola igiambama ipe' hipei. Afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipe' peloma epes hiesi etagahipama waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.”
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi makwaha wambel anama Jeriko ma'i mefe', amam nematawa hiesi sailana safe'.
Ea' amam biam naep mase'ami tol mape felefele'ma eaf. Ea' mame' basef sa'i Jisas nafi'i ea' mofalana mehip ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' akunamana Deviti,
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sinifalom sa'i mosopama malogof. Owa'etin. Amam mofalana mehip endilisi ma'i, “Dembinai ine' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
Ea' Jisas naitu nofala amam biam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pa'i ae' enda'mepa main?”
Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ine' newalamafa naep afa'imi ma witi andeande'.”
Ea' Jisas nati amam owahipim nasa lagof ananimi naep amamumi, ea' dei' etef amam biam mati andeande' wapoti', ea' magi'ma Jisas mafe'.
Ea' amam mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, mataga Betfage felefele'ma halaf Oliv. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi biam na'ipam na'i,
“Ipe' bipa pefe' piwis wambel nanima nape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ae. Ea' piti anona donki sa'unai esis sepana nail naloma noganai ananinai maitu. Ipe' petagahom ea' pefa'am pifi'mai ae'.
I'i enin epen ni'i nihali'ipa ma anom basef, pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maola anan ama atuwasi nosapa'am mutanimipei mehip.’ ”
Amamaga amama amam mofa'i donki mataga dende' si'i basef amama fowa' gani anona profet na'iami. Anan na'i,
“Ipe' pi'ipa epes sape Saioni pi'i, ‘Ipe' piti, dei' king dembinai ipe'inai anona nemaf nifi'mai ipe'. Anan nanda' waf sa'umbilifi, ea' notoma donki noganai nofa'ana nifi'i.’ ”
Ea' alupumi Jisasi biam mafe' ea' manda'am si'i do'ok na'ipamam.
Amam mofa' donki anama naloma noganai mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagwegw amamumi matoma ilifa donki amama biam. Ea' Jisas nandegia natoma donki anama.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sambe'amonam sagwegw eaf, safela agel ananinai lu'una. Enis satopa' lawah agof apulima motawa felefele'i sase'wiam eaf sofalo'mana.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sali' sagi' sanda' la kolo' na'ama sa'i,
“Hosana! Ine' akunamana Deviti! Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma ine'. Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma ine' nafi'i agel ananinai nese'ena pepel ma neanda' maol ananinai. Ape' mofela agel dembinai God nape ilifi.”
Nemaf anama Jisas nafe' nawis wambel Jerusalem, ea' amam nematawa hiesi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete' ea' soga sa'i mehip sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anama anan emi egalina?”
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi safe' salomanai sa'i, “Aman anama anona profet Jisas, aman nape wambel Nasaret nape etap hiagoma Galili.”

Ea' Jisas nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nagalo'ma esis hiesi sanda' bisnis saloma isima satalom ipat anama nomon. Anom amam mati otamba enis epesi ea' mindisila'mam. Ea' Jisas namboma tebol amamumi nakowasom. Enis sanda' bisnisa setala amiguf mai'unamb. Ea' namboma siaifah asasimi nakowasom wapoti'.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef mape Baibeli God na'i,
‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma epes hiesi sifi'i sopaina sonda' beten sohali' Ae. Ea' ipe' panda'ana nataga si'i ipat sanda' walanai.’ ”
Jisas ata' napani ipat anama lu'unai nomon, sofa'manai epes isima naep mase'asi bo'wagah maim mondala'asi safi'manai, ea' nanda'as sataga bo'wes.

Ea' amam pris dembami maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mati anan nanda' maol la'ifinai bu'unai, ea' mame' esis awasi sandanifela anan gani nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sa'i, “Ape' mafela agel akunamana Deviti!”
Ea' amam dei' ukup aom kwapete' ma anan.
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' negawa basef ofagema awasi isima sa'iami?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “A'e, ae' egawam.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pitalifam basef amama mail Baibeli pegawam o owa'.? Basef amama fowa'imi ma'i na'ama ma'i, God,
‘Ine' owagama niwalipa awasi sa'wisi soloma isima ata' agunifisi sa' nomambeh atumi, ea' sofela agel ine'inai.’ ”
Ea' anan nakwaha amam nawisi ande' nafe' nape anona wambel Betani ea' na'oh owamb anama.
Ama wafilu kuhimbita atona Jisas nohafel notanima nafe' nataga felefele' ma taun anama Jerusalem ea' nolomahana.

Ea' nati anona lawag fik notawa eaf ea' nafe' natolona. Ea' ina nati anom su'utip mailana, owa'. Apul atom. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' ina ata' anom su'utip milina wapoti'. Owa'.” Ea' mehip lawag anama bowana ea' alina hi'alana.
Ea' amam alupumi ananimi mati lawag anama alina, gegelalasom endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina lawag anama fik bowana ea' alina mehip?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. I'i ipe' pembale'efa ae' endilisi ma ipe' ina ukup biembiefim mupeipa, nambimb ea' penda'am si'i ae' anda'ama lawag anama fik. Ea' ipe' ina penda' amama atom, owa'. I'i ipe' pi'ipa halaf nanima pi'i, ‘Ine' degia nefe' newala naoh,’ nambimb neme'epa nilam si'i ipe' pa'iam.
I'i ipe' pembale'ef endilisi ma penda' beten, amamaga amama ipe' panda' betena pa'i pefa'ami, nambimb ipe' pefa'am.”
Ea' Jisas notanima nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nape nawalipasa basef etin, amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anan mahali'ana ma'i, “Emi na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' opeh amama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapoti' a'i ihali'ipa ma anom basefa ipe' ata' pili' pi'ipa ae' ama atuwasi i'ipipa emi na'ipi ape dembiwei anda' opeh amama.
Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli, emi na'ipana ma nanda' opeh amama? God nape heveni na'ipana napisi'as o enin epen etapanai na'ipana?”
Ea' mame' basef amama manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' wi'i, ‘God nape heveni na'ipana,’ atuwasi anan ni'ipafa ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' owa' pembale'efana?’
Ea' afa' wi'i, ‘Enin epen etapanai na'ipana,’ na'ama esis amam nematawa sohafa. Afa' umbamahafama esis. Dei' main, esis hiesi sa'i Jon anona profet dembinai.”
Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' ina ogawana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Na'ama etin ae' ina i'ipipa ma emi nase'e agel lu'unai anda' opeh amama Ae'ami, owa'.”
“Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Anona aman nogamana biam. Anan nafe'ma nogalomana dambena ma na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogalome ae'inai, dei' ine' fo'o nenda' opeha aof ae'anai newa mandelef wainim.’
Ea' nogalomana nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'.’ Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', namboma okom ea' nafe'.
Ea' ahalomana nafe' na'ipa anona wapoti' na'ipana na'ama etin si'i do'ok nali' na'i. Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, ‘A'e, ahalome.’ Ea' anan ina naila basef ananimi nafe', owa'.
Ea' dei' nogamana amama biam ananimi mamanama naila basef ahalomanai?”
“Amam ma'i, ‘Nali'i.’ ”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam amama mofa' takisi manda' waf aonai maloma nematawa wanda' waf aonai wanda' so'a wauli esis ea' sefe' suwis wambota Godi numafias sili' ma ipe'.

Ipe' pegawa aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli. Anan nali' nafi'mai ipe' ea' nihi'ambepa wafa eaf bu'unai, ea' ipe' owa' peambale'efana. Ea' epes isima sanda' waf aonai anom mofa'asa takisi maloma anowa nematawa wanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai esis sembale'efana. Ipe' pati esis sembale'efana na'ama, ea' ipe' ina pamboma opalef pakwaha waf aonai pambalelefana, owa'.

Ipe' peme' anom basef womun etin. Anona aman dembinai nanda' anona aof nawa wain nahopana. Aof anama nomon anan nanda' anona tang notawa ma sofa'asa su'utip amama wainim, ea' nala' anona ipat launai notawa sope sumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomama aof anama anom amam ma'i monda' maola aof anama mofa' monianai. Ea' nafe' napani anona wambel laoguma.
Nogota su'utip mailanai, nasapa' anom manda' maola anani mafe'ma amam manda' maol aof ananinai. Anan na'i amam mose'ana anom su'utip gwa'aimi aof anama.
Ea' amam amama manda' maol aofi mofa' amam amama nafomona aof anamai naspa'am mafi'i mombalo'am maham, anona mahana afuna endilisi, anona makwaha otamba mahana, ea' anona mahana etin nafa' nafe'.
Ea' anan nafomona aofi nasapa' anom amam mafe' wapoti'. Nasapa' amam hiami mikila' amam mali' nasapa'ami. Ea' amam amama manda' maol aofi manda'am na'ama etina amam si'i mali' mafi'i.
Ea' nagi' nasapa' nogalomana ananinai nafe'ma amam manda' maol aofi. Ea' anan na'iam na'i, ‘Nambimb amam mome' malogel nogalome ae'anai.’
Ea' mombalo'ana mofa'ana mawisi aof ande'ana mahana afuna.
Ea' nambimb aman nafamona aofi nonda' maina amam?”

Ea' amam pris dembemi maloma amam agufumi Judai magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Namanani anan nonda'mam waf aonai endilisi ma amam amama manda' waf aonai noham moga'. Ea' nose'asa aof anama nefe'ma enis epes sumafiana ama nogota gwa'aimi mieilana esis sose'ana anom gwa'aimi anan.”
‘Owap
Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa. God nambimb nelefata basefa waf bu'unai ma ipe' piowis kingdom Ananinai ea' nose'asam enis epes nambimb sombale'efana sonda' waf bu'unai. [
Ea' emi egafis sanda' sisi'ip sowa owap anama, pepe'etas. Ea' i'i owap anama nowa nosali'as, esis loloweas si'i sopof atona.]”
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi mame' basef amama womun etin Jisas na'iami ma'i anan nondala'wifa amam na'i basef amama.
Ea' mape magolopa eaf mombalo'ana ea' amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa. Dei' main, esis hiesi sombale'efana la'ifis sa'i Jisas anona profet.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef womun etin wapoti' na'i,
“Epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona king dembinai etapanai. Nogalomana ananinai na'i noso' ano'w nemata'w, ea' king anama nanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami.
Nemaf anama seagwa' gwa'aimi anai notaga, anan nasapa' amam amama manda' maola anani mafe' mofalai epes isima fowa' nali' nofalasi seafi'mai gwa'aimi amama. Ea' esis sandaiwa'ma seafi'i.

Ea' anan nasapa' anom wapoti' manda' maola anani motambel mafe', ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' fo'mago epes isima ae' andandepas sapani ea' pi'ipas na'ama pi'i, “Peme', ae' andandomba gwa'aimi ae'ami ea'. Mafis bulmakau suwafumi maloma mafis amama lu'wami ae'ami, ape' maham. Ea' amamaga hiami mandandombol ma'oh ea'. Ipe' pifi'mai gwa'aimi amama enda'ama nogalome noso' akwa'wi.” ’
Ea' esis ukup aoma seme'ama seafe' ea' sandamboma safe' deindei ma opeh asasimi. Anona nafe' aof, anona nafe'ma bisnis ananimi.
Ea' amam mapani mombalo' amama manda' maola kingi manda'am kwapete'am maham afum.
Ea' king anama neme' amama okom wandafuna nasapa' soldia ananimi mafe' maha amam maha manda' maola anani afum hi'alam. Ea' makata nif maofa wambel amamunai wapoti'.
Ea' king na'ipa amam manda' maoli na'i, ‘Gwa'aimi enda'ama nogalome noso' akwa'w ea' sandandombam ma'oh ea' epes isima ae' efalasi ina seme' basef ae'ami safi'i, owa'.
Na'ama dei' ipe' pefe' eaf anama hianai dawalegefa piti isima epes hiesi pi'ipas pefalas sifi'mai gwa'aimi amama lu'wami dase'amaimi.’

Anan na'iam na'ama, amam manda' maoli mafe'agon gani gani eaf dawalegef mowa'aniesi epes isima matilisi hiesi, epes bu'wasi saloma sanda' waf aonai wapoti'. Ea' safi'i sape ipat anama sondase'ama ma si'ina endilisi.
Esis sape ea' dembinai king nawis nomona nitilis. Ea' nati anona aman atotona ina nala luwaguf salama nemaf anama dase'amainai, owa'.
Ea' king na'ipana na'i, ‘Alupinai, dei' maina ine' owa' nela luwaguf amama sandase'amaimi nifi'i niwisi na'ae?’ Ea' anan ina na'i anom basef, owa'.
Ea' king na'ipa amam manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ipe' pewa' lagof maloma bo'wagaha ananimi pekwahona nefe' niwis nepe owamb ande'. Owamb anama nambimb anan nowa nelef nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' nepe.’ ”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “A'e, God nofala epes hiesi na'ama etin si'i king anama nofalas. Anan nofala hiesi, ea' nandandepa atona etin sifi'i siowis sope solomana.”
Ea' amam dambami Farisi mafe' manda' basef ma'iam mandame'mama membale'a Jisas mowa'ana. Amam ma'i mome' anom basef ananimi owa' andeande'i ma monda'mana basef mowa'ana si'i sowa' bogof.

Ea' amam masapa' alupumi amamumi maloma amam Heroti amam mafe'ma Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena ine' aman bu'unai na'i basef endilisimi. Ina umbamehena owa'. Ina ni'ipasa anom basef isima enis agof lu'wamisi ea' anom basef isima agof a'asi falafisi, owa'. Ine' na'ipasa basef atifim endilisimi atom ma okom Godi amam nematawa hiesi dende' etin hi'alas.
Ea' ine' ni'ipafa. Dei' ine' okom nape na'imama? Mi'uli ape'inai na'i andeande'ma ape' mose'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nogawa ea' ma waf baso'omainai amamunai ea' na'i, “Ipe' amam pa'i malogof biamipei, dei' maina ipe' pagwamba ae'?
Ipe' pihi'ambe anona moni ma ata' itolona.”
Ea' mofa'manai anona moni ma natolona.
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ambal naloma agel anama mailanai eminai?”
Ea' ma'i, “Anama Sisari gavman dembinai esis Romi.”
Ea' nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamaga Sisari, amama pese'anam Sisar. Ea' amamaga Godi, pese'anam God.”
Amam mame'anama basef amama ea' gegelalasom kwapete'am makwahona mafe'.
Nemaf anama atona anom amam Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas. Amam hiami mombale'ef saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'. Ea' amam mafi'mai Jisas mahali'ana
ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, fowa' gani Moses na'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anan awasi a'ana ea' waulu'mana ata' kope, owalomana ananinai nose'akw nola enis awasi ma soho'ofana.’
Ea' fowa' amam wambota atotona 7-peleim mape. Nali'i sahalomam nase'akw awani a'akw naga', nakwaho'w kwape. Ea' owalomana nase'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwapani awani a'akw.
Ea' owalomana nandatu'ulanai wapoti' nanda'am na'ama etin, ea' anona nandatu'ulomi nase'akw manda'am na'ama etin mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai.
Amam amama wambota atotona ea' maga' hi'alam. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', akwa'w kwaga' waulu'mam.
Ea' anona nemaf esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', nemata'w akwama kwaso' amam 7-peleimi emi egafuna nose'akw? Amam 7-peleim mase'akw hi'alam.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef Baibel na'iami, owa' pegawa pepel Godi. Ea' ipe' dei' ina pa'i basef endilisimi, owa'.
Nemaf anama sa'i sokwaha hi'agilif sotanima sohafel wapoti', amam nematawa ina ata' sondase'ama wapoti', owa'. Sopan etin si'i ensel mape heveni.
Basef amama esis saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti', ipe' patalifa basef amama God na'iam mape Baibeli o owa'? Anan na'ipipa na'ama na'i,
‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki maloma Jekopi.’ Basef amama ma'i God ina Dembinai ma epes isima saga'i, owa'. Anan God epes isima ambal napeis sape namusi.”
Esis amam nematawa hiesi same' na'ama sohafel gegelalasisa basef ananimi.
Ea' Jisas nasopama malogofa amam amama dambami Sadyusi ma basef amama. Ea' anom amam Farisi mame' basef amama mondowa'anima mafi'i felefele'ma anan.
Ea' anona naloma amam nogawa mi'uli Godi andeande' na'i nogwamba Jisasa ni'i anom basef owa' andeande' ma monda'mana basef mowa'ana si'i sowa' bogof. Ea' nahali'ana na'i,
“Dembinai Tisa, maina mi'uli Godi lu'unai nikila' mi'uli hianai nape nali'i?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ukup ipe'imi mohafela Dembinai God ipe'inai mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana ambagof opalef ipe'imi pese'anam hi'ilama Dembinai God atona.
Mi'uli anama lu'unai, nali' endilisi. Ea' mi'uli nagi'i anama, ‘Ipe' ukup mimila enis epes sape felefele'ma ipe'i, si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.’
Basef ofagema ma mi'uli hianai Godi maloma basef amam profet manda'ami hiami mape nomona mi'uli anama biefina.”
Amam Farisi ata' munduwa'animai etifigin maitu, Jisas nahali'am na'i,
“Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama ma Krais anan God nandandepana ea' ma nesapa'ana niefi'i? Anan nogalomana emi?”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Devit nogalomana.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' maina Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela okom Deviti ma na'i Krais Anan Dembinai? Ea' Devit fowa' gani na'i,
‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai Ae'anai na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel kwahisinai Ae'anai la'ela'ef nefe' netagama anona nemaf Ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bo'wagah ine'imi.” ’
Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i, ‘Dembinai.’ Amama atom dei' Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anan Dembinai.”
Ea' dei' ina anona aman la'ifina ma nogwamana anom basef Jisas, owa'. Nemaf anama nafe' nafe' owagama wapoti' amam hiami umbamahama meahali'anama anom basef, owa'.
Ea' Jisas nase'asa basef esis amam nematawa hiesi saloma amam alupumi 12-peleim ananimi.
Na'iam na'ama na'i, “Amom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amama Farisi amam maho'ofa Mosesa mawalipasa mi'uli Godi la'ifim.
Andeande'ma pila basef hiami amam ma'ipipami, ea' ipe' ina penda' waf amam manda'anai, owa' hapainai. Dei' main, amam ma'ipasa basef hiami, ea' amam atom ina mailam, owa'.
Amam mowatania basef amamumi mawalipasama sielam si'i basef wafimi anom awolef wafimi lu'wami mawamonam matoma ikeguf asasimi, ea' amam ina magiambamas mofa'am ma lagof amamumi, owa'.
Amamaga hiami manda'ami manda'am etina epes sotolom sinifelom. Amam mala egip
Amam ukup ma'i siaifah amama motawa mali'i atom dambami atom mapoma, ma nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami o anama ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi.
Amam ma'i hiesi sotoloma sondalalimam sosa'ma agof amamumi anama sandatama sapoma ma ma'i sofalam si'ipam si'i, ‘Dambami tisa’.
Ea' enis epes ina sofala ipe' si'i ipe' dembipei, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' tisa dembinai ipe'inai atotona ea' ipe' hipei pape si'i sahin owan wambota atotona.
Ipe' ina pefala enin epen nape etap anae' pi'i Ahalomepa ipe'inai, owa'. Dei' main, aman anama atotona anan Ahalomepa ipe'inai, nape ilif heveni.
Ea' esis ina sofalepa si'i dembipei tisa, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai tisa ipe'inai Krais atotona, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
Ea' emi egafis nambimb sotaga dembesi ipe'isi, dei' ata' sili' sope sonda' maol sope owina ipe'.
Ea' na'ama etin, emi egafis sefela agof asasimi atom, epes isima anona nemaf agof a'as. Ea' emi egafis sonda' agof asasimi mefe' owin, anona nemaf esis sefa' agof lu'wami.”

“Ipe' amam dembipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam malogof biamipei! Ipe' pewalo uta ma naep esis amam nematawa ma ina nambimb siowis kingdom heveni, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pafe' pawis nomon, ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sefe' siwis nomon, isima ipe' pasopamas eafa sefe' siowis. [

Ipe' amam dembipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' malogof biamipei. Ipe' pawis ifagw amama nematawa alifiwai, pawis pakawalopom amamaga awoumi. Panda'am na'ama panda' beten launai etina esis sitilipa si'i ipe' bu'wipei. Anona nemaf God newaloga epes hiesi, enis epes owa' seanda' waf aonai na'amainai sofa' nimanimi kwawie'um, ea' ipe' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.]

Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' malogof biamipei! Ipe' pafe' hi'agoma naoh etap wambel hiagoma, pifa'ai anona epena notaga alupunai ipe'inai nila basef ipe'imi. Anan ea' nataga alupunai ipe'inai, ea' ipe' panda' anan aona endilisi nikila' ipe' na'ama. Ipe' aopei ma peafe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi mapoma. Ea' ipe' panda' epen anama nikila' ipe' nenda' waf aonai endilisi nandahama nefe' wambel aonai hel.

Ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' naep masi'ipei pa'i pihi'ambasa eaf enis epes. Ipe' pawalipas na'ama pa'i, ‘I'i emi egafis si'i agola ipat anama lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, amama falafumi. Ea' emi egafis si'i agola gol amama bu'wami sofalo'ma ipat anama ma si'i senda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, senda'am sila basef si'i sa'i.’

Ipe' pahaga pagaoli ukup mololaepai ea' naep masi'ipei! Main de'im mape lu'um mikila'? Gol amama sofalo'ma ipat anama amam lu'um o ipat anama bu'unai nanda' gol amama mataga bo'oma naep Godi? Ea' dei' ipat anama atona nikila' gol.

Ea' ipe' pawalipas wapoti' pa'i, ‘I'i emi egafis si'i balata sofa' mafis saso' Godanai ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, amama falafumi. Ea' emi egafis si'i ofa mafis satoma balata ilifa senda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, esis silam si'i sa'iam.’
Ipe' naep masi'ipei! Maim amamaga mape lu'um? Ofa mafis mape lu'um o balata nanda' ofa anama nataga bo'ona ma naep Godi, dei' nataga lu'una? Ea' dei' balata nikila' ofa.
Na'ama dei' emi egafis si'i agel balata anama ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, isima senda' basef amama la'ifima amamaga matoma balata ilif maloma balata wapoti'.
Ea' emi egafis si'i agel ipat lu'unai Godi ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, isima sanda' basef asasimi la'ifima ipat anama naloma Anan nape ipat anama.
Ea' emi egafis si'i heven ilifa sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, isima sa'i sonda' basef asasimi la'ifima balata bu'unai Godi naloma Aman anama natoma balata anama.

Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam malogof biamipei! Ipe' pawaloga nambawa maloma lombo maloma akwal mamumami hiami pase'ana tu'wanim God. Panda'am na'ama ma akwal amama hiami agofuma amama min, dil, kumin. Ea' ipe' pindihi'ama basef amama hiami ma mi'uli God na'iami ma waf bu'unai ma pigiambama epes, piti esis uwahipis, penda' amamaga andeande' ma waf endilisinai. Waf anama hianai neloma waf pindilali pese'ana amamaga maim Godanai, anama pekolasana pihapilana etin pilana.
Ipe' naep masi'ipei, pa'i pihi'ambasa eaf enis epes! Ipe' panda' maola patofa afi'awa amama sa'umi mail maloh nembawa, ea' mafin anama lu'unai kamel ea' pewalo'ana nalomam.

Ipe' amam dembipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam malogof biamipei! Ipe' pandombasa kap plet ande'ama atom bo'om. Ea' nomon owa'. Ipe' opalef si'ipama waf sanda' walanai naloma waf anama alop atonai aonai.
Ipe' Farisi, naep masi'ipei! Ipe' ata' pili' pendombasa kap malep nomonam muli' ma nambimb ande'ema wapoti' meataga bo'om.

Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' epes malogof biamipei! Ipe' pandahama si'i ifagw sa'umi sawa epes saga'i hi'agilif sanda' pen afitinai saofam. Ea' ande'ama bo'om ma satolom, ea' nomonama si'ima amamaga awami folo'alami mala maloma bihiguf balagah epes saga'i alialimi.
Ipe' pape na'ama etin. Esis epes sati alop ipe'inai ande' sa'i ipe' panda' waf bu'unai. Ea' nomon waf aonai baso'omunai ma malogof biagufi patopa' basef anai ma mi'uli Godi amama mape si'ima ipe'.

Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam pa'i malogof biamipei. Ipe' panda' hi'agilif amam profet maga'i ea' pefalo'ma ifagw epes isima bu'wasi saga'i sapeimi.
Ea' ipe' pa'i, ‘I'i afa' fowa' gani ope si'i akusafa afa'isi, afa' ina wiegiambama esis oha amam profet afum, owa'.’
Ama basef amama atom ipe' pawalapami ofagema ipe'imi atom, pa'i ipe' akusas pagi' patagai saha profet maga'i.
Ea' ipe' piwatani waf anama aonai esis akusipa sanda'anai hi'ilana!
Ipe' si'i iguf awami pataga iguf awami mahasi! Anona nemaf God nonda'masa basef lu'wami ea' ni'ipipa pefe' pepe wambel aonai hel. Dei' penda'am pi'imama ma nambimb pefe'ma basef amama? Owa'etin.

Na'ama Ae' asapa'o anom profet molomago anom amam ukup bu'wami mapeimi molomago anom gawaimi ma Baibeli amam mofo'o motagamepa. Anona nemaf ipe' peham moga', ea' anom ipe' piunda lawah usi'imi tu'wanaimi, anom pepe pela'am nomon ifagw pa'i basef papeimi. Ea' ipe' penda'am petofam anona wambel taun lu'unama ea' petofam mofa' mefe' anona taun ea' petofam pegolopam etin pefe'. Ipe' anona nemaf penda' waf aonai anama.

Ea' dei' epes isima sape bu'wasi hiesi ma enis sahas saga', ofagema amama hiami anona nemaf mopoma ipe'. Nali'i Abel anan aman bu'unai nafi'i nafi'i natagama aman akutainai profet Sakaraia, Berekia nogalomana, anama akusipa sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi naloma balata saofa mafis saso' Godanai. Amama ofagema anona nemaf mila ipe' etipa.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipe'. Amamaga nimanimi awami ofagema anona nemaf mopoma ipe' epes hipei amam nematawa dei' papani.

O ipe' Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipe' paha amam profet afumi, pakwaha otamba paha amam God nasapa'am mafi'mai ipe' maga'. La'ela'ef ae' a'i ekolasa ipe' epes hipei si'i awata numa'inai nowa'ani nogami nakolasam mawis mail behenagof ananimi. Owa'etin, ipe' pandaiwa'.
Ipe' peme'! Dei' wambel ipe'inai anona nemaf aona wafina nope.
Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' nambimb ina petolowe wapoti' ma nambimb pi'i, ‘Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anama nafi'i agel Dembinai ma nonda'ana nondanifel.’ ”
Jisas nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nafe' etin, amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai Anan. Amam ma'i mihi'ambana ifagw lu'wami lotumi.

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pati ifagw amama hiami? Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona nemaf ina anom otamba motoma anom otamba mope, owa'etin. Sagwasi'am sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona etin.”

Jisas tol nape halaf anama lawah oliv motawama ea' alupumi ananimi atom mafi'mai anan ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' ni'ipafa amamaga amama nambai' motaga. Maina ikwaf nili' notaga ma afa' ogawa ine' na'i netanima neafi'i ma etap anae' higililana?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa.

Dei' main, amam hiami anona nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agel ae'anai mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i.’ Ea' anona nemaf mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi some' basef amamumi si'i endilisimi silam.
Anona nemaf peme' enis sopa' lupulupu' sonda' wandaf ea' enis seme'asa wandaf si'ipipa, ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Amamaga amama anona nemaf meatagai, ea' nemaf akutainai ata' owa'.

Enis epes sape anama etap hiagoma kantri sofela wandaf sopa' soloma anona kantri. Anona dembinai king nehafel no'wa enis wambel hiagoma ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king no'wa ananisi wambel hiagoma. Enis epes wambel hiagoma nolomohas sope, ea' enis wambel hiagoma atona etin etap suwambon nokoto'.
Amamaga amama hiami ata' muli' motaga si'i nimanimi mali' matagama nemata'w kwa'i kola awani.
Amama motaga ma ea', esis sofa'epa ma sese'epa nimanimi, ea' sehepa pega'. Epes hiesi wambel hiagoma opalef aoma ipe' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipe' paila basef Ae'ami na'ama dei' sahepa.
Nemaf anama amam nematawa hiesi sokwaha sombale'efa Dembinai ea' sondawawalapa etin sose'asas sefe'ma naumbih sohas, ea' epes isima ukup aoma enis.
Ea' amam profet hiami mambaso'ami motaga mohafel mufi'i mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi.
Waf aonai anona nemaf netaga lu'una, na'ama amam nematawa hiesi sokwaha waf anama ukup maimaila enis epes mi'i uwahipis.
Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa ae' la'ifis situ seatagama nemaf akutainai, isima anona nemaf God nefa'as setanimani.

Ea' anona nemaf esis si'ipasa basef amama bu'wami Godi ma epes hiesi siowis kingdom heveni. Esis si'ipas ganima etap hiagoma hi'ilagon ama amam nematawa hiesi ganima wambel hiagoma ata' sili' seme'am ea' nemaf akutainai notaga.

Anona nemaf ipe' piti amamaga awami mohambombaga amamaga bu'wami motaga si'i fowa' gani profet Daniel na'i basef mail Baibeli ma'i. Amamaga amama motaga mope anama bo'wagoma nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. (Emi egafis sitalifa basef amama esis sogawa basef ofagema andeande'.)
Nemaf anama amam nematawa sape etap hiagoma Judia sofa' sefe' sondowasa' halafutagw.
Emi egafis sape ipat ande' felefele' ina ata' setanima siwis sefa'ai amamaga asasimi ipat nomon, owa'.
Emi egafis sapani aofi, ina ata' setanima sefe' wambel sefa' luwaguf maim asasimi, owa'.
Nematawa opafuwai waloma awama awasi ata' sagwa' nomambeh atomi, ae' a'i awau uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota anama ofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi meataganai.
Ipe' penda' betena Goda ipe' ina pefa' pefe' nogota anama uf noloma asaf mifi'i o nemaf anama Sabat sapoma noma'wanai, owa'.

Nogota anama nimanimi lu'wami endilisi. Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' etap nataga nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', nimanimi awami amama fowa' gani ina anom na'amaimi mataga, owa'. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' ina anom nimanimi amama motaga, owa'.
I'i God owa' notopa' nimeguf mefe' bandam, anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi higililas hi'ilas. Owa'etin. God okom napoma epes isima anan nasahe'as ea' dei' natopa' nogota anama bandana.
Nemaf anama notaga ma i'i enis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Ipe' piti Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i anan nape na'ae’, o ‘nani nape gani,’ ipe' ina pembale'efas, owa'. Hapaisi.

Dei' main, nemaf anama anom amam mombaso'am mi'i amam Krais o mi'i amam profet motaga monda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani hianai si'i God atona nanda'anai. Endilisi i'i amam la'ifim, mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea' mohambombagas. Owa'. Hapaisi.
Peme', ae' ali' a'ipipa ea' ma amamaga amama nimanimi dei' ata' owa' meatagai.

Na'ama i'i emi egafis si'ipipa si'i, ‘Ipe' piti, anan nani nape gani epes a'agoma wafiguma fetauguma,’ ipe' ina peme'as pefe'agon, owa'. I'i emi egafis si'i, ‘Ipe' piti nani nape ipat nani nomon’, ipe' ina pembale'efas, owa'.

Ipe' piti otaga holhol pelepele' holala nataga gani aon natefima ea' howalagon nafe' anama hiagoma aon nowalama naso'ma. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nemaf anama ae' etanima iefi'i, enda'am na'ama etin hiesi sotolowe.
Mamagoma alop saga'i na'oma, ea' anama atogon anona nemaf komemb mefe' munduwa'anima.
Nimanimi amama hiami ma nogota anama hi'ilam ea', mehip etin
‘Aon alipunai netaga owamb, ea' aon owambunai wa na'ef ina molo, owa'. Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, amamaga hiami mape otagai ea' bol etin mope.’

Nemaf anama ondowa mowai, ikwaf ae'anai netaga gani otaga ilif, Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ifi'i. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma selef. Ea' siti ae' eloma elagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma amamaga howalagon bu'wami Godi moloma pepel Ananinai.

Ea' alof lu'unai nelef mehip, esapa' amam ensel ae'ami mofe' etap hiagoma aon natefima nowalama wa'owa'ol anama biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganima etap otaga mafe' motambela. Ensel amama mofe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea' Ananisi sondatama etifigin.
Ipe' ukup mi'i anom basef womun etina fig. Ipe' piti lawag anama fik noloma lawah hiami wapoti'. Ipe' piti ilaof nonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota anama nelemb ea' felefele' ma meaof.
Ea' na'ama etin nemaf anama ipe' piti amamaga amama ali' a'ipipami motaga hi'ilam, ipe' pegawa ae' afi'i aitu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laona, owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' papani ina nambimb poga' ulal, ata' owa', ipe' piti amamaga amama hiami motaga hi'ilam.
Otaga noloma etap hiagoma anona nemaf hegililam hi'ilam, ea' basef ae'ami ina anona nemaf hi'ilam, owa'etin. Mope la'ela'ef hihif.

Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei a'ipipa. Owa' enin epen negawa nemaf anama o nogota anama ae' iefi'ianai. Amam ensel mape heven ilifi wapoti' ina mogawana. Ae' nogalomana Godi wapoti' ina egawana, owa'. Ahalome atona nape ilif anan atona negawa nemaf anama. Waf fowa' sanda'ana nogota anama Noa napenai, ea' na'ama etin si'i esis sonda'ana nemaf anama felefele'ma iefi'i etaga etap anae'.
Fowa' gani embel lu'wami ata' owa' motagai, nogota anama esis sape sa' gwa'aimi sa' embel amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandase'ama etin safe' safe' sataga nemaf anama Noa nafe' nawis sip.

Amam nematawa isima ina sagawa nemaf anama, owa'. Esis ukup mase'as sape na'ama etin safe' satagama nemaf anama embel lu'wami mataga mahas muwambu'was saga' hi'alas. Ea' na'ama etina nemaf anama ae' etanima iefi'ianai.
Anama amam biam mondao'oma monda' maol mapani aof, God nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nope.
Ea' anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' bret, nemaf anama God nofa' ano'w kofe' nokwaha ano'w kope.
Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pegawa nambai' Dembinai ipe'inai nifi'i, owa'.

Ipe' ukup mopoma anom basef wamun etin pegawam. I'i ofagena ma ipati nili' nogawa owamb maina nogota nanda' wali neafi'ianai, ama naep motawa notologon nope, nanda' wali ina nafi'i nupisila ipat ananinai nuwis nomon, owa'.
Ea' ipe' wapoti' naep motawai pepe. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen endililsiwei iefi'i anona nemaf ipe' ina pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf anama, owa'.

Ipe' hipai penda' waf bu'unai pehafa Ae' si'i aman anama gawainai numafi amam manda' maoli nanda' maol andeande'. Aman anama dembinai ananinai nandandepana ma numafi ananimi manda' maoli ma nease'ama gwa'aimi amam nogota anan na'ianai.
Nemaf anama dembinai ananinai notanima niefi'ianai, ma niti aman anama nanda' maol andeande', aman anama nondanifel.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Dembinai ananinai anona nemaf nonda'ana nope dembinai ma numafi amamaga hiami ananimi.
Ea' i'i aman anama nonda' waf aonai okom napoma opaf ananinai atona ni'i, ‘Dembinai ae'anai ina nambimb nifi'i ulal, owa'.’
Ama anan noha amam manda' maol etini nea' gwa'aimi embel la'ifimi noloma amam amama mahaga magaoli.
Ea' Dembinai ananinai notanima nifi'i anona nemaf aman anama ina ni'i Dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'.
Ea' nohana negalo'mana nope noloma epes isima sambaso'ami malogof biefimisi. Wambel anama awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete'as sope.

Nemaf anama epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anom basef womun etina nematawa awiawai 10-peleiwa. Anona aman na'i noso' ano'w nemata'w, nafe' napani ma notanima nifi'i. Ea' nematawa awama awiawaiwai ohafel ofa' lamifah mandandawa wafe' wa'i witi aman anama eaf o'wana ufi'i.
Wanowa biawa gawa a'awai ea' wanowa biawa ogawai.
Awama gawa a'awai ofa' lamifah malomawa wafi'i, ea' awau ina ofa'ai kerosin etifin nalomawa, owa'.
Ea' awama gawaiwai owala kerosin batowagof ofa'am etifim maloma lamifah awoumi ofa'am etifim wafe'.
Aman anama ina dei' nafi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Ea' awau hiawai naep nimanim ambeh mahawa wa'oh.
Wa'oh wafe' wafe' ma amaneta la'efina wame' anona maf nataga na'i, ‘Dei' aman naso' nemata'wi nafi'i. Ipe' pefe' petolona eaf pe'wanai pifi'i.’
Ea' nematawa awama ohafel, wandondomba lamifah awoumi ma weafe'.
Ea' nematawa awama gawa a'awai wandaila awama gawaiwai wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Ipe' ata' pese'apa kerosin tu'wanina. Lamifah ape'imi ma'i fendaga'am.’
Ea' awau wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Owa'. Kerosin anae' dende'ma ape'. Ipe' fo'o stua petala anona ipe'inai.’

Ea' awo ata' wafe' watala kerosin etin, aman anama noso' nemata'wi nafi'i. Ea' nematawa awama wandandombol wapoti', wawis ipat nomon walomana sa' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma aman naso' nemata'wi, ea' uta naso'.
Ea' awama wafe' watala kerosin otanima wafi'i wagi' wataga, ea' waitu ofalana wa'i, ‘Dembinai, Dembinai, ine' usi'mapai uta.’
Ea' anan nagwamawa basef na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' owa' eagaupei.’
Ea' Jisas na'i anom basef wapoti' na'i, ‘Dei' ea' na'ama etin, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pegawa nambai' ae' iefi'i.’

Nemaf anama ae' etanima iefi'ianai epes siowis kingdom heveni na'ama etin si'i anom basef womun etina anona aman na'i nefe' anagon. Anan nofalai amam amama manda' maola anani mafi'i, nase'ama amamaga ananimi atona etina mumafiam.
Ea' anan nawalomam moni amam. Anona nase'ana 5,000 kina, anona nase'ana 2,000 kina, anona nase'ana 1,000 kina. Anan nase'am otamba amama dende' ma gawa amamunai ea' nafe'.
Ea' aman anama nofa' 5,000 kinai mehip etin nanda' maolana ea' nofa' 5,000 kina wamenai wapoti'.
Ea' aman anama nofa' 2,000 kinai wapoti' nanda' maolan nofa' 2,000 kina wamenai wapoti' naloma fowa'inai.
Ea' aman anama nofa' 1,000 kinai dembinai ananinai nase'ananai nofa'ana nafe' nala'agon nawa moni anama nambaho'wana etap.
Ama nogota laona nafe' ea', dembinai amamunai notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i ata' ni'i basef andeande' noloma amam nogawa moni anama anan nase'amanai.

Ea' aman anama nofa' 5,000 kinai nafi'i ea' nofa'ai 5,000 kina anama anan nanda' maol nofa'anai wapoti' na'ipa dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' nase'e 5,000 kina ea' dei' ine' niti ae' anda' maola moni anama dei' efa' 5,000 kina wamenai wapoti'.’

Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' aman bu'winai nanda' maol andeande'. Dei' fowa' ine' nimafi amamaga sa'um andeande'. Dei' enda'ena nimafi amamaga lu'wami. Ine' nifi'i nendanifel neloma Dembinai ine'inai.’
Ea' aman anama nofa' 2,000 kinai nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' niti. Ine' nase'e 2,000 kina, dei' anda' maola moni anama, efa' 2,000 kina wamenai wapoti'.’

Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' aman bu'winai nanda' maol andeande'. Fowa' ine' nimafi amamaga sa'umi andeande'. Dei' enda'ena nimafi amamaga lu'wami. Ine' fi'i nendanifel neloma Dembinai ine'inai.’

Ea' aman anama nofa' 1,000 kinai anan wapoti' nafi'i na'ipa Dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' egawa ine' aman la'ifinai nagi amamaga na'i ine'imi atom. Aof anona aman nawamanai anama ine' nafe' nala'am. Ea' anona etap anona aman nowaha olelembanai, ine' nafi'i nagiam.
Ae' okom napoma ine'. Na'ama ae' umbamahe ma ine', dei' afe' ala'agon ambaho'am 1,000 kina ine'inai amboho'ana nape etap. Amama amamaga ine'imi ea' ine' tanima fa'amo.’

Ea' Dembinai ananinai nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nanda' maoli, ine' aman aowinai endilisi. Ine' ala'uta nainai. Endilisi ine' negawa ae' ala' gwa'aimi anona aman nawam aof ananinai, afe' atopa' wit anona etap anona amani.
I'i na'ama, dei' nefa'ana nembe'ana benga ae' etanima ifi'i efa'ana neloma anona wamenai wapoti'.
Ea' ipe' dalombana 1,000 kina aman anama pese'anana nefe'ma aman anama nofa' moni 10,000 kinai.’
Dei' main? Emi egafis sahapila amamaga amama nambimb sofa' anom wamenai wapoti' ma sefa' hiami. Ea' emi egafis amamaga a'asi, amamaga kwaiyo'um esis sahapilami, amama nambimb endalombasam esis.
Aman anama wafinai ipe' pekwahona nefe' nuwis ande' akotiguma endilisi. Wambel anama awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete'as sapoma.
Nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei iefi'i ilumai pepel howalagon ae'anai, ea' amam ensel hiami molome mifi'i. Ama nemaf anama ae' epe etoma balata lu'unai ae'anai ma howalagon mafi'i heveni.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma sifi'i sope naep ae'imi. Ea' ae' ihihi'as enda'as situ biefis, si'i aman numafi sipsipi nasifa' sipsip mafe' anagon, meme mafe' anagon.
Ea' enda' epes sefe' situ wa'ol lagel kwahisinai ae'anai si'i sipsip, ea' epes isima God nondaiwa'masi situ wa'ol lagel eganai si'i meme.

Ea' ae' dembiwei king i'ipa esis isima sape lagel kwahisinai i'i, ‘Ipe' Ahalome ae'anai nofalo'mepa ma pendanifel, ipe' piwis kingdom Ananinai pefa' amamaga amama ipe'imi fowa' etap owa' ata' neatagai ma'omipei.
Dei' main, ipe' fowa' pati ae' nolomahe ape ipe' pase'e gwa'aimi. Pati iap nase'e, pase'e embel a' embel. Ae' afi'i si'i anona wambelinai ipe' pefa'e afe' ifagw ipe'imi.
Ea' ae' luwaguf maim a'e, ipe' pase'eam anda'am ea' awasiwi ipe' pimafi andeande'. Ae' ape anda' kalabus, ipe' pafo'o patolowe.’
Ea' esis isima bu'wasi sogwa basef ananimi si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' maina nemaf ape' mati ine' nolomahena mase'ena gwa'aimi ine'? Maina nemaf ine' eap mase'ena ape' mase'ena embel?
Ea' maina nogota ape' matilina si'i anona wambelinai ape' mofa'ena mafi'i ifagw ape'imi? Ea' maina nemaf ape' matilina lowaf a'ena, mase'ena lowaf?
Ea' maina nemaf mati awes nanda'ena nape kalabus mafe' matilina?’

Ea' ae' dembiwei king egwamasa basef i'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Maim opeh bu'wami ipe' panda'ama pagiambama esis sahin owan ae'asi falafisi agof a'asi, amama ipe' ina panda'masam esis etis, owa'. Panda'meam ae' wapoti'.’

Ea' ae' i'ipa esis saitu lagel eganai wa'ol wapoti' i'ipas, ipe' si'amae fo'o. God nandaiwa'mepa na'i ipe' epes aopei. ‘Ipe' fo'o wambel aonai nif lu'wami ma'oma. Nif anama Ahalome nanda'am mandandombol ma'oma aman aonai Satan naloma ensel ananimi atom.
Dei' main, ipe' fowa' pati ae' nolomahe ape, ipe' ina pase'e gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' ae' eap mase'ema embel, ipe' ina pase'e embel a' embel, owa'.
Ea' ae' si'i epen anagon lauguniwei, ea' ipe' owa' pefa'e pefe' ifagw ipe'imi, owa'. Ea' lowaf a'e ipe' ina pase'e lowaf, ae' awes nanda'e, ape anda' kalabus ea' ipe' ina pafo'o patolowe, owa'etin.’

Ea' esis wapoti' sogwa basef sohali' ae' si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' maina nemaf ape' mati ine' gwa'aimi embel a'ena nolomahena, ine' epen anagon lauguninai, ine' lowaf a'ena awes nand'ena, nape nanda' kalabus, ea' ape' owa' mofo'o meatilina?’
Ea' ae' egwamasa basef esis i'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, maina waf owa' peanda'ana enin epen inima falafini agel a'ani, amama ea' na'ama etin ina panda'meana ae' wapoti', owa'etin.’
Ea' epes isima anona nemaf sefe' sofa' amamaga awami mape la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' epes isima bu'wasi anona nemaf owagama sofa' ambal namunai sefe' sope anama sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.”
Jisas nawalipasa basef amama ma hi'alam, ama nogota anama anan na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i,

“Ipe' pegawa, nimeguf biam atom ata' mape ma nemaf anama sogwa' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova ea' neataga. Nemaf anama anona aman nowalapa ae' ataga epen endililsiwei ma anom amam naumbih mundi ieil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai mohe eaga'.”
Nemaf anama amam pris dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai munduwa'anima mape ipat Kaiafasi, anan pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami.
Ea' ma'i basef mandame'mama mefe' mondambaho' mombalo' Jisas mohana neaga'.
Ea' amam mandaiwa'ma meambalo'ana nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami. Na'ama epes hiesi ukup aom ea' sohafel sonda' wandaf.
Nemaf anama Jisas nape Betani nape ipat anona aman Saimon, fowa' awes aonai nanda' alop ananinai nambo', dei' ambo'ona.

Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'mai anan kwahapila anona botol sanda'ana si'i owap, embel sanda alogw bu'wami ma'anai satalona otamba lu'wami nala botol anama. Ea' kwakolo'w sanda anama newala balaga Jisasi ma tebol anan natomama.
Amam alupumi ananimi mati na'ama, ukup amamumi aom endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina akwa'w kwahambombaga sanda anama nafe' etin?
I'i afa' ofa'ana enis epes sotalona moni hianai ma afa' ofa'ana oso' epes isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim, andeande'. Owa'etin.”
Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamumi, na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' ukup aom mapoma nemata'w akwama? Owa'. Akwa'w kwanda' waf bu'unai ma ae'.
Isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim sape salomepa nimeguf hiami. Ea' ae' ina ata' elomepa epe nimeguf hiami, owa'.
Nemata'w akwama kwakolo'wa sanda anama ma alop ae'anai kwanda' amama kondola'wifa felefele'ma esis seawe hi'agif.
Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ganima etap wambel hiagoma anona nemaf si'ipasa basef amama bu'wami Godi, si'ipasa basef ako'umi wapoti' ma ukup meapoma waf bu'unai akwa'w kwanda'meanai.”
Nogota anama anona alupumi Jisasi 12-peleim agilinama Judas Kariotinai nafe'ma amam pris hiami dambami.
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i pese'e main petalowe ma ihi'ambepana?”
Ea' amam matalifa moni silva 30-peleim mase'ana.
Ea' nogota anama atona nohafel nanda'am la'ela'ef nagolopa anona eafa nihi'ambama Jisas amama meambalo'ana.

Nemaf anama sali' sa' anom gwa'aimi sa'i Pasova esis sa' bret anama owa' neatef lu'unai ea' amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai anan mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat eti ma ine' nea' gwa'aimi amama?”

Ea' na'i, “Ipe' pefe' taun, pefe'ma anona aman pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai Tisa na'i, “Nemaf dahandahama God nandandepamianai ea' felefele'. Ae' a'i ea' Pasova anama eloma alupumi ae'ami ope ipat ine'inai.” ’ ”
Ea' amam alupumi ananimi manda'am na'ama si'i anan na'ipam ea' mandondomba gwa'aimi Pasova.
Ea' owamb anan nape nagwa' gwa'aimi tebol naloma alupumi ananimi 12-peleim.
Ea' amam mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atuwasi nefe' nihi'amba amam naumbiha ae' efe' eapoma.”
Ea' ukup amamumi nimanim endilisi, mohafel mahali'ana atona etin ma'i, “Dembinai, ae' o emi?”
Ea' anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anama dei'aol nalome wahapila bret walata dis, anan ea' ma'una, anama atuwasi nowalapa ae' ma naumbih ae'ami.

A'e, ataga epen endilisiwei, atuwasi enis epes sehe eaga' si'i Buk Baibel na'iama ae'. Ea' aman anama nowalapa ae' ma naumbih, anan uwahipina endilisi. Nambimb nimanimi awami endilisi motagamana. Fowa' mama'wana owa' ata' kolanai, andeande'. Ama anan ina notagama amamaga nimanimi awami. Owa'etin.”
Ea' aman anama Judas atuwasi nowalapa Jisas amam naumbih anan na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' o emi?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' etina na'iam.”
Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, nafela anona bret, nanda' beten nanifela God, nawalona nase'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' felana pea'ana. Bret anama alop ae'anai.”
Ea' nafela anona kap embel wain nalanai nanifela God, nase'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' hipei gwa'am etin.
Embel amama esimbel ae'ami manda' basef amama Godi ma'i endilisimi atomi mataga la'ifim. Esimbel amama ae' ekolo'wama God nokwahomasa waf aonai epes hiesi sanda'anai.
Ae' a'ipipa, ina ata' etanima ea' embel wain wapoti', owa'. Ae' efe' etaga wambel Ahalomei, ea' anona wain dambainai elomepa anama.”
Amam manda' anona awaf ea' mawisi mafe' mondowasa' halaf lawah oliv motawama.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Atuwasi owamb anae' ipe' pindaiwa'ma pembale'efa ae' pekwahowe. Dei' main, fowa' gani Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, God na'i,
‘Anona nemaf owagama gani, ae' eha aman anama numafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amama mofa' mefe' atona etin.’
Ea' owa'etin. Nambimb ae' etanima ehafel wapoti' ili'ipa efe' etap hiagoma Galili.”
Ea' Pita nagwa basef na'ama na'i, “I'i endilisi amam alupumi ine'imi hiemi meambale'efa ine' mi'i mokwahena, hapaimi, ae' embale'efa ine' la'ifiwi ina atuwasi ikwahina, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, dei' owamb anae' awata ata owa' nondo'am, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Owa'etin. I'i esis soha afa' biafa oga' etin, ae' ina embaho' agel ine'inai, owa'etin.”
Ea' alupumi hiami Jisasi ma'iam na'ama etin hi'alam.
Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafe' etin anagon Getsemani lawah hiami oliv motawama. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pepe na'ae, ae' efe' gani wa'ol enda' beten.”
Ea' anan nao'wa Pita naloma Sebedi batausana Jemsi Jon nao'wam mafe'. Ea' name' opaf ananinai nimanina kwapete' endilisi.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Opaf ae'anai nimanina endilisi ma ae' ega'. Ipe' pepe na'ae pindumafuma pepe pehafa ae' eatanimani.”
Ea' anan nandamboma nafe' fele' nowa nambe' opaf notawa nanda' beten na'i, “Ahalome Ae'inai, i'i ine' ni'i a'e, nekwahome nimanimi amama. Ea' ine' nila okom ine'inai atona, Ae' owa'.”
