Nahali'ana ea', nehafel notanima nafe'ma alupumi ananimi mapoma, nati amam ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Pita na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa pepe pehafa ae' o owa'? Nogota a'ipipa a'i pepe pehafa ae' ina laona, owa'. Nogota bandana si'i aua atotona.
Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pepe penda' beten. Na'ama amamaga meagwambipei motagama ipe'. Endilisi ambagof ipe'mi ma'i a'e ma penda' beten, ea' alop nimanina ala'uta naepa.”
Ea' anan notanima nafe'ma bif nanda' beten na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai, i'i owa' anona eaf ae' indihi'ama nimanimi amama, ea' hapaimi, ae' efa'am. Ine' nila okom ine'inai atona.”
Anan nahali'ana ea' nandamboma notanima nafi'i bif amam mapoma nati amam ata' ma'oh etin. Dei' main, naep amamumi nimanim.
Ea' nakwahom notanima nafe' nanda' beten wenif. Beten anama atona do'ok nali' nanda'anai, notanima nanda'ana wapoti'.

Ea' notanima nafi'mai amam mapoma na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ata' papoma noma'w pa'oh etin? Peme'! Nogota ae'anai nataga. Dei' nemaf anae' anona aman aonai nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa' Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.
Hafel! Afa' ofe' uti aman anama nihi'ambama ae' ma naumbih ae'ami dei' nafi'i.”
Jisas ata' naitu na'ipam etin, Judas, anona amam 12-peleim Jisasi, anan nafi'i nalumai amam hiami mahapila bainahi belep. Amam pris dambami malumai amam agufumi dambami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.
Ea' aman anama nowalapa Jisas, nali' na'ipam nanda' ikwaf nihi'ambam na'i, “Atuwasi ipe' piti ae' iesisi' dalogwanai, aman anama ea' Jisas ma'una. Ipe' pembalo'ana pewa'ana.”
Ea' anan nafe'ma Jisas mehip na'i, “Owamb bu'unai, Dembinai Tisa.” Ea' nasisi' dalogwana.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Alupinai, amamaga ine' nafi'i ma na'i nenda'ami, da'am mehip.”
Ea' amam mafi'i felefele'ma Jisas mowasa' lagof mombalo'ana.
Ea' anona aman nape naloma Jisas, nala lagel nagiai bainat ananinai naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami, natopa' aliga ananinai pele'atana nowa.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Wala bainat notambel nowala napoma. Emi egafis sapa' bainah, anona nemaf bainah mohas soga'.
Ine' negawa pepel Ahalomei o owa'? I'i ae' ihali'ana, Anan nase'e ensel ananimi hiami endilisi mehip mikila' amam soldia hiami wambotagw 12-peleim. Owa'.
I'i ae' enda' waf anama, atuwasi basef amama fowa' God na'iam mape buk Baibeli ina mataga alihim dende'ma amam mifi'i mombale'e, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Ipe' pefa'ai bainahi belep pafi'i si'i pafi'i pa'i pewa' anona aman aonai napa' naloma gavmani? Nimeguf hiami ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wami esis amam nematawa hiesi ea' ipe' ina pembale'e.
Ea' dei' amamaga amama ipe' panda'ami mataga dende'ma basef amama fowa' God na'ipa amam profet manda'am mail buk mataga endilisi.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
Amam amama mombalo' Jisas mofa'ana mafe' ipat anona pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami Kaiafas. Ea' amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma agufumi esis Judai mali' mafi'i mundawa'anima mape.

Ea' Pita ina nalomam nafe' etin, owa'. Anan nape lougun nagi'mam nafe' nataga endalelemb nawis ipat dembinai prisi nafe' nape naloma amam polisman mapoma nif. Anan na'i nope niti atuwasi maim meataga.
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami Juda mumafi koti, amam hiami ma'i mogolopa enis epesa sombaso'ma Jisas ma anom basefa mohana neaga'.
Ea' epes hiesi sataga sa'i basef baso'maimi mafe'ma Anan. Ea' esis ina satagama anom basef endilisimi ofagema ma mohana neaga', owa'. Ea' anom amam biam mataga
ma'i, “Aman anama na'i anom basef na'i, ‘Ae' la'ifiwei ma etalona ipat lu'unai Godi ma etanima ela'ana wapoti' nimeguf wanom.’ ”
Ea' pris anama dembinai naitu nahali' Jisas na'ama na'i, “Ine' negwa basef amama o owa'? Dei' maina amam ma'ipina basef na'ama?”
Ea' Jisas ina na'i anom basef, owa'.
Ea' pris anama na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi ma agel dembinai Godi nape la'ela'ef hihif, ine' kipa ape'. Ine' Krais nogalomana Godi nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipe' pa'iam ea' ma'um. Ea' ae' a'ipipa, anona nemaf ipe' piti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, epe lagel da'isinai Godi. Epe otaga ilif etanima ifi'i petolowe.”

Jisas na'iam na'ama ea', pris anama okom wandafuna ea' nahape' klos amama anan nalami na'iam na'i, “Anan nanda' dembinai God findiwana ma basef awami! Ape' ina ata' mofalai enis epes wapoti' sifi'i si'i anom basefa anan, owa'. Anan na'ipana basef awami ma God, ea' amama dei' pame'anamam ea'.
Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama?”
Ea' amam hiami magwamana basef ma'i, “Anan nanda' waf aonai ea' andeande'ma neaga'.”
Ea' amam misi'wafa amaga Jisasi mahana lagof amamumi. Ea' anom nakolaombana.
Ea' masopamana naep ananimi ma'i, “Ine' Krais God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i, ine' ni'i basef si'i anona profet na'iami newalapa emi nahena.”
Pita tol nape endalelemb nomon nape ipat ande'. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwafi'i felefele' ma anan ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ine' wapoti' nape naloma Jisas etap hiagoma Galili.”
Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi ma naep isima hiesi na'i, “Ae' ina egawa basef amama ine' na'iami, owa'.”
Ea' nafe' naitu indalelemb nomon felefele'ma uta, ano'w nemata'w kwatolona wapoti' kwa'ipa esis amam nematawa sape felefele' kwa'i, “Aman anama anan nape naloma Jisas Nasaretinai.”
Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi wapoti' ea' na'i, “Endilisi gani ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anama.”
Nogota bandana nafe'ma ea', anom amam maitu felefele' mafi'mai Pita ma'ipana ma'i, “Endilisi, ine' aman naloma esisi. Diga ine'inai nawalapena alihina.”
Ea' dei' Pita nehafel na'i basef la'ifimi na'i, “I'i basef ae'ami ina endilisimi, ae' a'i God nehe' ega'. Endilisi gani ilif, ae' ine egawa aman anama, owa'.”
Anan na'iam ea', mehip awata nanda'am.
Ea' Pita okokoma basef nambati' Jisas na'ipanami na'i, “Awata owa' ata' neanda'am, ine' nembaso'mas ni'iam wenif ni'i, ‘Ine' owa' negawa Jisase.’ ”
Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ande' nalef mehip endilisi.
Ea' lala kuhimbita atona amam pris dambami hiami maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Jisas neaga'.
Amam mowa'ana mofa'ana mafe' mase'ana gavman dembinai Pailat.

Dei' aman anama Judas nawalapa Jisasa amam naumbih nati amam manda' basef mahana Jisasa neaga'. Ea' nati amam mahana manda' amamaga amama, ea' nofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi. Ea' dei' anan notanima nowambela moni silva anama 30-peleina nafe'ma amam pris amama dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai.
Ea' na'i, “Ae' anda' waf aonai. Dei' main, awalapa aman anama bu'unai, owa' nonda' waf aonai, atuwasi neaga'.”
Ea' amam ma'i, “Amama ina ofagema afa'imi, owa'. Amama ea' ofagema ine'imi atom.”
Ea' Judas nakwaha moni silva anama ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nafe' anagon nandaha nail mandof ea' afuna.
Amam pris amama dambami mafela moni anama mofa'ana ma'i, “Moni anama anan natala aman anama afa' wahana naga'i. Ea' afa' ina ombe' moni anama neloma moni na'oh ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'.”

Ea' amam ma'i anom basef mandame'mam ama moni anama manda'ana matala anona etapa anona aman nala' malohi. Ea' mofa' etap anama ma monda' hi'agilifa sowa epes isima lauginasi safi'i salomas sape saga'i.
Ea' dei' sofala agiliguma sa'i, “Etap esimbel matalanai.”
Agel anama ma etap anama dei' nandape.
Ea' anom basef fowa' gani God nihi'amba anona aman profet Jeremaia nanda'ami, anama dei' mataga alihim mandawalap. Basef amama ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“Amam mofa' otamba silva 30-peleim, esis Juda sandandepam ma aman anama.
Ea' moni anama satala anona etapa anona aman nala' malohi, si'i Dembinai na'ipa ae' mehip.”
Amam mofa' Jisas mafe' naitu naep dembinai gavman Pailati ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai esis Judai o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef amama ine' na'iami endilisimi.”
Ea' amam pris amama dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai mambaso'mana ma basef hiami, ea' anan ina nagwamam anom basef, o owa'.
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' name' basef amama hiami manda'menami o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas ina nagwamana anom basef Pailat, owa'. Ea' dembinai gavman gegelalasana kwapete'.

Nogota anama gavman anama dembinai waf ananinai na'ama. Afagof hiami ma nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami amama sa'i Pasova, anan nakwaha enin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe' wafifina. Emi epen esis amam nematawa hiesi sandandepanai, dembinai gavman na'i a'e nakwahona nafe'ma esis wafifina.
Nemaf anama anona aman nanda' waf aonai nape nanda' kalabus, agilinama Barabas. Aman anama epes hiesi sagawa anan nanda' waf aonai endilisi.

Ea' esis amam nematawa sunduwa'anima saitu. Pailat nogawa amam dambami esis Judai kowalama epes hiesi saila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana. Amama atom dei' nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' pa'i ae' ekwaha emi epen nekwaha kalabus nefe'mago ipe'? Ekwaha Barabas o Jisas, esis sa'i Krais Dembinai?”

Pailat nape ipat anama sanda' kotanai, waulu'mana anani'wi kwanda' basef mafi'mai anan kwa'i, “Ina nenda' anom amamaga awami ma aman anama bu'unai, owa'. Ae' do'ok a'oh owamb andondo'ah atolona ea' efa' nimanimi lu'wami ma Anan.”
Ea' amam pris amama dambami maloma anom agufumi esis Judai mafela ukup ma esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sohali' Pailata nokwaha Barabas, ea' soha Jisas noga'.
Ea' Pailat na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Amam amama biam, ipe' pa'i ae' ekwaha emi epen nefe'mago ipe'?”
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Barabas.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Aman anama Jisas ipe' pa'i Kraisi, ipe' pa'i ae' i'imamana?”
Ea' esis hiesi sa'i, “Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai!”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anan nanda' maina waf aonai?”
Ea' esis sa'i mehip endilisi sa'i, “Undana lawag hana afuna!”

Ea' Pailat nogawa basef ananimi ina la'ifim nahianas, owa'. Na'ama esis sohafel sonda' wandaf lu'unai. Ea' Pailat nolai embel nasa'opa lagof ananimi ma naep esis amam nematawa hiesi nihi'ambas na'iam na'i, “Ae' ina ati ofagema owa'etina eha aman anama noga', owa'. Ofagema amama ipe'imi atom.”
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sagwa basef sa'i, “Ea' ofagema amama mondafi'mai ape' moloma awasi ape'isi.”
Ea' Pailat nakwaha Barabas nafe'ma esis. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia ma moha Jisas mofa'ana mafe' mundana lawag usi'inai ti'wanainai.
Ea' amam soldia Pailati mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat amam gavmani lu'unai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anan.
Ea' mowalia luwaguf maim ananimi malamana anona saket akwahinai.

Ea' mowalo'mana anona mandof higatagunai, malasana'ofana si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananinai. Ea' mase'ana anona alifita nahapilana lagel da'isinai ananinai. Amam mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma anan, manda' salamalana ma'i basef findiwaimi ma anan ma'i, “Nemaf bu'unai, ine' king dembinai esis Judai!”
Ea' misi'wafana mandalombana alifita anama mohana timbi tambel balaga ananinai.
Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket anama, akwahinai malamana klos maim ananimi mofa'ana mafe'ma mundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
Amam mohafel mafe' etin, mati anona aman Saimon Sairininai. Ea' amam soldia masapa'ana ma niegiambama Jisas nofa' lawag ananinai.
Ea' mafe' mataga anagon agiliguma Golgota. Ape' dei' mambomefagel ma'i, Pipitagel Balagaina.
Ea' mase'ana anom embel wainim mambomom malomana anona marasin numbutinai nea' embel mohagofa ekep pehana. Anan name' embel etin, nandaiwa'mam.
Amam maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea', manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma emi nikila' nefa'am mondondam atona etin.
Ea' amam tol mape anama mumafiana.
Ea' manda' anom basef mail lawag anama ilifunama felefele'ma balaga ananinai. Basef amama sanda' kotami Pailat nanda'ami mai'am na'ama ma'i, “AMAN ANAMA ANAN JISAS, DEMBINAI ESIS JUDAI.”
Felefele'ma Jisas naila amam soldia maunda anom biam manda' waf aonai manda' wali. Amam maunda Jisas nail la'afen, ea' maunda amam biam mail wa'owa'ol.
Ea' enis amam nematawa safe' safi'i esis sanda' salamala anan samboma balagah sa'iam na'ama
sa'i, “Ine' ewi, ine' netalona ipat anama lu'unai Godi, ma netanima nefelana nimeguf wanom wapoti', dei' nigiambama ine'. I'i ine' nogalomana Godi, nendatagah nisila'i.”
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam agufumi esis Judai wapoti', hiami malomam manda'ana findiwana na'ama etin si'i eses ma'i,
“Anan nagiambama enis epes ea' dei' ina nagiambama anan, owa'. Anan dembinai king esis Israeli! Ea' dei' nondatagah lawag ilif nisila'i ma ape' motolona mombale'efana.
Anan nembale'efa God na'iam na'i, ‘Ae' nogalomana Godi.’ Ea' i'i God okom ninilana, anan nigiambamana.”
Ea' amam amama biam makowalefi saundam malumana manda'ana findiwana si'i amam agufumi mali' manda'manam.
Aon nahagasom owamb lu'unai nataga naofenia etap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin nape nafe' nafe' nataga aon nandamboma nape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' nataga howalagon wapoti'.
Felefele'ma aon nandamboma 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabaktani?”
Ape' mambomam ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ine' nakwahowe?”
Ea' enis epes saitu felefele' same' anan na'iam na'ama sa'i, “Anan nofala profet Elaija.”
Ea' enis saitu sa'i, “Ata' ota' kwahowana, ma ata' muti Elaija atuwasi nifi'i notagahona o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas noga na'i mehip endilisi wapoti' ea' na'i a'e, ea' ambal ananinai nandahi' nafe'ana.
Ea' anama sawa epes saga'i hi'agilif mandawisi' ea' amam nematawa hiesi Godi fowa' saga'i sohafel wapoti'.
Esis sokwaha hi'agilif amama sape. Nemaf anama Jisas nohafel wapoti' esis sefe' suwis Jerusalem, wambel bu'unai God nandandepanai. Ea' epes hiesi satilis.

Kepten anama dembinai numafi soldia hiami naloma amam soldia mape mumafi Jisasi mati amamaga amama. Nogota anama mati amamaga mataga etap nasol etin napan, umbamaham endilisi ma'i, “Endilisi, aman anama nogalomana Godi.”
Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi. Ano'w agel atona Maria kola Jems naloma Josep. Ea' ano'w kola amam biam Sebedi batausana.
Ea' wambomota felefele' ma owamb anona aman Arimateainai agilinama Josep nafi'i. Anan amamaga hiamunai anan alupunai naila Jisasi.
Ea' nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nofa'i alop Jisasi nowana. Ea' Pailat na'ipa amam soldia mehip ma Josep nofa'ana mose'anana.
Ea' nofa'ana lowaf namunai bu'unai afitinai.

Ea' nowa'ana nofa'ana nafe' nawis hi'agif ananinai dambainai, fowa' nagwasana nawis anona owap lu'unai. Ea' nasapa'ana nawis nambe'ana na'oh nomon. Ea' dei' namboma anona owap lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta hi'agif anama. Anan nanda'am na'ama ea' nafe'.
Ea' Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awau agel atona, awau biawa wape wa'ol felefele' ma hi'agif watologon.
Ama wafilu nemaf sandandomba amamaga gwa'aimi maim anama nafe'ma ea', amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi mafe' matagama Pailat.
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' ukup mapoma anom basef aman anama nambaso'ami na'iami fowa' anan ata' nape. Anan na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Nimeguf wanom mefe'ma hi'ilam, ae' etanima ehafel wapoti'.’

Amama atom dei' ine' ni'ipa anom soldia mumafi hi'agif anama andeande'ma nimeguf wanom mefe' hi'ilam. Na'ama amam alupumi ananimi mifi'i mokoalopana mofa'ana mefe' mi'ipa esis amam nematawa mi'i, ‘Anan notanima nehafel hi'agif wapoti'.’ Ea' baso'am anama dei'inai lu'una nikila' nali'i.”
Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pe'wa anom soldia pefe' pewalo uta hi'agif anama la'ifina, si'i ukup ipe'imi ma'iam dende'ma gawa ipe'inai.”
Nemaf anama esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat nafe' hi'alana, ea' Sande
Ea' sowambon lu'unai nasol mehip. Ea' anona ensel Dembinai nisila'i gani heven, nafe' hi'agif nelefata owap anama nowalo uta nafe' na'oh wa'ol ea' natomana.
Amaga ananinai howalona nafifil endilisi si'i otaga pelele'ala howalagon ea' lu'waguf maim ananimi afitim endilisi si'i ais mandati.
Ea' soldia amama mumafi hi'agifi umbamaham kwapete'am endilisi mowa ma'oh etap si'i saga'i.
Ea' ensel anama na'ipa awau biawa na'i, “Ipe' bipa ina umbamehepa, owa'. Ae' egawa ipe' pafi'i pa'i piti Jisas, aman anama esis sahana naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
Anan ina ata' nape na'ae, owa'. Notanima nohafel ea' si'i fowa' nali' na'ipipa! Ipe' fi'i ma ata' piti na'ae na'oma. Dei' wafigin nape.
Dei' ipe' fo'o mehip pi'ipa alupumi ananimi pi'i, ‘Anan nahafel wapoti' ea'. Peme'. Anan nali'ipa nafe' etap hiagoma Galili. Ipe' fo'o potolona gani.’ Basef ae'ami ea' amama.”
Ea' awau umbamahawa ea' wandanifel endilisi wapoti', mehip wakwaha hi'agif wasagih wafe'ma wie'ipa amam alupumi ananimi.
Dei' atef Jisas nati awau eaf nanda'mawa gude na'i, “Nemaf bu'unai ipe'.”
Ea' awo wafe' felefele'ma anan wahapila bo'wagah ananimi ma onda' lotuma anan.
Ea' Jisas na'ipawa na'i, “Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Ipe' bipa pefe' pi'ipa amam owape ae'ami mofo'o Galili. Atuwasi motolowe ganima.”
Nematawa awama biawa ata' wafe' eaf etin, anom soldia mumafi hi'agifi mafe' mawis taun anama ma'ipa amam pris dambami ma amamaga amama matagai.
Ea' pris amama maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i anom basef mandame'mam ea' mase'ama moni hianai nafe'ma soldia amama ea'
ma'ipam ma'i, “Ipe' pi'iam na'ama pi'i, ‘Owamb afa' wa'ihi, amam alupumi ananimi mafi'i makoalopana mofa'ana.’
Ama gavman dembinai neme' basefana, afa' onda' okom ananinai awanena ipe' basef a'epa.”
Ea' amam soldia mofa' moni anama mame' basef amamumi magi'mam. Ea' basef amama ea' mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma esis Juda, ea' ata' sa'iam etin mafi'i matagama dei' sa'iam la'ela'ef.
Ea' amam alupumi 11-peleim mafe' Galili mataga halaf anama Jisas nali' na'ipam meafe'ma.
Ea' mati Jisas mafela agel ananinai manifelona. Ea' anom ukup biambiefim mapeim.
Ea' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amam na'ipam na'i, “God nase'eana agel lu'unai ma pepel ilifanai etapanai ea'.

Na'ama dei' ipe' pefe' wambel hiagoma piwalipa amam nematawa sape wambotogw hiami piwalipasa basef bu'wami ae'ami, penda'as sotaga alupisi ae'asi ma siela basef Ae'ami andeande' ea' pipisi'as embela agel Ahalomei noloma Ae'anai noloma Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai.
Ea' piwalipasa sila basef bu'wami hiami ae'ami fowa' awalipipami ma basef la'ifimi. Endilisi ae' ape alomepa ma nimeguf hiami danda, pefe' pefe' ma nemaf akutainai nogota hi'ilana.”
Basef amama bu'wamima Jisas Krais, Anan nogalomana Godi. Basef amama mohafel mataga si'i anona profet fowa'inai Aisaia nanda'am mape buk.
Aisaia na'i basef amama na'i,
“God na'ipa Jisas na'i, ‘Ine' neme'. Anona nemaf ae' esapa' anona aman nofa' basef Ae'ami nili' nefe' nendondombamena eaf ine'inai.
Anona etap wafiguma fatauguma malogel anona amani anona nemaf ni'i basef na'ama ni'i, “Ipe' pendondomba eafa Dembinai.” ’ ”

Ea' Jon napisi'as embel nafe' anagon wafiguma fatauguma nawalipasa basef amam nematawa hiesi na'ipas na'i, “Ipa pewa' alafugaha waf aonai pemboma opalef ma God pefa' baptaisa God nekwahomepa waf aonai panda'anai.”

Ea' esis hiesi sape etap hiagoma Judia saloma amam nematawa hiesi sape Jerusalemi hi'alas safi'mai Jon sa'i some' basef ananimi. Esis sawalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, ea' Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.
Jon nala anom klos sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kamelim sanda'am, ea' nowaho'am let sanda' agwahup mafisina sanda'anai, nagundisana. Gwa'aimi na' gwamu'wis maloma aupimbel aolupumi.

Ea' nawalapa basef na'i, “Anona aman nambimb nigi'ma ae' niefi'i, anan la'ifinai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'. Nambimb Anan nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope opalef ipe'imi nomon.
Ae' apisi'ipa embel atom wafimi ea' Anan owa'. Nambimb Anan nupisi'ipa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nuwisipa nope nolomepa.”
Nogota anama Jisas nakwaha Nasaret etap hiagoma Galili nafi'i. Ea' Jon napisi'ana embel walemb Jordan.
Jisas nakwaha embel walemb nandegiai, nati heven uta nandausi' alihina ma Anan, nati Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anan si'i amil mai'una nufia' nisila'manai.
Ea' anona maf na'i natagai heven na'i anom basef na'i, “Ine' nogalome. Ae' okom nainailina endilisi. Okom ae'anai bo'ona endilisi ma ine'.”

Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anona etap fatauguma wafiguma mafis atom aolupumi maituma nape nimeguf 40-peleim, aon si'inai tu'waninai. Ea' Satan nafi'i nagwambana na'i Jisas nonda' waf aonai. Nagwambana ma ea', amam ensel mafi'i mumafi Jisas magiambamana.
Nemaf anama amam manda' Jon nanda' kalabus, Jisas nafe' etap hiagoma Galili nanda' maol nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi na'ipasam
na'i, “Nemaf anama felefele' netaga ma epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias. Na'ama dei' ipe' pemboma opalef pefe'ma God pewa' alafugaha waf aonai.”
Jisas naila akata nafe' etin walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili, nati amam biam Saimon naloma owalomana Andru. Amam mala anemb magi agof manda' bisinis.
Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pifi'i pembalo'a basef ae'ami pila Ae'. Fowa' ipe' pagi agof, ea' dei' ihi'ambepa pefe' pi'ipa enis epes sila ae'.”
Ea' mame'ana makwaha anemb ma'oh, mailana mafe'.
Ea' nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele' ma akata nati Jems naloma owalomana Jon, Sebedi batausana. Amam matoma bot mape magundisa anemb amamumi.
Ea' Jisas natolom nofalam mehip mame'ana. Ea' mohafel mehip makwaha amamaga amamumi hi'alam ma'oh, ea' mailana mafe.

Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi Jems naloma Jon, Saimon naloma Andru mafe' Kaperneam mape. Nemaf anama esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai, Jisas nao'wam mafe' mawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ea' na'ipasa basef amam nematawa.

Esis same' basef ananimi ea' gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi. Anan ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi ma'ipas, owa'. Anan na'ipasa basef la'ifimi si'i amam agufumi ma'ipas. Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'ama si'i anan, owa'.
Nemaf anama anona aman nape nalomas ipat anama, ambal aonai napeinai ea' mehip etin ambal anama noga na'i mehip na'i,
“Jisas ine' Nasaretinai, ine' nafi'i na'i nenda' maina afa'? Nafi'i ma nehambombagafa? Ae' egawena ine' aman bu'winai Godi.”
Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i, “Ine' ambalip aonai, feso'mena kwaha aman anama fo'o.”
Ea' ambal anama aonai nakoto'ana kwapete'ana nanda'am ge'ala mehip nakwahona nawisi nafe'.

Ea' amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasis sandakoto'ma ea' sanda'ipama sa'i, “Amama main de'im? Amama anom basef dambaimi. Anan natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman la'ifinai. Amamaga hiami mame' basef Ananimi. Ambagof awami wapoti' mame' basefana makwaha epes mafa' mafe'.”
Ea' basef amama ma maol Jisas nanda'ana mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma nape nomona etap hiagoma Galili.
Jisas naloma alupumi biamibiam ananimi mohafel makwaha ipat anama ea' mafe' wambel Saimoni Endrui ea' mawis ipat amamunai. Jems naloma Jon wapoti' mafe' malomam.
Ea' esis sa'ipa Jisasa Saimon nandagi'mokwi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'unai nifina.
Ea' Jisas nafe'ma akwa'w nahapila lagel akwa'unai nafela'w kwataga bo'okw, kwanda'masa gwa'aimi esis.
Ea' aon nowala naso', esis sofa'ai epes awes naninani nanda'asi saloma enis ambagof awami mapeisi safi'mai Jisas.
Ea' esis hiesi sape wambel lu'unai safi'i saitu felefele'ma uta ipat si'ina.

Ea' Jisas nanda' amam namatawa hiesi awes nanda'asi bo'wes, natofamasa anom ambagof awami mapeisi ea' sataga bo'wes. Ambagof awami mogawa Jisas anan nogalomana Godi. Na'ama nasopama malogof ambagof amama awami faso'mam tol mape.
Wafilu kuhimbita atona owamb ata' nail, Jisas nohafel nakwaha ipat anama napoma. Anan atona nohafel nafe' anama wafiguma ea' nape nanda' betena God.
Saimon naloma anom alupumi ananimi mohafel matimana owa', ea' magolopana magi'mana mafe'.
Magolopana mafe'ma matolona ma'ipana ma'i, “Epes hiesi sagolopena.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Dei' ata' ali'aso, afa' ofe' wambel hianai nape felefele'i. Ae' ata' i'ipasa basef bu'wami esis. Maol anama atona Ae' afi'manai anama.”

Na'ama nase'asa basef nafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma Galili, nase'asa basef bu'wami nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapaimi natofamasa ambagof awami mape enis epesi mandahi' mawisi mafe'.
Ea' anona aman awesinai alop nambo'anai nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana mehip na'i, “I'i ine' ni'i a'e, nenda' ae' etaga bo'awe.”
Ea' Jisas nati anan uwahipina nawomana lagela anan na'i, “Ae' a'i a'e ma ine' netaga bo'wena.”
Ea' dei' atef aman anama alop nambu'wi nataga bo'ona.
Ea' Jisas dei' etef nasapa'ana na'ipana mehip

na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'. Ine' fo'o nihi'ambana alop ine'inai ma aman anama pris. Ea' nese'ana amama anan nondolalima God ea' ine' ninifelana ma nataga bo'wena si'i mi'uli Ananinai fowa' Moses na'ipasanai na'i. Ama amam nematawa hiesi sotolona sogawa ine' ambo'wena.”

Owa'etin. Aman anama na'ipasam mafe'agon hi'alagon amam nematawa hiesi sogawa anan nataga bo'ona. Ea' Jisas ina nafe' nawis anona wambel ma naep hiesi, owa'. Na'ama hiesi sifi'i sili'akwana. Ea' ina nawis anona wambel lu'unai, owa'. La'ela'ef nape anama wafiguma atogon. Ea' nambimb esis amam nematawa sape ganigani safi'mai anan.
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Jisas notanima nafe' Kaperneam. Ea' esis same' basefa Anan nafi'i nape ipat.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sandakolas ipat anama napeinai asi'ina ea'. Na'ama uta owa' anagon nogal nopoma sefe' siowisi. Ea' na'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi ma esis.
Ea' anom amam biamibiam manda' balata malai anona aman lagof bo'wagah maga' mefa'ana ma'i mefe'ma Jisas.

Ipat asi'inama amam nematawa hiesi saitu sili'akw, ea' ina anagona mofa'ana muwis mofe' felefele'ma Jisas, owa'. Ea' malata ipat ilif ande'ana mapisila bogwan ilif mala aman anama awes nanda'anai naloma lahis nowala nomon Jisas naituma.

Nogota anama Jisas nati biamibiam nagawa amam mombale'efana ma'i anan la'ifinai ma nigiambama aman anama notaga bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Ine' epen ae'inai. Waf aonai ine' nanda'anai Ae' akwahomenana ea'.”
Ea' anom dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mape mame'ana. Opalef amamumi aoma basef ananimi. Na'ama amam nomonas matamea ma'i,
“Dei' maina Jisas na'iam na'ama? Anan nanda' God findiwana. Owa' etina anona aman la'ifinai ma neakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai. God atona nakwa waf aonai.”
Dei' atef Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi negawam okom ananinai, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi mape na'ama?

Dei' amamaga maim ipe' pa'i ahifima Ae'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma i'ipa aman anama awesinai, i'i ‘Ae' ekwahomena waf aonai ine' nanda'anai’, o i'ipana, i'i, ‘fela lahis ine'imi nehafel nefe'.’ Ipe' pa'i maim ahifima ae'?

Ae' a'i ipe' pegawa ae' ataga epen endelisiwei, la'ifiwei ma ekwahomasa waf aonai hianai amam nematawa sape etap anae' sanda'anai. Ae' a'i ihi'ambepa ae' la'ifiwei ma enda' amamaga amama.” Ea' na'ipana na'i,
“Ae' a'ipina, ine' hafel fela lahis ine'imi fo'o ipat ine'inai.”

Ea' esis saitu satolona sati anan nohafel mehip nafela lahis ananimi nefa'am nafe'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasis kwapete'as, safela agel Godi lu'una sa'i, “Fowa' ape' ina mati anom amamaga si'i na'ama, owa'etin.”
Ea' Jisas notanima naila akata nafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili. Amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan na'ipasa basef bu'wami God.
Jisas nohafel nafe' ea', nati anona aman Livai, Alfius nogalomana nape ipat sanda' takisa. Aman anama nofa'asa otamba amam nematawa hiesi.
Ea' Jisas nofalana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.”
Ea' nohafel nailana nafe'.
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi ma' gwa'aimi ipat Livai maloma amam hiami manda' waf aonai. Anom mofa' takisi, anom manda' waf aonai amam maloma Jisas ma' gwa'aimi. Amam amama mailana etin.

Ea' amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi amam Farisi mati Jisas na' gwa'aimi naloma amam manda' waf aonai maloma amam amama mofa' takisi. Ea' mahali' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina anan nape naloma amam mofa' takisi maloma amam amama manda' waf aonai ma' gwa'aimi etifigin?”

Ea' Jisas name'am na'ama na'ipam na'i, “Epes bu'wasi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Isima awes nanda'asi etis safe'ma dokta. Ae' ina afi'i ma efala epes isima bu'wasi, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma efala isima sanda' waf aonai.”

Anona nemaf amam amama alupumi Joni maloma anom alupumi Farisi makwaha gwa'aimi ma monda' beten andeande'. Ea' enis epes safi'i sa'ipa Jisas sa'i, “Dei' maina amam alupumi Joni maloma alupumi amam Farisi makwaha gwa'aimi ma manda' beten, ea' alupumi ine'imi owa' mokwaha gwa'aimi?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “I'i enis sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma enis aman nemata'w bias sendase'ama, ipe' pa'i esis alupisi atuwasi sondaiwa'ma gwa'aimi amama? Owa'etin. Nemaf anama esis bias sondase'ama, alupisi asasisi sandanifela sea' gwa'aimi solomas.
Ea' anona nemaf enis epes sofa' aman anama naso' nemata'wi nefe' laoguma, wila esis sokwaha gwa'aimi, ea' dei' ata' owa'.”

Ea' Jisas nanda' anom basef wamun etina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma peatopa' lowaf namunai pigundisana neloma anona lowaf apinai, owa'. I'i penda'am na'ama, nambimb lowaf anama namunai pele'etana nehape' apinai nogal notaga lu'una.”

Ea' na'i anom basef wapoti' na'i, “Ina enin epen nakolo'wa embel wain dambainai agwahup mafinina mowala agwahup apinai si'i botowagof, owa'etin. I'i enin nenda'am na'ama, embel wain motef hiami, mohape' agwahup anama pele'etana ea' wain kolo'olam hi'ilam. Na'ama owa'. Enin nakolo'am agwahup dambainai atona.”
Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat, Jisas nafe' nawis anona aof sawa witanai ea' nawis. Ea' alupumi ananimi mafe' malomana magi anom wit maufi magwa'am.
Ea' anom dambami Farisi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Neme'. Alupumi ine'imi manda'am na'ama ma main? Amam mosambala mi'uli ma nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai, Sabat.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam Farisi na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef mape Baibeli ma waf fowa' gani king Devit nanda'anai. Nemaf anama Devit naloma alupumi ananimi gwa'aimi a'am nolomaham. Ipe' pegawa basef amama ea'.

Nemaf anama Abiata nape dembinai pris nali'ma amam prisi, Devit nolomahana nawis ipat Godi na' bret anama mondolalima Godanai. Mi'uli ape'inai lu'unai na'i amam pris atom mea'ana. Enis epes owa'. Ea' Devit na'ana nagwa'ana naso' alupumi ananimi magwa'ana etin.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam Farisi wapoti' na'i, “God nali' nanda' epes ea' nagi' na'ipasa nemaf sapoma noma'wanai Sabat ama nigiambamas. Ina nanda' epesa sagi'ma basefa Sabat, owa'.
Ae' atowe ataga epen endilisiwei ape Dembiwei ma amamaga hiami. Ea' ape Dembiwei ma nemaf anama Sabata i'ipipa maina maol andeande'ma pila basef penda'ana nemaf anama.”
Anona nemaf Jisas nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai, nati anona aman lagel ananinai naga' nail nape.
Ea' enis safe' sagolopa basef kwamaimi ma senda'mana basef. Ea' satolona naep maimailana ma siti nonda' aman anama bo'ona nemaf anama Sabat?
Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anama lagel ananinai naga' nailanai na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu naep epes hiesi la'afena sitilina.”

Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i “Mi'uli lu'unai ape'inai na'iam na'imama? Ape' monda' waf bu'unai nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai o monda' waf aonai? Ape' migiambama esis sope ambal namunai napeis mohas soga'?”
Ea' esis ina sa'i anom basef, owa'.

Ea' Jisas nafela naep natilis tulif ea', nogawa esis opalef mase' sandaiwa'ma seme' basef. Na'ama okom ananinai wandafuna ma esis. Ea' nati esis uwahipis na'ipa aman anama lagel ananinai naga' nailanai na'i, “Dowa lagel ine'inai usi'ina.”
Ea' nandowanai nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
Ea' amam dambami Farisi mohafel mafe' maloma anom amam epes hiami Heroti, ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Jisas noga'.
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi makawaha wambel anama mafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'i etap hiagoma Galili sailana safe'.

Esis safi'i hiagoma. Enis safi'i wambel hiagoma Judia, enis safi'i Jerusalem, enis safi'i etap hiagoma Idumea, ea' enis sape walemb Jordan gani wa'ol saloma enis safi'i wambel biefina Tair naloma Saidon, esis hiesi safi'mai anan. Same' basefa amamaga Jisas nanda'ami, na'ama safi'mai Anan.
Ea' Jisas nati amam nematawa hiesi endilisi sape. Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Na'ama esis safafa'asowe. Anona bot nola ma ae' ma elata etoma i'ipasa basef.”
Anan fowa' nanda' hiesi isima awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Ea' dei' awes nanda'asi sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin safe'ma anan sehapilana ma seataga bo'wes.
Maina nemaf ambagof awami mape epesi mati Anan mogawana, ea' mowa ma'oh etap felefele'ma anan opafunama, ea' mofalana mehip ma'i, “Ine' nogalomana Godi.”
Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami mehipa amam ina mowalapa Anan mi'ipasana mi'i anan nogalomana Godi, owa'.
Jisas nafe' nondowasa' halaf, ea' nofala amam amama Anan okom na'iami mafi'mai Anan.
Ea' nandandepa amam 12-peleima la'ela'ef mope molomana, ama nambimb nosapa'am mefe' mi'ipasa basef. Amam 12-peleim nandandepam Aposel.
Na'ipam nase'ama pepel ma meatofa ambagof awami mape epesi.
Amam 12-peleim nandandepami, agof amamumi amama. Saimon agel wa'ana Pita,
ea' Jems Sebedi nogalomana, naloma owalomana Jon, nase'ama agof wa'am Boanerges. Agel anama ofagema na'ama, nogamana otaga dililu bugalagw.
Ea' Andru, Filip naloma Bartolomyu, Matyu, Tomas, naloma Jems nogalomana Alfiusi, naloma Tadius naloma Saimon. Aman anama Saimon anan epes hiesi Seloti.
Ea' Judas Kariotinai, aman anama nafe' nawalapa Jisasa naumbih.
Jisas nafe' anona ipat, ea' esis hiesi safi'i wapoti'. Ea' naloma alupumi ananimi ina ata' ma' gwa'aimi, owa'.
Esis wambota Jisasi same' basef amama ma Anan naloma alupumi ina ma' gwa'aimi, ea' safi'i sa'i so'wana. Ea' sa'i, “Anan ambagof awami manda'ana dei' nahaga nagaol.”
Ea' Jisas nofalai esis safi'i saitu felefele'ma anan na'ipasa anom basef womun etina esis na'i, “Satan ina natofa anan atona, owa'.
I'i enis anona wambel hiagoma esis etis sondawaloga biefisa sopa', ina nambimb la'ifis, owa'. Esis sandawaloga biefis ea' ina la'ifis.
I'i enis epes hiesi anona wambota sape ipat atotona sondawaloga epes biefis sopa', esis sandawaloga biefis, ina nambimb sope la'ifis, owa'. Sandawaloga biefis ea'.
I'i wambota Satani sondawaloga biefis sopa', ina la'ifis, owa'.”

“Enin epen ina la'ifina nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman la'ifinai napeinai nokowalefa nefa' amamaga ananimi, owa'. Enin ata' nili' nombalo'ana ma nowa'ana tatala'ina, anan la'ifina ma niowis nokowalefa nefa' amamaga ma'oh ipat aman anama.”
Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mambaso'am manda' findiwana ma'i, “Anona ambal aonai nagiambama Jisas nanda' maol ananinai.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi etis ae' a'ipipa, anona nemaf God nokwaha waf aonai naninani hianai noloma basef findiwaimi hiami amam nematawa sanda'ami hi'ilam. Ea' emi epen nenda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi, God anona nemaf owa'etin endilisi ma nokwaha findiwa anama aonai ma epen inima nanda'anai, owa'. Findiwa aonai la'ela'ef nopein dei' nefe' anona nemaf wapoti' la'ela'ef nope.”
Nemaf anama Jisas naloma epes hiesi sape salomana ipat nomon. Ea' mama'wana kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i sataga saitu ande'. Ea' sa'ipa enis sawis sa'ipana sa'i Jisas nuwisi ande' nefe'ma esis.
Ea' isima hiesi sape salomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' neme', mama'wena ine'ikwi kwaloma owapena ine'imi safi'i saitu ande' sa'i solomena si'i.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Mama'we owape ae'asi emi egafis?”
Ea' Anan nati esis amam nematawa sape salipana na'ipas na'i, “Piti mama'we kwaloma owape ae'asi isima.
Emi egafis saila okom Godi ma sila waf Ananinai, isima mamase owape henitiame ae'asi.”

Anona nemaf Jisas nasefela opeh wapoti' nanda'am nawalipa amam nematawa hiesi felefele'ma walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili. Ea' esis hiesi safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalata natoma anona bot nala embel walemb batupa'manai anama, ea' esis saitu akata felefele'ma walemb anama. Ea' nase'asa basef hiami womun etin na'ama na'i, “Ipe' peme'! Anona aman nafe' nowaha olelemb witim si'i rais anona aof.
Anan nowahom nafe', anom mowa eaf safe'ma ea' amiguf mufia' mafi'i ma'am.

Ea' anom mowa etap otambaiguma, etap ina lu'una, owa'. Kwaie'una. Natoma ilif atogon ina nowala owin, owa'. Ea' olelemb witim mataga mehip ea' masilimb ina mowala etap, owa'. Ea' owaf naluwi naham, otamba maofam alim.
Anom mowala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofenia wit, ea' ina malo andeande' mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
Ea' anom mowa mafe' etap bu'unai, ea' mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi. Anom mola 30-peleim, anom 60-peleim ea' anom mola 100-peleim.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' aligah magalipei peme' basef amama andeande' ukup mopomam.”
Jisas atona nape, alupumi 12-peleim ananimi maloma enis sape salomanai safi'i sahali'ana ma basef amama womun etin.

Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God nihi'ambepa basef ofagema mape mandambahi'i ma epes siowis wambota Ananinai numafias. Dei' God nihi'ambepa basef amama ofagema alihim. Ipe' pame'am pegawam ea'. Esis isima sololama Godi owa'. Esis same' basef womun etin.
Ama anom basef mape Baibeli mandawalap ma'iam ma'i,

‘Esis nimeguf hiami sotologon, ea' ina sati anom amamaga, owa'. Ea' esis some' basef aligah asasimi, ea' ina sogawa ofagema, owa'. I'i sogawam ofagema, esis somboma opalef ma ae' ekwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Owa'etin.’ ”
Ea' Jisas nahali' esis na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef amama womun etin dei' apipami? Ea' nambimb ipe' pegawa basef womun etin hi'ilam pi'imama? Owa'etin.
Dei' aman anama nowaha olelemb, anan si'i anona na'ipasa basef Godi.
Olelemb mowa eafi amama si'i epes same' basef amama, ea' Satan nagi basef amama God nase'asam mape opalef asasimi nakwahom nafe'.
Ea' anom mowa mafe' anagon otambaiguma, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi sofa'am mehip sandanifelamam.

Epes isima si'i masilimb ina malo mowala etap owin. Esis sembale'ef nogota bandana etin ea', nambimb nimanimi matagamas enis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sembale'am basef Godi sanda'as findiwas sahas, sanda'masa waf aonai ea' satanima safe'.
Ea' anom mowala mandelef wandafumi la'afen, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi sailam safe',

ea' amamaga hiami nimanimi maloma amamaga hiami esis satolom kowalasami baso'maimi maloma moni wiga maima esis sa'i sofa'ami hiami mape etapi, amama mataga maofenia basef Godi. Ea' ina sombale'ef sanda' waf bu'unai la'ifis, owa'. Sowa si'i gwa'aimi owa' molo andeande'.
Ea' anom mowa etap bu'unai si'i epes isima same' basef bu'wami sembale'am sanda' waf bu'unai. Enis si'i mola gwa'aimi 30-peleim, enis si'i mola 60-peleim, ea' enis si'i mola 100-peleim.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas basef womun etin na'i, “A'i epes sakata lamifah sopalo'am ma'oh owina balatagw o sopalo'am mandambaho' ma'oh baket? Owa'. Esis sawamonam balatagw ilif.
Amamaga hiami mandambahi'i, anona nemaf motaga alihim epes hiesi sotolom sogawam. Ea' amamaga hiami ata' sambaho'am mapani, anona nemaf motaga mondawalap, epes hiesi sogawam.
Ipe' aligah magalipei pame' basef, peme'am andeande'.”

Ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Basef ipe' pame'ami, amama pegawam andeande'. Maim basef maloma maina waf ipe' panda'masam enis epes, ikwaf anama atona anona nemaf God nogwamepana ipe', ea' nowatanimipa anom wapoti'.
Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Godi, nambimb God nowatanimasam wapoti'. Isima owa' sembale'ami, nambimb basef kwawie'im amama esis sembale'ami, God nondalombasam esis ea' sopan etin.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas basef womun etin na'i, “Epes siowis wambota Godi numafias, si'i anom basef womun etin dei' ae' a'ipipami. Anona aman nowaha olelemb gwa'aimi aof ananinai.
Ea' nafi'i nape wambel na'oh owambeh hiami nape nimeguf hiami mafe' ea' olelemb amama nawami mataga malo lu'um ma'imama? Anan ina nogawa mataga ma'imama, owa'.
Etap atona nanda' olelemb amama mataga malo mola gwa'aimi bu'wami mail. Soh atom mali', ea' afis mataga ea' gwa'aimi mandanda' lu'um mail.
Ea' matagama lu'um akom andeande' ea' maof. Nemaf anama sala' gwa'aimianai nataga, aman anama nanda' maol naloma nogwatop.”
Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Epes siowis wambota Godi numafias na'ama etin si'i main? Ae' indila'wifam si'i maim basef wamon etin?
Nalelef mastetim so'uso'umi. Ina lu'um si'i su'utip gwa'aimi lawah hiami mawam etapi, owa'. Nalelef so'uso'um endilisi. Anona aman nawam etap
ea' mataga malo lu'um mikila' gwa'aimi hiami mape aofi. Amam mataga si'i lawag lu'unai, agof mandalana mafe'agon ganigani. Ea' amiguf mafi'i mala alagah mandambaho'ma owaf mail agof.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas basef womun etin si'i nali' na'ipasami. Na'ipas nendala'wifa amamaga hiami nagi'ma gawa asasinai nafe' netambel.
Anan ina na'ipasa anom basef alihima esis, owa'. Na'iam womun etin. Ea' nambimb alupumi ananimi atom malomana mape, na'ipam alihima ofagema basef womunaimi.
Nemaf anama atona, wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' ofe' anama walemb lu'unai batupa'manai anama gani fisana.”
Ea' amam makwaha esis amam nematawa hiesi mafe' bot anama Jisas natumanai mofa'ana mafe'. Enis epes sofa' anom bogw maloma bot anama mafe'.
Ea' anona uf lu'unai naluwi, naoh manda'am fepoh, mafe' mawis bot nomon ea' na'i si'inama embel.
Ea' Jisas na'oh nalola bot nagi'ma nola komboto'w na'oh.
Ea' amam mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i a' owala. Ine' negawafa, owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nohafel ninifala uf na'ipa embel naoh na'i, “Uf neloma embel ipe' petah.” Ea' uf faso'mana, embel ina ata' manda' fepo. Tol motah.
Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, 'Ipe' umbamahepa ma main? Ipe' pembalo'a basef Godi pa'i Ae' la'ifiwei, owa'?
Ea' amam mati na'ama, umbamaham kwapete'am endilisi, ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anan emi egafuna? Na'ipa uf naloma embel mame'ana mowala.”
Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol walemb batupa'manai anama etap esis Gerasa sapoma.
Anan nakwaha bot nisila'i, mehip anona aman ambagof awami mapeinai nafi'mai Anan. Aman anama nape na'oh la'ela'ef hi'agilif sawa epes saga'i sapoma nafi'i.

Esis sali' sombalo'ana sumafiana, sanda' seni hankap sowa'ana lagof bo'wagah la'ela'ef. Owa'etin. Anan nahape'am etin. Ina enin epen la'ifina nembalo'ana la'ifina nope, owa'. Ea' sen wapoti' ina la'ifina, owa'.
La'ela'ef owamb alip nape nafe' hi'agilif halafutagw, nafe' na'i mehip nafe'. Nafela otamba hi'elimi natotopa' alop ananinai.
Anan ata' nati Jisas nafi'i laogon, nasagih nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawamana.
Ea' Jisas nogawa aman anama ambagof awami mapeinai. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ambagof aopei, ipe' pekwahona pefe'.”
Na'ama anan noga' na'i mehip na'i “Jisas, ine' nogalomana Dembinai God nape ilif endilisi, ine' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina endilisi gani ilifa agel Godi, ine' owa' nese'e nimanimi ae'.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agel ine'inai emi?”
Ea' anan na'i, “Afa' ambagof aofai hiafai. Dei' agel afa'inai ambagof hiami.”
Ea' nahali' Jisas mehip na'i, “Ina netofafa ofe' anona etap laugoma, owa'.”
Ea' anom bogof hiami maitu ma' gwa'aimi anona domota felefele'.
Ea' ambagof amama mofala Jisas ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Ine' netofafa ofe' uwisa bogof mamuma.”

Ea' Jisas na'i a'e mam, makwaha aman anama mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof mamuma hiami 2,000-peleim masagih mafe' mehip mowala anagon awagoma tata mowala embel walemb batupa'manai ma' embel afum hi'alam.
Ea' amam mumafimi masagih mafe' ma'ipasa basef amama wambel anama lu'unai amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' ma'ipas sape aof wapoti' ma amamaga amama amam matulumi.
Ea' safi'mai Jisas sati aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai, dei' ambo'ona nomonas bu'wami mapeina andeande' nowaho' lowaf nape. Amam nematawa hiesi satolona ea' esis umbamahas.
Ea' esis sati amamaga amama sa'ipas ma amamaga amama mataga aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai. Ea' sa'ipas amamaga matagama bogof wapoti'.
Ea' esis hiesi sa'ipa Jisas mehip sa'i nokwaha etap anama asasima nefe' anagon.
Ea' Jisas nalata bot, aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai nahali'ana mehip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.”
Ea' Jisas ina na'i, owa'. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nefe'ma esis wambota atona ine'inai ni'ipasa amama Dembinai nanda'minami nati uwahipina ma nanda'ena bow'ena.”
Ea' aman anama nafe' nawalapa basef amama na'ipasam wambel 10-peleina Dekapolisa amamaga Jisas nanda'manami. Ea' esis amam nematawa gegelalasis kwapete'as ukup matamea mafe'.
Jisas nofa' bot notanima nambo walemb batupa'manai anama nafe' fisana gani wa'ol, ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sape satagamana. Anan nape felefele'ma akata,
anona aman Jairus numafi ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nafi'i. Anan nati Jisas ea' nindiwa nembawa notawamana, felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi.
Ea' na'ipana mehip na'i, “Nogame ae'akwi felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ae' a'i ine' nefe' newamona lagel ine'inai akwa'w ambal notanimai nuwisa'w kohafel kopan.”
Ea' Jisas nalomana mafe'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safe' sagi'mam sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin saitu sindiwapana.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape kwalomas, awes lu'unai nanda'akwi kwape gamba la'ela'ef afagof 12-peleim.
Akwa'w kwafe'ma dokta hiesi sase'akw nimanimi, ea' kwakwaha otamba akwa'umi hi'alama dokta isima hiesi ma senda'akw bo'okw, owa'etin. Awasi'w kwape na'ama la'ela'ef.
Ea' kwame' basefa Jisas nafela enis epes awes nanda'asi ambo'wes. Ea' kwaloma amam nematawa hiesi kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananinai.
Dei' main, akwa'w okom na'i, “Ae' esa lagela lowaf ananinai, ae' bo'awe.”
Kwahapila lowaf ananinai etin mehip esimbel pele'atam ea' kwame' alop akwa'unai nataga bo'ona.
Dei' atef Jisas name' alop ananinai kwofalina, name' anona pepel ananinai nakwahona nafe'ma nanda' enin epen bo'wen. Na'ama nandamboma la'afena esis hiesi na'i, “Emi nasa lagela Ae'?”
Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' natilis o owa' amam nematawa isima hiesi saitu sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin salomafa? Dei' maina ine' ata' na'i, ‘Emi nasa lagela ae'?’ ”
Ea' Jisas nandamboma natologon na'i niti epen inima nahapilani.
Ea' nemata'w akwama kogawa amamaga amama matagama'wi, ambo'okw ea' umbamaha'w kwapete'akw. Ea' kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa felefele'ma Anan, kwawalapa amamaga kwa'iam alihim.
Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Nemata'w, ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ine' fo'o, opaf ine'inai nope awanena. Esimbel ine'imi fataom, dei' awes ine'inai ahi'alana.”
Jisas ata' na'ipakw etin, nati anom amam makwaha ipat Jairusi mafi'i ma'ipa Jairus ma'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi kwaga' ea'. Amama atom dei' ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o ekep pehana, owa', hapainai.”
Ea' Jisas ina nembe' aligah name'amam basef amama amamumi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina umbamehena, owa'. Nembale'efa Ae' la'ifiwei.”
Ea' Anan ina na'i a'e ma amam nematawa hiesi solomana siowis ipat anama, owa'. Anan nao'wa Pita Jems naloma owalomana Jon amam atom mawis malomana.
Mafe' mataga ipat Jairusi, Jisas nati esis salef mehip sa'i sapoma'w kwapete'as.
Ea' nawis nomon na'ipas na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' palef patapea kwapete'epa? Akwa'w ina kwaga' endilisi, owa'. Kwa'oh etin.”

Ea' esis sanda' iafana kwapete'as ama na'iam na'ama. Ea' nagalo'ma esis sawisi ande'. Anan nao'wa ahaloma'w naloma mama'wakw saloma alupumi ananimi mape malomanai, esis etis safe' sawis nomon awani inima naga' na'oma.
Ea' nahapila lagel akwa'unai na'ipakw na'i, “Talita kumi.” Ape' mamboma basef amama ma'i, “Nemata'w sa'ukwi, ae' a'ipina, ine' dei' hafel.”
Ea' mehip nemata'w akwama afagof 12-peleim mahape'akwi kohafel kwafe' esis satolo'w, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas mehipa siela basef ananimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'ipa enin epena amamaga amama, owa'.”
Ea' na'ipa esisa sese'akwa anom gwa'aimi kogwa'am.
Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel anama nafe' wambel ananinai ofagama Nasaret naloma alupumi ananimi.

Nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat nataga, nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa, same'ana sohafel gegelalasis sa'i, “Aman anama nofa' basef amama eti? Emi nase'ana gawa anama? Emi nagiambamana ma dei' nanda' pepel anama si'i God nanda'anai?
Ape' magawa aman anama fowa' nanda' kamda nala' ifagw. Anan Maria nogaloma'w atona, nape wambeli. Anan sahalomam Jems naloma Josep, Judas naloma Saimon. Henitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'ae.”
Esis sa'iam na'ama opalef aoma anan, ea' sowa' alafugahana.

Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet nofa' agel lu'unai anona wambel, sa'i anan dembinai safela agel ananinai sombale'efana. Ea' ina nofa' agel lu'unai wambel ananinai ofagama, wambota ananinai sapoma, owa'.”
Na'ama Anan ina nanda' anom amamaga la'ifimi wambel anama, owa'. Anan nasa lagofa enis awes nanda'asi atona etin nanda'as bo'wes.
Amam nematawa wambel Nasaretisi owa' sembale'efa Anan. Na'ama Anan nomonas matamea mafe'.
Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel ananinai Nasaret nafe' na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa wambel hiagoma nape felefele'i.
Ea' nofala alupumi ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai Anan ea' nase'am agof lu'wami nanda'am la'ifima meatofa ambagof awami, ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom.
Na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pefa' gwa'aimi isalef moni molomepa, owa'. Ipe' pela su pehapila bandefah pendahe'amon pefe'. Ina pefa' siogw biam atom, owa'. Pefa' atona etin mondondaepa.”
Ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pefe' petaga anona wambel, i'i enis si'i a'e ma pefe' piowis ipat asasinai, ipe' pepe ipat anama atona palomas. Ea' pekwahona pehafel pefe'.

I'i anona wambel owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi some' basef ipe'imi, ipe' penda'am na'ama. Pekwaha wambel anama pindilama nombol mail bo'wagah ipe'imi ma sitilipa sogawa waf aonai ofagena asasinai atona.”
Ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom makwaha basef ma'i, “Ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf aonai, pemboma opalef pefe'ma God.”
Ea' matofa ambagof awami mape epesi. Ea' mofa' wel bu'wami makolo'ma esis awes nanda'asi hiesi sataga bo'wes.

Dei' anona gavman king Herot name' basefa maol anama Jisas nali' nanda'anai. Dei' main, agel Jisasi nataga lu'una nafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' enis amam nematawa sa'i, “Jon napisi'as embeli dei' nohafel wapoti' nape la'ifina nanda' maol si'i God nanda'anai.”
Ea' enis epes sa'i, “Anan profet Elaija fowa'inai.”
Ea' enis sa'i, “Anan anona profet si'i profet amama fowa' ganimi.”
Gavman anama king Herot name' na'ama ea' na'i, “Jon fowa' ae' atopa' bagato'wana, ea' dei' notanima nohafel wapoti' nanda' maol Jisasi.”

Fowa' Herot nali' naso' nemata'w owalomana Filipi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahalomana Herot nandalombana'w. Ea' Jon nati waf anama na'ipana na'i, “Ine' naso' nemata'w sahalomenai, ea' nawala mi'uli Godi. Na'ama ina andeande', owa'.”
Ea' Herot nasapa' anom amam mafe' mombalo' Jon mofa'ana mafe' manda'ana nanda' kalabus.

Ea' Herodias kwame' basef amama, okom aona endilisi ma Jon, kwa'i kohana afuna, ea' owa'etin. Herot anan umbamahanama Jon ea' numafiana andeande'. Amama atom akwa'w ina la'ifikwa kohana neaga', owa'. Herot nogawa Jon aman bu'unai Godi. Nemaf anama anan name' basef Jon na'ipanami, anan nomonas matamea, ea' umbamahana. Anan okom na'ina'i endilisi ma neame' basef ananimi.

Ea' dei' Herodias kwagolopa anona eaf ma kohana neaga'. Herot nanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma okom nopoma nemaf anama mama'wana kolana. Anan nanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma anom dambami magiambamana ma maol gavmani maloma anom dambami mumafi amam soldia maloma anom dambami mape etap hiagoma Galili.

Ea' amam dambami maloma Herot mape ma' gwa'aimi, ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi awiawai'wi kwawisi nomon kwaitu kwalemb. Akwa'w Herodias nogama'w. Ea' Herot naloma amam dambami ukup maimaila akwa'w endilisi. Ea' na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' ese'ena maim amamaga? Ine' ni'ipiam ae' ma ese'enam.”

Ea' Herot na'iam endilisi gani ilif na'i, “I'i ine' nihali' ae' ma ease'ena anom amamaga ine', ae' ese'enam. Ea' ine' ni'i ae' eawala amamaga ae'ami hiami ma'oh anama iliakwagoma ese'ena tu'wanim, ae' a'i a'e ma ese'enam. Ine' tu'wanim, ae' tu'wanim, dende'am etin.”
Ea' akwa'w kwawisi ande' kwafe' kwahali' mama'wakw akwa'ukwi kwa'i, “Ae' atuwasi i'ipa Herot efa' maim amamaga?”
Ea' mama'wakw kwa'ipakw kwa'i, “Ine' ni'ipana ni'i nefa'ai balaga Jon napisi'as embeli.”
Ea' kwandamboma kwawis nomon mehip kwahali' Herot kwa'i, “Dei' atef ae' a'i ine' neha Jon napisi'as embeli noga' netopa' balaga nola anona plet nefa'anai nese'eana.”

Akwa'w kwa'iam na'ama, opaf Heroti nimanina endilisi. Ea' anan okom na'i basef endilisi gani ilif na'iam la'ifimi ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape salomana sa' gwa'aimi same'ana. Ea' ina ata' nosambala basef akwa'umi, owa'.
Mehip Herot nasapa' anona soldia nafe'ma noha Jon noga' nofa' balaga nafi'i. Soldia anama nafe' ipat sanda' kalabusanai natopa' bagato'w Joni nofa' balaga
nala anona plet nofa'ana nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'ana kwafe' kwase' mama'wakw.
Ea' alupumi Joni mame' basef amama, mafi'i mofa' alop si'ina mafe' mawana hi'agif.
Amam Aposel Jisasi dei' motanima mafi'i mandakolas malomana. Ea' mape manifa maol mafe' manda'anai ma'ipana basef hiami amam ma'ipasami.
Enis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i safe' ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi ina ata' anona nogotama meagwa' gwa'aimi, owa'.
Na'ama Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Wale, afa' atofa ofe' anagon wafiguma ma ata' tol opoma noma'w.”
Ea' mofa' bot mafe' anama wafiguma epes a'agoma, amam atom mafe'.
Owa'etin. Esis amam nematawa hiesi sogawa amam mafe'ma. Ea' esis hiesi sakwaha wambel hiagoma asasima sasagih safe' anama ea' sali' sataga anama amam ma'i meafe'ma.
Ea' Jisas nafe'ma nisila' akata, nati esis hiesi. Natilis ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' enin epen nimafiase, ea' nati esis uwahipis nawalipasa basef bu'wami hiami.
Wambomota felefele'ma owamb alupumi ananimi mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wape na'ae wafiguma ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb.
Ine' nesapa'as sofo'o wambel aof asasinai deindei sape felefele' setala gwa'aimi maim sea'am.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' etipa pese'as gwa'aimi.”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' utalai bret ama 200 kina ose'esam? 200 kina otamba amama dondo' ma epen nenda' maol aomb 8-peleim nofa'am.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' bret ma'ufina na'oh? Ata' fo'o petolona.”
Ea' mafe' matolona ma'i, “Bret lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof biam hi'imi ma'oh.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sope sefe' oto otowa otalef bu'wami.”
Ea' sape safe' si'i amam ma'ipas, enis sataga 100-peleis, enis 50-peleis, na'ama etin.

Ea' Jisas nafela bret anama wa'ana atona naloma agof biam naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God. Ea' nawalana naso' alupumi ananimi mafe' maso' esis amam nematawa hiesi hi'alas. Ea' nafela agof wapoti' nawalom nase'am mase'asam.
Esis sa'am elihis hi'alas.
Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleim bret anama.
Esis amam nematawa sa' gwa'aimi amama epes hiesi. Seamba amam atom mataga 5,000-peleim.
Dei' atef Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai anama mambo fisana mafe' Betsaida. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa hiesi safe' deindei.
Nasapa'as safe', anan nandowasa' halaf nape na'i nonda' beten.
Wambomota alupumi ananimi mape bot ata' mala walemb batupa'manai lu'unai la'afen. Ea' Jisas atona naitu akata.

Ea' nati uf lu'unai nalo nafi'i anama amam ma'i meafe'ma, ea' nakoto'ma amam manda' pul masasapa' bot ekep paham endilisi. Owamb ata' nail etin felefele'ma leala, Jisas nailam natoma embel ilif nafe'ma amam. Ea' na'i nikila'am nefe'.
Ea' mati anan naitu nafi'i embel ilif ea' ma'i anona gamba nailam nafe', ea' manda'am wi ge' ma'oh kwapete'am.
Dei' main, amam hiami matolona ea' gegelalasom. Ea' mehip Jisas nalomam na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa, umbamehepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
Ea' nalata bot nape nalomam, dei' atef uf faso'mana opalef amamumi gegelalasom kwapete'am endilisi, ea' mape ukup matamea mafe'.
Dei' main, amam ina ata' ukup mape andeande'ma mogawa basef ofagema ma bret anama Jisas nase'asama esis hiesi sa'am, owa'. Ukup amamumi mase'am.
Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mowala mambo walemb batupa'manai anama mafe' mataga anona etap lu'wagoma Genesaret. Ea' mowa' bot nail,
misila'i mafe' ea', esis mehip sati Jisas ea' sagawana.
Ea' sasagih safe' anama hiagoma ganigani. Esis same' basefa Jisas napoma, ea' sefa' awes nanda'asi balatagw sofa'as safi'mai anan.

Wambel hiagoma lu'wagon sa'ogon, naloma anama hiagoma Jisas nafe'ma, esis sambe' isima awes nanda'asi sa'oh la'afen. Ea' sofala Jisas mehip ni'i a'e ma isima sohapila lowaf ananinai da'malifinama atona. Ea' emi egafis sahapilanai sataga bo'wes wapoti' hi'alas.
Amam Farisi maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, makwaha Jerusalem mafi'mai Jisas malipana.
Ea' mati anom alupumi Jisasi ma' gwa'aimi owa' mosa'opa lagof mea' gwa'aimi si'i amam Farisi ma'iam, owa'. Ea' amam Farisi ma'i alupumi Jisasi lagof amamumi alogw mailam.
Dei' main, amam Farisi maloma esis Juda hiesi hi'alas saila mi'uli anama esis akupasi. I'i esis sesa'opa lagof andeande', sea' gwa'aimi. I'i owa', owa'.

Esis safe' maket setanima sifi'i, ma owa' sesa'opa lagof, ina sea' gwa'aimi, owa'. Esis saila mi'uli hianai naninani si'i mi'uli anama sofa'ana akupas asasisi. Sasa'opa kahi sospas, dis saloma belegw atom ama saila mi'uli akupasi.
Na'ama amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dei maina alupumi ine'imi owa' mila mi'uli amam akupami? Lagof amamugumi alogw mailam magwa' gwa'aimi.”
God na'i,
‘Amam nematawa isima safela agel ae'anai lu'una malogof asasimi atom, ea' opalef asasimi mape laogona ae'. Ukup asasimi ina sembale'efa Ae', owa'.
Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'ami, owa'. Esis sawalapa mi'uli epes sape etapi, sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mi'uli anama basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu safela agel ae'anai etin.’ ”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pakwaha mi'uli Godi ea', dei' paila waf epes sape etapi atona la'ifipa.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa andeande' pa'i penda' waf bu'unai atona, owa'etin. Dei' pesambala mi'uli Godi ma paila waf ipe'inai atona.
Fowa' gani Moses nawalipasa mi'uli anama na'ipas na'i,
‘Ipe' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pembale'efas pigiambamas.’ Anom wapoti' na'iam na'i, ‘Emi egafis si'i basef awamima ahapas mamasas asasisi, isima enis epes sohas soga'.’
Ea' ipe' pambaso'am pa'i anom basef na'ama pa'i, Emi nindaiwa'ma nigiambama mamasan ni'ipas ni'i, ‘Otamba maim ae'ami andaiwa'ma ease'epam, ae' andandepama ease'anam God.’
Ea' ipe' Farisi paloma ipe' pawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ipe' pa'i a'e ma epen inima nembaso'ma mamasan, ea' ina nagiambamas, owa'.

Na'ama ipe' paila mi'uli fowa' gani pefa'ana akupipa ipe'imi, panda' waf anama pesambala basef amama Godi na'i ape' migiambama mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'inai atona panda' waf aonai la'ela'ef na'ama ina andeande', owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nofalai amam nematawa hiesi wapoti' safi'mai anan ea' na'ipas anom basef womun etin na'i, “Ipe' hipei peme' basef ae'ami okokomam pegawam andeande'.
Amamaga gwa'aimi maim ande'ami ipe' pegwa'am mowala mape nomon, amama ina monda'epa awepa, owa'. Ea' amamaga mape ukup ipe'imi nomon mawisi ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa. [
Ipe' aligah magalipei, ipe' peme' basef amama.]”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'ama,
nakwaha amam nematawa isima hiesi nafe' nawis ipat. Ea' alupumi ananimi atom mape mahali'ana ma basef amama ofagema womun etin do'ok na'ipasami.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina ata' pegawa! Amamaga gwa'aimi maim mape ande'i ina monda'epa awepa, owa'. Gwa'aimi amama sa'am mowala opalef nomon ea' mafe' sakam mafe' mowala dowah. Ea' ukup ipe'imi ina aom, owa'.”
Jisas na'ipasa basef amama na'i, “Gwa'aimi mamumami hiami hi'alam bu'wami atom mogwam.”
Ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Amamaga mape epes opalef nomoni, ukup awami maim mataga ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa.
Amamaga awami mape ukup nomon epesi mawisi ande' na'ama. Waf naninani aonai, ukup awami, waf sanda' so'a waulanai, wal, soha enis seaga'i,

sohambombaga waf dase'amainai, waf kowalasanai, waf sa'i sofa' amamaga hiami ma esis etis, baso'amunai naninani aonai, sesambala basef, simbisambas, sa'i basef awami, ukup aoma enis epes, findiwa, safela agof asasimi atom lu'um, waf gawa a'anai.
Waf anama naninani aonai, anama nape nomon ukup epesi nawisi ande' nanda'epa awepa.”
Ea' Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel anama, nafe' Tair nafe' nawis anona ipat. Anan nandaiwa'ma enin epen negawa anan nape na'ama. Owa'. Anan ina nandambaho'.

Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwame' basefa anan nape na'ama. Nemata'w akwama nogama'w akwa'ukwi sa'ukwi ambal aonai napai'w. Ea' mama'wakw mehip kwafi'mai Jisas kwindiwa nembawa kotowa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi.
Akwa'w Finisiai'wi anona etap hiagoma Siria. Akwa'w ina Judai'wi, owa'. Kwa'i diga Griki. Ea' kwahali' Jisas mehipa netofama'wa ambal aonai nape nogama'w akwa'ukwi.
Ea' na'ipakw anom basef womun etin na'i, “Ape' ata' mose'asa gwa'aimi awasi ape'isi sili'. Ape' ina mofa' gwa'aimi awasi ape'isi makwahom mafe'ma nombagw,
Ea' akwa'w kwagwamana basef Anan kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i endilisi. Ea' nombagw mafe' owina tebol matatama gwa'aimi mowa etapi magwa'am.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' na'iam na'ama andeande'. Ea' tanima fo'o. Ambal aonai nakwaha nogamena ine'ikwi nawisi nafe' ea'.”
Ea' akwa'w kotanima kwafe' ipat akwa'unai, kwati nogama'w akwo'ukwi tol kwa'oh lahis, ambal aonai nakwaho'w nawisi nafe'.
Dei' Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel Tair, ea' nafe' nawis la'afena wambel Saidon. Ea' nakwaha Saidon nafe' etin nataga walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili ea' nafe' la'afena wambel 10-peleina Dekapolis.
Ea' esis sao'wai anona aman nafi'mai Jisas, aligah mase'ana afega ananinai dindigina. Ea' ina na'i andeande', owa'. Na'ama esis sofala Jisas ma nesa lagela anan nonda'ana bo'ona.
Ea' Jisas nao'wana amam biam mafe' makwaha esis amam nematawa hiesi amam atom mape. Ea' nasapa' faguf biam ananimi mawis aligah aman anama, wa'owa'ol. Ea' nisi'waf nasa faf afega aman anama,
ea' Jisas naniga nati heven ilif, okom Ananinai nataga mehip, na'iam na'ama diga Hibrui na'i, “Efata.” Basef ofagema amama ma'i, “Ine' aligah mogal neme' basef ni'iam andeande'.”
Ea' aligah magal, afega anainai nataga bo'ona ea'. Dei' na'i andeande'.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'ama esis ina si'ipasa amamaga amama ma enin epen. Nape na'ipasa basef la'ifimi timbitambel. Owa'etin. Esis sawalapam sa'ipasam timbitambel seme'am.
Ea' esis gegelalasis endilisi sa'i, “Amamaga hiami Anan nanda'ami nanda'am bo'om etin. Anan nanda' esis aligah mase'asi same' andeande', esis malagof mase'asi sega sa'i andeande'.”
Anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi sandakolas wapoti' sa'i seme' basef Jisasi. Ea' esis gwa'aimi a'as. Na'ama Jisas nofala alupumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i,

“Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isima uwahipis. Esis sape salome nimeguf wanom gwa'aimi a'as nolomahas endilisi. I'i ae' esapa'as sefe' etin utagw wambel asasima, siti noga atona sowa so'oh sofe' eaf. Enis safi'i laogoma.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Anae' wafiguma epes a'agoma. Atuwasi afa' ofa'ai bret eti weaso' amam nematawa isima hiesi sea'am? Afa' bret ina hiana, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' bret ma'una na'oh?”
Amam ma'i, “7-peleina na'omafa.”
Ea' na'ipa esis amam nematawa sape etap, Anan nafela bret 7-peleina, nanifela God nawalona naso'am alupumi ananimi ma mase'asam esis amam nematawa hiesi. Amam mase'as hi'alas dende'.
Ea' anom agof sa'umi hi'imi wapoti' ma'oh. Ea' Anan nafelam nanifela God, naso'amam mese'as wapoti'.
Ea' esis sa'am, dondo' elihis. Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi makolasam maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 7-peleim.
Amam nematawa sa' gwa'aimi amama sataga hies seamba amam atom mataga 4,000-peleim. Ea' Jisas nasapa'as safe'
ea' mehip Anan nalata bot naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' anona etap lu'unai Dalmanuta.

Ea' amam Farisi mafi'i ma'i basef mandahihianamam maloma Jisas. Amam ma'i mogwambana ma muti anona ikwaf la'ifinai. Na'ama ma'ipana ma'i anan nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai si'i God nape heveni nanda'anai. Amam ma'i anan nihi'ambamama anan nape pepel Godi ma dei' nanda' amamaga amama.
Ea' Jisas name' ambal ananinai nemanina ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' pa'i piti anona ikwaf la'finai? Ae' owa'etina enda'ana pitolona, owa'.”
Ea' nakwaha amam notanima nalata bot nafe' fisana.
Amam alupumi Jisasi ukup mase'ama mofa' bret hianai nolomam. Amam mofa' atotona nala bot
Ea' Jisas naumbalom na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma yis amama amam Farisi maloma yis Heroti.”
Ea' mame' Anan na'iam na'ama, manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ukup mase'afa bret na'ihi dei' na'ipafa na'ama.”
Ea' Jisas nogawa basef amamumi na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pa'i, ‘Ipe' bret a'epa?’ A'i ipe' ukup mase'epa, owa' ata' pegawa?
Ipe' naep mati, ea' ipe' owa' ata' piti anom amamaga. Ea' aligah mapeipa, ea' ipe' ine' peme' basef, owa'. Ukup mase'epa.
Nimbewa' awala bret 5-peleina ma epes isima 5,000-peleis, ama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi pakolasom paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im?”
Ea' amam ma'i, “12-peleim.”
“Ea' nimbewa' awala bret 7-peleina ma tukwakwanimi ma'ihi patatamam paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im?”
Ea' amam ma'i, “7-peleim.”
Ea' Anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' dei' ina pegawa, ata' owa'.”
Amam mafe' mataga Betsaida, sao'wamanai anona aman naep mase'anai nafi'mai Jisas ea' sa'ipana mehipa nesa lagel ananinai nonda'ana bo'ona.
Ea' nahapila lagel anan naep mase'anai, nofa'ana nakwaha wambel nawis ande' nisi'wafa naep ananimi, nasa lagela anan nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' nati ambasif o ata' owa'?”
Ea' aman anama natologon na'i, “Ae' ati enis epes ea' atilis si'i lawah mafe'.”
Ea' Jisas nasa lagel wapoti', naep ananimi dei' mataga bo'om, natologon andeande'.
Ea' Jisas nasapa'ana nafe' ipat ananinai na'ipana na'i, “Ine' owa' nefe' niwis wambel ni'ipasa ae' anda'ena ambo'wena, owa'. Ine' nefe' usi'ina ipat ine'inai.”
Ea' Jisas nohafel naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' felefele'ma wambel hiagoma Sisaria Filipai. Amam mafe'ma eaf, nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman emi egafuwi?”
Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Enis sa'i ine' Jon aman napisi'as embeli. Ea' enis sa'i ine' Elaija. Ea' enis sa'i ine' enina profet, fowa'inai.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' pa'i ae' emi egafuwi?”
Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i.”
Ea' na'ipama basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pewalapa ae' pi'ipa enis pi'i ae' Krais, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas nasefela basef ananimi nawalipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb agufumi Judai mose'e nimanimi lu'wami. Amam moloma amam pris dambami moloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Nambimb mondaiwa'me mose'e alafugah mohe ega' ma nimeguf biam ea', meafe'ma wanomi ehafel wapoti'.”
Anan nawalapa basef amama alihima amam. Ea' Pita nofa'ana nelefata nasa gemba ea' na'ipana basef la'ifimi ma basef amama Jisas na'ipasami.

Ea' Jisas nandamboma nati alupumi ananimi, nanda' megahaha Pita na'i, “Ine' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ine' owa' okom nopoma okom Godi. Ukom ine'inai si'i ukup epes sape etapi etis. Si'amae nefe' alafuga ae'anai.”

Ea' Jisas nofalai esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai Anan saloma alupumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “I'i emi egafis si'i sila Ae', esis ata' seho'ofa ukup asasimi atom mowala, sefe' owin ama God ea' ina umbamahasa enis epes sohas soga', owa'. Ae' efa' nimanimi ma anda' maol Godi nambimb sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Epes isima senda'am na'ama etin si'i Ae' ma sigi'ma ae'. I'i owa', owa'etin.

Emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom, si'i sihapilam tatala'im, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma ae' eloma basef bu'wami Godi ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf God nofa'as sotanimani sopan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Emi egafis senda' maol naninani sofa' gwa'aimi wiga amamaga hiami etapami atom hegilialami, esis wapoti' hegililas solomam. Dei' amamaga amama anona nemaf migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin.
Epes isima anona nemaf sofa' amamaga maima seatala ambagof asasimi ma sitanima sowambilami wapoti'? Owa'etin.

Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf aonai sakwaha sombale'efa God. Emi egafis ambagof aoma ae' sondafa'me eloma basef ae'ami, anona nemaf ae' wapoti' ambal aona epes isima endafa'mas nemaf anama ae' ifi'i eloma amamaga bu'wami la'ifimi mafifili Ahalomei elomai amam ensel bu'wami Godi wapoti'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, enipa paitu na'ae nambimb ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Enipa piti pepel Godi nifi'i ma epes hiesi siowis wambota Ananinai numafias.”
Nimeguf wanom wanom mafe'ma ea', Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anona halaf launai. Nao'wa amam atom mape, ea' mati alop Ananinai nandati na'ana nafifil endilisi.
Luwaguf maim ananimi mataga afitim endilisi. Ina anona aman etapanai la'ifina nanda' luwaguf maim mataga efitim na'ama, owa'.
Ea' mati amam biam fowa'imi, Elaija naloma Moses mataga maitu ma'i maloma Jisas.

Pita naloma Jemsi Jon umbamaham endilisi, ea' Pita na'i nie'iami anom basef, ea' anan ina ata' okom napoma basef na'i ni'iami, owa'. Ea' na'iam na'ama na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' wape na'ae andeande'. Ata' ola' anom aolah wanom, mondandafa. Ine' anona, Moses anona, Elaija anona.”
Ea' anom elagw maofeniam. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai elagw amama na'i basef na'i, “Anan Nogalome ae'anai, Ae' okom nohafel nainailana endilisi. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi.”
Dei' atef alupumi Jisasi wanom matologon mehip ganigani, ina mati enin epen, owa'. Mati Jisas atona naitu nalomam.

Ea' amam ata' makwaha halaf makini'i etin, Jisas na'ipam mehip na'i, “Ipe' ina pewalapa amamaga amama dei' patulumi pi'ipa enin epen, owa'. Pefe' dahama dahama nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ma sehe ega' etanima ehafel hi'agif wapoti', pi'ipas.”
Ea' amam mahapila basef amama mape, manda'ipama ma'i, “Basef amama Jisasi notanima nohafel hi'agif, ofagema ma'imama?”
Ea' mahali'ana Jisas ma'i, “Dei' maina amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nifi'i?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Endilisi. Elaija nifi'i nondondomba amamaga hiami motaga bo'om andeande'. Ea' basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i dembinai anona nemaf notaga epen endilisinai nope ni'imama? Amama ma'i anan neme' nimanimi awami ma esis sowa' alafugahana.
Dei' a'ipipa, anona Elaija nafi'i ea'. Ea' esis saila ukup asasimi atom, sanda'mana waf aonai endilisi si'i anom basef mape buk Baibeli ma'iam.”

Jisas naloma alupumi wanom mafi'i mati anom alupumi tu'wanim 9-peleim mapani, ea' mati amam nematawa hiesi saitu felefele'ma amam. Ea' mati anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i basef mandahihianamam maloma alupumi Jisasi 9-peleim.
Amam nematawa isima hiesi sati Jisas nafi'i, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as, sasagih safe'ma Anan sanifelona.
Ea' Jisas nahali' amam alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' palomam pa'i main pandahihianamam?”
Ea' anona aman nape la'afena amam nematawai nagwamana basef Jisas na'i, “Dembinai tisa, so'uso'win aman ae'anai anona ambal aonai napein, malogel nase'an. Na'ama efa'an afi'mai ine'.

Nimeguf hiami ambal anama aonai nahapilan tatala'in nakwahin newa etap. Ea' apah nataga malogel, nalelef ananimi dindigim dogw, ea' alop ananinai dindigina endilisi. Ae' a'ipa alupumi ine'imi a'i motofa ambal anama aonai nefe', ea' amam ina la'ifim.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa owa' pembale'efa ae'. Nimeguf ma'um ae' ata' epe elomepa? Nimeguf ma'um wapoti' ma efa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipe' fa'an pifi'mai ae'.”
Ea' esis sao'wamana awani inima anan. Ambal anama aonai nati Jisas, mehip nakoto'an kwapete'an nafe' newa etap na'oh, apah afitimi mataga sisih malogel ananinai.
Ea' Jisas nahali' ahalomana na'i, “Nogalomena ine'inai, awes anama nanda'an nape nimeguf ma'um?”
Ea' anan na'ipana na'i, “Fowa' ata' awani nape la'ela'ef na'ama etin.
Nimeguf hiami ambal aonai nakwahin newala nasef nif fandumi, o newala embel na'i nohan afin. I'i ina la'ifinai, niti ape' owahipipa nigiambamapa.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' nahali'i na'ama? Emi epen nembale'efa Ae' endilisi, enin la'ifina nenda' opeh bu'wami mamumami hiami.”
Ea' ahalomana ma nogalomana anama na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ae' embale'efa ine' kwaukwawie'. Dei' nigiambame ma eambale'efena la'ifiwi endilisi.”

Ea' Jisas nati amam nematawa hiesi safi'i saitu salipana felefele', na'ipa ambal anama aonai mehip na'i, “Ine' ambal aonai nasopama aligahi malogel awani inima, ine' nekwaha so'uso'win inima nefe'. Netanima niefi'mani owa'.”
Ea' ambal anama aonai nakoto'an mehip nakwahin nandahi' nafe'. Ea' awani inima nandati si'i naga'i ea' hiesi satilin sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Enin naga' ea'.”
Ea' Jisas nahapila lagel ananinai nafelan ea' bo'wen naitu.
Alupumi Jisasi atom malomana mawis anona ipat mape, mahali'ana na'ama ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' la'ififama weatofa ambal anama aonai?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' penda' beten pembale'efa God atona, ipe' la'ifipama peatofa ambal anama aonai. Owa' anona eaf petofana. Beten atona.”

Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi makwaha anama mapoma mafe' mataga etap hiagoma Galili mawis mafe' anagon mape. Dei' main, Jisas na'i nope nondambaho' nolomama neawalipama basef ananimi. Na'ama nandaiwa'ma anona aman nogawa anama amam mafe' mapoma. Anan nawalipama basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb felefele' anona aman nose'asa ae' efe'ma lagof naumbih ae'ami mohe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilam meafe'ma wanomi, etanima ehafel efa' ambal namunai wapoti'.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama, ea' amam ina mogawa ofagema, owa'. Ea' amam umbamahama meahali'ana ma basef amama ofagema.
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga Kaperneam, mafe' mawis ipat nomon, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i maim basef do'ok wafi'i eaf?”
Do'ok mafi'i eaf, amam ma'i basef hiami ma'i nambimb emi nepe nili' dembinai ma amam. Na'ama amam ina magwamana anom basef, owa'. Tol mape etin.
Ea' Jisas nape etap nofala amam mafi'i mape felefele' na'ipam na'i, “Emi epen ni'i netaga dembinai nepe nili', enin ata' nili' netaga si'i nanda' maola anasi, netaga nagi' endilisi ma naep epesi.”
Ea' Jisas nafilai enin so'uso'win nahaponan naitu la'afena amam nahapilan na'ipam na'i,

“Emi egafis sese' opalefa siegiambama enin sa'usa'win si'i ini' ma okom ananinai nopoma Ae', esis sase'e opalef Ae' wapoti' sagiambame. Ea' emi egafis sigiambama ae'i, ina sagiambama Ae' atowe, owa'. Esis sagiambama anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'.”
Ea' Jon nogwa basef na'ama na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' wati anona aman nanda' maol natofa ambagof awami ma agel ine'inai. Ea' anan ina nagalo'ma afa', owa'. Ea' dei' wa'i owa'mana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa Jon na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'ipana na'ama, owa'. Emi epen nanda' maol bu'unai ma agel Ae'anai, enin ina ni'ipasa basef awami ma Ae', owa'.
Emi egafis owa' naumbih afa'isi, esis alupisi afa'isi.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, emi egafis sitilipa si'i ipe' epes ae'ipei ma siegiambamepa sese'epa anom amamaga kwauwie'im si'i embel kwaie'um pea'am, anona nemaf God nogwamasam amamaga bu'wami si'i presen.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'ama na'i, “I'i emi egafis senda' enin epen so'uso'win nembale'efa ae'i, nefe' nenda' waf aonai, nambimb epes isima sofa' nimanimi awami. I'i enis epes sofa' epes isima sepa' owap lu'unai nil bagafowa asasimi sokwahis sowala naoh loumi, sope andeande' kwaukwawie'. I'i epes isima senda' enin so'wiso'win nekwaha nembale'efa ae', epes isima sepe awes endilisi sikila' isima sewala naoh laumi afis.

I'i lagof ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'am pekwahom mefe'. Ea' lagel atona etin nope, ma pefa' ambal namunai nopeipa pepan andeande' la'ela'ef. Na'ama lagel anama nanda' waf aonai nope, nofa'epa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi mape la'ela'efi.”
“Wambel anama endihip sa'usa'umi namumi mape la'ela'ef magwa epesi, ea' nif amama wapoti' ina hi'gilalam, owa'.”]

“Ea' i'i bo'waga ipe'inai nonda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'ana pekwahona. Ea' bo'waga atotona nope, ma pefa' ambal namunai nopeipa pepan andeande' la'ela'ef. Na'ama bo'waga anama nonda'epa penda' waf aonai nope nofa'epa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi mape la'ela'efi.”
“Wambel anama endihip sa'usa'umi namumi mape la'ela'ef magwa epesi, ea' nif amama wapoti' ina higilalami, owa'.”]

“I'i naep ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, pigiam pekwahom. Atona etin mope ma piwis wambota Godi numafipa, pepe andeande' la'ela'ef. Na'ama naem anama nonda'epa panda' waf aonai nope, nofa'epa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi mape la'ela'efi.”
“Wambel anama endihip so'uso'umi namumi mape la'ela'ef magwa epesi, ea' nif amama wapoti' ina higilalami, owa'.”

“Anona nemaf epes hiesi some' nimanimi lu'wami si'i nif monda'as sope bo'wes andeande'. Sol usihimi bu'wami ma gwa'aimi, ea' sol owa' usihim, nambimb penda'am pi'imama usihim wapoti'? Ipe' panda' sola gwa'aimi usihim. Ea' ipe' na'ama etin si'i sol usihimi, pepe opalef ipe'imi etifim peloma sahin owan hiesi pigiambamas penda' waf bu'unai.”
Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' anona etap hiagoma Judia nambo walemb Jordan gani fisana. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai Anan wapoti', nase'asa basef si'i la'ela'ef nawalipasam.
Ea' anom Farisi mafi'i mahali' Jisasa anom basef magwambana ma'i, “Mi'uli ape'inai andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma nemata'w anani'wi nokwaho'w o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nagawamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Moses nase'epa maina mi'uli?”
Amam magwamana basef ma'ipana ma'i, “Moses na'i a'e ma anona aman ni'i nokwaha akwa'w, nonda' anom basef mil okwatip nose'akwana nokwaho'w kofe'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' patotopa' basefi. Dei' Moses nanda'mepa mi'uli anama.
Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' amamaga hiami,
‘Nanda' epes sataga amam nematawa.’
'Na'ama esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sape deindei, owa'. Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sope alop atotona.
Ea' esis bias sondase'ama sotaga si'i alop etifina.’
Esis ina ata' sape biasa sape deindei, owa'.
Ea' esis God nakolasis sape la'ifis, isima God na'i enin epen ina nehape'as, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mawis mape ipat, mahali'ana ma waf anama sandase'amainai.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Emi egalin nakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nose' ano'w wapoti', anan nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama nali' nase'akwi.
Ea' na'ama etin, emi egafu'w kokwaha anona kose' anona aman wapoti', akwa'w kwawala waf bu'unai kwatopa' dase'ama kwanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai ma anan nali' nase'akwi.”

Ea' esis sau'wamanai enis awasi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anan nowamona lagof ananimi ma awasi isima ma ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas. Ea' alupumi ananimi mati amama ea' minifalis esis sofa'as sifi'mai Anan.

Ea' Jisas nati amam ma'i manda' na'ama, anan okom aona ma amam ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' kwahowas awasi isima sifi'mai ae'. Ipe' ina pindaiwa'mas. Fa'asi sifi'mai ae'. Esis amam nematawa siowis wambota Godi numafias same' basef ananimi sailam si'i awasi isima.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, emi egafis sindaiwa'ma siowis wambota Godi numafias ama sese'ana ukup asasimi ma God si'i awasi isima sa'i aho'mana, epes isima sanda'am na'ama ina nambimb suwis wambota Godi numafias, owa'.”
Ea' Anan nafela awasi isima nahapilas satoma bo'wagah ananimi nawamona lagof ananimi balagah asasimi na'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas.
Jisas nohafel nafe', anona aman nasagih nafi'mai anan nindiwa nembawa notawa nahali'ana na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' nambimb enda' maina waf bu'unai ma efa' ambal namunai epe andeande' la'ela'ef?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' na'i Ae' bu'uwei? God atona Anan bu'unai.
Ine' negawa mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai na'i,

‘Ina nenda' waf aonai so'a waulanai neha enis soga' nenda' wal, owa', ine' owa' nembaso'ma enis epes ama nenda' kotimas etin, ea' ina nembaso'ma enis epes ma nefa' anom amamaga asasimi, owa'. Ine' nepe owina mamasena ine'isi neme' basef asasimi nilam ea' numafias andeande'.’ ”
Ea' aman anama na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Tisa, mi'uli anama hianai ahapilana ailana fowa' ata' awani afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”

Ea' okom Jisasi nohafela anan nainailana, na'ipana na'i, “Ine' anona waf bu'unai atotona ata' owa' neanda'anai. Ine' fo'o nese'asa amamaga ine'imi hiami enis epes sotaluma nefa' moni anama nenda'ana neso' isima kwahusi. Nenda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf nefa' amamaga bu'wami gani heven ilif. Ea' nembale'efa ae' nila ae'.”
Ea' aman anama neme' basef amama nandaiwa'ma nonda'am nose' enis epes kwahusi. Ea' okom ananinai nimanina endilisi nandamboma megah atogah nafe'. Dei' main? Anan amamaga hiamunai.
Ea' Jisas natologon ganigani na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Epes isima wiga moni hiamisi sanda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' suwis wambota Godi numafias. Atona etin sefe' siowis.”
Ea' amam mohafel gegelalasoma basef amama na'ipamami. Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef wapoti' na'i, “Owape ae'ipei, eaf nafe' anamai ina andipana, owa'. Ahifina.

Anona mafin lu'unai kamel nuwis nil nagala sagundisa luwagufanai, anama wila ma niowis. Ea' amam nematawa amamaga hiamisi sefe' siowis wambota Godi numafias sonda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' siowis. Eaf anama ahifina endilisi nikila' maol kamel nuwis nil nagala.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi mohafel gegelalasom kwapete'am endilisi manda'ipama ma'i, “I'i na'ama, anona nemaf God nofa' emi egafis setanimani? Owa'etin.”
Ea' Jisas nati amam na'ipam na'i, “Amamaga epes owa' la'ifisa seanda'ami, amama God atona la'ifinai ma nonda'am. Anan la'ifinai ma nonda' amamaga hiami.”
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' wakwaha amamaga afa'imi hiami, dei' wafi'i wambale'efa basef ine'imi wailina.”
