Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Endilisi, ae' a'ipipa na'ama a'i, Ipe' emi egafipa ukup ipe'imi mopoma Ae' eloma basef bu'wami Godi pekwaha ifagw moloma sahin owan ahapas mamasas batawisas moloma aof amamaga maim ipe'imi, anona nemaf pefa' amamaga amama hiami endilisi, mikila' ipe'imi amamaga fowa'imi. Ea' enis epes nambimb sehepa sonda'mepa waf aonai. Ea' anona nemaf nogota bu'unai neataga, pefa' ambagof namumi pepan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Ea' epes hiesi dei' sataga sali'i agof lu'wamisi, anona nemaf agof a'as sotaga sigi'. Ea' epes isima sataga sagi'i anona nemaf owagama sofa' agof lu'wami sotaga sili'.”

Esis saila eaf safe' sondowasa' Jerusalem, Jisas nafe' nali'as. Ea' alupumi ananimi mailana mafe'. Amam mogawa Anan nafe' Jerusalem, na'ama dei' amam gegelalasom. Enis epes sagima amam, esis umbamahas. Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi atom mafe' mape anagon dei, na'ipama amamaga amama nambimb meatagamasi.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Peme'. Dei' afa' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb anona aman nowalapa ae' ma efe'ma amam pris dambami moloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ea' monda' kotimi ea' mi'i basef mondame'mam mohe ega'. Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sololama Godi ma
sonda' salamala ae' sonda' findiwae sisisi'wafe sopagahowe sehe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'alam, anona nefe'ma wanomi etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
Ea' Jems naloma Jon, Sebedi batawisana mafi'i mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, afa' biafa wa'i uhali'ina ma anom basef ea' nenda'mafam afa' biafa.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i enda'mepa main?”

Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Anona nemaf ine' netaga nefa' agel lu'unai mafifili gani wambel Godi, nemaf anama afa' wa'i ine' nenda'afa ope dembifai wil olomena wa'owa'ol, anona nil wa'ol egagili ea' anona nil wa'ol da'isinaima.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa ina pegawa andeande'ma amamaga amama pahali'imami, owa'! Ipe' bipa la'ifipama pea' embela kap anama dei' ae' eagwa' embelanai, o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'ama ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' bipa la'ifipama pefa' baptais amama dei' efa'ami o owa'?”
Ea' magwamana basef ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wila la'ififa.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, kap anama dei' ae' ea' embelanai, ea' baptais amama nambimb efa'ami amama ipe' nambimb pefa'am.
Ea' peape lagel da'isinai o eganai ae'ami, amama ina maol ae'anai, owa'. God atona ni'i esis isima nandandepas ea'i, esis etis sope lagof da'isinai egagili ae'ami.”
Ea' alupumi tu'wanim 10-peleim mame' amam biam ma'iam na'ama, manda' megah maham Jems naloma Jon.

Ea' Jisas nofala alupumi Ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai Anan, na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa epes sololama Godi sa'i agufumi asasimi dambami, amam mape ilifa esis manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' amam dambami mape la'ifim endilisi manda' esis amam nematawa saila malogof amamumi.
Ea' waf anamai ina nepoma ipe', hapainai. Emi aman nope dembinai ma ipe'i, anan ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maola ipe' hipai.

Emi aman ni'i nope nili', anan nepe owina ipe' hipai nonda'mepa opeh ipe'imi. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ina afi'ima esis sonda'me opeh sigiambame, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipe' peloma epes hiesi etagahipama waf aonai nowa'ipei. Ea' emi egelin ni'i notaga dembeni ma ipe', anan ata' nopan si'i agel a'anai nonda'masa maol hiesi.”

Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jeriko. Ea' ma'i mokwaha Jeriko mefe' moloma amam nematawa hiesi, mataga eaf nawis wambel, ea' anona aman naep mase'anai Bartimeus, nogalomona Timeusi, tol nape felefele'ma eaf. Anan nape nandailasa gwa'aimi moni maim.
Bartimeus name' basefa Jisas Nasaretinai nafi'i nape, ea' nofalana mehip na'i, “Jisas, ine' akunamana Deviti, niti ae' uwahipiwi!”
Ea' esis hiesi sinifalona sa'i, “Ine' feso'mena.”
Ea' anan fala etin nape na'i, “Jisas ine' akunamana Deviti, nitolowe uwahipiwi.”
Ea' Jisas nafi'i naitu na'i, “Kipana nifi'mai ae'.”
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Nomonas la'ifim. Hafel! Fi'i Jisas nofalinai.”
Ea' anan nakwaha saket ananinai nohafel mehip nafe'ma Jisas.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' enda'mena main?”
Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapoti'.”
Ea' mehip naep matiana andeande' nagi'ma Jisas nafe' eaf.

Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mondowasa' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' mataga Betani naloma Betafage wambel biefina ea' mataga halaf lawah oliv motawama. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi biam

na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefe' wambel nanima nape gani wa'ol felefele'ma na'ae pefe' piwis wambel anama, piti anona donki so'unai sapana nail. Ina dei' enin epen natomana, ata' owa'. Petagahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
I'i enin epen nihali'ipa ni'i, ‘Ipe' pafi'i panda'am na'ama ma main?’ Ea' ipe' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolana atuwasi nosapa'ana notanimamipei mehip.’ ”
Ea' amam biam mafe' mati anona donki sa'unai sapete'ana nail ipat uta ande' felefele'ma eaf. Amam ata' matagahona etin, enis saitu felefele' sahali'am sa'i, “Dei' maina ipe' patagaha donki anama?”
Ea' ma'ipas si'i Jisas do'ok na'ipam. Ea' sa'i a'e ma amam mofa' donki anama.
Ea' mofa'ana mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagwegw amamumi matoma donki anama Jisas natomam.
Ea' esis hiesi sambe'amonam sagwegw eaf.
Esis hiesi sali' sagi' sanda' la kolo' safe' na'ama sa'i,
“Hosana. Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma ine'. Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma ine' nafi'i agel Dembinai.
Dei' awi ine' nafi'i, nape Dembinai ma ape' nimafiapa si'i fowa' gani Devit nape dembinai numafias. Hosana. Ape' mosa'ma agel Godi nolata ilif endilisi.”
Ea' Jisas nawis Jerusalem nafe' nawis ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai. Nawis nati amamaga nafe'ma hi'alam, aon na'i nowala, nao'wa alupumi 12-peleim ananimi mafe' Betani.
Wafilu Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mohafel makwaha Betani mafi'i etin, Jisas nolomahana.

Ea' naitu nati anona lawag agilinama fik notawa laogon felefele', nati apul atom. Ea' nafe' felefele' nagolopa su'utip. Ea' ina nati anom mailana, owa'. Nati apul atom. Nogota anama mailanai ata' owa'.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina ata' nela anom su'utip milina wapoti', owa'”.
Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama na'ipa lawagami.

Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jerusalem, ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nagolo'ma esis hiesi sanda' bisnisi saloma isima satalom ipat anama nomoni sawisi ande'. Anom amam mati otamba enis epesi mindisila'mam. Ea' Jisas namboma tebol amamumi nakowasom. Enis sanda' bisnisa setal amiguf mai'unamb. Ea' namboma siaifah asasimi nakowasom wapoti'.
Ea' nanda'imagon na'i, “Ina ata' sofa' anom amamaga amama suwisi nomon wapoti' ipat anama sandatama sapoma, owa'.”
Ea' na'ipasa basef Godi mail Baibeli na'i,
“Ipat Ae'anai nopoma esis sape ganima wambel hiagomai ma sifi'i sopaina sonda' beten sohali' Ae'. Ea' ipe' panda'ana nataga si'i sanda' walanai.”
Amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasisa basef ananimi. Amama atom pris amama dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi umbamahama anan. Ea' magolopa eafa mohana neaga'.
Ea' wambomota Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi makwaha Jerusalem mafe'.
Wafilu kuhimbita atona Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mati lawag anama fik bowana alina, soh maloma nombalef alim hi'alam.
Ea' Pita natolona okom napoma Jisas na'iami basefa lawag anama ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ine' niti lawag anae' nambati' ine' na'ipanai, alina hi'alana.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pembale'efa God.

Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, emi egafis owa' ukup bimbiefim mopeis ma esis ukup etifim sembale'a basef Ae'ami endilisi si'ipa halaf nani si'i, ‘Ine' degia nefe' newala naoh,’ endilisi God nambimb nonda'am motaga si'i esis ukup ma'iam.
Na'ama a'ipipa, I'i ipe' pi'i penda' betena pehali Goda anom amamaga, pembale'efa God endilisi penda' beten pi'i, ‘Endilisi, afa' nambimb ofa'ami,’ ma nambimb pefa'am si'i pa'iam.
Nemaf anama ipe' pitu penda' beten, pekwahomasa waf aonai enis sanda'mepanai. Ama Ahalomepa nape heven ilifi nekwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai wapoti'. [
I'i pindaiwa'ma peakwahomasa waf aonai enis epes sanda'mepanai, Ahalomepa nape heveni ina nekwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, owa'etin.]”

Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafi'i Jerusalem wapoti', ea' nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Anan ata' nafe' etin, amam pris dambami maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam agufumi Juda mafi'mai Anan.
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' nefa' agel maina dei' nanda' maol anama? Emi na'ipina ma nepe dembinai nanda' maol anama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapoti', a'i ihali'ipa ma anom basefa ipe' ata' pili' pi'ipa ae', ma atuwasi i'ipipa emi na'ipi ape dembiwei anda' maol anama.
Jon napisi'as amam nematawa hiesi, emi na'ipana nanda' maol anama? God nape heveni na'ipana napisi'as o enin epen etapanai na'ipana? Ipe' pegwam pi'ipiam.”
Ea' mame' basef amama manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' wi'i, ‘God nape heveni na'ipana,’ Anan atuwasi ni'ipafa ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' owa' pembale'efana?’
Ea' afa' wi'i, ‘Epes sape etapi sa'ipa Jon napisi'asi,’ na'ama esis amam nematawa sohafa.”
Dei' main, esis hiesi sa'i Jon anan profet dembinai. Ea' amam umbamahama esis.
Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' ina ogawana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Na'ama etin ae' ina i'ipipa emi nase'e agel lu'unai na'ipi anda' maol anama.”

Ea' Jisas nanda' anom basef womun etina esis na'i, “Anona aman dembinai nanda' anona aof nawa wain nahopana. Aof anama nomon anan nanda' anona tang notawa ma sofa'asa su'utip amama wainim, ea' nala' anona ipat launai notawa sope sumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomama aof anama anom amam ma'i monda' maolanana. Ea' anan nafe' napani anona wambel laugoma.
Ama nogota su'utip mailanai, nafamona aof anamai nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' ma amam manda' maol aof ananinai. Na'i amam mose'ana anom su'utip gwa'aimi ma aof anama.
Ea' mombalo'ana mahana matofana notanima nafe'.
Ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' wapoti' ma mose'ana anom su'utip. Ea' mombalo'ana wapoti' mahana mawala balagana manda'ana kwapete'ana.
Ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' wapoti', ea' mahana afuna, ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anom hiami mafe'. Ea' maham etin anom afum.
Ea' nagi' nasapa' aman atotona napani wapoti'. Anama nogalomana ananinai. Okom ananinai nohafel nainailana endilisi. Ea' na'iam na'i, ‘Nambimb, amam mome' malogel nogalome ae'anai.’
Ea' amam mati nogalomana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama etin ma'i, ‘Aman anama anona nemaf nofa' amamaga hiami ahalomanai. Afa' ohana afuna, ma afa' atofa ofa' aof anama.’
Ea' mombalo'ana mahana afuna makwaha alop ananinai nawis na'oh aof ande'.
Ea' nambimb anan nafamona aofi nonda' maina amam? Nambimb nifi'i noham afum hi'ilam, nose'asa aof anama nefe'ma enis.
Ipe' patalifa basef Godi pegawam ea'. Basef Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i,
‘Owap
Dembinai nanda' amama mataga, ape' matolom bo'om endilisi.’ ”
Ea' amam agufumi esis Judai mogawa anan na'i basef amama womun etini mondola'wifa amam. Ea' ma'i mombalo'ana. Ea' amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' makwahona mafe'.

Ea' amam mafi'i makikipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena ine' aman na'i basef endilisimi. Ina ni'ipasa anom basef isima enis agof lu'wamisi ea' anom basef isima agof a'asi falafisi, owa'. Ine' na'ipasa basef atifim endilisimi atom ma okom Godi amam nematawa hiesi dondo' etin hi'alam.
Mi'uli ape'inai na'i andeande'ma ape' mose'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai ma esis Rom, o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas negawam baso'am amamunai na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pagwamba ae'? Fa'mai anona moni atotona ata' itolona.”
Ea' mofa'mananai ma natolona nahali'am na'i, “Ambal naloma agel anama mailanai eminai?”
Ea' ma'i, “Amama Sisari gavman dembinai.”
Ea' nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamaga Sisari pese'anam Sisar. Ea' amamaga Godi, pese'anam God.”
Ea' amam gegelalasom ukup matamea ma Anan.
Anom amam Sadyusi amam hiami ma'i saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'. Ea' mafi'mai Jisas mahali'ana ma'i,

“Dembinai Tisa, fowa' gani Moses nanda' anom basef mail buki ma ape' ma'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anan awasi a'ana, ea' waulu'mana ata' kope, owalomana ananinai nose'akw nola enis awasi ma soho'ofana.’
Ea' fowa' amam wambota atotona 7-peleim mape. Nali'i sahalomam nase'akw awani a'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwape.

Ea' owalomana nagi' nase'akw, naga' nakwaho'w kwape awani a'akw. Ea' owapam mandatu'umai manda'am na'ama etin, mase'akw maga' etin hi'alam mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amam amama wambutaim ina mola enis awasi, owa'. Maga' etin hi'alam. Ea' waulu'mam kwagi' kwaga' kwagi'mam.
Ea' nemaf anama esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', nemata'w akwama kope nemata'w emi'wi? Amam 7-peleim maso'akw etin hi'alam kwape waulu'mam amamu'wi.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef Baibel na'iami, owa' pegawa pepel Godi.
Nemaf anama saga'i sokwaha hi'agilif sohafel wapoti', amam nematawa ina ata' sondase'ama wapoti', owa'. Sopan etin si'i ensel mape heveni.

Basef amama saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti', ipe' patalifa basef mail buk Baibeli, fowa' gani God na'ipa Mosesami. Basef amama ma'i nif ilalowa mataga ma lawag so'unai fandonai. Basef amama God na'ipa Moses na'i,
‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki, maloma Jekopi.’
Basef amama ma'i Dembinai, Anan ina God epes saga'i, owa'. Anan God epes isima ambal napeis sape namusi. Ea' basef ipe'imi ina endilisimi. Ipe' ina pegawam andeande', owa'.”
Anona aman nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nafi'i, name' amam ma'i maloma Jisas mandahihianama basef. Ea' name' Jisas nagwamama basef bu'wami atom.
Ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Mi'uli Godi ape' membale'efanai hianai. Ea' maina mi'uli lu'unai nikila' mi'uli hianai nape nali'i?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Mi'uli nali'i anama.
‘Ipe' Israel, ipe' peme'! Dembinai God ape'inai, Anan atona Dembinai.
Nomonas ipe'imi mohafela Dembinai God ipe'inai mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana ambagof opalef moloma pepel ipe'imi pese'anam hi'ilama Dembinai God atona.’
Ea' mi'uli nafe'ma bifi anama.
‘Ipe' ukup mimila enis epes sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.’
Owa' anona mi'uli nikila' mi'uli anama biefina, owa'. Mi'uli anama biefina ape' mombale'efanai ea' anama atona.”
Ea' aman anama na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'iam andeande'. God atona Anan Dembinai, Anan atona nape. Owa' anona aman nope dembinai si'i Anan.

Mi'uli lu'unai nali'i anama. Nomonas ipe'imi mohafela anan mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana opalef moloma gawa moloma pepel ipe'inai hi'ilana. Na'ama andeande'. Ea' mi'uli nagi'i anama. Ipe' piti uwahipis ukup mimila emi egafis sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipe' ukup maila ipe' etipa. Na'ama andeande'. I'i ape' mila mi'uli anama biefina, waf anama bu'unai nikila' gwa'aimi mafis maim mose'anam Godi ata' bo'om andeande'.”
Jisas name' aman anama nagwa basef si'i aman gawa bu'unai. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina ata' nogota laona ma niowis wambota Godi numafina, owa'.”
Ea' amam hiami umbamahama meahali' Jisasa anom basef wapoti'.

Ea' Jisas nape felefele' ma ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai nase'asa basef esis amam nematawa na'i, “Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i, ‘Krais, aman anama God nandandepana nasapa'ana niefi'i, Devit akunamana.’ Ea' ma'i Krais aman atona etapanai. Dei' maina ma'iam na'ama ma Krais?
Ambal Bu'unai Godi fowa' gani nafela Devit na'i
‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel da'isinai ae'anai la'ela'ef nefe' netagama anona nemaf ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bo'wagah ine'imi.” ’
King Devit fowa' gani nofala Krais na'i,
‘Anan Dembinai.’ Amama atom dei' Krais ina aman nogalomana Deviti atona falafunai, owa'. Anan Dembinai.”
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sandanifel same' basef Ananimi.

Ea' Jisas nawalipasa basef na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Amam ma'i mowaho'a luwaguf laumi atom mofe'ma esis sotoloma si'i amam dambami manda' waf bu'unai. Amam ma'i mope anama esis hiesi sandatama sapoma ma sotoloma sefela agof amamumi sinifelom.

Amam amama ukup ma'i mope siaifah amama motawa mali'i atom, dambami atom mapoma nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi o anama epes hiesi sandatama sapoma nimeguf amama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma hiesi sotolom.

Ea' amam mawis ifagw amama nematawa alifiwai, mawis makowalopam amamaga awaumi. Ea' mohafel maitu manda' beten launai atona wafinai esis sotolom si'i amam bu'wami. Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes hiesi. Enis epes owa' senda' waf aonai na'amainai anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi kwawie'um, ea' amam mofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.”

Jisas nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai, nape felefele'ma bokis amama sala moni nalami. Anan nape nati amam nematawa safi'i sala moni nowala bokis amama. Amam nematawa isima hiesi moni hianaisi sala moni hianai.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwafi'i kwala moni sa'unai biefina si'i 10 toea newala bokis isima.
Ea' nofala alupumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwama alifi'wi kwala moni lu'unai nikila' moni hianai amam nematawa hiesi salanai.

Epes isima hiesi moni hianai na'omas, sala tu'wanina atona nowala bokis. Ea' nemata'w akwama, moni a'akw endilisi, akwa'w kwala moni ako'unai hi'alana. Ea' owa' anona ne'oh kweatala gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' moni akwa'unai biefina so'unai nikila' moni hianai esis salanai.”

Jisas nape nomon ipat anama lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Ea' na'i nokwaha ipat anama nawisi ande', anona alupunai ananinai nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Tisa, ine' niti ifagw amama bu'wami. Sanda' otamba lu'wami sanda'am bu'wami atom.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i na'ama, na'i, “Ine' nati ifagw amama lu'wami? Anona nemaf ina anom otamba mondatoma la'ifim etin mope, owa'. Sowowalom atona etin hi'ilam mo'oh.”
Jisas nape halaf anama lawah oliv motawama ea' nati ipat lu'unai Godi notawa to'wan wa'ol. Ea' Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon naloma Andru atom mafi'mai Anan mahali'ana ma'i,
“Ine' ni'ipafa amamaga amama nambai' motaga'? Maina ikwaf nili' notaga ma afa' ogawa amamaga amama felefele'ma motaga si'i dei' na'ipafa?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa.

Dei' main, amam hiami anona nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agel ae'anai mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i.’ Ea' anona nemaf amam mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi some' basef amamumi si'i endilisimi silam.
Anona nemaf peme'asa basefa wandaf lu'unai hianai notaga ea' ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Amamaga amama anona nemaf motaga ea' nemaf akutainai ata' owa'.

Enis epes sape anama etap hiagoma kantri sofela wandaf sopa' soloma anona kantri. Anona king nohafel no'wa enis wambel hiagoma ananisi sopa' soloma anona king no'wa ananisi wambel hiagoma. Enis epes wambel hiagoma atona etin etap bol etin nope, ea' enis epes hiesi sape wambel hiagoma nolomohas sope. Amamaga amama hiami ata' muli' motaga si'i nimanimi mali'i ma nemata'w kwa'i kola awani. Ea' nimanimi anona nemaf migi' meatagai lu'um endilisi mikila' amama mali'i.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Anona nemaf sonda' kotimipa ma gavman dambami asasimi. Ea' sehepa nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Ipe' pame' basef ae'ami paila ae'i amama atom dei' sondaiwa'mepa sonda'epa pitu naep kingi moloma gavman dambami ma peawalapa basef ae'ami bu'wami pi'ipasam.
Alupisi ae'asi ata' sili' sofe' wambel hiagoma si'ipa amam nematawa hiesi some' basef bu'wami Godi mili'.

Nemaf anama esis sowalapepa sofa'epa pefe'ma kot, ipe' ina umbamehepa pi'i, ‘Atuwasi afa' wi'i maim basef?’ Owa'. Maim basef God niesi'ipami ma nogota anama atona, amama ipe' pewalapam. Amama ina basef ipe'imi atom, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nowalapama ipe' pi'iam.
Anona nemaf esis hiesi sahin owan sondanda'ma kot, sohas soga'. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'ama etina esis nogamas asasisi. Ea' batawisas wapoti' sonda' kotima mamasas asasisi enis sohas soga'.

Anona nemaf epes hiesi wambel hiagoma opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Esis sati ipe' paila basef ae'ami na'ama dei' sahepa. Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa Ae' situ la'ifis sotaga nemaf akutainai, isima anona nemaf God nefa'as sotanimani.

Anona nemaf ipe' piti amamaga mohambombaga amamaga bu'wami motaga mope nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. God nandaiwa' endilisi ma amamaga awami mope nomon ipat Ananinai.” (Emi egafis setalifa basef amama, esis sogawa basef ofagema andeande'.)
“Nemaf anama amam nematawa sape etap hiagoma Judia sofa' sefe' sondowasa' halafutagw.
Ea' emi egafis sape ipat ande' felefele' ina ata' setanima suwis sefa'ai amamaga asasimi ipat nomon, owa'. Esis sofa' sefe' mehip.
Emi egafis sapani aofi, ina ata' setanima sefe' wambel sefa' luwaguf maim asasimi, owa. Esis sofa' sefe' mehip.
Nematawa opafuwai waloma awama awasi ata' sagwa' nomambeh atomi Ae' a'i awau uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota anama ofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.
Ipe' penda' betena amamaga amama nimanimi ina motagamepa nogota anama uf noloma asaf mifi'i.

Nogota anama nimanimi lu'wami endilisi meataganai. Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' etap nataga nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', nimanimi amama lu'wami ina anom na'amaimi mataga, owa'. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' ina anom nimanimi amama motaga, owa'.
I'i God owa' nenda' nimeguf mefe' bandam, anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi hegililas hi'ilas. Owa'etin. God okom napoma epes isima anan nasahe'as ea dei' nanda' nogota anama bandana.
Nemaf anama notaga ma i'i enis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Ipe' piti Krais, God nandandepana nasap'ana nafi'i, anan nape na'ae,’ o ‘Nani nape gani,’ ipe' ina pembale'efas, owa' hapaisi.

Anona nemaf anom amam mombaso'am mi'i amam Kraisi o mi'i amam profeti, motaga monda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani hianai si'i God atona nanda'anai. Endilisi i'i amam la'ifim, mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea' mohambombagas. Owa'.
Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Ae' ali' a'ipipa ea'ma amamaga amama nimanimi dei' ata' owa' meatagai.
Nimanimi amama hiami ma nogota anama hi'ilam ea', mehip etin
‘aon alipunai netaga owamb, ea' aon owambunai wa na'ef ina molo, owa'.
Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, amamaga hiami la'ifimi mape otagai ea' bol etin mope.’
Nogota anama esis amam nematawa siti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei eloma elagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma amamaga howalagon bu'wami Godi moloma pepel Ananinai.

Nogota anama Ae' iefi'ianai esapa' ensel amama Ae'ami mofe' etap hiagoma aon natefima nowalama wa'owa'ol anama biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganima etap otaga nafe' notambilima. Ensel amama mefe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea'i Ananisi sondakolas etifigin.
Ipe' okokoma anom basef womun etina lawag anama fik. Ipe' piti ilaof monafa ma masowa, pegawa nogota anama nelemb ea' felefele'ma meaof.
Ea' na'ama etin nemaf anama piti amamaga amama ali' a'ipipami motaga, ipe' pegawa ae' afi'i aitu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laona, owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' ata' papani ina pega' ulal, ata' owa', ipe' piti amamaga amama motaga hi'ilam.
Otaga noloma etap hiagoma anona nemaf hegililam hi'ilam, ea' basef Ae'ami ina anona nemaf hi'ilam, owa'etin. Mope la'ela'ef hihif.
Owa' enin epen negawa nemaf anama amamaga amama meataganai, owa'. Amam ensel mape heveni maloma ae' Nogalomana Ananiwei ina ogawa, owa'. God atona nogawa nemaf anama.
Ipe' ina pegawa amamaga amama nambai' motaga, owa'. Na'ama pindumafuma, ukup motamea andeande' pepan.

Ipe' peme' anom basef womun etin dei' ie'ipipami. Nemaf anama Ae' etanima iefi'ianai si'i anona aman nakwaha ipat ananinai nafe' anagon. Anan nofalai amam manda' maola anani mafi'i nawaloga maol nase'am atona etina mumafi amamaga ananimi. Ea' na'ipa aman numafi utai ma numafiana andeande'.
Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Ipe' ina pegawa nambei' Dembinai numafi ipati niefi'i. Nambimb nifi'i wambomota o amaneta o kwafolimbuta awatagw meada'am o kuhimbita atona, ipe' ina pegawam, owa'.
Na'ama Anan nifi'i mehip niti ipe' ata' pe'eh etin.
Basef amama ae' ase'epam ipe'i amama ae' a'ipa amam nematawa hiesi. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pepe ma amamaga ae' a'ipipami meataga.”

Anona nemaf bu'unai sa'i Pasova ma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sagwa' anona bret owa' neatef lu'unai. Nimeguf biam ata' mape ma nemaf anama bu'unai sa'i sea' gwa'aimi Pasova ea' notaga. Nemaf anama amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom pris dambami ma'i mondambaho' miti anona eaf ma mombalo' Jisas mohana neaga'.
Amam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami afa' ina ombalo'ana, hapainai. Na'ama epes hiesi ukup aom sohafel sonda' wandaf.”

Nemaf anama Jisas nape Betani, nape ipat anona aman Saimoni. Fowa' awes aonai nanda' alop ananinai nambo', dei' ambo'ona. Jisas ata' nape na' gwa'aimi etin nalomana, ea' ano'w nemata'w kwahapila anona botol sanda'ana si'i otam, sanda alogw bu'wami ma'anai satalom otamba lu'wami mala botol anama, agilinama nad. Ea' kopalia botol anama kwakolo'am mowala balaga Jisasi.
Ea' enis epes sape satolom sa'i, “Dei' maina kwakolo' sanda amama mafe' etin?”
Ea' esis ukup numbutim kwapete'as ma akwa'w,
ea' sa'i, “Dei' afa' ofa'am enis epes sose'afa moni nikila' 300 kina sotalom ofa'ana oso' epes isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim, andeande'.”
Esis ukup numbutim endilisi mapoma nemata'w akwama.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' kwaho'w. Ipe' ina ukup aoma akwa'w, owa'. Akwa'w kwanda' waf bu'unai ma Ae'.

Isima gwa'aimi maim a'asi la'ela'ef sape salomepa. Maina nemaf pi'i pigiambamas pese'as moni, andeande' pese'asana. Epes isima sape salomepa nimeguf hiami, ea' ae' owa'. Ae' ina elomepa epe nimeguf hiami, owa'.

Maol anama akwa'w kwogawana, kwanda'ana. Felefele'ma nambimb esis sehe ega' ma sowe hi'agif. Okom ako'unai napoma felefele'ma ae' ega'. Na'ama dei' kofa'ai sanda amama kwafi'i kwakolo'am mowala balaga ae'anai kwakolo'am mowala alop ae'anai ma kwandondomba ae' ma seawe.
Endilisi Ae' a'ipipa, ganima etap anae' wambel hiagoma anona nemaf si'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi, si'ipasa basef ako'umi wapoti' ma ukup mopoma waf bu'unai akwa'w kwanda'meanai.”
Amam amama Jisasi 12-peleim anona amamunai agilinama Judas Kariotinai nafe'ma amam pris hiami dambami. Anan na'i ni'ipama Jisas atona napoma mofe' mombalo'ana.
Amam mame' basef ananimi mandanifel endilisi. Ea' ma'i basef mandame'mam na'ama ma'i, “Andeande', afa' ose'ena anona moni.”
Ea' Judas na'i nefe' nogolopa anona eafa nihi'ambama Jisas amama mombalo'ana.
Nemaf anama sali' sa' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova esis sa' bret anama owa' neatef lu'unai, nemaf anama saha sipsip noganai sondolalima Goda sonda' gwa'aimi amama si'i afagof hiami sanda'am.
Ea' alupumi Jisasi mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat enima ma afa' ofe' onda' gwa'aimi amama?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa ananimi biam na'i, “Ipe' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'unai, piti anona aman eaf nofa' embel malep lu'unai. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat anama anan nefe' niowisanai. Ea' pihali' kofagena ma ipat anama pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, rum ae'anai nape eti? Anan na'i no'wa afa' atofa alupufai ope onda' gwa'aimi amama Pasova.’
Ea' nihi'ambepa rum anama lu'unai nape ilif, ea' sandombana tebol siaifah ma'oh etifim. Ipe' pendondombamafa gwa'aimi rum anama.”
Ea' amam mafe' mawis wambel anama mati amama si'i Jisas nali' na'ipami ea' mandondomba gwa'aimi amama Pasova rum anama.
Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas naloma alupumi 12-peleim mafe' mataga ipat anama
Mawis ata' mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai dei' nape nalomafa na' gwa'aimi, atuwasi nefe' nihi'amba amam naumbiha Ae' efe' eapoma.”
Amam mame' na'ama ukup amamumi nimanim ea' mahali'ana atona etin ma'i, “Ae' o emi?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Anona afa'inai 12-peleim naloma ae' wahapila bret walata disi, ea' anama atona.

Ae' ataga epen enidilisiwei, naman enis epes sehe ega', si'i Buk Baibel na'iama Ae'. Ea' aman anama nowalapa Ae' ma naumbih, anan uwahipina endilisi. Nambimb nimanimi awami endilisi motagamana. Fowa' mama'wana owa' ata' kolanai, andeande'. Ama anan ina notagama nimanimi amama awami, owa'.”
Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, nafela anona bret, nanda' beten nanifela God, nawalona nase'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' felana pea'ana. Bret anama alop Ae'anai.”
Ea' nafela anona kap embel wain nalanai nanda' beten nanifela God naso' amam hiami ma' embel etin.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Embel amama esimbel Ae'ami manda' basef amama God na'i endilisimi atomi motaga la'ifim. Ae' ekolo'wama igiambama amam nematawa hiesi.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' etanima ea' embel wain wapoti', owa'. Efe' etaga wambel Godi, ea' anona wain dambainai.”
Amam manda' anona awaf ea' mawisi mafe' mondowasa' halaf lawah oliv motawama.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi na'i, “Fowa' gani Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, God na'i,
‘Anona nemaf owagama gani, Ae' eha aman anama numafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amama atuwasi mofa' mofe' atona etin.’
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, atuwasi ipe' pekwaha pembale'efa ae' pefa' pefe' atona etin, si'i fowa' gani God na'iam.
Ea' nambimb ae' etanima ehafel wapoti', ili'ipa efe' etap hiagoma Galili.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana na'i, “I'i amam hiami ine'imi mokwahina, hapaimi, ae' owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina basef endilisi, dei' owamb anae', awata ata' owa' nonda'am bif, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisas.’ ”
Ea' Pita na'ipana mehip na'i, “I'i esis sohafa, afa' biafa oga' etin. Ae' ina embaho' agel ine'inai, owa'.”
Ea' alupumi hiami Jisasi ma'iam na'ama etin hi'alam.
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga anona etap Getsemani, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pepe na'ae. Ae' efe' gani wa'ol enda' beten.”
Ea' Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon mafe' malomana. Ea' opaf Jisasi aona kwapete'ana.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Opaf ae'anai nimanina endilisi ma ega', nomonas ae'ami aom endilisi. Ipe' pepe na'ae pindumafuma pepe pehafa ae' etanimai iefi'i.”
Ea' Jisas nandamboma nafe', nambe' opaf na'oh etap nanda' beten. Na'i notofa amamaga awami amama anan atuwasi meatagamanai.
Ea' nahali' God na'i, “Aba

Anan nahali'ana ea', nohafel notanima nafe'ma alupumi ananimi mapoma. Nafe' natolom ea', nati amam ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon, ipe' ata' owa' pepe, pa'oh etin a'amon? Dei' maina ipe' owa' la'ifipama pepe pehafa ae'? Nogota ina ata' laona ma ie'ipipa a'i pepe, owa'.
Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pepe penda' beten. Na'ama amamaga meagwambipei meatagamepa. Endilisi ukup ipe'imi ma'i awima penda' beten, ea' alop owa' la'ifina, ala'uta naepa ma penda beten pelome.”
Jisas na'ipam na'ama ma ea', notanima nafe' nanda' beten. Nahali'anama basef amama atom nali' nahali'anamami.
Nahali'ana ea' nandamboma notanima nafi'i amam mapoma nati ata' ma'oh. Ea' ninimbalom mohafel ma'i, “Atuwasi afa' wi'ipana maim basef?”
Ambeh maham ea' ma'oh maga' mafe'.

Ea' anan nandamboma notanima nafe' wapoti' nanda' beten si'i do'ok nali' nanda' beten bif. Ea' notanima nafi'mai amam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' papoma noma'w pa'oh etin? Dei' ipe' koh ea', hafel. Dei' nemaf anae' anona aman nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.
Hafel! Afa' ofe' uti aman anama nihi'ambama ae' dei' nafi'i.”

Jisas ata' naitu na'ipam etin, anona aman nafi'i. Aman anama Judas anona amam 12-peleim alupumi ananimi nafi'i nalumai amam hiami mahapila bainahi belep malomana mafi'i. Amam pris dambami malumai amam agufumi dambami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.
Aman anama nawalapa Jisasi, nali' na'ipam nanda' ikwaf nihi'ambam na'i, “Atuwasi piti ae' iesisi' dalogwanai, aman anama ea' Jisas ma'una. Ipe' pembalo'ana pewa'ana andeande' pefa'ana pefe'.”
Amam ata' mataga etin, Judas nafe'ma Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai Tisa.”
Ea' nasisi' dalogwana.
Ea' amam membalo' Jisas.
Ea' anona aman naitu felefele'ma Jisasi nagiai bainat naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami, natopa' aliga ananinai pele'atana nowa.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam naumbih na'i, “Ipe' pefa'ai bainah maloma belep pafi'i pa'i pewa' anona aman aonai nanda' wal napa' naloma gavmani?

Nimeguf hiami ae' ape alomepa felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wami ma esis aman nematawa hiesi, ea' ipe' owa' pembale'e. Ea' dei' paila basef mape Baibeli pafi'i pewa'e si'i basef fowa' gani ma'iam. Ae' a'i basef amama dei' motaga endilisi mola' gwa'aimi.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
Ea' anona aman sa'unai nagi'ma Jisas nafi'i nowaho' anona lowaf afitinai ea' amam mahapila bainah maloma belep ma'i mombalo'ana.
Ea' anan nakwaha lowaf atona na'oh ea' nafa' nafe' etin.
Amam mofa' Jisas mafe'ma pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami. Anan naloma amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami Judai maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi amam hiami mandakolas etifigin.
Ea' Pita ina nalomam etin nafe', owa'. Anan nagi'mam nafe' nawis endalelemba pris anama dembinai ea' nape naloma amam polisman mapoma nif.
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami Juda hiami mumafi koti ma'i mogolopa enis epesa sombaso'mana ma anom basefa moha Jisas neaga'. Ea' amam ina mati enis, owa'.
Esis hiesi sambaso'mana ma anom basef ea' ina sa'i endilisimi mafe' etifigin, owa'. Sa'iam mafe' deindei.
Ea' amam maitu mambaso'mana ma anom basef na'ama ma'i,
“Afa' wame' Jisas na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Ipat lu'unai Godi epes sanda'anai, nambimb Ae' etalona, ma nimeguf wanom ea' efelona notawa wapoti'. Ea' Ae' ina enda' lagof epesi efelona, owa'.’ ”
Basef amama amam ma'iami ina ma'i endilisimi mafe' etifigin, owa'. Ma'iam mafe' deindei.
Ea' pris anama dembinai naitu la'afen nahali' Jisas na'ama na'i, “Ine' negwa basef amama, o owa'? Dei' maina amam ma'ipina basef na'ama?”

Ea' Jisas nasopama malogel naitu. Anan ina nagwamana basef anan, owa'. Ea' pris anama dembinai nahali'ana wapoti' na'i, “Ine' Krais aman anama God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o owa'? Ine' nogalomana Godi ape' manda' lotumanai, o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' ma'uwi. Ea' anona nemaf ipe' piti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei epe lagel da'isinai Godi, epe otaga ilif itanimai ifi'i petolowe.”
Jisas na'iam na'ama, ea' pris anama okom wandafuna, ea' nahape' lowaf anama nalanai na'iam na'i, “Ape' ina ata' mofalai enis epes wapoti' sifi'i si'i anom basefa anan, owa'.
Anan nanda' God findiwana ea' amama pame'am. Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama?”
Ea' amam hiami ma'i anom basef mandame'mam ma'i, “Anan nanda' waf aonai afa' ohana nega'.”
Ea' anom mohafel misisi'wafana masopama naep ananimi mahana ma'ipana ma'i, “Ni'i basef si'i profet newalapa emi nahena.”
Ea' amam polisman mafi'i mahana mofa'ana mafe'.
Ano'w nemata'w kwanda'mana maol pris anama dembinai kwafi'i kwati Pita napoma nif ipat ande'. Ea' kwaitu kwatolona kogawana kwa'ipana na'ama kwa'i, “Enina ine' nape naloma Jisas Nasaretinai.”
Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi na'ipakw na'i, “Owa'. Ae' ina egawa basef ofagema ine' na'iami.”
Ea' anan nohafel nafe' felefele'ma endambel uta, anona awata nonda'am.
Ea' nemata'w akwama kwatolona kwa'ipas isima saitu felefele'i wapoti' kwa'ipas na'ama kwa'i, “Aman anama wapoti' alupunai Jisasi.”
Ea' Pita na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' ina egawana, ae' owa'.”
Nogota bandana ea' enis saitu felefele'i sa'ipa Pita wapoti' sa'i, “Endilisi, ine' alupinai naloma amam Jisasi. Ine' wapoti' aman Galilinai.”
Dei' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi na'i basef la'ifimi na'i, “Endilisi ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anama ipe' pa'ianai, owa'.”
Anan na'iam ea', awata nanda'am bif ea' Pita okokoma basef do'ok Jisas na'ipanami na'i, “Awata owa' ata' nonda'am bif, ine' nembaso'mas ni'iam wenif ni'i, ‘Owa' negawea.’ ”
Ea' Pita okom napoma basef amama ea' nalef mehip.

Kuhimbita atona amam pris dambami maloma anom dambami Judai maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom Juda dambami mumafi koti, amam hiami mandakolas maila basef etifim. Amam mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe' maso' gavman dembinai Pailat.
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai esis Judai o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef amama ine' na'iami endilisimi.”
Ea' amam pris dambami mambaso'ma Jisasa basef hiami.
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana wapoti' na'i, “Ine' owa' negwa anom basef? Ine' neme'. Amam manda'mena basef hiami ma ine'.”
Ea' Jisas ina nagwa anom basef wapoti', owa'. Na'ama Pailat okom natanea.

Nemaf anama esis Juda sanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova. Afagof hiami ma nemaf anama Pailat nanda'am na'ama. Anan nakwaha anona nape kalabusi nafe' wafifina. Emi epen esis amam nematawa sa'ianai, Pailat name'asa nakwahona nafe'mas.
Nogota anama anona aman nape kalabusi agilinama Barabas. Anan nanda' kalabus naloma anom amam mapa' maloma gavmani maha enis saga'i.
Ea' esis hiesi safi'i saitu sofala Pailat sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nekwaha anona aman nape kalabusi nifi'mai ape' wafifina, si'i afagof hiami nanda'am.”
Ea' nagwamasa basef na'i, “Dei' ae' ekwaha king dembinai ipe' Judai nefe'mago ipe', o emi?”
Dei' main, Pailat anan nogawa amam pris dambami kowalama epes hiesi saila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana.
Ea' amam mafela ukup ma esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sohali' Pailata nokwaha Barabas atona nufi'mai esis.
Ea' Pailat na'iam wapoti' na'ama na'i, “Aman anama ipe' pefalona pa'i king dembinai esis Judai, ipe' pa'i ae' enda' i'imamana?”
Ea' esis sa'i mehip sa'i, “Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai!”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anan nanda' maina waf aonai?”
Ea' esis sa'i mehip sa'i, “Undana lawag hana afuna!”
Ea' Pailat naila ukup asasimi, nakwaha Barabas nafe'ma esis na'ipa amam soldia ma mopagaha Jisas mofa'ana mefe'ma mundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
Amam soldia mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat gavmani lu'unai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anan,
malamana saket akwahinai. Ea' mofa'ai anona mandof higatagunai manogana mala'watefana si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananinai.
Ea' maitu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'unai, ine' king dembinai esis Judai!”
Ea' amam mahana anona elifita balaga ananinai, misisi'wafana mindiwa nembawa motawa mafela agel ananinai etin.
Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket anama akwahinai, malamana lowaf ananinai mofa'ana mafe'ma mundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.

Amam soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ata' mafo'o eaf la'afen ea' matagama anona aman Saimon Sairininai nafi'i. Batausana ananimi biam, Aleksanda naloma Rufus. Saimon napani aolop nafi'i na'i nefe' Jerusalem. Ea' amam soldia masapa'ana nofa' lawag Jisasi. Ea' nofa'ana nafe'.
Ea' mofa' Jisas mafe' mataga anagon agiliguma Golgota. Ape' dei' mambomefagel ma'i, Pipitagel Balagaina.
Ea' mase'ana anom embel wainim mambomom malomana anona marasin agilina mer ma nea' embel mohogofa ekep pehana. Ea' anan ina na'i a'e na'am, owa'. Nandaiwa'mam.
Ea' maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma emi nikila' nefa'am mondandam atona etin.
Kuhimbita aon ata' natefi naili 9 klok, soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' maundana lawag anama.
Amam mofa' anona pepa basef amama do'ok amam Juda mambaso'ma Jisasami Pailat nanda'am mail ma'i, “AMAN ANAMA KING ESIS JUDAI.” Amam manda' basef amama mail balaga Jisasi lawag ilif.
Felefele'ma Jisas naima, amam soldia maunda anom biam manda' waf aonai manda' wali. Amam maunda Jisas nail la'afen, ea' maunda amam biam mail wa'owa'ol. [
Na'ama si'i anom basef Baibel na'iami dei' mataga alihim mandawalap. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Anona nemaf esis ukup mopoma anan noloma amam amama manda' waf aonai.”]
Ea' enis amam nematawa safe' safi'i eaf sanda' salamala anan samboma balagah sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Ine' ewi, ine' aman netala ipat anama dembinai Godi, ma netanima nefelona nela'ana nimeguf wanom,
dei' nigiambama ine' nendatagah nisila'i.”
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi hiami malomam maitu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Anan nagiambama enis epes ea' dei' ina nagiambama anan, owa'.
I'i aman anama Krais Dembinai esis Israeli, anan nokwaha lawag nisila'i ma motolona mombale'efana.”
Amam biam saundam maloma Jisasi wapoti' manda'ana findiwana ma basef awami.
Aon nahagasom owamb lu'unai nataga etap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin. Owamb nape nafe' nafe' ma aon nasa nape 3 klok wambomota. Ea' aon howalagon wapoti'.
Aon nasa nape 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?”
Ape' mambomam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ine' nakwahowe?”
Enis epes saitu felefele' same' anan na'iam na'ama sa'i, “Peme'. Anan nofala profet Elaija.”
Ea' Jisas na'i mehip endilisi naga' ea'.
Ea' dei' lowaf anama lu'unai si'i uta nail ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai nomon palalana gani ilif nowala etap nataga biefina.
Ea' kepten anama dembinai numafi soldia hiami, naitu felefele'ma Jisas nati anan naga' na'ama ea' na'iam na'i, “Endilisi, aman anama nogalomana Godi.”
Fowa' Jisas ata' nape Galili, awo waila anani ma wagiambamana ma anom amamaga gwa'aimi maim. Anowa hiawai wapoti' walomana ondowasa' Jerusalem.
Ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Josep Arimateainai nafi'i.

Anan dembinai ma kot esis Judai, agel lu'unai. Nape nohafa nemaf bu'unai notaga ma hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias. Dei' sandandomba amamaga gwa'aimi maima naman nemaf anama Sabat notaga. Ea' Josep nafe' nawis naitu naep Pailati. Anan ina umbamahana, owa'. Nahali'ana ma nofa'ai alop Jisasi nawana.
Ea' Pailat gegelalasona okom na'i Jisas ina dei' afuna endilisi, ata' owa'. Ea' nofala anona dembinai soldia nafi'i nahali'ana na'ama na'i, “Jisas naga' ea' o owa'?”
Soldia anama na'ipana na'i, “Jisas naga' endilisi ea'.”
Ea' Pailat na'ipa Josep na'i, “Ine' nefe' nefa' alop Jisasi.”

Fowa' nanda' anona hi'agif nagwasa owap lu'unai nagal nawis nomon. Ea' dei' anan na'i nowa Jisas hi'agif anama. Ea' nafe' notala anona lowaf afitinai nafi'i natagaha alop Jisasi nisila'i ma nanda' lowaf anama nowa'ana ma ea', nasapa'ana nawis hi'agif anama nalana nomon. Ea' namboma anona owap lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta hi'agif anama.
Anowa nematawa biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria mama'wana Josepi, awau waitu watologon wati anama Josep nawa Jisas.
Nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai nafe' hi'alana, Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria mama'wana Jems kwaloma Salomi watala anom wel alogw bu'wami ma'ami. Awau wa'i ofa'am ofe' ondisa alop Jisasi.
Wafilu nemaf Sande, kuhimbita atona awau ofa' wel amama wafe' hi'agif.
Awau ata' wafe' etin eaf, wanda'ipama na'ama wa'i, “Atuwasi emi nigiambamafa nelefata owap anama nowalo utai?”
Ea' watologon, wati owap anama lu'unai ina ata' nape nowalo uta, owa'. Enin epen nafe' nausi'ana nafe' na'oh wa'ol.
Awau wawis hi'agif nomon, wati anona aman sa'unai tol nape uta wa'ol lagel da'isinaima. Nala anona lowaf launai afitinai. Na'ama awau gegelalasowa kwapete'awa umbamahawa.

Ea' anan na'ipawa na'ama na'i, “Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Ae' egawepa ipe' pafi'i pegolopa Jisas Nasaretinai, esis saundana naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Anan notanima nohafel ea', ina ata' nape na'ae, owa'. Ipe' piti na'ae sofa'ana sawisi salana nalama. Dei' wafigin nape.
Ea' ipe' fo'o pi'ipa alupumi ananimi ea' pi'ipa Pita nalomam na'ama pi'i, ‘Jisas nali'ipa nafe' etap hiagoma Galili. Ipe' pefo'o petolona si'i nimbewa' na'ipipa.’ ”
Ea' wakwaha hi'agif wawisi ande' wasagih wafe'. Awau umbamahawa wanda'am bombol etin. Ea' awau ina wa'ipasa basefa enis epes, owa'.
Akwa'w kwafe' anagon alupumi Jisasi mapoma. Ukup amamumi nimanim endilisi, mape malef.
Ea' kwa'ipam kwa'i, “Ae' ati Jisas notanima nohafel wapoti' nape namunai.”
Amam mame' basef amama ako'umi, ea' ina meme' basef akwa'umi ma'i endilisimi, owa'.
Amama mataga ea', anom alupumi Jisasi biam makwaha wambel lu'unai maila eaf nafe' aolopi mafe'. Ea' Jisas nandati na'ana nafe' natagamam.
Amam biam matolona motanima mafe' mawalapa basef amama ma anom alupumi Ananimi mapani, ea' amam ina mombale'efam, owa'.
Ea' na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pefe' wambel hiagoma pi'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi ma amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas.
Emi egafis sembale'efa ae' sofa' baptais, anona nemaf God notanima nefa'asi wapoti' ea' Ananisi. Ea' isima owa' sembale'ifi, anona nemaf God nonda'mas kota basef lu'wami ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai.

God nambimb nonda' esis isima sembale'efi sotaga la'ifisa sonda' ikwaf hianai naninani si'i anan nanda'anai. Ea' sohali' Ae' ma enda'as sotaga la'ifisa sili'amona ambagof awami mapeisi, ea' si'i anona diga hianai dambainai.

Ea' sohapila iguf mahasi lagof asasimi ea' ina mohas soga', owa'. Ea' sea' embel numbutimi wapoti', esis ina soga', owa'. Ea' enis owa' seambale'efi, sea' embel amama, esis soga'. Ea' nambimb esis isima sembale'ifi sosa lagofa enis epes awes nanda'asi sotaga bo'wes wapoti'.”
Dembinai Jisas nawalipas na'ipas ea', God nofa'ana nalata heven. Ea' nofa' agel lu'unai nape lagel da'isinai Godi.

Ea' alupumi Ananimi mafe' gani wambel hiagoma mawalapa basef Godi. Anan nanda'am mataga la'ifim manda' ikwaf hianai naninani si'i God nanda'anai. Enis epes sati maol anama amam manda'anai sa'i, “Endilisi, God nagiambama amam ea' ape' magawa basef Ananimi endilisimi.”]
O dembinai Tiofilus, fowa' amam hiami manda' basef hiami mail buk ma amamaga hiami God nanda'am mataga la'afena afa'i.
Fowa' dambadamba Jisas nafela opeh nanda'am ea' amam dambadamba mali' mati amamaga amama naep amamumi dei' mawalipafa basef amama ea' afa' wanda'am mail buk.

Ae' dambadamba ali' ahali' enisa basef amama afi'i afi'i dei' egawam andeande' si'i fowa' mataga, anom amam mihi'ambamam dei' ae' egawa basef amama ofagema. Amama atom dei' ae' elagen andeande'ma enda' anom basef mefe'mago ine', dembinai Tiofilus.
Anda'ama ine' neagawa andeande' basef amama ofagema esis sawalipanami endilisimi atom.

Nemaf anama anona king Herot dembinai gavamani numafi etap hiagoma Judia, anona aman pris nape, agilinama Sekaraia. Anan wambota Abiya, anan aman dembinai fowa'inai. Sekaraia waulu'mana Elisabet. Akwa'w kwataga wambota Aroni.
Esis bias Sakaraia Elisabet sape bo'wes ma naep Godi saila mi'uli ananinai hianai hi'alana. Ea' saila basef Godi andeande' basef ofagema a'as.
Ea' Elisabet asa'w ea' esis bias awasi a'as, ahages ea'.
Nogota anama amam hiami wambota Sakaraiai nemaf amamunai nataga ma meanda' maol Godi, ea' Sekaraia nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nanda' maol nondolalima God.
Amam maila waf amamunai mandandepana ma niowis ipat anama nomon nofa' amamaga amama nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami.
Nogota anama anan nawis naofa amamaga, esis amam nematawa hiesi sanda' lotuwi sandatama sape sanda' beten ande'.
Ea' Sekaraia nati anona ensel dembinai Godi nataga naitu balata wa'ol lagel da'isinai. Balata anama amam pris mondolalima Goda amamaga amama alogw bu'wami ma'ami.
Ea' Sekaraia natolona gegelalasana ombamahana nomonas matamea ma ensel anama.

Ea' ensel anama na'ipana na'ama na'i, “Sekaraia, ina umba mohena, owa'. God name'enama beten ine'inai ea'. Waulu'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet nambimb kola enin awani aman ine'inai. Ea' ine' nefalana agel ananinai Jon.
Okom ine'inai nambimb nope andeande' nendanifela awani inima. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi wapoti' sondanifa so'uso'uni inima netaga.

Dei' main, enin anona nemaf netaga dambeni nefa' agel lu'unai ma naep Dembinai. Enin ina nea' embel wainim moloma embel la'ifimi, owa'. Enin ata' nape opaf mama'wanai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina si'ina nonda'ana la'ifina.
Anona nemaf enin netaga damben nomboma amam nematawa hiesi Israeli ma nefa'as sotanimani seafe'ma God Dembinai asasinai.

Enin nili' nefe'ma Dembinai nefa' pepel Godi ma neanda' maol ananinai si'i fowa' Elaija nofa'ana nanda'anai. Ea' nomboma opalef ahapasi mefe'ma awasi ma esis ukup mi'imi'ias. Ea' nomboma epes isima sosambala basef Godi ma sofa' nomonas bu'wami ma niegiambamas nonda'as sondandombam seapoma Dembinai neafi'i.”
Ea' Sekaraia nahali' ensel anama na'i, “Ae' atuwasi iti maina ikwafa eagawa basef amama meataga endilisi? Ae' hagewe ea' waulu'mi wapoti' ea' hage'w.”
Ea' ensel nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' Gebriel, aitu naep Godi. Anan atona nasapa'e afi'i a'ipina basef amama bu'wami.

Ine' name'am etin, ine' owa' nembale'a basef ae'ami. Na'ama etin dei' malogel ine'inai nese'ena, ina nambimb ni'i, owa'etin. Ea' nefe' nefe' neatagama amamaga amama ae' a'ipinami meatagamena. Basef amama ae'ami nambimb meataga na'ama etin anona nemaf God na'ianai.”
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sape sohafa Sekaraia ande' ukup matamea sa'i, “Main natagamana nape nogota laona ipat lu'unai Godi nomon?”
Anan nawisi ande', ina na'i anom basefa esis, owa'. Na'ama esis sogawana sa'i anan nati anom amamaga mandati na'ami ipat lu'unai Godi nomon.
Ea' anan nape nanda'masa lagel atona na'ipasa amamaga, ea' malogel ananinai nase'ana nape.
Maol Sakaraiai hi'alana, notanima nafe' wambel ananinai.
Anan nape anom nimeguf, waulu'mana anani'wi Elisabet a' opafu'w. Ea' kwandambaho' etin kwape ipat aomb wanemb biamb kwa'i na'ama kwa'i,
“Dei' Dembinai okom na'ina'i ae' ma nagiambame na'ama. Fowa' ae' asawe, ambal ae'anai aona ma esis amam nematawa ea' dei' owa'etin.”
Elisabet opafu'wa aomb wanemb biamb ea', dei' anona aon wapoti' wanemb wanemb. Dei' God nasapa' ensel anama Gebriel nafe' anona wambel Nasaret nape etap hiagoma Galili.

Wambel anama ano'w nemata'w awiawai'wi kwape, agel akwa'unai Maria. Ina dei' kwase' anona aman, ata' owa'. Dei' sandandepa'wa kweaso' anona aman agilinama Josep. Anan nataga wambota anama akunamana king Deviti. Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma akwa'w na'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, nemata'w. Dembinai God okom na'ina'i ine' endilisi. Anan nofalo'mena nape nalomena la'ela'ef numafina.”
Maria kwame' basef amama okom akwa'unai a' nimanina endilisi. Okom akwa'unai natanea na'i, “Basef amama ofagema mataga mi'imama?”
Ea' ensel anama na'ipa'w na'i, “Maria, ina ombamohena, owa'. Okom Godi bo'onama ine'.

Ine' neme'. Nambimb ine' opafina nela enin awani aman. Ea' nenda'mana agel Jisas. Anona nemaf anan nope aman dembinai, sefela agel ananinai lu'una. Ea' sofala Anan nogalomana God nape ilifi. Anona nemaf dembinai God nenda' awani inima nofa' agel lu'unai nepe dembinai king si'i fowa' gani Devit nape king. Devit anan wambota anama dei' awani inima neataganai.
Anona nemaf enin nepe dembinai king numafi epes hiesi Jekopi la'ela'ef. Enin etin nepe dembeni la'ela'ef ma amamaga hiami moloma epes ananisi.”
Ea' Maria kwa'ipa ensel anama kwa'i, “Amama meataga mi'imama? Ae' ina dei' aso' anona aman, ata' owa'etin.”

Ea' ensel anama nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ambal Bu'unai Godi nifi'mai ine', pepel God nape ilifi nose'alina. Ea' dei' awani inima nambimb nelani enin bo'wen. Ea' esis nambimb sefela agel ananinai lu'una sofalana si'i Anan Nogalomana Godi.
Neme', amani'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet akwa'w hage'w ea', dei' ea' opafu'w. Fowa' esis sa'i, ‘Akwa'w asa'w, ea' dei' akwa'w opafu'w aomb wanemb wanemb akwa'umi mafe' ea'.
Owa' anom amamaga ahifima God nonda'am, owa'etin.”
Ea' Maria kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' ape anda' maol Dembinai. Ae' a'i Anan nonda'meam motaga si'i ine' na'i.”
Ensel anama na'ipakw na'ama ma ea', nakwaho'w nafe'.
Nemaf anama Maria kohafel mehip kondondomba amamaga kondowasa' anona wambel nape halafutagw anona etap hiagoma Judia,
kwafe' kwawis ipat Sakaraiai kwanda'makwa nemaf bu'wafi Elisabet.
Elisabet kwame' Maria ata' kwanda'makwa gude etin, awani Elisabeti fete' etin nape opaf akwa'unai nomon. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi si'inama akwa'w,

koga kwa'i mehip kwa'i, “God nofalo'mena nanda'ena nandanifel endilisi. Danifel ine'inai nikila' danifel anowa nematawa ofa'anai. Ea' awani inima nambimb nelan, enin wapoti' God nofalo'mana nonda'ana nondanifel.
Ae' gegelalasowe ma God okom bo'oma ae' nanda'e endanifel ma nanda' ine' mama'wana Dembinai ae'anai nafi'mai ae'.
Neme', aligah ae'ami ata' mame' nemaf bu'wafi ine'inai atona, batawin nape opaf ae'anai nendanifel fete' etin nape.
Ine' nandanifel endilisi, nembale'efa basef Dembinai na'ipinami nambimb meataga na'ama etin si'i anan nali' na'ipina.”
Ea' Maria kwanda' anona awaf kwa'i,
“Ae' a'i basefa Anan Dembinai afela agel ananinai lu'una. Okom ae'anai napoma basef amama,
God nofa'e etanimani. Dei' andanifel ma anan.

Dei' main? Ae' nemata'w anda' maol Ananinai, ae' falafuwei, ea' anan okom napoma ae' nagiambame. Ipe' peme'. Dei' epe anona nemaf owagama wapoti' epes hiesi sigi' seatagai la'ela'ef sehafel seapani sofale si'i, ‘Dembinai God nagiambame nase'e danifel.’
Dei' main, God la'ifinai endilisi nanda'me amamaga pepel ma ae' eafela agel ananinai lu'una nape andeande' la'ela'ef.
Okom dahowinai ananinai nape la'ela'ef ma emi egafis umbamahasa sa'i sila Anan. Ea' nape la'ela'ef naloma epes isima sope na'ama etin dei' awasi bafasas ehasas anona nemaf seatagai.
Lagel ananinai nanda' amamaga la'ifimi. Ea' ukup asasimi ma'i esis etis sofa' agof lu'wami ea' nali'amonas safe' gani gani hiagoma.
Anan natalogofa amam king dambami ea' nafela agofa isima sape owina enis epes.
Anan nase'asa amamaga bu'wami ma isima nolomahasa waf bu'unai, ea' epes isima amamaga hiamisi, natofam mafe' etin.

Anan okom napoma basef na'aim ananimi endilisimi la'ela'ef mope owagama gani. Amama fowa' gani na'iam naloma bafapapa akupapa. Basef amama fowa' gani na'ipa Abraham naloma wambota ananinai owagama sigi' setagai. Ama anona nemaf neati esis uwahipisa niegiambamas la'ela'ef. Anan nagiambama ape' Israel manda' maol Ananinai.”
Maria kwape kwaloma Elisabet aomb wanemb, ea' kotanima kwafe' wambel akwa'unai.
Nemaf anama nataga ea' Elisabet kola so'uso'win aman.
Esis wambel atona saloma esis wambota akwa'unai seme' basef ma Dembinai nati owahipi'w endilisi ma kola awani inima. Ea' esis sandanifel saloma'w.
Nimeguf 7-peleim mafe' mali'mana ea', nemaf nafe'ma 8i, esis safi'i sa'i seatopa'mana alop ananinai, ea' sa'i sofalana agel Sekaraia si'i ahalomana.
Ea' mama'wana kwa'i, “Owa'. Ape' monda'mana anona agel Jon.”
Ea' esis sa'ipakw sa'i, “Owa', esis wambota ine'inai tagasi ina enis sanda' agel anama Jon, owa'etin.”
Ea' sanda' lagof atom sahali' ahalomana sa'i anan ni'i nonda'mana maina agel.
Ea' Anan nanda' logel atona na'ipas sofa'ai anota selet ma nonda' agel nogalomanai. Ea' nanda'ana na'i, “Agel ananinai Jon.”
Ea' esis gegelalasis kwapete'.
Anan ata' nanda' agel etin, noga na'i malogel ananinai, afega ananinai neawi andeande', nandanifel nafela agel Godi lu'una.
Ea' esis hiesi wambel anama umbamahas. Ea' dei' amamaga amama gatom mafe' wambel hi'agoma nape halafutagw etap hi'agoma Judia.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi same' basefa amamaga amama, ukup asasimi matamea mafe' sa'i, “Anona nemaf awani inima nepe ni'imama?”
Dei' main, esis sogawa pepel la'ifinai Dembinai nape nalomana.
Awani inima Jon ahalomana Sekaraia, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'ina anan ea' nawalapa basef Godi si'i amam profet fowa' gani mawalipasam na'i,
“Ae' a'i ape' mofela agel Godi Dembinai lu'una, God ape' Israeli. Anan nafi'i nagiambama ape' amam nematawa ananipai. Ea' natagahepa makwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
Ea' nandandepa anona aman la'ifinai nambimb nofa'apa nokwahamapa waf aonai meatanimani. Fowa' gani Devit nanda' opeh Godi, ea' dei' aman anama nofa'apa motanimani, anan akunamana Deviti.
Basef amama si'i fowa' gani nawalapama amam profet bu'wami ananimi ma'iam malogof amamumi.
Ma'i anona nemaf anan nofa'apa meatanimani mokwaha lagof esis naumbih ape'isi soloma epes isima ukup aom endilisi ma ape'i.
Fowa' gani anan na'i anona nemaf nieti akusapa ape'isi fowa'isi uwahipis nigiambamas. Ea' anan okom nopoma basef bu'wami fowa' gani na'iam endilisi mope owagama gani.
Anan na'i basef amama endilisimi atom na'iam la'ifimi gani ilif naloma akunamapa ape'inai Abraham.
Ma anan na'i notagahepa ma lagof esis naumbih ape'isi ma meanda'mana opeh ananimi, ina umbamohapa, owa'.
Anan na'i basef amama ma ape' mope etap anae' monda' opeh ananimi nimeguf hiami danda mefe' mefe' meatagama meaga'. Ma naep ananimi monda' opeh amama ma waf ananinai bu'unai andeande'.
Ea' ine', awani ae'inai, basef ine'imi amama. Anona nemaf sofalena profet nanda' opeha God pepel hianainai. Dei' main, nambimb ine' nefe' nili'ma Dembinai nenda'mana eaf ananinai.
Ama neawalipa amam nematawa ananisi seagawa anan nefa'as seatanimani. Ama neakwaha waf aonai asasinai.
God ape'inai nati esis uwahipis endilisi dei' nakwahamasa waf aonai asasinai. Anan nambimb nosapa'i howalagon mape heveni mifi'mai ape' molomapa mope la'ela'ef.
Ama howalama epes sape akoti, ea' isima ga' na'i neatagamasi. Ama nenindina ape' ma meape eaf opalef awanami.”
Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', awani inima nataga damben la'ifina ea' okom ananinai negawa. Anan nape etap wafiguma epes a'agoma nape nape ma nemaf anama nataga nandawalap alihinama naep esis Israeli.

Anona nemaf anona aman gavman dembinai esis Romi Sisar Ogastus nape, nanda' anona mi'uli gavmani na'ama. Anan na'i nofa' agofa esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma esis Rom sumafiagoma mil buk gavmani.
Nemaf anama dambadamba anan nali' nofa' agof. Nemaf anama anona aman Kwirinius nape gavman dembinai ma etap hiagoma Siria.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safe' wambel ofagama asasima ma sonda' agof asasimi.
Josep anan aman wambota Deviti. Ea' nakwaha Nasaret nape etap hiagoma Galili, nondowasa' nafe' wambel Deviti Betlehem. Wambel anama nape etap hiagoma Judia.
Ea' Josep nafe' naloma ano'w nemata'w Maria, esis sandandepana'w sa'i nese'akw ma esis bias sonda' agof asasimi. Ea' akwa'w opafu'w.
Esis bias ata' sapani etin wambel Betlehem, nemaf akwa'w kolanefi a' nataga.
Ea' kwali' kola awani aman ako'uni nali'i. Ipat sa'ohanai asi'ina. Ea' dei' kowa'ana lowaf kwalana nomon bokis gwa'aimi bulmakauwi malama.
Felefele'ma wambel anama anom amam mumafi sipsipi mape wa'ol mumafi sipsip mape owamb.
Ea' anona ensel nafi'i nalumai howalogon Dembinai, howalama amam ea' umbamaham endilisi.
Ea' ensel anama na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina umbamohepa, owa'. Peme', ae' ifa'mipei basef bu'wami ipe', amama monda' amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas sondanifal endilisi.

Dei' nemaf anae' ano'w nemata'w kwape Betlehem wambel Deviti kola enin awani aman. Anan aman anama nokwahomepa waf aonai nofa'epa peatanimani. Anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i, anan Dembinai.
Ipe' pefe' piti awani inima pegawan na'ama. Piti sanda' lowaf so'unai sowa'ana salana na'oh bokis isima sala gwa'aimi bulmakauwi malami.”
Ensel anama na'ias na'ama ma ea', mehip anom ensel hiami si'i ami misila'i gani heven mataga maloma ensel anama ea' mandagala mafela agel Godi ma'i,
“Ape' mafela agel God nape gani ilif endilisi lu'una. Pepel howalogon ananinai atona. Ea' epes emi sape etapi God okom bo'ona ma esis, opalef asasimi mope awanem.”
Ea' amam ensel makwaha amam mumafi sipsipi motanima malata heven. Ea' amam mumafi sipsipi manda'ipama etin ma'i, “Wale, ata' ofe' Betlehem uti amamaga anama Dembinai nihi'ambafami.”
Ea' mohafel mehip mafe' mati Maria kwaloma Josep sape. Awani salana na'oh bokis nomon sala gwa'aimi bulmakauwi malami.
Amam matolona ea' mawalapa basef ensel na'ipamami ma awani inima.
Ea' amam nematawa same' basef amama amam ma'iami, esis hiesi same' basef amama gegelalasis ea' nomonas matamea.
Ea' Maria kwame' basef amama hiami okokomam mape okom akwa'unai.
Ea' amam amama motanima mafe' mafela agel Godi lu'una ma'i anan dembinai bu'unai. Amam mandanifela amamaga amama hiami mame'am matulumi mataga si'i ensel na'ipamami.
Nemaf nafe'ma 8i nataga, nemaf anama amam ma'i motopa'mana alop awani. Ea' matopa'mana alop awani inima amani. Ea' sofalana agel Jisas si'i ensel nali' na'ipakwanai nogota anama owa' ata' kofa' opaf.

Nemaf anama nataga ea' ma esis sonda' awani inima noloma mama'wana sondolali sonda' ofa setaga bo'wes si'i basef mail mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai na'iam. Ea' esis mamasana sao'wana safe' sondowasa' Jerusalema sose'ana awani inima Dembinai Goda naep ananimi.
Esis sanda'am na'ama si'i basef mape buk Baibeli ma'iama mi'uli Dembinai ma'i, “Awasi amam wali' dambadamba olami, amama ipe' pefalam pi'i amam dembinai Godi atom.”
Ea' bias sa'i sondolalima God sila basef mail mi'uli anama Dembinai fowa' gani na'ipa Moses na'i, “Esis bias sofa' amiguf mai'unamb biam, o sofa' ambegof sa'umi biam.”
Ea' sefa'am sanda'am na'ama.

Ea' anona aman nape Jerusalemi agilinama Simeon. Anan naila waf bu'unai Godi andeande'. Anan nape nahafa nogota anama God nifi'i nigiambama esis Israel nokwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ea' ambal bu'unai Godi nape okom ananinai nihi'ambana anan ina nambimb noga' ulal, owa'. Anan ata' nepe niti Krais, Dembinai nandandepana nosapa'ana nafi'i.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelana nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi. Ea' esis mamasana Jisasi sao'wana safi'i sandolalimana si'i mi'uli Godi na'iam.
Ea' sanda'am etin, Simeon nandalombasana lagof ananimi nanifela God nafela agel ananinai lu'una na'iam na'ama na'i,
“Dembinai, nahapila pepel hianai ae' anda' opeha ine'. Dei' ine' nenda' opaf ae'anai nupe awanena ea' ega' efo'o si'i basef endilisi atomi fowa' gani na'iami.
Naep ae'ami atilin ea' awani aman inima ine' nasapa'ana nafi'i nofa'apa meatanimani. Na'ama dei' ine' nekwaha ae' ega' efo'o.
Ine' nanda' awani inima natagama amam nematawa hiesi satolona ea'.
So'uso'win inima si'i anona howalagon howalama epes isima sololama Godi nihi'ambas. Ama nonda' amam nematawa ine'isi Israel sofa' agof lu'wami.”
Ea' mamasana Jisasi gegelalasis ukup asasimi matamea ma basef amama Simeon na'iami.

Ea' Simeon na'ipasa basef bu'wami nanda'as la'ifis ea' na'ipa mama'wana Jisasi na'ama na'i, “Ine' neme'. Awani inima God nandandepan ea' ma nahambombaga enis amam nematawa Israel sowa' alafugaha enini. Ea' enis epes nofa'as sokwaha waf aonai siefi'mai enin. Enin si'i anona ikwaf God nanda'anai ma enis epes hiesi sosambala basef ananimi sondaiwa'mana.
Awani inima napoma newalapa nomonas hiami mape mandambahi'i motaga alihim. Maria, ine' nambimb okom nimanina si'i anona bainat hi'alinai notopa' okom ine'inai.”
Ea' ano'w nemata'w profet agili'wa Ana kwape kwalomas. Ahaloma'w ako'unai Fanuel. Wambota lu'unai akunama'wi Asa. Akwa'w ahage'w endilisi. Fowa' kwase' aman kwalomana sape afagof 7-peleim.

Ea' waulunama'w naga'. Ea' kwape etin, kwafe' kwafe' dei' afagof akwa'umi mataga 84-peleim. Akwa'w ina kwakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi anom nimeguf, owa'etin. Akwa'w kololama gwa'aimi kwape kwanda' beten ea' kwanda' lotu kwahapila opeh Godi kwanda'am kwafe' owamb alip.

Nemaf anama dei' atef akwa'w kwafi'i anama Simeon naloma Josep Maria saituma kwanifela God. Enis wapoti' saitu na'ama sape sehafa nemaf anama nambimb God nigiambama esis sape Jerusalemi nofa'as setanimani seape wafifis. Ea' akwa'w wapoti' kwa'ipasa basefa so'uso'win inima.
Esis Josep naloma Maria sanda'am sailam ea' opeh ahalomana si'i Dembinai fowa' gani na'iama mi'uli ananinai ea' satanima safe' Nasaret asasima ofagama etap hiagoma Galili.
Ea' so'usowin Jisas nataga dambena la'ifina ma gawa hianai. Ea' God okom nainailana nagiambamana etin nanda'ana la'ifina.
Afagof danda mamasana Jisasi sondowasa' safe' Jerusalema sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sofalam sa'i Pasova.
Afagof Jisasi dei' mataga 12-peleim mahape'ana ea' sao'wana sondowasa' Jerusalem saila waf asasinai si'i afagof danda sanda'anai.
Ama nimeguf amama Pasovaimi hi'alam, esis mamasana satanima safe'. Ea' sa'usa'win ina nafe' nalomas, owa'. Sakwahona napani Jerusalem. Esis ina sagawa anan napani, owa'.
Sa'i nali' nafe' naloma enis epes safe'. Esis safe' anona nemaf si'ina hi'alana, ea' sagolopana la'afena esis wambota atona saloma esis alupisi.
Esis mamasana sagolopana sati owa'etin, ea' satanima safe' Jerusalem sagolopana.
Esis bias sagolopana safe' nimeguf wanom. Ea' satolona nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. Anan nape naloma amam Juda gawaimi mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Nape nagahembe'ma basef amomumi ea' nahali' amam.
Amam dambami maloma esis hiesi same' basef ananimi, gegelalasoma basef maloma gawa ananinai nagwamama basef amam.
Ea' mamasana satolona nape la'afena amam dembemi nalomam mape ea' gegelalasam kwapete'.
Ea' mama'wana kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Nogalome, dei' maina ine' nanda' na'ama ma afa'? Ahalomena naloma ae' opalef afa'imi nimanim endilisi ma wagolopena.”
Ea' anan nagwamas na'ipas na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' bipa pagolope pafe' hi'alagon? Ae' dei' ape anda' opeh ipat Ahalome Godi, amama ipe' pegawam o owa'?”
Ea' esis ina sogawa basef anan na'ipasami ofagema, owa'.

Ea' Jisas nafe' naloma esis bias safe' Nasaret, name' esis naila abasef asasimi nimeguf hiami. Ea' mama'wana anani'wi okom napoma basef hiami ma amamaga amama matagama sa'usa'win akwa'uni nape okom akwa'unai.
Jisas ea' nataga dambena. Ea' gawa ananinai nataga lu'una andeande' bo'ona, ea' God naloma epes wapoti' satolona ambo'ona endilisi.

Anona afagel anona gavman dembinai esis Romi Taiberius Sisar nape dembinai ma etap hiagoma esis Romi afagof 14-peleim hi'alama anona afagel wapoti', nafe'ma 15-peleim, Pontius Pailat ata' nape dembinai gavmana etap hiagoma Ituria naloma Trakonitis wambel hiagoma Herot ata' nape dembinai numafi wambel hianai etap hiagoma Galili. Ea' Lisanias nape dembinai gavman numafi wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma Abilene.

Ea' afagel anama atona Anas naloma Kaiafas amam biam pris dambami mape mali'ma pris hiami. Nogota anama ma afagel anama basef Godi mafi'mai Jon, Sekaraia nogalomana nape anona etap wafiguma fatauguma.
Ea' nafe' anama hiagoma walemb Jordan na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa. Na'ipasa somboma opalef sowa' alafugaha waf aonai sofa' baptais ma God nokwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
Anon nawalapa basef amama Godi si'i profet Aisaia fowa' gani nawalapam nanda'am mail buk Baibeli ma'i,
“Anona etap wafiguma fatauguma, malogel anona amani anona nemaf noga ni'i, ‘Pendondomba eaf Dembinai, penda' ana nefe' usi'ina.
Pewam gambiwah asiasinuguma ma si'igin dondo' etin, petopa' halalef laumi bandami hiami ma mowala dondo'am. Dilindila'ma penda'agon usi'igin. Ea' ufiawa amama manda' lotasila'ma sonda'am andeande'.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas anona nemaf siti God nagiambama enis amam nematawa nofa'as sotanimani.’ ”

Hiesi amam nematawa safi'mai Jon ama sa'i nupisi'as embel. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' panda' waf aonai, si'i awasi iguf awami molaipei. Emi na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi anona nemaf na'i neatagama ipe'i?

Ea' dei' a'ipipa. Penda' waf bu'unai ma pihi'ambas ipe' pamboma opalef endilisi paila waf bu'unai. Ipe' ina ukup mondanda' mi'i, ‘Abraham anan ahalomapa ape'inai’, owa', hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anan la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba amama motaga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
Tamia'w nandandombol na'oh neatopa' lawah ofagem nombalefima. Maim lawah owa' mil mola su'utip bu'wami, amama anona nemaf solam sokwahom mefe'ma nif.”
Anan na'iam ea', esis hiesi sahali'ana sa'i, “Ape' nambimb monda' main?”
Ea' Jon na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Emi epen siaogw biam atumi nese'anana anona enin siot a'ani, ea' emi gwa'aimi ma'omani inima nenda'am newalogam wapoti'.”
Ea' anom amam mofa' takisi mafi'mai Jon ma'i nupisi'am embel ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, nambimb afa' onda' main?”
Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pefa' otamba mondahama si'i gavman na'ipipam. Ipe' ina pefa' anom wapoti', owa'.”
Ea' anom soldia mafi'i mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' nambimb onda' main?”

Anan nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pembaso'ma epes piumbelis penda'as umbamohas penda'mas basef pelela'epasa moni asasinai, owa'. Ea' opalef ipe'imi mope awanema otamba ipe'imi dondo'ma ikwaf amam dambami mandandepami.”
Ea' dei' nomonas esis amam nematawai hiesi mohafel la'ifim, ea' ukup mandanda'ma Jon sa'i, “Jon anan Krais, ma'una God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i?”

Ea' Jon nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'i, “Ae' apisi'ipa embel atom. Ea' anona aman nambimb niefi'i, anan la'ifinai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'etin. Nambimb anan nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope opalef ipe'imi nomon ea' nese'epa nif wapoti'.

Anan nahapila anona savol lagof ananimi ma niesimba wit si'i rais amama nisimba'am andeande'. Nefa' wit bu'unai nuwis nembe'am ipat ananinai. Ea' tukwakwanimi awami nembefam nofam nif amama lu'wami fandom la'ela'ef mapani.”
Ea' Jon nawalapa anom basef hiami wapoti' ma neafela ukup asasimi ma sonda' waf bu'unai. Ea' nawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi.

Ea' Jon na'ipana basef la'ifimi aman anama Herot, gavman dembinai asasinai, ma waf aonai hianai anan nanda'anai. Anan nandalombana Herodias nemata'w sahalomana nase'akwi, ea' nanda' waf aonai hianai wapoti'.
Dei' nowatani anona waf aonai wapoti' ma nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus.
Jon napisi'a amam nematawa hiesi ma ea', napisi' Jisas wapoti'. Jisas nofa' baptais ea', anan ata' nanda' beten etin ea', heven uta nandausi'.

Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nisila'i si'i amil mai'una nufia' nisilamanai. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai heven ilif na'i anom basef na'i, “Ine' Nogalome ae'inai. Ae' okom nohafel nainailina endilisi. Okom ae'inai bo'ona ma ine'.”
Nemaf anama Jisas nasefela opeh nanda'am, afagof ananimi mataga felefele'ma 30-peleim. Esis amam nematawa ukup mandanda' etin ma'i anan nogalomana Josepi.
Bafapana Jisasi agufuma amama. Josep, anan Heli nogalomana. Ea' Heli, Matat nogalomana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogalomana. Livai, Melki nogalomana. Melki, Janai nogalomana. Ea' Janai, Josep nogalomana.
Josep, Matatias nogalomana. Matatias, Emon nogalomana. Emon, Nahum nogalomana. Ea' Nahum, Esli nogalomana. Ea' Esli, Nagai nogalomana.
Nagai, Mat nogalomana. Mat, Matatias nogalomana. Ea' Matatias, Semen nogalomana. Ea' Semen, Josek nogalomana. Josek, Joda nogalomana.
Joda, Joanan nogalomana. Joanan, Resa nogalomana. Resa, Serubabel nogalomana. Serubabel, Sealtiel nogalomana. Sealtiel, Neri nogalomana.
Neri, Melki nogalomana. Melki, Adi nogalomana. Adi, Kosam nogalomana. Kosam, Elmadam nogalomana. Elmadam, Er nogalomana.
Er, Josua nogalomana. Ea' Josua, Elieser nogalomana. Ea' Elieser, Jehoram nogalomana. Jehoram, Matat nogalomana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogalomana.
Livai, Simeon nogalomana. Ea' Simeon, Juda nogalomana. Juda, Josep nogalomana. Ea' Josep, Jonam nogalomana. Jonam, Eliakim nogalomana.
Eliakim, Melea nogalomana. Melea, Mena nogalomana. Mena, Matata nogalomana. Matata, Natan nogalomana. Natan, Devit nogalomana.
Devit, Jesi nogalomana. Jesi, Obet nogalomana. Obet, Boas nogalomana. Boas, Salmon nogalomana. Salmon, Nason nogalomana.
Nason, Aminadap nogalomana. Aminadap, anan Atmin nogalomana. Atmin, Arni nogalomana. Arni anan Hesron nogalomana. Hesron, Peres nogalomana. Peres, Juda nogalomana.
Ea' Juda anan Jekop nogalomana. Jekop anan Aisak nogalomana. Aisak, Abraham nogalomana. Abraham, Tera nogalomana. Tera, Nahor nogalomana.
Nahor, Seruk nogalomana. Seruk, Reu nogalomana. Reu, Pelek nogalomana. Pelek, Eber nogalomana. Eber anan Sela nogalomana.
Sela anan Kenan nogalomana. Kenan, Arpaksat nogalomana. Arpaksat, Siem nogalomana. Siem, Noa nogalomana. Noa, Lamek nogalomana.
Lamek, Metusela nogalomana. Ea' Metusela, Enok nogalomana. Enok, Jaret nogalomana. Jaret, Mahalalel nogalomana. Mahalalel, Kenan nogalomana.
Kenan, Enos nogalomana. Enos, Set nogalomana. Set, Adam nogalomana. Adam, God nogalomana. Bafapana Jisasi ea' ma'um.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'inama Jisas ea' nakwaha walemb anama Jordan nandegiai natanima nafe'. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa'ana nafe' anona etap wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma.
Jisas nape anama nimeguf hiami ea' Satan nafi'i nagwambana aon si'inai tu'waninai. Jisas ina na' gwa'aimi, owa'. Nolomahana.
Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' Nogalomana Godi, dei' kipa owap anama na'oh etapi notaga si'i bret.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel na'i bret atona ina nose'asa ambagof namumi epes, owa'.”
Ea' Satan nao'wana mafe' anona halaf launai endilisi nihi'ambana amamaga hiami bu'wami mape etap hiagoma maloma amam nematawa. Nihi'ambana la'ifina mehip etin.

Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Amamaga hiami pepel amama amam king hi'alam mumafiami maloma epes hiesi agel lu'unai, amamaga bu'wami hiahaom maim, amamaga amama hiami God nase'eami ae'ami. Ea' dei' i'i ese'anam enin epen, ae' ese'anam.
I'i ine' nindiwa nembawa netawa nenda' lotu ma ae', amamaga amama ine'imi atom.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Ipe' penda' lotuma Dembinai God ipe'inai atona, ea' penda' opeh ananimi atom.’ ”
Ea' Satan nao'wana nondowasa' Jerusalem nahaponana naitu ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai ilif.
Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' Nogalomana Godi, dei' netoma nukupa' newa etap.
Dei' main, anom basef Godi mail buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i,
‘God ni'ipa amam ensel Ananimi mifi'i muhapilina lagof amamumi mumafina ma otamba ina moha bo'wagah ine'imi, owa'.’ ”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anom basef Godi wapoti' mape na'ama ma'i,
‘Ipe' ina pegwamba Dembinai God ipe'inai nonda' waf aonai, owa'.’ ”
Satan nagwambana ma ea', nakwaha Jisas nafe' nohafana ma anona nemaf nifi'i neagwambana wapoti'.
Pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape opaf Jisasi ea' natanima nafe' etap hiagoma Galili. Ea' same' basef gato mafe' anan mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma Galili.
Anan nawalipasa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safela agel ananinai lu'una.
Ea' Jisas nafe' Nasaret taun anama ofagama, fowa' anan ata' so'uso'win napoma.
Nape ea' nemaf anama Sabat esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai, nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai si'i la'ela'ef nanda'am. Anan naitu natalifa basef Godi, ea' sase'ana anona pepa lounai.
Pepa anama anom basef Godi fowa' gani profet Aisaia nanda'am mailanai. Anan naofa pepa anama nati anom basef natalifam ma'i na'ama ma'i,

“Ambal bu'unai Dembinai nape ae'. Ea' nandandepe ma eawalapa basef bu'wami ma epes isima kwahusi amamaga a'ami. Nasapa'e afi'i ma ewalapa basef na'ama i'i, ‘Ipe' panda' kalabusi pekwaha kalabus pefe' wafifipa. Ipe' epes naep masi'ipei, ipe' piti andeande' wapoti'. Anan nasapa'e afi'i iegiambama isima sofa' nimanimi seape andeande'.
Ea' i'ipasa basef hiesi ma nogota anama bu'unai ma Dembinai niti uwahipis nigiambamas seape andeande'.’ ”
Ea' Jisas nambomefa pepa anama nase'anana anona aman numafi ipati ea' anan nape. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape nomoni sati anan atona.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pame' ae' atalifa basef Godi fowa'imi etin ea', dei' mataga alihim endilisi mandawalapa ae'.”

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Nogota anama fowa' gani Elaija napenai owaf atona naluwi, asaf ina ata' nalai afagof wanom aomb wanemb wanemb, owa'etin. Ea' nolomahas lu'unai nataga ganima hiagoma. Nogota anama nematawa hiawai Israeliwai amam maga' mialifawa wapen.
Ea' God ina nasapa' Elaija nafe'ma anowa awamai, owa'etin. Anan nasapa'ana nafe'ma ano'w nemata'w kwape Serafat, wambel nape anona etap lu'wagoma Saidon. Ea' akwama ato'w.
Ea' nogota anama anona awes aonai
Ea' esis hiesi sape ipat anama same' basef amama, nomonas wandafum kwapete'a Jisas.
Ea' sohafel sagalo'mana nawisi taun ande'. Taun anama asasinai natoma halafuta ilif. Ea' sofa'ana safe' halafuta anama sa'i sogwale'ana nowala tata.
Ea' anan nisila' esis hiesi nafe'.

Ea' Jisas niliana Kaperneam anona taun nape etap hiagoma Galili. Anan nape ea' nemaf anama Juda sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat, anan nawis nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nawalipasa basef Godi.
Same'ana sa'i anan nofa' agel lu'unai dei' na'ipasa basef la'ifimi. Ea' sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi.
Anona aman ambafuh manda'anai nape ipat anama, ambal aonai napaina. Anan na'i mehip endilisi na'iam na'i,
“E! Jisas ine' Nasaretinai, na'i nifi'i nenda' maina ape'? Ine' nafi'i ma nehambombagapa? Ae' egawa ine' nogalomana God bu'winai andeande'.”
Ea' Jisas ninifalona na'ama na'i, “Ine' aonai awinai sopama malogel kwaha aman anama.”
Ea' ambalip anama nakwahona nowa etap la'afena esis hiesi nawisi nafe', ina ata' nahambombagana wapoti', owa'etin.

Esis hiesi gegelalasis sandakoto'ma sanda'ipama sa'i, “Amama maim basef? Anan natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman la'ifinai nofa' agel lu'unai. Ambagof awami mame' basefa anan, makwahona mafa' mafe'.”
Ea' basef amama nanda' amamaga amama la'ifimi mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel nape felefele'i.
Saimon nandagi'mokwi awesi'w alop ako'unai nifina kwapete'. Ea' Jisas nohafel nakwaha ipat anama sanda' kolasanai, nafe' nawis ipat Saimoni. Ea' sahali'ana ma niegiambama'w.
Ea' anan nafe' naitu felefele'ma akwa'w natofa awes anama nafe' nakwaha akwa'w. Ea' kohafel mehip kwanda'masa gwa'aimi esis.
Aon newala naso', esis amam nematawa sofa'ai enis awes naninani nanda'asi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' nasa lagofas atona etin nanda'as bo'wes hi'alas.

Ea' ambagof awami hiami makwaha esis hiesi mawisi mafe' ea'. Ambagof amama awami mofalana mehip ma'i, “Ine' nogalomana Godi.” Amam mogawa anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i ina ata' mi'i anom basef, owa'. Mosopama malogof.

Kuhimbita atona Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' anagon wafiguma fetauguma epes a'agoma. Esis safe' sogolopana satolona safe'ma anan. Esis sa'i anan ina nokwaha esis nofe', owa'. Sa'i sembalo'ana nope la'ela'ef nolomas.
Ea', na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i ewalapa basef bu'wami ma epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. A'i ewalapa basef amama anagon taun hianai wapoti'. Dei' main, God nasapa'e afi'i enda' maol anama atona.”
Ea' nafe' nawalapa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sai basef sapeimi nawalapam nafe' etap hiagoma Judia.
Anona nemaf Jisas naitu akata walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Genesaret naloma amam nematawa hiesi sala'ambemana sape same' basef Godi.
Ea' nati bogw sa'umi biam mala embel felefele'ma nimbap walemb batupa'manai. Ea' amam mowafa agufi mandani' mafe' masa'opa anemb amamumi.
Ea' Jisas nalata natoma bot Saimoni ea' na'ipana na'i, “Sapa' bot nokwaha bandagoma nefe' laogoma.”
Ea' Jisas natoma bot nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa.
Anan na'ipas ea' na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ine' sapa' bot nofo'o walemb embel laogoma ea' pekwaha anemb mowala pewafai anom agof.”
Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Dembinai, do'ok owamb laona afa' wanda' maol lu'unai ea' ina wagi anom agof, owa'. Ea' na'ipa ae' na'ama, dei' ekwaha anemb mowala.”
Ea' mokwaha anemb mowala mowafai agof hiami. Ea' anemb ma'i pele'etama agof hiami endilisi.
Ea' amam mofalai alupumi amamumi mape anona boti mafi'i magiambama mowafai agof malam bogw biam si'ima agof ma'i mowala.
Saimon Pita nati na'ama, ea' nindiwa nembawa natawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' kwaha ae', fo'o. Ae' aman aowei, anda' waf aonai!”
Dei' main, anan naloma amam malumanai mati agof mowafami umbelimi endilisi. Ea' amam gegelalasom nomonas matamea.
Batausana Sebedi biam Jems naloma Jon maloma Pita mandau'umai wapoti' gegelalasoma agof amama.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina umbamehena, owa'. Dei' atef nesafela maolan nenda'ana la'ela'ef ni'pa enis epes sila Ae'.”
Nogota anama Jisas nape anona taun, anona aman awesinai
Ea' Jisas nasa lagel alop aman anamai na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i a'e ma ine' netaga bo'wena.”
Ea' dei' atef awes anama aonai nakwahona ea' nataga bo'ona.

Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'. Ine' fo'o nihi'ambana alop ine'inai ma aman anama pris. Ea' nese'ana amamaga amama anan nondolalima God ea' ine' ninifelona ma nataga bo'wena si'i mi'uli ananinai fowa' gani Moses na'ipasanai na'i. Ama esis hiesi sogawa ine' ambo'wena.”

Owa'etin. Diga basefa amamaga amama Jisas nanda'manam aman anama gatom mafe' ganigani. Fowa' ina hiesi same' basef amama, owa'. Dei' hiesi endilisi. Amama atom dei' epes hiesi safi'i ma some' anona nonda eses awes nanda'as setaga bo'wes.
Ea' nimeguf hiami Jisas nafe' anama wafiguma epes a'agoma ma nape nanda' beten.

Anona nemaf Jisas nape nawalipa esis amam nematawa ea' anom Farisi maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi tol mape. Anom mafi'i wambel hianai etap lu'unai biefina Judia naloma Galili. Ea' anom mafi'i Jerusalem. Ea' pepel Dembinai Godi nape Jisas, ama nanda' epes awes nanda'asi sotaga bo'wes wapoti'.
Ea' anom amam mofa' anona aman lagof bo'wagah maga' mailanai, na'oh lehis mofa'ana mafi'i. Ea' ma'i mofa'ana mefe' muwis ipat mombe'ana felefele'ma Jisas.

Ea' si'igina amam nematawa hiesi. Amam ina mati anona eafa mofa' aman anama muwis nomon, owa'. Ea' malata ipat ilif mihianama bogwan ilif mala aman anama awes nanda'anai naloma lehis nowala nomon la'afena amam nematawa mambe'ana na'oh naep Jisasi.

Nogota anama Jisas natolom nogawa amam mombale'efana la'ifinai ma niegiambama aman anama awes nanda'anai. Ea' na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Ine' epen ae'inai. Waf aonai ine' nanda'anai ae' akwahomenana ea'.”

Ea' amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi atom ukup atifim mandanda' ma'i, “Aman anama emi egafuna nanda' God findiwanai? Owa'etina anona aman la'ifinaima nekwaha waf aonai. God atona nakwaha waf aonai.”
Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi mape na'ama?

Dei' amamaga maim ipe' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma i'ipa awes nanda'anai i'i, Ae' ekwahomena waf aonai ine' nanda'anai o i'ipana i'i, fela lehis ine'imi nehafel nefe'. Basef amama ma nefela lehis ananimi, ipe' pa'i amama ahifima ae'.
