Ea' ae' a'i ipe' pegawa ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, la'ifiwei ma ekwaha waf aonai hianai amam nematawa sape etapi sanda'anai. Ae' a'i ihi'ambepa ae' la'ifiwei ma enda' amamaga amama.”
Ea' anan na'ipa aman anama awes nanda'anai na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ine' hafel fela lehis ine'imi fa'am nefe' ipat ine'inai.”
Jisas na'ipana etin na'ama, nohafel naitu nafela lehis ananimi naep amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' ata' nafe' etin eaf, nandanifel nafela agel Godi lu'una nafe' ipat ananinai.
Ea' amam nematawa isima hiesi gegelalasis kwapete'as umbamahas endilisi safela agel Godi lu'una sa'i, “Dei' ape' mati anona waf dambainai fowa' owa' meatolonai.”
Amama mataga ea', Jisas nohafel nafe' nati anona aman nofa' takisi tol nape ipat sofa' takisanai, agilinama Livai. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.”
Ea' nohafel nailana nafe'. Amamaga hiami ananimi nakwahom ma'oh.
Ea' Livai nanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ipat ananinai nanifela Jisas. Ea' amam hiami manda' waf aonai mofa' takisi maloma anom amam wapoti' mape ma' gwa'aimi maloma amam biam.

Ea' anom Farisi maloma anom amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, amam Farisi, mape manda' megah maham ma amam alupumi Jisasi ma'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pape pa' gwa'aimi paloma amam mofa' takisi maloma amam amama manda' waf aonai? Na'ama ina andeande', hapaimi.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Isima awes a'asi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Ea' isima awes nanda'asi etis safe'ma dokta.
Ae' ina afi'i ma efala epes sape andeande'i somboma opalef, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma efala epes sanda' waf aonai etis somboma opalef sokwaha waf aonai sefe'ma God.”

Ea' enis epes sa'ipa Jisas na'ama sa'i, “Alupumi Joni maloma alupumi amam Farisi ukup mapoma basef Godi. Ea' anom nimeguf wikifah hiami amam mololama gwa'aimi monda' beten etin. Ea' alupumi ine'imi owa' monda' waf anama. Amam ma' gwa'aimi embel maim nimeguf hiami.”

Ea' nagwamas na'i basef womun etin na'i, “I'i enis sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma enis aman nemata'w bias sondase'ama, ipe' ina la'ifipama penda' esis alupisi sondaiwa'ma gwa'aimi nemaf anama anan naso' nemata'wi nape nalomas, owa'etin.
Ea' nemaf anama anan naso' nemata'wi nokwaha esis nafe' anagon laogoma, esis sakwaha gwa'aimi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anom basef womun etina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma petopa' lowaf namunai pesana neloma anona lowaf apinai, owa'. I'i enis sonda'am na'ama, lowaf ina noloma apinai na'ama etin, owa'. Namunai pele'etana etin.

Ea' ina enin epen nakolo'wa embel wainim dambaimi agwahup apinai mafinina, si'i botowagof, owa'. I'i enin nenda'am na'ama, wain netef hiana, nohape' agwahup anama pepe'etana ea' wain kolo'olana aona hi'ilana.
Ea' wain dambainai sakolo'wana agwahup dambainai atona.
Ea' emi noga' wain apinai enin ina atuwasi okom ni'i wain dambainai, owa'. Enin na'i, ‘Wain apinai bu'unai nikila' dambainai.’ ”

Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon ea' nataga anona aof sawa witanai nawis. Ea' alupumi ananimi mafe' malomana, ea' magi anom wit maufi moka'isam lagof amamumi magwa'am.
Ea' anom Farisi mahali'am ma'i, “Ina penda'am na'ama ma nemaf anae' Sabat mapoma noma'wanai, owa'. Dei' maina panda'am na'ama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa basef amama ma waf fowa' gani dembinai King Devit nanda'anai. Nemaf anama Devit naloma alupumi ananimi nolomaham
anan nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret anama amam pris mondolali maso' Godanai. Ea' na'ana naso' alupumi ananimi wapoti' ma'ana etin. Ea' mi'uli ape'inai na'i amam pris atom mea'ana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ape Dembiwei ma nemaf anama Sabata i'ipipa maina maol andeande'ma pila basef penda'ana nemaf anama.”

Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat nataga. Ea', Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nape na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa. Ea' anona aman nape nalomas, lagel da'isinai ananinai aona naga' nail.

Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom Farisi ma'i mogolopa anona eafa meambaso'ma Jisasa anom basef baso'maimi ma monda'mana basef. Ea' manda'ana naep di'inde'ana. Ma'i muti anan nonda' aman anama bo'ona nemaf anama Sabat o owa'?
Ea' Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi, na'ipa aman anama lagel aonainai na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu naep hiesi la'afena esis seatilina.”
Ea' anan nohafel naitu.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma mi'uli ape'inai na'iam na'imama? Nemaf ana'e ape' monda' waf bu'unai o monda' waf aonai? Na'i ape' migiambama epes ambal namunai napeis o mohas soga'?”
Ea' natologon tulif amam nematawa hiesi, na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Dowa lagel ine'inai usi'ina.”
Ea' nando lagel nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
Ea' amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi opalef wandafum kwapete' endilisi ma anan. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' nambimb onda' maina Jisas?”
Anona nemaf Jisas nandowasa' nafe' halafutagw nanda' betena God. Ea' owamb anama laona anan nape nanda' beten nafe' ea' lala.
Aon natefi, anan nofala alupumi ananimi hiami mafi'i. Amam 12-peleim nandandepam Aposel.
Anona Saimon, ea' Jisas nanda'mana agel wa'ana Pita. Ea' Andru, owalomana Saimoni. Ea' Jems naloma Jon, Filip naloma Bartolomyu,
Matyu naloma Tomas ea' Jems nogalomana Alfiusi. Ea' Saimon anan epes hiesi Seloti.
Ea' Judas nogalomana Jemsi, naloma Judas Kariotinai, aman anama nawalapa Jisasa naumbih ananimi.

Ea' Jisas niniala naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' anagon bembe'agoma, do'ok esis alupisi hiesi ananisi safi'i sali' saituma. Ea' epes hiesi safi'i. Enis safi'i wambel hiagoma Judia ea' enis safi'i wambel biefina Tair naloma Saidon nape felefele'ma naoh, enis safi'i Jerusalem.
Esis safi'i ma some' basef ananimi ma natofa awes nanda'asi. Ea' esis amam nematawa ambagof awami mahambombagasi safi'i, Jisas nanda'as bo'wes wapoti'.
Pepel ananinai nafe' nanda' esis hiesi bo'wes. Ea' dei' esis hiesi sa'i sombale'efana.
Jisas nati amam alupumi ananimi na'ipam na'i,
“Ipe' kwahupei otamba maim a'ipei, ipe' pawis ea' wambota Godi numafipa. Amama atom dei' ipe' pandanifel pape.
Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Nambimb enis epes siti ipe' pila ae', esis opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Ea' sowa' alafugaha ipe' sese'epa agof awami endilisi si'i ipe' epes aopai sindaiwa'mepa sogalo'mepa.
Nemaf anama esis sonda'epa na'ama, ipe' pendanifel pialemb etin. Dei' main, amamaga hiami bu'wami ipe'imi ma'oh heven ilif. Fowa' gani akupas bafapas asasisi sanda' amam profet aom na'ama etin.
Ipe' otamba wiga maim hiamipei, ipe' pindumafuma ma amamaga awami nimanimi meatagamipei. Dei' main, ipe' dei' pefa'am ea' amamaga monda'epa pandanifelamami.

Ipe' dei' pa' gwa'aimi elihipei, pindumafuma ma amamaga awami nimanimi meatagamipei. Dei' main, anona nemaf ipe' nolomehepa. Ipe' dei' panda'iafi, ipe' pindumafuma ma amamaga awami nimanimi meatagamepa. Dei' main, anona nemaf ipe' pelefa penda'aga endilisi.

Ipe' dei' epes hiesi hi'alas safela agof ipe'mi sa'i ipe' bu'wipei, ipe' pindumafuma ma amamaga nimanimi lu'wami meatagamipei. Dei' main, fowa' akusas bafasas asasisi sa'ipam na'ama etina amam profet mambaso'mami ma'ipasa basef Godi. Sanda'mamam na'ama etin, safela agof amamumi.
Ea' ipe' pame' basef ae'ami, ipe' ukup mimila naumbih ipe'isi, penda'masa waf bu'unai isima opalef aoma ipe'i.
Ipe' pihali' Goda nonda'mas waf bu'unai ma epes isima sanda'mepa waf aonai. Ea' penda' betena epes isima sanda'epa aopei.
I'i emi egelin nehepa aomb wa'ol, pendamboma nehepa wa'ol wapoti'. I'i emi egelin nefa'epa saket ipe'inai, ina pinda'imana, owa'. Pese'ana wapoti'.
I'i emi egefin nefalepama anom amamaga, ipe' pese'anam. Ea' i'i emi egefin nefa' amamaga ipe'imi, ipe' owa' pi'ipana mehipa negwamepam, owa'.
Maina waf ipe' pa'i esis sanda'mepana ipe'i, ipe' penda'masana na'ama etin.

I'i ipe' ukup mimila epes isima ukup maimaila ipe' etipa, nambimb pefa' maim amamaga bu'wami ma waf anama? Owa'etin. Epes sanda' waf aonai esis sanda'ana na'ama etin. Ukup maimaila epes isima ukup maimailasi.
I'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma isima sanda' waf bu'unai atona ma ipe'i, nambimb emi nefela agof ipe'imi? Owa'etin. Epes isima sanda' waf aonai esis wapoti' sanda' waf na'amainai.

I'i ipe' pese'asa anom amamaga epes isima ipe' pegawa esis nambimb seagwamepami, anona nemaf emi nefela agof ipe'imi? Owa'etin. Epes sanda' waf aonai wapoti' sase'asa anom amamaga enis sanda' waf aonai, ma esis seatanima seafa'am na'ama etin mondagwama si'i sali' sase'asam.

Ea' ipe' ukup mila naumbih ipe'isi, penda'mas waf bu'unai esis pese'asa amamaga. Ipe' ina ata' pi'i anona nemaf esis sogwamepam, owa'. Ipe' penda'as na'ama anona nemaf God la'ifinai nape ilifi nese'epa amamaga lu'wami bu'wami ma pepe awasi ananipei. Dei' main, anan na'i uwahipis esis isima owa' seanifelonae saloma isima sanda' waf aonai.
Ahalomepa ipe'inai na'i uwahipis esis sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' penda'am na'ama etin si'i anan nati esis uwahipis.

Ipe' ina pewaloga enis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'. Ama anona nemaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'. Ipe' ina pembaso'ma enis epes, owa'. Ama anona nemaf God ina nombaso'ma ipe' wapoti', owa'. Ipe' pekwaha waf aonai enis sanda'ma ipe'anai. Ama anona nemaf God nogwam nokwaha waf aonai ipe'inai.

Ipe' pese'asa amamaga enis epesa God nose'epa amamaga ipe'. Anona nemaf anan nose'epa amamaga hiami si'im mosaminiala ma ipe'. Ikwaf ipe' pease'asana enis epesi, ikwaf anama atona God nese'epana ipe'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anom basef womun etin wapoti' na'i, “A'i enin epen naep mase'ani la'ifinama nihi'ambaman eaf enin epen naep mase'ani? Owa'etin. Atuwasi esis bias sondakolas dogwas sefe' sowala etin kwambiwag.
Epes sanda' skul etini ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Esis sanda' skul sambefan ea', sotaga na'ama etin si'i tisa asasinai.
Dei' maina ipe' pati usan sa'unai nape naep sahin owan ipe'isi, ea' ipe' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nape naep ipe'imi?

Dei' maina ipe' ata' pa'ipa alupisi pa'i, ‘Owalome, ae' a'i iwafamenana usan sa'unai nape naem ine'inai.’ Ea' ine' hapataf lu'unai anama nape naep ine'imi. Ipe' malogof biamipei pambaso'mami. Ipe' ata' pili' pewafa hapataf lu'unai nape naep ipe'imi, ma piti andeande' pewafamenan usan sa'unai nape naep alupisi ipe'isi.
Lawag bu'unai ina nola gwa'aimi awami, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin lawag aonai ina nola gwa'aimi bu'wami, owa'.
Ape' mati gwa'aimi mailami, mogawa lawah bu'wami awami. Ape' ina mola su'utip fik si'i ahip anona mandof higataunai, owa'. Ea' ina mola su'utip wainim anona mandof pipi'embin, amama wapoti' owa'.

Epes na'ama etin. Epes bu'wasi, esis ukup bu'wami mapeis ukup asasimi sawalapa waf bu'unai. Ea' epes awasi waf hianai aonai napeis ukup asasimi. Ea' sawalapa waf aonai atona. Dei' main, waf bu'unai aonai nape si'ina ukup asasimi, anama atona dei' malogof mawalapana nawisi ande'.
Dei' maina ipe' pa'i ae' Dembiwei, Dembiwei, ea' ipe' owa' pila malogel ae'anai?
Emi egafis sifi'mai ae' sieila malogel ae'anai, dei' ae' indila'wifa waf ananinai ma ipe' pegawana.

Epen inima si'i anona aman nala' ipati. Anan nandoma olalef mowala gani etap owin otamba ma'oma. Ea' nala' ipat netawa etap anama otambaiguma la'ifiguma. Ea' asaf lu'unai nalai, walemb nawisi lu'una embel kolo'walami mafe', ipat ina nandagwamba, owa'. Dei' main? Aman anama nanda'ana la'ifina.

Ea' emi egefin name' basef ae'ami owa' nilam, inima si'i anona aman nala' ipat falafunai. Anan nanda'ana nala'ana etin natoma etap atona ilif. Ea' anom nimeguf mafe' ea' walembeh mawisi embel magwale'ana nowa aona hi'alana.”
Jisas na'ipasa basef amama laumi esis amam nematawa seme'am ma hi'alam, ea' nafe' nataga anona wambel Kaperneam.
Anona aman dembinai nape. Anan kepten numafi soldia hiami 100-peleim. Anona nanda' maola anani awes nanda'ana felefele'ma neaga'. Ea' kepten okom nainailana.
Ea' name' basefa Jisas nasapa' anom agufumi Judai mafe' mofala Jisasa nifi'i nonda' aman anama bo'ona.
Ea' mafe' matagama Jisas ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Kepten anama aman bu'unai, andeande'ma ine' nigiambamana nenda' aman nanda' maolananai bo'ona.
Dei' main, anan okom nainaila ape' Juda nala' ipat ape' ma'i basef mapeinai.”

Ea' Jisas nafe' nalomam nafe' nataga felefele'ma ipat ea', Kepten anama nasapa' anom alupumi mofa'ai basef ananimi mafi'i ma'ipa Jisas na'ama ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' nefo'o owa', hapaimi. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma ine' nefo'o niwis ipat ae'anai, owa'.

Amama atom ae' wapoti' ina bo'owe ma efe'mago ine', owa'. Ine' ni'i etin, atuwasi anan bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape owina anom soldia dambami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. I'ipa anona i'i, ‘Ine' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. Ea' i'ipa anona i'i, ‘Ine' fi'i’, neme'e nafi'i. Ea' i'ipa anama agel a'anai nanda'me maoli i'i, ‘Ine' da'a maol anama’, anan name'e nanda'ana. Ine' dembinai. Ea' awes anama atuwasi neme' basef ine'imi nefe'. Dei' ine' ni'i etin, ea' anan ambo'ona wapoti'.”

Jisas name' basef ananimi okom natanea ea' nandamboma na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sagi'ma anani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, soldia dembinai anama anan ina ipe' Israelinai. Ea' dei' nembale'efa ae'. Ina anona aman Israelinai nembale'ef na'ama, owa'etin. Anan nikila' ipe' Israela nembale'efa ae' la'ifina.”
Ea' amam amama kepten nasapa'am mafi'i motanima mafe' ipat mati aman anama nanda' maola kepteni ambo'ona.
Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', Jisas nafe' anona wambel Nain. Alupumi ananimi maloma enis amam nematawa hiesi safe' salomana.

Anan nafe' felefele'ma uta sawis wambel anama, ea' nati enis sofa' enin so'uso'win naga'i safi'i sa'i sowan. So'uso'win inima mama'wan alifi'wi. Akwa'w kola enin etin, waulunama'w a' naga'. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sape wambel anama safi'i salomai akwa'w.
Dembinai nati akwa'w, okom ananinai na'i uwahipi'w ea' na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' nelef owa'.”
Ea' anan nafe' felefele' nasa lagela bokis salanami. Ea' amam mofa'ai bokis amama maitu.
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Souso'win, ine' neme'! Ae' a'ipina, ine' hafel.”

So'uso'win inima naga' ea'i nehafel nape na'i. Ea' Jisas naso'akwan mama'wan anani'wi. Na'ama esis umbamahas endilisi safela agel Godi sa'i, “Anona aman profet dembinai nataga ea' la'afena ape'. God nafi'i ma nigiambama ape' amam nematawa ananipai.”
Ea' basef amama ma maol Jisasi mafe'agen hi'alagon anama etap hiagoma Judia ea' anama hiagoma wapoti'.
Alupumi Joni ma'ipana amamaga amama pepel anama Jisas nanda'anai. Ea' Jon nofala alupumi biam ananimi
nasapa'am mafe' mahali' Dembinai Jisas ma'i, “Ine' aman ma'wina nafi'i o ata' mope mohafa anona?”
Amam matagama Jisas ea' ma'i, “Jon napisi'as embeli nasapa' afa' biafa wafi'mai ine', anan na'i nogawa, ‘Ine' aman ma'wina nafi'i o ata' mope mohafa anona?’ ”
Nemaf anama atona Jisas nanda' amam nematawa awes naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Anan natofamasa ambagof awami mapeisi. Hiesi naep mase'asi nanda'masam mati andeande'.

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona amamaga amama dei' patolomi pami'ami. Isima naep mase'asi sati wapoti', bo'wagah awamisi safe' andeande'. Isima awes aonai nanda' alop asasinai nambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah mase'asi same' basef andeande', saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti' ea' kwahusi same' basef bu'wami Godi.
Emi egafis ukup etifim sombale'efa ae', isima sondanifel endilisi.”

Amam biam mofa'ai basef Joni motanima mafe'. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipe' pafe' anona etap fatauguma wafiguma epes a'agoma pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pati anona aman ina nembale'ef andeande' si'i anona elifita uf nefa'ana nanda' felifal? Owa'etin.

Ea' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nala luwaguf bu'wami atumi? Owa'etin. Epes isima sotala amamaga bu'wami atumi ma moni hianai sala luwguf bu'wami atumi, epes isima sape ifagw bu'wami king dambami atom mapeimi.
Dei' ipe' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, anan profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.
Aman anama ea' ma'una anan atona si'i basef mape Baibeli na'iama God fowa' gani na'iam na'i,
‘Ine' neme', anona nemaf ae' esapa' aman nofa' basef Ae'ami nili' nefe' nendondombamena eaf ine'inai.’

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Jon dembinai nikila' amam hiami ma etap anae'. Ea' emi egafis dei' siowis wambota Godi numafias, isima dembesi sikila' Jon. Ea' emi egafis agof a'asi ma wambota Godi, esis wapoti' dei' sape dembesi sikila'ana.”
Ea' amam mofa' takisi maloma epes hiesi same' basef Jisasi esis sa'i, “A'e, waf Godi andeande'.”
Dei' main, Jon atona napisi'asi.
Ea' amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ina mofa' baptaisa Jon, owa'. Amam manda'am na'ama dei' mandamboma mowa' alafugaha eaf bu'unai God nihi'ambamanai.
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Dei' ae' indili'wifa ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae'i i'imama? Ae' i'ipipa maim basef womun etina pegawa waf ipe'inai?
Ipe' pape si'i enis awasi sandakolas sapoma sofala enis awasi sa'i,
‘Ape' mandanifel mufapula batagwa ipe', ea' ipe' ina palemb. Ape' manda' awalef malef matamea, ea' ipe' ina palef.’
Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli nafi'i, ina na' gwa'aimi embel wainim, owa'. Ea' pa'i ambal aonai napaina.

Dei' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei afi'i a' gwa'aimi maloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti anan aman na' gwa'aimi hiami, na' embel wain hianai endilisi. Anan alupunai ma amam mefa' takisi maloma amam manda' waf aonai!’
Ea' emi egafis sila gawa bu'unai Godi, esis isima sihi'ambapa gawa anama Godi bu'unai endilisi ma sombale'efana!”
Anona aman Farisi nahali' Jisasa nifi'i nea' gwa'aimi nolomana. Ea' nafe' ipat anama Farisi nalomana ma' gwa'aimi.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape taun anama kwanda' waf aonai. Akwa'w kwame' basefa Jisas na' gwa'aimi ipat anama. Ea' kofa' anona botol bu'unai si'i owap embel sanda alogw bu'wami ma'anai kwafi'i.

Ea' kwawis kwafe' kwaitu alafuga Jisasi felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi kwalef. Ea' embif akwa'umi maluwi mowala bo'wagah Jisasi ea' kwanda' auf balagaimi kopati' embif akwa'umi, kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ananimi kwanda' lotumana. Ea' kwakolo' sanda anama bo'wagah ananimi.

Ea' Farisi anama nahali' Jisas nafi'i nati amama, nomonas ananimi matamea na'i, “I'i aman anama endilisi anan profet, anan nogawa nemata'w akwama kwahapila anani, nogawa waf akwa'unai. Dei' main? Akwa'w kwanda' waf aonai.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana nomonas amama Farisi anama na'ipana na'i, “Saimon, ae' a'i i'ipina anom basef.”
Ea' Saimon na'i, “Tisa, ine' walapa basef ine'imi.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Amam biam anona wiaf napoma amoma anona aman otamba hiamunai. Anona nowaola wiafa 100 kina ea' anona 10 kina atona.
Amam biam ina la'ifima meagwa wiaf anama, owa'. Ea' dei' aman anama nakwahomoma wiaf anama amam biam. Ea' amam biam nambimb emi okom ninila anan endilisi nikila' anona?”
Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' a'i aman anama nase'ana wiaf lu'unai 100 kinai.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ine' nawalogam andeande'.”

Ea' nandamboma nati nemata'w akwama na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ine' niti nemata'w akwama? Ae' afi'i awis ipat ine'inai. Ine' owa' nase'e embel esa'opa bo'wagah ae'ami, owa'etin. Ea' nemata'w akwama kwasa'opa bo'wagah ae'ami ma embif maluwi naep akwa'umi. Ea' kopati'am balaga akwa'unai.
Ine' owa' niesisi' ae'. Ea' do'ok ae' afi'i awis etin, akwa'w kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ae'ami la'ela'ef kwape kwafi'i kwataga dei'.
Ine' owa' neanda' wel nekolo'am ma balaga ae'anai. Ea' akwa'w kwakolo'am bo'wagah ae'ami embel sanda bu'unai.

Na'ama dei' ae' a'ipina. Akwa'w okom nainaila ae' endilisi. Waf anama okom nainaila ae'anai nihi'ambapa waf aonai akwa'unai hianai ae' akwahomakwana hi'alana. Emi epen God nokwahoman waf aonai ananinai kwasala'una, epen inima enin nambimb ina okom ninila God endilisi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ae' akwahomena waf aonai ine'inai.”
Ea' amam mape ma' gwa'aimi malumanai mape ukup matamea manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anama emi egafuna na'i la'ifina ma nokwaha waf aonai?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa nemata'w akwama na'i, “Ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom God nakwahomena waf aonai ine'inai nofa'ena netanimani. Ine' fo'o, ea' opaf ine'inai nope awanena.”

Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', Jisas nafe' wambel hiagoma na'ipasa basef bu'wami amam nematawa sape taun anama wambel hiagomai. Na'ipasa basef amama bu'wami ma nambimb siowis wambota Godi numafias. Alupumi ananimi 12-peleim maloma

anowa nematawa safe' salomana. Nematawa awama fowa' awes nanda'awa Jisas natofamawa ambagof awami nanda'awa bo'owa. Ano'w Maria sofala'w sa'i Makdalai'wi, fowa' natofama'wa ambagof awami 7-peleim mapai'wi.

Ea' ano'w Joana nemata'w anona aman numafi ipat Heroti, agel ananinai Susa. Ea' ano'w Susana kwaloma anowa nematawa hiawai wapoti' wafe' walomana. Awo wagiambama anan naloma alupumi ananimi ma otamba gwa'aimi maim awaumi.
Esis amam nematawa hiesi sape safi'i taun hiagoma, safi'i sandakolas safi'mai Jisas. Ea' anan nase'asa basef hiami womun etin na'ama na'i,
“Anona aman nafe' nowaha olelemb witimi si'i rais anona aof. Nowahom nafe', anom mowa eaf safe'ma. Enis epes safe' safofo'asom ea' amiguf mufia' mafi'i ma'am.
Ea' anom mowa anagon otambaiguma. Ea' mataga ea' etap owa' embelina. Masilimb ina mowala ea' alim.
Anom mowala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofenia wit, ea' amam ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
Ea' anom mowa mafe' etap bu'unai ea' mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi. Anom mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi hiami 100-peleim.”
Jisas na'iam na'ama ma ea', na'ipas mehip na'i, “Ipe' aligah magalipei, peme'am andeande' ukup mopomam.”
Ea' amam alupumi Jisasi mahali'anama basef ofagema womun etini.
Ea' nagwamama basef na'i,

“God nihi'ambepa basef ofagema mape mandambahi'i ma ipe' piowis wambota Ananinai numafipa. Ea' enis epes owa'. God ina nihi'ambas basef amama ofagema, owa'. Ama esis ‘ina some' basef amama alihim, owa'. Some' basef womun etin nambimb sotologon, ea' ina siti anom amamaga, owa'. Esis some' basef, ea' ina sogawa ofagema, owa'.’ ”
Basef womun etini ofagema na'ama. Olelemb amama si'i basef Godi.
Anom mowa eafi amama si'i epes isima same' basef, ea' Satan nafi'i nofa' basef amama God nase'esam mape opalef asasimi ma esis ina sembale'efa God nofa'as seatanimani, owa'.

Anom mowa mafe' anagon otambaiguma, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi ea' sofa'am mehip sandanifelamam. Ea' isima si'i masilimb ina mondala mowala etap owini. Esis sembale'am nogota bandana etin ea', Satan nagwambas sanda' waf aonai ea' satanima sakwaha sombale'efa God.

Anom mowala mandelef wandafumi la'afen, amama si'i epes isima same' basef sailif safe' ea', anom nimanimi mamumami maloma moni main naloma anom danifel maim etapami, amamaga amama mase'ala esis. Ea' ina sombale'efa God sanda' waf bu'unai la'ifis, owa'.

Ea' anom mowa etap bu'unai, si'i enis same' basef bu'wami sembale'am la'ifis. Opalef asasimi bo'om same' basef Godi sailam. Esis sape la'ifis sanda' waf bu'unai la'ela'ef, isima sape si'i olelemb mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi andeande'i.
Epes ina sakata lamifah sopalo'am ma'oh owina baket o balata owina, owa'. Esis sawamonam balatagw ilifa epes isima suwisi siti howalagon.
Amamaga hiami hi'alam mape mandambahi'i anona nemaf motaga alihiguma hiesi sotolom sogawam. Ea' amamaga hiami ata' sambaho'am ma'ihi, anona nemaf motaga mondawalap, hiesi sogawam.

Ea' ipe' pindumafuma peme' basef andeande'. Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Godi, nambimb God nowatanimasam wapoti'. Ea' isima owa' sembale'ami, anona nemaf basef kwawie'im amama esis sombale'am, God nondalombasam esis sopen etin.”
Nemaf anama mama'wana Jisasi kwao'wa owapana safi'mai anan. Amam nematawa hiesi sandakolasi sili'akwana ea' esis ina safe' felefele'ma anan, owa'.
Ea' enis epes sape salomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' neme', mama'wena ine'ikwi kwaloma owapena ine'imi safi'i saitu ande', sa'i solomena si'i.”
Ea' nagwamasa basef isima hiesi na'ipas na'i, “Esis amam nematawa isima some' basef Godi sailam, isima mama'we sahin owan ae'asi.”
Anona nemaf Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi malata anona bot. Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Afa' ofe' anama walemb batupa'manai gani fisana.” Ea' amam malata bot mafe'.
Bot anama nafe' etin, Jisas ambeh mahana na'oh nolola.
Ea' anona uf lu'unai naluwi walemb batupa'manai anama, embel kolo'walam mawis bot nomon na'i si'inama embel felefele'ma mowala.
Ea' mafe' minimbalana ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ahegililafa.”
Ea' anan nohafel ninifala ufi embel. Ea' uf faso'mana, embel ina ata' manda' fepo, owa'. Tol motah.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Bale'ef ipe'inai nape eti?”
Amam umbamaham ukup matamea. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anan emi egafuna? Na'ipa uf naloma embel mame'ana mowala.”
Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi mafe' mataga anagon esis Gerasa sapoma, anama nape wa'ol walemb batupa'manai fisana etap hiagoma Galili.

Ea' Jisas nakwaha bot nisila' nafe' akata, anona aman nape taun anamai nafi'mai anan. Anom ambagof awami mapeinai. Anan ina nowaho' anona lowaf nape andeande' anona ipat, owa'etin. Fowa' anan aona nape la'ela'ef nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Nape nafe' hi'agilif atom.

Anona ambal aonai nahapilana tatala'ina. Esis sombalo'ana sumafiana nimeguf hiami sanda' seni hankap sowa'ana lagof bo'wagah, owa'. Nahape'am etin. Ea' ambal anama aonai nofa'ana nafe' anama epes a'agoma.
Aman anama nafi'i nati Jisas, nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi. Ea' Jisas na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ine' ambal aonai, nekwaha aman anama ine' fo'o.”
Ea' nofalana mehip endilisi na'i, “Jisas, ine' Nogalomana dembinai God nape ilif endilisi, ine' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina mehip, ine' owa' nese'e nimanimi ae'.”
Ea', Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agel ine'inai emi?” Ea' anan na'i, “Agel ae'inai ambagof hiami.”
Dei' main, ambagof awami hiami mafe' mawisana.
Ea' ambagof amama mofala Jisas mehip timbitambel ma'i, “Ina netofafa ofe' owala hul launai owa' nowala neatambili, owa'.”
Ea' anom bogof hiami maitu ma' gwa'aimi anona domota felefele'. Ea' ambagof awami ma'ipa Jisas mehip ma'i, “Ine' ni'i a'e ma afa' ofe' uwis bogof mamuma.”
Ea' na'i aho'mam.
Ambagof awami amama makwaha aman anama mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof mamuma hiami masagih mafe' mehip mowala awagoma tata, mowala embel walemb batupa'manai afum hi'alam.
Ea' amam mumafi bogofi mati amamaga matagama bogof, masagih mafe' ma'ipasa amamaga amama amam matulumi amam nematawa sape tauni saloma sail aof felefele'i wapoti'.

Ea' esis safe'ma sieti amamaga amama. Safi'mai Jisas sati aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai dei' makwahona ea' ambo'ona okom bu'unai napaina andeande' nowaho' lowaf tol nape felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi. Amam nematawa hiesi satolona ea' esis umbamahas.
Ea' epes isima sati amamaga amama, sa'ipas sa'i waf Jisas nanda'ana aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai dei' ambo'ona wapoti'.
Ea' epes hiesi sape anama Gerasai hiesi umbamahas endilisi. Ea' sa'ipa Jisas sa'i, “Ine' nekwaha ape' fo'o.”
Ea' Jisas nalata bot anama notanima nafe'.
Aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai nahali'ana mehip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.”
Ea' Jisas nasapa'ana na'i,
“Ine' tanima fo'o wambel ine'inai, ni'ipasa amamaga hiami God nanda' maina ine'ami.”
Ea' aman anama nafe' nawalapa basefa amamaga amama ma amam nematawa hiesi sape taun anamai amamaga Jisas nanda'manam anani.
Jisas notanima nafi'i, enis amam nematawa hiesi sape sohafana. Ea' sanda'mana nemaf bu'unai sandanifela ma nafi'i.

Ea' anona aman nataga agilinama Jairus. Anan numafi ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai. Nogamana nemata'w atoto'w afagof akwa'umi 12-peleim felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi, nahali'ana mehip na'i, “Ine' nifi'i ipat ae'anai.”
Ea' Jisas nafe' esis amam nematawa hiesi safe' sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin saitu sindiwapana.

Anan ata' nafe' etin, ano'w nemata'w kwafi'mai anan. Awes lu'unai nanda'akwi kwape gamba afagof 12-peleim. Otamba akwa'uimi hi'alama kwatal dokta hiami. Owa' anom la'ifima monda'akw kotaga bo'okwe, owa'etin.
Ea' kwafe' felefele'ma alafuga ananinai, kwasa lagela saket Jisasi da'malifinama. Kwanda'am na'ama, mehip etin esimbel pele'atam, ea' ina ata' maluwi wapoti', owa'etin.
Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i, “Emi nasa lagela ae'?”
Ea' esis hiesi sa'i etin etin sa'i, “Ae' owa'.”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, amam nematawa isima hiesi saitu sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin salomafa.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ame' pepel ae'anai nakwahowe nafe'ma nonda' enin epen bo'wen. Ae' egawa enin epen nasa lagel alop ae'anai.”

Ea' nemata'w akwama kogawa akwa'w ina atuwasi kondambaho'w ma anan, owa'. Na'ama akwa'w umbamaha'w kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa etap felefele'ma naep amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' kwawalapa basef ofagema akwa'umi ma dei' kwasa lagela anan ea' ambo'okw. Ea' kwa'i, “Awes ae'anai ahi'alana owa'etin.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Nogame, dei' ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ine' fo'o opaf ine'inai nope awanena.”
Anan ata' na'i etin, anona aman nakwaha ipat Jairusi nafi'i na'ipa Jairus na'ama na'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi kwaga' ea'. Amama atom dei' ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o ekep pehana, owa', hapainai.”
Ea' Jisas name'as na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina umbamohena, owa'. Nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei, ama atuwasi nogamena ine'ikwi kohafel wapoti'.”

Ea' Jisas nafe' nataga ipat Jairusi ea' ina na'i a'e ma amam nematawa hiesi suwis ipat anama, owa'. Nao'wa Pita naloma Jon Jems atom maloma mama'wakw ahaloma'w etis safe' sawis salomana. Esis amam nematawa hiesi sape ande' salef mehip sa'i sapoma'w.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' ina pelef, owa'. Tol pepe. Akwa'w ina kwaga' endilisi, owa'. Kwa'oh etin.”
Ea' esis sanda'iafana kwapete'. Esis sogawa akwa'w kwaga' endilisi.
Ea' Jisas nahapila lagel akwa'unai nofala'w na'i, “Sa'ukwi, ine' hafel.”
Ea' ambal akwa'unai notanima nafi'i nawisa'w wapoti' kohafel mehip. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis mamasa'w na'i, “Ipe' so'akwa anom gwa'aimi.”
Ea' sati amama, gegelalasis endilisi nomonas matamea.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas mehipa siela basef ananimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'ipa enin epena amamaga amama, owa'.”
Nemaf anama Jisas nofalai alupumi 12-peleim ananimi mandakolas mafi'i nase'am agof lu'wami nanda'am la'ifima meatofa ambagof hiami awami ea' monda' hiesi awes hianai naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
Ea' nasapa'am mafe' ma'ipasa basefa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias ea' manda' epes awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pefa' anom amamaga bandefah isalef gwa'aimi moni, owa', hapaimi. Ipe' ina pefa' siogw biagw atogw, owa'. Pefa' atona etin mondandaepa.
I'i pefe' piowis anona ipat, ipe' pepe ipat anama atona. Ea' pekwaha wambel anama pefe'.
I'i esis owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi, ipe' pekwaha wambel anama pindila'ma usas etap mail bo'wagah ipe'imi ma esis sitilipa sogawa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ofagena asasinai atona.”
Ea' alupumi Jisasi makwaha anama mapoma mafe' wambel anama hiagoma ma'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi. Ea' magiambama epes awes nanda'asi sape wambel hiagomai manda'as bo'wes wapoti'.

Gavman dembinai king Herot numafi etap hiagoma Galili name' basefa amamaga amama hiami mataga, ea' ina nogawam andeande' ea' nomonas matamea mafe'. Dei' main, enis epes sa'i, “Jon notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.”
Ea' enis sa'i anom basefa Elaija profet fowa'inai sa'i, “Anan nohafel wapoti'.”
Ea' enis sa'i, “Anona aman profet fowa'inai notanima nohafel wapoti'.”
Ea' Herot na'i, “Jon ae' atopa'mana. Ea' aman anama ame' basefanai, anan emi egafuna?”
Ea' nape la'ela'ef na'i niti Jisas.
Aposel alupumi Jisasi motanima mafi'i ma'ipa Jisasa amamaga maol amam manda'ana. Ea' anan nao'wam makwaha enis epes, amam atom mafe' anona taun Betsaida.

Ea', esis amam nematawa hiesi sogawa anama napoma sagi'mana safe'. Safi'mai anan, nanda'mas nemaf bu'unai nandanifel ma esis safi'i. Ea' nawalipasa basefa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. Ea' nanda' epes awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.

Wambomota felefele'ma owamb alupumi ananimi 12-peleim mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nesapa'as sofo'o wambel aof sape felefele'i ma sogolopa gwa'aimi sogolopa sea'oma. Dei' main, anae' afa' wapoma wafiguma epes a'agoma.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' etipa pese'as gwa'aimi.”
Ea' amam ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aimi owa' hiame. Bret lagel wa'ana atona maloma agof biam ea' amama atom ma'oh. Ea' ine' na'i afa' ofe' utalai gwa'aimi ma amam nematawa isima hiesi?”
Amam atom hiami 5,000-peleim mape.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sope sefe' oto otowa sotagama wambotagw 50-peleis etis.”
Ea' manda' amam nematawa hiesi sape.
Ea' Jisas nafela bret anama lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof biam, naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God. Ea' nawalana naso' alupumi ananimi maso' esis amam nematawa hiesi hi'alas.
Sa'am elihis dondo', alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleim si'im endilisi.
Anona nemaf Jisas atotona nanda' beten, alupumi ananimi mape malomana nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman emi egafuwi?”
Ea' amam magwa basef na'ama ma'i, “Enis sa'i ine' Jon aman napisi'as embeli. Ea' enis sa'i ine' anona profet fowa'inai netanima nehafel wapoti', ea' enis sa'i ine' Elaija.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' pa'i Ae' emi egafuwi?”
Ea' Pita nagwa basef na'i, “Ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam mehip na'i amam ina mi'ipasa basef amama enis epes mi'i anan Krais, owa'.

Ea' na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb efa' nimanimi lu'wami ma anom agufumi dambami moloma anom dambami pris maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi nambimb mowa' alafugaha ae', mohe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilama anona neafe'ma wanomi, God nefele etanima ehafel wapoti'.”

Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' nimanimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Emi egafis si'i sila Ae', esis senda'am na'ama etin si'i Ae' la'ela'ef nimeguf danda ma sieili. Ea' sesambala ukup asasimi ma maina maol esis sa'i seanda'anai.

Dei' main, emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom, si'i sihapilam tatala'im, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma Ae' ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf ambagof asasimi God nofa'ami sotanimani sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
I'i emi egefis senda' maol naninani ma sefa' gwa'aimi hiahaom amamaga hiami etapami atom higilialami, esis wapoti' awes higililas selomam. Dei' amamaga amama nambimb migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin.

Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. I'i emi egafis ambagof aoma Ae' sondafa'me eloma basef Ae'ami, Ae' wapoti' ambal aona epes isima endafa'mas nemaf anama Ae' ifi'i eloma amamaga bu'wami mafifili Ae'ami, elomai mafifili howalagon Godi maloma amam ensel Godi wapoti'.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, enipa paitu na'ae nambimb ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Enipa nambimb piti epes siowis wambota Godi numafias.”
Jisas na'ipasa basef amama ma ea', nimeguf amama 8-peleim mafe'ma ea', anan nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon, nao'wam mondowasa' anona halaf launai ma nonda' beten.
Anan nape nanda' beten etin, amaga ananinai nataga nandati na'ana, ea' luwaguf nalami mataga afitim endilisi howalagon.
Ea' amam biam fowa'imi Moses naloma Elaija mataga maloma nafifili pepel ilifanai ea' maitu ma'i malomana. Amam ma'i ma nambimb Jisas nila okom Godi ma nokwaha etap anae' noga' gani Jerusalem.
Pita naloma alupumi biam ananimi amam naep nimanim endilisi ma'i mo'oh etin. Ea' mohafel mati nafifili Jisasi maloma amam amama biam maitu malomana.
Amam biam ma'i mokwaha Jisas mefe', ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'ae fafas. Afa' ola' anom aolah wanom mondandaepa. Ine' anona, Moses anona, Elaija anona.”
Pita ina nogawa andeande'ma na'i basef amama, owa'.
Anan ata' na'i basef etin, anom ilagw maofenia amam ea' umbamaham.
Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai ilagw nomon na'i, “Anama anan Nogalome ae'anai. Ae' andandepana ea'. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi.”
Malogel anama na'i ea', amam mati Jisas atona naitu nalomam. Ea' amam malogof maso', ina ma'ipa enis epesa amamaga amama matulumi, owa'.
Naman wefilu amam makwaha halaf anama makini', ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai Jisas eaf.
Anona aman naitu la'afena esis na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ahali'ina mehip a'i, ine' niti nogalome ae'anai uwahipina. Ea' anan atotona.

Anona ambal aonai nahapilana la'ifina ea' na'i mehip endilisi. Ea' naolana kwapete' endilisi, ifat nataga sisih malogel ananinai. Ambal anama nahambombaga alop ananinai endilisi, ea' ina nakwahona, owa'. Napaina la'ela'ef.
Ea' ae' dei' ahali' alupumi ine'imi ma motofa ambal anama aonai nefe'. Ea' amam ina la'ifim.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa owa' pembale'efa Ae'. Ea' opalef ipe'imi owa' mope andeande'. Nimeguf ma'um ae' ata' epe elomepa wapoti' ma efa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipe' fa'an pifi'mai Ae'.”

Nogalomana ata' nafi'i etin, ambal anama aonai naolana nafe' nowa etap nakoto'ana kwapete' endilisi. Ea' Jisas ninifala ambal aonai nanda' aman anama so'uso'win bo'ona ea' nase'anan notanima nafe'ma ahalomana ananinai.
Amama atom dei' amam nematawa hiesi sati pepel lu'unai Godi gegelalasis kwapete' endilisi.
Esis ata' nomonas matamea mafe'ma etina amamaga amama Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'ama na'i,
“Ipe' pembe' aligah andeande'ma basef dei' ae' a'ipipami. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb felefele' anona aman nose'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amam naumbih ae'ami.”
Alupumi Ananimi mame' basef amama ea' ina mogawa ofagema, owa'. Dei' main, mandambaho'ma amam. Ea' amam umbamahama meahali'ana ma basef amama ofagema.
Ea' alupumi Jisasi mandahihianamam ma'i emi nepe dembinai amamunai.
Ea' Jisas nogawa nomonas amama mape opalef amamumi, ea' nasa'mai enin sa'usaw'in nafi'i naitu nalomana.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Emi egafis sese' opalefa sigiambama enin sa'usa'win si'i ini'i ma ukup asasimi mopoma Ae', esis sase'e opalef Ae' wapoti' sagiambame. Ea' emi egafis sagiambama Ae'i, esis saso' opalef Anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'. Dei' main? Emi egafis sepe agof a'asi la'afena ipe' hipei, esis sape dembesi sali'ma ipe'.”
Ea' Jon nagwamana basef na'ama na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wati anona aman natofa ambagof awami ma agel ine'inai. Anan ina nagi'mafa. Ea' dei' wati watalagamana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ipe' ina petalagamana, owa'. Dei' main? Emi egafin ina naumbih ipe'ini, inima alupunai ipe'inai.”
Ea' nasapa' anom amam mali' mofa' basef ananimi mafe'. Mafe' mawis anona wambel esis Samariai ma meandondomba amamaga ananimi.
Ea', esis wambel anama sowa' alafugaha Jisas sandaiwa'ma
sofa'ana sofe' ipat asasinai. Dei' main? Esis sogawa anan na'i nefe' Jerusalem.
Ea' alupumi amama biam ananimi Jems naloma Jon mati waf anama ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i afa' ofalai nif fandumi misila'i hevena fendo epes isima?”
Ea' Jisas nandamboma ninifala amam biam.
Ea' mafe' anona wambel.
Amam ata' mafe' eaf etin, anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' etin anama hiagoma ine' na'i neafe'ma.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw aolopumi ma'oh mala etap wambel amamunai. Amiguf wapoti' mufia' mafe' ilifi mala' alegah mapeih gani ilif, ea' ae' owa'etin. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei wambel a'e ma a'oh alo balaga ae'anai.”
Ea' na'ipa anona aman na'i, “Ine' nifi'i nila ae'.”
Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahalome, ata' igiambamana ma noga' ewana ma nope ea' ifi'i ilina.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapainai, sowago esis etis isima saga'i. Ea' ine' fo'o newalapa basefa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Emi egafin nehafel nili' nenda' maol aofi ma nendamboma niti alafuga ma neakwaha maol ananinai, enin ina la'ifina nenda' maola ni'ipas siowisa wambota Godi numafias, owa'.”
Dembinai nandandepa anom alupumi ananimi 72-peleim nasapa'am mafe' biam atom mali'ana mafe'. Anan nasapa'am mafe' taun wambel hiagoma anan na'i neafe'agoma.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' piti aof hianai gwa'aimi hiami maof ea'. Ea' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiase, kwawie'is. Ea' ipe' penda' beten pihali' Dembinai ofagonama aofi. Pihali'ana ma nosapa' epes hiesi sefe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sembe'am etifigin.
Ipe' fo'o. Peme', ae' esapa'epa pefe' si'i sipsip nogami la'afena nombagw wandafumi aolopumi.
Ipe' ina pefa' paos manisi soloma brasbeli su, owa'. Ipe' ina penda'masa nemaf bu'unai enis amam nematawa eaf, owa'. Pefe' mehip.
I'i ipe' pefe' piwis anona ipat, ata' pili' pi'i na'ama pi'i, afa' wa'i God nonda' opalef ipe' hipei pape ipat anae' mope awanem.
I'i enin epen opaf awanena nepe ipat anama, ea' basef bu'wami ipe'imi mopoma epen inima. I'i owa', hapaimi, basef amama bu'wami motanimani mopomepa la'ela'ef.

Ipe' peape ipat anama atona. Ina pepe pefe' ifagw mamumami, owa'. Pepe ipat anama atona pea' gwa'aimi embel esis sasi'ipami. Dei' main, epes sanda' maoli andeande'ma mofa' otamba ma maol amam manda'anai.
I'i ipe' pefe' piwis anona taun ama esis sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi, ipe' pefa' gwa'aimi esis sase' ipe'ami.
Ea' penda' isima awes nanda'asi bo'wes wambel anama. Ea' pi'ipa esis pi'i, ‘Nemaf anama felefele'ma neataga ma ipe' piowis wambota Godi numafipa.’
Ea' ipe' i'i pefe' piwis anona taun ama esis owa' seafa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi, ipe' pefe' pitu eaf taun anama pi'i,

‘Etap ma taun anama ipe'inai maila bo'wagah afa'imi, ea' afa' upati'am motanima mefe'mago ipe'. Ama ipe' ukup mondanda' pegawa basef amama andeande'. Nemaf nataga felefele'ma epes siowis wambota Godi. Ea' ipe' pandaiwa'.’

Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf anama lu'unai God nowaloga epesanai anan anona nemaf niti esis fowa' gani sape Sodomi uwahipis andeande'. Ea' epes isima wambel anama anan ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Nimanimi lu'wami endilisi anona nemaf motagamas.”

“Ae' ati ipe' Korasinipei paloma Betsaidaipei uwahipipa endilisi! Nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamepa. Epes isima fowa' gani sanda' waf aonai sape wambel biefina Tair naloma Saidoni, esis ina sati ikwaf la'ifinai naninani si'i dei' anda'ana wambel ipe'inai, owa'. I'i esis siti pepel anama, esis sowaho'am begah pepe'atami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sihi'amba enis epes esis samboma opalef endilisi safe'ma God. Owa'etin.
Anona nemaf God nowaloga esis amam nematawa hiesi, niti esis fowa' gani sape Tair naloma Saidoni uwahipis andeande'. Ea' ipe' owa'. Anona nemaf pefa' nimanimi awami endilisi.
Ea' ipe' Kaperneam, anona nemaf esis sefela agof ipe'imi molata ilif? Owa'etin. Anona nemaf God nokwahipa pefe' pewala wambel aonai hel.”
“Emi egafis seme' malogof ipe'imi, esis same' malogel Ae'anai wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis sese'epa alafugah ipe', esis saso' alafugah ma Ae' ea' sase'ana alafugah Anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'.”
Ea' amam amama mafe' manda' maoli 72-peleim motanima mafi'i mandanifel endilisi ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wahapila agel ine'inai, ambagof awami mame' basef afa'imi.”

Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ati Satan nowai heven si'i otaga holala ma dililimbugwalag. Peme', ae' ase'epa pepel ipe' ma nambimb la'ifipa pefa'asa iguf awami wandafumi moloma awisiguf. Ama la'ifipa pili'amona epen aonai Satan naloma pepel hianai ananinai. Ea' ina nambimb anom amamaga mohambombagepa, owa'.
Ea' ipe' ina pendanifel ma ambagof awami mame' basef ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' pendanifel ma God nanda' agof ipe'imi mail buk ananinai gani heven ilif.”

Nogota anama atona Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapa danifela opaf Jisasi ea' Jisas na'i, “Ahalome, ine' Dembinai ma ilif etapi. Ae' afela agel ine'inai anifelina. Dei' main? Ine' nambaho' amamaga amama ma esis epes gawaisi sofa' gawa lu'unai, ea' nambomam nihi' ambasam epes isima gawa a'asi falafisi isima sape si'i awasi. Ahalome, okom ine'inai na'i, ea' amama atom.

Ahalome ae'anai nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam mape lagel ae'anai. Ina enin epen negawa ae' Nogalomana Godi, owa'etin. Anan atona nogawe. Ea' owa' enin epen negawa Ahalome, owa'. Ae' Nogalomana ananiwei atowe egawana. Ea' emi egafis ihi'ambasa Ahalomei, isima wapoti' esis etis sogawana.”
Ea' anan nandamboma nati alupumi ananimi atom mape malomana na'ipam na'i, “Epes sati amamaga ipe' patulumi esis sandanifel.

Dei' main? Fowa' gani amam king dambami hiami maloma amam profet hiami ma'i miti amamaga amama dei' ipe' patulumi. Owa'. Ukup amamumi maimailam endilisi ma mame' basef amama ipe' pame'ami, owa'. Amam ina mame'am.”
Anona aman gawainai nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nohafel na'i nogwamba Jisas nememe'mana. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' enda' maina nambimb efa' ambal namunai eape andeande' la'ela'ef?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Maim basef mapoma mi'uli Godi? Ine' natalifam na'imama?”

Ea' anan nagwamana basef na'i, “Ukup ipe'imi mohafela Dembinai God ipe'inai mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana ambagof opalef moloma pepel ipe'inai pese'anam hi'ilama Dembinai God atona. Ea' ukup mimila enis epes sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Amama ine' nagwa basef andeande'. Ine' nenda'am na'ama ma nambimb neape ambal namunai la'ela'ef.”
Aman anama na'i nondanda' agel ananinai atona nope bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Epes sape felefele'ma ae'i, esis emi egafis?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana anom basef na'i, “Anona aman nakwaha Jerusalem nafe' nakini' Jeriko. Ea' anom manda' wali matolona eaf, mahana kwapete'ana mola'ipana amamaga hiami luwaguf maim ananimi. Amam manda'am na'ama makwahona mafe'. Anan nataga si'i naga'i.”
Nemaf anama anona aman pris naila eaf anama nafe'. Ea' nati aman anama, nisila'ana naila eaf wa'ol atogon nafe'.
Ea' anona aman wambota Livai naila eaf anama nafi'i wapoti'. Nafi'i nati aman anama nisila'ana naila eaf wa'ol atogon nafe'.
Ea' anona aman Samariainai
naila eaf anama nafi'i natagama aman anama. Anan natolona nati owahipina endilisi.

Ea' nafe' felefele'ma anan nakolo'wa wel marasin naloma embel waina melegw ananimi, ea' nowa'manam. Ea' nafelana nawamonana natoma donki ananinai nofa'ana nafe' nahaponana nape ipat esis fi'ife' sapeinai ea' na'ipa aman numafi ipati ma numafiana andeande'.
Ama wafilu anan nase'ana otamba siliwa biam aman numafi ipat anamai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nimafi aman anama andeande'. Ama i'i enin moni ine'inai nese'anana, nambimb itanimai egwamenana.’ ”
Jisas na'ipana basef amama ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' ine' okom nape na'imama? Amam wanom maila eaf mafi'i, emi nanda'am si'i aman nape felefele'ma aman anama amam awami mahanai?”
Ea' nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Aman anama Samariainai nati anan uwahipina nagiambamana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fo'o nenda'am na'ama etin.”
Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' eaf, ea' nataga anona wambel nafe' nawis. Ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Marta kofa'ana kwafe' ipat akwa'unai.
Owama'w akwa'ukwi agili'wa Maria. Maria kwafi'i kwape felefele'ma bo'wagah Dembinai, kwame' basef ananimi.

Ea' Marta kwanda' maol hianai ma kwandondomba gwa'aimi. Okom natanea ma amamaga mamumami. Ea' kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' niti uwahipiwi. Owame ae'akwi kwa'waha ae' atowe anda' maola andondomba gwa'aimi. Ine' kipa'w kufi'i kwigiambame.”
Ea' Dembinai nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Marta, Marta, okom ine'inai napoma amamaga mamumami ma opaf ine'inai nafe' aona ma amamaga hiami.
Ea' waf bu'unai atotona ine' a'ena. Maria kwa'i kofa' amamaga amama bu'wami mikila' anom. Ina enin epen la'ifinama nili'amona amamaga amama bu'wami ma akwa'w, owa'.”
Anona nemaf Jisas nanda' beten nape anagon. Nanda' betena hi'alan, anona alupunai ananinai na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' nihi'ambafa onda' beten si'i fowa' Jon nihi'amba alupumi ananimi.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Nemaf anama ipe' pi'i penda' beten, ipe' pi'iam na'ama pi'i,
‘Ahalomapa, ape' ma'i agel ine'inai nope bo'ona ma hiesi sefela agel ine'inai lu'una. Ape' ma'i nemaf anama bu'unai nifi'i ma epes hiesi siowis wambota ine'inai numafias.
Dei' ine' nese'apa gwa'aimi mondahama nemaf anae'.
Ine' nekwahomapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Dei' main? Ape' wapoti' makwahomasa waf aonai enis sanda'mapanai. Ine' owa' nili'apa mefe'ma amamaga ahifimi meagwamba ape'i.’ ”
Ea' na'ipam anom basef womun etin na'i, “I'i anona aman alupunai ipe'inai nefe' nie'ipa alupunai ananinai owamb amaneta ni'i, ‘Alupinai, ine' se'e bret wanifina
ma imafi alupunai ae'anai nafi'i natagama ae', ea' ae' gwa'aimi a'e ma imafiana.’
Ea', aman anama napani ipat nomon nagwa basef na'ipana na'i, 'Ae' andaiwa'ma nese'e noma'w ae', owa'. Ae' awasi sa'oh ea' ao'was ma'oh lehis. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma esafel ease'ena gwa'aimi, owa'.’

Ae' a'ipipa, aman ahalomai ipat ina okom napomana na'i aman anama alupunai ananinai ma nohafel nease'ana gwa'aimi, owa'. Anan okom aona ma name' aman anama falafala la'ela'ef napomana. Amama atom dei' nohafel nase'ana amamaga hiami anan nahali'anami.
Dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' pihali' God, nese'epa amamaga. Amama ipe' peagolopami, nambimb pitolom. Ipe' peha uta, nambimb God nusi'amepana.
Dei' main, emi egafis sohali' Godi, sofa' amamaga. Emi egafis sogolopa amamaga, nambimb sotolom. Ea' emi egafis seha utai, nambimb God nuwisi'amasana esis.
I'i enin so'uso'win nehali' ahalomana ma anona aol, anan ina nambimb nose'an anona yul aonai, owa'.
I'i so'uso'win nihali' ahalomana ma anona kofemb, nambimb nose'ana anona aunil aonai? Amama wapoti', owa'.
Ea' ipe' amam nematawa aopei pase'asa amamaga bu'wami atoma awasi ipe'isi, ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heven ilifi anan wapoti' nambimb nose'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai esis sahali'anai.”
Ea' Jisas nogalo'mana ambal aonai nape nasopama malogel anona amani. Nafa' nafe', ea' aman anama ambo'ona noga na'i. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi ukup matamea ma aman anama nataga bo'ona.
Ea' enis epes sa'i, “Anan natofa ambagof awami ma pepel anan dembinai ma ambagof awami agilinama Belsebul.”
Ea' enis epes sa'i sogwambana sofalana sa'i anan ata' nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai nafi'i heveni ma sotolona sogawa endilisi God nagiambamana.

Ea' anan nogawa ukup asasimi na'ipas na'i, “I'i enis epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma sondawaloga biefis sopa', ina nambimb la'ifis, owa'. I'i enis epes wambota atona sondawaloga biefis sopa, esis ina nambimb la'ifis sopa', owa'.
I'i wambota Satani sondawal biefis sopa', nambimb wambota anama la'ifis sopa' si'imama? Owa'etin. Ipe' pa'i ae' atofa ambagof awami ma pepel ambal aonai Belsebul. Na'ama ae' dei' a'ipipa basef amama.
I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma pepel Belsebuli, dei' emi nigiambama epes ipe'isi satofam? Owa'. Dei' epes isima sihi'ambepa basef amama ipe'imi owa' endilisimi.
Pepel Godi atona nagiambama ae' atofa ambagof awami. Na'ama dei' ipe' pegawa nemaf anama epes siowis wambota Godi numafias nataga ma ipe' ea'.”
“I'i anona aman la'ifinai nohapila wambawa maim nopoma ipat ananinai andeande', amamaga ananimi hiami mopen andeande'.

Ea' i'i anona aman la'ifinai endilisi nikila' aman anama ma anan notaga la'ifina nifi'i nonda' wandaf nolomana nikila'ana wambawa maim aman anama nawamona okomami, nofa' amamaga ananimi nowalogam mefe'ma anom amam.
Emi egafis owa' alupisi ae'asi owa' sepe la'ela'ef neloma ae'i, esis naumbih ae'asi. Ea' emi egafis owa' sekolasa sipsip moloma ae'asi, esis satofa sipsip mafa' mefe' atona etin.

Nemaf anama anona ambal aonai nakwaha enin epen nawisi nafi'i, anan nafe' anama fatauguma nogolopa anagon na'i neapoma noma'w. Nagolopagon owa' niti anagone ea' ni'i, ‘Ae' etanima efe' ipat fowa' apeinai.’
Ea' nafi'i nati ipat anama sambefana andeande' sofalo'mana nape.

Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai anom ambagof awami 7-peleim wapoti' mafi'i mawis mape ipat anama. Ambagof amama awami endilisi manda' waf aonai nikila' waf aonai fowa' nali' nanda'anai. Fowa' epen inima nape awen, ea' dei' nape awen endilisi nikila' pe fowa' nali' napeinai.”

Jisas ata' na'i basef amama etin, enis epes hiesi safi'i salipana. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape la'afena esis kwa'i na'ama kwa'i, “Nemata'w akwama fowa' kolaena ma kwase'ena nomambeh ine'i, akwa'w kwandanifel.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Owa'etin. Ipe' amam nematawa pame' basef Godi ma pagi'mami, ipe' pandanifel ea'.”

Amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sandakolas sape, Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae', ipe' epes aopei. Dei' pa'i piti anona ikwaf la'ifinai. Ae' owa' enda'ana. Ikwaf anama fowa' gani God nihi'amba profet Jonai atona anona nemaf ihi'ambepana ipe'.
Anona profet Jona nataga si'i anona ikwaf nihi'amba esis amam nematawa Ninivaisi. Ea' na'ama etina ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ataga ape si'i anona ikwaf Godi ma ipe' amam nematawa pape nogota anae'.

Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes, nemaf anama ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwapani gani wa'ol aon nowalama lambihilifinama kohafel koloma ipe' pape na'ae kogwamepa basef motanima milipa kwi'i ipe' epes aopei. Dei' main, kwin akwama kwapani gani etap nafe' netambela, ea' kwafi'i kwame' basefa gawa lu'unai dembinai king Solomon nawalipasanai. Ea' dei' anona nikila' Solomon nape na'ae.

Nemaf anama God nowaloga esis amam nematawa esis epes Ninivaisi sohafel sola' basef motanima milipa ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. Dei' main? Esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona na'ipasami, ea' samboma opalef sakwaha waf aonai safe'ma God. Ea' dei' anona aman nikila' Jona nape na'ae.
Epes ina sokata lamifah nomon ifagw sosapa'am sombaho'am mafe' owina maloh, owa'etin. Esis sawamonam matoma balatagw ilifa sawis sati howalagon.
Naep nomon ukup ipe'imi si'i lama alop si'ina ipe'inai. I'i ukup ipe'imi bo'om mupe, alop si'ina ipe'inai nififil hi'ilana. Ea' i'i ukup ipe'imi aom, nambimb alop ipe'inai hi'ilana akutina.
Dei' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama nafifili nape nomona ipe'i akotina.
I'i alop ipe'inai nififil hi'ilana, ina anagon kwaie'ugun akotigin, owa'. Ea' nambimb alop ipe'inai howalana hi'ilana endilisi si'i lamifah matoma mafifil mafifimipa.”
Jisas nanda' basef amama hi'alam, anona aman Farisi nofalana na'i nifi'i nea' gwa'aimi nolomana. Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat natoma tebol.
Ea' Farisi anama nati anan nafe' nape na' gwa'aimi owa' nesa'opa lagof muli' si'i waf amam Farisi mailanai. Ea' anan okom natanea ma waf anama.
Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ipe' Farisi, ipe' pandombasa kapi plet ande'am atom andeande'. Ea' nomon owa'. Ipe' opalef nomon si'ipama waf walanai naloma anona waf aonai wapoti'.
Ipe' epes ukup mahipei. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God nanda' amamaga ande'am, nomonam wapoti'.
Ea' amamaga mala nomon kahi plegw ipe'imi, amama ipe' penda'am pese' epes kwahusi pigiambamas. I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama, nambimb amamaga hiami ambo'om andeande'.

Ipe' Farisi uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami nambimb meatagamipei. Ipe' pawaloga nambawa lombo maloma akwal mamumami hiami pase'ana tu'wanim God. Ea' ipe' pindihi'ama waf bu'unai ukup maimaila Godanai ukup mase'epana nape. Waf anama naloma waf pindalali pese'ana amamaga maim Godanai, anama pekolasana pihapilana etin pilana.

Ipe' Farisi, ae' a'i uwahipipama nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei! Ukup ipe'imi mase'epa pa'i pepe siaifah bu'wami naep epesi nomon ifagw pa'i basef papeimi. Ea' esis amam nematawa seanifelipa sonda'mepa nemaf bu'unai ipe' anama epes hiesi sandatama sapoma.
Ae' a'i uwahipipa endilisi ma nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei! Ipe' si'i hiegilif mape mandambaho' etap owin, epes ina sogawam, owa'. Esis satoma safe' ilif ande' atogon.”
Anona aman gawainai nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'iam na'ama, na'i basef la'ifimi na'i afa' epes aofai.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipe' amam dembipei gawaipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ae' a'i uwahipipa ipe' wapoti' ma nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' panda' amamaga nimanimi mapei'as esis amam nematawai, noma'w nahas. Ea' ipe' owa' pigiambamas pefa' nimanimi amama lagof ipe'imi, owa'etin.
Ae' a'i uwahipipama nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei! Esis akusipa ipe'isi saha amam profet maga', ea' ipe' pala' hi'agilif amamumi.
Waf anama nawalapa basef alihim na'i ipe' pa'i a'e ma esis saha amam profet fowa'imi maga'. Ea' dei' pala' hi'agilif amamumi,
panda'am na'ama si'i God anan gawa bu'unai napeinai na'i, ‘Anona nemaf ae' esapa' anom profet moloma Aposel mefe'mago esis, ea' soha anom moga' ea' anom sonda'am kwapete'am.’
Ea' dei' amam nematawa nogota anae'isi, anona nemaf God nose'asa nimanimi ma ofagema amama saha profet hiami afum hi'alam fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' ilif etap ea' nafi'i nataga nogota anae'.

Nali'i esimbel mali'i Abeli nafi'i natagama profet esimbel Sakaraiai sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai naloma balata saofa mafis sase' Godami. Amama ofagema nambimb mila ipe' etipa dei' pape etap anae'.

Ipe' amam gawaipei pegawa mi'uli Godi, ae' a'i uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Dei' main, ipe' pakwaha ki anama pefa' gawanai. Ipe' etipa ina pawisi' uta pawis nomon, owa'. Ipe' pahopa eafa enis sa'i siowis nomoni.”

Ea' Jisas nakwaha ipat anama nawis ande', amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi wandafum kwapete'am endilisi ma magolopa anona eafa meanda'mana basef. Amam ma'i mogwamba malogel ananinai ma basef mamumami mahali'anami.
Amam mape mati anan la'ela'ef ma'i mome' anan ni'i anom basef motaga malogel ananinai ma monda'mana kot.

Nemaf anama do'ok enis amam nematawa hiesi endilisi safi'i sonduwa'anima endilisi sandafofo'asanama etin bo'wagah asasimi. Ea' Jisas nali' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma yis amama amam Farisi. Basef ofagema ma yis amama ma'i waf baso'mainai ma'i malogof biam.
Amamaga mape mandambahi'i, anona nemaf motaga alihim. Amamaga mandambaho' mape, anona nemaf hiesi sotolom alihim.
Ea' basef hiami ipe' panda'am owambi anona nemaf sotolom alip. Ea' basef ipe' pa'iam so'uso'umbili ifagw nomoni, nambimb sotoma ifagw ilif sowalapam alihim.
Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' a'ipipa na'ama. Ipe' owa' umbamohepama esis soha alop atona neaga'i ea' anona nemaf esis ina la'ifisa sonda' anom amamaga wapoti', owa'.
Ea' ae' ata' i'ipipa aman ipe' umbamiehipamanai. Anama nohepa peaga'i, ea' anona nemaf wapoti' la'ifinai ma neakwahipa pefe' wambel aonai hel. Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' umbamiehipamanai, aman anama atona.
Ipe' pegawa, epes satala amiguf sa'umi wanom biam otamba 2 toea. Ea' God ina okom mase'ana anona amil sa'unai na'amainai, owa'.
Endilisi, Anan neambam auf malo balagah ipe'imi God neambam dondo' hi'alam. Ipe' owa' umbamehepa. Anan okom napoma ipe' pikila' amiguf hiami amama sa'umi.
Ae' a'ipipa, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Emi egafis sewalapa agel Ae'anai ma amam nematawa hiesi, anona nemaf ae' ewalapa agof epes isima ma naep amam ensel Godi.
Ea' emi egafis sowa' alafugaha Ae'i naep amam nematawai, anona nemaf ae' ewa' alafuga esis ma naep amam ensel Godi.

Emi egafis seanda' anom basef awami findiwama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb God nokwahomasa awami esis sanda'ami. Ea' emi egafis sanda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi, anona nemaf God owa'etin endilisi ma neakwaha findiwa anama aonai ma epes isima.

Nambimb esis sofa' ipe' pefe' piowis ifagw amama esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi o sofa'epa pefe'ma naep amam dembemi gavman moloma agufumi monda'mepa kot, ipe' ina umbamohepa, owa'. Ipe' ina pi'i, ‘Nambimb ape' mi'i basef mi'imama? Nambimb mi'i maim basef?’ Owa'.
Dei' main, nogota anama atona Ambal Bu'unai Godi nihi'ambepa maim basef atuwasi peagwami.”
Anona aman atotona ma amam nematawa hiesi anan na'ipa Jisas na'ama na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ine' ni'ipa sahalome ae'anai nowaloga amamaga amama ahalomafai nese'e amamaga wa'am.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' andaiwa'! Emi nandandepa ae' ma epe eawaloga amamaga ma ipe'? Owa'etin.”
Ea' anan na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma ipe' ina kowalepama anom amamaga. Epen amamaga hiamini endilisi, ina nefa' ambal namunai ma amamaga amama ananimi, owa'.”
Ea' nase'asa anom basef womun etin na'i, “Aof anona aman otamba hiamunai nola gwa'aimi hiami.
Aman anama okom napoma anan atona na'i, ‘Dei' ae' ata' enda'am i'imama? Ae' ifagw a'e ma etama gwa'aimi ae'ami hiami imbe'am mea'ome.’
Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' enda'am na'ama. Etala ifagw ae'ami ea' ila' dambaimi lu'wami mikila' fowa'imi. Ama nambimb ikolasom ewa'aniam gwa'aimi wit hiami moloma amamaga hiami bu'wami ae'ami mo'oh ifagw amama.
Ea' i'ipa ae' i'i, “Ine' nape andeande'. Amamaga hiami bu'wami mape mondahama afagof hiami. Ea' dei' nepoma noma'w nea' gwa'aimi embel nendanifel nepe.” ’
Ea' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' aman nahaga nagouli! Dei' owamb anae' igi ambal ine'inai nega'. Ea' amamaga amama hiami ine' nanda'am nandondombam ma'ihi, amama nambimb emi nefa'am?’
Amama na'ama etin si'i epes satama amamaga hiami asasimi atom sambe'am ma'oh. Esis amamaga a'asa naep Godi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina ukup motamea mefe' ma ambagof ipe'imi ea' pi'i, ‘Ape' ata' mea' main?’ Owa'. Ipe' ina ukup motamea ma alop ipe'inai pi'i, 'Nambimb ape' monda' main mombahe' alop ape'inai?’ Owa'.
Dei' main, ambagof afa'imi ina gwa'aimi atom. Ea' alop ina luwaguf atom, owa'.
Ipe' ukup mopoma amiguf. Amiguf owa' mowa gwa'aimi, mola' gwa'aimi. Ea' owa' mefa' gwa'aimi membe'am ifagw amamumi. God atona nase'am gwa'aimi. Ea' ipe' epes pikila' amiguf amama endilisi.
Ipe' emi atuwasi la'ifina okom natanea nawis niwatania anona nemaf wapoti' ma ambal ananai nope nogota laona wapoti'? Owa'etin.
I'i ipe' owa' la'ifipama penda' anom amamaga sa'usa'umi na'ama, dei' maina ipe' ukup ipe'imi motamea ma anom amamaga mamumami wapoti'?

Ipe' ata' ukup mopoma afis. Amam ina manda' maol ina manda' luwaguf maim, owa'etin. Ea' ae' a'ipipa, fowa' gani anona aman amamaga hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi, sosaf ananinai ina bo'ona si'i afis amama, owa'etin.

Otalef amama dei' ata' motawa aof ama naman atef sotopa'am sokwahom mefe' nif. Otalef amama awami God nofalo'mam. Ea' ipe' amam nematawa pikila' otalef amama. Ea' dei' ipe' pembale'efa basef Godi, bale'ef ipe'inai ina la'ifina, ipe' pegawa endilisi anan numafipa andeande' wapoti'.
Ea' ipe' ina ukup motamea pi'i, ‘Nambimb mea' gwa'aimi embel eti?’ Owa'. Ipe' ina ukup aom motamea ma amamaga amama, owa'.
Epes sololama Godi ukup matamea mafe' endilisi ma sogolopa amamaga amama hiami. Ea' ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heveni anan nogawa ea' amamaga amama a'ipei.
Ipe' ata' ukup mili' pegolopa waf bu'unai noloma piwis wambota Godi numafipa pili', ea' nese'epa amamaga amama ipe' wapoti'.
Ipe' epes si'i sipsip kwaie'umi ina umbamohepa, owa'. Ahalomepa ipe'inai okom bo'ona ma ipe' piowis wambota ananinai numafipa.

Ipe' pese'asa amamaga hiami ipe'imi ma enis epes sotalomepam, ea' pefa' otamba pewalogam pese' isima kwahusi pigiambamas. Ipe' penda' maol pegolopa paos otambaimi anona nemaf owa' motaga aom. Ipe' pekolasa otamba wiga maim amamaga bu'wami atom heven ilif nemaf owa' hegilialami. Anama sakowalefi ina suwis sokowalopam, owa'. Sopafowa maim owa' meatotopa'am hiahaom, owa'.
Dei' main, maina wambel amamaga bu'wami ipe'imi ma'oma, wambel anama atona anona nemaf ukup ipe'imi wapoti' meapoma.
Ipe' penda' luwaguf ipe'imi bandam, pewaho' legw, ea' pekata lamifah pendondombol pindumafuma pepe.
Ipe' pepe si'i epes sape sahafa aman dembinai asasinai na'i nokwaha gwa'aimi lu'wami sandase'amai notanima nifi'i. I'i nifi'i noha uta ipat ananinai, esis suwisi'manana mehip.

Andeande'ma amam manda' maoli mundumafuma mope miti dembinai amamunai nifi'i notoloma mondanifel. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nambimb dembinai nili' nowaho' lowaf bandana nowaho' let, ama nonda'mam gwa'aimi. Ea' ni'ipam motoma tebol ea' anan nifi'i nease'am gwa'aimi.
Anan nifi'i amaneta la'afina o noloma awatagw muli' meanda'am, o maina nogota, ma nieti amam mundumafuma mope, amam mondanifel.

Ipe' ukup mopoma anom basef womun etin. I'i ofagenama ipati nili' nogawa nogota nanda' wali neafi'ianai ma nundumafuma nope, nanda' wali ina nambimb nifi'i nupusila ipat ananinai nuwis nomon, owa'etin.
Ipe' wapoti' pundumafuma pepen. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ifi'i anona nemaf ipe' ina pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf anama, owa'.”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, basef amama womun etini ine' nase'afam afa' atofa, o esis amam nematawa hiesi wapoti'?”

Ea' Dembinai na'i, “Emi egafis gawaisi sape sanda' maol andeande' panda' waf bu'unai? Epes isima dembinai asasinai nambimb nondandepas ma sumafi ananimi manda' maoli ma sease'ama gwa'aimi amam nogota dembinai na'ianai.
Anona nemaf dembinai asasinai notanima nifi'i ma nieti esis isima sanda' maol andeande', esis isima sendanifel.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, dembinai ananinai anona nemaf nondandepasa sope dambesi sumafi amamaga ananimi hiami.

Ea' i'i epes isima ukup mapoma opalef asasimi atom ea' si'i, 'Dembinai ape'inai ina nambimb nifi'i ulal, owa'etin.’ Ama esis sohafel soha enis amam nematawa sanda' maoli, sa' gwa'aimi embel da gwa' sonda' spak sape.

Esis i'i sonda'am na'ama, dembinai asasinai nambimb notanima nifi'i anona nemaf esis isima ina nambimb si'i dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Dembinai nifi'i nogota anama esis ukup mease'asanama. Nifi'i nohambombaga esis isima endilisi, ea' nonda'asa sope soloma epes owa' seambale'efa Godi seapoma.
Emi egafis sanda' maola anani, esis segawa ea' ma okom dembinai asasinai, ea' esis owa' seandondomba amamaga siela nomonas dembinai, anona nemaf dembinai nohas mehip endilisi.

Ea' emi egafis sanda' maoli owa' seagawa okom dembinai asasinai ma seanda' waf nendahama esis sefa' nimanimi, nambimb dembinai nohas sa'ombel. Ea' emi egafis enis sease'asa amamaga hiami, anona nemaf epes isima si'ipas sogwamasam amamaga wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis enis sease'asa amamaga hiami sase'as sumafiami, anona nemaf epes isima si'ipas sogwamasam wapoti' mikila' fowa' sali' sase'asami.
Ae' afi'i ma ekata nif etap anae' ea' a'i nif amama dei' fendom lu'um. Owa', ata' owa'.
Ea' ae' okom na'i efa' anom baptais. Dei' ae' owa' ata' efa'am, okom ae'anai aona endilisi ma ehafa efa' baptais amama.
Ipe' pa'i ae' afi'i ma indiwa wandaf hianai netaga etap anae' ma hiesi sope opalef awanem? Owa'. Ae' a'ipipa, ae' afi'i ma ewala epes esis amam nematawa hiesi.
Ama dei', anona nemaf wapoti' epes wanis bias sope ipat atotona wambota atotona sondawaloga biefis. Wenis soloma bias sifitap ea' bias soloma wenis sifitap ea' na'ama etin.

Nambimb esis sondawaloga, anona aman noloma ahalomana ananinai mondawaloga biefim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma mama'wakw ondawaloga biefiwa, ea' mefi'makw ako'ukwi koloma ma'makw kwandagi'mokwi ondowaloga biefiwa.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pati otaga natefi gani aon newalama, mehip ipe' pa'i, ‘Atuwasi asaf a' nelai’ ea' asaf a' nalai.
Ea' ipe' pati uf la'ifinai naluwi aon natopa'ima wa'ol nataga, ipe' pa'i, ‘Atuwasi owaf a' nuluwi la'ifina.’ Endilisi, naluwi la'ifina na'ama etin.
Ipe' epes pa'i malogof biamipei! Ipe' pati ikwaf hianai ilifanai etapanai andeande', ea' dei' ipe' owa' peagawa ikwaf nogota anae' andeande'.”
“Dei' maina ipe' owa' powaloga waf bu'unai?

Nemaf anama ipe' pefe' peloma epen inima na'i nenda' kotimipei, ipe' ata' pefe' eaf, nogota anama pese'ana okom pewalapa amama pi'iam peloman. Na'ama epen inima nenda'epa penda' basefa amama ma jas nonda'epa pefe'ma polisman ea' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina nambimb pekwaha ipat anama sanda' kalabusanai ulal, owa'. Ama peagwa amamaga lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'inai hi'ilana, pefe'.”
Nemaf anama atona enis epes sape sa'ipa Jisasa enis epes Galilisi. Nemaf anama fowa' esis sape sondolalima God sanda' ofa etin, gavman dembinai Pailat nahas saga'.
Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ipe' ukup mandanda'mas ma'i epes isima sa'i sikila' enis epes Galilisi sanda' waf aonai, ama ofagema amama atom dei' sofa' nimanimi amama saga'?
Ae' a'ipipa owa'etin endilisi! I'i ipe' owa' pemboma opalefa waf aonai ipe'inai, anona nemaf ipe' hipei pega' na'ama etin si'i esis.
Dei' si'i main enis epes isima 18-peleis wambel anama Siloam ipat launai nato nahas saga' hi'alas? Amama ipe' pa'i waf aonai asasinai nikila' waf aonai enis epes sape Jerusalemi?
Owa'etin. I'i ipe' owa' pemboma opalefa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, anona nemaf ipe' hipei pega' na'ama etin si'i esis.”
Ea' Jisas nawalapa anom basef wamon etin na'i, “Anona aman nawa anona lawag fik aof ananinai nawa wain. Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', su'utipa lawag anama owa' nili.
Ea' na'ipa anan nanda' maol aof anamai na'i, ‘Neme'. Afagof wanom ae' afi'i agolopa su'utip lawag anama fik, owa' nili. Na'ama dei' ine' lena. Dei' main netawa nefa' ifat atona etap etin?’
Ea' anan nanda' maol aofi nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' ata' kwahona notawa afagel anae' atona. Ama ata' ela' etap noloma umba bulmakaum esembe'ana.
Ama iti nambimb niema su'utip afagel anae' o owa'. I'i owa', wila ine' nelena.’ ”
Nemaf anama esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Jisas na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa anona ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nomon.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w ambal aonai napei'wi kwape, ambal anama aonai nanda'akw awasi'w kwape afagof 18-peleim ea' alafuga akwa'unai nondala'akw, ina kohafel kwaitu andeande', owa'etin.
Ea' Jisas natolo'w nofala'w kwafi'i na'ipakw na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' atofa awes ine'inai dei' nataga bo'wena.”
Anan nasa lagel ananinai nemata'w akwama ea' mehip kwaitu usi'ikw. Ea' kwafela agel Godi lu'una.

Ea' aman anama numafi ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai okom wandafuna ma Jisas nanda'akw kwataga bo'okw nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai. Ea' anan na'ipa esis amam nematawa na'i, “Nimeguf amama wanom wanom sanda' maolanami. Ea' dei' ipe' pi'i aman anama notofamepa awes ipe'inai, andeande'ma pifi'i nemaf anama sanda' maolananai. Ea' ipe' ina pifi'mai maol anama ma nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai.”
Ea' Dembinai nagwamana basef na'i “Ipe' amam pa'i malogof biamipei! Peme! Nemaf mapoma noma'wanai ipe' hipei pafe' ifagw bulmakauwi ma patagaha bulmakau maloma donki ipe'imi pao'wam mafe' ma' embel.
Ea' nemata'w akwama kwataga wambota Abrahami, Satan nowa'akw la'ifikw kwape afagof 18-peleim. Ea' dei' nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai ae' a'i etagaha mandof nowa'akwi ma kweape wafifi'w.”
Jisas na'iam na'ama, nanda' esis naumbih ananisi ambagof aom kwapete'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sandanifel endilisi ma amamaga bu'wami la'ifimi hiami anan nanda'ami.
Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti na'i, “Epes siowis wambota Godi numafias si'i main? Ae' indila'wifam i'imama?

Amama si'i anom nalelef so'uso'umi ape' mofalam ma'i mastet. Anona aman nofa' nalelef amama nawam aof ananinai. Anom nimeguf mafe' ea' mataga malo si'i lawah lu'wami ea' amiguf mafi'i mala' alegah mailam.”
Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' a'i indila'wifa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias i'imama?
Ae' indila'wifama anom yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'am kwambomam maloma plaua hiami. Ea' mafe' mawis plawa hiami manda'am matef lu'um.”
Jisas nafe' wambel hiagoma lu'wagoma sa'ogoma nape felefele'ma eaf nafe' Jerusalemi nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa, ea' nafe' okom na'i nefe' Jerusalem ea' nafe'.
Ea' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ihali'ina ma epes isima anona nemaf God nofa'as seatanimani. Isima hiesi o kwaie'wis?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i,
“Ipe' pepe la'ifipa penda' maol lu'unai endilisi, pefe' piwis uta sa'unai. Dei' main, epes hiesi anona nemaf si'i suwis nomon, ea' owa' la'ifisi.
Anona nemaf ofagena ma ipati nohafel nowalowa uta ipat anama. Ea' ipe' pifi'i pitu peha uta ande' pefalana na'ama pi'i, ‘Dembinai, usi'amapa uta.’
Ea' nogwamepa basef ni'i, ‘Ipe' enimaipei? Ae' owa' egaopei, ipe' enimaipei?’
Ea' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Ape' mape ma' gwa'aimi embel malomena, nape nawalapa basef na'ipapa wambel ape'inai.’
Ea' anan anona nemaf nogwa basef ni'i, ‘Ipe' enimaipei? Ae' owa' egaopei. Ipe' epes panda' waf aonai, ipe' si'amae!’

Anona nemaf ipe' piti Abraham noloma Aisak noloma Jekop moloma profet amama hiami mope wambel Godi ea' ipe' owa'. Ipe' nogalo'mepa pepe ande'. Anama pelef mehip pena' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' pepe.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sifi'i gani aon natefima nowalama naso'ma noloma anama wa'owa'ol esis sope sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami wambel Godi.
A'e endilisi, enis epes dei' sataga sagi'i agof a'asi, anona nemaf sefa' agof lu'wami sope sili'. Ea' enis dei' sataga sali'i sofa' agof lu'wami anona nemaf agof a'as setaga sigi'.”
Nogota anama atona anom amam Farisi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nekwaha wambel anae' fo'o anagon. Dei' main, Herot na'i nehena nega'.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fo'o pi'ipa aman anama nanda' do'ufi douf si'i nombat aolopunai pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dei' naman wapoti' ae' etofa ambagof awami mape epesi, ea' enda' awes nanda'asi setaga bo'wes. Anom nimeguf mefe' ea', nemaf nefe'ma wenifi hi'ilana, embefa maol ae'anai hi'ilana.’
Ea' dei' naman bimb ae' efe' enda' maol anama. Ina andeande'ma esis soha anona profet noga' anona wambel, owa'. Sehana noga' Jerusalem atagon.

Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipe' paha amam profet afumi, pakwaha otamba paha amam God nasapa'am mafe'mai ipe'i, la'ela'ef ae' a'i ekolasa ipe' epes hipei si'i awata numa'inai nowa'ani nogami nakolasom mawis behenagof ananimi. Owa'etin, ipe' pandaiwa'.
Ipe' peme'! Dei' ipat bu'unai naloma wambel ipe'inai atuwasi wafina notawa etin. Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina petolowe wapoti' ma nambimb pie'i,
‘Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anama nafi'i agel Dembinai.’ ”
Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat Jisas nafe' naloma anona aman Farisi na' gwa'aimi ipat ananinai. Ea' esis sanda'ana naep di'indi'ana endilisi.
Anona aman lagufi bo'wagah malatawana kwapete'i nape Jisas opafunama.
Ea' Jisas nati aman anama, nahali' amam gawaimi mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi na'i, “A'i afa' onda' aman awes nanda'anai bo'ona nemaf anama Sabat mapoma noma'wanai, o owa'?”
Ea' amam masopama malogof. Ea' nahapila aman anama nanda'ana bo'ona nasapa'ana nafe'.

Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai awani ananini o anona bulmakau ananinai sowala hul lounai nemaf anama Sabat sapoma noma'wanai, a'i aman anama ahalomas asasinai nefe' nigiasi mehip nemaf anama o owa'? Endilisi, nefe' nigiasi.”
Ea' amam basef a'am.
Ea' Jisas nati esis safi'mai gwa'aimi amama sa'i sope siaifah bu'wami matawa sali'i bo'wagoma atogon. Ea' na'ipasa basef womun etin na'i,

“I'i anona aman nofalepama anom gwa'aimi lu'wami sonda'ama aman naso' nemata'wi ma pefe', ipe' owa' pefe' petoma pili' siaifah bu'wami amam dambami atom matomami, owa'. Na'ama aman anama nofo'o nofalai anona aman agel lu'unai nikila' agel ine'inai.
Ama aman anama nofalena nifi'i ni'ipina ni'i, ‘Ine' kwahomana sia inima bu'wani aman anae'.’ Nonda'am na'ama, ine' ambal aona endilisi. Ea' nonda'ena nefe' nepe nigi'i ipat basagaf.

Ea' i'i anona aman nofalena nefe' nea' gwa'aimi nelomana, ine' nefe' nepe nigi' ipat basagaf. Nenda'am na'ama ma atuwasi nofalena nie'i, ‘Alupinai, ine' nifi'i nepe nili' bo'ogoma!’ Anan nonda'am na'ama, atuwasi nefa' agel lu'unai ma naep epes isima hiesi sa' gwa'aimi salominai.
Dei' main, epes emi egafis sefela agof asasimi atom, God nonda'as sisila'. Ea' epes emi egafis senda' agof asasimi misila'i, anona nemaf God nefela agofa esis.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anama nahali'ana nafe'ma gwa'aimi amama na'i, “I'i ine' nenda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami o sa'umi, ine' owa' nefala alupisi soloma sahin owan wambota ine'isi wambel atona amamaga hiamisi, owa'. I'i nenda'am na'ama, nambimb esis sofalena ma nefe' nea' gwa'aimi ifagw asasimi, ea' sogwamena gwa'aimi ine'imi.
Ine' nenda' gwa'aimi lu'wami, nefala isima kwahusa amamagai, bo'wagah awomisi, naep mase'asi.

Epes isima ina la'ifisa sogwamena gwa'aimi ine', owa'. I'i ine' nenda'am na'ama, nendanifel nepe andeande'. Ea' anona nemaf God nogwamena amamaga amama bu'wami nemaf anama epes isima sanda' waf bu'unai saga'i sohafel wapoti'.”
Anona aman asasinai na' gwa'aimi nalomas name' basef amama, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Emi egafis sepe sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami wambel Godi, esis sendanifel.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef womun etin wapoti' na'i, “Anona aman na'i nonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami. Ea' nofalai epes hiesi safi'mai gwa'aimi amama.
Nemaf danda' endilisi ma gwa'aimi amama mataga, ea' nasapa' anona nanda' maola anani nafe' na'ipa epes isima fowa' nofalasi. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipe' fi'i. Amamaga hiami mandandombam mape ea'.’
Ea' epes isima hiesi atona etin sohafel sa'i basef sa'i esis ina safe', owa'. Anona aman na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma efo'o. Ata' efe' etopa'ma aof ae'anai.’
Ea' anona na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' atala bulmakau 10-peleim monda' maol mowala etap, ea' dei' efe' endondomam. Ea' ae' ina efo'o.’
Ea' anona na'i, ‘Dei' etef ae' aso' nemata'w. Na'ama ae' ina efo'o, owa'.’

Ea' aman anama nanda'mana maoli notanima nafe' na'ipa dembinai ananinai ma amama. Ea' ofagenama ipati opaf wandafuna ea' na'ipa nanda'mana maoli na'i, ‘Ine' mehip fo'o eaf hianai lu'unama sa'onama ma taun anama ea' nefa'ai isima falafisi, naep mase'asi, lagof bo'wagah awomisi ine' ne'wasi sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'anai.’
Ea' aman anama nanda' maolananai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' aila basef ine'imi ea', ati ipat ina dei' si'ina, ata' owa'.’
Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' fo'o eaf hianai lu'unama sa'onama nila indalelemb nefe' aof ea' ni'ipasa basef la'ifimi sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'anai ma si'ina.
Ae' a'ipina endilisi, epes isima hiesi fowa' ali' efalasi, dei' andaiwa' ma sea' gwa'aimi ae'ami.’ ”
Amam nematawa hiesi safi'i saloma Jisas, ea' nandamboma na'ipas na'i,

“Emi egafis sifi'mai Ae', ma esis owa' sesambala mamasas wauhiamas wauhupawa batawisas asasisi soloma sahin owan wambota asasinai, ea' ambagof asasimi wapoti', esis ina nambimb sepe la'ifis sepe alupisi ae'asi, owa'.
Ae' efa' nimanim awami anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Emi egafis owa' senda'am na'ama etin si'i ae' ma sieili, epes isima ina la'ifis setaga alupisi ae'asi, owa'.

Enin epen ipe'ini i'i nenda' anona ipat lu'unai nolata ilif, enin nenda'am ni'imama? Enin ata' nope nomonas motamea andeande' nili' ma nogawa andeande' otamba amama nanda' ipatami. Nambimb otamba ananimi mondahama ipat anama hi'ilana o owa'?
I'i owa'etina nenda' amama meali', ma nili' nonda' simen etina owa' nonda' ipat anama hi'ilana. Nambimb epes hiesi satolonai si'i basef aman anama sonda' findiwana
si'iam si'i, ‘Epen inima nasefela ipat anama, ea' enin owa' la'ifin nembefanae.’

Anom basef wapoti' amama. I'i anona aman dembinai king ni'i nofe' nopa' noloma anona king, anan ata' nope okom notanea andeande'. Soldia ananimi 10-tausen etin, ea' king anama nagi'i anan nifi'i noloma soldia ananimi hiami 20-tausen. Ea' king anama nali'i na'i ata' nili' nogawa na'ama. Anan nambimb nopa' noloma king anama nagi'i la'ifinama notofam o owa'?
Anan nonda'am na'ama ma i'i nogawa anan ina la'ifina, naumbih ananimi ata' mopani laogon, nili' nosapa' anom amam mofe'ma anan mofalana mi'ipana basef mi'i wandaf hapainai.
Ea' ipe' na'ama etin. Ipe' emi egafipa owa'etina pewa' alafugah ma amamaga ipe'imi ma pesambalom, ipe' ina nambimb la'ifipa pepe alupipei ae'ipei, owa'.
Ipe' pegawa sol amama bu'wami. Ea' i'i sol amama mumbul owa' usihim, owa'etin. Nambimb ipe' penda'am pi'imama usihim wapoti'? Owa'.
Sol amama ina bo'oma ape' monda'am aof, o mokwahom moloma umba bulmakaum, owa'etin. Ape' mokwahom etin. Emi egafipa aligah magalipei pame' basefi, pilam.”
Epes hiesi saloma anom mofa' takisi maloma enis epes sanda' waf aonai safi'i felefele'ma Jisas same' basef ananimi.
Ea' amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi manda' megah mahama anan ma'i, “Aman anama naloma epes isima sanda' waf aonai nofalas alupisi nalomas na gwa'aimi.”
Ea' Jisas nase'ama basef amama womun etin na'ipam na'i,

“I'i anona aman ipe'inai numafi anom sipsip 100-peleim ama anona atotona hegililana, aman anama ata' nokwaha sipsip amama 99-peleim mitu mea' otalef anagon, anan ata' nefe' nogolopa anona hegilalanai. Nogolopana nafe' nafe' natolona nafelana
nowandefana ekaf ananinai, nandanifel nefa'ana nafi'i.

Nafi'i nataga ipat ananinai, nofalai esis alupisi ananisi saloma esis wambel atona sandakolas etifigin. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipe' pendanifel peloma ae'! Anona sipsip ae'anai hegilalana, ea' ae' afe' agolopana atolona efa'anai ea'.’ ”

Dei' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa na'ama etina esis amam nematawa sape heven ilifi sandanifel ma epes isima 99-peleis ambo'wes, ina sanda' waf aonai ma sotanima somboma opalef, owa'. Ea' i'i enin epen nenda' waf aonai ni'i nemboma opaf, esis sape heven ilifi sondanifel endilisi ma enin. Danifel asasinai nikila' sandanifela epes isima sape bu'wasi.

I'i ano'w nemata'w anona moni 10-peleina siliwa anona atotona higililana, atuwasi konda' maina kogolopana kwutolona? Akwa'w kwakata lam kombefagon ipat nomon kogolopana andeande' hi'alagon kofe' kofe' ma kwatolona.

Akwa'w kwatolona ea', kofala esis alupisi wambel akwa'unai sondakolasi ea' kwi'ipas kwi'i, ‘Ipe' pendanifel peloma ae'! Anona moni ae'anai higilalana, ea' dei' agolopana afa' atolona etanima efa'anai ea'.’
Dei' ae' a'ipipa na'ama etin si'i amam ensel Godi mandanifela enin epen nanda' waf aonai nemboma opaf nafe'ma God.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Anona aman batausan biam.
