Aonama awagufunai nafe' na'ipa ahalomana ananinai na'i, 'Ahalome, ae' okom napoma otamba maim amamaga afa' ofa'ami ma nemaf ine' nega'. Dei' ae' a'i efa' tu'wanim ae'ami. Ine' niwalom biefim newalogamafam afa' biafa. Ae' a'i ine' nese'eam dei'.’
Ea' ahalomam nawaloga amamaga hiami ananimi mafe'ma amam batausana biam.

Ea' ina ata' nogota laona aonama awagufunai nefa' amamaga hiami ananimi nafe' napani anona wambel laogoma ea' nase'asam amamaga hiami ananimi ma waf naninani aonai anan naila okom ananinai na'i neanda'anai. Ea' otamba ananimi hi'alama ma waf aonai.
Anan nakwaha otamba ananimi hi'alam, nogota nolomahasanai nataga lu'una etap anama hiagoma hi'alagon. Ea' anan amamaga a'ana nape wafina.
Ea' anan nafe' nanda' maola anona aman etap anamainai. Aman anama nasapa'ana nafe' etap ananinai ma numafi bogof ananimi.
Bogof amama ma' su'utip lawahim, ea' anan wapoti' na'i nea' su'utip amama ma opaf ananinai. Anan ina enis sase'ana gwa'aimi, owa'.
Anan nape na'ama anom nimeguf, okom ananinai nogawa andeande' ea' na'iam na'i, ‘Amam hiami manda' maola ahalome ae'anai amam gwa'aimi hiami endilisi. Ea' ae' ape na'ae nolomahe endilisi.
Hapaimi, ae' atuwasi ehafel efe'ma ahalome ae'anai. Ea' i'ipana i'i, “Ahalome, ae' anda' waf aonai ma God ine' wapoti'.
Dei' ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma ine' nefala ae' nogalomena ine'iwei, owa'. Ine' nenda'e epe si'i anona nanda'mena maoli.” ’
Ea' nohafel nafe'ma ahalomana.
Ea' anan ata' nafi'i laogon ahalomana natolona, okom nainailana endilini nasagih nafe' nahapilana nombalo'ana nasisi' dalogw.
Ea' nogalomana na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahalome, ae' anda' waf aonai ma God ine' wapoti'. Ae' ina ata' aman bu'uwei ma ine' nefala ae' ni'i nogalomena ine'iwei, owa'etin.’

Ea' ahalomana na'ipa amam manda' maola anani na'i, ‘Ipe' fa'ai lowaf bu'unai launai namunai ae'anai pefa'ana pifi'i ulal pewaho'manana anan. Ea' pelamana anona ring faf ananinai, pelamana su bo'wagah ananimi.
Fa'ai bulmakau noganai anama lu'unai gigititi'i pehana ma ape' mea'ana mondanifel molomana.
Dei' main, nogalome anama ae'anai andowelamana si'i naga'i, ea' dei' ambal napaina wapoti'. Anan higilalana ea', dei' matolona wapoti'.’
Ea' esis sandanifel salomana.
Ea' nogalomana dembenama napani aof nafi'i. Ea' anan nafi'i nataga felefele'ma ipat, name' maguf sanda' musik salemb.
Ea' nofala anona nanda' maoli nahali'ana na'i, ‘Esis sanda' main?’

Ea' anan nanda' maoli na'ipana na'i, ‘Owalomena ine'inai notanima nafi'i, ea' ahalomena ine'inai nandanifel nalomana, na'ama dei' naha anona bulmakau lu'unai. Dei' main, anan notanimai ina ata' nape aona, owa'. Nape andeande'.’
Ea' nogalomana dembenama okom wandafuna ea' nandaiwa'ma nuwis nomon ipat. Ea' ahalomana nawisi ande' na'ipana mehipa nuwis nomon, owa'etin.

Anan nagwamana basef ahalomana na'i, ‘Afagof hiami ae' ahapila maol ine'inai si'i agel a'e anda' maol atona. Ae' ina esambala basef mi'uli ine'imi anona nemaf, owa'. Ea' ine' owa' nese'e anom amamaga so'umi atom si'i meme noganai ma eandanifel eloma alupisi ae'asi, owa'etin.
Ea' sa'usa'uni anama ine'inai anan nase'awa amamaga hiami ine'imi ma awau nematawa gembaiwai. Ea' dei' notanimai, ine' okom napomana dei' nahamana bulmakau anama anan.’
Ea' ahalomana na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogalome, la'ela'ef afa' biafa wape etifigin. Ea' amamaga ae'ami amama ine'imi atom.

Ea' dei' afa' ondanifel, opalef afa'imi mope bo'om. Dei' main, owalomena anama ine'inai fowa' nafe' laogon si'i naga'i, ea' dei' nafi'i nataga ambal napaina wapoti'. Anan higilalana, ea' dei' afa' watolona wapoti'.’ ”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Anona aman amamaga hiamunai nao'wa anona ananinai numafi opeh ananimi nape. Ea' enis safi'mai anan sambaso'mana anan nanda'mana opehi ma basef sa'i, ‘Numafi maol ine'imi anan nakwaha otamba hiami ine'imi mafe' etin.’

Ea' nofala aman anama numafi maoli nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dei' maina basef anama ae' ame'ama ine'? Ine' nefe' niamba amamaga ae'ami mape lagel ine'inai newalapam. Ina ata' nepe nimafi maol ae'anai wapoti', owa'.’
Ea' numafi maoli okom natanea na'i, ‘Ae' nambimb ata' enda'am i'imama? Dembinai na'i nigalo'me ma epe imafi maol dei'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma ewala etap. Ea' ambal aona indaila enis epesa gwa'aimi maim.
Ea' ae' okom natanea ma anom amamaga eanda'ama nambimb epes sofa'e efe' ifagw asasimi ma nemaf anama dembinai nigalo'me ma maol anama dei' anda'anai.’
Ea' nofala amam hiami atona etin wialef mataomami mafi'mai anan. Anona aman nali' nafi'manai nahali'ana na'i, ‘Ine' wialef ma'um mapoma dembinai ae'anai?’
Ea' anan na'i, ‘Darep wel lu'wami 100-peleim.’
Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' mehip nepe niti tiketa wiaf nenda' amefa darep 50-peleim atom mil.’
Ea' anona nataga nahali'ana na'i, ‘Wialef ine'imi ma'um?’
Ea' anan na'i, ‘Begah witim 100-peleim.’
Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nefa' tiket anama wiaf ine'inai nailanai ea' nenda' 80-peleim.’

Ea' aman dembinai nafela agela aman anama aonai numafi maoli. Dei' main, anan nanda' waf gawainai si'i aman nomonas mapeinai. Epes ukup asasimi maimaila amamaga maim mape etap anae' esis sanda' maola waf gawainai si'i epes nomonas mapeisi sikila' epes sape howalagon owa' segawa andeande'i.”

Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ma moni wiga maim ma'oh etap anae', ipe' penda' enis amam nematawa sotaga alupisi ipe'isi. Ea' i'i nemaf esis sohapila wiga monianai hi'ilana, anona nemaf God nofa'epa pefe' ifagw mape ilif heveni pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.

Emi egafis sumafi amamaga sa'umi andeande', anona nemaf sumafi amamaga lu'wami andeande' wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis sembaso'am, owa' seanda' maol andeande'ma amamaga sa'usa'umi, anona nemaf esis ina senda' amamaga lu'wami andeande' wapoti', owa'etin.
I'i ipe' owa' pimafi moni wiga maim mape etap anae', anona nemaf emi nese'epa amamaga bu'wami endilisi pimafiam? Owa'etin endilisi.
I'i ipe' owa' pimafi amamaga enis epesi, emi nese'epa amamaga ipe'imi atom pimafiam? Owa'etin.

Ina enin epen nanda' maoli la'ifin nihapila maol biefina amam dambami biam, owa'etin. Na'ama okom nila anona, anona nesambalona. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' ina la'ifipa pepe owina God noloma wigai moni wapoti', owa'.”

Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' panda' maol ma epes hiesi sitilipa si'i ipe' epes bu'upei. Ea' God nogawa ukup ipe'imi nomon. Amamaga epes safela agofami satalom otamba lu'wami, amama falafumi atoma naep Godi.

Basef amam profet mawalipasami maloma basef mail mi'uli God nase' Mosesanai amama amam mawalipasam la'ela'ef mape mafi'i metambel nogota Jon nataganai. Ea' nogota anama Joni nafi'i nataga dei' basef bu'wami ma epes siowis wambota Godi numafias, amama mape mafe' mataga wambel hiagoma. Ea' epes hiesi la'ifis sanda' maol mehip ma sefe' siowis wambota Godi numafias.
Anom basef tu'wanima
amef sa'usa'umi moloma anom basef bandami mail nomona buk mi'uli Godi ina anona nemaf mefe' higililam hi'ilam, owa'etin. Mope la'ela'ef hihif na'ama etin. Ea' etap naloma otaga anona nemaf hegililam.

Emi egalin nakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nease' ano'w nemata'w wapoti', anan nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama nali' nase'akwi. Ea' emi egalin naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' anona aman nagalo'makwi aman anama nagi' nase'akwi wapoti' nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama.
Anona aman amamaga hiamunai nape. La'ela'ef anan nala siaogw bu'wami atom luwaguf bu'wami satalom otamba lu'wami. Ea' nimeguf hiami nefa' gwa'aimi bu'wami atom nape andeande' endilisi.
Ea' felefele'ma ipat ananinai anona aman kwahunai nandailasa gwa'aimi moni maim nape, agilinama Lasarus. Alop ananinai si'ina ma maselis.

Enis epes sofa'ana safi'i na'oh felefele'ma ipat aman anamai. Anan na'i notatama gwa'aimi tukwakwanimi mowa ma'oh tebol owinam aman anama amamaga hiamunai ma ata' nea'am nease' opaf. Ea' nombagw mafi'i mapalo'mana maselis ananimi afegah amamumi.
Anom afagof mafe'ma ea', aman anama falafunai naga', ea' anom ensel mofa'ana mafe' mahaponana nape wambel bu'unai felefele'ma Abraham. Ea' aman anama amamaga hiamunai anan wapoti' naga, sawana.
Ea' nafe' wambel aonai hel nofa' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' natologon nalata ilif, nati Abraham napani laogon endilisi, Lasarus nape nalomana.
Ea' nofalana na'i, ‘Ahalome Abraham, ine' niti uwahipiwi nesapa' Lasarus nufi'i nola faf ananinai tu'wanina atona embel nupihi'ame afega ae'anai. Ae' ame' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi ma nif amae'.’

Ea' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogalome, ine' okom nondanda'ma fowa' ata' nape naminai etap anae' nefa' amamaga bu'wami atom. Ea' Lasarus nofa' amamaga hiami awami. Ea' dei' wambel ana'e opaf ananinai nape bo'ona, ea' ine' nefa' nimanimi lu'wami.

Ea' anom amamaga wapoti' mape. La'afena ape' maloma ipe' God nanda' anona kwambiwag lu'unai. Na'ama epes sape na'ae ma sa'i sotopa' kwambiwag anama seafo'o ma ipe', esis ina la'ifis. Ea' epes sapani na'amai, esis ina la'ifisa sotopa'i kwambiwag siefi'mai ape', owa'etin.’
Ea' aman anama na'i, ‘Ahalome, ae' a'i ine' nesapa'o Lasarus notanima nofo'o ipat ahalome ae'anai.
Ae' anom owape wanom biam mape. Ama Lasarus ni'ipama basef la'ifimi ma momboma opalef. Na'ama amam wapoti' mufi'i wambel anae' mofa' nimanimi lu'wami.’
Ea' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'. Owapena ine'imi mome'ago basefa Moses noloma amam profet migiambamam. Amam mome'ago basef amama.’
Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahalome Abraham, owa'etin. Ina nambimb mome'am, owa'. Ea' i'i enin epen naga'i nehafel hi'agif nefe'ma amam, nambimb meme'ana momboma opalef.’
Ea' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'etina meame' basefa Moses noloma amam profeti, ea' nambimb enin epen naga'i nitanima nehafel hi'agif, amam ina mombale'efana wapoti', owa'.’ ”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Endilisi amamaga amama meagwambipei motagamepa ma penda' waf aonai. Endilisi amamaga anona nemaf miatagai, ea' emi egefis sonda' amamaga amama awami motaga, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, esis anona nemaf sefa' nimanimi lu'wami.

I'i enis epes sofa' epes isima sepa' owap lu'unai nil bagafowa asasimi, sofa'as sefe' sokwahis sowala naoh mami lu'wami ma afis, esis ata' sepe awes. I'i epes isima senda' enin so'uso'win nekwaha nembale'efa Ae', epes isima anona nemaf sepe awes endilisi sikila' sewala naoh afis.
Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. I'i owalomepa ipe'inai nonda' waf aonai, pi'ipana basef mehipa nokwahana. Ama i'i anan nemboma opaf, ipe' pekwahomana waf aonai ananinai.
I'i anan nonda'mepa waf aonai ma ipe' la'ela'ef 7-peleif nemaf atotona, ama anan netanima nifi'mai ipe' 7-peileif ni'i, ‘Ae' amboma opaf.’, ipe' pekwahomana waf aonai anan nanda'anai.”
Ea' amam Aposel Jisasi ma'ipa Dembinai amamunai ma'i, “Ine' nenda' afa' ombale'efena la'ififa wikila' wali' ombale'efena.”

Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “I'i bale'ef ipe'inai so'ona nendahama si'i nalelef sa'umi mastetimi lawag, nambimb ipe' pi'ipa lawag nanima su'utip mailanai pi'i, ‘Ine' degia neloma ofagena nefe' newala naoh embel nomon,’ ea' nila basef ipe'imi.”

“I'i anona aman ipe'inai nofa' anona aman nanda' maola anan nowala etap aof o numafi sipsip, ea' wambomota notanimai nifi'i ipat, atuwasi dembinai numafi anani ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ine' fi'i mehip nepe nea' gwa'aimi’? Owa'etin.
Atuwasi ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ine' nendondomba gwa'aimi ae'ami, newaho' let, nenda'me gwa'aimi ae' nili' nefa'am nifi'i. Ma ili' ea'am, ine' nigi' nea' ine'imi.’
Ea' atuwasi anan ninifela aman anama nanda'mana maoli ma nila basef ananimi? Owa'etin.
Ea' ipe' wapoti' na'ama etin. I'i ipe' penda' amamaga hiami hi'ilam si'i God na'ipipa, ipe' pi'i basef pi'i, ‘Afa' wanda' maoli aofai. Amamaga afa' wanda'ami, amama maol afa'imi atom.’ ”
Ea' Jisas nafe' eaf na'i nefe' Jerusalem, nafe' la'afena etap hiagoma biefigin Samaria naloma Galili.
Anan nataga anona wambel, ea' amam 10-peleim awes aonai nanda' alop amamunai nambo' mafi'i eaf ata' maituwi laogon,
mofalana mehip ma'i, “Jisas, Dembinai, ine' niti uwahipifa!”
Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fo'o pihi'amba alop ipe'inai ma amam pris.”
Amam ata' mafe' etin, alop amamunai nataga bo'ona.
Anona aman amamunai nati alop ananinai bo'ona, notanima nafe' noga na'i mehip nafela agel Godi.
Ea' natambe nowafa notawa etap felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi nanifelona. Anan ina Judainai, owa'. Anan Samariainai.
Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Ae' a'i ipe' 10-peleipa ambo'wepa etin. Dei' 9-peleim emuma?
Amam motanima mifi'i mefela agel Godi? Aman anama anona wambelinai, anan atotona.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel fo'o. Ine' nembale'efa ae', amama atom dei' nataga bo'wena wapoti'.”
Anom Farisi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Maina nogota nemaf anama bu'unai notaga ma ape' miowis wambota Godi numafiapa?”
Ea' anan nagwamama basef amam na'i, “Amama esis ina satolom naep, owa'.
Esis ina anona nemaf si'i, ‘Piti, amama mape na'ae, o mape gani, owa'etin.’ Peme'! Amama mape opalef ipe'imi nomon ea'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Anona nemaf notaga, opalef ipe'imi pelef endilisi pi'i, ‘Ape' ma'i aman anama notaga epen nofa' alop epesi ata' nifi'i notaga ulala ata' mutolona.’ Owa'etin. Ipe' ina petolowe, owa'.
Ea' nambimb enis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Piti nani nape gani,’ enis si'i ‘Piti anan nape na'ae.’ Ea' ipe' ina peme'as pigi'mas, owa'. Hapaisi.

Ipe' pegawa pelele'ala ma otaga dilulum bogwalag pele' pele' nafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, anona nemaf enda'am na'ama etina nemaf ae' iefi'ianai. Ea' ae' ata' ili' efa' nemanimi hiami ma epes anai'isi dei' sowa' alafugahe. Waf fowa' gani sanda'ana nogota anama Noa napeinai, ea' na'ama etin si'i anona nemaf esis sonda'ana nemaf anama felefele'ma ifi'i etaga etap anae'.
Sa' gwa'aimi, sa' embel, amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandase'ama etin safe' safe' sataga nemaf anama Noa nafe' nawis sip. Ea' embel lu'wami mataga maha esis amam nematawa hiesi afis hi'alas.
Esis sanda' waf na'ama etin si'i nogota anama Lot napeinai wapoti'. Sa' gwa'aimi, sa' embel, satala amamaga sase'asam safe'ma enis satalom, sawa amamaga aof, sala' ifagw.
Ea' Lot nakwaha Sodom nafe', ma nemaf anama atona nif maloma otamba salfa fandumi mowai heven si'i asaf nalai ea' mahambombaga amam nematawa hiesi saga' hi'alas.
Ea' na'ama etina nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei iefi'ianai.
Nemaf anama emi epen neape ipat andi'i felefele'i, ina ata' netanima nuwis nefa'ai amamaga ananimi ipat nomon, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin epen napani aofi, ina ata' netanima nefe' ipat, owa'.
Ipe' nomonas mondanda'ma Lot waulu'mana.
Emi egafis si'i sili'akwa ambagof asasimi, ambagof asasimi anona nemaf higililam. Emi egafis sesambala ambagof asasimi, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi mope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, nemaf anama owamb amam biam mo'oh ipat lehis atifim, God nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nope.
Anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' bret, atuwasi God nofa' ano'w, nokwaha ano'w kope.”
[Amam biam meape aofi, atuwasi God nofa' anona, nokwaha anona nope.]
Alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, amama anona nemaf motaga eti?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Anama alop saga'i sa'oma, ea' anama atogon anona nemaf komemb mufi'i mondowa'anima.”
Ea' Jisas nase'am basef wamon etin alupumi ananimi ma nihi'ambam monda' beten nimeguf hiami ma amam ina ala'uta neam, owa'.
Ea' anan na'iam na'i, “Anona dembinai jas nape anona taun. Anan ina umbamahana ma God, ina okom napoma enis epes wapoti', owa'.
Ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwape taun anama. La'ela'ef akwa'w kwafi'mai jas anama kwa'ipana kwa'i, ‘Naumbih ae'asi sa'i sohambombaga ae'. Ine' ata' nigiambame ma kot.’
Jas anama nali' nandaiwa'ma niegiambama'w. Nogota launai nafe' ea', okom ananinai ma'i, ‘Ae' ina umbamahema God, ea' ina ila basef epesi, owa'.
Ea' nemata'w akwama alifi'wi kwase'e nimanimi ae'. Ea' hapaimi, ata' igiambama akwa'w mehipa kot. Na'ama kwafi'i la'ela'ef konda' okom nalowe.’ ”
Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' peme' basefa jas anama aonai.
Epes isima God nandandepas ea' ananisi, esis salef sakokowe la'ela'ef owamb alip. Dei' God nigiambamasa kot o owa'? Anan nigiambamas. Anan ina ni'ipas mamumami, owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nambimb nigiambamas mehip. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Ea' anona nemaf ae' iefi'i, nemaf anama iti amam nematawa etapesi sembale'efa ae', o owa'?”
Enis epes ukup mapoma esis etis sa'i esis epes bu'wasi sanda' waf bu'unai, ea' sa'i enis sanda' waf aonai. Epes isima Jisas nase'asa basef womun etin na'i,
“Anom amam biam ma'i mofe' monda' beten ipat lu'unai Godi. Anona Farisi, anona aman nofa' takisi.

Farisi anama naitu okom napoma anan atona nanda' beten na'ama na'i, ‘Ae' anifelina God, ama ae' ina si'i enis epes sanda' waf aonai. Esis sambaso'mas sofa' wiga hiahaom enis epesi, sanda' waf aonai, sanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai. Ae' anifelina ma ae' ina si'i aman nanima aonai nofa' takisi.
Wikifah hiami ae' akwaha gwa'aimi nimeguf bifa anda' beten. Ea' amamaga hiami ae' efa'ami, awala tu'wanim amamaga ase'enam ine'.’ ”
“Ea' aman anama nefa' takisi naituwi laogon nandaiwa'ma niniga niti heven ilif, owa'. Naha mafata ananinai la'ela'ef na'i, ‘God, ae' aman anda' waf aonai, ine' niti ae' owahipiwi nigiambame.’

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, aman anama nofa' takisi na'iam na'ama, anan bo'ona ma naep Godi. Ea' aman anama nali' nanda' beteni, owa'. Dei' main, emi egafis sefela agof asisimi atom, nambimb God nonda' agof asasimi mowala. Ea' emi egafis senda' agof mowala, nambimb God nefela agof asasimi lu'um.”
Esis sao'wamanai enis awasi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anan nowamona lagofa ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas. Ea' alupumi ananimi mati isima ea' minifalis esis sofa'as sifi'mai anan.

Ea' Jisas nofala awasi isima safi'i felefele'ma anan ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' kwahowas awasi isima sifi'mai ae'. Ipe' ina pindaiwa'mas. Fa'asi sifi'mai Ae'. Dei' main, esis amam nematawa siowis wambota Godi numafias esis same' basef ananimi sailam si'i awasi isima.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Emi egafis si'i a'e ma siowis wambota Godi numafias ama sese'ana ukup asasimi ma Anan si'i awasi isima sa'i a'e mana, isima sanda'am na'ama nambimb siowis wambota Godi numafias. I'i owa', owa'etin.”
Anona agilinai Judainai nahali' Jisas na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' nambimb enda' maina efa' ambal namunai epe andeande' la'ela'ef?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' na'i Ae' bu'uwei? God atona bu'unai.

Ine' negawa mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai na'i, ‘Ina nenda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, ina neha enis epes soga' nenda' wal, owa', ina nembaso'ma enis epes, ine' neme' basef mamasinai nembale'am nilam ea' nimafias andeande'.’ ”
Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Mi'uli anama hianai ahapilana ailana fowa' ata' sa'owe afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”

Ea' Jisas name' basef amama na'ipana na'i, “Ine' anona waf bu'unai atotona ata' owa' neanda'ana. Ine' fo'o nese'asa amamaga ine'imi hiami enis epes sotaluma ine' nefa' moni anama nenda'ana neso' isima kwahusi. Nenda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf nefa' amamaga bu'wami gani heven ilif. Ea' nifi'i nembale'efe ae' nila ae'.”
Anan name' basef amama, opaf ananinai nimanina endilisi. Anan amamaga hiamunai. Na'ama dei' anan okom nimaninai.
Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Epes isima hiahaom moni hianaisi, sanda'am ahifim endilisi ma siowis wambota Godi numafias. Atona etin sefe' siowis.

Anona mafin lu'unai kamel nuwis nil nagala sagundisa luwagufanai, anama wila ma niowis. Ea' amam nematawa amamaga hiamisi i'i suwis wambota Godi, sonda'am ahifim endilisi ma siowis. Maol anama ahifina endilisi nikila' maol kamel niowis nil nagala.”
Ea' epes isima same' na'ama sa'i, “I'i na'ama, anona nemaf God nofa' emi egafis setanimani sopen andeande' la'ela'ef? Owa'etin.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Amamaga epes owa' la'ifisa seanda'ami, amama God atona la'ifinama nonda'am.”
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' wakwaha amamaga afa'imi hiami ea' dei' wafi'i wambale'efa basef ine'imi wailina.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipe' emi egafipa pekwaha ifagw ipe'imi ma penda' maola epes siowis wambota Godi numafias,
anona nemaf God nogwamepa amamaga hiami mikila' amama pali' pefa'ami. Anona nemaf nogota bu'unai neataga, ipe' pefa' ambagof namumi ma peape andeande' la'ela'ef.”

Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi 12-peleim na'ipam na'i, “Peme', dei' afa' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ama basef amama hiami amam profet fowa' gani manda'am mail buki ma'i ae' ataga epen endilisiwei motaga alihim mondawalap hi'ilam.
Nambimb amam monda'e efe'ma enis epes sololama Godi. Ea' sonda'e findiwae sehe sonda'me waf aonai sisisi'wafe sopagahowe sehe ega'.
Ama nimeguf biam mefe' hi'ilam ama anona nefe'ma wenifi ae' etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
Ea' amam alupumi ananimi ina mogawa basef amama, owa'. Basef ofagema ma'iam ata' mandambaho'ma amam, ea' ina ukup mandanda'mam andeande'ma amamaga Jisas na'i neanda'ami, owa'.
Jisas nafe' nataga felefele'ma anona wambel Jeriko, ea' anona aman naep mase'anai nape eaf wa'ana dawalegef nandailasa gwa'aimi moni maim.
Ea' name' esis hiesi safi'i sikila'ana safe', nahali'as na'i, “Esis sanda' main notaga?”
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai anama dei' nafi'i nikila'ena nafe'.”
Ea' nofalana na'i, “Jisas, ine' akunamana Deviti, niti ae' uwahipiwi!”
Epes isima sali' safi'i sinifalana na'ama sa'i, “Ine' feso'mena!”
Ea' anan fala etin nape na'i, “Ine' Devit akunamana, niti ae' uwahipiwi.”
Ea' Jisas nafi'i naitu na'ipas na'i, “Kipana nifi'mai ae'.”
Anan nafe' felefele', Jisas nahali'ana na'i,
“Ine' na'i ae' enda'mena main?”
Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapoti'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Naep ine'imi miti. Ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifina. Amama atom dei' nataga bo'wena wapoti'.”
Ea' mehip naep matiana andeande', naila Jisas nafe' eaf nafela agel Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa sati amama safela agel Godi wapoti'.
Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis Jeriko, na'i nefe'.
Ea' anona aman amamaga hiamunai nape, agel ananinai Sakius anan agilinai ma amam amama mofa' takisi.
Anan na'i niti Jisasa nogawana anan emi egafuna. Ea' amam nematawa wambelisi hiesi saitu sili'akw. Sakius anan bandabandanai, ea' ina nati Jisas, owa'.
Ea' nasagih nali' nafe' nalata natoma anona lawag fik ama niti Jisas niefi'i.
Ea' Jisas nataga anama naniga nati ilif na'ipana na'i, “Sakius, dei' ae' efe' epe ipat ine'inai. Ine' sila'i mehip.”
Ea' nisila'i mehip okom ananinai nandanifel, nao'wa Jisas nafe' ipat ananinai.
Ea' esis amam nematawa sati amama, ukup aom endilisi sa'i basef mamumami sa'i, “Anan nafe' nape ipat anona aman nanda' waf aonai.”

Ea' Sakius nehafel naitu na'ipa Dembinai na'i, “Dembinai, ine' neme'. Dei' ae' a'i ewala amamaga hiami ae'ami la'afen na'ama etin, ea' ese'as tu'wanim isima kwahusi. I'i ae' embaso'ma enin epena ekwalopa amamaga ananimi, nambimb ae' egwamana hiami bifibif.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' God nefa' amam nematawa sape ipat anae'i sotanimani ea'. Dei' main, aman anama wapoti' akunamana Abrahami.
Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ae' afi'i ma egolopa epes higilalasi efa'as setanimani.”

Esis same' basef amama, ea' Jisas nafe' nataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' epes hiesi ukup ma'i dei' atef God nifi'i numafi epes Ananisi nupe dembinai ma esis ea' epes hiesi sotolona. Na'ama Jisas na'i basef amama womun etin
na'i, “Anona aman dembinai na'i nefe' anona wambel laogoma ma esis sonda'ana nope king. Anona nemaf anan notanima nifi'i.
Ea' nofalai anom amam 10-peleim manda' maol ananinai, ea' natambe' moni 20 kina nandahama amam. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' penda' maolana moni anama pefe' petagama ae' etanima iefi'i.’
Ea' esis wambel atona aman anamai ukup aoma anan endilisi. Ea' nafe' sasapa' anom amam magi'mana mafe' ma'i, ‘Ape' mandaiwa'ma ine' nepe king ma ape'.’

Owa'etin. Esis sanda'ana nataga nape king dembinai nape anom nimeguf, notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i, ‘Falai amam amama manda' maoli fowa' ae' ase'ama moni. Ae' a'i ata' egawa moni wamanai ma'ufina amam hiami atona etin mofa'anai.’
Ea' nali'i nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maol 20 kina anama ine'inai anda' maolanana dei' efa'ai 200 kina wamanai.’
Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nanda' maol andeande'. Ine' nimafi moni anama kwawie'una andeande'. Dei' ese'ena agel lu'unai ine' ma nimafi taun lu'wagoma 10-peleina.’
Ea' anona nafe'ma biami nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maola 20 kina ine'inai dei' etanima efa'ai 100 kina wamanai wapoti'.’
Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' enda'ena nimafi taun lu'wagoma 5-peleina.’
Ea' anona nagi'i nafi'i wapoti' na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, 20 kina ine'inai anae'. Ae' ewa'ana hankisip ambe'ana na'oh.

Ae' egawa ine' aman la'ifinai. Anom amamaga enis epes sambe'am ma'ihi, amama ine' nefa'am. Gwa'aimi enin epen nawami, amama ine' nala'ami. Na'ama ae' ombamahe ma ine'. Ea' dei' ewa'ana moni anama na'omena.’
Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nanda' maoli, ine' epen awinai natotopa' basefi. Basef ine'imi atom ewalogena. Dei' ine' negawa ae' aman la'ifiwei ala' gwa'aimi anona aman nawami.
I'i ine' negawa na'amai, dei' nefa'ana nembe'ana benga ae' etanima ifi'i efa'ana neloma anona wamanai wapoti'.’
Ea' na'ipa esis saitu na'ama felefele'i na'i, ‘Ipe' dalombana 20 kina aman anama pese'anana aman anama nofa' moni 200 kinai.’
Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, ‘Dembinai, anan nofa' 200 kina ea'.’

Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, emi egafis sohapila amamaga amama nambimb ese'asa anom amamaga wapoti' esis. Ea' emi egafis owa' sehapila anom amamaga, amamaga kwawie'um esis sahapilami, amama nambimb ae' endalombasam.
Ea' esis isima satago naumbih ae'asi, sandaiwa'ma ae' epe dembiwei king asasiwei imafias, ipe' fa'as fi'i na'ae pehas ma naep ae'ami.’ ”
Jisas na'i basef amama ea' nali' nafe' naila eaf nafe' Jerusalemi nondowasa'.
Ea' nataga Betfagei Betani wambel anama felefele'ma halaf anama oliv motawama ea' nasapa' alupumi ananimi biam mali' mafe'.

Na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefe' wambel nanima nape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ae. Pefe' piwis piti anona mafin donki sa'unai esis saundana nail. Ina dei' enin epen natomana, ata' owa'. Petagahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
I'i enin epen nihali'ipa ni'i, ‘Patagahona ma main?’ ea' pegwaman pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolanana.’ ”
Ea' amam biam mafe' mati amamaga amama na'ama etin si'i do'ok na'ipam.
Ea' matagaha mandofa donki anama sa'unai. Matagahona etin, amam mumafi donki anamai ma'ipam ma'i, “Dei' maina ipe' patagaha donki anama?”
Ea' amam ma'ipam ma'i, “Dembinai na'i nonda' anona maolanana.”
Ea' amam mofa' donki anama mafi'mai Jisas mawamona sagegw amamumi matoma ilifa donki anama.
Ea' magiambama Jisas nalata natoma donki anama nafe', ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sefela agel ananinai lu'una. Ea' dei' sambe'amanam sagegw sase'wiam eaf sofalo'mana.

Anan nafi'i felefele'ma eaf nakini'i halaf lawah oliv motawama, alupusi ananisi hiesi sandanifel, ukup mapoma amamaga amama pepel fowa' nanda'anai. Ea' sanda' la kolo' sa'oh mehip, safela agel Godi lu'una.
Sa'iam na'ama sa'i,
“Ape' mefela agel God nape ilifi lu'una, howalagon anan atona. Ma'i anan nofalo'ma ine' dembinai king nafi'i agel Ananinai nese'ena pepel ma nenda' maol Ananinai. Esis sape heveni opalef awanem.”
Ea' anom dambami Farisi mape maloma epes hiesi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' ninifala alupusi ine'isi ma ata' sosopama malogof.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i esis seasopama malogof, atuwasi otamba atom ma'oh etapi mope mi'i mehip.”
Ea' Jisas nataga felefele'ma Jerusalem natologon nalopagon. Nalopa esis amam nematawa sape taun anamaisi.
Ea' na'i, “I'i dei' nemaf anae' atona ipe' pegawa basef ofagema ma pepe opalef awanem, amama andeande'. Owa'etin. Basef amama ata' mandambahe', dei' ipe' owa' ata' pegawam.
Anona nemaf netaga, naumbih ipe'isi sifi'i sola' indalelemb sonda' wandaf sili'akwepa. Ea' sili'akwepa endilisi ma anama hiagoma.

Ea' sehepa sohambombagepa endilisi, peloma awasi ipe'isi sape nomona wambel ipe'inai. Esis sohambombaga wambel awagon hi'ilagon endilisi, ea' ina nambimb otamba sala' ifagwami mondapapei'ma etin mope, owa'. Mo'oh deindei'. Dei' main? Ipe' owa' pegawa nemaf dei' God niefi'anai ma nefa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande', owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nehafel nawis ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ea' nagalo'mas amam amama manda' bisnisi matala amamaga ipat anama nomon.
Anan na'ipam na'i, “Basef mape Baibeli, God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma esis sifi'i sopama sonda' beten sohali' Ae'.’ Ea' ipe' panda'ana nataga si'i sanda' walanai.”
Nimeguf hiami Jisas nawalipasa basef ipat anama nomon. Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam agufumi Judai maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi magolopa eafa mohana neaga'.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi ukup bo'om endilisi ma seame' basef ananimi. Na'ama amam ina mati anona eafa meahana, owa'.

Anona nemaf Jisas nape nase'asa basef amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi. Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma agufumi amam Judai mafi'mai anan.
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' ni'ipafa. Ine' nanda' maol anama ma pepel eminai? Emi na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' maol anama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapoti' a'i ihali'ipama anom basef pi'ipiam.
Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli, God nape heveni na'ipana napisi'as o enin epen etapani na'ipana?”
Ea' amam mame' basef amama manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' wi'i, ‘God nape heveni na'ipa Jon napisi'asi’, atuwasi anan ni'ipafa ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' owa' pembale'efana?’
Ea' afa' wi'i, ‘Enin epen nape etapanai na'ipana’, na'ama esis amam nematawa sohafa. Dei' main, hiesi sa'i Jon anona profet dembinai.”
Ea' magwamana basef Jisas ma'i, “Afa' ina ogawana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Na'ama etin ae' ina i'ipipa ma emi nase'e agel lu'unai anda' maol anama Ae'anai, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef amama womun etin esis amam nematawa na'i, “Anona aman nanda' anona aof nawa wain. Ea' nakwahomana aof anama anom amam monda' maolana aof anama mofa' monianai. Ea' nafe' napani nogota launai anona wambel laogoma.

Ama nogota su'utip mailanai, anan nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe'ma amam manda' maol aof ananinai. Anan na'i amam mose'ana anom su'utip gwa'aimi ma aof anama. Ea' amam mahana matofana notanima nafe'.
Ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' wapoti' ma amam, ea' mahana wapoti' manda'ana aona matofana nafa' nafe'.
Ea' nasapa' anona nafe'ma wenifi. Ea' amam mahana makwahona nawis ande'.
Ea' anan nafamona aofi na'i, ‘Ae' ata' enda' main? Nogalome ae'anai ae' okom nainailana, esapa'ana nofo'o. Nambimb mome' malogel ananinai o owa'?’
Ea' amam mati nogalomana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama etin ma'i, ‘Aman anama anona nemaf nofa' amamaga hiami ahalomanai. Afa' ohana ma afa' atofa ofa' aof anae'.’
Ea' mahana makwahona nawis aof ande'ana, mahana afuna. Ea' nambimb anan nafamona aofi nonda' maina amam?
Nambimb nifi'i noham afum hi'ilam, nose'asa aof anama nofe'ma enis epes.”
Esis same' basef amama sa'i, “Waf anama aonai endilisi. Afa' wandaiwa'mana.”
Ea' Jisas natilis andeande' na'ipas na'i, “Ea' na'ama etin si'i basef amama mape Baibeli ma'i,
'Owap anama amam mala' ipati magalo'mana, dei' nataga owap nape nali'i ma nembalo' ipat.’
Basef amama ofagema ma'i main?
Emi egafis hilili'ilamas sowa owap anama, pepe'etas. Ea' i'i owap anama nowa nesali'as, loloweas si'i sopof atona.”
Ea' amam agufumi esis Judai mogawa Anan na'i basef amama womun etini mondela'wifa amam. Ea' ma'i mombalo'ana. Ea' amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa hiesi.

Ea' amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam pris dambami manda'ana naep di'indi'ana ma mombalo'ana mofa'ana. Ea' masapa' anom amam mafi'i matolona. Amam amama manda' doufindouf mambaso'am ma'i amam manda' waf endilisinai. Owa'etin. Amam ma'i mombalo'a Jisasa anom basef na'iami ma moso' anan neafe'ma gavman dembinai ma nonda' kotimana.

Ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, ape' mogawena basef ine'imi bu'wami atom na'ipasam esis amam nematawa. Ine' na'i basef atifima epes isima hiesi agufisi saloma isima agof a'asi na'ama etin hi'alas. Ine' na'ipasa basef maloma waf bu'unai Godi endilisi ma epes hiesi.
Mi'uli ape'inai na'iam na'imama? Ape' mose'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi o owa'?”
Jisas negawa ea' ma baso'am amamunai. Ea' na'ipam na'i,
“Ipe' pihi'ambe anona moni ma ata' itolona. Ambal naloma agel anama mailanai eminai?”
Ea' ma'i, “Amama gavman dembinai Sisar esis Romi.”
Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamaga Sisari, amama pese'anam Sisar. Ea' amamaga Godi, pese'anam God.”
Ea' amam ina la'ifima mombalo'ana ma anom basefa naep esis amam nematawa hiesi, owa'. Amam ukup matamea ma basef amama na'ipamami, ea' masopama malogof tol mape.
Anom Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas. Amam hiami mombale'ef saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'.

Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, fowa' gani Moses nanda' anom basef mail buki ma ape' ma'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anan awasi a'ana, waulu'mana ata' kope, owalomana ananinai nose'akwa nola enis awasi ma soho'ofana.’
Ea' fowa' amam wambota atotona 7-peleim mape. Nali'i sahalomam nase'akw so'uso'win a'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwape.
Ea' owalomana nafela'w nase'akw.

Ea' anona owalomana la'efinai wapoti' nanda'am na'ama etin, ea' anona natu'ulanai nase'akw manda'am na'ama etin mafe' matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amam amama wambutaim 7-peleim ina mola enis awasi, owa'. Maga' etin hi'alam.
Anona nemaf nemata'w waulu'mam kwagi'mam kwagi' kwaga'.
Ea' anona nemaf esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', nemata'w akwama kope nemata'w emi'wi? Amam 7-peleim mase'akw hi'alam.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amam nematawa nogota anae'isi dei' sandase'ama.
Ea' emi egafis God na'i bo'wes andeande'ma sotanima sohafel wapoti' sope namusi nemaf anama etap dambainai neataga ina sendase'ama, owa'.
Esis ina soga' wapoti', owa'. Sopen si'i ensel Godi. Sotanima sohafel hi'agilif wapoti'. Na'ama sope awasi Godi.
Basef amama ma saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti', amama fowa' gani Moses nihi'ambepam nif ilalowa mataga lawag sa'unai fandonai, ma'i anan nofala Dembinai na'i
‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki, naloma Jekopi.’
Basef amama ma'i God ina Dembinai ma epes isima saga'i, owa'. Anan Dembinai ma epes isima sape namusi. Dei' main, epes hiesi sape namisa naep Godi hi'alas.”
Jisas na'iam na'ama, amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi umbamahama mohali'ana ma anom basef wapoti'. Ea' anom magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' na'iam andeande'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amam ma'i Krais, God nasapa'ana nafi'i anan akunamana Deviti. Ma'i Krais aman atona falafunai si'i epes sape etapi. Dei' maina amam ma'iam na'ama ma Krais?
Buk anama Songi Devit na'i na'ama na'i,
'Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel da'isinai ae'anai,
la'ela'ef nefe' netagama anona nemaf ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina ine' si'i sia bo'wagah ine'imi maituma.” ’
Devit fowa' gani nofala Krais na'i anan Dembinai. Amama atom Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anan Dembinai. Dei' maina Devit nofala Krais akunamana ananinai?”
Amam nematawa hiesi ata' sape same' basef amama, Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i,

“Ipe' pindumafuma amam amama mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Amam ma'i mundawisam luwaguf bu'wami atom mefe', si'i dambami atom mandawisami. Ma'i enis epes sotolom sondalalimam sonda'mam nemaf bu'unai sinifelom anama lu'wagoma ma naep hiesi sandatama sapoma ma sefela agof amamumi lu'um. Ea' amam ukup ma'i siaifah amama motawa mali'i atom, dambami atom mapoma, nomon ifagw esis Juda hiesi sa'i basef sapeimi o anama hiesi sandakolasam nimeguf amama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami.

Amam amama mawis ifagw amama nematawa alifiwai, manda' wala amamaga awoumi. Ea' manda' beten launai etina esis sotolom si'i amam bu'wami. Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes hiesi, enis epes owa' seanda' waf aonai na'amainai sofa' nimanimi kwawie'um ea' amam mofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.”
Ea' Jisas nape ipat lu'unai Godi natologon tulif nati enis epes moni hianaisi sakwaha moni nowala bokis moni nalami soaso' God.
Ea' nati ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwala moni sa'unai biefina newala bokis amama.
Ea' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwama alifi'wi kwa'waha moni lu'unai nikila' otamba hiami esis amam nematawa hiesi sakwahomi.

Epes isima hiesi moni hianai na'omas sakwaha tu'wanina atona newala bokis. Ea' nemata'w akwama moni a'akw endilisi kwa'waha moni akwa'inai hi'alana. Ea' owa' anona no'oh kweatala gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' moni akwa'inai biefina sa'unai nikila' moni hianai esis sakwahonai.”
Anom alupumi Jisasi ma'i basefa ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma'i, “Esis sofalo'ma ipat anama otamba bu'wami amamaga bu'wami esis amam nematawa sase'anam Godi.”
Ea' Jisas na'i,
“Amamaga amama dei' patulumi, anona nemaf dahandahama neataga, ina anom otamba mandapapei'ma etin la'ifima mopan, owa'. Sugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona etin hi'ilam.”
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, maina nemaf amama motaga? Maina ikwaf nili' netaga ma afa' weagawa amama felefele' motaga?”

Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma pepe. Na'ama enis epes sombaso'mepa. Epes hiesi anona nemaf sifi'i si'i agel ae'anai si'i, ‘Ae' ea' ma'uwi.’ Ea' enis si'i, ‘Dei' nemaf nafi'i felefele' ea'.’ Ipe' ina pefe' pila esis, owa'. Hapeimi.

Anona nemaf peme'asa basefa wandaf lu'unai hianai ea' enis si'i sondaiwa'ma amam gavman dambami mumafias sonda' wandaf. Nemaf anama ipe' ina umbamohepa, owa'. Amamaga amama ata' mili' motaga, ea' nemaf akutainai ina notaga mehip, ata' owa'.”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Enis epes sape etap hiagoma sefela wandaf sopa' soloma esis sape anona etap hiagoma. Anona aman dembinai king no'wa enis wambel hiagoma ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king no'wa ananisi anona wambel hiagoma.

Anona nemaf sowambon lu'unai nokoto' etap hiagoma. Anagon nolomeahas lu'unai neatagamas, wambel hiagoma ea' awes lu'unai notaga wambel hiagoma. Esis anona nemaf siti gani ilif ikwaf lu'unai neatagama amamaga mamumami monda' epes umbameahahas endilisi.

Amamaga amama hiami ina motaga mehip, ata' owa'. Esis sili' sombalo' ipe' paila basef ae'ami. Ea' sonda'epa kwapete'epa. Sonda'mepa kot nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi ea' sonda'epa penda' kalabus. Ea' sofa'epa pefe' sohaponepa pitu naep amam king moloma gavman dambami. Ipe' pefela agel ae'anai paila basef ae'ami. Amama atom sonda'epa na'ama.
Sonda'mepa waf anamanai si'i anona eafa pewalapa basef bu'wami pi'ipasam.
Ea' ipe' pihapila nomonas ipe'imi mope la'ifim, ama ipe' ina ukup mopoma anom basef pi'i pegwamasam mehip, owa'.
Dei' main, nemaf anama ae' atowe enda' basef mope malogof ipe'imi ese'epa gawa bu'unai ma epes isima ina la'ifisa seagwa basef amama ae' iesi'ipami, owa'.
Ehasepa mamasepa sahin owan esimbel atom ipe'isi soloma alupisi, esis wapoti' anona nemaf sowalapepa ma naumbih ipe'isi. Ea' soha enipa pega'.
Anona nemaf epes hiesi wambel hiagoma opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Esis sati ipe' paila basef ae'ami, na'ama dei' sahepa.
Ea' ipe' ina nambimb pega', owa'etin. Ina anona auf atotona nape balagah ipe'imi higililana, owa'.
Ipe' pepe la'ifipa ma anona nemaf pefa' ambal namunai.
Nemaf anama ipe' piti soldia hiami esis naumbih sifi'i sonauli' Jerusalem, ipe' pegawa nambimb felefele'ma taun anama lu'unai neataga aona.

Nemaf anama amam nematawa sape etap hiagoma Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa' halafutagw. Ea' esis amam nematawa sape nomon Jerusalemi sokwaha wambel anama sofa' sefe' laogon. Ea' isima sape aof wambel anama, ina ata' sefe' suwis, owa'.
Dei' main, nemaf anama God nogwamasa awami isima sanda' waf aonai si'i basef hiami mail buk Baibeli mondawalap alihim endilisi.

Nematawa opafuwai waloma awama awasi ata' sa' nomagof atomi, ae' a'i awau uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota anama ofa' nimanimi lu'wami. Nimanimi amama aom endilisi motaga etap anae' ma okom wandafunai Godi nambimb neafe'ma epes isima.

Enis, bainat nohas soga'. Enis, naumbih sonda' kalabusimas sofa'as sefe' sope etap anae' hiagoma hi'ilagon. Ea' epes isima sololama Godi sotaga sofa'asa wambel anama Jerusalem bo'wagah asasimi sumafiagon. Ea' sope la'ela'ef sefe' na'ama etina nemaf God nandandepanai ma nogota asasinai hi'ilana.”

“Nemaf anama ikwaf hianai notagama aon alipunai owambunai neloma ondowa. Etap anae' amam nematawa hiesi sape anona etap lu'unai hiagoma gegela'asis kwapete'as. Esis umba mohas kwapete'as ma naoh lu'wami mohafel lu'um mowa bililig etin ea' sowa selef.

Ea' ondowa maim mape gani ilifi mondakoto' bolatin mofe' mifi'i mope. Na'ama esis amam nematawa hiesi umbamohas kwapete'as sowa so'oh etap si'i saga'i. Esis ukup mopoma amamaga amama ma'i meataga etap anae'.
Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Nemaf anama siti ae' eloma elagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma amamaga mafifili bu'wami Godi moloma pepel ananinai.
Nemaf anama amamaga amama mohafel, ipe' pitu piniga. Dei' main, nemaf anama felefele'ma neataga God notagahipa ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai nofa'epa petanimani.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef womun etin na'i, “Ipe' piti lawag anama fik noloma lawah hiami wapoti'.
Ipe' piti elif monafa ma masowa, pegawa nogota anama nelemb ea' felefele'ma meaof.
Ea' na'ama etin, i'i ipe' piti amamaga amama ae' ali' a'ipipami motaga, ipe' pegawa nemaf anama Krais a' nifi'i nupe dembinai numafi epes hiesi Ananisi felefele'ma neataga.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' papani ina nambimb pega' mehip, ata' owa', ipe' piti amamaga amama hiami motaga hi'ilam.
Otaga noloma etap hiagoma anona nemaf a' higililam hi'ilam, ea' basef ae'ami ina hi'ilam, owa'. Mope la'ela'ef hihif.

Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' nemaf anama ae' iefi'ianai. Na'ama penda' waf aonai penda' waf alop atonai, pea' embel la'ifimi hiami ukup motamea ma nimanimi mamumami etapami atom. I'i waf anama nose'elipa hi'ilipa, nemaf anama ae' iefi'ianai notagamepa mehip si'i sakwaha wambawa saha mafis.
Nemaf anama notaga ma amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagomai ganigani hi'alas na'ama etin.

La'ela'ef pindumafuma pepe ma ina penda' waf aonai anama, owa'. Pepe penda' beten la'ela'ef ma God nose'epa pepel pitu la'ifipama pihi'ama amamaga amama ma'i meatagamipei. Ama pitu la'ifipa ma ae' ataga epen endilisiwei isimba'epa ewalogepa.”
Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef Jisas nape nawalipa esis amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, ea' owamb nafe' na'ihi halaf anama oliv motawama.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sohafel kuhumbita atona safi'mai anona seme' basef ananimi ipat lu'unai Godi la'ela'ef.
Felefele'ma nemaf anama Pasova sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami esis Juda sogwa' bret owa' neatef lu'unaia felefele'ma netaga.
Ea' amam pris maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi magolopa eafa moha Jisas neaga'. Dei' main, amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa.
Ea' Satan nawis okom Judasi Kariotinai. Anan amam 12-peleim alupumi Jisasi.
Ea' Judas nafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma amam plisman dambami mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi. Amam amama ma'i basef mandame'mama Judas nogolopa eafa nease'ama Jisas nofe' lagof amamumi.
Ea' mandanifel ma'i basef mandame'mama mose'ana anom otamba Judas.
Ea' anan na'i a'e ma basef amamumi, ea' nafe' nagolopa eafa nihi'ambama Jisas amam meambale'ana. Anan nahafa anona nemaf ma owa' enis amam nematawa sope solomana.
Nemaf anama nataga esis Juda sa'i sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami sea' anona bret owa' neatifi. Anama sa'i soha anom sipsip nogami hiami ma sonda' gwa'aimi amama Pasova.
Ea' Jisas nasapa' Pita naloma Jon na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefe' pendondombamafa gwa'aimi amama Pasova ma afa' weagwa'am.”
Ea' amam mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat enima?”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Peme', ipe' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'unai, atuwasi piti anona aman nofa' embel malep lu'unai nitilipa eaf. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat anama anan nefe' niowisanai.
Ea' pihali' ofagena ma ipat anamai pi'i, ‘Tisa afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, ipat anama sapeinai netawa eti? Anan na'i no'wa afa' atofa alupufai ope onda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova.’
Ea' anan nihi'ambepa rum anama lu'unai nape ilifi, tebol siaifah ma'oh etifim. Ipe' pendondomba gwa'aimi rum anama.”
Ea' amam mafe' mati amamaga amama na'ama etin si'i Jisas nali' na'ipamam ea' mandondomba gwa'aimi amama Pasova.
Nogota a' nataga ma sogwa' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova, Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafi'i mape, anan nafe' nape felefele'ma tebol.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' okom na'i ata' ea' gwa'aimi amama Pasova elomepa uli', ma atuwasi efa' nimanini awami.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' ea' gwa'aimi amama Pasova wapoti', owa'. Anona nemaf basefa gwa'aimi amama Pasova ofagema motaga mondawalap alihim anama wambel Godi, eagwa'am wapoti'.”
Ea' anan nafela anona kap embel wain nalami nanifela God na'i, “Ipe' fela embel amama pendandamam.
Ae' a'ipipa, dei' anona nemaf wapoti' ae' ina ea' embel wainim elomepa, owa'. Anona nemaf epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias wambel Ananinai, ae' ea' embel wain anama wapoti' elomepa.”
Ea' anan nafelai bret nanifela God nawalona nase'am na'i, “Bret anama alop ae'anai. [Ae' ase'epana ma iegiambamepa. Penda'am la'ela'efa ukup mopoma ae'.”

Amam ma'am hi'alam, nanda'am na'ama etina anona kap embel wain nalami, na'i, “Wain embel amama esimbel ae'ami manda' basef Godi dambaimi endilisimi mataga la'ifim. Esimbel amama ae' ekolo'wama iegiambamepa.]
Ea' ipe' piti aman anama na'i nowalapa ae' ma amam naumbih ae'ami, nape na' gwa'aimi nalome tebol amae'.
Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, naman ega' si'i eaf fowa' gani God nandandepanai. Ea' aman anama neawalape ma amam naumbih, ae' ati uwahipina endilisi. Dei' main, nimanimi lu'wami motagamana.”
Anan na'iam na'ama, alupumi ananimi atom mandahahali'ma ma'i, “Epen afa'ini emi atuwasi neanda' waf anama?”
Amam alupumi Jisasi ma'i anom basef mandahihi'anamam ma'i, “Emi nepe dembinai afa'inai?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amom king dambami ma esis hiesi sololama Godi sape lu'wagoma, mape dambami asasimi manda'as kwapete'as. Amam mumafi esis la'ifim, ea' ma'i esis sofalam agof lu'wami si'i manda' waf bu'unai migiambamasi.
Ea' ipe' ina penda'am na'ama, owa'. Emi egalin ni'i nope dembeni ma ipe', anan ata' nope si'i amama agof a'ami si'i isima sanda' maoli ma segiambamepa.
Emi epen dambeni nikila' enis epes? Epen natoma na' gwa'aimi teboli o epen nanda' gwa'aimi nefa'am nafe'manai? Ea' ae' ape alomepa si'i nanda' maoli ma iegiambamepa.
Fowa' amamaga amama magwamba ae'i, nimeguf amama ipe' pape palome, ipe' ina pakwahowe, owa'etin.
Ahalome ae'anai nase'e agel lu'unai na'ipi ape dembiwei, imafi enis epes. Ea' na'ama etin ae' ese'epa agof lu'wami i'ipipa pepe dembipei king pimafi enis epes.
Nemaf anama ipe' pepe dembipei king peloma ae' pea' gwa'aimi embel pelome tebol ae'ami wambel Godi. Ea' pepe siaifah bu'wami amam dambami kingi, pewaloga epes wambotagw 12-peleim ape'isi Israel.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Saimon, Saimon, ine' neme'. God na'i a'e ma Satan nogwamba ipe' ma penda' waf aonai si'i sandilama rais ama bu'wami mafe' anagon awami mafe' anagon.
Owa'etin. Ae' anda' betena egiambamena ma nembale'efa ae' la'ela'ef. Atuwasi nemboma opaf nenda' owapena ine'imi motaga la'ifim.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' andandombam elomena weafe' kalabus. Ea' ae' andandombam ega' ealomena wapoti'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Pita, ae' a'ipina endilisi! Atuwasi owamb anae' awata ata' owa' neanda'am, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam na'i, “Fowa' ae' asapa'epa pandailagof pafe', ipe' ina pefa' paos moni nalami maloma brasbeli su, owa'. Pafe' etin. Nemaf anama anom amamaga a'epa o owa'?”
Amam magwam ma'i, “Owa'etin.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ea' emi dei' aman paos moni nalami ma'omanai anan nefa'am. Ea' brasbel wapoti' na'ama etin. Aman bainat a'anai anan nose'asa saket ananinai enis sotalona, notala anona bainat.
Dei' main, anom basef ma ae' felefele'ma motaga mondawalap. Anom basef mail Buk Baibeli fowa' gani ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Esis ukup ma'i ae' epen aowei atowe.’
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Basef amama felefele' motaga endilisi ma nimanimi lu'wami atuwasi motaga ma ae'.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' niti. Afa' bainah biam amae'.”
Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amama.”
Ea' Jisas nakwaha taun nawis ande' nafe' halaf lawah oliv motawama si'i la'la'ef nanda'am. Ea' alupumi ananimi magi'mana mafe'.
Anan nataga na'ama na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' penda' betena amamaga meagwambaipei ina motagamepa, owa'.”
Ea' nakwaha amam nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele', nogota bandana si'i aman nakwaha anona otam nafe' nowama. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa nanda' beten na'i,
“Ahalome, ine' ni'i a'e, nekwahome kap anama. Ea' ine' nila okom ine'inai atona, ae' owa'.” [
Ea' anona ensel nafi'i heven ilif nase'ana pepel.
Jisas name' nimanimi ea' aom endilisi, ea' nanda' beten la'ifinai endilisi, agwah mandana si'i esimbel malo etap.]
Anan nanda' beten ea' nohafel nafe'ma alupumi ananimi. Ea' nati amam ukup nimanim ambeh maham ma'oh etin.
Ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pa'oh? Ipe' hafel penda' beten. Na'ama amamaga meagwambipei mafi'i fele' ea' motagamepa.”
Jisas ata' na'i etin, amam hiami mafi'i. Aman anama sofalana sa'i Judas, anan alupunai amam 12-peleim Jisasi, nafi'i nali'ma amam. Anan nafi'i felefele'ma Jisasa neasisi' dalogw ananimi.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Judas, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Ine' nasisi'i nihi'amba amam naumbih ae'ami?”
Alupumi ananimi mape malomana mati amam naumbih Jisasi ma'i mombalo'ana mohana ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i afa' oham bainah?”
Ea' anona alupunai ananinai naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami ea' natopa' aliga da'isinai pele'atana nowa.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana mehip na'i, “Kwaha waf anama.”
Ea' Jisas nasa lagel aliga aman anamai, nataga bo'ona wapoti'.

Ea' Jisas na'ipa agufumi Judai maloma amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami mumafi polisman hiami mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi, mafi'i ma'i mombalo'ana. Ea' na'i, “Ipe' pefa'ai bainahi belep pafi'i si'i pa'i pewa' anona aman nanda' wandaf naloma gavmani?

Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wami ma esis amam nematawa hiesi, ea' ipe' owa' peambale'e. Ea' dei' nogota anae' nemaf ipe'inai. Dei' waf anama owambunai a' nikila' ae'.”
Ea' amam mombale'ana mofa'ana mafe' mawis ipat pris dembinai. Ea' Pita ina nalomam nafe' etin, owa'. Nagi'mam nafe' nape laogon.
Amam makata nif indalelemb anama nomon ipat napoma mapomam. Ea' Pita nape nalomam.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwati anan napoma nif. Ea' kwatolona kwa'i, “Aman anama wapoti' anan nape naloma Jisas.”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Ehae', ae' owa'.” Anan na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' ina egawa anan, owa'.”
Ea' nogota bandana hi'alana, anona aman nati Pita na'i, “Ine' wapoti' ine' aman epes hiesi ananisi.”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Aman, ae' owa'.”
Ea' nogota bandana si'i aua atitin, anona aman na'i basef la'ifimi na'i, “Endilisi etis, aman anama wapoti' nape naloma anan. Dei' main, anan wapoti' Galilinai atona.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ehae', ae' owa' eagawa basef amama ine' na'iami.”
Anan ata' na'iam etin, awata nanda'am.

Ea' Dembinai nandamboma nati Pita, ea' okom Pitai nandanda' ma basef amama do'ok Dembinai na'ipanam na'i, “Owamb anae' awata ata' owa' neanda'am, ine' atuwasi nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'iam wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ande' nalef mehip.
Amam mumafi Jisasi manda' anan findiwana mahana.
Amam mapete' anona lowaf mambaho'mana naep mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' ni'i basef profeti newalapa emi nahena.”
Ea' manda' basef hiami awami wapoti' ma anan.
Ama aon natefi amam agufumi esis Judai maloma amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, amam hiami mondowa'anima mape. Ea' mofa' Jisas mafi'mai amam mahali'ana ma'i,
“Ine' ni'ipafa. Ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “I'i ae' ipipa, ina atuwasi pembale'efam owa'.
Ea' i'i ihali'ipa ma anom basef, ipe' ina pegwam, owa'.
Ea' dei' anona nemaf wapoti' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei epe wa'ol lagel da'isinai Godi.”
Ea' amam hiami ma'i, “Dei' ine' God Nogalomana a'amon?”
Ea' anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pa'iam ea' ma'um.”
Ea' amam ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ata' ome' maim basef wapoti'? Owa'. Malogel ananinai atona na'i basef amama afa' wame'am ea'.”
Ea' amam dambami hiami mohafel mofa' Jisas mafe'ma dembinai gavman Pailat.

Ea' ma'i mombaso'mana manda'mana basef ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anama nanda' waf aonai nafela ukup epes hiesi ma sonda' wandaf soloma gavman. Anan nandaiwa'ma epes sese'ana takisa gavman dembinai Sisar ea' na'ipapa na'i anan atona anona dembinai king Krais.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai Judai o owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef amama ine' na'iam endilisimi.”
Ea' Pailat na'ipa amam pris dambami maloma esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Ae' ina ati anom amamaga awami ma epen anama, owa'. Ina ati anona waf aonai ma aman anama enda'mana anom basef, owa'.”

Ea' amam manda'mana basef Jisasi ma'ipana basef la'ifimi ma'i, “Anan nase'asa basef esis amam nematawa hiesi nanda'as sehafel la'ifis sa'i sonda' wandafa ganima hiagoma Judia. Anan nanda'i maol gani etap hiagoma Galili ea' nafi'i nataga na'ae.”
Pailat name' basef amama sa'i anan nanda' maol etap hiagoma Galili ea' nahali' amam na'i, “Aman anama anan Galilinai?”
Amam ma'ipana ea' negawa Jisas anan Galilinai gavman dembinai Herot numafiagoma. Ea' Pailat nasapa'ana nafe'ma Herot. Nogota anama Herot ata' napani Jerusalem.

Herot nati Jisas nandanifelamana endilisi. Anan name' basefa anan nogota launai, ea' na'i notolona. Anan name' basefa maol Jisas nanda'anai ea' na'i Jisas ata' nonda' anona pepel si'i God nanda'anai ma ata' notolona.
Ea' Herot nahali'anama amamaga hiami. Ea' Jisas ina nagwamana anom basef anan, owa'.
Amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mafi'i maitu felefele' manda'mana kot baso'manai la'ifinai endilisi.
Ea' Herot nao'wa amam soldia ananimi manda' Jisas findiwana ma basef awami. Ea' mofa'ai anona lowaf bu'unai mowahe'amonana masapa'ana notanima nafe'ma Pailat.
Fowa' Herot naloma Pailat manda' naumbih, ea' dei' nemaf anama mataga alupumi.
Ea' Pailat nofalai amam pris dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai maloma esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sandakolas.

Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' fa'ai aman anama pa'i nafela ukup epes hiesi nahambombagasa sanda' wandafi sifi'mai ae'. Do'ok ahali'ana ma amamaga amama ma naep ipe'imi pame'e. Ae' ina ati anona waf aonai ma aman anama ma amamaga amama ipe' panda' basefami, owa'.
Dembinai gavman Herot wapoti' na'ama etin. Dei' main, anan nasapa'ana netanima nafi'mai ape'. Ipe' pegawa aman anama ina nanda' anona waf aonai ma ape' mohana neaga', owa'etin.
Ea' atuwasi ehana etin ekwahona nefe' wafifina.”
Ea' waf esis Judai nape na'ama. Afagof danda nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova gavman dembinai Pailat natagaha anona nanda' kalabusi nafe' wafifina ma esis.]
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sa'i mehip na'ama sa'i, “Ha aman anama ma noga', ea' tagaha Barabas nifi'mai ape'.”
Aman anama Barabas anan napa' naloma amam gavmani ma taun anama lu'unai ea' naha enin epen naga'. Ea' dei' sanda'ana nanda' kalabus.
Pailat na'i nokwawa Jisas nefe' wafifina, ea' nahali'as wapoti'.
Ea' sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hana noga', hana noga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”

Ea' Pailat netambel nahali'as wenif wapoti' na'i, “Dei' nanda' maina waf aonai? Ae' ina ati anona waf aonai ofagena napoma aman anama ma ape' mohana neaga', owa'etin. Ea' ae' i'ipa amam soldia mohana mopagahona ea' ekwahona nefe' wafifina.”
Owa'etin. Esis sa'i mehip sa'i anan nohana noga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ea' basef asasimi mikila' basef Pailati.
Ea' Pailat nasopama malogel ananinai naila ukup asasimi.

Aman anama nanda' wandaf naloma gavmani naha enin epen naga'i, sanda'ana nape nanda' kalabus, Pailat nakwahona nafe'mas wafifina. Ea' nagi'ma ukup asasimi nakwahona nafe'mas wafifina ea' nase'asa Jisas nafe'ma esisa amam soldia mefa'ana mafe' mohana noga'.

Amam soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ea' mati anona aman Saimon, anan anona etap hiagoma Sairini, napani aolop nafi'i na'i nefe' nuwis wambel taun lu'wagoma. Ea' masasapa'ana nowandefa lawag anama usi'inai tu'wanainai ekaf ananinai nofa'ana naila Jisas nafe'.
Ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi safe' sagi'mana ea' anowa nematawa wapoti' wafe' walef watawea wafe' wa'i uwahipina ma anan.
Ea' Jisas nandamboma na'ipawa na'i, “Ipe' nematawa Jerusalemipei, ipe' ina pelopa ae', owa'. Ipe' pelopa ipe' peloma awasi ipe'isi'.
Dei' main, anona nemaf netaga ma enis epes si'i, ‘Awau nematawa asawai, ea' awama owa' weaso' nomambeha awasi, awama nambimb ope andeande' ondanifel.’
Ea' anona nemaf lawag anama notaga alina, esis sonda' maina waf?”
Ea' amam soldia mofa' amam biam manda' waf aonai ma'i moham moga' moloma Jisas.

Ea' safe' sataga anagon sofalagon sa'i Pipitagel Balagaina. Anama amam soldia maunda Jisas lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ea' maunda anom biam manda' waf aonai manda' wali mandolam mail wa'olwa'ol Jisas nail la'afen.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa God na'i, “Ahalome, ine' nekwahomama waf aonai amam manda'meanai. Amam ina mogawa andeande' amamaga amama manda'meam ae'i, owa'.”
Ea' amam soldia manda' satu ma luwaguf maim Jisasi ma emi nikila' nefa'am mandandamam atona etin.

Ea' esis amam nematawa saitu sape satolona ea' amam agufumi esis Judai manda' salamalana manda'iafana ma'i, “Anan nagiambama enis epes. Ea' endilisi anan Krais God nandandepana, ata' nigiambama anan atona nondatagah nisila'i.”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i endilisi ine' king Judai, ine' ata' nigiambama ine' etina.”
Anom basef mail lawag anama ilifa balaga ananinai ma'iam ma'i, “AMAN ANAMA DEMBINAI KING ESIS JUDAI.”
Ea' anona aman nanda' waf aonai nail wa'ol na'i basef findiwaimi ma Jisas na'i, “Ine' Krais endilisi, ine' ata' nigiambama ine' nili' ea' nigiambamafa wapoti'.”
Ea' anona nail wa'oli na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ine' nefa' nimanimi na'ama etin si'i aman anama. Ine' owa' umba mehenama Gode?
Amam soldia maha afa' oga' andeande' wandahama waf aonai afa' wanda'anai. Ea' aman anama ina nanda' waf aonai, owa'etin.”
Ea' nandamboma na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Jisas, anona nemaf ine' netaga dembinai king, nemaf anama ine' okokoma ae'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ine' dei' nepe nelome wambel bu'unai Paradais.”
Aon na'i naho'walom, awamb lu'unai nataga naofenia etap hiagoma esis Judai nape nafe' nafe' nataga aon nandamboma nape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' owaf naluwi wapoti'.
Ea' anona lowaf lu'unai si'i uta nail ipat lu'unai God nomoni palalana hi'alana nandawal nataga biefina.
Ea' Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai, ae' ese'enago ambal ae'anai nofo'o lagel ine'inai.”
Anan na'iam na'ama ma ea', a' naga'.
Ea' kepten numafi amam soldiai naitu nati amamaga amama mataga, ea' nafela agel Godi na'i, “Endilisi, aman anama bu'unai.”
Ea' amam nematawa isima hiesi safi'i sandakolasa sati amamaga amama mataga, satolom ea' saha mefetagw asasimi sihi'ambasa ukup asasimi aom endilisi ea' setanima safe'.
Esis alupusi hiesi Jisasi saloma anowa nematawa wafi'i etap hiagoma Galili waila Jisas wafi'i, esis saitu laogon felefele' sati amamaga amama.
Anona aman agilinama Josep anan Arimateainai etap hiagoma Judia. Anan aman bu'unai, dembinai ma amam mumafi esis Juda hiesi.
Anan ina na'i a'e ma amam dambami Juda moha Jisas noga', owa'. Anan nape nohafa nemaf bu'unai neataga ma epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias.
Aman anama nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nefa'ai alop Jisasi neawana.

Ea' nafe' natagaha alop Jisasi nisila'i, nanda' anona lowaf afitinai nowa'ana ma nombafana, nasapa'ana nawis hi'agif anama nalana nomon. Hi'agif anama sagwasana nawis anona owap lu'unai. Fowa' esis ina dei' sawa enin epenagon, ata' owa'.
Nemaf anama sa'i sogolopa gwa'aimianai. Nemaf sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat felefele'ma neataga.
Nematawa awama Galiliwai nimbewa' waloma Jisas wafi'i, awau do'ok wagi' waila Josep wafe' wati hi'agif anama. Ea' wati nomon na'ama Josep nawa Jisasa.
Watolona ea' otanima wafe' ifagw awaumi, wandondomba wel maloma amamaga alogw bu'wami ma'ami ma bimb ofa'am ofe' hi'agif undisa alop Jisasi.
Nemaf anama Sabat nataga, wapoma noma'w si'i mi'uli Godi na'i.

Wafilu nemaf anama Sande nali'ma wik, kuhimbita atona awau ohafel wafe' hi'agif. Agufuwama awama. Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awau agel atona Maria mama'wana Jemsi waloma Joana ea' waloma anowa wapoti'. Ea' ofa' wel maim alogw bu'wami ma'ami awau wali' wandondombami, ofa'am wafe' hi'agif.
Ea' watologon, wati owap anama ina ata' nape nowalo uta, owa'. Enin epen nafe' nawisana nafe' na'oh wa'ol.
Wawis nomon ea' awau ina wati alop Dembinai Jisasi, owa'etin.
Ea' awau ukup matamea mafe'ma amama. Ea' mehip wati anom amam biam mataga felefele'ma awou. Luwaguf amamumi membal endilisi.
Ea' awau umbamahawa endilisi windiwa balagah wati etap. Ea' amam ma'ipawa ma'i, “Ipe' pafi'i pagolopa aman anama ambal napeinai ma na'ae epes saga'i ma main?
Anan ina ata' nape na'ae, owa'. Ea' nohafel ea'! Ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama fowa' nali' na'ipipemi. Nemaf anama ata' nape nalomepa ganima etap hiagoma Galili na'ipipa na'i,
‘Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Esis nambimb sese'e efe'ma amam manda' waf aonai, munde lawag usu'inai tu'wanainai. Ma nimeguf biam hi'ilam, anona nemaf wapoti' etanima ehafel.’ ”
Ea' awau ukup mandanda'ma basef amama fowa' na'iami.
Ea' wakwaha hi'agif otanima wafe' wa'ipa amam alupumi ananimi 11-peleim maloma enis alupusi hiesi ananisi wapoti' ma amamaga amama.
Nematawa awama wanowa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Joana kwaloma ano'w Maria Jems mama'wana. Awau wape waloma anowa nematawa wa'ipa amam Aposel 11-peleim.
Ea' amam ma'i awau wambaso'mam wa'i basef atom wafimi. Owa' meme'awai.
Ea' Pita nohafel nasagih nafe' hi'agif natambe' nati nomon ea', nati luwaguf mowa'anami atom ma'oh. Ea' notanima nafe' ipat okom ananinai nataneama amamaga amama matagai.
Nemaf anama atona anom amam biam alupumi Jisasi mohafel mafe' anona wambel sa'unai felefele' agilinama Emeus. Eaf anama nakwaha Jerusalem nafe' Emeusi kilomita 11-peleina.
Amam mafe' ea' manifa amamaga amama dei' matagai.
Amam ma'iam mandahahali'mam mafe', ea' Jisas atona nataga felefele' nafe' nalomam.
Ea' naep amamumi walufum, ina mati Jisas mogawana, owa'.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pa'i main pafe'?”
Nahali'am na'ama, ukup amamumi aom maitu.
Ea' anona amam biam Kliopas nahali'ana na'i, “Epes hiesi sape Jerusalemi sati amamaga amama mataga nemaf anae' sogawam. Ea' ine' etina owa' negawai.”
Anan na'iam na'ama, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Main de'im?”

Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Amamaga amama matagama Jisas Nasaretinai. Anan dembinai profet na'ipa esis amam nematawa basef bu'wami. Anan la'ifinai ma nawalipasa basef amama nanda' maol la'ifinai ma naep Godi naloma epes wapoti'.
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma agufumi ape'imi mase'ana nafe'ma amam gavman dambami. Ea' amam gavman manda'mana basef mohana naga'. Ea' maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
Ea' fowa' afa' ukup ma'i endilisi wa'i, ‘Aman anama notagaha ape' Israel meape wafifipa.’ Ea' anom basef wapoti'. Amamaga amama mataga ea' nemaf dei'inai nafe'ma wanifi.
Dei' anowa nematawa afa'iwai wanda'afa gegelalasofa kwapete'afa. Kuhimbita atona ohafel wafe' hi'agif,
ea' awo ina wati Jisas, owa'etin. Ea' otanima wafi'i wa'iam wa'i, ‘Afa' wati anom ensel si'i wa'oh wandanda'ah watolom ma'ipafa ma'i.” Anan nohafel nape namunai.” ’
Ea' anom amam afa'imi mafe' hi'agif mati amamaga na'ama etin si'i awau wa'iam. Ea' anan ina matolona, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa nomonas a'ipei. Ukup ipe'imi ea' mase'epa, ina pembale'a basef hiami amam profeti, owa'.
Krais anan ata' nili' nofa' nimanimi ea' nigi' nofa' pepel howalagon ananinai nigi'.”
Ea' nali' nasefela basef hiami Baibelimi amam profet maloma Moses manda'ami nawalipamam. Na'ipam basef amama hiami ma'i anan nawalipamam ofagema hi'alam.
Ea' amam mafe' mataga felefele'ma wambel anama ma'i meafe'ma. Ea' Jisas na'i ata' nefe' etin,
ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nepe nelomafa. Aon nowala felefele'ma owamb.”
Ea' nawis nape nalomam.
Amam ma'i mea' gwa'aimi, anan nape nalomam nafela bret nanifela God nawalona nase'amana.
Anan nanda'am na'ama ma amam ea' naep amamumi pele'atam dei' mogawana. Ea' nohafel nafe' nakwaha amam matimana owa'.
Ea' ma'i, “Afa' wafi'i eaf ukup afa'imi ea' mohafel endilisi ma anan nawalapa basef mape Baibeli na'ipafam nogota anama.”
Amam ma'iam na'ama ea', dei' atef mohafel motanima mafe' Jerusalem. Ea' mati alupumi 11-peleim Jisasi maloma enis alupusi amamisi sandatama sape.
Ea' sa'ipa amam biam sa'i, “Endilisi etis Dembinai notanima nohafel! Saimon natolona ea'.”
Ea' amam biam ma'ipasa amamaga amama do'ok matolom eafi. Ma'ipasam ma'i, “Anan nalomafa wape nawala bret watolona ea' ogawana.”
Esis ata' sa'i basef amama atom, Jisas naitu la'afena esis na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
Ea' satolona sohafel gegelalasis kwapete' umbamahas. Esis sa'i sati anona gamba.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' gegelalasipa kwapete'epa ma main? Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi matamea?
Ipe' piti lagufi bo'wagah ae'ami. Ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi ape si'iwi. Ipe' pesa lagofa ae' peme'e. Gambefah ina alop naloma bihitagof mapeis si'i pati mape alop ae'anai, owa'.”
Anan na'iam na'ama ma ea', nihi'ambasa lagofi bo'wagah ananimi.
Ea' sandanifela sati anan. Ea' esis gegelalasis kwapete' ukup matamea, owa' ata' seambale'efanai.
Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' anom gwa'aimi o owa'?”
Ea' sase'ana anona aol tu'waninai saofanai.
Nandalombasana na'ana ama naep asasimi.

Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' ae' ata' ape alomepa, a'ipipa ea' ma basef hiami mail buk Baibeli ma mi'uli God fowa' gani naso' Mosesanai. Buk anama amam profeti maloma Buk Songi, basef amama hiami ma'i ae'. Basef amama hiemi dei' mataga endilisi mandawalap alihim.”
Anan nihi'ambas andeande'ma ukup asasimi ma segawa basef mail Buk Baibeli.
Ea' na'ipas na'i,
“Fowa' gani amam manda' basef amama mail buk Baibeli ma'i Krais nefa' nimanimi sohana noga' ma nimeguf bi'am hi'ilam anona neafe'ma wanomi, notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.

Ama agel ananinai anona nemaf alupusi ananisi sili' sowalapa basef Jerusalem ea' si'ipasam amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas sape wambel hiagomai ma seamboma opalefa God nokwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
Ipe' pati amamaga amama matagamai ma nambimb pi'ipa amam nematawa hiesi.

Ipe' peme! Anom amamaga la'ifimi fowa' Ahalome na'iam endilisi na'i niesi'ipami felefele' miefi'imipei. Ipe' pepe la'ela'ef taun anama pefe'ma petaga nemaf anama la'ifimi amama misila'i heven ilifi meafi'mai ipe'.”
Jisas nao'wa esis amam nematawa hiesi safe' sataga felefele'ma Betani ea' nasa'ma lagof malata nofalo'masa nonda'as la'ifis.
Anan ata' nofalo'mas etin, God nagiana nakwaha esis nalata heven ilif.
Ea' sanifelana sanda' lotumana ea' sandanifel endilisi sotanima safe' Jerusalem sandanifel la'ela'ef sape.
Ea' la'ela'ef sape ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai safela agel ananinai lu'una endilisi.
Fowa' gani dambadamba anom Basef epen nape. Ea' Basef epen anama nape naloma God. Ea' epen anama agilinama Basef anan atona God.
Fowa' dambadamba epen anama agilinama Basef naloma God nape.
Anan nanda' epes ea' nanda' amamaga hiami. Owa' anom amamaga motaga anona eaf, owa'etin. Epes saloma amamaga matagai hiami anan atona nanda'am mataga.
Ambal namunai napaina nape epen anama ea' ambal anama nanda' epes howalas.
Howalagon anama nanda' owamb howalagon. Ea' owamb ina naofeniagon, owa'.
Anona aman nataga, agilinama Jon, God nasapa'ana nafi'i.
Anan nafi'i ma neawalapa basef. Dei' nawalapa basefa howalagon anama ma epes hiesi some' basef ananimi sembale'efana.
Jon nawalapa basef amama anan ina nagwapin anama nanda' epes hiesi howalas, owa'. Anan nali' nafi'i ma neawalapa basef alihima nagwapin anama endilisinai nafi'i etap anae' nanda' epes howalas.
Nagwapin anama nanda' epes howalas endilisi nafi'i etap anae' ma dei' nogota anae'.
Fowa' gani anan nanda' etap anae' nataga, dei' nafi'i nape etap anae'. Ea' esis amam nematawa etapasi ina segawana, owa'.
Anan nafi'i nataga ofagama etap hiagoma esis Juda, ea' epes hiesi Ananisi ina sogawana sa'i sofa'ana sembale'efana, owa'etin.
Ea' esis emi egafis amam nematawa seambale'efanai, nese'asa esis agofa setaga awasi Godi.
Esis ina sataga awasi Godi ma waf bu'unai mamasas solasi, owa'etin. Esis ina sataga awasi Godi si'i ukup mamasasi ma'i ma selas, owa'. God atona nanda'as sataga awasi ananisi.

Basef mataga epen ea' anan nape la'afena ape', ea' wati howalagon pepel Ananinai. Howalagon anama pepel Nogalomana atona, Ahalomana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Ape' mati amama nagiambamapa etin nanda'apa la'ifipa ma nihi'ambapa waf endilisinai nape si'ina ma anan.

Ea' Jon nawalapa basefa anan na'ama na'i mehip na'i, “Anan aman anama fowa' ali' a'ipipana a'i. Anan nigi'ma ae' neafi'i, anan nape nali'ma ae'. Dei' main, mama'we ata' owa' kolae anan fowa'inai napen ambal namunai.”
Ape' hiapai mofa' amamaga bu'wami hiami mapoma anan atona. Waf anama nagiambamapa etin nanda'apa la'ifipa nanda'am mape na'ama etin nimeguf hiami.
Fowa' God nase'ana mi'uli Moses ea' Moses nawalipas. Ea' Jisas Krais nikila' Moses nagiambamapa etin ma waf endilisinai.

Owa' anona epen nieti Gode. Owa'etin. Nogalomana anama Godi atotona natolona. Anan na'ama etin si'i God. Anan nape felefele' endilisi naloma Ahalomana ea' nawalapa basef ofagema ma ape' nihi'ambapa God.
Anom amam dambami Judaimi mapani Jerusalem masapa'i anom amam mafe' mahali' Jon. Anom pris maloma anom Livai mumafi ipat Godi, amam mapani Jerusalem mafi'i mahali' Jon ma'i, “Ine' emi egafina?”
Ea' Jon ina nambaho'a basef, owa'. Anan nagwamam nawalapa basef alihim na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina Krais God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i, owa'.”
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' ine' enina profet fowa'inai agilinama Elaija?”
Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
Ea' ma'i, “Dei' ine' aman anama Profet ape' mape mohafanai?”
Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “Owa'.”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' ine' emi? Ama afa' utanima ofe' wi'ipa dambami masapa'afa wafi'i. Ine' na'i ine' etina na'i maim basef, ine' emi?”
Ea' Jon nagwa basef si'i fowa' profet Aisaia na'iam na'i,
“Ae' anona maf atona na'i anona etap fatauguma wafiguma na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Pendondomba eaf Dembinai!’ ”

Ea' anom Farisi dambami Judai masapa'am mafi'i mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' Krais God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o, ine' Elaija o, ine' enina Profet dembinai? I'i ine' owa' Krais, owa' Elaija, enina Profet, dei' ine' napisi'asa embela main?”
Ea' Jon nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' apisi'as embel atom wafimi, ea' anona aman nape la'afena ipe', ina pegawana.
Aman anama nigi'ma ae' niefi'i. Ae' ina epen bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'. Anan dembinai endilisi, nikila' ae'.”
Basef amama mataga anona wambel Betani walemb Jordan fisana, Jon napisi' esis amam nematawa.
Wafilu Jon nati Jisas nafi'mai anan na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Ipe' piti aman anama anan si'i mafin sipsip nogalomana Godi. Anan nambimb nokwaha waf aonai esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi sanda'anai.
Anan ma'una anama ea' nafi'i. Anama fowa' ae' a'ipipa a'i, ‘Anona aman nigi'ma ae' niefi'i, anan nali'ma ae'. Dei' main, anan nali' nape ea' ae' selai agi' ataga.’
Ae' ina egawa anan epen emi egalina, ata' owa'etin. Ae' afi'i apisi'ipa embela eawalapa aman anama dembinai ma ape' amam nematawa Israel.”
Ea' Jon nawalapa basef alihim na'i, “Ae' ati Ambal Bu'unai Godi nakwaha heven nisila'i si'i amil mai'una nisila'i ea' nafe' nape nomona anan.

I'I God owa' nie'ipi basef amama ae' ina egawa anan, owa'. Ea' God nasapa'e afi'i ma iepisi'asa embel anan na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' niti Ambal bu'unai Ae'anai nisila'i ma ea' aman anama ea' ma'una. Anan nambimb nesapa'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope nolomepa.’
Ae' atolona endilisi awalapa basef alihima anan a'iam a'i, anama anan Nogalomana Godi endilisi.”
Wafilu Jon nafe' naitu wapoti' na'ama ea' alupumi ananimi biam malomana mape.
Ea' nati Jisas nafo'o, na'ipa alupumi ananimi nihi'ambama Jisas na'i, “Piti, anan si'i sipsip nogalomana Godi.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' na'ipam na'ama, mafe' maila Jisas.
Ea' Jisas nandamboma nati amam mailana na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pa'i pifi'i pegolopa main?”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Rabai, ine' nape maina ipat?” Agel anama “Rabai” ape' mambomana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa.”
Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ata' fi'i ma petologon.”
Ea' mafe' ipat anan napeinai. Nemaf anama atona wambomota aon nandamboma napani gani wa'ol 4 klok, ea' malomana mapani.
Amam mame' basef amama Jisasi Jon fowa' nali' na'iami mailana. Amam agilinama Saimon Pita naloma owalomana Andru.
Andru nali' name' basef Jisasi atom, netambel nagolopa Saimon, ea' na'ipana na'i, “Afa' wati Mesaia ea'.”
Ape' dei' mamboma agel anama Mesaia ma'i Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
Ea' Andru nao'wa Saimon nafi'mai Jisas natolona na'i, “Ine' Saimon nogalomana Joni. Anona nemaf agel ine'inai nefala Sifas.”
Agel anama “Pita” na'i owap.
Wafilu Jisas na'i nefe' etap anama hiagoma Galili. Ea' nagolopa Filip natolona na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.”
Filip nafi'i wambel anama atona Pita naloma Andru mafi'ima, Betsaida.

Ea' Filip nafe' nagolopa Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Aman anama fowa' gani Moses nanda' basefa mi'uli God na'ianai, ea' amam profet wapoti' manda' basef ma'ianai, aman anama ma'una afa' watolona. Anan Jisas Nasaretinai, Josep nogalomana.”
Ea' Nataniel nahali' Filip na'i, “Dei' anom amamaga bu'wami mataga mafi'i Nasaret?”
Ea' Filip na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nitolona.”
Ea' Jisas nati Nataniel nafi'mai anan na'ipana na'i, “Niti aman anama Israelinai endilisi, aman bu'unai. Anan owa' ni'i anom basef baso'maimi.”
Ea' Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ine' negawe na'imama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Do'ok Filip ina dei' nofalena, ata' owa'etin, ae' ali' atilina nape lawag fik ofagena. Nogota anama atilina.”
Ea' Nataniel nagwamana na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' nogalomana Godi endilisi. Ine' dembinai King ape' Israeli.”
Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'i, “Do'ok ae' atilina nape lawag ofagena fik. Amama atom dei' ine' nombale'efa ae'. Endilisi, anona nemaf ine' niti anom amamaga la'ifimi mikila' amama.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona nemaf ipe' piti heven nindowsi' negal ea' amam ensel Godi molata misila'i ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.”
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma wenif, anona aman naso' ano'w nemata'w wambel anama Kana nape etap anama hiagoma Galili. Ea' mama'wana Jisasi kwape kwalomas kwati sandase'ama.
Esis sofala Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi wapoti' mafi'i mati sandase'ama.
Ea' embel wain hi'alam. Ea' mama'wana Jisasi kwafi'i kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Esis embel wain a'as.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Mama'we, maol anama ina ae'anai. Nogota ae'anai ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'.”
Ea' kwa'ipa amam manda' maola anan naso' nemata'wi kwa'i, “I'i anan nie'ipipa anom basef, ipe' peme'ana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam manda' maoli na'i, “Ipe' pilai embel pekolo'wam maloh amama ma si'im endilisi.”
Ea' amam molam si'im si'i anan na'ipam.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' nelai tu'wanim pefa'am pefe' pese'anam aman numafi gwa'aimi.”
Ea' mofa'mana embel mafe'.

Dembinai numafi gwa'aimi embel amama name'am, ea' mataga bo'om si'i wain, ea' anan ina negawa embel amama amam mola embel atom, owa'. Ea' amam manda' maola anan mogawam. Ea' anan dembinai nofala aman anama naso' nemata'wi

na'ipana na'i, “Epes hiesi ata' sali' sase'asa wain anama bu'unai nali' sa'ana ea' sagi' sofa'masi wain anama aonai kwaikwaie'. Ea' ine' owa'etin. Ine' nambaho'wa wain anama bu'unai na'ihi dei'aol nagi' nefa'ana nafi'i.”
Ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nati epes satama mafis amama sipsip bulmakau amiguf mai'unamb ea' enis satalom otamba sindisisila'mam.

Ea' Jisas nafela anona mandof strin natopagas nanda' anep wip si'i bolam. Ea' natopaga epes isima natofas natofamasa amamaga amama asasimi sipsip maloma bulmakau wapoti' mawis mafe' ande'. Ea' nakowasom otamba moni esis sindisisila'mami nakwahom, namboma tebol asasimi nakolo'asam.
Ea' na'ipa amam amama matala mai'unamb na'i, “Ipe' fa'a amamaga amama fo'o. Ipe' ina penda' ipat Ahalomei netaga si'i ipat maket, owa'.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi ukup mandanda'ma anom basef mape Baibel ma'iam ma'i, “Ae' okom nohafel endilisi ma enda' maol la'ifinai endilisi ma imafi ipat ine'inai neape andeande'.”
Ea' amam Juda mati anan nanda'am na'ama, ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' ata' nihi'ambafa anona ikwaf si'i God atona nanda'anai ma weagawa ine' agel lu'unai ma nanda'am na'ama ma afa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' penda'ana ipat anama lu'unai Godi aona, nambimb ae' etanima ela'ana notawa wapoti' nimeguf wanom.”
Ea' amam Juda ma'ipana ma'i, “Ipat anama sanda'ana sala'ana afagof hiami 46-peleim, ea' ine' na'i nimeguf wanom etin nela'ana wapoti' a' amon?”
Ea' ipat anama Jisas na'ianai ina na'i ipat anama endilisinai lu'unai Godi, owa'. Anan na'i alop ananinai.

Nemaf anama God nafelana wapoti' hi'agif sawanama, nogota anama amam alupumi ananimi ukup mapoma basef amama ananimi fowa' na'iami. Ea' dei' mombale'efa basef amama mape Baibel maloma basef amama Jisas fowa' na'iami.
Jisas nape Jerusalem ama nimeguf amama Pasovaimi, esis amam nematawa hiesi sati ikwaf la'ifinai anan nanda'anai ea' sembale'efana.
Ea' Jisas negawa nomonas asasimi epes hiesi. Na'ama anan ina nembale'efas, owa'.
Anan ina gawa a'ana ma enis sie'ipana ma waf epesi, owa'etin. Anan negawa epes hiesi ea' negawa ukup opalef asasimi.
Anona aman agilinama Nikodemus, anan Farisi agel lu'unai ma esis Juda. Anan nape dembinai asasinai.

Anona owamb nafi'mai Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ape' mogawa ine', God nasapa'ena nafi'i si'i Dembinai Tisa. I'i owa' God nope noloma anona epen, anan ina la'ifina neanda' maol anama la'ifinai ine' nanda'anai, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, emi epen God owa' nendan netaga dambaini, enin ina nambimb niowis wambota Godi numafian, owa'etin.”
Ea' Nikodemus nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' amama hagasi sonda'am si'imama ma solas seataga dambais wapoti'? Esis sotanima suwis opalef mamasasi nomon, ama nambimb otanima olas wapoti'?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, i'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi owa' nenda'an dambaina embel, ina nambimb la'ifin niowis wambota Godi, owa'etin. Ea' i'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nolan dambain, enin wilama niowis wambota Godi.
Amamaga mataga alop atonai, amama alop atopumi si'i ano'w nemata'w kola awani. Ea' amamaga Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'ami, amama mataga si'i Ambal Bu'unai.
Ina nomonas natanea a'ipina na'ama a'i petaga dambaipa wapoti' si'i epes solaipa, owa'.
Uf naluwi si'i nalo nafe' ganigani. Ine' name' uf atona, ea' ina negawa anama nalo nafi'ima nafe'ma, owa'. Epes hiesi Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'as sataga dambais, esis sataga na'ama etin.”
Ea' Nikodemus nagwamana basef na'i, “Amamaga amama nambimb motaga mondawalap mi'imama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Dei' si'i main? Ine' Dembinai Tisa nawalipasa basef esis Juda, ea' ine' owa' negawa amamaga amama?
Endilisi ae' a'ipina, afa' wa'i amamaga afa' wagawami, ea' wawalapa amamaga amama watolomi. Ea' ipe' pewa' alafugaha basef amama afa' wawalapami.
Ae' a'ipipa amamaga amama etapami, ea' ipe' ina pegawam pembale'efam, owa'. I'i ae' iea'ipipa amamaga ilifami, nambimb ipe' pegawa pembale'efam pi'imama? Owa'etin.
Ina enin epen etapani nealata gani heven, owa'. Ae' atowe. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ea' ae' atowe akwaha heven isila'i, ae' ma'uwi.

Fowa' Moses nafela anona yul nanda' kapa nanda'anai nail anona lawag ilif. Nanda'ana anama wafiguma fatauguma. Anama na'ama etina anona nemaf sefela ae' ataga epen endilisiwei sundi ieil anona lawag ilif.
Ama epes emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i, anona nemaf sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.

Endilisi, God Nogalomana ananinai atotona nape. Owa'etin. Ea' anan okom nainaila amam nematawa hiapai mape etapi. Ea' nase'apai Nogalomana ananinai atotona ma emi egafis sombale'efanai sope andeande', ina sega'ma waf aonai, owa'. Sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
God ina nasapa' Nogalomana ananinai nafi'i etap anae' ma neanda'mapa basef, owa'. Anan nasapa'ana nafi'i ma nofa' ape' epes hiapai mape etapi motanimani.

Emi egafis sembale'efa anan, esis anona nemaf basef kot lu'unai a'as. Ea' emi egafis owa' seambale'efana, epes isima hegililas ea' ma kot anama lu'unai aonai. Dei' main? Esis sandaiwa'ma seambale'efa Nogalomana atotona Godi, na'ama epes isima hegililas hi'alas.

Basef ofagema ma kot lu'unai anama na'ama. Howalagon nafi'i nataga etap anae', ea' esis ukup maimaila waf anama etapanai atona si'i sape owamb, sandaiwa'ma howalagon. Dei' maina esis sandaiwa'? Esis sanda' waf aonai na'ama dei' sandaiwa'.
Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, sowa' alafugaha howalagon, esis sandaiwa'ma sifi'mai howalagon ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai neandawalap. Ea' dei' umbamahas sandaiwa'.
Emi egafis sanda' waf endilisinai safi'mai howalagon ma enis epes sitilis seagawa esis sape la'ifis la'ela'ef saloma God sanda' opeh ananimi.”
