Ae' ina nambimb i'i basef hiami elomepa, owa'. Dei' main? Aman dembinai aonai numafi etap anae' anama dei' nafi'i. Anan ina nambimb la'ifinama nonda'me anom amamaga, owa'etin.
Ea' ae' a'i esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sogawa ae' okom nainaila Ahalome endilisi. Na'ama dei' anda'am na'ama etin si'i anan na'ipi. Ea' dei' afa' ofe'.
Ae' si'i lawag wain si'ina
endilisi. Ahalome ae'anai Anan si'i ofagenama aofi. Aof anama sawa lawah su'utip wainim gwa'aimi mailami.
Agof hiami su'utip owa' mielami, amama Ahalome natopa'am nakwahom. Ea' anom agof mail mola gwa'aimi amama anan nandombasom natopa'am bandam ama nambimb mope bo'om mil mola gwa'aimi hiami andeande'.
Basef amama Ae' a'ipipami monda'epa pataga bo'wepa ea'.
Ipe' pepe ae' ea' ae' nambimb epe ipe'. I'i agof atom wafim, ina mola gwa'aimi, owa'. I'i agof owa' mondala la'ifim lawag si'ina,
amam ina molo andeande', mil mola gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin si'i ipe'. I'i ipe' owa' pepe peloma ae', ipe' wapoti' ina pela anom gwa'aimi, owa'etin.
Ae' si'i lawag si'ina, ipe' si'i agof. Emi egafis sope Ae' ma Ae' ape esis, nambimb sola gwa'aimi hiami. I'i ipe' pekwaha Ae', ipe' etipa ina nambimb penda' anom amamaga, owa'.
I'i ipe' pepe ae' ma basef ae'ami mope nomona ipe', ipe' pihali' ae' ma maim basef pendahama ukup ipe'imi ma'iam, anona nemaf amamaga amama motagamepa na'ama etin.
I'i ipe' pela gwa'aimi hiami, Ahalome ae'anai nofa' agel lu'unai. Ama pihi'amba amam nematawa hiesi ipe' pepe alupipei Ae'ipei.
Ahalome okom nainaila Ae', ea' na'ama etin Ae' okom nainaila ipe'. Ipe' la'ela'ef pepe okom ae'anai la'afena pegawa okom ae'anai nainailipa endilisi.
I'i ipe' pila mi'uli ae'anai andeande', nambimb pepe okom ae'anai nomon si'i ae' aila mi'uli Ahalome andeande'ma ape okom ananinai nomon.
Ae' a'ipipa basef amama ma a'i danifel anama ae'anai nepe nelomepa ea' danifel ipe'inai nepe opalef ipe'imi si'im.
Mi'uli ae'anai anama. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi atona etin si'i ae' okom nainailipa.
Emi egafis ukup mimila alupisi ma sokwaha ambagof asasimi atom soga', ma sigiambama alupisi asasisi, waf anama nikila' waf bu'unai hianai.
I'i pila mi'uli a'ipipanai andeande' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei.

Epen agel a'ani dembinai ananinai ina na'ipana basef alihima maol anan nienda'anai, owa'. Ea' ae' a'ipipa basef hiami Ahalome ae'anai na'ipiami. Na'ama dei' ae' ina efalepa epes falafipei agof a'ipei, owa'. Ae' efalepa alupipei endililsi.

Ipe' ina pali' pesaho' ae' ipe'iwei, owa'. Ae' ali' andandepepa ea' ae'ipei. Ea' anda'epa panda' opeh bu'wami. Ama pefe' penda' opeh bu'wami si'i lawah mola gwa'aimi ma opeh bu'wami ipe'imi mope andeande'. Penda'am na'ama ma i'i ipe' penda' beten pihali' Ahalome ma anom amamaga agel ae'anai, anan nose'epa.
Ae' ase'epa mi'uli ipe' na'ama. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi atona etin.
I'i esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai si'i sonda'mepa naumbih, ipe' pegawa esis fowa' sali' sanda'ma ae' naumbih wapoti.

I'i ipe' epes etapipei, esis saila waf etapanai ukup mimilipa si'i ipe' epes asasipei etipa. Ea' ipe' ina epes etap anae'ipei, owa'. Ae' esahe'epa ea' ma pekwaha waf etapanai. Ea' dei' esis saila waf etapanai sonda'mepa naumbih.

Ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama ae' a'ipipa emi andeande'. Basef amama ma'i Ae' Dembiwei ipe'iwei ma'i epen agel a'ani nanda' opeh etini, enin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'. Ae' sali' sanda'me waf aonai, ea' nambimb esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, sonda'epa awepa wapoti'. I'i esis sila basef ae'ami, nambimb esis siela basef ipe'imi wapoti'. Owa'etin.
Esis ina sogawa Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i, owa'. Ipe' ukup mopoma agel ae'anai, ea' ae'ipei. Ea' esis saila waf etapanai sonda' amamaga awami hiami ma ipe'.
I'i ae' owa' ifi'i ie'ipasa basef amama, esis ofagema ma waf aonai a'as. Owa'etin. Dei' esis owa' anona eafa sombaho'a waf aonai asas sanda'anai, owa'.
Emi egafis sonda'me naumbih, esis sonda' naumbiha Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'.

Esis saila waf etapanai ina sati anona aman nanda' opeh mandahama opeh ae' anda'ami, owa'. I'i ae' owa' enda 'opeh amama, esis ofagenama waf aonai a'as. Ea' dei' sati opeh ae'ami la'ifimi ea' sowa' alafugaha ae' ukup aom endilisi ma ae' aloma Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'.
Ea' waf anama asasinai nafe' na'ama etin si'i anom basef mail mi'uli esis Judai ma'i, ‘Esis ukup aoma ae' etin. Ae' basef ofagema a'e.’

Ea' Anan nigiambamepa nonda'epa la'ifipa, Anan napani naloma Ahalome nambimb nifi'i. Ea' Ae' nambimb esapa'ana nifi'mai ipe'. Anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapa basef endilisimi. Nemaf anama Ae' esapa'ana nifi'mipei, nowalapa basefa ae'ami.
Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' wapoti' nambimb pi'i basef ae'ami pewalapama esis. Dei' main, ipe' fowa' dambadamba pati asefela maol anda'ana palome pape la'ela'ef pafi'i pataga dei'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' dei' a'ipipa basef amama hi'alam ma ipe' ina pekwaha pembale'efa ae', owa'.
Anona nemaf esis sogalo'mepa ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Anona nemaf notaga ma emi egafis sehepa pega', esis ukup mondanda' si'i sanda' maol bu'unai Godi. Owa'etin.
Fowa' esis ina sogawa Ahalome naloma ae' wapoti', owa. Na'ama esis sanda' waf anama aonai.
Ea' dei' a'ipipa ea' ma amamaga amama. Ama nemaf anama neataga ma esis sonda'epa na'ama, ipe' ukup mondanda'ma basef amama dei' a'ipipami.
Fowa' Ae' ape alomepa Ae' ina a'ipipa ma amamaga amama, owa'. Ea' dei' ae' efe'ma anan anama nasapa'e afi'i. Ina anona aman ipe'inai nahali'i na'i, ‘Ine' nefe' eti?’ Owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa basef amama ea' ma ipe'. Ea' dei' opalef ipe'imi nimanim endilisi.

Ea' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi. Ae' ikwahipa efe' ma igiambamepa pepe andeande'. I'i ae' owa' eafe', dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nonda'epa la'ifipa, ina nambimb nifi'mai ipe', owa'. I'i ae' efe', esapa'ana nifi'mai ipe'.
Nemaf anama niefi'ianai, nihi'amba esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai ma sogawa basef ofagema ma waf aonai noloma waf bu'unai noloma wafa God nowaloga epes hiesi ma nonda'masa basef.
Waf aonai ofagena asasinai na'ama. Esis ina sombale'efa ae', owa'.
Waf ofagena bu'unai na'ama. Ae' efe'ma Ahalome ea' ipe' ina petolowe wapoti', owa'.
Basef ofagema ma kot na'ama. Aman dembinai aonai ma epes etapasi, anan faso'mana ma kot anama ma basef lu'wami God dei' nanda'manami.

Nemaf anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'i basef endilisimi atomi niefi'i, nihi'ambepa ma basef hiami endilisimi. Anan ina nowalapa basef nomonas ananimi atom, owa'. Basef name'am ea', amama atom nowalapam ni'ipipam. Ama ni'ipipa amamaga amama ma'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai.
Ea' nofa' basef ae'ami nowalapama ipe' ma nowalapa agel ae'anai.
Amamaga Ahalomei Ae'anai hiami, amama ae'ami. Ea' dei' Ae' a'iam a'i nambimb Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa' basef Ae'ami ni'iam nowalapama ipe'.

Anom alupumi ananimi, amam atom manda'ipama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Maim basef ofagema amama anan na'ipafa emi? Anan na'i, nogota bandana afa' ina nambimb otolona, ea' nambimb otolona wapoti'. Na'i nefe'ma Ahalomana. Afa' ina ogawa basef amama ofagema, owa'.”
Ea' amam ma'iam wapoti' ma'i, “Nogota anama bandana anan na'ianai, amama amamaga maim? Afa' ina ogawa basef amama na'iam na'ama, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas nogawa amam ma'i mohali'ana, ea' na'ipam na'i, “A'i ipe' pahali'ima basef amama ofagema ae' a'iami. Ae' a'iam na'ama. Nogota bandana ipe' ina petolowe, owa'. Ea' nambimb ipe' petolowe wapoti'.

Endilisi ae' a'ipipa. Nambimb ipe' pelef mehip pendahowe. Ea' esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sondanifel. Ea' ipe' opalef nimanim. Owa'etin. Opalef ipe'imi nimanim ea' nambimb mondamboma monda'epa pendanifel endilisi.

Nemata'w opafu'wi ma kwa'i kola awani akwa'w kwame' nimanimi kogawa nogota bandana ma kola awani nataga ea'. Na'ama opaf akwa'unai nimanina. Akwa'w kolana ea', akwa'w ina ata' okom nandanda'ma nimanimi amama wapoti', owa'. Akwa'w kwandanifel etin kwapoma so'uso'win nataga nape etap ea'.
Ipe' na'ama etin, dei' ipe' opalef nimanim. Ea' nambimb ae' itilipa wapoti', opalef ipe'imi bo'om. Ina enin epen la'ifina nogalo'ma danifel anama ipe'inai, owa'.
Nemaf anama ipe' ina pihali'i ma anom amamaga atom, owa'. Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi ipe'. I'i ipe' pihali' Ahalome ma maim amamaga ma agel ae'anai, nambimb nese'epam.
Fowa' ipe' ina pahali'ana ma pefa' anom amamaga agel ae'anai, owa'. Dei' pihali'anamam, pefa'ama opalef ipe'imi bo'om endilisi.
Ae' dei' a'i basef amama womun etina ipe'. Ea' ae' ina nambimb ata' i'ipipa basef womun etin, owa'. Nemaf anama ae' ewalapam alihim i'ipipam ipe' ma Ahalome.
Ama nemaf anama ipe' pihali' Ahalome ma agel ae'anai. Ae' ina ata' i'ipipa na'ama i'i ae' atowe ihali'ana ma nigiambamepa, owa'.
Ahalome atona okom nainailipa endilisi. Dei' main, ipe' ukup maimaila ae' endilisi, ea' ipe' pembale'efa ae' pegawa ae' ape aloma God afi'i.
Fowa' gani ae' ape aloma Ahalome ea' akwahona afi'i etap anae'. Dei' ae' a'i ekwaha etap anae' etanima efe'ma anan.”
Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' ine' na'ipafam alihim, ina ata' na'i basef womun etin, owa'.
Dei' afa' ogawa ina ata' nape nehafa enin epen nihali'ina nili', owa'etin. Ine' negawa amamaga hiami ea'. Amama atom dei' afa' wambale'efa ine' nape naloma God nafi'i.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' dei' pembale'efa ae' a' amon?
Ipe' peme'. Nogota felefele' notaga, endilisi nataga ea' ma sogalo'ma ipe' hipei atona etin pefe' wambel ipe'inai. Ea' pekwaha ae' atowe epe. Ea' ina ae' atowe epe, owa'. Ahalome nape nalome.
Ae' a'i ipe' pepe pelome opalef ipe'imi mope awanem. Na'ama dei' a'ipipa basef amama. Etap anae' ipe' peme' opalef nimanim. Pepe la'ifipa! Dei' main, ae' agalo'ma waf aonai etapanai ikila'ana ea'.”

Jisas na'i basef na'ama ma ea', naniga nati heven ilif nanda' beten na'i, “Ahalome, nogota nataga ea'. Dei' ine' nese'e agel lu'unai ae' nogalomena ine'iwei, ma atuwasi la'ifiwi ma efela agel ine'inai lu'una.
Dei' main? Ine' nendandepe ea' ma ape Dembiwei ali'ma epes hiesi ese'as ambal namunai epes isima hiesi ine' nasi'iesi. Ambal anama nenda' esis sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Ambal namunai anama ofagena anama. Esis sogawa ine' etina God endilisinai ea' sogawa endilisi ae' Jisas Krais, ine' nasapa'e afi'i.
Opeh amama ine' nasapa'e afi'i ma eanda'ami, ae' anda'am hi'alam. Ea' dei' afela agel ine'inai lu'una ma naep esis amam nematawa etapasi.
Ahalome, fowa' etap anae' owa' ata' notagai ae' ape alomena efa' agel lu'unai. Dei' ine' nese'e agel anama lu'unai si'i fowa'.
Ae' awalapa agel ine'inai ea' a'ipa epes isima ine' naso' ae'asi ma etap anae'. Epes isima ine'isi naso' ae'asi. Esis saila basef ine'imi andeande'.
Dei' sogawa amama hiami ine' nase'eam ae'i hi'alam, amama mafi'mai ine' etina.
Basef hiami ine' nasi'iami, amama ae' a'ipasam ea' sofa'am sogawa endilisi fowa' ae' ape alomena afi'i. Ea' sombale'efa basef amama ine' nasapa'e afi'i.

Dei' ae' anda' betena igiambama esis. Ae' ina anda' betena igiambama esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai, owa'. Ae' anda' betena igiambama epes isima ine' naso' ae'asi. Dei' main? Isima esis ine'isi si'isi.
Ea' epes ae'asi, isima ine'isi etis. Epes hiesi ine'isi hi'alas isima ae'asi. Ea' enis epes siti epes isima ae'asi ea' dei' sogawa nafifili pepel ine'inai.

Dei' ae' ina ata' epe etap anae' wapoti', owa'. Ea' esis sope etap anae'. Ea' ae' efe'mago ine'. Ahalome bu'unai endilisi, ine' nimafi esisa sope la'ifisa pepel anama ine'inai, nali' nasi'ianai. Ine' nenda'am na'ama ma esis sope wambota atotona si'i afa' biafa wape atotofa.

Nogota anama ae' ape aloma esis, ae' emafias sape pepel ine'inai, pepel anama ine' nasi'ianai. Ae' emafias andeande' ea' ina enin atitin higilalan, owa'. Aman hegilialanai, anan atona nambimb nefe' wambel aonai ma basef ine'imi mail buk Baibeli motaga endilisi mondawalap.
Ae' dei' ata' ape etap anae' a'i basef amama ma danifel ae'anai nepe si'ina opalef asasimi. Ea' dei' efe'mago ine'.
Basef ine'imi, ae' ase'asam ea'. Esis amam nematawa sanda'ma esis naumbih sanda'as awes. Dei' main? Esis ina saila waf etap anae'inai si'i ae' wapoti' ina etap anae'iwei, owa'.
Ae' ina anda' beten ahali'ina ma nogalo'mas etap anae', owa'. Ae' anda' betena ine' nimafiasa aman aonai ina nohambombagas, owa'.
Esis ina saila waf etapanai si'i ae' wapoti' ina etap anae'wei, owa'.
Basef ine'imi amama endilisimi. Ine' nenda' esis sotaga ine'isi etis bo'wes ma basef amama.
Fowa' ine' nasapa'e afi'i ape la'afena esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai. Dei' na'ama etin ae' wapoti' asapa' esis ae'asi sofe' la'afena esis isima saila waf etapanai.
Ine' nigiambame epe ine'iwei atowe ma igiambama esis wapoti' sotaga bo'wes andeande' ine'isi etis.
Ae' ina anda' betena igiambama esis amama atom, owa'etin. Ae' anda' betena agiambama epes isima anona nemaf some' basefa esisa sombale'efa ae'.

Ahalome, ae' anda' betena esis isima hiesi sope ukup etifim si'i ine' Ahalome nape naloma ae' ea' ape alomena. Ea' na'ama etin, anda' betena esis sope afa' biafa. Ama amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sombale'efa ine' etina nasapa'e afi'i.
Fowa' ine' nase'e agel lu'unai naloma la'ifimi ine'imi ase'esam esisa sope ukup etifim si'i afa' biafa wape ukup etifim.

Ine' nape naloma ae', ae' ape aloma esis, ea' na'ama etin ae' okom na'i esis sotaga ukup etifim endilisi. Ama esis amam nematawa etapasi sogawa ine' nasapa' ae' afi'i, ea' ine' okom nainaila esis endilisi si'i ine' okom nainaila ae'.

Ahalome, ae' okom na'i esis amam nematawa ine' nasi'iasi sefe' sope solome wambel ae' eapoma. Ae' okom na'i esis siti pepel la'ifinai noloma nafifili ae'anai, anama ine' nasi'ianai. Fowa' etap anae' ata' owa' notagai nogota anama ine' okom naila ae'. Ea' nase'e pepel nafifili anama.
Ahalome bu'unai endilisi, esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai ina sogawa ine'. Ea' ae' egawa ine'. Ea' esis amama alupisi sogawa ine' nasapa'e afi'i.
Ae' awalapa agel ine'inai ea' ma esis. Ea' ae' ewalapana etin la'ela'ef hihif. Ama esis sofa' waf anama ukup maimaila epes hiesi si'i ine' okom nainaila ae' ma ae' epe nomona esis.”
Jisas nanda' beten nahali' Ahalomana ea', naloma alupufai ananifai wafe' owala wambo walemb Kidron fisana lawah hiami oliv motawama. Nao'wafa wafe' anama.
Anan Judas nogawa anama ma atuwasi neafe' nihi'amba amam naumbih ma Jisas napoma. Dei' main? Nimeguf hiami Jisas nao'wafa wape etifigin wapoma anama.

Ea' Judas nafi'i nao'wa anom soldia maloma anom polisman. Soldia amama maloma polisman amama, amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi masapa'am mafi'i. Amam polisman maloma soldia mefa' bagah nagwahis lamifah maloma amama sapa'ami mefa'am mafi'i anama.
Ea' Jisas nogawa amamaga hiami atuwasi meatagamanai. Ea' nafe' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pagolopa emi?”
Ea' magwamana basef ma'ipana ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.”
Ea' Judas na'i nihi'ambamam Jisas, anan naitu nalomam wapoti'.
Ea' Jisas ata' na'ipam etin na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi”, ea' mandahagas mowa motawa etap.
Ea' Jisas nahali'am wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pagolopa emi?”
Ea' ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Doko' ae' a'ipipa a'i ae' ea' ma'uwi. I'i ipe' pegolopa ae', pihapili pekwaha amam mefe' wafifim.”
Ea' Jisas dei' na'ipam na'ama naila basef amama fowa' na'iami ma motaga alihim endilisi. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Amam amama fowa' ine' nasi'iami, ina anona atotona higililana, owa'.”
Ea' Saimon Pita nahapila anona bainat nagianai naha anona aman Malkus nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami. Ea' natopa' aliga da'isinai ananinai nowa.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa Pita mehip na'i, “Ine' tanima la bainat nowala let. Ae' ea' embela kap Ahalome nasi'ianai.”
Ea' amam soldia maloma dembinai amamunai maloma amam polisman Judai hiami mombalo' Jisas manda' mandof mowa' lagofana.
Ea' mao'wana nali' nafe' ma Anas, Kaiafas fafomana. Afagel anama Kaiafas dembinai pris nape nali'ma pris hiami.
Aman anama Kaiafas nali' na'ipa amam agufumi Juda na'i, “I'i aman atotona noga' ma nigiambama ape' Juda hiapai, waf anama andeande', waf bu'unai.”
Ea' Saimon Pita naloma ae' alupuwei Jisasi wagi'ma Jisas wafi'i. Pris anama dembinai nogawa ae'. Ea' ae' awis aloma Jisas ipat nomon
ea' Pita tol naitu uta endalelemb ande'. Ae' etanima awisi ande' a'ipa ano'w nemata'w kumafi utai ea' ao'wa Pita wawis nomon.
Ea' nemata'w kumafi utai kwa'ipa Pita kwa'i, “Ine' wapoti' alupinai aman anama, o owa'?”
Ea' anan nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
Amam manda' maola pris anama dembinai maloma anom polisman amam hiami nomanamb mam makata nif maitumam mahi'am. Ea' Pita wapoti' nalomam naitumam.
Ea' pris anama dembinai Anas nahali' Jisas ipat nomon. Nahali'ana ma alupumi ananimi maloma basef anan nawalipasami.

Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Ae' awalipasa basef ae'ami alihiguma ma epes hiesi etapasi. Ae' awalipas nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef. Ea' awalipas ipat lu'unai Godi wapoti', ipat anama esis Juda hiesi sandakolas etifigin. Basef ae' a'iami ina mandambaho', owa'.
Dei' maina ine' nahali' ae'? Dei' nihali' esis same' basef awalipasami. Esis sogawam.”
Jisas na'i basef amama, anona polisman naitu felefele' nakola aombana na'ipa Jisas mehip na'i, “Ine' owa' negwamana basef amama dembinai pris.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anom basef awami, ine' ni'ipa amam hiami na'ama. Owa'etin. Ae' a'i basef endilisimi dei' nahe ma main?”
Mandelef ata' mapomana lagof Jisasi ea' Anas nasapa'ana nafe'ma pris anama dembinai Kaiafas.
Saimon Pita tol naituma nif mahi'ana, esis sa'ipana sa'i, “A'i ine' alupinai ananinai?”
Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
Ea' anona aman nape felefele'ma Pita, anan nanda' maola pris anama dembinai. Anan amam atom wambota atona aman anama do'ok Pita nahana natopa' aliganai.
Ea' na'ipa Pita na'i, “Endilisi, ae' ati ine' nape naloma Jisas ganima lawah oliv motawama.”
Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi na'i wapoti' na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
Anan ata' na'i etin, awata nanda'am.

Ea' kuhimbita atona amam Juda mofa' Jisas makwaha ipat Kaiafasi, mofa'ana mafe' ipat gavman dembinai. Ea' amam Juda ina mafe' mawis ipat anama Romi, owa'. Amam ma'i, “Na'ama mofa' alogw awami ea' ina naman mea' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova, owa'.”
Amam ukup mandanda' na'ama ea' maitu ande' ea' Pailat nafi'mai amam na'i, “Aman anama ipe' pa'i penda'mana kot ma main?”
Amam magwamana basef ma'i, “I'i aman anama owa' nonda' waf aonai, ape' ina mofa'ana nifi'mai ine', owa'.”
Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' etipa pefa'ana penda'mana basef mondahama mi'uli ipe'inai. Ae' owa', andaiwa'.”
Ea' amam Juda magwamana ma'i, “Mi'uli ipe' Romi na'i owa' ma moha enin epen noga', owa'.”

Amamaga amama amam Juda manda'ami ina mataga etin, owa'. Amama mataga maila basef amama Jisas nali' na'iami motaga endilisi. Dei' main? Anan nali' na'i, “Nambimb esis sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”
Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat natanima nawis ipat lu'unai gavmani nomon. Ea' nofala Jisas nafi'i nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai esis Judai?”
Ea' Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Basef amama mataga okom ine'inai atona o enis epes sa'ipinama ae'?”
Ea' Pailat nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' okom na'i ae' wapoti' ae' Judaiwei? Owa'. Epes ine'isi saloma amam pris dambami, esis etis sombalo'ena sowa'ena nafi'mai ae'. Ine' nanda' maina waf?”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ina Judaiwei king imafi epes etapesi, owa'. I'i ae' epe king etap anae', alupumi ae'ami manda' opeh ae'ami migiambama ae' mopa' ma esis Juda ina la'ifisa sombale'e. Owa'.”
Ea' Pailat na'i, “Na'ama ine' enina king dembinai?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' anowe dembiwei king. Basef amama endilisimi. Mama'we kolae ma epe king dembiwei. Ae' afi'i etap anae' ma iwalipasa basef endilisimi. Emi egafis sonda' waf endilisinai, esis seme' basef ae'ami.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Basef amama endilisimi, maim basef?”
Pailat na'iam na'ama ea' notanima nawis ande' esis Juda sapoma na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina ati anom amamaga awami ma anan, owa'. Ina ati anona waf aonai ma eanda'mana basef, owa'.
Ea' waf ipe' Judai, ma panda' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova, ae' akwaha enin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe'mago ipe'. Dei' ipe' pa'i ae' ekwaha king Dembinai ipe' Judai nefe'mago ipe', o emi?”
Ea' esis sagwamana basef la'ifimi sa'i, “Owa'etin, anan owa'. Ine' nekwaha Barabas nifi'mai ape'.”
Aman anama Barabas anan nakowalefi naha epes saga'i.
Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat nao'wa Jisas nafe' na'ipa amam soldia mopagahona.

Mapagahona ma ea', mala'watefa anona mandof higatagunai si'i anona hat mowalo'manona balaga ananinai, malamana anona lowaf akwahinai. Ea' mafe'ma anan timbi tambel ma'ipana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'unai ine' dembinai king Judai!” Amam manda' salamalana manda'ana findiwana na'ama, makola aombana.
Ea' Pailat nawis ande' wapoti' na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Ipe' peme'! Ae' dei' efa'ana afi'mai ipe' ma pegawa ae' ina ati anona waf aonai ma anan enda'mana basef, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nawis ande'. Hat anama manda' mandof higatagunai manda' sana'ofana si'i hat napomana balaga ananinai ea' lowaf akwahinai napomana.
Ea' Pailat na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' piti aman anae'.”
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma polisman amamumi ata' matolona, ma'iam mehip ma'i, “Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai! Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai!”
Ea' Pailat nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' etipa fa'ana undandago. Ae' owa', ae' ina ati anona waf aonai anan nanda'anai ma enda'mana basef, owa'.”
Ea' amam Juda magwamana basef ma'i, “Anan na'i anan Nogalomana Godi. Ea' mi'uli afa'inai na'i anan noga'.”
Fowa' Pailat umbamahana etin, ea' dei' name' basef amama atom, umbamahana endilisi.
Ea' nawis nomon ipat anama nahali' Jisas na'i, “Ine' nataga nafi'i eti?”
Ea' Jisas ina nagwamana anom basef, owa'.
Ea' Pailat na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nandaiwa'ma ni'ipi anom basef? Ine' negawa ae', o owa'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma ekwaha ine' nefe' etin o i'ipas sehena nega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i God nape heven ilifi owa' nease'ena pepel ine', ine' etina ina la'ifina ma netalogofa ae', owa'. I'i nehe ega', waf anama aonai. Ea' amam amama mofa'e afi'mai ine', waf amamunai aonai lu'unai endilisi, nikila' waf aonai ine' nanda'anai.”

Pailat name' basef amama atom, ea' na'i notagaha Jisas nefe' wafifina. Ea' esis Juda sofalana mehip sa'i, “I'i ine' netagaha aman anama nefe' wafifina, ina alupinai ma Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, owa'. Emi egalin na'i enin etin king dambeni enin naumbih Sisari.”
Pailat name' basef amama atom, nofa'ai Jisas nawisi nataga ande' ea' nape anona sia amam dambami jas mapeinai. Anama alihiguma sa'i otamba atom ma'oma. Eaf anama diga Hibrui sa'i Gabata.
Nemaf anama esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aimi ma naman sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova. Ea' aon nahagasom nape 12 klok, Pailat na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Piti dembinai king ipe'inai naitu anae'.”
Ea' esis Juda sa'ipana mehip sa'i, “Fa'ana, fa'ana, undana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' pa'i ae' iundana king dembinai ipe'inai lawag?”
Ea' amam pris dambami magwamana basef ma'i, “Ape' owa' anona dembinai king, Sisar atona anan dembinai king ape'inai.”
Ea' Pailat nakwahomasa Jisas esis Juda ma siundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.

Ea' amam soldia mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe'. Ea' Jisas atotona nofa' lawag ananinai nafe' nakwaha wambel lu'unai nawis ande' nafe' nataga anagon agiluguma Pipitagel Balagaina. Diga Hibrui sa'i Golgota.
Anama amam maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai naloma anom amam biam. Anona nail wa'ol, anona nail wa'ol, Jisas nail la'afen.
Gavman dembinai Pailat nanda' anom basef nofa'am nanda'am mail lawag anama ilif. Basef ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai, anan King esis Judai.”
Esis Juda hiesi sati basef amama satalifam. Dei' main, anama amam maunda Jisas naila nape felefele'ma Jerusalem. Ea' basef amama ma'i diga Hibrui, Latini, naloma diga Griki, ma'i diga wenifina.
Amam pris dambami esis Judai ma'ipa Pailat ma'i, “Ina nenda' basef amama ni'i, ‘Dembinai king esis Judai’, hapaimi. Ine' nenda' basef ni'i, ‘Anan na'i, Ae' dembiwei King esis Judai.’ ”
Ea' Pailat nagwamama basef na'i, “Basef ae' anda'am ea' mondape na'ama la'ela'ef.”
Amam soldia maunda Jisas ea', mofa' luwaguf ananimi matambe'am biami biam mofa'am mandandam. Ea' mofa' siot ananinai wapoti'. Siot anama esis ina sagundisana, owa'. Sanda'ana nape si'ina.
Amam manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ina owala siot anama, owa'. Afa' onda' pilai satu ma emi nikila' nefa'ana.”
Amam ma'iam na'ama maila anom basef fowa'imi mape Buk Baibel dei' mataga mandawalap alihim. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i,
“Amam matambe' luwaguf ae'ami mafe'ma amam atona etin ea' manda' satu ma emi nikila' nefa'am.”
Ea' amam soldia manda'am na'ama etin.
Mama'wana Jisasi kwaloma owama'w akwa'ikwi waloma ano'w nemata'w Maria kwaso' Klopasi waloma Maria Makdalai'wi awau biawai biawa waitu felefele'ma lawag Jisas nailanai.
Ea' Jisas nati mama'wana anani'wi kwaloma ae' alupunai ananiwei okom nainaila ae'i, afa' biafa waitu felefele'ma anan. Ea' na'ipa mama'wana na'i, “Mama'we, aman anama nogalomena ine'inai.”
Ea' na'ipa ae' alupuwei ananiwei na'i, “Nemata'w akwama mama'wena ine'ikwi.”
Nogota anama ae' Jon efa'akw kwafe' ipat ae'anai ma imafia'w la'ela'ef kwape.
“Ae' eap nase'e ma embel.”
Anan na'iam na'ama naila basef amama Baibelimi.
si'i elefi'w mowala wain embel amama magiam masapa'am elifita mandowana mandolamanana malogel Jisasi ma nea' embel.
Anan nagwa' wain embel amama ea' na'i, “Maol anama hi'alana ea'.”
Ea' nitimale' balaga nail nowalana ambal nandahi' nafe' anan ea' afuna.
Ea' amam soldia mafe' anama maham mail. Ea' mati anona nail wa'ol mindiwa bo'wagahana ea' afuna. Ea' mafe'ma anona wa'ol mindiwa bo'wagahana.
Ea' mafe'ma Jisas nail, mati anan afuna endilisi. Ea' amam ina mindiwa bo'wagah ananimi, owa'.
Ea' anona soldia nanda' wamba'w napisila lambeh Jisasi wa'ol. Ea' mehip etin esimbel maloma embel kolo'alam mawisi.
Ae' ati amama naep ae'ami a'ipipa basef amama. Ea' basef amama ae'ami endilisimi atom. Ae' egawa basef amama a'ipipa emi endilisimi a'ipipa ma ipe' wapoti' pembale'efana.
Ea' anom basef wapoti' ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“Anona nemaf esis siti aman anama sopisilana wamba'w.”
Amam soldia manda'am na'ama maila basef amama atom mail Buk Baibel mataga mandawalap alihim.

Anan Josep nafe' naloma Nikodemus, anama fowa' nafe' nati Jisas anona owamb. Nikodemus nofa'ai anona marasin bu'unai sanda'ana ifat lawahi, agilinama mer naloma alos. Marasin anama hianai nimanina endilisi, 30 kilo.
Ea' amam biam mafe' mofa' alop Jisasi manda' luwaguf afitimi maloma marasin anama mowa'ana, maila waf esis Judai.
Felefele'ma anama mali' maunda Jisas naila anona aof nape. Aof anama anona owap lu'unai nagali na'oh wa'ol si'i hi'agif lu'unai nape. Anama esis ina dei' nawa enin epenagon, ata' owa'.
Nemaf anama esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aimi maima naman sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova. Ea' amam mofa' alop Jisasi mawana hi'agif anama nape felefele'.
Owamb ata' nail, felefele'ma kuhimbita ma nemaf Sande
Maria Makdalai'wi kohafel kwafe' hi'agif. Ea' kwati owap ina ata' masopama uta hi'agif, owa'. Enin epen nelefatana naitu gemba.

Ea' kotanima kwasagih kwafi'mai ae' aloma Saimon Pita wapoma, ae' alupuwei Jisasi anan okom nainaila ae'. Ea' kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “Enis epes safe' sofa' Dembinai nakwaha hi'agif safe'. Ea' afa' ina ogawana safe' sambe'ana enima.”
Ea' ae' aloma Pita wasagih wafe' wataga hi'agif anama. Wasagih wafe', ea' ae' ikila' Pita ali' afe' ataga hi'agif anama.
Ea' atambe' ati luwaguf atom ma'oh nomon ea' ina awis, owa'.

Ea' Saimon Pita nagi'mi nafi'i nataga ea' nawis hi'agif nomon. Ea' nati luwaguf sowa'anam ma'oh, maloma anona lowaf manda'ana mowa' balaganai. Lowaf anama somagwiana sambe'ana na'oh anagon. Ea' luwaguf amama anom ma'oh dei'.
Ea' ae' ali' afe' hi'agif anama agi'mana awis nomon ati amamaga amama embale'efana.
Nogota anama afa' ina ogawa basef mail buk Baibel ma'i Jisas noga' notanima nohafel wapoti', owa'.
Ea' afa' biafa otanima wafe' ipat.
Maria ato'w kwaitu kwalopana hi'agif ande'. Kwaitu kwalopana, kwatambe' kwati hi'agif nomon,
kwati ensel biam mala luwaguf afitimi mape anama do'ok alop Jisasi na'oma. Amam biam anona nape balaga Jisasi nafe'ma, anona bo'wagah mafe'ma.
Ea' mahali'akw ma'i, “Nemata'w, ine' nalopa main?”
Ea' akwa'w kwagwamama basef kwa'i, “Enis epes sofa' Dembinai ae'anai safe' ea' ina egawa anama safe' sambe'anama, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Nemata'w, dei' maina ine' nalef? Ine' nagolopa emi?”
Akwa'w okom na'i anona nanda' maol aofi. Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ine' nefa'anama, ni'ipi anama nefa'ana nafe' nambe'anama.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Maria.”
Ea' kwandamboma kwati anan kwa'ipana diga Hibrui kwa'i, “Rabonai.” Basef ofagema ma'i Dembinai Tisa.

Ea' anan Jisas na'i, “Ina nihapila alop ae'anai, owa'. Dei' main? Ae' ina dei' etanima afe'ma Ahalome gani ilif, ata' owa'. Ine' nefe'ma owape ae'ami ni'ipam ni'i, Ae' etanima elata ilifa Ahalome ae'anai, Ahalomepa ipe'inai. Efe'ma God Dembinai ae'anai, God Dembinai ipe'inai.”
Ea' akwa'w kwafe'ma alupufai ananifai wapoma kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “Ae' ati Dembinai ea'!”
Ea' kwa'ipafa basef amama anan na'ipakwa emi.

Nemaf anama Sande owamb, afa' alupufai Jisasi wandatama wafe' etifigin owalo uta wape anona ipat nomon. Afa' umbamahafama amam dambami esis Judai. Ea' Jisas nafi'i naitu nalomafa na'ipafa na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
Na'ipafa basef amama ea', nihi'ambafa lagof maloma lambeh ananimi. Ea' afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai, wandanifel ma anan endilisi.
Ea' na'ipafa wapoti' na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem. Ae' dei' a'i esapa'epa pefe' pi'ipasa basef Godi si'i Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i a'ipipa.”
Na'ipafa amama ma ea', naolamafa ambip na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi.
I'i ipe' pekwaha waf aonai emi egafis sanda'anai, God wapoti' nokwahomasana. I'i ipe' owa' peakwaha waf anama aonai, God wapoti' ina anona nemaf nokwamasana, owa'.”
Anona ma afa' 12-peleifa alupufai Jisasi, Tomas agel wa'ana Didimus. Ofagena agel anama sa'i mama'was atoto'w kolam biagasi. Nemaf anama Jisas nafi'i natolofa, Tomas ina nape nalomafa, owa'.
Ea' enofa alupufai ananifai wafe' wa'ipana wa'i, “Afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai ea'.”
Ea' Tomas na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' owa' iti melegwa lagof ananimi sahana nigufa, ma esa faf ae'anai ma niguf mawisa ea' esapa' lagel ae'anai nuwis nomon lambeh ananimi, ea' embale'efana. I'i owa', owa'.”

Nimeguf 8-peleim mafe'ma ea', afa' alupufai Jisasi wape anona ipat nomon, owalo uta wape. Nemaf anama Tomas wapoti' nape nalomafa. Ea' Jisas nawisi naitu nalomafa na'ipafa na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
Ea' na'ipa Tomas na'i, “Ine' nesa faf ine'inai ma ae' anae'. Ea' niti lagof ae'ami. Nesapa' lagel ine'inai nuwis lambeh ae'ami nomon. Ina okom bimbiefina nopeina, owa'. Nembale'efa ae' endilisi.”
Ea' Tomas na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai ae'inai, God ae'inai.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' natolowe ea', dei' nembale'efa ae'. Ea' emi egafis ina satolowei, sembale'efa ae'i, esis sondanifel endilisi.”
Jisas nanda' ikwaf hianai la'ifinai pepel naninani ma naep alupufai ananifai. Basefa pepel ananinai ina anda'ana hi'alana nape buk anae', owa'.

Anda' basef amama tu'wanim atoma pepel anama ma ipe' pembale'efa Jisas anan Nogalomana Godi, anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Ae' anda'am na'ama ma pembale'efa anan Jisas pefa' ambal namunai pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.

Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', afa' wati Jisas wapoti'. Basef ma'i na'ama. Jisas natagamafa gani walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Taiberias. Anofa afa' ondowa'anima etifigin wapoti' agof afa'imi alupufai Jisasi amama. Saimon Pita naloma Tomas agel wa'ana Didimus maloma Nataniel, anan Kanainai, etap hiagoma Galili. Amam maloma ae' nogalomana Sebedi aloma sahalome Jems waloma amam biam Jisasi ondowa'anima wape etifigin.
Ea' Saimon Pita na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' igi agof.”
Ea' afa' wa'i, “Olomena ofe' etin.”
Ea' wafe' walata anona bot wafe' wa'i ugi agof wafe' wanda'am owamb anama si'ina ea' afa' ina wagi anom agof, owa'etin.
Wafilu kuhimbita atona Jisas nafe' naitu walemb batupa'manai anama akata ea' afa' ina ogawa anan Jisas, owa'.
Ea' nofalafa na'i, “Awami alupipei, ipe' pagi anom agof?”
Ea' wagwamana basef wa'i, “Owa'etin.”
Ea' na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' ata' pela anemb mowala bot anama wa'ol lagel da'isineima. Ea' atuwasi pigi anom agof.”
Ea' afa' wa'i ola anemb, owafai agof hiami. Ea' ina la'ififa wiegiai anemb mulatowi motoma bot nomon, owa'. Dei' main? Agof hiami endilisi mala anemb anama si'ina.
Ae' alupuwei Jisasi anan okom nainaila ae', a'ipa Pita a'i, “Nanima Dembinai afa'inai.”
Saimon Pita do'ok natagaha saket ananinai na'oh ea' nanda' maol, ea' name' basef amama nala saket wapoti' nukupa' nowala embel walemb batupa'manai nopaul nafe' embel.
Ea' afa' watoma bot wagi'mana wagiai anemb si'inama agof. Afa' ina wail laogona akata, owa'. Si'i 100 mita.
Wafe' wataga akata, wati anom nif fandom ma'oh ea' wati anom agof masef nif maloma anona bret.
Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' fa'ai anom agof dei' pagiami.”
Ea' Saimon Pita nalata bot anama nagiai anemb mafi'i akata. Anemb anama si'inama agof lu'wami atom 153-peleim. Ea' ina pele'atam, owa'.
Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' fi'i ma ata' pea' gwa'aimi.”
Afa' ina anona la'ifina ma nohali'ana nie'i, “Ine' emi?”
Owa'etin. Dei' main, afa' ogawa anan Dembinai afa'inai.
Ea' Jisas nafi'i nofa' bret nase'afa, agof wapoti' na'ama etin.
Fowa' Jisas nohafel wapoti', nali' nafe'ma afa' alupufai ananifai watolona nimeguf bif. Ea' dei' watolona wapoti' wenif.
Afa' wa' gwa'aimi ea', Jisas na'ipa Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon nogalomana Joni, ine' okom nainaili endilisi nikila' anom alupumi amama?”
Ea' anan na'i, “A'e, Dembinai. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainailina.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nese'ama gwa'aimi sipsip nogami ae'ami.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'ana wapoti' na'i, “Saimon nogalomana Joni, ine' okom nainaili endilisi?”
Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “A'e, Dembinai. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainailina.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nimafi sipsip ae'ami.”
Jisas nali' nahali'ana bif ea' dei' nahali'ana wapoti' wenif na'i, “Saimon nogalomana Joni, ine' okom nainaili?”
Ea' Pita okom nimanina na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' negawa amamaga hiami. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainailina.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nese'am gwa'aimi sipsip ae'ami.

Endilisi ae' a'ipina, fowa' ine' ata' so'uso'win, ine' nowaho' let ea' nafe' mamagoma nomonas ine'imi ma'i neafe'ma. Ea' anona nemaf ine' netagama hagena, ine' nesa'ma lagof ine'imi ma anona aman nowaho'mena let nohapilina nefe' anama ine' nandaiwa'ma neafe'ma.”
Jisas na'ipana na'ama ma nihi'ambam eaf anama ma soha Pita noga' ma epes hiesi sefela agel Godi lu'una.
Ea' dei' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nila ae'.”

Ea' Pita nandamboma nati ae', alupuwei Jisas okom nainailei, agi'mam afi'i. Ae' ma'uwi fowa' afa' wape wa' gwa'aimi ma indisi'ah felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana a'i, “Dembinai, atuwasi emi ni'ipa naumbih ma nihi'ambama ine' neapoma?”
Ea' Pita nati ae', nahali' Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, aman anama anona nemaf nope ni'imama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef Pita na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anan nope ambal nopaina nope nefe' nefe' anama ae' etanimani, amama ina maol ine'inai, owa'. Ine' nila ae'.”
Ea' basef baso'maimi wafimi amama mafe'ma afa' alupufai Jisasi ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Aman anama anona nemaf ina noga', owa'.”
Ea' Jisas ina na'ipafa basef amama esis sa'iami, owa'. Basef amama kwamaimi.
Jisas na'i basef amama atom na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anan nope nefe' nefe' ma nemaf ae' etanimani, amama ina maol ine'inai, owa'.”
Aman anama alupunai Jisasi ea' ae' ma'uwi. Ae' a'ipipa basef amama ma amamaga amama Jisas nanda'ami dei' anda'am mape buk anae'. Ape' Kristen mogawa basef amama ae' anda'ami endilisimi atom.
Jisas nanda' anona maol hianai wapoti'. I'i enis epes sonda' basefa maol Jisasi hi'ilana nil, ae' a'i etap anama hiagoma owa' anagona buk hianai no'oh, owa'etin. Asi'igin endilisi.
anda' basefa amamaga hiami Jisas nanda'ami nawalipa esis amam nematawa

ma dambadamba nali' nanda'am ea' nafi'i natagama nemaf anama God nofa'ana nalata gani heven ilif. Fowa' Jisas owa' ata' nolata heven ilif, Anan nali' nase'ama basef amama na'ipam mehipa maol amam aposel amama Anan nandandepami. Anan nase'ama maol amama pepel anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi.

Fowa' saha Jisas nefa' nimanimi lu'wami naga' ea' notanima nohafel wapoti' nafe' natagama alupumi ananimi. Ea' nape aon si'inai tu'waninai nanda' pepel hianai ma nihi'ambam mogawa endilisi anan nofa' ambal namunai nape. Nimeguf amama Anan nawalipasa epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias.
Anan ata' nape nalomam na'ipam mehip na'i, “Ipe' dei' ina pekwaha Jerusalem ulal, owa'. Pepe pehafa amamaga amama Ahalome na'i endilisi niesi'ipami. Amama fowa' ae' a'ipipami.

Ea' basef ipe'imi amama. Nambimb Ambal Bu'unai Godi nifi'mai ipe', nemaf anama pefa' pepel Ananinai, pewalapa basef Ae'ami Jerusalem ea' ganima etap hiagoma Judia ea' ganima etap hiagoma Samaria, ea' pefe' anama etap wambel hiagoma hi'ilagon.”
Anan nafe' ea', esis ata' saitu satologon etin ilif otaga, ea' dei' atef anom amam biam mola klos afitimi mondokwama mataga malomas maitu.

Ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa Galilipei, ipe' ina pitu piti otaga ilif, owa'. Jisas anama dei' God nofa'ana nakwahipa ea' nofa'ana nalata heven ilif. Anona nemaf notanima nifi'i petolona na'ama etin si'i dei' paitu patolona nalata heven ilif.”

Esis sotanima safi'i Jerusalem, safe' sawis ipat ea' safe' sape ipat ilif esis sapeinai. Agof amamumi amama. Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon a Andru a Filip naloma Tomas naloma Bartolomyu Matyu ea' Jems, Alfius nogalomana, Judas, Jems nogalomana ea' Saimon anan wambota Seloti.
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', esis Kristen 120-peleis hiesi sandatama etifigin sape ea' Pita nohafel naitu na'i,

“Sahin owan ae'ipei, anom basef mail buk Baibel fowa' gani Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipa dembinai king Devit ma'iam na'ama ma'i aman anama Judas anona nemaf nonda' waf aonai ma nihi'amba Jisas naumbih Ananimi. Eaf ina naso', owa'. Nagal. Basef amama mataga alihim. God atona na'i, dei' basef amama mataga mandawalap. Fowa' Judas ina dei' nanda' waf aonai nawalapa Jisasa amam, ata' owa', nogota anama
Jisas nandandepana anan alupunai afa'inai nanda' maol anama Jisasi naloma afa'.”
“Moni Judas nofa'ana waf anama aonai ananinai natala anona etap. Anan nafe' etap anama nowa opaf pe'ana kolo'alanai hi'alana afuna.
Ea' epes hiesi sape Jerusalem sogawa amama. Ea' diga asasinai sofala anama agiliguma sa'i Akeldama. Ape' ma'i etap anama esimbel kolo'alami ma'oma.”
Dei' main, Pita na'i basef amama mape Buk Song ma'i,
“ ‘Ipat ananinai anan nope wafina. Ina anona aman napaina, owa'.’
Ea' anom basef mape Buk Songi ma'i wapoti' ma'i,
‘Anona aman anona nemaf noho'ofana nofa' maol ananinai.’

Ea' dei' ape' mondandepa anona aman ape'inai noho'ofana ma mowalipasa basef amama Jisas notanima nohafel wapoti'. Ape' mondandepa anona ma amam amama mape maloma ape' ma nemaf anama Dembinai Jisas nape nalomapa. Nemaf anama Jon nawalipasa basef Godi napisi' amam nematawa embel nafi'i nafi'i nataga ma nemaf anama God nofa' Jisas nalata heven ilif nakwahepa.”
Pita na'iam na'ama, ea' esis Kristen sandandepa amam biam. Anona Josep, agel wa'ana Barsabas, ea' agel wa'ana wapoti' sa'i Jastus. Ea' anona Matias.
Ea' esis sanda' beten na'ama sa'i, “Dembinai, ine' negawa ukup epes hiesi. Ine' nendandepa amam amama biam nihi'ambapa maina aman
nofa' maol aposel noho'ofa aman anama Judas. Anan nakwaha maol anama nafe' wambel aonai ma God nogwamana waf aonai ananinai.”

Ea' esis sanda' agof amam biam mail otamba biam. Ea' sala otamba amama mala anona malep si'i tin sakoto'mam sati otam nali' nataga agel Matias. Ea' sanda' anan nanda' maol naloma amam aposel 11-peleima monda' maol Godi.
Nemaf anama lu'unai Pentikos nataga, esis hiesi sembale'efana sandatama etifigin sape ipat atotona.
Ea' dei' atef same' anona maf lu'unai nanda'am nafi'i heven. Maf anama name' si'i uf la'ifinai naluwi ea' ipat anama esis sapeinai si'inama maf anama.
Ea' sati nif ilelowa si'i melisigah pepe'atam mafe' matoma esis hiesi atona etin hi'alas.
Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'inama esis atona etin hi'alas, sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani wambel hiagoma. Ambal Bu'unai Godi anama nanda'am mataga malogof asasimi.
Ea' enis Juda sanda' lotuma Godi safi'i ganima etap hiagoma safi'i sape Jerusalem.

Esis hiesi same' maf anama ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sondowa'anima sape. Ea' epes isima hiesi atona etin same' esis sembale'efanai sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani hianai. Ea' sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi ma same' diga asasinai.
Esis sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as ea' ukup matamea hiahiam. Ea' sa'iam sa'i, “Amam amama Galilimi atom, ea' dei' ma'i diga ape'inai atona etin.
Dei' maina ape' hiapai atona etin mame' amam ma'i diga ape'inai dende' si'i ape' mame'ama mamasapa ape'isi? Ape' mafi'i etap anama hiagoma anama,

Partia, Midia Elam ea' Judia, Kapadosia naloma Pontus Esia Frigia Pamfilia Isip ea' ape' anona etap hiagoma Mesopotamia ea' esis ganima Libia felefele'ma wambel Sairini. Ea' anepa ape' wambel Rom mafi'i mape na'ae.
Ape' Juda maloma enis epes maila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwanai ea' ape' etap hiagoma Krit Arebia, ape' hiapai mame' amam mawalapa basefa pepel maol Godi ma diga hianai naninani.”
Ea' esis hiesi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as, esis ukup matamea mape hiahiam. Esis etis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Amamaga amama mataga ma'imama?”
Ea' enis sanda' iafam sa'i, “Amam ma' embel wain hianai ea' mahaga magaol dei' ma'i basef mamumami.”

Ea' Pita nohafel naitu naloma amam aposel 11-peleim ea' noga na'i mehip nawalapa basefa esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Ipe' Juda alupipei paloma ipe' amam nematawa hipei ipe' pape Jerusalem, ipe' pembe' aligaha basef ae'ami, ma pegawa amamaga amama.
Ipe' pa'i amam amama manda' spak, owa'. Dei' ata' kuhimbita aon ata' natefi nail etin si'i 9 klok.
Ea' amamaga amama mataga si'i anona profet Joel fowa' gani na'i,
‘God na' i,

felefele' ma nimeguf akutaimi Ae' ese'as Ambal Bu'unai Ae'anai nope amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' efela esis batawisipa ipe'isi sowalapa basef si'i amam profet ma'iam. Ea' ihi'amba amam so'umi ipe'imi mondanda'oh motolom naep mose'am mope motolom, ea' ese'ama mo'oh mondanda'oh motolom amam hagami ipe'mi ma ihi'ambam waf ae'anai.
Nimeguf amama ae' ese'asa Ambal Bu'unai ae'anai nope esis amam nematawa ae'asi sanda' maol ae'anai nefelas sowalapa basef Ae'ami si'i fowa' amam profet manda'ami.
Ea' enda' anona ikwaf notaga gani otaga ilif, enda' anona ikwaf notaga na'ae etap. Anama na'ama. Enda' nogoh hiami otaga, enda' esimbel, nif fandumi mataga etap anae'.

Ea' emboma aon alipunai notaga owamb owambunai notaga akwahina si'i esimbel. Ea' enda'am i'i nemaf Dembinai nigi' notaga. Nemaf anama ananinai lu'unai endilisi. Dembinai nihi'ambapa pepel nafifili Ananinai.
Nemaf anama ata' owa' neataga emi egafis sofala agel Dembinai, nofa'as sotanimani.’ ”

Ea' Pita na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' epes Israelipei, ipe' peme' basef amama. Dei' i'ipipa aman anama Jisas Nasaretinai. Ipe' pegawa maol ahalomana la'ifinai naloma pepel anama God nanda'anai la'afena ipe' ma lagel aman anama. Amama mihi'ambepa andeande' aman anama God nasapa'ana nafi'i.

Fowa' gani God nogawa ea' nail okom Ananinai atona nanda' aman anama nefe' nope lagof ipe'imi. Ea' amam amama mololama mi'uli Godi sanda' waf aonai, amam magiambama ipe' pembale'ana paundana nail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' pahana naga'.
Ea' God nafelona nohafel wapoti' nakwaha ekep pahana ma naga'i. Dei' main, ga' anama ina la'ifina ma nombale'ana, owa'.
Fowa' gani Devit na'i basefa Jisas na'i,
‘Ae' ati Dembinai ae'anai nape nalome wa'ol lagel ae'anai da'isinai la'ela'ef. Na'ama dei' ina enis epes la'ifisa sanda'me anom nimanimi, owa'.
Amama atom dei' okom ae'anai nandanifel. Ae' i'i basef bu'wami i'i, ae' egawa endilisi nambimb anona nigiambame epe andeande'.
Dei' main, anona nemaf ina nekwaha ambal ae'anai nefe' nepe anama epes saga'i sapoma, owa'. Ea' ina nambimb nekwaha aman anama bu'unai nanda' maol ine'inai alop ananinai folo'olana, owa'.
Ine' nihi'ambe eaf nafe' natagama ambal namunai. Anona nemaf ine' nepe nelome endanifel endilisi.’ ”

Ea' Pita na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' sahope owape ae'ipei, dei' ae' a'i ewalapa basef i'ipipana aman anama akunamapa ape'inai Devit. Anan fowa' gani naga' sawana, dei' hi'agif ananinai ata' nape la'afena ape'. Basef amama Devit ina na'iama anan atona, owa'.
Aman anama Devit anan profet ea' nogawa God na'i basef la'ifimi na'i endilisi gani ilif na'ama ma anona nemaf nonda' bafalomana Deviti notaga nope dembinai king si'i Devit fowa' nape king.

Fowa' gani Devit ata' nape, anan nogawa amama God na'i anona nemaf neanda'ami. Na'ama dei' anan na'i dembinai Krais anona nemef noga' notanima nohafel wapoti'. Anan na'iam na'i, ‘Anona nemaf God ina nokwahona nope anama saga'i sapoma hi'agif alop ananinai folo'olana, owa'.’
Aman anama Jisas God nafelana notanima nohafel wapoti'. Ea' afa' hiafai wati amama dei' wa'iam.

Dei' God nafelona nohafel nalata gani heven ilif ea' nape lagel da'isinai Godi. Anan nofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi ma Ahalomana, si'i fowa' Ahalomana na'ipana na'i endilisi nese'ana. Amama atom dei' Jisas nase'asam esis amamaga amama dei' patolom pame'am ea'.
Dei' main, Devit ina nalata heven, owa'. Ea' anan fowa' gani na'i basef na'i,
‘Dembinai na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'ama na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel da'isinai ae'anai ma nepe Dembinai neloma ae'.
Nepe na'ama nefe' nefe' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bowagah ine'imi ine' nikila'as.” ’ ”

Ea' dei' Pita na'iam na'ama na'i, “Dei' ape' Israel mogawa isima andeande'. Aman anama Jisas ipe' paundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai pahana naga', dei' God nanda'ana nataga nape dembinai anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.”
Esis same' basef amama, maha opalef asasimi endilisi. Ea' sa'ipa Pita naloma anom aposel sa'i, “Ipe' sahopapa, dei' ape' monda' maina mope andeande'?”

Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' hipei pemboma opalef ipe'imi pila God ea' ipe' hipei atona etin pefa' baptaisa agel Dembinai Jisas Krais ma God nokwaha waf aonai ipe'inai. Ipe' penda'am na'ama, nambimb God nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope nolomepa.

Fowa' gani God na'i basef la'ifimi endilisimi atom na'i nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope noloma ipe' peloma awasi ipe'isi soloma esis amam nematawa hiesi ata' sape lauguni anona nemaf sigi' seatagai. God Dembinai ape'inai na'iam ma nose'as Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope noloma epes isima. Epes amama atom anona nemaf Anan nofalas sotanimani.”

Pita ina na'ipasa basef amama atom, owa'. Na'ipasa anom basef hiami wapoti' na'ipas basef la'ifimi ma nafela ukup asasimi na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama pefa' nimanimi lu'wami peloma amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf aonai.”

Ea' epes emi egafis sofa' basef Pitai sombale'efam, esis sofa' baptais. Nemaf anama God nowa'ani epes hiesi wambota ananinai sataga hias 3,000-peleis sataga Kristen, ea' sape saloma esis isima amam nematawa sombale'efanai.

Amam nematawa isima sataga Kristen dambaisi esis la'ifis endilisi ma same' basef amam aposel mawalipasami sandagiambanama etin enis sahin owan sape etifigin etin sa' gwa'aimi sanda' beten etifigin atogon.
Nimeguf hiami God nanda' ikwaf lu'unai ma pepel hianai nataga lagof amam aposeli. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi umbamahas endilisi sape.
Ea' esis hiesi sombale'efa Kraisi sandatama etifigin atogon. Amamaga asasimi gwa'aimi maim hiami, ina asasimi atona etin, owa'. Amamaga amama hiesi atom.
Ea' esis sombale'efanai enis sase'asa etap asasinai naloma anom amamaga asasimi mafe'ma enis epes satalamasam. Ea' sofa' otamba ma amamaga sotambel sanda'am sase' epes isima gwa'aimi a'asi kwahusi.

Ea' esis hiesi nimeguf la'ela'ef safe' ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Ea' safe' sa' gwa'aimi ifagw asasimi atona etin. Esis sandanifel ukup bo'om sose'as gwa'aimi ma sigiambama enis epes ea' sandanifel sa' gwa'aimi etifigin.

La'ela'ef esis safela agel Godi lu'una, ea' opalef esis amam nematawa hiesi sape andi'i bo'oma esis Kristen nimeguf hiami. Ea' nimeguf la'ela'ef Dembinai nofa' enis amam nematawa sotanimani sape saloma epes hiesi isima sombale'efanai.
Nogota anama esis Kristen sanda' betenanai, Pita naloma Jon mafe' ipat lu'unai Godi ma'i monda beten. Nemaf anama ea' wambomota 3 klok.

Ea' anona aman bo'wagah mondala'anai nape anama, mama'wana anani'wi fowa' kolana nape na'ama la'ela'ef. Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef esis sanda'ana sofa'ana sahaponana nape ipat lu'unai Godi ande' felefele'ma uta sa'i bu'unai. Sanda'ana na'ama ma nondailasa moni gwa'aimi maima esis amam nematawa safe'ma lotu.
Aman anama nati Pita naloma Jon ma'i mofe' muwis ipat anama, nahali' amam biam ma mose'ana anom otamba anan.
Ea' Pita naloma Jon mati anan titi titi ea' Pita na'i, “Ine' ata' niti afa' biafa.”
Ea' nandamboma nati amam, okom na'i mose'ana anom amamaga.
Ea' Pita na'i, “Ae' otamba siliwa gol a'e, ea' amamaga bu'wami a'i atuwasi iesi'inami amama. Ae' a'i pepel Jisas Krais Nasaretinai atona a'ipina, dei' hafel nitu nefe'.”
Ea' nahapila lagel da'isinai aman anama aonai nafelona. Ea' mehip etin bo'wagah maloma nembawa ananimi la'ifim mataga bo'om.
Ea' anan nitipa' nafe'. Ea' nalomom mafe' mawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nandanifel kwapi' etin naitu nalemb nafe' nafela agel Godi lu'una.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sati anan nafe' nafela agel Godi

ea' sogawana sa'i anan ma'una aman anama bo'wagah mandola'anai, fowa' nape la'ela'ef uta anama sa'i bu'unai ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai nape nandailasa moni maim. Esis sati anan bo'ona sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as ukup matamea.

Aman anama nandanifel ma nataga bo'ona ea' nahapila Pita naloma Jon ea' esis sasagih safi'i ma sotolona ilaf anama sa'i ilaf Solomoni. Pita nati epes isima, na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' epes Isrel, dei' maina ipe' gegelalasipa ma amamaga amama mataga? Dei' maina ipe' pati afa' biafa? Pa'i pepel afa'inai naloma waf bu'unai afa'inai atona wanda' aman anama nataga bo'ona nohafel nafe'? Owa'.

God anama bafapapa ape'imi Abraham naloma Aisak naloma Jekop manda' lotumanai, anan atona nanda'ana nataga bo'ona nafela agel Jisasi, nanda' maola Anani. Anan aman anama atona ipe' pandaiwa'mana pase'ana amam agufumi gavmani ma mahana naga'. Dembinai Pailat na'i notagahona nifi'i, owa'. Ipe'pandaiwa'mana pewa' alafugahana.
Ipe' pewa alafugaha aman bu'unai Godi. Ea' pahali'a Pailat mehipa anona aman aonai naha epes saga'i, ea' nakwahomepanai.
Aman bu'unai ofagena ma ambal namunai, anama ea' pahana naga'. Ea' God nafelona nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ea' afa' biafa wape amam ananifai owalapa basefa amama, wati anan nape namona endilisi.

Afa' biafa ombale'efa Jisas. Anan atona nafela bale'ef afa'inai, pepel ananinai atona nanda' aman anama bo'ona naep ipe'imi hipei. Pepel Jisasi atona dei' nanda' aman anama bo'ona endilisi patolona pegawana.
Endilisi, alupipei, ae' egawa ipe' ina pegawa andeande'ma dei' panda' waf anama aonai ma Jisas, owa'. Amam agufumi ipe'imi wapoti' amam na'ama etin.

Fowa' gani God nawalapa basefa amam profet hiami ma Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Basef amama ma'i Krais nome' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' waf anama dei' ipe' panda'anai, anama nandahama basef amama amamumi mataga mandawalap alihim.
Dei' ipe' pemboma opalef pila Goda nokwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.
Ipe' penda'am na'ama, nambimb Dembinai nese'epa pepel namunai ma ambagof ipe'imi. Ama nambimb nosapa' Krais nofi'mai ipe'. Aman anama fowa' gani God nandandepana ma ipe' ea'i, Anan Jisas.
Dei' napani heven nohafa nemaf anama God nonda' amamaga hiami motaga dambaimi wapoti'. Si'i fowa' gani na'ipipa basef Ananimi endilisimi atom ma amam profet ananimi bu'wami.
Amama si'i fowa' Moses na'iam na'ama na'i,
‘God Dembinai ipe'inai, anona nemaf nefela anona sahalomepa ipe'inai, nonda'ana nope profet si'i ae'. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi hiami pilana.
Ea' emi egafis sondaiwa'ma some' basefa profet anama, esis ina ata' sope wambota Godi, owa'. Nambimb sefe' anagon.’
Ea' amam profet hiami, Samuel naloma amam profet mataga magi'ma anani, hiami ma'iama nimeguf amama dei' mataga.

Basef Godi endilisimi atom amam profet dei' ma'ipa ipe' pembale'am pilam. Fowa' gani God na'i basef la'ifimi amama naloma bafasepa ipe'isi. Dei' basef amama mataga alihim ma migiambama ipe' wapoti'. Fowa' gani anan na'ipa Abrahama anona nemaf Jisas notaga na'i,
'Anona nemaf bafasena ine'isi etis ae' igiambamas amam nematawa hiesi sope etap hiagoma i'ipasa basef bu'wami Ae'ami.’
Ea' God nandandepa aman anama nanda' maol ananinai, nasapa'ana nali' nafi'mai ipe' ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa ma pemboma opalef atona etin pekwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.”
Pita naloma Jon ata' ma'i maloma esis amam nematawa, amam pris maloma kepten dembinai ma amam soldia mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi maloma amam Sadyusi mafi'i.

Amam mogawa amam biam mawalapa basef ma'ipasa Jisas notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti'. Ea' ma'i epes hiesi sali' saga'i anona nemaf sohafel wapoti'. Amam dambami Juda ma'i basef amama amam biam ma'iami ina endilisi. Na'ama amam mandaiwa'mam endilisi ma ma'i basef amama.
Ea' dei' amam mafi'i mombalo' amam biam wambomota aon nowala. Ea' manda'am manda' kalabus owamb anama mahafa wefilu kuhimbita.
Esis amam nematawa hiesi same' basef amama Jisas nohafel hi'agif wapoti' sombale'efana. Amama atom dei' esis sombale'efanai sataga hias, amam atom mataga felefele'ma 5,000-peleim.
Nemaf nagi'i amam dambami Judaimi maloma agufumi esis Judai maloma amam Juda mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, mandakolas etifigin Jerusalem.
Dembinai pris Anas nape nali'ma pris hiami naloma Kaiafas maloma Jon Aleksander ea' anom amam wapoti' wambota Anasi mafi'i hi'alam mandakolas etifigin maloma amam dambami Juda.
Ea' amam hiami manda' amam aposel biam maitu naep amamumi mahali'am mehip ma'i, “Ipe' pefa' maina pepel pa'i maina agel dei' panda' amamaga amama? Kiam!”
Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'ina ma Pita nanda'ana la'ifina na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' Israel amam dembipei peloma ipe' agufipei,
ipe' dei' pahali' afa' biafa ma wanda' waf bu'unai wagiambama aman anama bo'wagah awomunai. Ipe' pa'i pegawa anan nataga bo'ona na'imama.

Ipe' hipei peme' basef ae'ami pegawa andeande'. Esis hiesi Israel wapoti' seme'ama sogawam andeande' ma pepel agel Jisas Krais Nasaretinai atona dei' aman anama ambo'ona endilisi nohafel naitu naep ipe'imi. Jisas ipe' paundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai pahana afuna, ea' dei' God nafelana nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.
‘Owap
anama ipe' pala' ifagwi pandaiwa'mana pelefatana na'oh, dei' nandamboma nataga nape nali' nanda' ipat anama la'ifina.’

Amam agufumi mati Pita naloma Jon maitu la'ifim ma'i basef amama. Ea' agufumi mogawa amam biam ina manda' skul, owa'. Amam lelaimi atom. Ea' amam agufumi ukup mohafel kwapete'am ukup matamea ma amam. Ea' mogawa amam biam ma'i fowa' mape maloma Jisas.
Ea' agufumi Judai amama mati aman anama nali' bo'wagah mondala'anai dei' nataga bo'ona naitu naloma Pita naloma Jon. Ea' amam ina ma'i anom basef magwamamam amam biam, owa'.
Ea' ma'ipa amam biam ma mokwaha ipat anama mandakolasanai muwis ande'.
Amam biam mawis ande', amam atom ma'i basef mandame'mam ma'i,

“Afa' nambimb ata' onda' amam amama biam wi'imama ma osopama malogof? Dei' main, amam manda' maol la'ifinai si'i God nanda'anai ea' epes hiesi sape Jerusalemi sogawam. Afa' ina la'ififa ma ombaso'mas wi'i, ‘Amam ina manda' maol anama’, owa'.
Afa' wi'i basef la'ifimi ma amam biam ina ata' mi'ipasa basef wapoti' enis epesa agel anama, owa'. Na'ama basef amama mefe'agon hi'ilagona esis amam nematawa hiesi.”

Ea' agufumi motanima mofala amam biam mawisi wapoti' ma'ipam basef la'ifimi ma'i, “Ipe' bipa ina ata' pi'ipasa basef amama ma agel Jisasi, ina ata' piwalipasa agel Jisasi ma enis amam nematawa, owa'.”
Afa' biafa ina feso'mafa malogof, owa'. Afa' owalapa basef hiami ma amamaga watolom wame'am.”

Ea' agufumi mowatania anom basef la'ifimi ma'ipam amam biam ma mosopama malogof, ea' makwahom mafe'. Esis hiesi safela agel God lu'una ma amamaga amama sati amam biam manda'ami. Na'ama agufumi amama Judai ina mati anom basef ofagema ma mose'ama nimanimi amam, owa'. Aman anama amam biam manda'ana nataga bo'ona, afagof ananimi mikila' 40-peleim.
Agufumi Judai matagaha amam biam motanima mafe'ma esis sombale'efanai, ea' ma'ipasa basef hiami amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Judai ma'ipamami.
Esis same'am ea', hiesi ukup etifim sanda' beten safela agel Godi na'ama sa'i, “Dembinai, ine' nahapila ilif etapi, ine' nanda' etap otaga naoh maloma amamaga amama hiami mape.
Fowa' gani ine' nanda' akunamapa ape'inai Devit na'i basef. Anan nanda' maol ine'inai ea' Ambal Bu'unai Ine'inai nafelona nahali'as na'i,
‘Dei' maina esis owa' Judaisi ukup wandafum endilisi? Dei' maina esis epes hiesi ukup aom endilisi ma Dembinai? Owa'. Esis ina la'ifis, owa'.

Amam king ganima etap hiagoma mandandombol maloma amam agufumi mandatama mape etifigin manda' wandafa motofa dembinai God noloma Krais Dembinai, God nondandepana nosapa'ana nifi'i. Owa', ina la'ifim.’

Herot naloma Pontius Pailat maloma enis epes hiesi owa' Judaisi saloma esis Israel saila basef amama Deviti sanda' kolas wambel anama atona sasombala basef Jisasi, aman anama bu'unai nanda' maol ine'inai, fowa' gani nesahe'ana ea'.
Esis sandakolas sape etifigina sonda' amamaga hiami si'i fowa' gani ine' la'ifina okom ine'inai na'i neataga dei'.

Dembinai, ine' okom nepoma basef hiami wandafumi esis sa'iami ea' nigiambama afa' wanda' maol ine'inai. Nenda'am na'ama ma afa' otaga la'ififa endilisi owalapa basef ine'imi, ma afa' ina umbamahafa, owa'

Ine' newamona lagof ine'imi nihi'amba esis ine' la'ifinai ma nigiambama esis awes nanda'asi sotaga bo'wes wapoti'. Ea' nenda' pepel ine'inai neloma ikwaf naninani la'ifinai ma agel Jisasi, Anan bu'unai nanda'mena maoli.”
Esis sanda' betena ea', same' ipat anama sapeinai nandakoto'. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi si'inama esis hiesi sataga la'ifis ea' sawalapa basef Godi. Esis ina umbamahasa amam agufumi Judai, owa'.
Epes hiesi sombale'efi ukup etifim. Ina enin epen atitin nati anom amamaga ananimi atom, owa'.
Amamaga hiami asasimi, amama esis hiesi.
Amam aposel mawalapa basef ma'ipasama Jisas Dembinai ape'inai notanima nohafel, ea' basef amamumi la'ifim endilisi. Ea' God nagiambamas endilisi ma epes isima hiesi sombale'efana.

Esis sandagigiambanama etin. Ea' ina enin epen atitin la'afena esis amamaga gwa'aimi maim a'an, owa'. Esis hiesi ofagesa etapi ifagwi, esis sase'asam enis epes satalom sase'asa otamba. Ea' sofa'ai otamba amama safi'i,
sase' amam aposel. Ea' amam manda'am maso' isima gwa'aimi hiahaom a'asi.
Ea' anona aman agel ananinai Josep amam aposel manda'mana anona agel Barnabas. Agel anama ofagena na'ama, “Epen nenda' ukup epesi la'ifim.” Anan anona Livai, aman anama ailan Saiprusinai.
Anan nase'asa etap ananinai enis epes satalona sase'ana otamba nofa'am nafi'i naso' amam aposel.
Anona aman agilinama Ananaias, anan nape naloma waulu'mana anani'wi Safaira. Anan nase'asa anona etap asasinai enis epes satalona.
Ea' nofa' otamba tu'wanim atom nase'amama aposel, tu'wanim ma'oma esis. Anan nambaso'ma amam na'i otamba ea' ma'um nase'amama si'im. Waulu'mana wapoti' kogawa amama.
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias, ine' na'i a'e ma Satan nafi'i nawis nape si'ina ma okom ine'inai ma dei' nambaso'ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nambaho' otamba tu'wanim ma etap anama?

Fowa' esis ata' owa' sotala etap, nogota anama ata' etap ine'inai atona. Ama dei' satalona ea', otamba ine'imi nimafiam. Dei' maina ine' okom na'i waf anama aonai? Ina nambaso'ma afa' atofa, owa'. Ine' nambaso'ma God.”
Ananaias name' basef amama, nowa etap afuna. Ea' esis same' basef amama ma naga', umbamahas kwapete' endilisi.
Ea' anom amam so'umi mafi'i mofa' alop ananinai mowa'ana lowaf mofa'ana mafe' mawana.
Ama nogota bandana awa wenifin nafe', akwa'w waulu'mana kwafi'i kwawisi. Akwa'w ina kogawa amamaga matagama anan, owa'.
Ea' Pita na'ipakw na'i, “Ipe' pefa' moni anama nandahama etap anama ea' ma'una?”
Ea' akwa'w kwambaso'mana kwa'i, “Ma'una anama atona.”

Ea' Pita na'ipakw na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' bipa pa'i basef baso'maimi pandame'mam pambaso'ma Ambal Bu'unai Dembinai? Neme'! Amam amama mefa' waulunamena ine'inai mafe' mawana, amam mafi'i maitu uta. Atuwasi mofa' ine' wapoti' nigi'mana nefe'!”
Ea' mehip akwa'w kowa etap felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai afu'w. Ea' amam so'umi mawisi nomon mati akwa'w afu'w ea' mofa'akw mafe' mawa'w felefele'ma waulunama'w akwa'unai.
Ea' esis Kristen hiesi saloma esis amam nematawa same' basefa amamaga amama, ea' umbamahas kwapete'!

Amam aposel manda' pepel naninani hianai si'i God nanda'anai la'afena esis amam nematawa. Ea' epes isima hiesi sombale'efanai ukup etifim sandatama etifigin sape atogon ilaf ipat Solomoni felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai.
Enis amam nematawa hiesi umbamahas, ea' ina safi'i sandatama etifigin salomas, owa'. Ea' isima sape ande'i safela agof esis Kristeni sa'i esis epes bu'wasi.
Ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi sombale'efa dembinai, ea' safi'i timbi tambel sawisa epes hiesi Ananisi la'ela'ef sape.

Esis saloma enis epes wapoti' sati pepel anama amam aposel manda'anai. Ea' sofa' awesisi safi'i sambe'as sa'oh ande' eaf, salas balatagw mamumami sofa'as safi'i. Esis ukup ma'i, i'i Pita ina nefe'ma esis, ea' hapaimi. Esis sa'i owaf nonda' ambal ananinai atona nefe' naolo'mas.

Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi wambel hiagoma sape felefele'ma Jerusalemi wapoti' safi'i sandatama etifigin salomas. Esis sofa'ai awesisi safi'i salomai epes isima ambagof awami mapaisi mahambombagasi. Ea' epes isima hiesi sataga bo'wes wapoti'.

Ea' pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami naloma amam amama hiami alupumi ananimi amam Sadyusi, amam kowalam endilisi ma maol bu'unai amam aposel manda'anai. Dei' main amam mati esis hiesi saila basef amamumi.
Amama atom dei' amam mohafel mombalo' amam aposel mase'am kalabus lu'wami.
Ea' owamb anona ensel Dembinai nafi'i nawisi' uta lu'unai endalelemba kalabus ea' nafelai amam aposel mawisi ande' na'i,
“Ipe' fo'o pitu ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai nomon pewalapa basefa amam nematawa hiesi ma waf hianai dambainai ma ambal namunai.”
Ea' amam aposel mame' basef amama, kuhimbita mafe' ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai ma'ipa esis amam nematawa.
Pris anama dembinai naloma amam alupumi ananimi mafi'i mofalai agufumi hiami Israeli mafi'i mandakolas etifigin. Ea' masapa' basef mafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, mofa'ai amam aposel mafi'i.
Ea' amam plisman mafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, ina mati amam aposel, owa'. Ea' motanima mafe' ma'ipa amam dambami ma'i,
“Afa' wati uta ipat kalabusi sowalowana la'ifina, ea' amam plisman mumafianai maitu mumafi utagw hiami andeande'. Afa' wawisi' uta wawis nomon, ina wati enin epen, owa'.”
Ea' kepten numafi ipat Godi naloma amam pris dambami mome' basef amama ea' nomonas matamea hiahias ma'i, “Maim amama atuwasi dei' motaga?”

Amam mape nomonas matamea mafe', anona aman nafi'i nataga na'ipam na'i, “Peme', amam amama ipe' panda'am mape kalabusi dei' maitu nomon felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi ma'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa.”
Ea' kepten naloma amam plisman mafe' mofa'ai amam aposel mafi'i. Ea' amam ina maham, owa'. Amam umbamaham ma'i, “Na'ama esis amam nematawa sokwaha otamba sohafa.”
Amam mofa'ai amam aposel maitu naep amam dambami esis Judai la'afen. Ea' pris anama dembinai nape nali'ma amam prisi na'ipam na'i,

“Afa' wa'ipipa basef la'ifimi wa'i ipe' ina pewalapa basef pi'ipasam amam nematawa ma agel anama, owa'. Ea' ipe' panda' basef amama mape mafe'agon hi'alogon Jerusalem asi'igina basef ipe'imi. Ea' pa'i basef mailafa pa'i ofagema afa'imi, afa' waha aman anama naga'.”
Ipe' paunda Jisas lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' pahana naga'. Ea' God anama bafapapa ape' Juda manda' lotumanai nafelona nohafel wapoti' hi'agif.

Ea' God nofa'ana nalata ilif nahaponana nape lagel da'isinai ananinai. Ea' nape agilinai ma nigiambama ape' Israel hiapai. Anan na'i nofa'apa ma momboma opalef mila God nokwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
Dei' afa' waloma Ambal Bu'unai Godi wawalapa basefa amamaga amama hiemi afa' watolom ogawami. God nase'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai ea' ma amam nematawa saila basef ananimi.”
Ea' anona dembinai naitu la'afena amam dambami esis Judai, anan Farisi agilinama Gameliel
anan dembinai tisa mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ea' esis amam nematawa sanifela agel ananinai. Na'ipa amama mokwaha amam aposel miowis ande' nogota bandana.
Ea' na'ipa amam dambami Juda na'i, “Ipe' amam Israelipei, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma amam amama. Ipe' ata' ukup mi'i andeande' pili'.

Ipe' pegawa nogota anama fowa', anona aman Teudas nohafel na'i, ‘Ae' aman dembiwei, agiliwei.’ Ea' amam hiami felefele' ma 400-peleim mafe' mailana. Ea' enis epes sahana naga' ea' amam mombale'efanai mafa' mafe' atona etin. Ea' maol amamunai nowala.

Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', nogota anama gavman nofa'asa agof esis amam nematawa hiesi, anona aman Judas Galilinai nohafel nambomefa ukup enis epes hiesi. Ea' safe' sailana safela wandaf sapa' saloma gavman sa'i sogalo'mana. Ea' sahana naga' wapoti' ea' epes isima hiesi sombale'efanai safa' safe' atona etin hi'alas.
Na'ama dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' umbamehepama amam amama pekwahom mopano. I'i amam monda' maola epes etis, nambimb maol anama aonai nowala si'i maol amam biam do'ok ali' a'ipipami.
Ea' i'i God atona nonda' amam la'ifima basef amama, ipe' ina nambimb la'ifipama pesopama amam, owa'. Na'ama ipe' pepa' peloma God!”
Ea' amam dambami Juda maila basef Gamelieli ma'i, “Afa' oham etin.”
Ea' mofala amam aposel mafi'i, ma'ipa amam plismana moham. Ea' ma'ipam basef la'ifimi ma'i, “Ipe' ina ata' pi'i basef amama ma agel Jisasi wapoti', owa'.”
Ea' makwaha amam mafe'.
Ea' amam aposel makwaha amam dambami Juda mumafi koti ea' mafe' mawis ande'. Manifela God na'i aho'ma mofa' nimanimi ma agel Jisasi.

Amam ina makwaha maol anama mawalipasa basef bu'wami ma Jisas Anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i, owa'. Nimeguf hiami amam mawalipa esis amam nematawa hiesi ipat lu'unai Godi, ifagw asasimi wapoti'.

Nogota anama esis alupusi saila Jisasi sataga hias endilisi. Ea' esis Juda hiesi enis sa'i diga Griki safitap saloma enis Juda sa'i diga Hibrui ea' sa'i, “Nimeguf hiami ipe' pagiambama esis amam nematawa isima gwa'aimi maim a'asi, ea' anowa nematawa alifiwai ape'iwai owa'.”

Ipe' Kristen alupipei, ipe' ata' pendandepa anom amam 7-peleim la'afena ipe' mape andeande'ma naep esis amam nematawai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape napaim si'inama amam nomonas bu'wami mapaimi. Ama afa' onda'am mopoma mumafi maol anama.
Ea' afa' opoma onda' beten etin ea' wi'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa wigiambamas.”
Ea' esis hiesi sanda' amam amama maitu felefele'ma naep amam aposeli mawamona lagofa amam manda'mam betena monda' maol anama.
Ea' anom amam mohafel ma'i basef mandahihianama maloma Stiven. Amam amama fowa' manda' maol mape owina enis epes ea' dei' mape wafifim.
Ea' sofalana amam wambel Sairini naloma Aleksandria anona etap hiagoma Silisia naloma etap hiagoma Esia.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'ana gawa bu'unai Stiven. Amam amama hiami ma'i basef mandahihianama maloma Stiven ea' amam ina la'ifima mi'i basef mikila'ana, owa'.
Ea' manda' anona waf baso'maimi ma moha Stiven noga'. Ea' mofa'ai anom amam mase'am anama otamba ma'i basef ma'i, “Afa' wame' anan na'i basef nanda' Moses findiwana ea' nanda' God findiwana wapoti'.”
Ea' amam mafela opalef esis amam nematawai saloma amam agufumi asasimi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Ea' esis safe'ma Stiven sombalo'ana sofa'ana safe'ma amam dambami Juda mumafi koti.
Ea' sanda' anom amam maitu ma mambaso'mana ma anom basef baso'maimi. Amam amama ma'i, “La'ela'ef aman anama na'i basef awami ma ipat lu'unai Godi naloma mi'uli fowa' gani God na'ipa Mosesanai.
Ape' mame' anan na'i, ‘Aman anama Jisas Nasaretinai nambimb nohambombaga ipat anama lu'unai Godi ea' nonda' anona waf dambainai noho'ofa waf hianai fowa' gani Moses na'ipapanai.’ ”
Ea' amam hiami manda' kolas etifigin ipat esis Juda sanda' kotanai mati Stiven ea' mati amaga ananinai nafifil nataga si'i amaga anona enseli.
Ea' pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami nahali' Stiven na'i, “Basef amama endilisi?”

Ea' Stiven na'ipama basef na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan paloma ipe' ahape wapoti' ipe' peme' ae'. Fowa' gani bafalomafa afa'inai Abraham nape etap hiagoma Mesopotamia ina dei' nafe' wambel Haran, ata' owa'. Nogota anama God Dembinai nihi'ambana nafifili howalagon ea' natagamana.
Ea' God na'ipana na'i,
‘Ine' nekwaha wambel etap ine'inai neloma sahin owan ine'isi nefe' anagon laogoma nepe anona etap hiagoma ae' a'i ihi'ambenagoma.’
Ea' dei' Abraham nakwaha etap hiagoma Kaldia ea' nafe' nafe' nataga nape wambel Haran. Ahalomana ananinai naga' ea' God nasapa'ana nafi'i nape etap anae' dei' ape' mapeinai.

God ina dei' nase'ana anona etap anama Abraham ma nefa'ana, ata' owa'. Anona etap kwaie'una wapoti', owa'. Ea' God na'i basef endilisimi atoma anona nemaf owagama anan ea' nose'ana etap anama anona nefa'ana noloma esis bafasana ananisi owagama sigi' seatagai sefa'ana ea' sepaina. Nogota anama Abraham so'uso'win ata' a'ana God na'ipana basef amama.
Na'ipana na'i,

‘Wombota bafasena ine'isi owagama sigi seatagai sope anona etap enis epesi. Ea' epes hiesi isima enis owagama sonda' epes hiesi ine'isi aowes sonda' maol ahifinai agof a'as sope owina esis ea' sonda'as kwapete'as sope sefe' sotaga nogota launai afagof 400-peleim.

Ea' anona nemaf ae' egwamasa waf aonai esis Isip sonda'as kwapete'asi.’ Ea' God na'i, ‘Anona nemaf owagama wapoti' epes isima hiesi ine'isi sokwaha etap anama hiagoma sifi'i sope sonda' lotuma ae' etap anae'.’

Ea' God na'ipa Abraham basef la'ifimi endilisi ma Abraham notopa' alop ananinai. Ea' Abraham name' basef amama nailam natopa' alop ananinai ea' nola Aisak nogalomana ananinai ma nataga nimeguf 8-peleim, ea' Abraham natopa'mana alop ananinai. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' Aisak nataga ahalomana Jekopi, ea' Jekop ahalomana bafapapa amama dambami 12-peleim.

Amam bafapapa 11-peleim nomonas aom kowalama Josep. Na'ama masapa'ana mafe' mofa' otambana enis epes Isip sao'wana nafe' nanda' maol aonai agel a'ana nape owina esis. Ea' sofa'ana safe' hiagoma Isip. Ea' God nape nalomana.

Anan nagiambamana nahagofam nimanimi hiami ananimi nape bo'ona. Nemaf anama anan na'i basef naloma king Isipinai Fero, God nase'ana gawa bu'unai na'i basef nalomana ma nanda' king Fero okom nainailana. Ea' dei' king anama nanda'ana nataga nape dembinai gavmana etap hiagoma Isip ea' numafi amamaga hiami ma ipat anan kingi wapoti'.

Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', nolomahas lu'unai nataga etap hiagoma Isip anama hiagoma nafe'agon hi'alagon nafe' nataga etap hiagoma Kenan wapoti' ea' esis sefa' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' esis bafasapa ape'isi sape Kenani ina ata' sofa' anom gwa'aimi, owa'.
Ea' Jekop name' basef sa'i gwa'aimi ma'oh gani etap hiagoma Isip. Ea' nasapa' amam bafapapa ape'imi mali' mafe' dambadamba.
Ea' magi' motanima mafe'ma bif ea' Josep na'ipa amam sahopam ananimi na'i, ‘Ae' Josep.’ Dei' king nogawa amam wambota Josepi mafi'i.
Ea' Josep nasapa' basef mafe' nofalai ahalomana Jekop nakwaha etap anama lu'unai Kenan nagi'mana nafe' Isip naloma esis wambota ananinai hiesi sataga 75-peleis.
Na'ama Jekop nakini' Isip naloma bafapapa ape'imi. Anom afagof mafe' ea', amam maga'.
Amam maga' ea', sefa'am sotanima safe' wambel Sekem sawam hi'agif anama fowa' gani Abraham nakwana otamba natalogoma ma awasi Hemoi.
Felefele'ma nemaf anama God na'i basef ananimi fowa' na'ipa Abraham ami mataga alihim, epes ape'isi Israel sataga amam nematawa hiesi endilisi sape etap anama hiagoma Isip.
Ea' anona aman dambainai nataga dembinai king Isipunai, anan ina nogawa fowa' Josep nape dembinai ma Isip, owa'.
King anama nambaso'mas nase'asa maol ahifinai ma epes hiesi ape'isi. Anan nanda' waf aonai ma esis bafasapa ape'isi, anan la'ifina endilisi na'i esis sokwaha awasi asasisi sope ande' ma afis.
Nogota anama Moses mama'wana kolana. Anan so'uso'win bu'unai endilisi. Ea' mamasana sumafiana andeande' ipat asasinai ma aomb wanom.
Ea' sofa'ana safe' sambaho'ana na'oh aolop ande'. Ea' king Fero nogamana anani'wi kwafi'i kwatolona kofa'ana nape si'i nogaloma'w akwa'unai endilisi.
Ea' Moses nanda' skul nefa' gawa hianai esis Isipi ea' nataga aman dembinai nanda' maol naninani na'i basef la'ifimi ma seme'am sailam.
Moses nape dambena ma afagof 40-peleim ea', okom na'i esis wambota ananinai Israel ea' nafe' natilis.
Nati anona Isipinai naha anona Israelinai nanda'ana kwapete'ana endilisi. Ea' nagiambama Israelinai naha aman anama Isipinai afuna.
Ea' anan okom na'i 'Epes ae'asi nambimb sogawa God nagiambama ape' ma lagof Mosesi ma nokwahepa mope andeande'.’ Owa'. Esis ina sagawa God nandandepa Mosesa nigiambamas, owa'.
Wafilu Moses notanima nafe' natilis wapoti' ea' nati anom biam amam atom Israel mapa' wapoti'. Ea' nohape'am na'ipam na'i,
‘Ipe' etipa sahalomana owalomana penda'am na'ama owa'. Dei' maina ipe' pahambomaga ipe' etipa?’
Ea' aman anama naha anona aman Isrelinai na'ipa Moses na'i,
‘Emi na'ipina ma nepe dembinai ma newaloga afa'?
A'i ine' na'i nehe si'i nambati' naha aman anama Isipinai naga'?’
Moses neme'ana na'ama, anan umbamahana nafa' nafe' anona etap hiagoma Midian laogoma. Nakwaha wambel ananinai nafe' nailas nape naloma esis Midian ea' nase' nemata'w nola awasi bias.
Afagof 40-peleim mafe'ma ea', anona ensel Dembinai natagamana anona etap wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma felefele'ma halaf Sainai. Ensel nape nomona nif ilelowa fandom mataga anona lawag so'unai.
Ea' Moses natolom okom ananinai natanea ma amama. Ea' nafe' felefele'ma natolom andeande', Dembinai na'ipana na'i,
‘Ae' God amam bafapena ine'imi manda' lotumei. Ae' God Abraham naloma Aisak Jekop fowa' gani manda' lotumei.’
Ea' Moses gegelalasana umbamahana ma natologon.
Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i,
‘Tagaha su mape bo'wagah ine'imi. Etap anae' ine' dei' naituma etap ae'anai.

Ae' ati amam nematawa hiesi ae'asi sefa' nimanimi lu'wami etap anama hiagoma Isip. Ae' ame' lef asasinai ea' dei' bo'wes isila'i ma igiambamasa etofa nimanimi amama asasimi sope. Na'ama dei' ine' hafel. Ae' a'i esapa'ena netanima nefe' Isip.’
Moses aman anama atona fowa' sosambalana sa'i,
‘Emi na'i ine' nepe dembinai ma newalogapa?’
Dei' aman anama atona God nasapa'ana nafe' si'i dembinai ma numafias nofa'as sotanimani. God nanda'ana la'ifina ma anama ensel natagamana nalomana na'i ma lawag anama so'unai.

Moses nao'was safe' sakwaha Isip, nanda' pepel naninani ma ikwaf naninani si'i God nanda'anai ma etap hiagoma Isip ea' naoh embel akwahimi ea' anama etap wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma ma afagof amama 40-peleim.
Moses aman anama ma'una anan na'ipa esis Israel na'i,
‘Anona nemaf God nosapa' anona sahalomepa ipe'inai nonda'ana nope profet si'i ae'.’

Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', esis Israel safe' sandakolas etifigin anama wafiguma fatauguma Moses aman anama atona nape nalomas. Anan nape naloma bafapapa ape'imi wapoti'. Anan nape naloma ensel anama nase'ana basef Godi halaf anama Sainai ea' nofa' basef amama ambal namunai na'ipapa.
Ea' bafasapa ape'isi sandaiwa'ma some' basef ananimi, owa'. Esis sosambalona ea' sa'i sotanima sefe' Isip ukup maimailagon.
Ea' sa'ipa aman anama Aron sa'i,
‘Aman anama Moses nofa'apai Isip mafi'i, ina mogawana nafe' nape eti? Ea' ine' da'mapa anona god baso'amunai ape'inai ma anan nope numafiapa.’
Nemaf anama esis sanda' anona bulmakau ea' sondolalima god anama baso'amunai. Ea' sandanifel ma god anama sanda'ana lagof asasimi atom.
Ea' God nase'asa alafuga esis nakwaha esisa sonda' lotu sefela agofa aon owambunai alipunai maloma ondowa, si'i basef mape buk profeti ma'iam ma'i,
‘Ipe' epes Israel, ipe' paha bulmakau maloma sipsip pendolali ma ae' pape anama wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma afagof 40-peleim? Owa'!

Ipe' pefa' ipat selinai panda' lotuma Molokanai, ea' pefa'ana naloma ikwaf si'i ondo'w god baso'amunai Refani, ambagof god baso'amunai hianai ipe' panda'ana panda' lotumana. Na'ama anona nemaf ae' egalo'mepa pefe' pepe laogoma peloma wambel Babilon gani wa'ol.’

Fowa' gani bafasapa ape'isi sape anama wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma, nogota anama sowalo'a sel si'i ipat sanda' lotuwanai. Ipat anama nihi'ambapa anama God napainai. Ipat anama God na'ipasa basef ananimi. Esis sala' ipat anama selinai nandahama ikwaf anama God fowa' nihi'amba Mosesanai. God na'ipana ma nanda'ana na'ama etin.

Ea' amam bafapapa ape'imi mafi'i maloma Josua ma mofa' etap lu'unai enis epesi. Ea' God nagalopa esisa naep esis bafasapa ape'isi. Nemaf anama sofa'ai ipat anama selinai, sanda'ana na'ae la'ela'ef nape nafi'i nafi'i nogota Devit nataga king.
Devit nanda' waf bu'unai ma God nagiambamana nanda'ana la'ifina. Ea' nanda' betena Goda anan na'i howalagon anona ipat bu'unai ma God anama fowa' gani Jekop nanda' lotumanai.
Ea' nogalomana Solomon nanda' ipat anama lu'unai Godi nala'ana.
Owa'. Dembinai Edilisinai ina nape ifagw amama epes sala'am lagof asasimi, owa'. Basef amama mail Buk Baibeli si'i anona profet na'iam na'i,
‘Dembinai na'i na'ama na'i, “Heven si'i balata Ae' apeinai, etap anae' Ae' ahapona bo'wagah matomama. Maina ipat nambimb pelana ma Ae'? Owa'. Ae' ina epoma noma'w ipat anama. Owa'.
Lagof ae'ami atom anda' amamaga amama hiami hi'alam,” ’

Ipe' epes pesambala basefi. Ipe' owa' pegawa basef Godi si'i enis epes owa' sogawa Godi. Ipe' pandaiwa' ma peme' basef Godi ma opalef aligah ipe'imi. La'ela'ef ipe' pesambala Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Ipe' panda'am na'ama etin si'i fowa' gani bafasepa ehasepa ipe'isi sanda'am.

Amam profet hiami fowa' gani mapani esis akusepa ipe'isi sanda' waf aonai ma amam hiami saham sanda'am aom. Saha amam profet ma'ipasa Aman Bu'unai anona nemaf neafi'i. Ea' dei' ipe' pawalapana ma amam naumbih mahana naga' ea'.
Fowa' gani God nase'epa mi'uli ananinai ipe'. Ea' amam ensel atom ma'ipipa mi'uli anama, ea' ipe' ina pame'ana pailana, owa'.”
Amam mame' basef amama maha opalef amamumi endilisi. Amam mona' nalelef tilili telele' ukup wandafum endilisi ma Stiven.
Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina endilisi, naniga nati heven ilif. Nati nafifili Godi ea' nati Jisas naitu lagel da'isinai Godi.
Ea' Stiven na'ipam na'i, “Peme'! Ae' ati heven nandawisi' ea' Dembinai nataga epen endilisinai naitu lagel da'isinai Godi.”
Ea' amam ma'i basef la'ifimi mehip endilisi masopama aligah amamumi mandaiwa'ma mome' basef amama. Ea' mohafel masagih mafe' etin mombalo' Stiven.

Ea' mogwasi'ana nawis ande'. Amam do'ok mali' mambaso'mana basefi mowalia siaogw amamumi mambe'am wa'ol felefele'ma anona aman so'unai naituma agilinama Sol. Mowaliam ma'oh mokwaha otamba mehip maha Stiven.
Makwaha otamba mahana etin, nanda' beten na'ama na'i, “Dembinai Jisas, ine' fa'ago ambal ae'anai!”
Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa na'i mehip na'i, “Dembinai, ine' owa' negwamama waf anama aonai ma amam, owa'.” Stiven na'iam na'ama, ea' naga'.
Ea' Sol okom atotona naloma amam maha Stiven naga'i.

Nogota anama esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi, sahas sase'asa nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' amama atom dei' esis sombale'efanai safa' safe' anama etap hiagoma Judia naloma Samaria. Ea' amam aposel atom ata' mapani la'ela'ef Jerusalem.
Anom amam maila waf Godi andeande'i mofa' Stiven mawana malopana endilisi.
Ea' Sol nafela maol nanda'ana naha esis Kristen. Anan nafe' nawis ifagw hiami atona etin nofa'ai amam nematawa hiesi sembale'efa Kraisi. Ea' nahonde'as nofa'as nafe' nanda'as sanda' kalabus.
Esis Kristen safa' safe' wambel hiagoma sawalapa basef bu'wami Godi sa'ipasam.
Ea' Filip nowala nafe' anona wambel etap hiagoma Samaria nawalipasa basef bu'wami na'i Jisas anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
Amam nematawa hiesi same' basefa anan ea' sati ikwaf la'ifinai hianai naninani anan nanda'anai ea' seme'am andeande'ma basef ananimi.

Ikwaf anama na'ama. Amam nematawa hiesi ambagof awami mapaisi, ambagof amama malef wigo' kwapete'am endilisi ea' makwaha esis mawisi mafa' mafe'. Ea' epes isima lagof bo'wagah awamisi, enis isima bihiguf mondala'asi, esis hiesi sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
Ea' dei' esis wambel anama sofa' danifel lu'unai.

Ea' anona aman nape wambel anama agilinama Saimon. Aman anama fowa' nanda' ambagofi nape la'ela'ef nafi'i nataga dei' nemaf anama. Ea' nanda' ukup esis amam nematawa Samariaisi ukup matamea mafe'. Anan Saimon na'iam na'i, “Ae' aman dembiwei.”
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi agof a'asi saloma agufisi, esis hiesi seme'am andeande' basef Saimoni. Sa'iam sa'i, “Aman anama anan nofa' pepel anama dembinai Godi sofalana sa'i pepel lu'unai.”
Ea' esis la'ifisa saila basef ananimi. Dei' main, nimeguf hiami anan nanda' waf naninani hianai la'ifinai nanda' ambagof nahapila mu'uhup. Ea' satolom ukup matamea mafe'.
