Ea' Filip nawalipasa basef bu'wami esis hiesi. Nawalipasa agel Jisas Kraisi ma siowis wambota Godi numafias. Ea' sombale'efa basef amama sofa' baptais. Esis amam nematawa wapoti'.
Ea' aman anama Saimon wapoti' nembale'efa Jisas ea' nofa' baptais nape naloma Filip. Anan nati Filip nanda' ikwaf anama la'ifinai naninani ea' okom natanea nafe'.
Amam aposel mape Jerusalemi mame' basefa esis Samaria sefa' basef Godi. Na'ama masapa' Pita naloma Jon mafe'ma esis.
Amam biam mafi'i mataga manda' betena God nigiambamasa sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai.
Dei' main, Ambal Godi ina dei' nape nalomas, ata' owa'. Esis sofa' baptais etina agel Dembinai Jisas.
Ea' amam biam mawamona lagofa esis ea' sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napais.
Ea' Saimon nati aposel amama biam mawamona lagof atoma esis sofa' Ambal Godi. Na'ama anan nofa' moni ananinai nafi'mai amam na'ipam na'i,
“Ipe' bipa pese'e pepel anama ma ae' wapoti' ma ae' i'i ewamona lagofa enin epen, nefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi.”

Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i otamba ine'imi moloma ine' pefe' wambel aonai hel. Amamaga bu'wami God nase'asam etin si'i presen, amama ine' okom na'i wilama netalom otamba ine'imi? Owa'.
Ine' owa' bo'wena neanda' maol anama Godi afa' wanda'anai. Owa'! Dei' main, okom ine'inai ina bo'onama naep Godi, owa'.
Ine' newa' alafugama waf anama aonai ine'inai nemboma opaf nefe'ma God. Ea' nenda' betena Dembinai ma nokwaha waf aonai nape okom ine'inai.
Dei' main, ae' ati ine' kowalena endilisi ma presen bu'unai God nase'afa anai. Ea' ae' egawena, waf anama aonai nembale'ena la'ela'ef nape si'i kalabus.”
Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Ipe' bipa penda' betena Dembinai ma anan nigiambame. Na'ama amama ipe' pa'iami motagame.”

Ea' Pita naloma Jon ma'ipasa basef ea' na'ipasam maloma amamaga amama Dembinai nagiambamam ea'. Ma'ipasam ea', motanima mafe' Jerusalem. Ata' nafe' eaf, mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi etap hiagoma esis Samaria.

Ea' anona ensel Dembinai na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ine' nefe' lambihilifinama kwa'waha Jerusalem nikini'i Gasa. Eaf anama fowa' esis safe'anai. Dei' owa'. Eaf anama nape anama wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma.”

Ea' Filip nohafel nafe'. Ea' natagama anona aman Itiopiainai eaf anama. Anan aman dembinai numafi otamba hiami ma kwin akwama dembe'wi gavman kumafi esis etap hiagoma Itiopia, sofala'w sa'i Kandasi. Aman anama anom amam matopa'mona alop ananinai. Nimbewa' nafi'i Jerusalema nanda' lotu,
dei' na'i notanima nefe'. Anan natoma karis ananinai si'i wilkar ea' natoma nati basef mape buk Baibeli fowa' gani profet Aisaia nanda'am ea' nafe'.
Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ine' fo'o felefele'ma aman anama nefe' neloma karis nanima.”
Ea' Filip nasagih nafe' felefele'ma karis anama, ea' name' aman anama natalifa basef amama Aisaia nanda'ami.
Ea' Filip nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' negawa basef amama ofagema dei' natalifam nafi'i?”
Ea' aman anama nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i enin epen owa' nihi'ambe, dei' egawa basef amama i'imama?”
Ea' na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ine' letowi netoma karis neloma ae'.”
Basef amama tu'wanim Godi anan natalifimi ma'iama Jisas ma'i,
“Esis sao'wana nafe' si'i sipsip ama sa'i sohana noga'. Anan si'i sipsip noganai esis sahapilana satopa'mana awif ananimi, tol napan. Ea' na'ama etina aman anama, ina na'i anom basef, owa'.

Esis sasambalona endilisi ea' ina sanda'mana basef andeande' ma kot ananinai, owa'. Anan awasi bafasana a'ana ma enis epes sitilis si'ipa enis epesa esis, owa'. Dei' main, sahana naga' ma ina ata' napan etap anae' wapoti', owa'.”
Ea' aman anama Ithiopianai na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ina. Profet anama na'i emi ma dei' nanda' basef amama? Na'iama anan atona o na'iama anona epen?”
Ea' Filip na'i basef nawalapama aman anama. Nahafel na'ipama basef amama tu'wanim Godi aman anama na'iami mafe' mafe' ea' nawalapai basef bu'wami Jisasi.
Amam biam mafe', matagama anona dumb. Ea' aman anama na'ipa Filip na'i, “Niti dumb notah anama. Ine' na'i a'e ma ae' efa' baptais?”
[Ea' Filip na'i, “I'i ine' nembale'efa Dembinai endilisi ma okom ine'inai, wila.”
Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' embale'efa Jisas Krais anan nogalomana Godi.”]
Na'iam ea', karis notawa ea' Filip naloma aman anama dembinai misila' mafe' mowala dumb anama. Ea' Filip napisi'ana.

Ea' amam biam makwaha dumb mandegiai wata'ita, mehip Ambal Bu'unai Dembinai nofa' Filip ea' nafe'. Ea' aman anama Ithiopiainai ina ata' natolona wapoti', owa'. Ea' anan nandanifel endilisi naila eaf ananinai nafe'.
Ea' Filip nafe' nataga Asdot. Anan nafe' taun anama hiagoma ganigani nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi. Nafe' nafe', notanima nafe' nataga taun Sisaria.

Fowa' basef amama ata' owa' motagae, nogota anama Sol nanda'am na'ama. Anan na'i basef la'ifimi endilisi ma naha esis alupusi saila Dembinai nohas soga'. Ea' nafe'ma pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami.

Na'ipana ea' pris anama nanda' basefa pas mafe'ma agufumi hiami mumafi ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi wambel Damaskus. Ea' nase'ana pasa basef amama Sol. Ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “I'i Sol niti enis amam nematawa saila eaf anama dambainai sape Damaskusi, nonda' kalabusimas nombale'as nefa'as sefe' Jerusalem.”
Ea' Sol nafe' nataga felefele'ma Damaskus, mehip anona nafifili howalagon nafi'i nisila'i heven ea' mafifimana.
Ea' nowa na'oh etap ea' name' anona maf na'ipana na'i, “Sol, Sol, dei' maina ine' nahambombaga ae'?”
Ea' Sol nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' emi egafina?”
Ea' maf anama na'i, “Ae' Jisas ine' nahambombaga ae'.
Dei' ine' hafel nefe' niwis taun lu'unai. Nambimb anona aman nifi'mai ine' ni'ipina amamaga ine' nambimb neanda'ami.”
Ea' amam mafe' maloma Soli mame' maf anama ea' ina mati anona epen, owa'.
Ea' Sol nohafel na'i niti, owa'. Nati owamb atona. Ea' amam mahapila lagof ananimi mofa'ana mafe' mawis Damaskus.
Anan nati owamb atona nape nimeguf wanom ea' ina na' gwa'aimi embel maim, owa'.
Ea' anona alupunai Jisasi nape na'ama Damaskus, agilinama Ananaias. Ea' na'oh nandondo'oh nati Dembinai nofalana na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias!”
Ea' anan na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ape na'ae.”
Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel fo'o eaf anama sa'i usi'inai nefe' ipat Judasi ea' niti anona aman Tarsusinai, agilinama Sol. Dei' anan nanda' beten nape.
Sol nali' na'oh nandondo'oh ea' nati anona aman agilinama Ananaias atuwasi nifi'i nuwisi nowamona lagofa anona nonda' naep miti andeande' wapoti'.”
Ea' Ananaias nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ame' basef hiami ma epen anama, waf aonai hianai anan nanda'ana esis amam nematawa ine'isi gani Jerusalem.
Anan nofa' agel lu'unai ea' ma amam pris dambami ma nombalo' amam nematawa sanda' betena agel ine'inai wambel anae' ma nanda' kalabusimas.”

Ea' Dembinai na'ipana nasapa'ana na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Aman anama nambimb nonda' maol Ae'anai. Ae' andandepana ea' ma nefe' ni'ipasa basefa agel ae'anai enis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi soloma amam dambami king asasimi moloma esis Israel wapoti'.
Nambimb ae' ihi'ambana nimanimi lu'wami nefa'ami ma nowalapa agel ae'anai. Na'ama ine' dei' fo'o netolona.”

Ea' Ananaias nafe' nawis ipat anama nomon nasa lagofa Sol na'i, “Sahalome Sol, Dembinai Jisas natagamena eaf nogota anama ine' nafi'i na'ae. Dei' nasapa'e afi'mai ine' ma niti andeande' wapoti' ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope si'inama ine'.”
Ea' amamaga mape masopama naep Soli si'i dunduf mafe' mehip makwaha naep Soli mowa. Ea' naep ananimi mati wapoti', nohafel nofa' baptais.
Ea' na' gwa'aimi nataga la'ifina wapoti'.
Sol nape anom nimeguf naloma amam alupumi Jisasi Damaskus.
Ea' dei' atef nafe' ifagw hiami esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nawalapa basef Jisasi na'i, “Jisas anan nogalomana Godi.”

Epes hiesi same' basef ananimi ea' sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i, “Aman anama nahambombaga amam nematawa sofala agel Jisasi wambel Jerusalem. Ea' dei' nafi'i na'ae ma nowa' esis nonda' kalabusimas nofa'as sefe'ma amam pris dambami. Ea' ma'una aman anama atona.”

Ea' pepel Soli nataga la'ifina nihi'amabas ma basef nawalipasami. Ea' esis Juda sape Damaskusi same' basefa anan. Esis ina la'ifisa sogwa anom basef si'ipanam, owa'. Anan la'ifina nihi'ambas endilisi na'i, “Jisas anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.”
Nimeguf hiami mafe'ma ea', amam Juda ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Sol noga'.
Ea' Sol name' basef amama amamumi. Ea' amam Juda hiami mape mumafi utagw hiami ma taun anama owamb alip wapoti' ma ma'i moha Sol noga'.
Ea' amam alupumi Soli mofa'ana owamb mafe' malata endalelemb nomon. Ea' malana nape anona holaf lu'unai mapana mandelef malana nisila' endalelemb ande'.
Sol nafe' Jerusalem ea' na'i nondakolas noloma esis alupusi Jisasi. Ea' esis hiesi umbamahasana. Esis ina sombale'efana sa'i anan alupunai Jisasi, ata' owa'.

Ea' Barnabas nao'wana mafe'ma amam aposel ea' na'ipama Sol nati Dembinai eaf ma Dembinai na'ipana basef anan. Ea' Barnabas na'ipam na'i anan la'ifina nawalapa basef na'ipasama agel Jisasi Damaskus, dei' anan ina ata' umbamahana, owa'.
Ea' dei' sogawa anan wambota atona Jisasi nalomas nape la'afena esis. Anan la'ifina nanda' maol nafe' Jerusalem anama hiagoma nawalapa basefa agel Dembinai. Anan ina umbamahana, owa'.
Na'ipasa basef Godi naloma amam Juda magawa diga Griki ea' na'i basef nalomam mandahihianama. Ea' amam mandaiwa'ma basef ananimi magolopa eafa mohana noga'.
Amam Kristen sahin owan mogawa amama, ea' mofa' Sol mafe' makini Sisaria. Ea' masapa'ana nafe' nape wambel Tarsus.

Dei' esis amam nematawa Kristen sape etap anama hiagoma Judia naloma Galili naloma Samaria sape opalef awanem sape andeande' ea' esis Kristen sataga la'ifis. Esis sape owina Dembinai ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'as sataga la'ifis opalef asasimi. Ea' esis Kristen sataga hias.
Pita nafe' wambel anama hiagoma ea' nakini' nafe' taun anama Lida wapoti' nape naloma esis amam nematawa Godi sape wambel anama.
Ea' nati anona aman Inas. Alop bihiguf ananimi maga'ana, tol na'oh nala lehis nape nogota laona afagof 8-peleim.
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Inas, dei' Jisas Krais nanda'ena bo'wena wapoti'. Ine' hafel nendondomba lehis ine'imi andeande'.”
Pita na'ipana ea' dei' etef nohafel.
Ea' epes hiesi wambel anama biefina Lida naloma Saron satolona samboma opalef safe'ma Dembinai.

Anona wambel Jopa ano'w nemata'w kwaila Jisasi kwape, agel akwa'unai Tabita. Diga esis Griki sofala'w sa'i Dorkas, agel anona mafin sa'i dia. La'ela'ef akwa'w kwanda' waf bu'unai ma kwagiambama esis amam nematawa kwahusi ma gwa'aimi maim.
Nemaf anama awes nanda'akw kwaga'. Ea' sasa'opa alop akwa'unai ma sowa'w. Ea' sofa'akw sambe'akw kwa'oh rum ilifanai.
Wambel Lida nape felefele' ma Jopa. Ea' esis alupusi Jisasi same' basefa Pita nape Lida, sasapa' amam biam mafe'ma anan mahali'ana na'ama ma'i, “Ine' nifi'mai afa'. Ni'i ota' ota' owa'.”

Ea' Pita nohafel nafe' nalomam, ea' mafe' mataga mofa'ana mafe' rum anama ilif akwa'w kwa'oma. Nematawa hiawai alifiwai wafi'i waitu felefele'ma Pita wape walopa'w. Ea' wihi'ambana klos sagwegw maim akwa'w Dorkas kwagundisami nimbewa' la'ela'ef ata' kwape kwalomawa.
Ea' Pita nagolo'ma esis amam nematawa sawisi ande', nindiwa nembawa notawa nanda' beten. Ea' namboma amaga ananinai nafe'ma alop nemata'wi na'i, “Tabita, ine' hafel.”
Ea' akwa'w naep mati kwati Pita kohafel kwape.
Ea' Pita nahapila lagel akwa'unai nafela'w kwaitu. Ea' nofalai esis amam nematawa sombale'efa Godi saloma nematawa awama alifiwai, naso' akwa'w kotanima kwafe'ma esis.
Basef amama mafe' anama hiagoma wambel Jopa ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi same'am sombale'efa Dembinai.
Pita nape wambel anama Jopa nimeguf hiami. Anan nape naloma anona aman nandondomba agwafuh bulmakaumi agel ananinai Saimon.
Anona aman nape Sisaria agilinama Kornilius, anan agilinai kepten numafi soldia 100-peleim. Soldia amama hiami sofalam sa'i soldia Italimi.
Anan aman nanda' lotu naloma epes hiesi ananisi sape ipat ananinai sanda' lotu ma God. Anan nase'as moni maina esis Juda kwahusi otamba maim a'asi. Ea' la'ela'ef nanda' betena God.
Anona nemaf wambomota aon nasa 3 klok, anan nati anom amamaga si'i na'oh nandondo'oh mape mataga alihim endilisi. Nati anona ensel Godi nafi'mai anan na'ipana na'i, “Kornilius.”
Ea' Kornilius natolona umbamahana endilisi na'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i main?”
Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “God name' beten ine'inai ea', okom na'i waf ine' nanda'anai nase'as moni maim nagiambama amam nematawa amamaga a'asi. Ea' God ata' okokomam.
Dei' ine' nesapa' anom amam mofo'o Jopa mogolopa anona aman agilinama Saimon agel wa'ana Pita. Mi'ipana nifi'i na'ae.
Aman anama nape ipat Saimoni, anan nandondomba agwafuh bulmakaumi. Ipat ananinai notawa felefele'ma naoh mafe' motambela.”
Ensel na'ipa Kornilius ea' nafe'. Ea' Kornilius nofalai amam biam ananimi manda'mana maoli maloma anona soldia. Soldia anama nanda' lotu ma God la'ela'ef nape nanda' maola Kornilius.
Ea' Kornilius na'ipa amam amama wanom andeande'ma basef amama hi'alam ea' nasapa'am mafe' wambel anama Jopa.
Ea' amam wanom mohafel mafe' ma'oh eaf. Lala mohafel mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jopa. Nogota anama aon nahagasom Pita nalata natoma ipat ande' ilifa nanda' beten.
Ea' nolomahana na'i nea' gwa'aimi ea' esis ata' sanda'am. Ea' anom amamaga matagamana si'i na'oh nandondo'oh.
Nati otaga ilif nandawisi' ea' anom amamaga si'i lowaf lu'unai endilisi misila'i ilif mowalai. Anom amamaga mahapila da'malifinama biefigin biefigin malana nisila'i.
Amamaga mala lowaf anama nomoni, mafis amamaga hiami, amiguf mamumami mape aolopi, maloma iguf mamumami hiami.
Ea' anona maf na'ipa Pita na'i, “Pita, ine' hafel neha mafis nea'am.”
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' owa' endilisi. Ae' ina a' anom mafis ape' Juda ma'i awami, owa'.”
Ea' maf anama na'ipana wapoti' na'i, “Amamaga God na'i bu'wami, amama ina ni'i awami, owa'.”
Amama matagamana wenif na'ama ea' mehip motanima malata otaga heven ilif wapoti'.
Ea' Pita okom natanea ma amamaga amama si'i na'oh dondo'oh, na'i, “Amama ae' atulumi ofagema main de'im?”
Anan okom natanea nape ea' amam amama Kornilius nasapa'am mafi'i mataga mahali'asa ipat Saimon napeinai. Ea' mowala mafi'i maitu uta.
Ea' mofalana ma'i, “Saimon agel wa'ana Pita anan nape na'ae?”
Pita ata' nape okom natanea nape ma amamaga amama ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Amam amama wanom ma'i mogolopa ine'.
Ine' hafel nisila' nefe' nelomom. Ine' owa' okom nope hiahiana, owa'. Ae' asapa'am mafi'i.”
Ea' Pita nisila'ma amam amama na'ipam na'i, “Aman anama ipe' pagolopanai ae' ea' ma'uwi. Ipe' pafi'mai main?”

Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Kornilius anan kepten dembinai numafi soldia 100-peleim hiami, nasapa'afa wafi'i. Anan aman nanda' waf bu'unai nanda' lotuma Godi. Esis Juda hiesi sa'i, ‘Anan aman bu'unai.’ Anona ensel Godi na'ipana ma nofalena nefe' ipat ananinai, ma ata' nome' anom basef ine'imi.”
Ea' Pita na'ipam mawis ipat nomon nao'wam numafiam mape owamb anama. Wafilu nohafel nafe' nalomam. Anom amam Kristen Jopaimi mafe' malomana.
Amam mohafel mafe' ma'oh owamb atotona eaf ea' mafe' mataga Sisaria. Ea' Kornilius nape nahafa amam. Anan nali' nofalai esis wambota ananinai saloma alupusi ananisi endilisi sondowa'anima sape.
Ea' Pita nafi'i na'i nuwisi ipat ea' Kornilius nafi'i natagamana nindiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai na'i nefela agel ananinai.
Ea' Pita nafelona na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel. Ae' wapoti' epen atowe si'i ine'.”
Ea' Pita naloma Kornilius ma'i ea' mawis ipat nomon nati amam nematawa hiesi sandatama etifigin sapan.

Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pegawa ea' mi'uli ape' Judai ma'i owa' ma ape' mefe' muwis ifagw o mope moloma enis epes owa' Judaisi, owa'. Ea' God nihi'ambe ma enis epes owa' Judaisi si'i ipe' na'ae na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina nendafa'ma enin epen ni'i enin nanda' waf aonai, owa'.’
Ea' ae' ina esambala basef amama God na'ipiami, owa'. Ea' ame' fala ipe'inai afi'i. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, ‘Ipe' pefale afi'i ma main?’ ”

Ea' Kornilius nagwamana na'i, “Amamaga natagama ae'i ma dei' nimeguf wenif mafe' ea', amama na'ama. Ae' ape anda' beten ipat ae'anai nogota aon nasa 3 klok. Nogota ea' na'ama etin si'i dei'. Anda' beten ape ea', ati anona aman naitu felefele'ma naep ae'ami, luwaguf maim ananimi mafifil endilisi.
Ea' nofale na'i, ‘Kornilius, God name' beten ine'inai ea', okom na'i amamaga hiami ine'imi nase'asam epes isima amamaga a'asi.

Ea' ine' nesapa' anom amam mofe' Jopa mofalai Saimon agel wa'ana Pita. Aman anama nape naloma anona aman Saimon ipat ananinai, nandondomba agwafuh bulmakaumi. Anan nape felefele'ma naoh mafe' motambela.’
Ea' dei' atef ae' asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ine' ea' dei' ine' nanda' waf bu'unai nafi'i. Dei' ape' hiapai mafi'i mape na'ae ma naep Godi ma meme' basef hiami Dembinai nasi'inami ma ni'ipapam.”
Ea' Pita na'iam na'i, “Endilisi, dei' ae' egawa okom Godi anan ina okom na'i wambota epes hiesi Judai etis, owa'.
Anan okom nainaila emi egafis sanda' lotuma anan sanda' waf bu'unai.

Ipe' pegawa basef amama God na'iam mafe'ma ape' epes hiesi Israeli. Anan nawalapa basef bu'wami Jisas Kraisi, Anan Dembinai ma amamaga hiami maloma epes hiesi nanda'apa mataga ukup etifim maloma God opalef mape awanem malomana.
Ipe' pegawa, fowa' Jon nawalapa basefa esis samboma opalefa waf aonai ma sefa' baptais. Nogota anama basef mafe' etap hiagoma Galili ea' mataga anama etap hiagoma Judia.

Basef amama, basef Jisas Nasaretinai. God nandandepana na'ama. Anan nase'ana Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai naloma pepel lu'unai Ananinai. Ea' nafe' wambel hiagoma ganigani nagiambama esis amam nematawa. Ea' dei' God nape nalomana nanda' epes hiesi saila pepel Satani ambo'wes wapoti'.
Ea' ae' afi'i aloma amam wanom afa' wawalapa basefa amamaga amama pepel anan nanda'anai gani Jerusalem naloma etap anama hiagoma ape' Juda mapoma. Ea' esis saundana lawag sahana naga' ma waf anama.
Nimeguf biam hi'alam ea' mafe'ma wanomi God nafelona nohafel wapoti' nawalapana alihina.
God ina nihi'ambasana Juda hiesi satolona, owa'. Nihi'amba afa' atofa fowa' God nandandepafa ma owalapa basef ananimi. Anan notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ea' wa' gwa'aimi walomana.
Anan na'ipafa basef la'ifimi ma wi'ipa esis amam nematawa owalapa basef alihim na'ama. God nandandepa aman anama ma nope aman nonda'masa basefa epes isima sape namisi soloma isima saga' ea'i.
Amam profet hiami ma'iama anan na'ama ma'i, ‘La'ifimi agel ananinai atona God nakwaha waf aonai esis amam nematawa emi egafis sembale'efanai.’ ”
Pita ata' na'i basef amama atom, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai ma amam nematawa hiesi same' basef Godi napais.
Amam amama Judaimi mombale'efi mafi'i malumai Pitai mohafel gegelalasom kwapete'am ma mati God nase'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai etin si'i presena esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
Amam Juda mame' esis sa'i diga naninani safela agel Godi ea' amam gegelalasom kwapete'am.
Ea' Pita na'i,
“Ina enin epen la'ifina nindaiwa'ma sipisi' amam nematawa isima embel, owa'. Esis sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ama etin si'i ape'.”
Ea' na'ipasa basef la'ifimi ma esis na'i, “Ipe' pefa' baptaisa agel Jisas Kraisi.”
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' ata' nepe nelomapa anom nimeguf wapoti'.”
Ea' amam aposel maloma esis sahin owan sombale'efanai sape anama Judia hiagomai same' basef amama ma enis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi wapoti' sefa' basef Godi sembale'efana.

Ea' Pita notanima nondowasa' Jerusalem, enis epes Juda sombale'efa basef Godi sape. Esis saila waf fowa'inai la'ifisa sa'i amam hiami mombale'efanai mila mi'uli esis Judai ma motopa' alop amamunai. Ea' sasambalana mehipa basef ananimi.
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nafe' nawis ifagw amam owa' Judaimi meatopa' alopi na' gwa'aimi nalomam.”
Ea' Pita na'ipasa basef ma amamaga amama hiami mataga. Nali' na'ipasa basef dambadamba mali'i nailam nafe' nafe' nambefam. Ea' na'i,

“Ae' ape taun Jopa anda' beten ape ea' okom ae'anai nandamboma ati anom amamaga si'i andondo'oh. Anom amamaga lu'wami misila'i ilif si'i lowaf launai endilisi. Amamaga mahapila lowaf anama da'malifinama biefigin biefigini mahapilana malana nisila'i heven ilif ea' nafi'mai ae'.

Ea' ae' a'i ata' egawa amama andeande', atologon nomon lowaf anama ati amamaga mamumami hiami mape nomona lowaf anama. Ati mafis hiamu mamumami maitu etapi mafis aolopumi maloma iguf amiguf amamaga mape aolopi.
Ea' ame' anona maf na'ipi na'i, ‘Pita, ine' hafel neha anom mafis nea'am.’
Ea' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' andaiwa' endilisi! Fowa' ae' ata' so'uso'win afi'i ataga dei' ae' ina agwa' anom amamaga awami, owa'.’
Ea' maf anama nafi'i ilif wapoti' bif na'i, ‘Amamaga God nanda'am mataga bu'wami, amama ina ni'i awami, owa'.’
Amamaga amama matagama ae' wenif ea' motanima malata heven ilif hi'alam.
Dei' atef amam amama wanom mafi'i mataga ipat anama afa' wapeinai. Anona aman nape Sisariai nasapa'am mafi'mai ae'.
Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina okom netanea, owa'. Ine' fo'o noloma amam.’ Amam sahope amama wanom wanom mafe' malome. Ea' afa' wafe' wawis ipat aman anama
na'ipafa ma nati ensel naitumana nomon gani ipat ananinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nesapa' anom amam mefe' Jopa mi'ipa Saimon agel wa'ana Pita ma nifi'mai ine'.
Ama ni'ipina anom basef ine' ma basef amama etoma God nigiambama ine' neloma esis wambota ine'inai soloma esis sanda' maol ine'imi ma nofa'epa petanimani.’
Ea' ae' afela basef a'iam, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nisila'mai esis, nafi'i na'ama etin si'i nali' nafi'mai ape' Juda dambadamba.
Ea' ae' okokoma basef amama Dembinai wapoti'. Amama ma'i, ‘Jon napisi'as embel ea' ina embel atom, owa'. Atuwasi pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nupaipa.’
Fowa' ape' mombale'efa Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' God nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai ape' si'i presen. Ea' dei' ae' emi egafuwi ma la'ifiwi i'ipa God niapani?”

Esis same' basef amama Pita na'ipasami ea' ukup mase'asa basef amama asasimi safela agel Godi sa'i, “Dei' ape' mogawa God namboma opalef esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi ma esis wapoti' safe'ma anan sope ambagof namumi.”

Fowa' amam maha Stiven naga'i manda' nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis Kristen amam nematawa mahas. Ea' esis sembale'efanai safa' safe' ganigani ea' sataga anona wambel Antiok safe' anona etap hiagoma biefigin Saiprus naloma Fonisia sawalapa basef Godi ma esis Juda etis.
Ea' anom amam Saiprusimi maloma anom Sairinimi mafe' Antiok mawalapa basef amama ma esis Grik wapoti'. Amam mawalapa basef bu'wami ma dembinai Jisas Krais.
Ea' pepel Dembinai atona nape naloma amam, amama atom dei' amam nematawa hiesi samboma opalef safi'mai Dembinai.
Ea' esis amam nematawa Kristen sape Jerusalemi same' basef amama ea' sasapa' Barnabas nafe' Antiok.
Anan nafe' nataga nati God nanda' esis bo'wesa waf bu'unai numafias nandanifamas. Nafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sope la'ifis sila Dembinai.
Barnabas anan aman bu'unai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina nembale'efa God andeande'. Ea' nagiambama esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sembale'efa Dembinai ea' sawisi epes hiesi Godi.
Ea' Barnabas nafe' Tarsus nagolopa Sol.

Natolona ea', nofa'ana nafi'i Antiok. Ea' amam biam mape afagel atotona maloma esis Kristen amam nematawa sape Antioki mawalipa epes hiesi ma basef Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa saila Jisasi, enis epes sofalas agel anama Kristen dambadamba wambel anama Antiok.
Nogota anama anom profet mape Jerusalemi makini' Antiok.
Anona profet esis sofalana sa'i Agabus, Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina ea' nawalipasa basefa nolomeahas lu'unai nambimb neataga etap wambel anama hiagoma.
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', aman anama Klodius nataga nape gavman dembinai esis Rom, nogota anama nolomahas nataga si'i fowa' Agabus na'iam.

Ea' esis amam nematawa saila Jisas Kraisi sa'i basef sandame'mama sefa' anom otamba mefe'ma esis alupusi sahin owan sape Judai ma sigiambas. Esis Kristen atona etin ukup ma'i otamba ma'omasi sawalom sase'asa tu'wanim hiami mafe'ma esis sape Judiai. Enis otamba hiami sase'asa hiami ea' enis otamba kwawie'im sase'asa kwawie'im. Hiesi sanda'am na'ama etin.
Esis sanda'am na'ama, sasapa' Barnabas naloma Sol mofa' otamba amama mafe'ma amam agufumi mumafi esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi.
Nogota anama dembinai king Herot naha enis amam nematawa Kristen sefa' nimanimi.
Ea' na'ipa anom soldia ananimi maha Jems, Jon sahalomana bainat mahana naga'.
Ea' anan nati esis Juda sandanifel ma amama ea' nanda' kalabusima Pita wapoti' nemaf anama esis Juda sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa' bret wafinai owa' neatifi.

Anan nombalo' Pita nanda'ana nanda' kalabus. Ea' nanda'ana nafe'ma soldia wambotagw biami biam mumafiana. Herot okom na'i ota' Pita nape wambota atotona soldia biami biami mumafiana ma esis Juda sope sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova ma hi'ilam, nefa'ai Pita nuwisi ande'ma naep amam nematawa hiesi sotolona ma nohana noga'.
Pita ata' napani kalabus amam soldia mape mumafiana. Ea' la'ela'ef esis Kristen sanda' beten la'ifisa God numafia Pita.

Wafilu Herot na'i nofa' Pita nefe' ma kot. Ea' nemaf anama owa' ata' notaga ulal owamb anama Pita na'oh la'afena anom soldia biam. Amam mowa' Pita sen biefina. Anom soldia maitu mumafi uta ipat anama sanda' kalabusanai.
Ea' mehip ensel Dembinai nataga naloma howalagon nawis ipat sanda' kalabusanai nomon. Ea' ensel naha lambeh Pitai ninimbalona na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel mehip.”
Ea' sen pele'atana etin lagof Pitai nowa na'oh etap.
Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “Ine' waho' let nugundisa lowaf la su bo'wagah ine'imi.”
Ea' Pita nanda'am si'i ensel na'ipana. Ea' ensel na'ipana wapoti' na'i, “La siot ine'inai nila ae' nifi'i.”
Ea' Pita nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusanai nomon nagi'ma ensel anama nafe'. Ea' anan ina nogawa amamaga amama ensel nanda'ami na'i endilisi, owa'. Pita na'i si'i na'oh nandondo'oh etin.

Amam biam mafe' makwaha amam plisman maitu mali'i mafe' mikila' anom wapoti' ea' mafe' mataga uta lu'unai sonda' ainambanai. Uta anama nafe' tauni. Ea' uta anama lu'unai nandawisi' etina amam biam. Ea' amam makwaha kalabus mawisi ande' mafe' anona eaf. Ea' mehip ensel nandambaho'ma Pita nafe' anagon.
Ea' okom Pitai nataga alihina nogawa na'i, “Dei' ae' egawa endilisi. Dembinai nasapa'i ensel ananinai nafi'i natagahowe ma lagel king Heroti ma awami amama hiami esis Juda ukup ma'i seanda'me emi.”
Anan negawa amama ea', nafe' ipat Mariai, Jon Mak mama'wana nati esis Kristen sandakolas etifigin sape ipat anama atona sape sanda' beten.
Ea' Pita nafe' naitu naha uta ande', ano'w nemata'w kwanda'masa maoli agili'wa Roda kwafi'i kwa'i kuwisi' uta.
Ea' kwame' maf Pitai kogawana, okom akwa'unai bo'ona kwandanifel ea' ina kwawisi' uta, owa'. Kwasagih kotanima kwafe' nomon kwa'ipas kwa'i, “Pita nani naitu uta ande'!”
Ea' esis sa'ipakw sa'i, “Ine' okom nahaga nagaolinai.”
Ea' akwa'w la'ifikw kwa'iam kwa'i, “Endilisi, anan naitu ande'.”
Ea' esis sa'i, “Anama ensel ananinai atona.”
Ea' Pita ata' naitu naha uta wapoti'. Ea' esis same'ana safe' sawisi' uta satolona, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'asa anan.

Ea' Pita nanda' lagel atona na'ipas na'i “Feso'mepa.” Ea' na'ipasa amamaga amama Dembinai nofa'ana nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusainai nao'wana nawisi ande'. Ea' na'i, “Ipe' kipago Jems nolomago sahin owan ama amamaga amama.”
Ea' nakwaha esis notanima nawisi ande' nafe' anagon.
Ea' lala kuhimbita, amam soldia matimana owa' mohafel gegelalasom kwapete'am ukup matamea ea' ma'i, “Pita nafe' eti?”
Ea' Herot wapoti' nafe' nagolopa Pita, owa'. Ina natolona nofa'anai, owa'. Ea' nandamboma nahali' amam soldia nanda' kotimama noham moga'.
Ea' Herot nakwaha etap hiagoma Judia nafe' nakini' napani wambel Sisaria.

Anan okom numbutinama esis amam nematawa sape wambel lu'unai biefina Tair naloma Saidon. Ea' enis epes Tair naloma Saidon sandakolas safi'mai anan. Ea' sali' sagolopa Blastus, nanda' maola dembinai kingi. Ea' sonandana basef salefa sonda' okom anama wandafunai noga'. Dei' main, epes sape wambel anama biefina sofa' gwa'aimi ma etap hiagoma kingi.
Anona nemaf Herot nandandepanai anan nandausa sosaf dembinai kingi ea' nape natoma balata kingi nanda' basef lu'wami ma esis.
Ea' esis seme'ana sa'i mehip sa'i, “Anama maf anona dembinai si'i god. Anan ina maf anona epeni, owa'!”
Ea' Herot ina ata' nafela agel Godi, owa'. Na'ama dei' atef ensel Dembinai nahana. Ea' asagof iguf so'uso'umi mahana mahahape' alop ananinai ea' afuna.
Ea' basef Dembinai mataga la'ifim mafe' wambel hiagoma ma epes hiesi sombale'efana.
Barnabas naloma Sol manda' maol God nase'amanai hi'alana Jerusalem ea' motanima mafe' Antiok mao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomam.

Esis amam nematawa Kristen sape Antioki anom amam mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi mape. Anom profet maloma anom tisa mawalipasa basef Godi isima sembale'efanai. Agof amamumi amama. Barnabas naloma Saimon agel wa'ana Niger, Lusius, anan wambel Sairininai maloma Sol maloma Manain anan alupunai Heroti gavman dembinai.
Esis Kristen sakwaha gwa'aimi sanda' lotuma God atona sape. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pendandepa Barnabas naloma Sola maol anama ae' efalam andandepam meanda'anai.”
Ea' esis sakwaka gwa'aimi sanda' beten, sawamona lagofa amam biam sasapa'am mafe'.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasapa' amam biam mafe' makini' anona wambel Selusia. Ea' malata anona sip mefa'am mafe' anona ailan Saiprus.
Ea' mataga Salamis, mawis nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ma'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi, Jon Mak wapoti' nape nalomam nagiambamam.

Amam mafe' mataga wambel hiagoma nape ailan anama Saiprusi, ea' mafe' mataga wambel Pafos nape di'inai. Ea' mati anona aman anan Judainai. Anan nanda' ambagof nanda' amamaga mamumami baso'maimi. Anan profet nambaso'ma esis hiesi, agilinama Barjisas.
Anan alupunai ma dembinai gavman agilinama Sergius Paulus. Sergius Paulus anan nomonas okom bu'unai napainai. Anan nofalai Barnabas naloma Sol mafi'i ma anan neme' basef Godi ma amam.
Ea' aman anama agel ananinai diga Griki sa'i Elimas, nanda' ambagofi nasambala basef amam biam ma'iami. Na'i nomboma okom gavman anama dembinai ma ina nambimb nembale'efa basef Godi.
Ea' aman anama Sol, sofalana Poli, anan pepel la'ifinai Ambal Bu'unai Godi napainai. Ea' anan natiti Elimas na'ipana na'i,

“Ine' awani nogaloma Satani! Ine' naumbih ma waf anama hianai bu'unai! Waf anama baso'mainai hianai aonai si'ina ma ine' endilisi! Ine' nimeguf hiami nambomefa basef endilisimi bu'wami Dembinai mataga baso'maimi. Dei' maina ine' nandaiwa'ma nekwaha waf aonai ine' nanda'anai?
Ea' dei' ine' neme'. Dei' Dembinai nehena lagel ananinai ea' atuwasi naep ine'imi mose'ena. Ea' ine' atuwasi niti aon alipunai, owa'. Ea' nepe na'ama etin anom nimeguf.”
Pol na'iam na'ama ma ea', mehip anom amamaga si'i elagw owamb nasopama naep Elimasi. Ea' naha ganigani nafe' nogolopa enis epesa sohapila lagof ananimi ma sihi'ambana eaf.
Ea' gavman anama dembinai nati amamaga amama gegelalasona endilisi ma basef Dembinai ea' dei' nembale'efa Jisas.
Pol naloma amam malomanai makwaha wambel Pafos ea' mefa' nefa'am mafe' anona wambel Perga nape anona etap hiagoma Pamfilia. Ea' aman anama Jon nakwaha amam notanima nafe' Jerusalem.

Ea' makwaha wambel anama Perga mafe' mataga anona wambel Antiok nape etap hiagoma Pisidia. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', nemaf anama Sabat esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai amam mafe' mawis ipat Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ea' matoma balata.

Ea' anona aman natalifa basefa mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai maloma basef amam profet ma'iami ea' amam agufumi Judai masapa' basef mafe'ma Pol naloma amam manda' maol etini ma'iam ma'i, “Alupipei, ipe' i'i anom basefa monda' ukup esis amam nematawai motaga la'ifim, ipe' awi kiam.”
Ea' Pol nohafel nafela lagel na'i basef na'i,
“Ipe' Israel hipei paloma ipe' enipa epes panda' lotuma Godi, ipe' peme' basef ae'ami.

God dembinai esis Israeli, anan nandandepa esis akusapa ape'isi ma nemaf anama esis safe' sailas sapani etap hiagoma Isip ea' anan nanda'as sataga epes hiesi wambota lounai. Anom nemeguf mafe'ma ea', pepel Ananinai atona nofa' esis sakwaha etap anama safi'i.
Ea' anama wafiguma fatauguma nofa' nimanimi ma waf esis sanda'anai ma afagof amama 40-peleim.
Ma etap hiagoma Kenan anan nahambombaga lain 7-peleina amam nematawa hiesi ea' nase'asa etap anama nafe'ma esis Israel,
ea' sahapila etap anama sape afagof amama 450-peleim.
Ea' anan nafela amam dambami esis Israeli ea' amam mumafi esis sape satagama nemaf aman anama profet Samuel nataga.

Nemaf anama esis sawa salef sa'i sofa' anona king dembinai, ea' God nase'asa anona aman Sol, Kis nogalomana. Aman anama nataga wambota Benjamini. Ea' anan nape king dembinai ma afagof hiami 40-peleim.

Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', God nali'amona king Sol, nanda' Devit nataga nape king asasinai. Anan na'ipasa aman anama Devit na'i, ‘Devit nogalomana Jesi, okom ae'anai nainailana. Anan nambimb nila okom ae'anai atona na'iami.’
Ea' God nanda'am na'ama si'i fowa' na'iam na'i nonda'am. Ama wambota Deviti owagama God nefela Jisas, aman anama nofa' ape' Israeli.
Fowa' Jisas ata' owa' nifi'i, nogota anama aman anama Jon nawalapa basef na'ipa esis Israel hiesi ma somboma opalef sokwaha waf aonai sefe'ma Goda sefa' baptais.

Ea' felefele'ma Jon na'i nonda' maol ananinai hi'ilana, anan na'i, ‘Ipe' ukup ma'i ae' ma'imama? Ae' ina aman anama dembinai ipe' pape pembale'efanai, owa'. Ipe' peme'! Aman anama owagama nila ae' niefi'i, anan bu'unai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina bu'uwei ma etagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.’

Ipe' sahin owan, ipe' epes hiesi pataga wambota Abrahami, enipa owa' Judaipei panda' lotuma Godi, peme'. Dei' basef amama God nasapa'am mafi'mai ape' hiapai. Basef amama ma anan nambimb nofa'apa mokwaha waf aonai motanimani.

Ea' esis sape Jerusalemi saloma amam agufumi asasimi, esis ina sogawa aman anama nofa'apa motanimani, owa'. Esis ina sogawa andeande' basef amama amam profet fowa' ma'iami, owa'. Anom agufumi matalifam Sabat nimeguf hiami sapoma noma'wanai. Ea' ina sogawam, owa'. Basef amama atom mataga endilisi nemaf anama esis sanda' kotima Jisas sa'i anan aman aonai ma sahana noga'.
Esis ina sati anom basef ofagema waf aonai ma sohana noga', owa'. Ea' sofalai gavman dembinai Pailat ma ni'i a'e ma mohana noga' etin.

Esis sanda'am hi'alam amamaga amama si'i fowa' amam profet ma'i basef manda'am mape buk Baibeli ma'iama anan. Nimeguf wanom mafe'ma ea', esis satagaha anan nisila'i lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' sawana anona hi'agif.
Ea' God nafelona wapoti'.
Esis isima hiesi sakwaha etap hiagoma Galili ea' salomana sondowasa' Jerusalemi, esis satolona nimeguf hiami. Dei' epes isima safe' sawalapa basefa ape' Israela anan.
Ea' ape' dei' ma'ipipa basef bu'wami ipe'. Amamaga amama fowa' God na'iama na'i nose'asas akusipa ape'isi,
ea' ma'um amama dei' God naso' ape' awasi ananipai ma nafela Jisas nape namunai. Nafela Jisas si'i basef mape buk Baibel Buk Song nafe'ma bifi ma'iam na'ama. God na'i,
‘Ine' nogalome ae'inai. Nemaf dei'inai ae' ataga ahalomena ine'iwei.’
Dei' God nafelona wapoti' hi'agif, ea' anan ina ata' notanima nofe' hi'agif wapoti' folo'olana, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin si'i God na'iam wapoti' na'i,
'Nambimb ae' igiambamepa i'ipipa basef amama endilisimi Ae'ami. Fowa' basef amama a'iam ea' ma a'i i'ipanam Deviti, amama i'ipipa ma Ae' pepe pe bu'unai.’
Ea' si'i anom basef mape Buk Sami ma anan wapoti' ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
‘Ina nambimb ni'i a'e ma aman anama nonda' maol ine'inai andeande' folo'olana, owa'.’
Ape' mogawa Devit nahapila maol naila okom Godi la'afena esis amam nematawa sape saloma anani. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', anan naga' nafe' naloma amam bafapana ananimi ea' folo'walana.
Ea' aman anama God notanima nafelona wapoti', anan ina folo'walana, owa'.
Amama atom dei' ae' a'i ipe' sahin owan pegawa basef ape'imi amama. Aman anama nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.

Mi'uli anama God naso' Mosesanai anama ina la'ifina ma nokwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ma pepe wafifipa andeande', owa'. Na'ama aman anama nakwaha waf hianai aonai ma ipe' emi egafipa pembale'efa anan, ma pepe wafifipa bo'wepa ma naep Godi.
Dei' ipe' pegawa waf ipe' panda'anai andeande' bo'ona o aona? Na'ama amamaga amama awami mifi'mai ipe' si'i amam profet fowa' ma'iami ma'i,

‘Ipe' panda' basef findiwaimi, ipe' petologon ukup matamea mefe' ea' awepa. Ae' anda' anona maol la'ifinai ma nimeguf ipe' ata' papeimi. I'i enin epen ni'ipipa maol anama, ipe' ina atuwasi pembale'efa maol anama, owa'.’ ”
Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ma'i muwis mofe' ea' esis amam nematawa sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Nemaf anama Sabat nigi'i ape' ma'i ipe' bipa pitanima pifi'i pi'ipapa basef amama wapoti'.”

Ea' esis sakwaha ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai sawisi ande' ea' esis Juda hiesi saloma enis epes hiesi sagi'mam. Esis isima saila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwanai. Ea' amam biam mase'asa basef esis hiesi ma sape la'ifis sembale'efa God nanda' waf bu'unai ma ape' nagiambamapa etin.
Nimeguf wanom wanom atotona mafe'ma ea' Sabat nemaf nagi'i, amam nematawa sape wambel anamai safi'i sandakolasa same' basef Godi. Amam nematawa isima felefele'ma hi'ilas wambel anama.
Na'ama esis Juda sati amam nematawa hiesi sandakolasi, ea' ukup kowalam endilisi. Ea' sa'i basef awami ma Pol sa'i anan nambaso'mas.

Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ina umbamaham, owa'. Amam la'ifim ma'ipasam alihim ma'i, “Endilisi, afa' ata' wi'ipipa basef Godi ipe' Juda pili'. Ea' ipe' pewa' alafugaha basef amama. Amama ipe' pa'iam pa'i, ‘Ape' mandaiwa'ma mofa' ambal namunai ma mope andeande' la'ela'ef.’
Ipe' pa'i na'ama dei' ipe' peme'. Afa' dei' okwaha ipe' ofe' ugi'ma epes owa' Judaisi wi'ipasa basef amama.
Dei' main, Dembinai na'ipafa mehipa anom basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i,
‘Ae' anda' ipe' si'i howalogon ma enis epes owa' Judaisi. Ama ipe' pigiambama esis amam nematawa sape wambel hiagomai ma etap anae'. Ama owagama efa'as sotanimani.’ ”

Ea' enis epes owa' Judaisi same' basef amama sandanifel endilisi. Esis sandanifela basef Dembinai safela agel Ananinai. Ea' amam nematawa isima God nosahe'asi ma sope namisi la'ela'ef, isima sombale'efa Jisas.
Ea' basef Dembinai mafe'agon hi'alagon anama hiagoma.
Na'ama esis Juda safela anowa nematawa agufuwai wanda' lotuma Godi waloma anom agufumi mape taun anama lu'wagoma saha Poli naloma Barnabas sanda'am kwapete'am. Ea' sagalo'mam wambel asasinai.
Ea' amam mandila'ma sopof mail bo'wagah amamumi ma mola ikwafa waf aonai napoma esis. Ea' mohafel mafe' Aikoniam.
Esis alupusi sombale'efa Jisasi sandanifel endilisi ea' pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'ina esis.

Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas mafe' mataga Aikoniam mafe' mawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai mawalapa basef si'i mali' manda'am. Amam mawalapa basef bu'wami ea' esis Juda hiesi saloma enis epes owa' Judaisi sombale'efa God.
Ea' enis epes Juda ina sombale'efa God, owa'. Esis safela ukupa enis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi ea' sanda' epes isima opalef aoma esis Kristen.

Amam biam mapani nogota launai Aikoniam ea' mawalapa basef Dembinai la'ifim alihim. Amam ina umbamaham, owa'. Ma'ipasa basefa Dembinai nandahomas endilisi nagiambamas. Ea' Dembinai nanda' amam biam mataga la'ifim manda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani hianai. Ea' dei' esis sogawa basef amama endilisimi atom.
Ea' esis amam nematawa taun anama sandawaloga biefis. Enis opalef atifim saloma esis Juda, ea' enis saloma amam aposel biam ukup etifim.
Esis epes ina Judaisi saloma esis sanda'ipama sa'i basef sandame'mam saloma amam agufumi asasimi ea' sa'i sonda' Pol naloma Barnabas aom. Sa'i sokwaha otamba soham afum.
Ea' amam biam mogawa amama mafa' mafe' etap hiagoma Likonia ma wambel biefina Listra naloma Derbe ea' anona wambel felefele'ma anama.
Amam manda' maol mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma esis sape wambel anama.
Anona aman nape wambel anama Listra, bo'wagah ananimi maga' mailana. Fowa' anan ata' nape opaf mama'wanai bo'wagah ananimi maga' mailana nape na'ama. Aman anama ina naitu nafe' kwaukwawie', owa'.
Ea' anan name' Pol na'i basef ea' Pol natolona titi nogawana na'i aman anama nembale'efa Goda notaga bo'ona wapoti'.
Ea' natolona titi na'i basef la'ifimi na'ama na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu.”
Ea' nohafel mehip naitu ea' nafe'.
Amam nematawa hiesi sati amama Pol nanda'ami ea' sa'i mehip diga Likoniai na'ama sa'i, “Amam god dambami ape'imi biam mataga si'i epes misila'a ape'!”
Barnabas sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Sus. Ea' Pol anan aman nanda' basef atomi. Ea' sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Hermes.

Ipat esis sanda' lotuma Susi notawa ande' taun anama. Ea' pris nondolalima Susi nofa' anom bulmakau suwafumi maloma enis afis sowalo'ami ea' nafi'i uta anama tauni. Anan nalumai esis amam nematawa sa'i sondolali sonda' ofa ma amam biam.
Amam aposel Barnabas naloma Pol mame' esis sa'i basef na'ama, amam mawala luwaguf maim amam malami. Ea' masagih mafe' mawala esis amam nematawa la'afena esis ma'ipas mehip ma'i,

“Ipe' epes, dei' maina panda'am na'ama? Afa' wandaiwa'. Afa' biafa ina God dembifai, owa'. Afa' epes atofa etin si'i ipe' wawalipipa basef bu'wami. Wawalipipa ma ipe' pekwaha god anama falafunai baso'maimi ma pefe' pembale'efa God ambal namunai nape la'ela'efi. Anan nanda' otaga ilif naloma etap maloma epes hiesi saloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma amamaga hiami mape.
Endilisi fowa' nimeguf hiami nape nati amam nematawa hiesi saila waf asasinai.

Ea' anan ina nape nandambahi'i, owa'. Anan nihi'ambapa waf ananinai ma nanda' waf bu'unai ma ape'. Anan napani heven nanda' asaf nalai ma ipe' ea' nanda' amamaga gwa'aimi bu'wami mataga dende' nimeguf amamumi. Ea' nowapoti'mipa gwa'aimi ipe', nanda' opalef ipe'imi mandanifel.”
Amam ma'ipasa basef amama, manda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma'ipas ina sandolalimam sanda' ofamam, owa'.
Anom Juda mape Antiok naloma Aikoniam mafi'i Listra mafela ukup asasimi amam nematawa. Ea' dei' esis sakwaha otamba saha Pol sa'i endilisi anan afuna ea' sahonde'ana nawisi na'oh ande' taun anama.
Ea' esis sombale'efa Godi safi'i saitu salipana, nohafel wapoti' ea' nafe' nawis taun anama. Wafilu nafe' naloma Barnabas mafe' Derbe.

Pol naloma Barnabas mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi taun anama ea' mafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiesi sataga alupusi Jisasi. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', motanima mafe' wambel anama Listra naloma Aikoniam naloma Antiok.

Ea' manda' esis Kristen sataga la'ifis. Amam ma'ipasa basef la'ifimi na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' pepe la'ifipa pembale'efa dembinai God. Ape' meme' mofa' nimanimi mamumami lu'wami ma muwis nomon wambota Godi numafiapa.”
Ea' mandandepa agufumi mumafi esis Kristeni mandanda' ma sios amama hiami. Amam makwaha gwa'aimi manda' betena manda' esis sope la'ifisa lagel Dembinai anama sembale'efana.
Ea' amam mafe' la'afena anona etap hiagoma Pisidia, mafe' mataga anona etap hiagoma wa'ol Pamfilia.
Amam mawalapa basefa epes sape Pergai ea' makini' Atalia.

Anama Atalia malata sip ea' nefa'am mafe' Antiok. Wambel anama fowa' esis Kristen sandandepam mapoma lagel Godi ma nandahomam manda' maol anama dei' manda'anai hi'alana. Ea' dei' motanima mafi'i wambel anama.

Amam mataga Antiok mofala esis mowa'anias sandakolas etifigin ma'ipasa basefa maol Dembinai nape nalomam nagiambamam manda'anai. Ea' ma'i, “God nanda' eaf nagala esis amam nematawa hiesi enis owa' Judaisi ma sombale'efa Krais.”
Ea' mapani anom nimeguf hiami maloma esis sembale'efa Krais sailana.

Anom amam mape Judiai makini' mataga Antiok ma'ipama basef esis Kristen sahin owan sape anama. Ma'ipasa basef ma'i, “I'i ipe' amam owa' pila mi'uli God fowa' gani na'ipa Mosesanai ma owa' petopa' alop ipe'inai, anona nemaf God ina nofa'epa pitanimani, owa'.”

Amam ma'iam na'ama, manda' ukup Poli Barnabasi wandafum endilisi ma'i basef la'ifimi mandahihianamam maloma amam Judaimi. Ea' esis Kristen sandandepa Pol naloma Barnabas maloma anom amam mombale'efa Kraisi wapoti' mondowasa' Jerusalem ma'i basef amama monandonam maloma amam aposel maloma agufumi siosi.

Esis Kristen sasapa'am mafe' ea' mafe' la'afena etap hiagoma Fonisia naloma Samaria. Ma'ipasa basef esis Kristen sape etap anama biefina ma sogawa God namboma ukupa enis epes owa' Judaisi. Esis Kristen same' basef amama manda' esis sandanifel endilisi.

Amam mafe' mataga Jerusalem, amam aposel maloma esis amam nematawa Kristen saloma agufumi asasimi sohafel sandalalamam sanda'mam gude amam. Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas mohafel ma'ipasa basefa maol hianai God nagiambamama manda'anai.
Ea' anom Farisi mombale'efa Kraisi mohafel ma'ipa esis ma'i, “Ipe' petopa'mama alop amamunai, pi'ipama mila wafa mi'uli God fowa' gani na'ipa Mosesanai.”
Ea' amam aposel maloma agufumi mumafi maol Godi mandakolas etifigin mape monandona basef amama.

Amam ma'i basef hiami ma ea', Pita nohafel naitu na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan, ipe' pegawa fowa' God nawaloga maola afa', ea' Anan nasahe'e ae' ea' ewalapa basef bu'wami ananimi ma enis epes owa' Judaisi seme'am sembale'efa God.
God nogawa opalef esis amam nematawa hiesi ea' nihi'ambafa okom Ananinai wila ma esis. Anan nihi'ambapa na'ama ea' nase'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai esis si'i fowa' nali' nase'apana ape'.
Anan ina nanda' anona wafa ape' ea' nonda' anona waf esis, owa'. Esis sembale'efa God amama atom opalef asasimi mataga bo'om si'i afa'.

Dei' maina ipe' pa'i pegwamba God? Ipe' ina pese'asa amamaga amama nimanimi esis Kristen sofa'am, owa'. Fowa' amam bafalomapa maloma ape' wapoti', ina la'ifipama mofa' nimanimi amama ma matopa' alop ape'inai, owa'.
Ape' mogawa eaf anama Dembinai Jisas nagiambamapa etin, dei' God nofa'apa matanimani ea' ananipai, ape' maloma esis wapoti'.”

Pita na'iam na'ama ea' esis sandatama etifigin ina sa'i anom basef, owa'. Ea' sape same' basef Barnabas naloma Pol ma'ipasami. Amam biam mawalapa basef hiami ma God nanda'am la'ifim manda' amamaga pepel hianai ma naep esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi.
Amam ma'ipasa ea', Jems na'iam na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan, ipe' peme' basef ae'ami.
Simeon na'ipapa ma dambadamba God nihi'ambapa nali' nati esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi uwahipis nofa'ai enis sotanimani sope ananisi.
Ea' basef fowa' gani God na'ipa amam profet mape buk Baibeli na'ama etin si'i amama. Basef amama ma'iam ma'i,
‘Anona nemaf ae' etanima iefi'i, ipat anama Deviti natuwi, anama efelona notawa wapoti'. Amamaga ipat anamai aom, amama anona nemaf enda'am motaga dambaim wapoti' ea' efelona natawa.
Ae' enda'am na'ama ma esis soloma enis epes sololama Godi wapoti' sogolopa Dembinai, isima hiesi efalasi ea' ae'asi.
Fowa' gani endilisi Ae' Dembiwai awalapa basef amama.’
Dei' okom ae'anai nape na'ama. Epes hiesi owa' Judaisi samboma opalef safe'ma God ea'i, ape' ina mose'asa nimanimi esis, owa'.

Ape' monda' anom basef mofe'ma esis mi'ipas mi'i ina sea' gwa'aimi maim sondolalimama god baso'amunai, owa'. Amama alogw awami ma'ami. Esis sihi'amago waf aonai anama so'a waulanai ea' ina sea' mafis saham sowa' bagafowa afumi, owa'. Ina sea' esimbela anom mafis amama moloma anom mafis wapoti', owa'. Ae' a'i ape' monda'masa basef amama atom mofe'ma esis.

Dei' main, ape' mogawa fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ma amam mawalapa basef God fowa' naso' Mosesami ofagema amama atom mawalipasam taun anama hianai. Matalifam ifagw hiami ape' Juda ma'i basef mapeimi nimeguf hiami sapoma noma'wami.”

Ea' amam aposel maloma agufumi mumafi maol Godi maloma esis Kristen hiesi sa'i basef etifim sandandepa anom amam biam asasimi mefe' Antiok maloma Pol naloma Barnabas. Amam amama agufumi Judas agel wa'ana Barsabas naloma Sailas. Amam biam agof lu'wami la'afena esis Kristen. Ea' sa'i sosapa'am mofe' Antiok moloma Pol noloma Barnabas.

Esis sase'ama anom basef mail pepa ma lagof amam biam Judas naloma Sailas ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Afa' aposel agufufai sahopepa afa'ipei, afa' dei' wanda'ago basef amama mafe'mago ipe' sahin owan owa' Judaipei. Ipe' pape wambel Antioki ma etap hiagoma Siria naloma Silisia, afa' wa'i nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'.

Afa' wame'am enis epes afa'isi safo'o sanda'epa pehafel gegelalasipa kwapete'epa ma basef asasimi, sanda'epa umbamahepa ukup matamea. Esis sanda'am na'ama sa'i somboma ukup ipe'imi. Ea' afa' ine' wa'ipas safo'o sanda'epa na'ama, owa'.
Afa' wame' basef amama ea' wa'ipasa ukup mape atogon wa'i basef wandame'mam. Ea' wandandepa amam amama biam ma osapa'am mefe'mago ipe' malomago biam ape' ukup mailam endilisi, Barnabas naloma Pol.
Amam biam ina umbamahama enis epes soham moga' mefela agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi monda' maol ananinai, owa'.
Afa' dei' wasapa'ago Judas naloma Sailas ama nambimb mi'ipipa basef amama atom afa' wa'iam wanda'am mail pepa mafe'mago ipe'.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape nalomafa wa'i basef wandame'mam na'ama. Afa' ina ose'epa anom nimanimi pefa'am, owa'. Waf anama atona ipe' penda'ana.

Ipe' ina pea' mafis saham sondolali ma god baso'amunai, owa'. Ipe' ina pea' esimbela anom mafis, owa'. Ipe' ina pea' mafis sowa' bagafowa ma afumi, owa'. Ea' pihi'ama waf anama so'a waulanai aonai. I'i ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma pihi'ama waf anama, andeande' ipe' penda' waf bu'unai pepe andeande'.”
Ea' esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi sasapa'am mafi'i Antiok, makolasai esis Kristen etifigin mase'asa pas amama.
Ea' esis satolom sandanifel ama basef amama bu'wami manda'as sataga la'ifisa bale'ef.
Judas naloma Sailas amam profet. Dei' ma'ipasa basef hiami bu'wami esis Kristen, manda'as sataga la'ifis mafela ukup asasimi.
Amam ata' mapani anom nimeguf Antiok, esis Kristen sanda'mam nemaf bu'unai ma amam mape opalef awanem. Ea' sasapa'am mutanima mafe'ma esis sasapa'am mafi'i.
Ea' Sailas na'i nopani Antiok.
Ea' Barnabas naloma Pol ata' mapani Antiok maloma anom amam hiami wapoti' mawalapa basef bu'wami Dembinai mawalipasam.
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Pol na'ipa Barnabas na'i, “Afa' biafa otanima ofe' uti esis Kristen sahin owan taun anama hiagoma fowa' wafe' wawalapa basef Dembinaima. Ofe' ogawas, sape andeande' o owa.”

Ea' Barnabas na'i no'wa Jon agel wa'ana Mak nofe' nolomam. Ea' Pol nandaiwa'ma anan nofe' nolomam. Dei' main, aman anama fowa' nakwaha amam gani Pamfilia notanima nafe'. Ina nalomam etin mafe' mambefa maolan, owa'.
Amam biam manda' migimigaha amama ea' dei' ina ata' manda' maol etifigin, owa'. Ea' Barnabas nao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomana malata anona sip mafe' anona ailan Saiprus.
Ea' Pol nao'wa Sailas nalomana mafe'. Ea' esis Kristen hiesi sasapa'am sa'i, “Okom lu'unai Dembinai nope nolomepa nigiambamepa numafipa.”
Ea' Pol nafe' la'afena etap anama hiagoma Siria naloma Silisia naloma Sailas mafe' manda' esis Kristen sataga la'ifis.

Pol naloma Sailas mafe' mataga Derbe ea' makwaha Derbe mafe' Listra. Wambel anama anona aman alupunai nembale'efa Jisasi nape, agilinama Timoti. Anan mama'wana ano'w nemata'w Judai'wi, akwa'w wapoti' kombale'efa Jisasi. Ea' ahalomana anona epen Grikinai.
Esis Kristen sahin owan Listra naloma Aikoniam sa'i waf Timoti nanda'anai bu'unai.

Pol na'i Timoti nefe' nolomana. Amama atom dei' nao'wana natopa'mana alop. Pol okokoma esis Juda sape na'amai na'i, “I'i Timoti owa' neatopa' alop, esis ina nambimb sila basef ananimi, owa'.” Na'ama dei' naila waf esis Judai natopa'mana alop. Dei' main, esis hiesi sogawa Timoti ahalomana anan Grikinai.

Nimeguf hiami amam maitu mafe' wambel hiagoma ma'ipasa basef esis. Basef amama fowa' amam aposel maloma agufumi ma'iam mandame'mam Jerusalemi, amama dei' ma'ipasam esis Kristen ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipe' pila basef amama.”
Ea' dei' esis Kristen sombale'efa Jisasi sataga la'ifis endilisi ea' wambota esis Kristeni sataga sandanda nimeguf hiami sataga hias endilisi.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasopama amam mawalapa basefa esis sape etap hiagoma Esiai. Ea' mafe' la'afena etap hiagoma biefina Frigia naloma Galesia.

Ea' mape anona etap hiagoma Misia, mafe' mataga felefele' ma anona etap hiagoma nafe' notanimaima Bitinia ma'i muwis etap anama ma mawalapa basef Godi etap anama hiagoma. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Jisasi na'ipapa na'i owa'.
Ea' amam mawis etap hiagoma mafe' Misia misila'agon makini' mafe' Troas.
Owamb anama Pol nati anom amamaga si'i na'oh nandondo'oh nati anona aman Masedoniainai naitu nofalai Pol na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ine' newala nimbuwi naoh ea' nifi'i Masedonia nigiambamapa.”
Ea' Pol nati amama, afa' mehip wandoga eaf wafe' etap hiagoma Masedonia. Afa' ogawa God nofalafa ma owalapa basef bu'wami ananimi ma esis.
Ea' walata sip wambel anama Troas ea' wafe' usi'ifa Samotres. Wefilu wafe' Neapolis.
Ea' wakwaha wambel anama wafe' Filipai, anama fowa' esis Rom safi'i sapoma. Wambel anama lu'unai ma etap hiagoma Masedonia. Ea' wape anama anom nimeguf.

Wape anama, nemaf anama sabat nataga wafe' wawis endalelemb uta ande' ma wambel anama wafe' anona walemb. Afa' wa'i wambel anama esis Juda sanda' beten sapoma. Wape anama, wati anowa nematawa ondowa'anima wape etifigin ea' afa' wafe' wape walomawa wa'i.

Ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Lidia kwanda' lotuma God kwape kwalomawa. Dembinai namboma okom akwa'inai kwame' basef amama Pol na'ipakwami. Akwa'w Taiatairai'wi, kwanda' maol kwanda' bisnisa luwaguf akwahimi.
Ea' kofa' baptais kwaloma esis sape ipat atona wapoti'. Akwa'w kofa' baptais, kwa'ipafa basef kwa'i, “I'i ipe' ukup mi'i ae' embale'efa Dembinai endilisi, ipe' fi'i pepe peloma ae' ipat ae'anai.”
Ea' akwa'w la'ifikw kwao'wafa wafe' waila basef akwa'umi.

Anona nemaf afa' wafe' anama esis sanda' beten sapoma, wati ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i kwatolofa eaf. Akwa'w agel a'akw kwape owina anom amam kwanda' maolana amam. Nemata'w akwama anona ambal aonai napai'w ea' nawalapa basefa amamaga nambimb meatagai. Akwa'w kwahali' ambal anama ma basef mamumami ea' nagwama'wa basef. Ea' dei' amam amama dambami akwa'umi mofa' otamba hiami ma akwa'w kwanda'am na'ama.
Nemata'w akwama kwagi'ma Pol kwaloma afa', kofalafa timbi tambel kwa'i, “Amam manda' maola God nape ilif endilisi ma'ipapa basefa eaf God nofa'apa mutanimani.”

La'ela'ef nemata'w akwama kwanda'am na'ama etin nimeguf hiami. Ea' Pol okom aona endilisi ma akwa'w, nandamboma na'ipa ambal anama napai'wi na'i, “Ae' a'ipina agel Jisas Kraisi, kwaho'w nemata'w akwama ea' fo'o!”
Ea' dei' atef ambal anama nakwaha akwa'w ea' nafe'.
Ea' nogota anama amam mumafia'wi mogawa ofagema ma eaf anama mofa' otambanai owa'. Ea' dei' mombalo' Pol naloma Sailas mahonde'am mafe'ma sandowa'anima ma mi'ipa amam agufumi mumafi koti mapoma.
Ea' ma'ipam ma'i, “Amam amama biam Judaimi, amam mafela ukup awami esis amam nematawai ma wambel ape'ima.
Ea' mawalapa basefa anona waf ape' epes Romipai mandaiwa'manai. Mi'uli ape'inai nandaiwa'ma ape' mila waf anama amamunai, owa'.”
Ea' esis amam nematawa wapoti' sambaso'ma amam biam. Ea' amam dambami mumafi koti mowaliam siogw amamumi ma mopagahom.
Ea' amam mapagahom mehip timbi tambel ea' manda'am manda' kalabus. Ma'ipa aman naitu numafi utai mehipa nope numafiam andeande'.
Ea' anan name' basef la'ifimi na'ama, nanda'am mapani rum anama nape la'afen atogon ipat anama sanda' kalabus sapeinai. Ea' nowa' bo'wagah amamumi sen, mail anona endap lu'unai.
Owamb la'afina amanota Pol naloma Sailas manda' beten manda' awalef mafela agel Godi ea' enis epes sanda' kalabusi same' manda'am.
Ea' mehip suwambon lu'unai nakoto' olalef mombalo' ipat anama sanda' kalabus sapeinai. Ea' utagw mandawisi', sen nowa' esis hiesi sanda' kalabusi nandatagah.
Ea' anan numafi esis sanda' kalabusi nohafel nati utagw ipat sanda' kalabus sapeinai mandawisi', na'i sanda' kalabusi sawisi safa' safe'. Ea' nagiai bainat ananinai na'i noha anan noga'.
Ea' Pol na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ai, ine' owa' nehambombaga ine'! Afa' hiafai wape na'ae!”

Ea' anan numafi kalabusi mehip nofalasa nogwapin sofa'ana safi'i ea' nasagih nafi'i nawisi nomon Pol naloma Sailas mapoma. Anan umbamahana endilisi ilaus mana nape nindiwa nembawa notawa opalefima amam biam.
Ea' nofa' amam biam mawis ande' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' dembipei, ae' enda' maina nambimb God nofa'e itanimani?”
Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nembale'efa Dembinai Jisas, ama nambimb God nofa'ena netanimani. Ea' neloma wambota ine'inai wapoti' na'ama etin.”
Amam ma'ipana basef Godi naloma epes isima sape ipat ananinai.
Ea' dei' atef owamb anama atona anan nofa' amam nasa'opamam esimbela melegw amamumi sahama. Ea' mehip anan naloma wambota awasi waulu'mana ananisi sofa' baptais.
Ea' nofa'am mafe' ipat ananinai nase'ama gwa'aimi. Ea' anan naloma esis hiesi sape ipat ananinai sandanifel endilisi ma sombale'efa God.
Ea' lala, amam dambami manda'masa koti masapa' plisman amamumi mafi'i ma'i, “Ipe' kwaha amam amama biam mofo'o.”

Ea' anan numafi kalabusi nofa' basef amama nafe'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Amam dambami manda'masa koti masapa' basef mafi'mai ipe' apefe'. Na'ama dei' ipe' pekwaha kalabus pefe' ea' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”

Ea' Pol na'ipa amam plisman na'i, “Afa' biafa Romufai, amam ina manda' kotimafa andeande'ma miti anona waf aonai ma afa' biafa, owa'. Amam mahafa etina naep esis amam nematawai. Ea motofa afa' ofe'? Owa'! Amam ata' mifi'i mo'wafa uwis ande'.”
Ea' amam plisman mofa' basef amama mafe'ma amam amama dambami manda'masa koti, mame' basef ma'i amam biam Romumi ea' umbamaham.
Ea' mafe'ma amam biam maolai amam mawisi ande' ma'i basef bu'wami malomam. Ea' ma'ipama mokwaha wambel anama mefe' anagon.
Ea' makwaha ipat sanda' kalabus sapeinai mawisi mafe' ipat Lidiai mati esis Kristen ma'ipasa basef manda'as sataga la'ifis ea' mafe'.

Amam biam mafe' mataga anona wambel Amfipolis ea' makwahagon mafe' mataga Apolonia. Ea' makwaha wambel anama wapoti' ea' mafe' mataga Tesalonaika. Anona ipat lu'unai esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai notawa wambel anama.

Ea' Pol nanda'am na'ama etin si'i la'ela'ef nanda'am ea' nafe' nawis ipat anama nalomas. Amam biam mape wikifah wanom ama nimeguf amama wanom sapoma noma'wanai sabat, ea' Pol na'i basef Godi mail buk Baibelia nalomas.
Anan nawalapa basef ofagema Godi na'ipasam na'i, “Krais God nasapa'ana nafi'i anan nofa' nimanimi lu'wami ma naga' notanima nohafel wapoti'.”
Ea' anan na'i, “Jisas anama dei' ae' awalapa basefanai, anan Krais.”

Ea' enis amam nematawa Judaisi sombale'efa Krais ea' saila Pol naloma Sailas sawis wambota Godi. Enis Grik sanda' lotuma Godi hiesi saloma anowa nematawa dembiwai hiawai esis wapoti' sawis wambota Godi saila amam biam.

Ea' esis Juda kowalas opalef aoma esis hiesi sombale'efa basef Pol naloma Sailas ma'ipasami. Na'ama esis sofa' anom amam awami manda' waf aonai. La'ela'ef amam mape anama esis sandakolas etifigin sapoma. Ea' sa'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sape wambel anama safela ukup asasimi ma sopa'. Ea' safitap endilisi sa'i basef lupa'aimi safe' sawisi uta sawis ipat Jesoni ma suwis sogolopa Pol naloma Sailas. Sa'i sofa'am muwisi ande'ma sose'am amam nematawa hiesi.

Ea' esis ina sati amam biam, owa'. Ea' sahonde'ai Jeson ipat anama naloma anom Kristen mafe'ma amam agufumi wambel anama. Esis sa'ipa agufumi amama mehip sa'i, “Amam amama biam manda' waf aonai nataga etap hiagoma ea' dei' mafi'i mape na'ae.
Ea' Jeson nao'wam mape ipat ananinai. Amam mosambala lo dembinai gavman Romunai, ma'i anona king dembinai nape agel ananinai Jisas.”
Esis amam nematawa hiesi saloma agufumi wambelimi same' basef amama, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i mehip.
Ea' dei' agufumi manda' Jeson naloma anom Kristen amama mali' matala kot motagaha amam mafe' wafifim.
Owamb nataga amam Kristen masapa' Pol naloma Sailas mafe' anona wambel Beria. Amam mafe' mataga Beria, mafe' mawis ipat lu'unai esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai.

Epes sape Beriai ukup mohafel endilisi same' basef sanda' waf bu'unai sikila' esis sape Tesalonaikai. Dei' main, esis Beria sofa' basef sandanifelamam endilisi. Ea' la'ela'ef satalifa basef mail buk Baibeli ma sogawa basef Pol na'ipasami endilisimi o owa'.
Ea' dei' amam nematawa Juda hiesi sombale'efa Krais. Ea' anowa nematawa hiawai agof lu'wami waloma anom Grik hiami wapoti' sembale'efana.
Ea' anona nemaf esis Juda sape Tesalonaikai same' basef ma'i Pol nawalapa basef Godi Beria. Ea' safe' safela ukup esis amam nematawa sape Beriai aom.
Na'ama dei' atef amam Kristen masapa' Pol nakini' nafe' naoh akata. Ea' Sailas naloma Timoti atom mape Beria.
Ea' amam mofa' Pol mafe' eaf maitumana mafe' mahaponana Atens. Amam motanima mafe' ea', Pol nasapa' basef mafe'ma Sailas naloma Timoti na'i, “Ipe' bipa pifi'mai ae' mehip.”
Pol nape nahafa amam biam Atens ea' nati wambel anama nati god baso'amunai hianai endilisi. Ea' okom nandaiwa' endilisi ma esis sanda' lotuma anama.

Ea' nimeguf hiami anan nafe' ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai na'i basef hiami naloma esis Juda saloma enis isima sanda' lotuma Godi. Nalomas sa'i basef sandahihianamam nahagofa ukup asasimi. Ea' nimeguf hiami nafe' anama esis sandatama etifigin sapoma na'i basef hiami nalomas sa'i sandahihianamam saloma enis safi'i sapani.
Anom amam tisa mogawa gawaimi anom Epikurian maloma anom Stoik ma'i basef mandahihianamam maloma Pol ma'i, “Aman anama okom nahaga nagaoli na'i basef mamumami, anan na'i ni'i main?”
Pol nawalapa basef bu'wami Jisasi na'ipasa Jisas nohafel hi'agif.
Ea' anom amam ma'i, “Anan na'i nowalapa basefa anom god dambami anona wambili?”
Ea' amam magawa gawai mefa' Pol mafe' maloma anom gawaimi mandatama etifigin anona domota agel Areopagus. Amam ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ogawa basef amama dambaimi ine' nawalapama esis amam nematawai.
Afa' wagahembe'ma basef ine'imi ma ogawam. Owa', anom basef. Ea' dei' afa' wa'i ogawa basef amama ofagema.”
Esis Atens hiesi saloma epes anona wambelisi safi'i sape Atensi, ina safi'i sanda' anona maol, owa'. Esis sape nimeguf hiami sape sa'i basef atom dambaimi ma seme' anom basef dambaimi.
Ea' Pol naitu la'afena amam gawaimi mandatama etifigin halaf Areopagusi na'ipasam na'i, “Ipe' epes Atensipei, ae' ati ipe' la'ifipa endilisi ma amamaga hiami panda' lotumami.

Do'ok ae' afo'o ati amamaga amama ipe' panda' lotumami ea' ati anona otam ipe' panda' ofa panda' lotumanai wapoti', esis sanda' anom basef mail otam anama ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘god anama ape' owa' mogawa agilinamae.’ Ipe' panda' lotuma anama ipe' owa' pegawa agilinama, dei' ae' awalapa basef alihim a'ipipana.
God nanda' etap naloma ape' epes maloma amamaga mape etap anae', anan Dembinai ma ilif etapi. Anan ina nape nomona ifagw lotumi epes sanda'am lagufi, owa'.
Anan atona nase'asa ambal namunai naloma hiami epes hiesi. Ea' Anan ina anom amamaga a'ana ma epes sigiambamana sose'ana anom amamaga, owa'.

Aman atona anan God nanda' epes amam nematawa hiesi sataga etap anae'. Ea' nanda'as sape etap hiagoma. Anan atona nanda' nimeguf ma'uma'um mandahama esis sape eti. Ea' nandandepa etap nafe' neatambela naloma wambel asasima.
God nanda'am na'ama ma esis sogolopa anona sombale'efana. I'i esis sogolopana sefe' sombale'efana o owa'? Anan ina nape laogona ape' hiapai atona etin, owa'. Nape felefele'ma ape' hiapai.
Si'i anona aman ipe'inai na'i basef na'i, ‘Ape' mofa' ambal namunai ma anan ea' nase'apa pepel, dei' maitu mafe'.’ Si'i anom amam gawaimi ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Ape' wapoti' awasi ananipai.’ ”

Ea' Pol na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ape' mape awasi Godi. Na'ama ape' ina ukup mi'i anan si'i ambal atona epes sanda' otamba gol siliwa sanda'anai, owa'. Anama ina ukup epesi atom ma'i sanda'ana gawa asasinai, owa'.

Fowa' gani epes owa' seagawanai, God ina na'i basef mamumami ma amamaga hiami esis sanda'am nogota anama, owa'. Ea' dei' anan na'ipas na'i mehip epes hiesi ma wambel etap hiagoma na'i, ‘Ipe' pemboma opalef pila Ae'.’

Anan nandandepa anona nemaf ea' ma nonda' basefa kot, nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai. Basefa kot ananinai mofe' bo'om andeande'. Anan nandandepa anona aman ea' ma nohapila kot anama. Aman anama naga' ea' God nafelona wapoti' hi'agif. Amama atom dei' epes hiesi sape etap hiagomai sogawa basef amama endilisimi atoma anan anona nemaf nonda'mas kot anama.”
Esis same' basef amama ma epes sohafel wapoti' hi'agif ea' enis sa'i basef sanda' iafana. Ea' enis sa'i, “Wila, ape' ma'i nambimb mome' basef ine'imi wapoti' ma amamaga amama.”
Ea' Pol nakwaha amam mogawa gawai mandatama etifigin mapeinai ea' nafe'.

Ea' enis epes kwaie'wis sombale'efa Jisas saila Pol safe'. Epes isima Dionisius, anan nagawa gawai ma amam mandatama etifigin Areopagus naloma ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Damaris saloma enis epes wapoti'.
Ea' Pol nakwaha Atens nafe' anona wambel Korin.

Ea' nati anona aman Judainai agilinama Akwila. Mamasana solana nataga Pontus. Nimbewa' nakwaha etap hiagoma Itali nafi'i naloma waulu'mana Prisila. Dei' main, Klodius nape dembinai gavman Romunai na'ipa esis Juda mehipa sokwaha Rom sotanima sefe'. Ea' Pol nafe' na'i niti esis bias.
Ea' nape nanda' maol naloma esis. Dei' main, anan nanda' maol anama atona naloma esis sofa' otamba maima sagundisa sel sanda'am sala' ifagwami.
Nimeguf hiami esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai, Pol nafe' ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ea' na'i nofela ukup asasimi ma sombale'efa Jisas, esis Juda saloma esis Grik wapoti'.

Sailas naloma Timoti makwaha etap hiagoma Masedonia mafi'i Pol napoma, nogota anama Pol nakwaha maol anama nagundisa sel ea' la'ela'ef nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi nimeguf hiami. Nawalapa basef la'ifimi esis Juda na'ama na'i, “Jisas anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.”

Ea' esis Juda sosambala basef ananimi sanda' anan findiwana. Ea' nanda'masa anona ikwaf nihi'ambasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Nandilama sopof usas mail luwaguf ananimi ma'oma esis na'ipasa basef la'ifimi na'i, “I'i ipe' hegililipa, ofagema ipe'imi atom. Ae' basef a'e ma amama. Dei' ae' efe'ma iwalipa amam nematawa isima owa' Judaisi.”

Ea' Pol nakwaha ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nawisi ande' nafe' anona ipat notawa felefele'ma ipat anama ea' nape la'ela'ef. Ipat anama anona amani, agel ananinai Titius Jastus. Aman anama nogawa God nanda' lotumanai.
Anona aman agilinai numafi lotu esis Judai Krispus. Anan naloma esis wambota ananisi hiesi sombale'efa Dembinai. Ea' esis Korin hiesi same' basef Pol nawalipasami sombale'efa Jisas sofa' baptais.
Anona owamb Pol nati anom amamaga si'i na'oh nandondo'oh, Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina umbamahena nesopama malogel, owa'. Newalapa basef ni'iam.
Dei' main, ae' ape alomena. Amam nematawa hiesi sape taun wambel anama esis ae'asi. Na'ama ina enin epen nehafel nehambombagena, owa'.”
Ea' Pol nape wambel anama Korin nogota launai afagel si'inai tu'waninai ea' na'ipasa basef Godi nawalipasam.
Anona nemaf anona aman agilinama Galio nataga nape gavman dembinai ma etap hiagoma esis Grik sapoma. Nogota anama esis Juda sa'i basef sandame'mam sombalo' Pol sofa'ana safe'ma kot sambaso'mana sa'i,
“Aman anama nafela ukup esis amam nematawai ma sosambala basefa mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ape'inai sanda' lotuma Goda anona waf.”
Pol na'i nogwa basef, Galio na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “I'i aman anama nowala lo nonda' anona waf aonai ma pa'i penda'mana basef, ae' eme' basef ipe'imi.
Ea' owa'. Ipe' pafi'i pahali'ima enda' kota basef maloma anom agofa mi'uli ipe'inai atona. Ea' hapaimi, ipe' etipa penandondombam. Ae' andaiwa'ma eme' kota amamaga na'amaimi, owa'.”
Ea' anan natofa esis sakwaha kot safe'.
Ea' esis sombalo' Sostenes agilinai numafi lotu esis Judai, sahana felefele'ma anama esis wambelisi sanda' kota. Ea' Galio ina okom napoma amamaga amama, owa'. Nape natolom etin.

Pol ata' nape nimeguf hiami wambel anama Korin naloma esis Kristen. Ea' nanda'masa nemaf bu'unai esis nakwahis nalata sip. Sip nakwaha wambel anama na'i nefe' etap hiagoma Siria. Akwila naloma Prisila safe' salomana. Nemaf anama Pol owa' ata' nolata sip, anan natopa' auf balaga wambel anama Senkria. Dei' main, anan na'i basef la'ifimi naloma Goda na'i nonda' anom amamaga.

Esis safe' sataga Efesus, Pol nakwaha esis Prisila kwaloma Akwila wambel anama. Ea' anan atona nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai naloma esis Juda sa'i basef nawalipasa basef Godi ma nefela ukup asasimi sombale'efa Jisas.
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nepe nogota laona nelomapa.”
Ea' na'i, “Ae' nambimb wila.”
Ea' na'i nemaf bu'unai ma esis na'i, “I'i God ni'i aho'me, anona nemaf itanimai ifi'i itilipa.”
Ea' nakwaha Efesus nafe' sip.
Sip nafe' nail Sisaria, Pol nisila' nafe' Jerusalem nanda'mas nemaf bu'unai naloma esis Kristen hiesi. Ea' nafe' Antiok.

Pol napani nogota launai kwaukwawie' Antiok ea' notanima nafe' wapoti' anona wambel hiagoma ganigani ma etap hiagoma Galesia naloma Frigia fowa' nali' nafe'ma. Ea' nanda' maol nanda' esis Kristen hiesi sataga la'ifis ma sombale'efa Krais.
Anona Judainai aman Aleksandriainai nafi'i nape Efesus. Agel ananinai Apolos. Anan na'i basef bu'wami atom, nogawa buk Baibel andeande'.
Fowa' enis sawalipana ma eaf Dembinai ea' dei' la'ifina endilisi ma na'ipas andeande' amamaga Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' anan nogawa basefa baptais Joni atom.

Ea' nafe' ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nawalipasa basef. Anan ina umbamahana ma esis amam nematawa, owa'. Prisila kwaloma Akwila same' anan sao'wana safe' ipat asasinai sihi'ambana anom basef wapoti' ma eaf Godi ma nogawa basef ofagema.

Ea' Apolos na'i nefe' esis Krik sapoma ea' esis Kristen sape Efesusi sanda' okom ananinai nataga la'ifina ma nanda'as na'ama. Esis sanda' anom basef mafe'ma esis Kristen Grikisi sa'ipasa sofa'ana. Apolos nafe' nataga Grik sapoma, nati enis amam nematawa sombale'efa Jisasi. Fowa' God nati uwahipis nagiambamas sembale'efana. Dei' Apolos nanda' maol nagiambama Kristen isima andeande' nanda'as sataga la'ifis ma sombale'efa Krais.

Anan la'ifina endilisi ma nagwa basef esis Judai ma naep esis amam nematawai. Anan la'ifina nalomas nandahihianama natalogofas nikila'as. Ama nihi'ambamasa basef alihima buk Baibela Jisas Anan Krais God nasapa'ana nafi'i.
Apolos nape Korin, nogota anama Pol nafe' wambel anama nape nomona halafutagw ea' nafe' nataga Efesus nati enis Kristen.
Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Fowa' ipe' pembale'efa Jisas pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi?”
Ea' esis sa'i, “Ata' owa'. Ape' ina mame' basefa anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi Holi Spirit nape, owa'.”
Ea' Pol na'ipas na'i, “Dei' ipe' pefa' baptaisa main?”
Ea' sa'i, “Ape' mofa' baptais Joni.”

Ea' Pol na'i, “Fowa' Jon napisi'as embeli na'iam na'i, ‘Ipe' pemboma opalef pewa' alafugaha waf aonai pefe'ma God pefa' baptais. Ea' pembale'efa aman anama Dembinai nambimb nigi'ma ae' nifi'i. Aman anama anan Jisas.’ ”
Esis same' basef amama, sembale'efa Dembinai Jisas sofa' baptaisa agel Ananinai.
Ea' Pol nawamona lagofa esis, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai esis nafelas sa'i diga naninani sawalapa basef si'i amam profet ma'iami.
Esis seamba epes isima sataga felefele'ma 12-peleis.

Ea' Pol nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi. Anan nanda'am na'ama etin nape aomb wanemb. Ina umbamahana, owa'. Anan la'ifina na'ipas. Anan naloma esis sape sa'i basef etin, na'ipasa nefela ukup asasimi ma sogawa siowis nomon wambota Godi numafias la'ela'ef.

Ea' enis sasopama opalef la'ifis endilisi, ina sombale'efa Jisas, owa'. Esis sa'i basef awami ma eaf Dembinai ma naep esis amam nematawai. Ea' dei' Pol nakwaha esis hiesi nao'wa esis Kristen etis safe' salomana. Ea' Pol nawalapa basef nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef ipat anama Tiranusi, anama sawalipasa basefa.
Ea' nanda'am na'ama etin nape afagof biam. Esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma Esiai wambel hiagoma same' basef Dembinai, esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
God nagiambama Pol nanda' pepel la'ifinai hianai si'i God nanda'anai.
Esis sati amama, sofa' hankisip luwaguf maima sanogam alop Poli, sofa'as safe'ma esis awes nanda'asi. Esis sanda'am na'ama, awes hianai hi'alana ea' ambagof awami makwaha esis mafe'.

Ea' anom Juda mafe' ganigani manda' bisnisa maol anama matofa ambagof awami. Mati maol Pol nanda'anai ma'i motofa ambagof awami ma waf anama. Ma'iam na'ama atona etin ma'i, “Agel Jisas anama Pol nawalapa basefanai, afa' wa'ipipa mehip endilisi ma pekwaha epes isima piwisi ande'.”
Ea' anona aman Judainai pris dembinai agel ananinai Skeva. Nogamana ananimi 7-peleim manda' waf anama ma'i motofa ambagof awami ma agel Jisasi.
Ea' aman anama ambal aonai napainai nagwa basefa amam na'ama na'i, “Ae' egawa Jisas naloma Pol. Ea' ipe' emi egafipa? Ae' ina egawepa.”
Ea' aman anama ambal aonai napainai fete'ana nalatawa amam ea' naham nanda'am aom kwapete'am nahambombaga alop amamunai nahape' luwaguf maim amamumi makwaha ipat anama mafa' mafe' alop wafifina.
Ea' epes hiesi sape Efesusi, Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisi wapoti' same' basef amama ea' umbamahas kwapete'as. Ea' safela agel Dembinai Jisasi lu'una.
Amam nematawa hiesi sembale'efanai safi'i sawalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai sa'iana.

Ea' isima hiesi sanda' naoh awami mamumami satamai buk amama hiami sanda' mu'uhup ma'akw naoh mailanai saofana nifa naep esis amam nematawai. Esis seamba otamba ma'um ma satala buk amama mataga 50,000 kina.
Sanda' waf anama, ea' basef Dembinai mataga la'ifim mawalapai pepel Ananinai nataga lu'una endilisi mafe'agon hi'alagon.
Amama mafe' ea', okom Poli nohafel la'ifina na'i nefe' etap hiagoma Masedonia esis Grik sapoma ea' nefe' Jerusalem. Anan na'iam na'i, “Ae' efe' anama ea' efe' iti Rom wapoti'.”
Ea' nasapa' amam biam magiambamanai Timoti naloma Erastus mafe' etap hiagoma Masedonia. Ea' Pol ata' nape etap hiagoma Esia anom nimeguf wapoti'.
Nogota anama enis epes sanda' naumbih saloma eaf bu'unai Dembinai sanda' aga lu'unai sindininifama sa'i mehip.

Anona aman agilinama Demitrius, aman anama nanda' amamaga hiami ma anona kapa siliwa. Anan ofagonama nanda' bisnis nanda' ifagw so'uso'umi endilisi manda' kapa siliwa manda'ami. Ea' mandati si'i ipat lu'unai sanda' lotuma god nemata'w akwama Artemis. Ea' nase'ama maol amam manda' maol siliwai mofa' otamba lu'wami.
Ea' natagama amam amama maloma anom amam manda' maol atifina si'i amam manda'anai na'i, “Ipe' pegawa ape' mofa' otamba lu'wami maol anama atona.

Ea' aman anama Pol na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi saila anona waf namboma ukup asasimi, amama ipe' patolom pegawam! Anan ina nanda'am na'ae Efesus atogon, owa'. Anan nanda'am mafe'agon hi'alagon felefele'ma etap hiagoma Esia anama hiagoma. Anan na'i, ‘Amam god ape' manda' lagof manda'ami, amama ina god endilisimi, owa'.’

Basef amama Poli nambimb mohambombaga maola bisnis ape'imi. Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Basef amama ananimi mohambombaga ipat lu'unai god ape'ikwi nemata'w dembe'wi Artemis. Ea' kotaga falafu'wi ma naep esis amam nematawai ma ukup asasimi. Dei' esis sape etap hiagoma Esiai hiesi saloma epes hiesi sape etap hiagomai wapoti' sanda' lotuma god ape'ikwi nemata'w akwama ato'w. Ea' basef Poli ma'i mohambombaga agel lu'unai akwa'unai.”
Amam manda' maoli mame' basef amama, ukup amamumi wandafum endilisi moga ma'i mehip ma'i, “Artemis ape' Efesusi akwa'w ato'w Dembe'wi agel lu'unai.”
Ea' epes hiesi sape taun anama sanda'am sa'i mehip endilisi. Ea' sohafel safe' anama sondowa'anima sa'i basefa. Sahondo' Gaius naloma Aristarkus Masedoniaimi mafi'i maloma Poli mafe' maloma esis.
Pol na'i nefe' ni'ipa esis amam nematawa la'afisa, ea' esis Kristen sili'akwana.
Anom amam mape gavman dambami ma etap hiagoma Esiai amam alupumi Poli masapa' basef mafe'ma anan. Ea' ma'ipana mehipa ina nefe' nuwis anama sandatama sape sanifa basefa, owa'.
Amam nematawa isima epes hiesi ukup asasimi ea' mololas endilisi. Enis soga sa'i mehip sa'i anom basef, enis sa'i anom basef. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi ina sogawa esis safi'i sandakolasa main.
Esis Juda sasapa' Aleksander nafe' la'afena esis saitu sa'i basefa. Ama sa'i anan ni'ipasa anom basef. Ea' Aleksander nafela lagel na'i nogwamasa basef esis amam nematawa.
Ea' satolona sogawa anan Judainai. Na'ama dei' hiesi sandame'mam na'ama etin sakolasa malogof atom sa'i, “Artemis ape' Efesusi akwa'w ato'w dembe'wi agel lu'unai.”
Esis sa'i mehip na'ama etin sape la'ela'ef nogota launai awa biefina.

Ea' kaunsel agilinai esis Efesusi na'ipasa basef la'ifimi esis amam nematawa na'i, “Ipe' epes Efesusipei, esis hiesi sape wambel hiagoma sogawa Efesus taun ape'inai numafi ipat lu'unai sanda' lotuma god dembe'wi Artemisi, taun anama numafi otam nowai heven ilifi.
Ina anona aman nasambala basef amama, owa'. Ipe' feso'mepa pepan. Ipe' ina penda' anom amamaga mehip, owa'.
Ipe' pefa'ai amam amama biam mafi'i na'ae. Ea' amam ina makowalopa anom amamaga ma ipat lu'unai ape' manda' lotuwanai, owa'. Amam ina ma'i basef findiwami ma god nemata'w ape'ikwi, owa'.
I'i Demitrius noloma amam manda' maola anani mi'i monda' basefa epen emi, anona nemaf monda'ama kot. Amam jas mape. Amam Demitriusami mi'ipam.
I'i ipe' penda' anom basef wapoti', penandonam anama sandatama sa'i basefa nogota anama dambami gavman mape meme' basef.

Amam dambami gavman Rom nambimb monda'mapa basef o owa'? Ape' ina mogawa. Dei' maina ape' mafela wandaf manda'ana dei' nemaf anae'? Ofagema owa'etin endilisi ma amamaga amama. I'i amam dambami Rom mihali'apa ma amamaga ofagema ma mandakolas anama, ape' ina anom basefa mogwam, owa'.”
Kaunsel agilinai na'iam ea', nasapa' esis amam nematawa safe'.
Esis sa'i basef awanami, Pol nofalai esis Kristen safi'mai anan, na'ipasa anom basef nanda' opalef asasimi mataga la'ifim. Ea' nanda'masa nemaf bu'unai esis nakwahis nafe' etap hiagoma Masedonia.
Anan nafe' anama hiagoma nawalipasa basef hiami esis Kristen nanda' opalef asasimi mataga la'ifim. Ea' nafe' nataga etap hiagoma esis Grik sapoma.

Anan nape aomb wanom etap anama. Na'i nofa' sip nefe etap hiagoma Siria ea' nogawa esis Juda sa'i basef sandame'mama sohana noga'. Ea' nanindifa okom ananinai na'i notanima nefe' nuwis etap hiagoma Masedonia la'afen.

Sopater Beriainai, Pirus nogalomana nafe' nalomana. Ea' amam biam Tesalonaikaimi Aristarkus naloma Sekundus naloma Gaius Derbeinai. Naloma Timoti maloma amam biam Esiaimi Tikikus naloma Trofimus, amam amama mafe' maloma Pol.
Amam mali'afa mafe' mape mohafafa Troas.

Nimeguf amama esis Juda sagwa' gwa'aimi saloma bret owa' niatifi, yis a'anai. Nimeguf amama mafe'ma hi'alam, afa' walata anona sip wakwaha Filipai ea' wafe'. Wafe', nimeguf wanom biam mafe' hi'alam watagama amam mali' mafi'i Troas mape wik si'ina.
Nemaf Sarere owamb afa' wandakolas waloma esis Kristen ma' gwa'aimi atogon ea' mofa' komunion gwa'aimi Jisasi. Naman Pol na'i nefe'. Na'ama nawalipasa basef nafe' nafe' akita amanota.
Rum anama lamifah hiami motaol anama ape' mandatama etifigin mapoma ilif.

Ea' anona aman so'unai agilinama Yutikus natoma windoa. Pol ata' na'i basef mafe' etin, Yutikus ambeh mahana naep ma'i mose'ana na'oh ea' na'oh nelola endilisi. Rum anama wenifina nape ilifi la'afen, anan nowai gani ilif laogoma nafe' etap. Ea' esis sisila' safe' sofa'anai ea' sati afuna endilisi.
Ea' Pol nisila' nasisil nowa natoma aman anama so'unai nahapila lagel ananinai na'iam na'i, “Ipe' ina pehafel gegelalasipa ukup aom, owa'. Ambal ata' napaina.”
Ea' Pol nao'was sotanima salata ipat ilif wapoti', nawala bret sa'ana. Ea' Pol na'i basef laumi wapoti' nalomas nafe' nataga lala. Ea' Pol nakwahis nafe'.
Aman anama so'unai nape namunai ambal napaina ea' sofa'ana safe' sambe'ana ipat ananinai, opalef asasimi ambo'om wapoti'.
Afa' wali' wafe' walata sip ea' wafe' wataga Asos. Afa' wa'i ogolopa Pol Asos ofa'ana ofe' sip. Dei' main, do'ok Pol nali' na'ipafa basef na'i nili' nefe' etap notaga Asos.
Ea' Pol nafi'i natolofa wambel anama Asos ea' ofa'ana wafe' sip wafe' Mitilini.
Ea' sip nofa'afa wakwaha Mitilini wa'oh ama lala wataga felefele'ma anona ailan Kios. Ea' wa'oh lala wafe' wataga anona ailan Samos. Ea' wa'oh lala wafe' wataga Miletus.
Pol nanindifa okom ananinai la'ifina na'i amam mikila' Efesus. Anan nandaiwa'ma nope etin anom nimeguf etap hiagoma Esia, owa'. Na'i nefe' ulal Jerusalem nemaf anama sa'i Pentikos.
Afa' wataga Miletus, Pol nasapa' basef mafe' Efesus nofala amam agufumi esis Kristeni mufi'mai anan.
Ea' mafi'i matagamana na'ipam na'i,
“Ipe' pegawa ma waf ae' ali' anda'ana nemaf nali'i dambadamba anama ae' ataga etap hiagoma Esia la'ela'ef ape alomepa.

Ipe' pegawa nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef esis Juda sa'i basef sa'i sogolope sehe ega'. Amama atom ae' efa' nimanimi magwamba ae'. Owa'. Ae' anda' agel ae'anai nafe' owin endilisi, efa' nimanimi ea' embif maluwi naep ma anda' maol Dembinai.
Ea' ae' ina umbamahe ma awalapa basef hiami ma agiambamepa, owa'. Anama ipe' pandakolas awalipipa ea' awalipipa ifagw ipe'imi nomon wapoti'. Amama ipe' pegawam.
Ae' a'i basef la'ifimi ma esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti' ma sowa' alafugaha waf aonai somboma opalef sefe'ma God, sombale'efa dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
Ea' ipe' peme', dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'anai aila anan atona. Amama atom dei' ae' efe' Jerusalem. Nambimb maim motagame ganima, ae' ina egawa amamaga amama, owa'.
Ae' egawa amama atom. Anama ae' afe'ma, wambel hiagoma Ambal Godi nihi'ambe basef la'ifimi na'ama na'i, ‘Ine' nambimb niti esis sese'ena nimanimi ea' sonda'ena nenda' kalabus.’

Ea' ae' ina okom napoma ambal ae'anai atona nope, owa'. Ea' ina la'ifiwi ma ihapila ambal ae'anai la'ifina, owa'. Ae' a'i ila eaf anama ilana efe' embefana. Ae' a'i enda'ana hi'ilana andeande' maol anama Dembinai Jisas nasi'ianai. Maol anama ewalapa basef bu'wami Godi nagiambamapa na'a nofa'apa motanimani.
