Ea' ipe' peme'. Fowa' ae' afe' la'afena ipe' hipei awalapa basefa epes hiesi siowis nomona wambota Godi numafias. Ea' dei' egawa, namanani ipe' hipei ina piti amaga ae'anai wapoti', owa'.
Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa. I'i enin epen ipe'ini awen higililan, amama ina ofagema ae'ami, owa'. Ofagema ipe'imi atom.
Dei' main, ae' ina umbamahe ma a'ipipa basefa okom hianai Godi, owa'. A'ipipam hi'alam.

Ipe' pimafi ipe' andeande' ea' pimafi esis amam nematawa isima Ambal Bu'unai Godi nandandepepa ea' ma pimafiasi. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma pimafi esis Kristen sios Godi andeande' si'i sanda' maoli sumafi sipsip andeande'. God natala esis Kristen ea' ma esimbel ananimi atom.
Ae' egawa atuwasi ikwahipa efe', nambimb anom amam awami si'i nombagw wandafumi mufi'i motaga la'afena ipe' ea' mohambombaga esis Kristen si'i nombagw maha sipsip.
Ea' enis epes ipe'isi etis sohafel si'i basef baso'maimi atoma somboma ukup esis Kristeni sefe' silas.

Ipe' dei' pindumafuma andeande' la'ela'ef. Ipe' ukup mopoma amama afagof amama wanom la'ela'ef owamb alip ae' ina apoma noma'w ma awalipipa afela ukup ipe' hipei atona etin, owa'. Awalipipa aloma embif maluwi naep ae'ami.

Dei' anda'epa ukup mopoma God noloma basef ananimi. Basef amama ma'ipipa Anan okom nainailipa ma nagiambamepa etin. Amama la'ifima monda'epa petaga la'ifipa mose'epa amamaga bu'wami atom God nase'asam amam nematawa anan nanda'as bo'wes ea' Ananisi etis.
Ae' ina kowalema otamba siliwa gol luwaguf maim enin epeni, owa'.
Ipe' etipa pegawa ae' atowe anda' maol agiambama ae' aloma amam mape malumai ma anom amamaga a'afa.

Maol hianai ae'anai, ae' ahi'ambepa ma ape' monda' maol la'ifipa migiambama isima emi egafis owa' la'ifisa sigiambama esesi. Ea' ape' ukup mopoma basef amama Dembinai Jisas na'iami. Anan na'i na'ama na'i, ‘Danifel enin epen nese'as amamaga anasi nikila' danifel epen inima nefa'ami. God nofalo'ma epen inima nikila' inima nefa'asi.’ ”
Pol nanda' basef amama ma ea', nindiwa nembawa nanda' beten naloma agufumi amama.
Amam hiami malef kwapete'am mandalulupatanima ea' mombalo' Pol masisi'amana dalogw.
Doko' Pol nali' na'i basef na'i, “Atuwasi ipe' ina piti amaga ae'anai wapoti', owa'.”
Amam mame' basef ananimi hiami hi'alam. Ea' basef amama tu'wanim atom manda' opalef amamumi nimanim endilisi. Ea' maitumana nafe' nalata sip.

Afa' wakwaha agufumi wafe' walata sip nakwaha Miletus ea' nafe'. Afa' usi'ifa wafe' naoh wataga Kos. Ama wafilu wafe' wataga Rodes. Ea' wakwaha Rodes wafe' wataga Patara wakwaha sip anama ukila'i wape.
Ea' wati anona sip na'i nefe' Fonisia ea' walata anama nakwaha anama ea' nafe'.
Ea' wati ailan anama Saiprus wikila'agon nape da'isinaima. Afa' wafe' wataga etap hiagoma Siria ea' wafe' wataga wail Tair. Esis sa'i sowafa hiahaom ma sip anama wambel anama.
Ea' afa' wafe' wagolopa enis Kristen watilis ea' wape walomas wik si'ina. Ea' Ambal Godi nafela ukup esis Kristeni ma sa'ipa Pola ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'.
Nogota afa'inai hi'alana wambel anama, wa'i a' ofe'. Amam Kristen maloma awasi nematawa amamisi saitumafa wafe' wawis ande'ma taun anama. Ea' ape' mindiwa nembawa manda' beten naoh akata.
Ea' esis sa'i basef sandanifel salomafa ma mondaso'ama lagof etin ea' sotanima safe' ifagw asasimi, afa' wafe' sip.
Afa' wafe' sip wakwaha Tair wafe' wataga Tolemes. Ea' wape wanda'masa nemaf bu'unai esis Kristen wape walomas nemaf atotona.

Ama wafilu wakwaha Tolemes wafe' wataga Sisaria wakwaha sip ea' wafe' ipat anona aman Filip nawalipasa basef Godi wape walomana. Anan anona ma amam amama 7-peleimi fowa' mandandepam Jerusalemi ma magiambama amam aposel.
Anan nola nematawa biawai biawa, ina dei' waso' amam, ata' owa'. God nase'awa gawa wawalapa basef ananimi si'i profet.
Afa' wape Sisaria anom nimeguf wapoti' ea' anona profet agilinama Agabus nakwaha etap hiagoma Judia nakini'i Sisaria.

Anan nafi'mai afa' nofa' let Poli nowa' bo'wagah maloma lagof ananimi atom. Ea' na'iam na'ama na'i, “Spirit Ambal Godi na'i na'ama na'i, ‘Amam Juda mape Jerusalemi nambimb mowa' aman anama ofagenama let anama. Ea' mose'ana nefe'ma lagof anom amam mololama Godi.’ ”
Afa' wame' basef amama ea' waloma esis wambel anamaisi wapoti' wa'ipa Pol mehip wa'i anan ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'.

Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' palef endilisi ma panda' okom ae'anai aona? Ae' ina andandombama enda' kalabus etin, owa'. Ae' andandombama eaga' wapoti' Jerusalema efela agel Dembinai Jisasi.”
Ea' afa' ina la'ififama osambala okom ananinai, owa'. Ea' afa' ukup mase'afa ma basef amama wa'i, “Okom Dembinai notaga.”
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', afa' wandondomba amamaga afa'imi ma ofe' Jerusalem.
Ea' enis alupusi saila Jisasi Sisariaisi safe' salomafa. Esis saitumafa wafe' ipat Nasoni, anan Saiprusinai nataga Kristen fowa'inai. Anan na'i afa' atuwasi ope ipat ananinai.
Ea' wafe' wataga Jerusalem, esis Kristen sandanifela sofa'afa.
Ama wafilu nemaf gi'maifi Pol nafe' nalomafa ma niti Jems. Ea' amam agufumi hiami ma esis Kristeni mape malomana.
Pol nanda'mam nemaf bu'unai ea' na'ipama amamaga hiami ma God nagiambamana nanda'am la'afena esis amam nematawa epes hiesi sololama Godi.

Amam mame'am ea', mafela agel Godi lu'una. Ea' ma'ipa Pol ma'i, “Sahalomafa, ine' negawa esis Juda tausen hiesi endilisi sombale'efa Jisas sataga Kristen. Ea' Kristen isima hiesi la'ifis endilisi ma saila mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai.

Ea' enis epes sambaso'mas sa'ipasa ine' na'ama sa'i, ‘Pol na'ipa esis Juda safe' sape salomas anona wambel enis epes hiesi owa' Judaisi. Na'ipasa esis sokwaha mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai.’ Anan na'i, ‘Ipe' ina petopa' alopa amam so'umi ipe'imi ea' ipe' ina ata' pilana wapoti' waf fowa'inai, hapainai.’ Enis epes some' basef ine' na'iami dei' sa'iam na'ama.
Ape' mogawa endilisi atuwasi esis Kristen Judaisi some' basefa ine' nafi'i nataga. Na'ama dei' afa' ata' onda'am wi'imama?
Ea' afa' wa'i wi'ipina anona wafa ine' nenda'ana na'ama. Afa' anom amam biamibiam ma'i basef endilisimi maloma Goda monda' anom amamaga.

Ea' ine' ne'wa amam pila waf anama nenda'epa petaga bo'wepa ma naep Godi. Ine' netal otamba amamumi wapoti' amam migi'ma waf esis Judai ma mando balagah amamumi. Ine' nenda'am na'ama, epes hiesi sogawa basef amama esis sanda'menam ine'i, amama baso'maimi atom. Ea' sogawa ine' naila mi'uli anama.

Ea' esis Kristen owa' Judaisi, ape' manda' basef mafe'masi ma'ipasa basef amama fowa' mowa'ami. Esis sindumafuma sope andeande' na'ama. Esis ina sea' mafis saham saso' god baso'amunai ea' ina sea' esimbel ea' ina sea' mafis amama sowa' bagafowa ma afumi ea' ina sonda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, owa'.”

Ea' Pol nao'wa amam amama ma wafilu naila waf hianai ma nonda' anan nataga bo'ona ma naep Godi noloma amam. Anan nanda'am na'ama nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi na'ipa amam pris. Na'ipama nemaf anama atuwasi anan no'wa amam amama mifi'i ma amam pris monda' ofa mondolali ma amam atona etina motaga bo'oma naep Godi.
Nimeguf amama 7-peleim felefele'ma hi'ilam, anom Juda mape etap hiagoma Esiai mati Pol nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ea' mafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiesi ma mombale'ana.

Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'ama sa'i, “Ipe' epes Israelipei, pigiambamapa aman anama na'ipa epes hiesi wambel hiagoma nasambala epes hiesi Israela mi'uli anama Godi fowa' gani Moses nawalipasanai naloma ipat lu'unai Godi wapoti'. Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Anan nao'wai enis epes owa' Judaisi safi'i sawisi nomon ipat anama sanda'ana aona.”
Dei' main, fowa' amam mati anona aman Trofimus Efesusinai owa' Judainai nape naloma Pol taun anama. Ea' amam ukup ma'i Pol nao'wana mafe' mawis nomon ipat anama. Owa'etin. Mambaso'mas.

Ea' amama atom dei' esis hiesi sape Jerusalemi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as ma basef amama sa'i sonda' wandaf. Ea' sasagih safi'i sondowa'anima sawis ipat nomon sombalo' Pol sahonde'ana nawisi ande'. Ea' mehip etin sowalowa utagw ipat anama.
Esis sa'i soha Pol noga', ea' basef mafe' matagama soldia dembinai numafi amam soldiai. Basef ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Esis Jerusalem hiesi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i sonda' wandaf.”
Ea' mehip anan nao'wa anom soldia masagih makini' ma esis hiesi. Ea' amam Juda mati anan ofisa dembinai nao'wa amam soldia, makwaha Pol ina ata' mahana wapoti', owa'.
Soldia anama dembinai nafi'i felefele' nombalo' Pol na'ipa amam soldia mowa' lagof ananimi sen biefina. Ea' nahali' esis na'i, “Anan emi? Anan nanda' main?”

Amam nematawa hiesi sohafel sa'i basef. Ea' esis ina sagwam mafe' etifigin, owa'. Sagwam mafe' deindei. Ea' sanda' salamala Pol sa'i sohana sa'i mehip, ea' ofisa dembinai ina nogawa basef ofagema asasimi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia ma mo'wa Pol nafe' nuwis ipat amam soldiai.
Ea' Pol nafe' nataga bulasan salata ipat anama, esis amam nematawa la'ifis endilisi ma sohana. Na'ama amam soldia mafelona mofa'ana mafe'.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hana ma afuna, hana ma afuna!” Ea' amam soldia mafelana mefa'ana mafe' ma'i muwis ipat.
Amam soldia ma'i mofa' Pol mofe' muwis ipat amamunai nomon, ea' Pol nahali' ofisa dembinai na'i, “Ae' a'i i'ipina anom basef o owa'?”
Ea' soldia anama dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ine' negawa diga Griki?
Ae' a'i ine' aman Isipinai fowa' nogota anama nafela wandaf napa' naloma gavmani ea' nao'wa amam 4,000-peleim mahapila bainahi nao'wam mafe' anama wafiguma epes a'agoma.”
Ea' Pol na'i, “Owa'. Ae' aman Judaiwei. Wambel ae'anai Tarsus etap hiagoma Silisia. Ea' ae' aman anona wambel lu'unai agel lu'unai. Ine' ni'i awi, ae' i'ipasa anom basef esis amam nematawa.”
Ea' soldia anama na'i aho'mana na'i. Pol naitu bulasan anama, nafela lagel nanda'ana de'inda' ma esis amam nematawa sosopama malogof. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef diga Hibrui.
Na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan poloma ahape, ipe' peme'. Ae' a'i egwa basefa' ipe' dei' ma pegawa ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai, owa'.”
Esis same' Pol na'i diga Hibrui ea' malogof mase'as sape, ina ata' sanda'am de'inda', owa'.

Ea' Pol na'i, “Ae' Juda. Mama'we ae'akwi kolae wambel Tarsus etap hiagoma Silisia, na'ama ae' ataga dambewe wambel lu'unai anama. Ae' anda' skula dembinai tisa Gameliel ea' nawalipi andeande'ma mi'uli anama hianai amam bafapapa ape'imi. Na'ama ae' okom nohafel la'ifiwi ma aila God si'i ipe' dei' pailana.
Fowa' ae' anda' maol ahambombaga epes saila eaf anama sombale'efa Dembinaianai. Na'ama aha esis amam nematawa wapoti', a'i ehas soga'. Ea' ewa'as sen efa'as afe' ipat sanda' kalabusanai.

Pris dembinai naloma amam agufumi hiami esis Judai mogawa andeande'ma mowalapa basef amama endilisimi. Amam mase'e pas manda'asa amam sahin owan amamisi Juda sape Damaskus, ea' ae' afe' Damaskus a'i embalo' esis sape wambel anama ewa'as sen. Ae' a'i efa' esis saila eaf anama sefe' Jerusalem sofa' nimanimi ma amam plisman mohas.
Ae' afe' ataga felefele'ma Damaskus, aon nahagasom 12 klok. Mehip anagon howalagon nisila'i ilif heven howalagona ae'.
Ea' ewa etap ame' anona maf na'i na'ama na'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina ine' nahambombaga ae'?’
Ea' ae' agwa basef a'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' emi?’
Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas Nasaratiwei ine' nahambombage.’
Amam malome maituwi mati howalogon ea' amam ina mame' malogola aman anama na'ipei, owa'.
Ea' ae' a'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' ae' atuwasi enda' main?’
Ea' Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' hafel nefe' niwis Damaskus ama atuwasi anona aman nofo'o ni'ipina maol hianai Godi na'i ine' neanda'menanai.’
Howalagon endilisi, na'ama ae' ina ati anom amamaga, owa'. Naep mase'e. Ea' amam amama maitu maloma ae' mahapila lagof ae'ami mofa'e afe' Damaskus.
Anona aman nape Damaskus agilinama Ananaias. Aman anama naila mi'uli Godi andeande'. Amam nematawa Juda sape Damaskus sa'i anan aman bu'unai.
Anan nafi'i naitu felefele' ma ae' na'ipi na'i, ‘Owalome Sol, dei' naep inewapoti'.’
Ea' nogota anama atona naep ae'ami mati wapoti'.
Ea' na'i, ‘God bafapapa ape'imi anan nandandepena ma negawa okom Ananinai ma niti Aman bu'unai. Ama nenda' maol Godi ma neme' basef Ananimi mataga malogel Ananinai.
Nambimb ine' newalapa basef Ananimi ni'ipa amam nematawa hiesi ma amamaga amama ine' name'am natolom.
Dei' maina ine' ata' nape nehafana etin? Ine' hafel nefalona nosa'opena nokwahomena waf aonai ine' nanda'anai ma nefa' baptais!’
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', ae' etanima afi'i Jerusalem, ea' awis anda' beten nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai, si'i a'oh andando'oh.
Ea' ati Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' mehip nekwaha Jerusalem nefe'. I'i ine' newalapa basef Ae'ami na'ae, ina nambimb seme'ena, owa'.’
Ea' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, na'ama owa'. Esis sogawa ae' fowa' afe' ifagw hiami esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi embalo' esis amam nematawa hiesi sombale'efa ine' ahas.
Fowa' esis saha Stiven naga', aman na'ipasa basefa ine' nogota anama aitu felefele' okom ae'anai bo'onama amama. Ae' aitu imafi siogw amamumi amam mahana.’
Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' fo'o. Nambimb ae' esapa'ena nefe' eaf laogoma ma enis amam nematawa hiesi owa' Judaisi sogawa ae'i.’ ”
Esis Juda same' basef Poli mafe' matagama basef amama ma'i epes isima ina Judaisi. Ea' esis sa'i mehip sa'i, “Epes amama ina mope etap, owa'. Hana ma afuna!”
Ea' esis sa'i mehip sowali siogw lagof asasimi sakwaha sopof nalata ilif.

Ea' soldia anama dembinai na'ipa amam soldia mehipa mo'wana mofe' muwis ipat amam soldiai nomon. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia mohana ma nowalapa basef amama ofagema. Anan na'i nogawa andeande' dei' maina esis sofalana na'ama.

Ea' amam mowa'ana ma mohana anona let ea' Pol nahali' anona kepten dembinai naitu felefele' na'ama na'i, “A'i lo na'i ipe' wila ma penda' basef na'ama ma aman anama Romunai? Ae' Romuwei. Ipe' ina dei' panda'me kot ea' ma dei' ipe' pahe. Waf anama andeande'?”
Ea' kepten anama name' basef amama, nafe' na'ipa soldia anama dembinai na'i, “Ine' na'i nanda' main? Aman anama anan Romunai!”
Ea' soldia anama dembinai nafi'mai Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ine' kipa ae'. Ine' aman Romunai?”
Pol nagwamana basef na'i, “A'e.”
Ea' soldia anama dembinai na'i, “Ae' akwaha otamba hiami atala pepa ma ataga aman Romuwei.”
Ea' Pol na'i, “Ae' owa'. Mamase esis Romisi. Ea' ae' wapoti' Romuwei.”
Ea' amam amama mahali'ana ma'i meahanai, owa'. Amam umbamaham mandafa'mana. Ea' soldia anama dembinai okokoma Pol anan Romunai ea' na'ipama mowa'ana sen. Ea' anan wapoti' umbamahana.

Wafilu soldia anama na'i nogawa andeande' amam Juda ma'i basefa maina waf Pol nanda'anai. Ea' soldia anama natagahamana sen ea' nasapa' basef mafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti mifi'i mondowa'anima mope. Ea' anan nao'wa Pol nafi'i nahaponana naitu naep amamumi.

Pol nati amam Juda dembami mumafi koti la'ifina ea' na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' afe' naep Godi ea' okom ae'anai bo'ona nafe'ma naep Godi, afi'i ataga dei'. Basef mape opaf ae'anai nomoni ma'iami ma'ipi basef mihi'ambe ma waf ae' anda'anai ina aona, owa'.”
Anan na'iam na'ama, pris dembinai Ananaias nape nali'ma pris hiami na'ipa amam maitumana felefele' ma maha malogel ananinai.

Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ine' aman aonai si'i anom endalelemb awami sanda' pen bu'unai afitinai sandisam ande' atogini. Atuwasi God nehena. Ine' nape na'ae naila mi'uli anama Godi ma nanda' kotima ae', ea' ine' etina nesambala mi'uli anama ma dei' na'ipam mahe!”
Ea' amam maitu felefele' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' na'i basef findiwama aman pris dembinai Godi?”

Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' ina egawa a'i anan pris dembinai, owa'. Dei' main, basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Ipe' ina pi'ipa agilinai numafi ipe'i pi'ipana basef awami, owa'.’ Amama ae' egawam.”

Ea' Pol nogawa amam Juda dambami mumafi koti anom Sadyusi, anom Farisi. Na'ama anan na'ipam mehip na'ama na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' Farisiwei ea' ahalome ae'anai Farisinai. Ae' embale'ef a'i endilisi anona nemaf epes saga'i sohafel wapoti', dei' ape ehafa nemaf anama. Ofagema amama atom dei' esis sanda' kotima ae'.”
Anan na'ipama basef amama, ea' amam atom mafitap la'afena amam Farisi maloma Sadyusi ea' mandawal biefim.

Dei' main, amam Sadyusi membale'ef ma'i epes saga'i owagama ina sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'. Amam ma'i ensel owa', ambagof owa'. Ea' amam Farisi membale'efa ambagof maloma ensel maloma epes saga'i sohafel wapoti' endilisi.

Amama atom amam ma'i mehip. Ea' anom dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi amam Farisi mohafel maitu ma'iam mehip na'ama ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anama basef ofagema a'ana. I'i anona ambal bu'unai o anona ensel ni'ipana ma ni'ipasa basef amama, andeande'.”

Ea' fitap nataga lu'una, soldia dembinai umbamahana ma Pol, na'i na'ama amam hiami mandawal biefimi mohonde'ana pele'atana biefina afuna. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia ananimi mikini' mombalo' Pol la'afena amam mofa'ana mofe' ipat amamunai.

Wafilu owamb Dembinai nafi'i naitu felefele'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nitu la'ifina. Ina umbamehena, owa'. Fowa' nawalapa basef ae'ami Jerusalem, ea' nambimb ine' newalapam na'ama etin wambel lu'unai Rom wapoti'.”
Ea' wafilu kuhimbita amam Juda mandakolas ma'i basef mandame'mama mape atogon ma'i endilisi ilifa moha Pol afuna. Amam ma'i ina mea' gwa'aimi embel muli', na'ama ota' ma mohana afuna, ea' mea'am.
Amam ma'i endilisi ilif mandame'ma basef amama, amam hiami mikila' 40-peleim.
Amam mafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Juda ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' wa'i basef wandame'mama oha Pol afuna. Afa' wa'i endilisi ilif ina ata' wea' gwa'aimi embel, ota'ma oha Pol afuna.

Na'ama dei' ipe' peloma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti pesapa' basef mefe'ma soldia dembinai Romunai ma nofa'i Pol nifi'mai ipe'. Ipe' pembaso'mana pi'i, ‘Afa' wa'i ata' ome' basef ofagema Poli andeande'.’ Ea' afa' wandandombam wape. Anan ina nifi'i notanimai ma ipe', ata' owa', afa' uli' ohana afuna.”
Ea' taganamana Poli name' amam Juda ma'i mofe' mopoma Pol eaf ma mohana noga', nafe' ipat amam soldiai nawis na'ipa Pol.
Ea' Pol nofala anona soldia dembinai na'i, “Akwolanago aman anama so'unai nefe'mago kepten dembinai ma amam soldia hiami. Anan anom basefa na'i ni'ipanam.”
Ea' soldia anama nao'wana nafe'ma kepten dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Aman anama nanda' kalabusi Pol nofala ae' na'ipi ao'wai aman anama so'unai nafi'mai ine'. Anan anom basef ni'ipinam.”
Ea' kepten anama nahapila lagel ananinai nao'wana nafe' wa'ol, amam atom mape nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' na'i ni'ipi maim basef?”

Ea' so'unai na'ipana na'i, “Amam Juda ma'i basef mandame'mam ea' ma ma'i mohali'ina ma naman nefa' Pol nefe'ma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti. Amam mambaso'am ma'i ata' mohali' Pol atona ma basef ofagema ananimi.

Ea' ina nila basef amamumi, owa'. Dei' main, anom amam amamumi hiami mikila' 40-peleim ma'i basef la'ifimi mandame'mam ma'i endilisi ilif ina mea' gwa'aimi embel, owa'. Ota' ma muli' moha Pol afuna. Amama atom dei' amam mape eaf mohafana. Amam mandondombam mape mohafa ine' ma ni'i aho'ma basef amamumi.”
Ea' Kepten anama nasapa' anan so'unai nafe' na'ipana basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen atitina basef amama, owa'.”

Ea' kepten anama nofala anom soldia dambami biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefa'ai soldia hiami 200-peleim moloma anom soldia 70-peleim matoma hos ea' 200-peleim mahapila wambawai. Ipe' pendondombama pefe' Sisaria atuwasi owamb 9 klok.
Ea' pendondomba anom hosa Pol wapoti' notomam ea' pefa'ana andeande' pefe'ma gavman dembinai Feliks.”
Kepten anama nanda' anom basef mafe'ma Feliks na'ama ma'i,
“Ae' Klodius Lisias anda' basef amama mafe'mago ine' gavman dembinai nape nali'i Feliks. Nemaf bu'unai.
Amam Juda ma'i mombalo' aman anama ma'i nohana noga'. Na'ama ae' ame'anama basef anan na'i anan aman Romunai. Ea' ae' aloma amam soldia wafe' watagama amam Juda wandalombamana lagof amamumi.
Ae' a'i ata' egawa basef ofagema amam mambaso'amanami, na'ama ae' ao'wana akini' ma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti.
Ea' ma'ipi anom basefa mi'uli amamunai mambaso'mana ma basef amama. Na'ama amam ina manda' kotimana ma anom amamaga ma ohana noga', o onda' kalabusimana, owa'.

Na'ama dei' anom basef matagama ae' ma amam ma'i anom basef mandame'mama ma'i mohana noga'. Ea' dei' ae' mehip asapa'ana nafe'mago ine'. Ea' ae' a'ipa amam amama mambaso'manai ma mofo'o mowalapa basef alihima naep ine'imi ma ine' negawa amamaga amama amam ma'i monda' kotimanami.”
Ea' amam soldia mame' basef mofa' Pol mafe' anona wambel Antipatris owamb.
Lala soldia amama motanima mafe' ifagw amamumi Jerusalem. Ea' amam 70-peleim matoma hos atom mofa' Pol mafe' Sisaria.
Mafe' mataga Sisaria, mase'ana pas basef amama gavman dembinai ea' mofa'ai Pol wapoti' nafi'i naitu naep ananimi.
Ea' dembinai gavman anama nafi'i nati pas amama ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ine' etap lu'unai agel lu'unai eti?”
Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ae' Silisiaiwei.”
Ea' anan na'ipa Pol na'i, “Nambimb amam amama mambaso'ma ine'i mufi'i motaga, ae' eme' basef ine'imi.”
Ea' na'ipa amam manda' kalabusima Pol ipat lu'unai gavman dembinai Heroti.

Nimeguf wanom biam mafe' ea', pris dembinai Ananaias nakini' nafe' Sisaria naloma anom agufumi Judai ea' anona aman Tertulus aman nogawa mi'uli gavman nalomam nafi'i. Amam hiami ma'ipa gavman dembinai Filiksa basef amama ma'i monda' kotima Polami.

Ea' gavman anama nofalai Pol nafi'i, Tertulus nanda' basef findiwama anan. Ea' na'ipa Feliks na'i, “Ine' aman dembinai Feliks, ine' nagiambama ape' Juda ma mape nogota launai andeande' ea' wandaf main owa'etin. Okom bu'unai ine'inai nagiambama esis wambota ape'inai ma dei' mape andeande' mikila' fowa' mali' mape.
Ea' ape' mape wambel hiagoma opalef ape'imi mape bo'oma ine'. Ea' nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef manifelina ma amama.
Na'ama ae' andaiwa'ma ahapilina nogota laona. Dei' ahali'ina ma neme' basef ape'imi bandami.

Ape' mogawa aman anama nanda'mapa amamaga awami hiami. Ea' nanda' naumbih nafela ukup awami naloma esis Juda hiesi napa' nalomas etap hiagoma wambel hiagoma. Anan agel lu'unai ma epes isima sapa' sawala epes hiesi ape'isi ma epes sape deindei'i, sa'i epes Nasareti.
Ea' anan na'i nonda' ipat lu'unai sanda lotuma Godanai aona wapoti'. Na'ama ape' mombale'ana ma'i monda' kotimana ma mi'uli ape'inai.
Ea' kepten dembinai Lisias nafi'i, anan la'ifinai nahonde'ana lagof ape'imi.
Anan na'i mehip ape' manda' kotima anan mifi'i motaga naep ine'imi. I'i dei' ine' nihali' aman anama, atuwasi ine' negawa endilisi basef ananimi ma ni'i amamaga hiami ape' manda' kotimanami.”
Ea' amam Juda dambami wapoti' magiambama anan mambaso'ma Pol mawalapam ma'iam ma'i, “Basef amama endilisimi atom.”

Ea' gavman dembinai nanda' balaga nahali' Pol nogwa basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' egawa afagof hiami ine' nanda' jas nape dembinai gavman numafi ape' Juda hiapai. Na'ama dei' okom ae'anai bo'ona, endilisi ma egwa basef amama ihi'ambena ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai, owa'.
I'i ine' nihali' esis, atuwasi neme' basef amama dei' ae' a'i i'ipinami. Nimeguf ata' 12-peleim mafe' ea' ae' ali' afe' Jerusalem anda' lotu.

Ea' amam Juda ma'i monda' kotima ae' mati ae' ina a'i anom basef afitapam aloma enin epen nomon ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'. Amam ina mati ae' afela ukup asasimi ma sopa' ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nomon o anagon nomona wambel anama lu'wagoma, owa'.
Ea' basef amama esis dei' sanda' kotimiami, esis ina atuwasi la'ifis sowalapa anom basef ofagema ma ine' negawa, owa'.

Na'ama ae' a'i ewalapa basef amama atoma ine'. Eaf anama esis Juda etis sandaiwa'manai sa'i waf anama sawala wambotagwanai ina endilisinai. Waf anama endilisinai ae' ahapilana ailana. Ae' aila eaf anama anda' lotu ma God amam bafapapa ape' Juda hiapai manda' lotumanai. Ae' ahapila basef hiami mape mi'uli Godi naloma basef hiami amam profet fowa' manda'ami.
Ae' embale'efam ape ehafa God owagama nefela esis saga'i, epes isima bu'wasi soloma isima sanda' waf aonai wapoti'. Amam manda' kotima ae' wapoti' mombale'ef mape mohafa God na'ama etin.

Ea' la'ela'ef ae' anda' maol lu'unai ma epe andeande' ma malogel nape opaf ae' nomoni ina nihi'ambe anona waf aonai ae' anda'anai, owa'. Ae' anda' maola waf aonai a'e ma naep Godi naloma naep epesi wapoti'.
Ae' ape anom afagof anona wambel ea' etanima afi'i Jerusalem ma epes hiesi ae'asi. Ae' efa'ai moni maina igiambama isima kwahusi ea' eha anom mafis endalalima God ese'ana.
Anda'am na'ama ma anda' waf bu'unai, waf aonai a'e ma naep Godi. Ea' esis satolowe. Ina enis amam nematawa hiesi sape salome afela opalef enis epes sanda' salamala naninani, owa'etin.
Na'ama enis Juda sape etap hiagoma Esiaisi safi'i sombale'e. I'i esis anom basefa ae', dei' andeande'ma sifi'i na'ae naep ine'imi sonda' kotimi.
I'i owa', amam amama mi'ipina anom basefa amamaga awami amam mati ae' anda'ami, nemaf anama fowa' aitu naep amam Juda dambami mumafi koti.
Anom basef etifim na'ama. Nemaf anama aitu la'afena amam, ae' ega a'i, ‘Ae' embale'efa God nefela esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', ea' amama atom ipe' dei' panda' kotima ae' ma naep ipe'imi.’ ”

Feliks nogawa andeande'ma bale'ef naloma waf sa'i eaf esis Kristeni. Ea' na'ipa esis Juda ma ata' sope sohafana. Anan na'i, “Ota' ma soldia dembinai Lisias nikini'i, ae' enandonama basef amama ipe'imi.”
Ea' na'ipa anona soldia dembinai ma ata' nonda' Pol nuwis nope kalabus nope wafifina etin. Ea' na'i aho'ma esis alupusi ananisi sifi'i sigiambamana ma amamaga.

Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Feliks nao'wa waulu'mana anani'wi Drusila safi'i. Drusila akwa'w ano'w Judai'wi. Ea' Feliks nofala Pol na'i neme' anom basef ananimi. Ea' Pol nafi'i na'ipana basef ofagema ma esis sombale'efa basef Jisas Kraisi.
Na'ipana waf bu'unai ma epes sumafi alop asasinai andeande' ma owagama God nonda' kotima epes hiesi. Na'iam na'ama, Feliks umbamahana.
Ea' na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Nambimb anona nemaf, efalena wapoti'.”
Feliks nape nohafa anom amamaga wapoti'. Anan na'i nambimb Pol nose'ana anona moni ma nokwahona nofe' wafifina. Na'ama la'ela'ef anan nofalana nafi'i na'i nalomana.
Afagof biam mafe'ma hi'alam, Festus nofa' maol Filiksi. Ea' Feliks na'i ata' nonda' ukup esis Judai mope andeande'. Ea' ata' nanda' Pol nape nanda' kalabus.
Festus nafi'i nofa' maol nape dembinai gavman numafi etap hiagoma fowa' Feliks numafiagoma. Nape nimeguf wanom ea', nakwaha wambel Sisaria nondowasa' Jerusalem.
Ea' amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anan mambaso'ma Pol.
Ma'ipa Festus mehip ma'i, “Ine' nigiambamafa nesapa' aman anama nifi'i anae'.”
Dei' main, amam ma'i mondambaho' mope eafa mohana noga'.
Ea' Festus nagwa basef na'ipam na'i, “Pol nanda' kalabus nape wambel Sisaria. Nambimb ae' etanima efe' ganima.
Ea' amam agufumi ipe'imi mifi'i mikini'i moloma ae'. I'i aman anama nanda' waf aonai, amam monda' kotimana.”
Festus nape nalomam nimeguf 8-peleim o 10-peleim, ea' nakini' wambel Sisaria. Wafilu nafe' nawis ipat sandakota na'ipa amam soldia mo'wa Pol mifi'i.
Ea' amam Juda makwaha Jerusalem mape mahafa Pol nafi'i makini'i maitu felefele'ma anan mambaso'mana basef hiami nimanimi. Ea' amam manda'mana basef etin, basef ofagema amamumi ina anom.
Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai ma mi'uli ape' Judai, ipat lu'unai Godi, o mi'uli Sisari wapoti', owa'etin.”
Na'ama Festus na'i nonda' ukup esis Judai mope bo'om. Ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ine' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama nambimb eme'enama basef ine'imi gani?”
Ea' Pol na'i, “Ipat anae' ae' dei' aituanai, anae' ipat Sisari sanda' kota. Ipat anae' atona peme' basefa kot ae'anai. Ine' etina negawa, ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai ma esis Juda, owa'.

I'i ae' anona waf aonai ma enda' anom amamaga awami mondahama ae' ega', andeande'ma amam mohe ega'. I'i basef amama amam manda' kotima ae'ami owa' endilisimi, ina andeande'ma dembinai gavman nese'e efe'ma lagof amamumi, owa'. Dei' ae' efala gavman dembinai Sisar neme' kot ae'anai.”
Ea' Festus ata' na'i basef naloma amam dambami ananimi, na'ipa Pol na'i, “Ine' nefala Sisar ama neme' kot ine'inai, ine' fo'mago Sisar.”
Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', dembinai king Agripa nafi'i naloma ano'w nemata'w Bernaisi esis bias safi'i Sisaria sa'i sonda'mana nemaf bu'unai Festus.
Esis sape Sisaria nimeguf hiami ea' Festus nawalapa basef na'ipanam king Agripa ma Pol. Anan na'i, “Anona aman fowa' napani Feliks nanda'ana dei' nanda' kalabus.
Fowa' ae' apani Jerusalem, amam pris dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai mambaso'mana mahali' ae' ma i'i endilisi anan aman aonai ma noga'.

Ea' ae' agwamama basef na'ama a'i, ‘Ape' Rom waf anama a'apa ma mose'ana nimanimi na'a enin epen, owa'. I'i basef milan, enin ata' nili' nitu nonda' basefa naep esis isima sanda' kotimani ma ape' ata' mose'ana nogota ma enin negwa anom basefa esis sanda' kotimani.’ ”
Nemaf anama amam agufumi Judai mafi'i na'ae, ina apoma noma ma eme' basefana, owa'. Nemaf gi'mainai ae' afe' ape ipat sanda' kota a'ipa esisa sofa' aman anama nafi'i.
Ea' amam manda' kotima anan mafi'i maitu mambaso'mana. Ea' amam ina ma'i anom basef endilisimi ma waf aonai masindinana a'i amam monda' kotimanami, owa'.
Amam mandahihianama anom basef malomana ma waf esis sanda' lotuwanai ea' anona aman naga'i, Jisas. Ea' Pol na'i aman anama nape namunai ambal napaina.
Ae' a'i egolopa basef amama ofagema andeande', na'ama okom ae'anai ina egawa, owa'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi, owa'. Ea' ahali'ana a'i, “Ine' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama nambimb eme'enama basef ine'imi gani?
Ea' Pol na'i anan nope kalabus ama nambimb gavman dembinai ape'inai Sisar neme' basef ananimi. Ae' a'i anan nope kalabus ea' esapa'ana nefe'mago Sisar.”
Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “Ae' atowe a'i eme' basef ananimi.”
Ea' Festus na'ipana na'i, “Naman ine' neme'ana.”

Wafilu Agripa naloma nemata'w akwama Bernaisi safi'i sanda' sosaf hianai ma sefela agof asasimi lu'um. Ea' sawis ipat lu'unai sandatama etifigin sape sa'i basef nomon saloma amam soldia dambami mali'i maloma amam agufumi taun anama. Ea' Festus na'ipas mehip sao'wa Pol nafi'i.

Ea' Festus na'i, “King Agripa, naloma ipe' epes hipei pape paloma ape', ipe' pati aman anama. Esis amam nematawa hiesi Juda sape Jerusalemi saloma sape na'ae wapoti' sanda' kotimana naep ae'ami. Esis sa'ipi basef laifimi sa'i ehana afuna. Sa'i 'Ina nope, hana afuna.’
Na'ama ae' ati anan ina nanda' anom amamaga awami ma noga', owa'. Ea' anan nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nome' kota anan. Amama atom ae' a'i basefa esapa'ana nofo'o.

Ea' ae' ina ati anom basefa anan mataga alihima enda' anom basefa pas esapa'am mofe'ma Sisar, owa'. Ea' dei' king Agripa ae' au'wai aman anama nafi'mai ine' neloma ipe' hipei wapoti'. Afa' ome' basef ananimi andeande'ma nambimb ae' egawama enda' anom basef mil pas.
Dei' main, ina andeande'ma esapa'ana nofe' etin. Afa' onda' anom basef sanda' kotimanami mil pepa mefe' molomana, andeande'.”
Ea' Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Dei' ine' negwa basef amama amam mambaso'mena.”
Pol nafela lagel na'i basef ananimi na'i,
“King dembinai Agripa, ae' a'i egwa basef amama hiami amam Juda mambaso'ma ae'ami. Ae' okom na'i andeande'ma a'i ewalapa basef ae'ami ma naep ine'imi.
Dei' main? Ine' negawa andeande'ma waf ape' Judai naloma amamaga ape' ukup mapomam mafe' deindei'mami. Amama atom dei' ae' a'i ine' neme' basef ae'ami, okom ine'inai ina iwanina mehip, owa'.
Fowa' ape afi'i afi'i dei' fe' anama ae'anai esis Juda hiesi sogawa. Fowa' ata' sa'owe ape etap ae'anai ea' afe' ape Jerusalem wapoti'.

Fowa' gani esis sogawa ae'. I'i ukup asasimi mi'i a'e, sowalapa basef amama ma waf ae' anda'anai. Esis sogawa ae' aila waf epes hiesi ape' Farisi. Waf anama ahifina endilisi, nikila' waf hianai anona lotu ape'inai.

Ea' basef ofagema ma kot na'ama. Ae' embale'ef endilisi ma God nefela saga'i sohafel wapoti', amama atom. Ae' embale'ef ape ehafa God nonda' amamaga amama motaga si'i fowa' na'ipa akupapa ape'imi Judai. Amama atom dei' esis sanda' kotimi.

Wambotagw apa'imi 12-peleim manda' lotuma God owamb alip ea' mombele'ef endilisi mape mohafa amama atom. Dei' a'ipa ine' dembinai king, ae' wapoti' embale'ef ape ehafa amama. Ea' na'ama esis Juda sambaso'me.”
Pol na'ipa king Agripa ea' nandamboma na'ipa amam Juda na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pa'i basef ina endilisimi ma God owagama nefela esis isima saga'i wapoti? Ipe' pembale'efa basef amama.
Fowa' ae' wapoti' okom na'i ae' enda' amamaga hiami ma ehagofa agel Jisas Nasaretinai.

Ae' anda'am na'ama etina enis epes gani Jerusalem. Amam pris dambami mase'e pepel anda' kalabusima amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Nemaf anama amam pris dambami ma'i moha enis Kristen soga', ae' wapoti' a'i a'e.

Ea' nimeguf hiami ae' ase'as nimanimi Kristen isima ahas nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi hiami. Ae' a'i enda' esisa sonda' Dembinai findiwana ma sokwaha basef Dembinai. Ae' okom wandafuna endilisi ma esis, ailas afe' anona wambel laogoma lu'wagoma.
Efa' pepela amam pris dambami masapa'e afe' Damaskus.
Ae' a'ipa ine' dembinai king, ma aon nahagasom ae' aila eaf afe', ati howalogon nisila'i heven nikila' aon alipunai. Howalagon nafi'i nolalowe aloma amam mafe' malumai.

Afa' hiafai wa'oh etap ea' ae' ame' anona malogel na'i diga Hibrui na'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina ine' nanda' maol nahambombaga ae'? Ine' nanda' maol naha anama ina negawa. Dei' nefa' nimanimi bolam si'i anona naha bulmakau ananimi bolam nanindinama nafe' andeande'.’
Ea' ahali'ana a'i, ‘Dembinai ine' emi?’
Ea' Dembinai na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas, ine' nahambombage.
Ea' ine' hafel nitu. Ae' afi'mai ine' ma amamaga amama. Ae' a'i esahe'ena ma nihapila maol ae'anai, newalapa basefa amamaga ine' natoloma ae'i. Ea' amamaga amama owagama ae' ihi'ambenam.
Nambimb ae' etagahina lagof esis epes hiesi ine'isi Juda ea' etagahina ma lagof isima enis epes sololama Godi wapoti'. Ae' esapa'ena nefe'ma epes isima.

Ama newala naep asasimi ma esis sowa' alafugaha akota waf aonai somboma opalef sifi'mai howalagon ma sokwaha pepel Satani sifi'mai God. Esis sombale'efa ae' ma ekwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ama sofa' amamaga bu'wami soloma enis amam nematawa God nanda'as bo'wes ananisi etisi.’
Dembinai king Agripa, ae' ati amamaga amama mataga heveni ea' ina esambala basef amama, owa'.

Ae' ali' awalapa basefa esis amam nematawa sape Damaskusi ea' awalapama epes sape Jerusalemi ea' awalapama esis sape etap hiagoma Judia ea' afe' awalapama isima sololama Godi wapoti'. Ae' awalapa basefa penda' maol peloma waf bu'unai nendahama epes somboma opalef sefe'ma God.
Ae' anda'am na'ama ea' ofagema amama atom dei' esis Juda sombale'e ipat lu'unai Godi sa'i sehe ega'.

Na'ama God nagiambame afi'i afi'i ataga dei' aitu na'ae ea' awalapa basef a'ipa epes hiesi agof a'asi saloma ipe' agufipei wapoti'. Ae' ina ewalapa anom basef, owa'. Awalapa basef amama Godi atom fowa' amam profet maloma Moses ma'iami ma amamaga owagama meatagai.

Amam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Dembinai Krais ata' nofa' nimanimi, ma nambimb notanima nohafel hi'agif nili'ma epes hiesi. Ama Anan nowalapa basefa epes hiesi sogawam si'i howalagon nikila'i nififima esis ananisi soloma isima sololama Godi wapoti'.’ ”
Pol na'ipas na'ama ea', Festus noga na'i basef la'ifimi na'ama na'i, “Pol, ine' okom nololaina! Ine' nati buk hiami natalifam nogawam dei' gawa anama lu'unai nanda'ena okom nololaina!”
Ea' Pol nagwamana na'i, “Ine' aman dembinai Festus, ae' ina okom nololae, owa'. Ae' okom napaewe dei' a'i endilisi.

Ine' dembinai king negawa hi'alam amamaga amama hiami. Ea' ae' dei' awalapam a'iam ae' ina umbamahe, owa'. Ae' egawa amamaga amama hiami ina mandambaho'ma naep maloma aligah ine'imi, owa'. Ine' natolom negawam ea'. Dei' main, amamaga amama ina mataga mandambaho', owa'.
Dembinai king Agripa, ine' nembale'a basef Godi amam profet fowa' mawalipasami o owa'? Ae' egawa ine' nembale'am!”
Ea' king Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Nogota anama bandana ine' na'i nenda'e etaga Kristen?”

Ea' Pol na'i, “Nogota bandana o laona andeande'. Ae' anda betena God na'ama. A'i nambimb ine' neloma epes isima hiesi dei' pame' basef ae'ami petaga Kristen na'ama etin si'i ae'. Ea' sen anama nowa' ae'i, andaiwa'ma nowa'epa.”
Pol na'iam na'ama ea', dembinai king nali' nohafel naitu naloma Bernaisi saloma gavman dembinai saloma epes isima sape salomasi.
Ea' sawis ande'. Esis etis sanda'ipama sa'i, “Aman anama ina nanda' anom amamaga awami ma noga' o nonda' kalabus, owa'.”
Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “I'i aman anama ina nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nome'anama kot, ine' netagahana nofo'o wafifina.”

Ea' anom dambami Rom ma'i basef mandame'mama afa' ofa' sip ofe' etap hiagoma Itali. Ea' anom dambami masapa' Pol naloma enis epes sanda' kalabusi ma anona soldia dembinai Julius numafias. Anan anona amam soldia gavman dembinai Sisari.

Ea' afa' walata anona sip nafi' Adramitiumi. Sip anama na'i nefe' anona wambel nape naoh amama etap hiagoma Esia. Afa' wafe' ea' anona aman Aristarkus Tesalonaikainai ma etap hiagoma Masedonia nafe' nalomafa.
Wafilu wafe' wail anona wambel Saidon. Ea' aman anama Julius numafi Pol nanda' waf bu'unai ma anan. Na'i aho'ma anan nefe' niti alupusi ananisi ma nofa' gwa'aimi maima esis.
Afa' wakwaha Saidon wafe' ea' uf naluwi anama afa' wa'i weafe'ma. Ea' wafe' anona ailan Saiprus wa'ol uf a'agoma.
Ea' wafe' watopa' naoh wafe' felefele'ma etap hiagoma Silisia naloma Pamfilia ea' wafe' watagama anona wambel Maira etap hiagoma Lisia.
Wambel anama Julius nati anona sip nafi'i Aleksandria na'i nefe' etap hiagoma Itali. Ea' na'ipafa wafe' walata sip anama.

Wafe', sip anama nafe' sa'osa'ombel ama anom nimeguf hi'alam. Wanda'am noma'w nahafa ea' wataga felefele'ma anona wambel Nidus. Uf nalo lu'una nili'akwafa ea' ina ata' wafe' mehip, owa'. Ea' wafe' anona ailan Krit wa'ol uf owa'ma felefele'ma etap Salmone da'malifinama.
Wanda'am noma'w nahafa ea' waila naoh atom wafe' felefele'ma akata ailan anama Krit. Wafe' nogota laona ea' wataga anona wambel Fasiguma Sip Naila. Anama felefele'ma wambel lu'wagoma Lasea.

Nimeguf hiami mafe' hi'alam, nemaf anama esis Juda sakwaha gwa'aimianai hi'alana ea' anom nimeguf wapoti'. Nogota anama naoh manda'am fepo. Ina nogota bo'onama sip neafe', owa'. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef esis na'ama na'i,

“Ipe' amam, peme'. I'i dei' afa' weafe'ma, nambimb otagama nimanimi ea' amamaga hiami higililam. Ina hiahaom maim atom moloma sip higililam, owa'. Ambagof afa'imi wapoti' nambimb higililam. Ae' egawam endilisi.”
Ea' Julius name' dembinai kepten anama numafi amam manda' maol sipi naloma aman anama ofagenama sipi ina mame' basef Pol na'iami, owa'.

Basis amama sip nafe' naima ina bo'wagon ma sip nilagon nogota anama uf naluwianai, owa'. Ea' amam hiami mape sip ma'i anom basef mandame'mama ma'i mokwaha wambel anama mafe'. I'i amam la'ifim, ma'i mefe' motaga ulal basis amama Finiks ea' mope anama nogota anama launai uf lu'unai naluwianai. Basis amama Finiks mape ailan anama Krit. Anama bo'wagoma ma sip nofe' nondambaho'ma uf naluma. Basis amama mape la'afena aon natefima nowalama.

Sape nogota bandana nafe' ea' uf so'unai nalo nafi'i aon natopa' nowalama ea' ina la'ifina, owa'. Ea' amam ma'iam ma'i atuwasi amam mofe' andeande' si'i ukup amamumi ma'i. Na'ama magiai anka nalatai ea' wafe' waila naoh atom felefele'ma bandagoma ailan anama Krit.
Nogota laona uf la'ifinai sa'i taleo naluwi nalo nafi'i ailan anama Krit.
Namboma sip anama ea' ina la'ifina neafe' anama uf nalu nafi'ima, owa'. Ea' wapoma uf atona nefa' sip nafe'.
Wafe' anona ailan wa'ol uf a'agoma sofalagon sa'i Kauda. Wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma owa' bot so'unai nail la'ifina.

Ea' amam magiai bot anama so'unai nalatai sip ilif ea' mowa' sip la'afen ma anom mandelef la'ifina nail. Amam umbamaham endilisi ma mefe' mieil anama wesan aonai na'oma, felefele'ma etap hiagoma Libia, Afrika. Ea' matagahai sel mikila'i.
Uf naloma naoh makoto'ma afa' mehip. Wafilu magi' anom hiahaom nimanimi makwahom mowala naoh.
Ama nemaf nafe'ma wenifi manda' lagof amamumi atom makwaha anom amamaga sel mandelef maim manda' sip nimaninai.
Nimeguf hiami afa' ina ata' wati aon ondowa, owa'. Uf lu'unai atona endilisi nakoto'mafa wape na'ama etin. Ea' wa'i nambimb ina ofe' otaga anagon andeande', owa'. Wa'i higililafa etin.

Nimeguf hiami amam ina ata' ma' gwa'aimi ea' Pol nohafel naitu la'afena amam na'i, “Ipe' peme'. Fowa' ipe' andeande'ma peme' basef ae'ami ma afa' ina okwaha Krit ufi'i ulal. I'i onda'am na'ama, afa' ina dei' ofa' nimanimi amama, ea' amamaga hiahaom maim afa'imi higililam, owa'.
Ea' dei' a'ipipa afela ukup ipe'imi mope la'ifim. Ina nambimb anona aman afa'inai nefe' higililana, owa'. Sip atona higililana.
Dei' maina ae' egawa amama? Ae' aman Godi anda' lotuma anani. Do'ok owamb anona ensel Ananinai nafi'i naitu felefele'ma ae'

na'ipi na'i, ‘Pol, ine' owa' umbamehena, owa'. Ine' nambimb nefe' nitu naep gavman dembinai Sisar. Ea' ine' neme', epes hiesi isima sape salomena sipi, isima God nambimb nigiambamas. Ea' ina atuwasi enin higililan, owa'.’
Dei' main, ae' embale'efa God anan nambimb nonda' amamaga amama motaga si'i na'ipiam.
Ea' afa' ata' ofe' wil anona ailan anama otamba ma'oma.”
Owambeh amama wikifah biam tol wala etin wafe' naoh amama Adriai. Owamb la'afen aon nahagasom amam mumafi hiahaom sipi mogawa ma'i sip nafe' nataga felefele'ma anona ailan.
Ea' mala mandof si'i ikwaf nowala naoh mondola'wifagon nihi'ambam na'i 40 mita, laogon atona. Ea' wafo'o felefele', walana wapoti' mondala'wifagon na'i 30 mita, ina laogon, owa'.
Ea' amam umbamaham ma'i, “Na'ama mofe' etin la'ifim mope anom otamba anama otambaiguma.”
Ea' makwaha anka biefina biefina nowala sip anama naila ma mombalo'a sip nail. Ea' amam ukup ma'i aon alipunai ata' nitefi mehip.
Amam manda' maol sipi ma'i ata' magolopa eafa mokwaha sip mefe'. Ea' mala bot so'unai nowala mambaso'am ma'i mokwaha anona anka nowala sip anama naila.
Ea' Pol na'ipa dembinai soldia Julius naloma amam soldia na'ipam na'i, “I'i amam amama owa' mope sip la'la'ef, atuwasi ipe' awepa higililipa.”
Ea' amam soldia matopa' mandelefa bot so'unai anama nowala naoh.

Ea' felefele'ma aon na'i nitefi, Pol na'ipam basef amam hiami. Anan na'i nonda'am motaga la'ifim mea' anom gwa'aimi. Ea' na'i, “Nogota launai ipe' pape etin ina pa' anom gwa'aimi ea' pape umbamahepa ma amamaga amama meatagamipei. Ipe' pape etin nimeguf amama 14-peleim ea' pafi'i pataga nemaf dei'inai.
Dei' a'ipipa mehip, a'i ipe' ata' pea' anom gwa'aimi ma petaga la'ifipa. Peme', ina atuwasi anom amamaga motaga mohambombagepa, owa'. Pepe andeande'.”
Anan na'iam na'ama, nafela anona bret naep amamumi nanda' beten nanifela God, nawalona na'ana.
Ea' amam hiami ukup bo'om ma' gwa'aimi wapoti'.
Afa' hiafai wape sip wataga 276-peleifa hiafai.
Amam ma'am ea', makwaha wit mowala naoh ama sip ata' sofalina.

Aon natefima lala, amam mati anona etap ea' amam ina mogawa etap anama akata, owa'. Amam mati anom basis sip nafe' naila nondola' nawis endilisi. Ma'i i'i la'ifim, dei' monda' sip nondowasa' wesan akata.
Ea' matopa' mandelefa anka anama hianai makwahom mala naoh. Ea' matagaha mandof manda'am mowa' stiaimi, mandola sela uf nofa' sip nafe' akata.
Ea' sip la'afina dogwala wesan la'ifina nail. Nali'ma la'ifina endilisi nape otamba. Ea' naoh mowa maha sip nagi'ma ea' kwa'alana.
Ea' amam soldia ukup amamumi ma'i moha amama manda' kalabusi afum hi'ilam, ama amam ina ata' mopaol mofa' mefe', owa'.
Ea' dembinai soldia Julius na'i nigiambama Pol. Ea' na'ipam na'i ina moham afum, owa'. Mope. Ea' na'ipa amam amama mogawa paoli ma motoma mukupa' mopaol mofe' akata.

Ea' anom mololama paoli, mohapila palag maim la'if'im moloma endah sip anama kokwa'alami mohapilam tol mola naoh mofa'am mofe' akata. Afa' wame' basef ananimi wanda'am na'ama, dei' afa' hiafai wafe' be'efa wataga waitu naoh akata.
Afa' wafe' wataga andeande' akata, ea' wame' esis sa'i ailan anama Malta.
Epes sape wambel anamai sanda'mafa waf bu'unai endilisi. Asaf nalai ea' nomanamb mafa. Ea' sakata nif sa'ipa afa' hiafai wafe' wapoma nif.
Ea' Pol nafe' nafela nif nawamonam. Ea' anona yul nahasi nape nif mahi'ana nawisi ande' nona' lagel Poli nalelef yuli mawis nomon.

Ea' esis amam nematawa wambelisi sati yul anama nana' lagel Poli nail, esis sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anama naha epes saga'i. Anan ina afuna naoh embel, owa'. Ea' god anama ape'inai nagwa waf andeande'i nandaiwa'ma nope ambal namunai wapoti.”
Ea' Pol niali' lagel yul pele'atana nafe' nowala nasef nif ea' anan ina awesina, owa'.

Ea' esis sape sahafana sa'i siti lagel nolata ea' anan nowa afuna, owa'. Esis sape satolona ea' ina sati anom amamamaga matagamana, owa'. Ea' samboma ukup sa'i basef sa'i, “Ahalomafa, Pol anon anona dembinai god.”

Etap nape felefele'ma anama afa' wapoma etap anama anona aman dembinai numafi esis sape ailan anamai, agilinama Publius. Aman anama nofa'afa wafe' ipat ananinai numafiafa andeande' wape walomana nimeguf wanom.
Publius ahalomana awesina na'oh. Alop ananinai nifina ea' naka embel atom. Ea' Pol nafe' nasa lagel alop ananinai nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
Amama mataga ea', enis epes sape ailan anamai hiesi awes nanda'esi safi'mai anan nanda'masa beten sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
Ea' esis sase'afa amamaga bu'wami wa'i weafe', sase'afa amamaga hiami afa' leifamami ea' sofa'am sambe'mafam sip afa' weafi'anai.

Afa' ata' wape aomb wanom ailan anama. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' walata sip anama nail ailan anama nogota anama uf lu'unai naluwi. Sip anama Aleksandriai atona. Agilinama sa'i sahalomana owalomana amam atom mape mambap atona. Amam amama nogamana biam anona god baso'omunai Sus. Ea' afa' wakwahogon wafe'.
Wafe' wataga Sirakyus wape nimeguf wanom.
Wakwaha anama wafe' wataga Regium. Ama nemaf nagi'i uf lu'unai nalo nafi'i aon nowalama, ea' wataga anom basis Puteoli.
Wambel anama afa' wati enis Kristen. Ea' sa'ipafa wape walomas wik si'inai. Wape ea' wafe' Rom.

Esis Kristen sape Romi same' basefa afa' wafi'i, enis safi'i sotambel Maket wambel Apiusi, ea' enis safi'i sotambel wambel agel anama sa'i ifagw wanom sanda' fi'i fe' sapeimi. Ea' satolofa eaf. Pol nati esis, nandanifel nanifela God okom ananinai bo'ona.
Afa' wafe' wataga Rom, gavman Romunai na'i aho'ma Pol atona nope anona ipat noloma anona soldia numafiana nope la'ela'ef.

Nimeguf wenif mafe'ma ea', Pol nofalai amam agufumi Judai mafi'i mandatama etifigin. Ea' na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' ina anda' anom amamaga ahambombaga epes ape'isi ma esambala waf amam bafapapa ape'imi, owa'. Ea' amam dambami Judai manda' kalabusima ae' Jerusalem ea' manda'e afi'i lagof amam Romi.
Amam Rom mame' basefa kot ae'anai, ae' basefa waf aonai ofagema owa'etina moha ega'. Ea' ma'i motagahe.
Ea' amam Juda mosambala basef amama. Na'ama dei' ae' eaf a'e ma efe' wafifiwi. Ea' efala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nome' kot ae'anai. Ea' ae' ina enda' kotima epes ae'asi ma anom amamaga, owa'.

Basef ofagema amama atom dei' efalepa pafi'i. Ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef. Ae' embale'ef ape ehafa anan anama ape' Israel hiapai mape mohafanai. Ae' embale'efanai. Amama atom ofagema ma dei' manda' sen anama mowa'e.”
Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Anom Judaimi ina manda' anom basef mafi'i ma ma'ipafa ine', owa'. Ea' ina anona aman Judainai nafi'i nape na'ipafa andeande'ma na'i anom basef awami ma ine', owa'.
Ea' afa' wa'i ome' okom ine'inai atoma malogel ine'inai. Afa' ogawa, wambel hiagoma esis amam nematawa sanda' basef awami ma epes hiesi wambota anama.”

Ea' amam mandandepa anona nemafa amam hiami mafi'i ipat Poli. Ea' mafi'i kuhimbita mape mape mataga wambomota, anan na'i basef ofagema nawalipam. Ea' nawalapa basef alihima epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. Anan nawalapa anom basefa mi'uli fowa' gani God naso' Mosesanai maloma basef Godi amam profet fowa' ma'iami. Ama basef amama anan na'ipama basef la'ifimi nafela ukup amamumi ma mombale'efa Jisas.
Anom mombale'efana ma basef ananimi, ea' anom owa' mombale'efana.
Ea' ukup mape na'ama ea' mafe'. Do'ok Pol nali' na'ipama anom basef na'ama na'i, “Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'i endilisi etisa amam akupapa ape'imi ma malogel profet Aisaia. Fowa' anan na'i na'ama na'i,
‘Ine' fo'mago esis amam nematawa isima ni'ipas na'ama ni'i. Anona nemaf ipe' pepe peme' basef, ea' ipe' ina pegawa ofagema, owa'. Ipe' pepe naep motawa ea' ipe' ina piti anom amamaga pegawam, owa'.

Dei' main, ukup epes amam nematawa isima mase'as ea'. Ukup asasimi aoma some' basefa aligah asasimi, sasopama naep asasimi. I'i owa', esis siti amamaga ea' some' basef aligah asasimi ma ukup mopoma basef ofagema samboma opalef sotanima sifi'mai ae' ma enda' esis bo'wes wapoti', owa'.’ ”

Ea' Pol na'ipam basef akutaimi na'i, “Dei' ae' a'i ipe' pegawa basefa God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf aonai motanima mufi'mai anan. Amama anan nasapa'am mafe'ma esis amam nematawa sololama Godi. Esis isima nambimb sila basef amama, ea' ipe' owa'.”
Pol na'ipam basef amama, amam dambami Juda mafe'. Ea' ma'i basef lu'wami ma'iam mandahihianamam la'afena amam atom.
Amama mafe'ma ea', Pol nape la'ela'ef afagof biam si'im ipat anama anan natalonai ea' nase'as opaf nanda'mas waf bu'unai epes hiesi safi'i satolonai.

Anan nawalapa basef bu'wami ma epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. Ea' nawalipasa basefa dembinai Jisas Krais. Anan ina umbamahana, owa'. Nawalapam na'iam alihim ea' ina enin epen nafi'i na'ipana na'i owa'.
Ae' Pol ape owina Krais Jisas anda' maola anan atona. God nofale ma enda' maol aposel ea' nosahe'e ma ewalapa basef bu'wami ananimi.

Basef amama mape na'ama. Fowa' gani God nanda' basef la'ifimi ea' na'ipa amam profet Ananimi mawalipasam manda'am mail buk Godi. Basef amama ma'i Nogalomana ananinai, Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai. Anan nataga epen endilisinai nataga wambota aman dembinai king Deviti. Ea' dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapana alihina ma pepel Godi, anan Nogalomana Ananinai endilisi. Ambal anama nafelona nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.
Lagof Jisasi atom God nagiambame nanda'e la'ifiwi anda' maol aposela afela agel Jisas Kraisi lu'una. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi sembale'efana sila basef ananimi.
Ipe' wapoti' pape paloma amam nematawa isima Kraisi. Ipe' pame' fala Jisas Kraisi ea' pailana pape Ananipei.

Ipe' epes Romipei, God okom nainailipa nofalepa pape amam nematawa Ananipei etipa. Ae' anda' basef amama mafi'mipei. Ae' a'i God Ahalomapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais migiambamepa monda'epa la'ifipa opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
Ae' a'i ata' ili' i'i basef amama. Ae' anifela God ae'anai ma agel Jisas Kraisi, anifelona ma ipe' wapoti'. Dei' main, esis etap gani hiagoma sa'i basef amama ma ipe' pembale'efana.

God nogawa maina nemaf anda' betenanai okom ae'anai napoma ipe' anda'mepa beten. Ae' anda' maol Godi aloma okom ae'anai si'ina awalipasa basef bu'wami ma Nogalomana ananinai. Beten ae'anai nape na'ama. Fowa' nimeguf hiami ahali'ana ma efo'o ietilipa. Owa'etin. Dei' wapoti' ahali'ana ma Anan ni'i awi, a'i nonda'me anona eaf efo'o ietilipa.
Ae' okom na'i endilisi ma anona nemaf efo'o ietilipa ma enda'epa petaga la'ifipa ease'epa anom amamaga bu'wami Ambal Godi nasi'ipam etini.
Amama na'ama. Ae' a'i bale'ef ae'anai nigiambama ipe' ea' bale'ef ipe'inai nigiambama ae' nenda' ae' etaga la'ifiwi. Amama monda'apa motaga la'ifipa opalef ape'imi na'ama etin.

Ae' a'i ipe' alupipei ata' pegawa nimeguf hiami ae' a'i efe'mago ipe' ea' afi'i ataga dei'. Ea' anom amamaga mahopa eafa ae'. Fowa' ae' agiambama enis epes owa' Judaisi sape anagoni sataga Kristen saitu la'ifis. Ea' dei' a'i ata' igiambama ipe' wapoti' si'i agiambama esis.

Ae' wiaf notaome ma igiambama epes hiesi sombale'efa Krais. Wiaf anama na'ama. Krais natalowe maol lu'unai dei' ae' egwamana igiambama epes isima hiesi ma sogawa waf bu'unai Godi. Epes gawaisi soloma isima gawa a'asi wapoti'.
Amama atom dei' opaf ae'anai nohafel endilisi ma ewalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma ipe' epes Romipei wapoti'.

Ae' ina umbamahe ambal aona ewalipasa basef bu'wami Godi, owa'. Ae' embale'efa basef amama bu'wami la'ifiwi endilisi. Dei' main, amama pepel Godi nofa' emi egafis seambale'efanai sotanimani. Esis Juda sembale'efana sali' ea' ipe' hipei owa' Judaipei pagi'.

Dei' main, basef amama bu'wami Godi ma'ipapa waf bu'unai ananinai. Anama na'ama. I'i ape' mombale'efa Jisas la'ifipa endilisi, God ni'i ape' bo'wepa andeande'. Ina anona eafa ape' meataga bo'wepa andeande' ma naep ananimi, owa'etin. Bale'ef atona. Eaf si'i Baibel na'i, “Emi egafis sembale'efa Godi, Anan ni'i esis bu'wasi andeande' sope namusi la'ela'ef.”

Dei' owagama wapoti' okom numbutinai Godi nape nafi'i heven notaga nondawalap alihina ma waf hianai aonai epes sanda'anai. Anan nogwamasa nimanimi lu'wami ma epes isima hiesi sowa' alafugaha waf bu'unai Ananinai sanda' waf aonai dei' sahagofa basef endilisimi Ananimi.
Dei' main, waf hianai Godi ina nandambaho', owa'. Maina waf dende' ma gawa epesi God nihi'ambasana nataga alihina nandawalap.

Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' amamaga hiami mataga nogota anama nafi'i nataga dei', esis sati amamaga anan nanda'ami. Amamaga amama esis wilama sogawa ma anona waf hianai Godi esis owa' la'ifisa seatolona naepi. Amama na'ama. Esis satolona endilisi waf Godi ofagena, Anan Dembinai nikila' amam dambami hiami mape etapi. Esis sati waf anama naloma pepel lu'unai Ananinai nape la'ela'ef. Ea' amama atom dei' esis ina anona eafa sondahali' sombaho'a waf aonai esis sanda'anai sie'i, “Afa' owa' ogawae.” Owa'etin.

Esis sogawa God nape ea' esis ina sogawa sa'i Anan bu'unai endilisi ma sosa'ma agel Ananinai lu'una o sinifelona, owa'. Ukup asasimi mapoma amamaga falafumi atom ea' opalef asasimi ina mataga andeande', owa'. Mataga aom endilisi.
Esis aligah maso'as sa'iam sa'i, “Ape' mogawai,” ea' esis sataga ukup mahaga magaola waf bu'unai.

Ea' sase'ana alafugaha God owa' neaga'i naloma agel lu'unai Ananinai. Esis ina sanda' lotumana sanifelona, owa'. Sambala lawah maim falafumi atom mataga god baso'omainai asasinai mandati si'i amiguf, mafis, iguf maim maloma epes owa' seape namusi la'ela'efi, ea' sanda' lotumam sanifelom.
Esis sandaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugahana. Amama atom dei' Anan nakwaha esis ea' ukup asasimi mohafel la'ifim manda'as sanda' waf hianai aonai. Sanda so'a waol sahambombaga alop asasinai.

Dei' main, esis ukup maso'asa basef Godi endilisimi ea' sagi'ma basef baso'maimi atom maho'ofa basef endilisimi Ananimi. Ea' sanda' lotuma amamaga amama God nanda'ami, ea' Anan, sesambalona. God Anan bu'unai ofagonama amamaga amama hiami, ape' mafela agel ananinai lu'una la'ela'ef endilisi.

Ea' God nakwaha esis saila ukup epesi atoma sanda' waf aonai ambagof aomanai. Sanda' waf anama aonai naho'ofa waf daso'amainai. Nematawa waila waf ikiakanai waloma anowa nematawa. Anom amam wapoti' manda'am na'ama etin. Ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi maimaila anom amam malomam monda' waf aonai. Ea' waf anama nahambombaga ukup maloma alop amamunai mandahama waf aonai amam manda'anai.
Ukup asasimi atom sandaiwa'ma sembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nape natilis saila ukup awami asasimi atoma sanda' waf naninani aonai owa' andeande'ma epes seanda'anai.

Esis sanda' waf hianai naninani aonai nape si'ina ma esis. Ukup mohafel maimaila sofa' amamaga hiami ma esis etis. Waf aonai agufuma anama. Ukup kowalepa amamaga bu'wami awami, ukup aoma soha enis epes, saha enis epes saga', migimigah sambaso'ama sofa' anom amamaga enis epesi ea' sanda' maola saha epes. Waf anama aonai asi'ina endilisi ma esis. Ea' sanda'ipama sa'i basef sawalapama sola'masa basef enis epes ma naep epes hiesi. Esis sataga naumbih saloma God, sa'i basef la'ifimi safela agof asasimi atom. Ukup mandanda' ma waf naninani aonai dambainai. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi.
Esis ina sagawa waf bu'unai ea' sa'i basef andeande', ea' ina saila basef amama asasimi andeande', owa'. Esis ina ukup maimaila enis epes satilis uwahipis, owa'.

Basefa mi'uli Godi bu'unai na'ama na'i, “Epes sanda' waf na'amainai esis soga'.” Epes isima sogawa mi'uli anama, owa'etin. Sanda' waf anama aonai atona. Ea' ina sanda'ana etin, owa'. Safela agofa enis epes sanda' waf anama aonai sandanifamas.

Ipe' emi egafipa pa'i enis epes sanda' waf aonai, ofagema ipe'imi atom. Peme', ipe' pa'i basef na'ama, ipe' wapoti' panda'am si'i esis sanda'am. Dei' main, isima ipe' pa'i basef na'ama, ipa panda' waf aonai si'i pa'i esis sanda'anai.
Ape' mogawa God anona nemaf nonda' kotima epes sanda' waf anama aonai ma basef endilisimi atom.

Ipe' emi egafipa pa'i enis epes sanda' waf naninani aonai, ipe' wapoti' panda' waf anama. Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Ipe' anona nemaf la'ifipama pindihi'ama basef God nonda' kotimasami pefa' pefe'? Owa'etin.

God nanda'epa andeande' endilisi, ea' ata' nape nohafepa nogota launai, ina nagwamepa waf aonai nase'epa nimanimi ulal, owa'. Waf anama bu'unai Godi ipe' ukup ma'i falafunai? Anan nanda'mepa waf anama bu'unai ma ata' pemboma opalef. A'i ipe' pegawa amama?

Ipe' pesambala basefi, dei' ina ata' pamboma opalef, owa'. Ipe' petagama nimanimi lu'wami mupei'ipa. Ama nemaf okom wandafunai Godi notaga alihina ma kot nowaloga epes hiesi ma basef endilisimi ananimi.
“Nemaf anama anan nowalogamasa waf epesi atona etin, nogwamasana nondahama waf esis sanda'anai.”
Enis epes sape la'ifis la'ela'efa waf bu'unai sagolopa eafa sofa' agof lu'wami, siti nafifili ma sope andeande' la'ela'ef. Epes isima God anona nemaf nonda'as sope andeande' la'ela'ef.
Ea' enis ukup mapoma esis etis sowa' alafugaha basef endilisimi saila waf aonai. Epes isima anona nemaf God okom wandafuna endilisi nindaiwa'masa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
Epes isima hiesi sanda' waf aonai anona nemaf nimanimi lu'wami motagamas. Esis Juda sili' ea' isima owa' Judaisi wapoti' sigi' solomas.
Ea' God anona nemaf nose'asa pe bu'unai ma nafifili noloma agof lu'wami moloma opalef awanemi epes isima hiesi sanda' waf bu'unai. Esis Juda sili' ea' isima owa' Judaisi sigi'.
Dei' main, Anan nowaloga epes hiesi ma ikwaf bu'unai atona.

Anan okom na'i na'ama. Emi egafis owa' seagawa mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, esis sanda' waf aonai, anona nemaf higililas. Ea' epes Juda sogawa mi'uli anama ea'i ma dei' sanda' waf aonai, anona nemaf nowalogasa mi'uli anama atona.
Ina epes isima same' mi'uli etini sataga bo'wes andeande'ma naep Godi, owa'. Emi egafis same' basefa saila mi'uli anama, amama atom anona nemaf God ni'i esis bo'wes andeande'.

Epes isima ina Judaisi, waf asasinai na'ama. Esis mi'uli a'as, ea' maina nemaf saila basef mape nomon opalef asasimi, waf anama nataga si'i mi'uli asasinai. Esis mi'uli Godi a'as, ea' endilisi saila waf anama ma opalef asasimi.

Waf anama asasinai nihi'ambapa basefa mi'uli anama mape ukup asasimi. Ea' basef mape opalef asasimi nomon, amama wapoti' mihi'ambapa na'ama etin. Dei' main, ukup asasimi ma'iam mihi'ambas alihim na'ama. Anom nimeguf manda' kotimasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ea' anom nimeguf ukup asasimi ma'i andeande' na'ama etin si'i waf esis sanda'anai.

Amama anona nemaf motaga na'ama etina nemaf anama God nowaloga waf hianai epes hiesi sanda'anai. Nemaf anama Anan ni'i wila ma Jisas Krais nope dembinai nogwaloga waf hianai asasinai nandambahi'i noloma basef sa'iam sambahe'ami. Basef bu'wami Godi ae' awalapami amama atom.
Ipe' pefala pa'i ipe' Juda pembale'efa mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai la'ifipa nigiambamepa pihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi. Ea' ipe' pefela agof ipe'imi pa'i, “Ape' mogawa God endilisinai.”
Ea' ipe' pegawa okom God na'i penda'ana ma pila waf mi'uli anama ma ukup mi'i waf bu'unai pilana.
Ipe' pegawana pa'i ipe' epes pegawa basef Godi ma pi'ipa epes isima naep maso'asi ea' pape si'i nagwapina epes isima sape akoti ma pihi'ambas.

Ipe' epes gawaipei pawalipa isima gawa a'asi saloma enis epes owa' Judaisi sape si'i awasi ata' sa'wisi. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa pa'i basef endilisimi hiami maloma gawa hianai nape mi'uli anama pelafana pegawana.

Basef amama atom hiami mali'i dei' motanima mila ipe'. Ipe' pawalipa enis epes ea' ipe' owa' ata' pili' piwalipa ipe' etipa? Ipe' pawalipasa basef enis epes pa'i, “Ipe' ina penda' wal, owa'”, ea' ae' a'i ipe' wapoti' panda' wali?

Ipe' pawalipasa basef ma enis epes pa'i, “Ipe' ina pehambombaga waf daso'amainai, owa'.” Ea' ipe' wapoti' panda' waf anama aonai? Ipe' pandaiwa'ma god baso'omainai ea' pakowalopam amamaga ma'oh ifagw epes sanda' lotuma god anama baso'omainai.
Na'ama ina andeande', owa'.
Ipe' pefela agof ipe'imi atom lu'um pa'i, “Ape' mogawa mi'uli Godi fowa' naso' Mosesanai.” Ea' ipe' pimbisila' mi'uli anama panda' waf anama atona dei' pahambombaga agel Godi.
Waf ipe' panda'anai aona si'i basef mail buki ma'iam ma'i, “Ofagema ipe' Judai atom, dei' esis owa' Judaisi sa'i basef sanda' agel Godi findiwana.”

I'i ipe' Juda pembale'efa mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai pilana endilisi, waf anama patopa' alopanai bu'unai. Ea' i'i ipe' pimbisila' mi'uli anama, petaga si'i epes owa' Judaisi ea' petaga na'ama etin si'i ipe' owa' peatopa' alopi.
Epes isima owa' Judaisi seatopa'masa alopi, esis sape na'ama. I'i esis sila waf anama hianai bu'unai ma mi'uli anama, nambimb sogawa God sotaga si'i isima satopa'mas alopi ma naep Godi.

Endilisi esis owa' Judaisi nambimb sofa' basef mila ipe' Juda. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa mi'uli anama Godi nape buki ea' patopa' alop ipe'inai ea' pimbisila' mi'uli anama. Ea' esis isima owa' seatopa' alopi saila mi'uli anama.
I'i ipe' epes Judaipei patopa' alop atona, ipe' ina Juda endilisipei, owa'. Ea' waf anama patopa' alopanai ina waf endilisinai ma ipe', owa'.

Ipe' epes hipei Juda. I'i opalef ipe'imi motaga dambaim, ipe' Juda endilisipei. Waf patopa' alopanai, God nanda'ana opalef ipe'imi nomon. Amama ina matagama basefa mi'uli nail buki, owa'. Ambal Godi atona nanda'am. Emi egafis senda'am na'ama, esis agof a'asa naep epesi. Ea' esis agof lu'uma naep Godi atom.
Dei' esis Juda sikila' enis epes owa' Judaisi ma maina waf bu'unai? Maina waf bu'unai natagama waf anama satopa' alopanai?
Waf bu'unai hianai natagamana. Waf nali'i anama. God nali' nase'asa basef Ananimi endilisimi atom esis Juda ma sumafiam silam.
Endilisi, enis ina sombale'efa basef amama andeande'. Ea' dei' ata' si'i main? A'i waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai anona nemaf nonda' God nokwaha basef endilisimi Ananimi?
Owa'etin. Ape' mi'i basef mi'i, epes hiesi sambaso'ami, ea' God atona na'i basef endilisimi la'ela'ef nanda' maol andeande' si'i Baibel na'iam,
“Amam nematawa hiesi seme' basef ine'imi si'i endilisimi atom. Nemaf anama enis epes si'i sonda'mena basef, ine' nikila'as.”

Dei' i'ipipa anom basef ape' epes ukup ma'iami. Basef amama na'ama. Dei' ata' mama? I'i waf aonai ape' manda'anai nawalapa waf bu'unai Godi nataga alihina, ape' nambimb mi'iam mi'imama? Mi'i God nanda' waf aonai okom wandafunai nogwamapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai? Owa'etin. I'i God nonda' waf aonai, dei' Anan nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai ma main? Owa'etin.

Enis epes ukup ma'i etin sambaso'am sa'i na'ama sa'i, “I'i epes hiesi siti waf aonai ape' manda'anai noloma waf Godi endilisinai ma sowalogana, sogawa waf Godi nikila' waf ape' manda'anai. Ea' waf ape' manda'anai nawalapa agel Godi lu'una. Ea' na'ama God ina nambimb nogwamapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai, owa'.” Owa'etin. Epes isima sambaso'ami.
I'i ape' mila basef amama baso'maimi, mefe' mefe' mi'i,
“Awi, ape' monda' waf aonai ma muwalapai waf bu'unai Godi.”
Endilisi, enis epes sambaso'am sa'i basef findiwama ae' sa'i ae' a'iam na'ama. Owa'etin. Epes isima sa'i basef amama, anona nemaf God nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.

Dei' si'i main? Basef amama do'okimi ma'i main? Ma'i ape' Juda mikila' enis epes owa' Judaisi ma waf bu'unai? Owa'etin. Ae' ihi'ambepa basef ea', waf aonai nase'ala ape' hiapai, esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
Baibel na'i na'ama na'i,
“Ina enin epen bo'wen andeande' nape, owa'etin.
Ina enin epen negawa waf bu'unai. Ina enin epen nanda' maol nagolopa God, owa'.
Epes hiesi sololama eaf bu'unai sataga epes sanda' waf aonai. Ina enin epen nanda' waf bu'unai, owa'. Ina enin atitin bo'wen.

Malogof asasimi mandahama si'i hi'agilif sawa epes saga'i, mindihianama alihim mape. Esis sa'i basef hiami baso'maimi maloma basef hiami mamumami ma sahambombaga enis epes si'i numbut nape igufi naha epes saga'i.
La'ela'ef ukup asasimi wandafum endilisi sa'i basef awami atoma sase'a nimanimi enis epes.
Esis mehip saha enis epes saga'.
La'ela'ef sahambombaga epes hiesi sase'asa nimanimi hiami.
Opalef asasimi ina mape awanem seape opalef atifim soloma enis epes, owa'.
Esis ina ukup maimaila God umbamahasana ma saila waf Ananinai, owa'.”

Ea' dei' ape' mogawa maim basef Godi mape mi'uli Anan fowa' naso' Mosesanai na'i ape' Juda mope owina mi'uli anama milana. Ea' ina la'ifipa mailana andeande', owa'. Ea' ina enin epen la'ifina ni'i, “Ae' epen bu'uwei andeande',” owa'etin. Ape' epes hiapai ganima hiagoma, ofagema mapoma ape' ma naep Godi anona nemaf nowaloga ape' nowalapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
Dei' main, waf anama maila mi'uli anama, owa' enin epen atitin anona nemaf nefa' agel epen bu'unai andeande' ma naep Godi, owa'. Mi'uli anama nihi'ambapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai.

Ea' dei' waf bu'unai Godi nataga alihiguma nandawalap. Anama ina nataga nagi'ma waf saila mi'uli fowa' gani God naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Anama nataga anona eaf na'ama. Basef hiami Godi mail buki mawalapai waf anama. Anom mail mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ea' anom amam profet hiami manda'anai.

Waf anama na'ama. Emi egafis sembale'efa Jisas Kraisi, isima God nofalas na'i epes bu'wasi. Ea' ape' epes hiapai mombale'efa Kraisi, God nanda'apa na'ama etin, esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
Ape' epes hiapai manda' waf aonai mumbisila' mi'uli Godi ea' ina la'ifipama anona nemaf muti mafifili bu'unai Ananinai, owa'.

Ea' God nati ape' uwahipipa nandahomapa. Ape' mombale'efa Krais Jisas ea' God na'i ape' epes bu'upai. Ape' ina mase'ana anom amamaga matalona, owa'. Anan nagiambamapa ma Krais Jisas ea' natagahepa natalapa ma mape wafifipa.

God nihi'ambasana Krais Jisas alihina ma amam nematawa hiesi na'ama. Anan naga' esimbel ananimi malo mali'amona okom wandafunai Godi ma nakwaha waf aonai emi egafis sembale'efanai. Ga' Krais Jisasi atona dei' God nihi'ambapa waf bu'unai na'ama. Fowa' nanda' esis amam nematawa sa'osa'ombemas ea' ina nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.

Anan nanda'am na'ama ma nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ma dei' nihi'ambapa waf bu'unai ananinai nataga alihiguma. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa Anan bu'unai endilisi na'i emi egafis sembale'efa Jisasi sataga epes bu'wasi.

Ea' dei' ape' eaf a'apa ma mefela agof ape'imi atom lu'um, owa'. Eaf anama ea' naso'. Main de'im mahefa eaf anama? A'i waf anama maila mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai? Owa'etin! Waf mombale'efa Jisasanai atona nahopa eaf anama.
Ape' mogawa emi egafis sembale'efa Jisas atona, God na'i esis sataga epes bu'wasi andeande'. Ea' esis ina saila mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, owa'.
Dei' mama? A'i God Anan Dembinai esis Judai atona? Owa'etin. Anan Dembinai esis isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.

Dei' main, God anan anama atona. Anan na'i basef atifim mafe'ma epes hiesi. Emi egafis sembale'efa Krais Jisasi, nambimb God ni'i esis epes bu'wasi andeande, esis Juda saila waf satopa' alopanai saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
Amama atom dei' bale'ef anama ape' ina mi'i ape' matopa' basefa mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ape' mombale'efa Krais Jisas dei' mawalapa basef ofagema ma mi'uli anama.
Ape' mi'i basefa Abraham akunamapa ape' Judai mi'imama? Anan nanda' maina God na'i anan epen bu'unai?
Endilisi Abraham ina nataga epen bu'unai ma nanda' maol bu'unai, owa'. Ea' ina nafela agel ananinai lu'una ma naep Godi, owa'. Anan nembale'efa God na'i epen bu'unai.
Baibel na'iam na'imama? Na'iam na'ama na'i, “Abraham nombale'efa God ea' God nati bale'ef ananinai na'i anan epen bu'unai.”
Ape' mogawa epes sanda' maoli ma sofa' amamaga ma maol sanda'anai, amamaga amama ina mi'iam mi'i mofa'am etin si'i presen, owa'. Amama amamaga satopa' maolami.

Na'ama God ina nati maol bu'unai epes sanda'anai ma ni'i esis epes bu'wasi, owa'. Anan nati emi egafis sembale'efana la'ifisi ma nefalas sanda' waf aonai sataga epes bu'wasi. Ea' God nati bale'ef asasinai dei' na'i esis epes bu'wasi.
Fowa' Devit wapoti' nanda' anom basef mail buk Baibela emi egafis God natilis na'i epes bu'wasi, isima sandanifel. Esis ina sanda' maol, owa'. Sembale'efana etin dei' na'i esis epes bu'wasi.
Devit nanda' basef amama na'i,
“Emi egafis God nakwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai, epes isima sandanifel.
Emi egafis Dembinai owa' okom nopoma waf aonai esis sanda'anai isima sandanifel.”
Epes isima Devit na'i sandanifel, epes isima satopa' alopi etis? Owa'etin. Isima owa' seatopa' alopi wapoti'. Dei' main, do'ok ae' a'ipipa Baibel na'i na'ama na'i,
“Abraham nembale'efa God ea' God nati bale'ef ananinai na'i anan epen bu'unai.”
Dei' Abraham nape na'imama God okom napomana na'i epen bu'unai? Anan nali' natopa' alop ea' o ata' owa' neatopa' alop? Anan ina dei' natopa' alopa God na'i anan epen bu'unai, ata' owa'.
Fowa' gani Abraham nali' nembale'efa God nofalana epen bu'unai. Ea' nagi' natopa' alop.

Ea' anan akunamas epes isima Juda satopa' alopi wapoti'. Ea' esis ina satopa' alop atona, owa'. Esis saila bo'wagah Abrahami sombale'efa God si'i fowa' anan nembale'efana nogota anama ata' owa' neatopa' alop.
Fowa' gani God na'i basef endilisimi atom naloma Abraham na'i, “Ae' anona nemaf ese'ena etap hiagoma ine' neloma esis bafasena akusena ine'isi wapoti'.”

Na'ama Abraham ina naila mi'uli anama God na'i noso' Mosesanai ma dei' na'i basef endilisimi nalomana na'ipana basef amama, ata' owa'. Abraham nali' nembale'efa God dei' nofalana epen bu'unai na'ipana basef amama.

Anom basef ma'ipapa amama mali'i na'ama ma'i, I'i epes sila mi'uli Godi ma sofa' amamaga amama God nease'asami, anona nemaf waf anama mombale'efa Godi nowala ea' basef endilisimi amama God na'iam nalomas wapoti' owa' la'ifim, owa'.

Dei' main, mi'uli anama nawalapa okom wandafunai Godi ma nose'as nemanimi isima sosambala basefa mi'uli anama. I'i ape' owa' mila basefa mi'uli anama, God okom wandafunai napomapa. I'i mi'uli anama owa', God ina ni'i epes sumbisila' mi'uli anama satopa'ana, owa'.

Abraham nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' God na'ipana basef amama endilisimi atom bu'wami ma ape' mogawa endilisi God na'ipas basef amama wapoti' na'i ape' hiapai bafalomapa Abrahami, nase'apam etin si'i presen. Ina nase'asa epes isima saila mi'uli anama atona, owa'. Emi egafis sembale'efa God na'ama etin si'i Abrahami, esis wapoti'. Anan nali' nembale'efa God nataga bafalomapa nali' endilisi ma ape' hiapai emi egafipa dei' magi' membale'efa God.
Si'i Baibel na'i, God fowa' gani na'ipa Abraham na'i,
“Ae' enda'ena nepe bafalomasa epes hiesi.”
Abraham anan bafalomapa ape'inai ma naep Godi. Anan nembale'efa God atona nase'asa ambal namunai epes saga'i, ea' nofala amamaga hiami ata' owa' meatagai si'i mataga mape ea'.
Abraham ina dei' nati amamaga amama God na'ipanam na'i neanda'ami. Ea' anan nembale'ef endilisi si'i natolom ea'. Amama atom dei' nataga
“Bafalomas esis amam nematawa hiesi.”
Si'i fowa' God na'iam na'i,
“Anona nemaf owagama epes hiesi wambota ine'inai sotaga na'ama.”

Abraham hagona felefele'ma afagof 100-peleim, alop ananinai nowafa si'i naga'i. Ea' waulu'mana Sara hage'w wapoti' asa'w ina la'ifikwa kola awasi, owa'. Abraham okom napoma amama, ea' bale'ef ananinai ina nowala, owa'. Anan nembale'ef la'ifina ma basef God na'i endilisimi nalomana ma amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Bale'ef atona nanda'ana la'ifina ea' nafela agel Godi lu'una.
Anan nembale'efa God endilisi ma nogawa Anan la'ifinai ma nonda'am na'ama si'i fowa' na'i nonda'ama basef amama endilisimi.
Amama atom God okom napoma bale'ef ananinai ea' na'i, “Anan epen bu'unai.”
Fowa' anona profet nanda' basef amama mape Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, “God okom napoma anan epen bu'unai.”
Amam profet ina manda' basef amama ma Abraham atona, owa'.
Manda'ama ape' wapoti'. Ape' membale'efa God nafela Jisas Dembinai ape'inai nohafel hi'agif. Amama atom God nati bale'ef ape'inai ea' na'i ape' epes bu'upai.
God nasapa' Jisas nafi'i naga'ma nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Ea' nafelona hi'agifa na'i ape' epes bu'upai.
Basef ofagema mape mali'i amama, bale'ef ape'inai atona dei' God nofalapa epes bu'upai. Amama atom dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nanda'apa mape opalef etifim awanem maloma God.

Anan atona eafa ape' mombale'efana mope nomona okom Godi nainaila ape' endilisi nandahomapa nefa'apai dei' mape andeande'. Ape' mogawa endilisi mape mohafa anona nemaf God nofa'apa mope molomana miti nafifili Ananinai. Bale'ef anama nanda'apa mandanifel ma amama.
Ape' ina mandanifela amama atom, owa'. Ape' mandanifela nimanimi meatagamapa wapoti'. Dei' main, ape' mogawa mofa'ama monda'apa la'ifipa.

I'i ape' mitu la'ifipama amamaga amama meagwamba ape'i, God ni'i aho'mapa. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa endilisi Anan naila basef ananimi andeande' ma nigiambamapa mope mohafa nafifili pepel ananinai anona nemaf neatagai.
I'i ape' mogawa endilisi na'ama, bale'ef ape'inai ina anona nemaf hegililana, owa'. Dei' main, God nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai ea' waf okom nainailapa nape lu'una opalef ape'imi.
Amama na'ama. Fowa' ape' ina la'ifipa ma monda' waf bu'unai, nogota anama God nandandepana Krais naga'ma ape' mowa' alafugaha Godi.

Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Enin epen na'i nega'ma nigiambama emi egalin na'i nila mi'uli Godi? A'i ina enis si'i a'e, owa'. Ea' i'i enin epen bo'wen endilisi, enin wila ma nega' nigiambama enin epen bu'wani.
Ape' ata' manda' waf aonai, Krais naga' nagiambamapa. Ea' dei' God nihi'ambapa okom lu'unai nainaila ape' nandawalap alihina.
Anan naga' esimbel ananimi malo dei' God nofalapa epes bu'upai. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa endilisi Krais natagahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi.

Fowa' ape' ata' mape naumbih Godi, ea' dei' nanda'apa mataga alupipai ananipai opalef etifim malomana. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma Nogalomana Ananinai naga'ma ape'. Amama atom dei' ape' mape alupipai Godi mogawa endilisi Krais nape namona ma anona nemaf nofa'apa motanimani mofe' molomana mope.

Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Ape' mandanifel ma God. Dei' main? Fowa' ape' mape naumbih Ananipai ea' dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nali'amona naumbih ape'imi nanda'apa mataga alupipai malomana. Ea' dei' mandanifel ma Anan.

Ape' mogawa amama. Aman atotona nali' nanda' waf aonai, dei' waf aonai nape opalef amam nematawa etapasi hiesi. Ea' dei' waf aonai nefa'ai ga' nafi'i, dei' ga' naha epes hiesi saga'. Dei' main, epes hiesi sanda' waf aonai.

Fowa' gani nogota anama God ata' owa' nose'anai mi'uli Ananinai Moses, waf aonai nali' nataga nape etap anae'. I'i basefa mi'uli anama owa'etin, dei' God ina nawaloga epesa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.

Ea' ga' nataga nape nogota anama Adami nafi'i nataga nogota Mosesi. Epes isima hiesi ina sogawa mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ea' ga' natagamas saga' hi'alas. Fowa' God nase'ana mi'uli Ananinai Adam, ea' Adam natopa'ana. Enis epes ina satopa'ana si'i Adam natopa'ana, owa'. Ea' ga' natagamas saga' wapoti'. Aman anama Adam nanda' ikwafa aman anona nemaf neatagai.

Waf God nandahomapa anai ma Jisas Krais naloma waf aonai Adam nanda'anai ina na'ama etin, owa'. Aman anama Adam atotona nanda' waf aonai, dei' nanda' epes hiesi saga'. Ea' God nandahomapa, waf anama nataga lu'una endilisi ma aman atotona Jisas Krais. Ea' ape' dei' mofa' amamaga amama presen Godi nikila' ga' anama ea' nataga lu'una endilisi ma nandahoma epes hiesi.

Waf bu'unai God nandahomapa anai anama ina nape etifigin naloma waf aonai aman anama atotona nanda'anai, owa'. Aman anama nanda' waf atotona aonai. Ea' God nawalogapa epes hiapai na'i, “Ipe' awepa hi'alepa endilisi.”
Ape' manda' waf aonai hianai ea' God okom nainailapa nandahomapa na'i ape' epes bu'upai.

Aman anama atotona nanda' waf aonai. Amama atom dei' ga' nataga ma epes hiesi ma aman anama atona. Ea' maol aman anama atotona Jisas Krais nanda'anai lu'una endilisi nikila' ga' ma nagiambama epes isima hiesi. Epes isima owagama sope namisi ma sope dembesi si'i king. Epes isima God nandahomas endilisi.
Dei' ape' mape na'ama. Fowa' waf aonai atotona nanda' ape' hiapai higilalapa. Ea' na'ama etin waf bu'unai atotona natagahepa ma waf aonai nanda'apa dei' mape namepa.
Aman atotona nosambala basef Godi dei' ape' hiapai mape manda' waf aonai. Ea' na'ama etin aman bu'unai atotona naila basef amama andeande' dei' ape' hiapai mataga epes bu'upai ma naep Godi.

Ea' mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai natagama esis sogawa waf esis sanda'anai aona satopa' mi'uli anama. Ea' esis ina sakwaha waf anama aonai, owa'. Sanda'ana hianai endilisi. Ea' eaf God nandahomasanai nataga lu'una endilisi ma esis.

Fowa' waf aonai nataga lu'una ma ape' hiapai dei' maga'. Ea' dei' waf God nandahomapa anai nikila' waf anama aonai. Anan nandahomapa ea' nofalapa amam nematawa bu'upai ma mofa' ambal namunai nape la'ela'ef ma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais.
Enis epes sambaso'mas sa'i na'ama. Sa'i ape' monda' waf aonai la'ela'ef ma waf God nandahomapanai notaga lu'una. Ape' mi'iam na'ama o owa'?
Owa'etin. Waf aonai atotona, dei' ape' maga'. Dei' maina ape' ata' monda' waf aonai atona? Owa'etin, hapainai.
Ipe' pegawa ape' emi egafipa mofa' baptaisa mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais mofa' baptaisa ga' Ananinai.

Baptais anama ape' la'ifipa maloma ga' Jisasi, God nawapa maloma Krais hi'agif. Pepel bu'unai Ahalomanai atona nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif. Ea' na'ama etina ape' mohafel wapoti' mape la'ifipa manda' waf dambainai ma ambal namunai etap anae'.
Ape' la'ifipa maloma Kraisa ga' anama ananinai si'i Anan naga'. Ea' na'ama etin anona nemaf ape' motaga la'ifipa mohafel wapoti' molomana.

Ape' mogawa opalef apimi ape'imi maga' mail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai maloma Krais ea' God natofa waf aonai nanda' maol nape alop ape'inai. Amama atom dei' ape' ina mape owina waf aonai wapoti', owa'.
Dei' main, anona aman naga'i, ina ata' nape owina waf aonai wapoti', owa'.
Ape' maga' maloma Krais. Ea' mogawa endilisi aona nemaf mope ambal namunai molomana wapoti'.
Ape' mogawa God nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif. Amama atom Anan ina anona nemaf noga' wapoti', owa'. Ga' ina la'ifina natofa Anan, owa'.
Anan naga' nemaf atotona ma waf aonai ape' manda'anai ea' ma'um. Ga' anama atona Anan nahambombaga pepel anama ma waf aonai nafe' hi'alana. Anan dei' nape ambal namunai naila okom Godi atona.
Ea' na'ama etina ipe' wapoti' ukup mopoma ipe' pakwaha waf aonai si'i epes saga'i. Ipe' ukup mopoma ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas pape namipei paloma God.
Ipe' ina pi'i aho'ma waf aonai nope notaga la'ifina numafi ipe', owa'. Na'ama waf anama aonai nohonde'epa ea' pila waf alop atonai.

Ipe' ina pese' lagof bo'wagah ipe'imi mefe'ma penda' waf aonai, owa'. Pese' ipe' pefe'ma God atona moloma ukup ipe'imi hi'ilama anan atona si'i epes sotanima sohafel hi'agif wapoti' sape namisi. Ipe' pese'ana alop wa'ana hi'ilana Goda penda' waf bu'unai.

Ipe' pegawa waf aonai ina ata' nape lu'unama ipe' wapoti', owa'. Dei' main, ipe' dei' ina ata' pape owina mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ma pilana, owa'. Ipe' pape owina waf Godi atona okom nainailapa ma nandahomapa.

Ea' dei' ape' ata' monda'am mi'imama? Ape' ina mape owina mi'uli anama God fowa naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ape' dei' mape owina waf anama God nandahomapa etin. Ea' dei' ape' monda' waf aonai? Owa'etin endilisi!

I'i ipe' pese' ipe' etipa penda' maol pepe owina aman emi, ipe' la'ifipa ma pilana. I'i ipe' pese' opalefa waf aonai, ipe' pape owina waf anama nonda'epa pega'. Ea' i'i ipe' pese' opalefa waf bu'unai pepe owina God petaga bu'upei ma naep ananimi.
Endilisi, fowa' ipe' pape owina waf aonai nanda'epa panda'ana. Ea' God nanda'epa pape owina basef ananimi pailam ea' pase'ana opalef hi'alama paila basef amama ipe' pefa'ami. Ea' ape' manifela God.
Anan natagahepa ma pepel waf aonai, dei' pataga epes panda' maol pape owina waf bu'unai natagahepa ma waf aonai.

Ukup ipe'imi ina dei' la'ifim, owa'. Amama atom dei' aila ukup ape' epesi a'iam alihim a'i. Fowa' ipe' ata' pase' alop ipe'inai wa'ana pape owina waf aonai naninani naloma waf hianai sosambala mi'uli Godi ea' nandepa panda'ana. Ea' dei' peso' alop wa'ana hi'ilana pepe owina waf bu'unai ma pepe epes Godi etipa.
Fowa' ipe' ata' pape owina waf aonai, nogota anama ipe' ata' pape peloloma waf bu'unai.
Ipe' pefa' amamaga maim bu'wami ma waf aonai fowa' panda'anai, ma dei' ipe' ambagof aoma waf anama? Owa'etin. Waf anama nawalapai ga' atona.

Ea' dei' God natagahepa ma waf aonai nanda'epa pape panda' maola anan pape owina anan la'ela'ef. Maol anama nola gwa'aimi amama. Ipe' pepe bo'wepa ananipei etipa ma pefa' ambal namunai pepe andeande' la'ela'ef.

Waf aonai nagwamasa awami ma isima sanda' maola waf aonai. Awami amama. Esis anona nemaf soga' etin higililas. Ea' God dei' nase'apai presen bu'unai etin, anama ambal namunai nape la'ela'efi ma mope la'ifipa moloma Krais Jisas.
