Ae' a'i esapa'ana nefe'mago ipe' ma atuwasi pegawa afa' wape na'ae wape wa'imama ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa.
Ae' a'i God Ahalomepa naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais monda'ago opalef ipe' alupipei hipei pepe etifigin peloma God. Ea' a'i amam mese'epago waf anama ukup maimailasanai neloma bale'ef bu'unai wapoti'.

Ea' a'i God nigiambamepago na'a nonda' epes isima emi egafis ukup maimaila Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai la'ela'efi sotaga la'ifis. Waf epes isima ukup maimailasanai anama nape la'ela'ef owa' hi'ilanae.
Ea' ma'um.

Ae' Pol aloma Timoti afa' biafa Krais Jisasi atofa wanda' opeh ananimi. Wanda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa Godi pape Filipai. Basef amama mafe'ma ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas paloma agufumi ipe'imi maloma amam magiambamam wapoti'.
Afa' biafa wa'i God Ahalomapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais migiabamepa na'a monda'epa petaga la'ifipa monda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
Maina nemaf ae' okom napoma ipe', anifela God ae'anai ma ipe'.
Ae' endanifela maina nemaf anda' betena ipe' hipei.
Dei' main, ipe' panda' waf bu'unai pagiambame awalipasa basef bu'wami Godi. Fowa' damba damba ipe' pame' basef amama bu'wami pembale'ef pandao'oma pape la'ela'ef palome pafi'i pafi'i pataga dei'.
Ea' ae' egawa endilisi, God nafela opeh bu'wami nomon opalef ipe'imi, anona nemaf nonda'am nefe' nefe' nembefam nemaf anama Krais Jisas niefi'ianai.

Ae' ahapila ipe' okom ae'anai, egawa God nigiambamepa dei' anona nemaf wapoti' na'ama etin. Amama andeande'. Dei' main, ape' manda'kolas etin manda' opeh ananimi. Nemaf anae' dei' ape kalabus o nimeguf hiami ali' awalapa basef amama bu'wami epes hiesi agiambamasa sogawa basef amama endilisimi atom, nimeguf amama hiami God nagiambamapa na'a.
Ae' a'iam endilisi ma naep Godi. Anan nogawa dahowe Krais Jisasi nafela ae' ea' okom nohafel endilisi nainailipa ma iti ipe' hipei.
Ae' anda' betena ipe' a'i ipe' ukup mimila God pendao'oma pila sahin owan hiesi ma waf anama nataga lu'una ma ipe' neloma gawa hianai neloma nomonas bu'wami pegawa basef Godi andeande'.
Anda' betena nambimb pewaloga waf hianai andeande' pegawa maina waf bu'unai o aonai. Ama nemaf Krais niefi'ianai pepe bo'wepa ofagema a'epa ma naep Godi.
Ae' anda' betena waf bu'unai Jisas Krais nawalapanai nambimb nepe si'ina ma ipe', nese'ana agel lu'unai Goda epes hiesi siti pepel nafifili Ananinai.
Alupipei, dei' a'i ipe' pegawa amamaga mali' matagama ae' ma anda' kalabus, ina masopama basef bu'wami Godi, owa'. Amama manda'am mafe' lu'um endilisi ma hiesi seme'am.
Ea' soldia amama Romi mumafi ipat dembinai gavmani maloma enis epes sape na'ae esis wapoti' sogawa anda' kalabusa agel Kraisi.
Esis sahin owan hiesi ukup mapoma ae' anda' kalabus. Ea' opalef asasimi la'ifim sape la'ifisa Dembinai, sakwaha umbamahas dei' saitu la'ifis la'ela'ef sikila' fowa' sape sawalapa basef Godi.
Endilisi, enis epes kowalasa ae' efa' agel aposel ma'i mofa' agof lu'wami sowalapa basef Kraisi. Ea' enis epes saitu la'ifis sa'i sonda' waf bu'unai sagiambame ma owalapa basef bu'wami Kraisi.
Isima sogawa ae' ape na'ae ma anda' basef bu'wami Godi mataga la'ifim. Ea' esis ukup maimaili sawalapa basef bu'wami.

Ea' epes isima kowalasa ae'i dei' sawalapa basef Kraisi. Esis ina ukup mohafel endilisi ma sanda' opeh sefela agel Kraisi, owa'. Esis sanda'am na'ama ma sefela agof asasimi atom. Sa'i sowatani anom nimanimi wapoti' ma ae' ape la'ela'ef anda' kalabus.

Ea' hapaiwei. I'i esis ukup mimila waf endilisimi ma sowalipasa basef Kraisi o i'i enis ukup mimila waf owa' endilisinai ma sowalipasam, andanifel alomas. Dei' main, sawalapa basef Kraisi atom. Ea' nambimb endanifel wapoti' ma amama. Ipe' penda' betena ae' ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi Jisas Kraisi nagiambame. Amama atom dei' egawa nambimb ekwaha kalabus.

Ae' okom na'i egawa endilisi nambimb ae' ina ambal aona ma ekwaha basef Godi, owa'. Dei' wapoti' ae' okom la'ifina ewalipasa basef Ananimi si'i fowa' anda'am. I'i epe namowe o ega', ae' okom na'i amamaga anda'am alop ae'anai nambimb mefela agel Kraisi lu'una.
Ofagema ma ape namowe na'ama. Ape namowe ma Krais atona. Ea' i'i ega', epe andeande' elomana efa' amamaga God nese'e pe bu'unai nikila' dei' ape.
I'i ata' epe namowe la'ela'ef etap anae', nambimb enda' opeh bu'wami Godi. Ea' ae' ata' ila maina eaf? Ae' ina egawa.
Ae' okom biefina anama. Ae' okom na'i efe' epe eloma Krais. Na'ama andeande' endilisi ikila' pe etapanai.
Ea' i'i ae' ata' epe etap anae', ae' la'ifiwi ma igiambamepa. Na'ama andeande' ma ipe'.
Ae' egawa amama endilisi. Ea' egawa nambimb ata' epe la'ela'ef enda' opeh elomepa igiambamepa ma pendanifel pembale'efa Krais pikila' pali' pape.
Ama nemaf anama efo'o etaga epe elomepa, ipe' pendanifel ma Krais Jisas endilisi.

Dei' fe' ipe'inai nefe' bo'ona nila basef bu'wami Kraisi. I'i ae' efe'mago ipe', o i'i eme' basef atoma ipe', ea' hapaimi. A'i ata' egawa ipe' paitu la'ifipa opalef etifim pandagigiambanama pafela esisa sembale'efa basef amama bu'wami
Ma ipe' ina umbamehepa ma naumbih ipe'isi, owa'. Amama mihi'ambas na'ama. Nambimb esis hegililas hi'ilas, ea' ipe' owa'. Anona nemaf God nofa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande'.
Dei' main, God nase'epa waf bu'unai ma penda' opeh Kraisi. Anan ina nase'epa waf pembale'efana atona, owa'. Anan nase'epa waf anama pefa' nimanimi wapoti' ma agel Ananinai.

Fowa' efa' nimanimi lu'wami ma agel Kraisi aitu la'ifiwi si'i anda' wandaf. Amama ipe' patolom pegawam. Ea' dei' pame' ae' ata' anda'am etin la'ela'ef. Ipe' pepe pendao'oma pelome ma opeh Kraisi si'i wandaf anama.

Ipe' pefa' pepel Kraisi? Ipe' pegawa Krais okom nainailipa nanda' opalef ipe'imi mape awanem? Ipe' pape ukup etifim paloma Ambal Bu'unai Godi? Ipe' ukup mapoma pagiambama ipe' atona etin? Endilisi, waf anama napomepa na'ama.
I'i na'ama, penda' ae' endanifel endilisi ma waf anama. Pepe ukup etifim, mimila God noloma sahin owan ea' pepe opalef etifim endilisi.
Ipe' ina ukup mopoma ipe' etipa penda' opeha enis epes safela agof ipe'imi lu'um, owa'. Ipe' pefe' owina enis epes ea' ina pi'i pepe ilifa esis, owa'.
Ipe' ina ukup mopoma ipe' etipa, owa'. Ukup mimila enis epes wapoti' soloma maim amamaga esis ukup ma'iami.
Ipe' pihapila ukup etifim si'i Krais Jisas okom na'iam.
Anan nape God endilisinai la'ela'ef, ea' ina okom na'i nohapila waf anama la'ela'ef nope si'i God, owa'.
Anan nowa' alafuga ma waf anama ea' dei' nataga epen endilisinai nanda' waf anama nataga agel a'ana nanda' opeh nape owina enis epes.
Esis satolona sati anan nataga epen endilisinai. Ea' nanda' anan nafe' owina God naloma epes. Naila okom Godi atona nafe' nafe' ma naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
Ea' waf anama atona anan nanda'anai dei' God nafelona nalata ilif endilisi. Ea' nase'ana anona agel nikila' agof hiami.
Anan nase'ana agel anama Jisasa anona nemaf epes soloma ambagof maim hiami mape heveni maloma anom amama mape etap anae' ilif owini hi'ilam mindiwa nembawa ma anan mafela agel ananinai lu'una,
mowalapa basef mi'iam na'ama mi'i, “Jisas Krais Anan Dembinai.” Monda'am na'ama mefela agel Ahalomana Godi nolata ilif endilisi.

Ea' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa. Fowa' la'ela'ef ape alomepa ipe' paila basef ae'ami. Ea' dei' wapoti' penda'am na'ama etin. Dei' ape laogon, ipe' penda'am la'ela'ef pefe' endilisi pikila' fowa' panda'ami. God nanda' opeh bu'wami nakwahomepa waf aonai nofa'epa pitanimani. Amama atom dei' ipe' umbamehepa endilisi pembefa opeh Anan nanda'mepami.
Dei' main, anan nanda' opeh opalef ipe'imi nomon. Anan atona nafela ukup ipe'imi ma nagiambamepa panda' opeh si'i Anan atona okom na'iam.
Amamaga ipe' pa'i penda'ami, pekwaha basef pandahihianamami moloma waf sandahambasefasami.

Penda'am na'ama ma pepe awasi Godi bo'wepa ma basef o waf aonai a'epa. Dei' pape paloma epes hiesi sape etap anae', esis sakwaha waf bu'unai sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' pape palomas pihi'ambasa basef ambal namunaimi si'i ondowa motawa ilif mafifima epes. Penda'am na'ama ma nemaf akutainai Kraisi ae' endanifel ma ipe' ma egawa ina anda' opeh akwaha pepel ae'anai na'a, owa'.

Ipe' pembale'efa God panda' opeh ananimi, amama si'i anom amamaga ipe' pindalali pase'anami. I'i nambimb esis sehe ega' sokolo'wa esimbel ae'ami si'i enis sondolali sakolo' ifat su'utip sanda' ofa sondalalima God, ea' hapaimi, ae' endanifel. Nambim ae' endanifel eloma ipe'.
Ea' na'ama etin ipe' wapoti' pendanifel pelome.
I'i Dembinai Jisas ni'i aho', a'i nambimb ina nogota laona esapa' Timoti nefe'mago ipe'. Ma notanima nifi'i ni'ipi ipe' pape andeande'ma panda' ae' la'ifiwi.
Timoti anan opaf etifina nalome. Okom ananinai natanea endilisi ma nigiambamepa ma pembale'efa God la'ifipa. Ina anona aman nape na'ae si'i anan, owa'. Anan atona.
Amam hiami mape maloma ae' mumafi amamaga amamumi atom ea' ina ukup maimaila mumafi opeh Jisas Kraisi, owa'.
Ea' Timoti ina si'i amam, owa'. Ipe' pegawa anan aman bu'unai, okom na'i nigiambamepa. Anan nagiambame ma wawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi si'i nogalomana nagiambama ahalomana.
Nemaf anama egawa amamaga hiami motagame mi'imama, esapa'ana nefe'mago ipe' mehip.
Ae' ape la'ifiwi ma Dembinai a'i anan nambimb nonda'me eaf ekwaha kalabus efe'mago ipe'.
Ae' okom na'i esapa' Epafroditus nefe'mago ipe'. Anan owalome ae'anai. Anan afa' wandao'oma wanda' opeh Godi etin waitu la'ififa ma nimanimi si'i soldia. Fowa' ipe' pasapa'ana nafi'i nagiambame.
Opaf ananinai nalef endilisi ma na'i nitilipa. Ea' anan okom nimanima ipe' pame' basefa awes nanda'ana.

Endilisi fowa' anan awasina na'i noga'. Ea' God nati anan uwahipina. Ea' ina nati anan atotona uwahipina, owa'. Nati ae' uwahipiwi wapoti'. Anan nandaiwa' endilisi ma opaf nimanina nose'alowe ma Epafroditus noga'.
Ea' ae' okom na'i endilisi ma esapa'ana nefe'mago ipe' ma' petolona pendanifel ma opaf ae'anai awanena.
Ea' ipe' pendanifel endilisi pefa'ana ma agel Dembinai. Pefela agof amam na'amaimi.
Dei' main, anan ina okom napoma nope namona, owa'. Anan okom nohafela opeh Kraisi ea' felefele' ma noga' ma nagiambame. Anan okom napome. Dei' main, ipe' papani laogon anan naho'ofepa nanda' amama.
Ipe' alupipei, ae' a'i i'i basef ae'ami hi'ilam na'ama. Ipe' pendanifel ma Dembinai. Ae' ina okom nimanima enda' basef amama atom do'ok ali' a'ipipami, owa'. Amama mili'akwepa ma waf aonai.
Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma amam amama manda' waf aonai si'i nombagw aolupumi. Amam ma'i mi'ipipa mehip momboma ukup ipe'imi petopa' alop ipe'inai ma pila mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai.
God atona nandandepapa mape ananipai. Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona dei' manda' lotumana mafela agel Jisas Kraisi atona. Ape' ina mombale'efa waf satopa' alopanai nagiambamapa, owa'.
Enis epes Juda ukup ma'i, “Ape' Juda epes bu'upai manda' waf ape'inai hianai andeande' na'ama si'i matopa' alop.” Ea' ae' ikila'asa waf anama. Ae' Judaiwei endilisi.

Dei' main, nemaf anama ata' sa'owe ape nimeguf 8-peleim mafe' ea' amam matopa' alop ae'anai. Ae' epen Israeliwei. Ae' wambota Benjamini. Ae' esimbel atom esis Hibrui. Ae' Farisi, epen aila mi'uli Godi fowa' naso' Mosesanai. Ae' aila mi'uli anama andeande' ikila' epes hiesi.
Ae' okom nohafel la'ifiwi endilisi ma anda' opeh Godi. Fowa' anda' opeha aha
Ea' ae' okom napoma Krais atona a'i amamaga amama hiami ali' anda'ami, amama falafumi atom.

Ae' ina a'i amamaga amama atom, owa'. Ae' okom napoma Jisas Krais atona Dembinai ae'anai ma amamaga hiami ali' anda'ami. Gawa anama endilisinai nikila'. Ea' ewa' alafugama amamaga amama hi'alam a'i falafumi atom si'i alufuta. Embale'efa Krais atona ape la'ifiwi ma Anan. Ae' andaiwa'ma efa' agel anama aman bo'awe ma mi'uli esis Juda sailanai, owa'. A'i efa' agel bu'unai na'ama. Ae' embale'efa Krais dei' God na'i ae' aman bu'uwei.
Ae' a'i egawa Krais endilisi noloma pepel God nafelona nohafel hi'agif. Ae' a'i elomana ondao'oma ma waf anama ofa' nimanimi ma ofa' ukup etifim amama si'i Anan okom napoma nemaf anama naga'anai.
Ae' a'i enda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf God nefele wapoti' hi'agif.
Ae' ina okom na'i efa' waf anama Kraisi hi'alana ape bo'awe andeande', ata' owa'. Dei' ape embalo'a waf anama la'ifiwi. Dei' main? Anan nofale nandandepe ma epe ananiwei si'iwi.

Ipe' alupipei, ae' ina okom na'i enda' waf anama ea', ata' owa'. Efa' okom atotona na'ama. Okom nase'e amamaga hiami fowa'imi maloma amamaga fowa' matagamai ea' dei' anda' opeh la'ifiwi efa' amamaga efa'am anona nemaf si'i epen nasagih mehipa nikila' nefa'am.
Ae' faso'me asagih mehip etaga ikwafa efa' agola waf bu'unai. Amama na'ama. Krais Jisas nanda' opeh bu'wami nagiambame ape la'ifiwi aloma anan. Dei' God nofale ma efe' epe la'ela'ef heven.
Ape' hiapai mahapila ukup mataga si'i epes dambesi ma waf bu'unai, ape' ukup mefe' etifima basef amama ali' anda'ami. Ama i'i ipe' anom nomonas mopeipa, anona nemaf God nomboma ukup ipe'imi wapoti'.
Ape' mope na'ama. Waf bu'unai mefa'ana ea', anama mombalo'ana la'ifipa.
Alupipei, ipe' hipei pila waf ae'anai. Ea' pendandepas andeande' epes saila waf afa'inai ma pilana.

Nimeguf hiami a'ipipa basef amama ma naumbih Kraisi. Dei' na'ama etin a'ipipam wapoti' aloma embif motah naep ae'ami. Epes hiesi saila waf aonai ea' sataga naumbih ma basef bu'wami Krais naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.

Ukup asasimi mapoma alop asasinai atona, anama si'i god asasinai. Esis sa'i esis etis agufisi sandanifela ma waf naninani aonai ambagof awomunai. Ea' ukup mapoma amamaga etapami atom. Epes isima anona nemaf higililas wambel aonai hel.
Ape' mape amam nematawa ilifapai, wambel ape'inai heven. Ea' mape mohafa Dembinai Jisas Krais anona nemaf nokwaha heven nisila'i nefa'apa motanimani.
Anona nemaf nomboma alop anama ape'inai notaga bo'ona nifififil endilisi si'i alop ananinai. Anan nonda'ama pepel ananinai atona. Pepel anama anan nonda' amamaga hiami mofe' mope owina anan atona.

Dei' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa a'i itilipa ea' pape laogona ae'. Ofagema ma andanifel, andanifel ma ipe' etipa si'i agel lu'unai amamaga bu'wami anona nemaf efa'ami. Ipe' pitu la'ifipama Dembinai si'i basef ali' a'ipipami.
Ipe' nematawa bipa, Yuodia neloma Sintike, ipe' peme'. Ipe' petaga opalef etifima Dembinai.

Ea' dei' ahali' ine' aman alupinai endilisi nanda' opeh Godi andeande', a'ipinago nigiambamago nematawa awama biawa. Awau la'ela'ef wandao'oma walome wanda' opeh la'ifiwa wawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi. Ea' Klemen naloma enis epes ae'asi wanda' opeh atom Godi, esis wapoti' sanda' opeh salomafa. Agof asasimi mape nomona buk ambal namunainai agof epes sope andeande' la'ela'ef mailanai.
La'ela'ef ipe' pendanifel ma Dembinai. Ae' a'iam wapoti', ipe' pendanifamana.
Penda' waf so'umbilinai ma epes hiesi sitilipa sogawa ipe' paila waf bu'unai anama. Dei' main, Dembinai felefele' niefi'i.
Ipe' ina ukup motamea mefe' ma amamaga hiami meatagamipei, owa'. Ipe' pi'ipanam Goda amamaga amama. Penda' betena anan pinifelona pihali'ana ma amamaga ipe' ukup ma'iami.
Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas, dei' opaf awanena God nase'apanai nikila' gawa hianai epesi hi'alana nope nolomepa nili'akwa opalef moloma ukup ipe'imi andeande'.

Alupipei, dei' ae' a'i enda' basef akutaimi ma ipe'. A'i ipe' ukup mopoma anona waf na'ama. Maim amamaga endilisimi, bu'wami moloma amamaga bu'wami dende' ma epes sanifelami, moloma amamaga bu'wami hiami si'i amama, ipe' ukup mopoma amama.
Waf hianai ipe' patolona pame'ana awalipipanai, anama ipe' penda'ana la'ela'ef. Ea' God nese'apa opalef awanemi nope nolomepa.
Endilisi, fowa' ipe' ukup mapoma ae', ea' ipe' eaf a'epa ma pagiambame. Ea' dei' pati eafa pagiambame pihi'ambe ukup ipe'imi maimaila ae'. Ea' andanifela Dembinai endilisi.
Ae' ina a'iam na'ama a'i ae' amamaga a'e, owa'. Dei' main, ae' egawa na'ama. I'i maim amamaga ma'ome, hapaimi. Opaf ae'anai awanena ma amamaga amama.

Fowa' ape na'ama. Anom nimeguf ape wafiwi, amamaga a'e. Anom nimeguf ahapila amamaga hiami. Ae' egawa waf sa' gwa'aimi hiami naloma waf nolom mahasanai wapoti'. Ae' egawa waf anama biefina sahapila amamaga hiami o amamaga a'e wapoti'. Ama nimeguf hiami anama hiagoma ape opaf nape awanena ma amamaga hiami na'amaimi.
Krais nanda'e la'ifiwi nase'e pepel. Amama atom dei' la'ifiwi ma anda' amamaga hiami hi'alam.
Ea' ipe' panda' waf bu'unai palome pandao'oma ma pefa' nimanimi ae'ami.

Ea' ipe' amam nematawa Filipai, ipe' pegawa na'ama. Nemaf anama ae' asefela opeh awalipipa basef bu'wami Godi ma akwaha anona wambel nape etap hiagoma Masedonia, ina dei' enis Kristen sios sagiambame. Ina enis Kristen sandao'oma salome ma waf anama sase'asa amamaga na'a, ata' owa'. Ipe' etipa panda'am na'ama.
Ae' ali' ape Tesalonaika, ipe' pagiambame nimeguf hiami.
Ea' dei' ae' ina ahali'ipa ma amamaga gwa'aimi maim, owa'. Ae' okom na'i nambimb God nogwa waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai pagiambame nose'epa amamaga bu'wami.

Otamba gwa'aimi amamaga maim ipe' pasi'iami hiami mikila' ae' okom na'iami. Amamaga ipe' panda'am paso' Epafroditus nofa'ami efa'am ea'. Amama si'i ofa pindalalima God pese'anami alogw ma'ami. Ea' ipe' pase'anam God, nofa'am opaf ananinai ambo'ona.
God amamaga hiamunai nambimb nowapatiamapam amamaga amama ipe' a'ipamami ma lagel Jisas Kraisi atona.
God anan Ahalomapa ape'inai. Ea' ape' minifelona mefela agel ananinai lu'una la'ela'ef. Endilisi.
Ae' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wami ipe' hipei amam nematawa Godi pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas. Amom owape maloma aho'mandifel manda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'.
Ea' amam nematawa hiesi Godi sandanifel sanda' nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'. Esis isima sanda' opeh ipat Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, esis wapoti' sandanifel ma sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'.
Ae' a'i okom Dembinai Jisas Kraisi nainaila ape'i na'a nope nolomago ipe' la'ela'ef.
Ae' Pol, okom Godi atona nandandepe aposel anda' maol Krais Jisasi. Ae' aloma owalome ae'anai Timoti wape na'ae.

Ea' anda'mepago basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa Godi pape wambel Kolosi, ipe' alupipei pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais. Afa' biafa wa'i God ahalomapa ape'inai nigiambamepa na'a nonda'epa pataga la'ifipa ea' nonda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
Maina nemaf afa' wanda' betena ipe', la'ela'ef afa' wanifela God anan Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais Ahalomana. Afa' wanifelona ma pembale'efa Krais andeande'.
Dei' main, afa' wame' basef ma ipe' na'ama. Ipe' pembale'efa Krais Jisas ea' ukup ipe'imi maimaila amam nematawa Godi hiesi.

Fowa' basef bu'wami Godi amama endilisimi matagamepa pame'ama amamaga bu'wami ipe'imi God nandandombam dei' ma'oh heven ipe' pape pehafami. Amamaga amama bu'wami ofagema ma bale'ef ipe'inai naloma waf anama ipe' panda'anai ukup maimaila epes hiesi.

Ama ganima etap hiagoma basef bu'wami amama mawalapai waf bu'unai ma epes hiesi mataga lu'um la'ela'ef mikila' fowa'. Basef amama manda'am na'ama etin si'i fowa' damba damba mali' matagama ipe' pame'am pailam. Nemaf anama ipe' pali' pegawa endilisi okom Godi nagiambamepa na'a, basef amama mawalapai waf bu'unai nataga lu'una ma ipe'.

Ipe' peme' basef amama bu'wami Epafras nawalipipami ea' pegawam. Anan epen bu'unai afa' ukup maimailana nanda' maola Krais nalomafa wandao'oma wanda' maol atotona. Anan naho'ofafa nagiambama ipe' ea' numafi maol Kraisi andeande'.
Anan na'ipafa basef amama ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'epa ukup maimaila amam nematawa Godi hiesi.

Epafras na'ipafa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda' maol anama bu'unai ma opalef ipe'imi. Ea' afa' biafa wapoti' wame' basef amama. Nemaf nali'i wame'am, anama atona wasafela beten wanda'ana ma ipe' wafi'i wataga dei'. Afa' ina wakwahepa, owa'. Wanda' betena God nigiambamepa nenda'epa pepe si'ipa ma gawa ananinai endilisi. Gawa anama Ambal Bu'unai ananinai nasi'ipanai.

Wanda'am na'ama ma nambimb ipe' petaga la'ifipama fe' pe ipe'inai netaga bo'ona endilisi dende'ma waf Dembinai. Wanda'mepa betena Anan niti waf ipe' panda'anai nenda' okom ananinai bo'ona ipe' nondanifamepa. Ama penda' maol naninani hianai bu'unai hi'ilana pegewana andeande' pikila' fowa' pali' pagawana.

Afa' wanda'mepa beten wapoti' na'ama. Wa'i God nonda'epa petaga la'ifipama pepel Ananinai bu'unai nafifili endilisi. Ama ipe' nambimb pitu la'ifipama pefa' maim nimanimi meatagamipei ma pendanifel ea' opalef ipe'imi ina mohafel endilisi, owa'. Mope so'umbel.

Ea' onda' betena ipe' ma pinifela Ahalomapa. Anan nanda'epa pataga la'ifipa ma pefa' amamaga amama bu'wami Anan nandondombama ipe'. Amama anona nemaf pefa'am peloma esis amam nematawa Ananisi hiesi wambel Ananinai howalagoma.
Anan natagahepa ma pepel aonai nape owamb ea' nahaponapa mafe' mawis nomona maol Nogalomanai nope Dembinai numafiapa. Nogalomana anama Anan okom na'iana endilisi.
Nogalomana ananinai atona natagahepa ma pepel anama ma dei' makwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai mape wafifipa.

Krais anan na'ama etin endilisi si'i God anama ape' owa' meatolonai. Anan nali'i endilisi ma amamaga hiami God nanda'ami mape ilif etapi hi'alam maloma amamaga ambagof mapaimi maloma epes hiesi wapoti'.

God nanda' amamaga amama hiami mape ilif etapi mataga mape lagel nogalomanai atona. Anan atona nanda' amam la'ifimi hiami mape mali'i mape la'afena etap naloma otaga maloma agufumi dembemi maloma amam dembemi ensel maloma amam dembemi la'ifimi mumafi ambagof. Anan nanda' amamaga amama maloma epes hiesi dei' ape' matolomi maloma amamaga amama ape' owa' meatolom naepi. God nanda' amamaga hiami mataga mape ma lagel Nogalomanai atona. Ea' amamaga amama maloma epes hiesi ananimi atom.
Anan nape nali'ma amamaga amama hiami ea' amamaga amama mataga pepel Ananinai atona nahapilam la'ifina mape la'ela'ef.

Anan Dembinai nape nali'ma esis sios amam nematawa Godi si'i alop si'ina Ananinai. Anan atona ofagonama sios sape namis la'ela'ef. Anan nali' damba damba nohafel hi'agif. Ea' dei' Anan atona nape nali'ma amamaga amama hiami numafiam.
Dei' main, okom Godi na'i waf naloma gawa naloma pepel Ananinai hi'alana nape nogalomana atona. Dei' nase'ana amama hi'alama Anan mapomana la'ela'ef.
God nanda' amamaga amama hiami mape ilif etapi maloma epes hiesi wapoti' sataga bo'wes sapoma anan. God nanda'am na'ama ma esimbel Kraisi atom malo nemaf anama naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
Fowa' ipe' wapoti' ata' pape laogona God pewa' alafugahana. Ukup ipe'imi ata' pefalona naumbih ma panda' waf aonai.

Ea' Krais nataga epen endilisinai sahana naga', amama atom God nanda'epa pataga alupipei opaf atotona palomana ma ga' Nogalomanai atona. Nanda'am na'ama ma nofa'epa pifi'mai anan pepe bo'wepa andeande', ofagema a'epa ma naep Ananimi.

Ea' ipe' pembale'efa basef bu'wami Godi la'ifipa la'ela'ef ma pitu la'ifipa endilisi si'i olaf nali'i nanda' ipat la'ifina. Na'ama ukup mose'epama pegawa endilisi anona nemaf pefa' amamaga amama bu'wami basef bu'wami Ananimi ma'iami. Basef amama pame'am ea' sawalipasama epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma. Basef amama ae' Pol ataga aman anda' maola awalipasami.

Dei' ae' andanifel ma efa' nimanimi agiambama ipe' Kristen amam nematawa sios Kraisi, ipe' si'i alop si'ina Ananinai. Anom nimanimi afa' wanda' maol Kraisi ofa'ami, amama ata' mape la'ela'ef. Dei' a'i embefa amama efa'am alop ae'anai anda' maol Kraisi. Ae' a'i ewapanimana nimanimi amama ma anda' maol Krais.
Ae' ataga aman anda' maol agiambama sios amam nematawa Godi na'ama. God nandandepe dei' ataga aman anda' maol a'ipipa basef hiami ananimi hi'alam.
Fowa' nimeguf hiami basef amama mape mandambaho'ma ukup epes amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' dei' mataga mandawalap alihima ukup esis amam nematawa Godi.

Okom Ananinai nape na'ama. Anan na'i nihi'ambapa basef amama bu'wami endilisi agel lu'unai, mandawalap magiambama esis amam nematawa hiesi. Basef amama na'ama. Krais nape opalef ipe'imi nomona dei' pape pehafa anona nemaf pefa' nafifili Ananinai pelomana.
Ea' afa' wawalapa basef Kraisi wawalipa epes hiesi ma gawa hianai naninani bu'unai. Afa' wa'i wihi'amba epes hiesi atona etin sefe'ma Kraisa sope epes Ananisi endilisi sope la'ifisa Anan.
Ea' dei' maol ae'anai anda'ana lu'unai endilisi ma pepel hianai Kraisi nanda' maol la'ifinai la'ela'ef nomon opaf ae'anai.
Ae' a'i ipe' pegawa na'ama. Ae' anda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma agiambama ipe' paloma esis Laodisia saloma epes isima hiesi ata' owa' siti amaga ae'anai.

Ae' anda'am na'ama ma opalef ipe'imi moloma opalef asasimi motaga la'ifim mope ukup mondao'oma etina sahin owan ipe'isi. Ama ipe' peloma esis pefa' gawa bu'unai endilisi nenda' bale'ef ipe'inai bo'ona ma pegawa basef Godi endilisimi atom. Ae' anda' maol anama ma ipe' peloma esis pegawa basef amama Godi ofagema fowa' mandambahi'i ma'i Krais atona.

Anan atona nanda' gawa bu'unai naloma okom bu'unai Godi hianai nataga nandawalap alihina. Anama fowa' nali' nape nandambaho' si'i epes sambe'am ma'oh mandambahi'i satalom otamba hiami, dei' nandawalap alihina ma lagel Krais atona.
Ae' a'ipipa basef amama. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa ma basef usihimi.
Endilisi ae' dei' ina ape alomepa, ea' okom ae'anai si'i ape alomepa andanifel ma sati ipe' paitu la'ifipa ma pembale'efa Krais andeande'.
Ipe' pembale'efa Krais Jisas pa'i Anan Dembinai ipe'inai. Na'ama dei' pefa' pepel ananinai pepe la'ifipa peloma Anan.

Ipe' pitu la'ifipama Anan si'i lawag nombalef mowala etap owin la'ifina notawa ea' si'i ipat natoma ilifa olalef notawa la'ifina. Ipe' pembale'ef la'ifipa ma basef amama bu'wami pefa'ami pikila' fowa' pali' pembale'efam ea' pinifela God la'ela'ef.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen nese'epa basef wafimi o basef gawaimi epes sa'iami nembaso'mepa nomboma opalef ipe'imi ma basef amama si'i saolo' mafis matolo' esalef. Basef amama ina mataga Krais, owa. Amama bafasapa ehasapa ape'isi sa'ipapami mataga waf etapanai atona.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa waf Godi naloma gawa naloma pepel ananinai hianai nape Krais atona la'ela'ef, fowa' gani nafi'i nataga nemaf anama nape etap anae' napomana la'ela'ef.

God nase'epa ambal namunai endilisinai napaipa pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais. Anan dembinai nape nali'ma ambagof hiami maloma pepel naninani naloma ensel dembemi mape la'afena etap naloma otaga hi'alam.

Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais. Ea' pape la'ifipa paloma anan, pape si'i panda' waf anama amam Juda matopa' alop. Waf anama ina waf epes sanda'ana atop atona wafinai, owa'. Krais atona nanda'mepana natofa waf apinai ma ukup apimi.
Ipe' pefa' baptais ea' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais sawepa palomana. Ipe' pembale'efa pepel Godi nafela Krais hi'agif, amama atom dei' Anan nafelapai wapoti' paloma Krais.

Fowa' ipe' paga' ea'. Dei' main, ipe' panda' waf naninani aonai ea' ipe' owa' Judaipai pelolama mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai. Ea' dei' God nanda'epa pataga namipa paloma Krais ea' nakwahomapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai hianai.

Basef amama ma mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai mail buki ma'i nimanimi ape' mofa'ama waf ape' manda'anai naloma anom basef ahifima milam, basef amama hiami God nali'amonam si'i nandolam mail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai nalamonam hi'alam.

Lawag anama Anan natalogofa ambagof awami maloma pepel naninani aonai naloma agufumi dembemi mape la'afena etap naloma otaga mape owina anan ea' ina la'ifim. Anan nikila'am ea' nowa'am la'ifim nafe' nali'am nafe' amam mafe' mailana ea' epes hiesi sakolasa naep satolom sa'i amam falafumi.

Na'ama dei' ipe' ina pi'i aho'ma anona aman nombaso'ma ipe' ni'ipipa anona mi'uli ma waf sa' gwa'aimi embel ma anona nemaf lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai o sanda' anom gwa'aimi ma aon dambainai notaga o nemaf sabat sapoma noma'wanai, owa'.
Amamaga amama fowa' esis sailami mondola'wifa amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai, amama dei' mataga ea'. Ea' amamaga endilisimi atom, amama Krais atona.

I'i emi egafis sepe sinifa na'oh nandondo'oh asasinai ma amamaga esis satolomi o sambaso'mas si'i esis so'umbelisi sape owina enis epes o senda' lotu ma amam ensel, ipe' ina pi'i aho'ma epes isima sembaso'mepa ma pefa' amamaga bu'wami ipe'imi ma'omepa ipe' ilif, owa'. Epes isimi na'amaisi safela agof asasimi lu'uma amamaga sa'oh sandondo'oh satolomi ea' ukup mapoma esis etis saila waf anama etapanai.

Esis ina sombale'efa Krais sape la'ifisa Anan nape nali' endilisima ma ape', owa'. Anan nali'i numafi gwa'aimi nataga alop si'ina ea' nanda' nigis maloma okwatogw maim mandahapima etin alop si'ina. Ea' dei' God nanda' alop anama nataga lu'una la'ifina.
Ipe' paga' ea' paloma Krais ma pakwaha waf aonai hianai wafinai etapanai. Dei' maina ipe' ata' pailana pafe' si'i ipe' epes etapipei? Dei' maina ipe' ata' pafe' owina mi'uli anama? Hapainai.
Mi'uli anama na'i na'ama na'i, “Ine' owa' nihapilan, nea'an, newa'an nepe lagof, hapainai.”
Mi'uli anama na'i amamaga embel gwa'aimi maim ape' magwa'ami. Amamaga amama ape' magwa'am ea' higilalam. Dei' main, mi'uli anama epes etis ukup mopomana sawalapana sawalipa enis.

Endilisi, mi'uli anama nataga si'i mi'uli gawa bu'unai napeinai ea' na'ipapa nafelapa na'ipapa la'ifipama monda' lotu ma amam ensel ea' na'ipapa moha alop ape'inai. Ea' mi'uli anama ina la'ifina nagiambamapa matofa waf aonai alopanai ma okom apinai, owa'etin.
God nafela ipe' ea' pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais. Amama atom ipe' ukup mopoma amamaga mape otaga ilifi, anama Krais nape agilinai felefele'ma lagel daisinai Godi.
Ipe' okokoma amamaga mape ilifi la'ela'ef. Amamaga mape etapi owa', hapaimi.
Dei' main, ipe' paga' ea'. Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma God, dei' ambal namunai ipe'inai nape nandabaho' si'i Krais dei' nape nandambaho'.
Krais ofagonama ambal namunai ape'inai anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihiguma, ea' ipe' wapoti' petaga pefa' nafifili Ananinai pelomana.

Ipe' peha waf aonai hianai etapanai opaf apinai noga', waf anama na'ama. Waf so'a waolanai naloma waf aonai, waf anama aonai ukup mohafemanai, ukup ma'i anom amamaga enis epesi. Waf anama si'i waf saila god baso'omainai.
Epes sanda' waf anama hianai, okom wandafunai Godi anona nemaf notaga nogwana.
Fowa' ipe' etipa paila waf aonai anama hianai pape owina waf anama ukup mohafemanai.
Ea' dei' ipe' pekwaha anona waf aonai hianai na'ama. Waf migimigahinai, ukup wandafum, opalef aom ma peha enis epes, waf basef awami findiwaimi, basef awami.
Ipe' ina pembaso'ma esis sahin owan, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' pakwaha waf hianai aonai ma opaf apinai ea' pataga dambaipa. God nanda'epa pataga dambaipa ma opaf namunai.
Ea' anan nanda'epa pataga dambaipa la'ela'ef ma petaga na'ama etin si'i Anan nape, Anan nanda' opaf anama namunai ma ape' mogawana endilisi.

Ea' dei' Krais atona Dembinai nape nali'ma epes hiesi. Esis Grik saloma esis Juda saloma enis owa' Judaisi, esis anona diga, isima sape aolopi sololama waf bu'unai, agufisi, agof a'asi, waf sa'iana epes isima falafunai atona. Krais atona Dembinai nape nali'ma epes isima hiesi, nape nomona epes hiesi hi'alas.

God anan nandandepepa ea' pape amam nematawa ananipei okom nainailipa endilisi. Ea' ipe' penda' waf bu'unai na'ama. Ipe' piti epes hiesi uwahipis la'ela'ef pigiambamas penda'as andeande'. Ipe' petalogofa ipe' pepe owina enis epes, penda' waf so'umbilinai ma esis ea' pepe piti esis sonda'mepa waf naninani aonai ipe' ma tol pepe opalef awanem.

I'i enin epen ipe'ini nenda' waf aonai ma enin epen, ina negwamana waf aonai anan nanda'mananai, owa'. Nenda'an sa'ombeman nekwahomana waf aonai anan nanda'menanai. Dembinai nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ea'. Ea' ipe' wapoti' penda'am na'ama etin.
Ipe' penda' waf anama bu'unai hianai ali' a'ipipanai pilana. Ea' penda' anona waf bu'unai wapoti'. Ipe' ukup mi'i sahin owan ipe'isi ma waf anama nakolasepa nanda'epa pataga etifipa.
Krais nase'apa opaf awanena ape' ea' opaf anama atona numafi ipe' endilisi. God nofalepa pataga alop etifina nape opalef awanem. Ipe' pinifelona la'ela'ef.

Basef Kraisi bu'wami endilisi mope opalef ipe'imi nomon. Ipe' penda'am na'ama piwalipa esis sahin owan ipe'isi pi'ipasa gawa hianai naninani. Ipe' pinifela Goda opalef ipe'imi pelomana. Ea' penda' awalef mail Buk Sami ea' penda' awalef lotuwimi ea' penda' awalef monda' ambagof ipe'imi motaga la'ifim.
Maim amamaga ipe' nambimb pi'iama basef o penda' maol, anama ipe' penda'ama agel Jisasi. Ama agel ananinai ipe' pinifela God Ahalomapa.
Ipe' nematawa, ipe' pefe' owina wauhupipa ipe'imi. Waf anama dende'ma ipe' Kristen pianda'anai.
Ipe' amam wapoti', ipe' ukup mimila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai. Ipe' ina penda' opalef awaumi aom, owa'.
Ipe' batawisas wapoti', peme' basef mamasipei andeande'ma waf naloma basef asasimi hiami. Waf anama nanda' okom Dembinai bo'ona.
Ipe' ahapas, ina penda' opalef batawisipei aom, owa'. Na'ama ukup asasimi aom.

Ipe' agof a'epa pape owina enis epes panda' maolanasi, pila basef amama hiami agufumi. Ipe' ina penda' maola naep asasimi atom, owa'. Ipe' umbamehepa ma Dembinai, dei' opalef ipe'imi mope bo'oma maol anama penda'ana andeande'.
Ea' maim amamaga ipe' panda'ami, amama penda'am la'ifipa si'i panda' maola Dembinai atona. Ipe' ina panda' maola epes etis, owa'.
Dei' main, ipe' pegawa anona nemaf Dembinai nofalo'mepa nese'epa amamaga bu'wami ipe'. Amama anan nandandepam ma'oh ma'oma ipe' epes ananipei. Ipe' pape panda' maola Krais Dembinai ape'inai.
Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, esis anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi lu'wami mondahama waf esis sanda'anai. Dei' main, God nawaloga epes hiesi agufisi agof a'asi ma ikwaf bu'unai atona.
Ipe' agufipei ma esis agof a'asi sanda' maolanipei, ipe' penda' waf bu'unai andeande'ma esis. Ipe' pegawa Dembinai ipe'inai nape otaga ilif.
Ipe' penda' beten la'ela'ef. Beten ipe'inai, ipe' ukup bo'om pepe andeande' pinifela God.
Ipe' penda' beten pihali' Goda nagiambamafa wapoti' na'ama. Anan nusi'amafa uta afa' ma owalapa basef Ananimi. Ama awalapa basef amama Krais fowa' mape mandambahi'i. Amama atom dei' ae' ape kalabus.
Ipe' penda' betena nambimb ae' ewalapa basef amama mandambahi'i motaga alihim si'i okom Godi na'i ae' enda'am.
Esis sape ande'ma Kraisi, ipe' ukup mope andeande'ma fe' pe ki ipe'inai. Maim nimeguf eaf nogal ipe' pi'ipasa basef Kraisi, pi'ipasam.
Basef ipe'imi la'ela'ef motaga bo'oma pegwa basefa epes hiesi dende'ma amamaga maim ukup asasimi mapomami.

Tikikus anan sahalomapa ape'inai endilisi ae' okom nainailana. Anan nanda' maol Dembinai andeande', ae' alomana wandao'oma wanda'anai. Anan nambimb nefe'mago ipe' nowalapa basef ni'ipipama ae' dei' ape a'imama.
Ae' a'i esapa'ana nefe'mago ipe' ma pegawa afa' wape wa'imama ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa opalef ipe'imi.

Anan no'wa Onesimus mefe'mago ipe', anan owalomapa nombale'efanai afa' ukup maimailanai nanda' maol Godi andeande'. Anan nape wambota ipe'inai. Nambimb amam biam mi'ipipago amamaga hiami mataga na'ae.

Aristarkus anan nanda' kalabus nalome, anan wapoti' na'iago nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'. Ea' Mak wapoti', Barnabas taganamana nanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ma ipe' wapoti'. I'i netagama ipe', pe'wanago si'i ae' a'ipipago.

Ea' Jisas agel wa'ana Jastus, anan wapoti' nanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'. Ama epes hiesi Juda, amam atom manda' maol malome ma wihi'amba hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias. Amam magiambame ma maol anama.

Epafras anan nandanifel nanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'. Anan wapoti' wambota ipe'inai, nanda' maol Krais Jisasi nape owina anan. La'ela'ef nanda' beten la'ifinai ma ipe'. Anan nanda' betena God nonda' ipe' pitu la'ifipa si'i epes dembipei pegawa God andeande' ma pembale'ef la'ifipa pila okom Godi la'ela'ef.
Ae' atowe egawa Epafras, na'ama dei' awalapana a'i anan nanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma nagiambama ipe' paloma esis amam nematawa wambel anama biefina Laodisia naloma Hierapolis.
Luk anan dokta epen ape'inai ukup maimailanai, anan naloma Demas amam manda'ago nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'.
Ipe' pese'aso danifel ma nemaf bu'unai ae'anai ma esis alupusi sape Laodisia. Ea' penda'masago nemaf bu'unai ma Nimfa kolomago esis Kristen sios sandatama etifigin ipat akwa'unai.
Ipe' pitalifa pas amama ea'pesapa'am mefe'mago esis Kristen sios sape Laodisia, ma esis wapoti' satolom sogawam. Ea' pas amama ae' asapa'am mafe'ma esis Laodisia wapoti', amama ipe' petolom pi'iam.
Ea' ipe' pi'ipago Arkipus na'ama pi'i, “Ine' nimafi maol anama nefa'ana ma Dembinai andeande' nimbefana.”

Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagel ae'anai atona anda'mepago basef amama bandami atom. Dei' anda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe' hipei. Ipe' ukup mopoma ae' amam mowa'e sen ata' ape kalabus la'ela'ef. Ae' a'i okom lu'unai Godi nigiambamago ipe' na'a numafipago nope nolomago ipe'. Ea' ma'um.

Ae' Pol aloma Sailas naloma Timoti wape na'ae. Ea' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa Godi pape Tesalonaika. Ipe' pape paloma God ahalomapa ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ipe' Kristen pape paloma amam ea' amamipei si'ipa.
Afa' wa'i God nigiambamepago ipe' na'a nonda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
Nimeguf hiami afa' wanifela God la'ela'ef ma ipe'. Ea' wa'i agof ipe'imi wanda' betena ipe'.

Afa' la'el'ef wa'ipa God ahalomapa ape'inai ma ipe' wanda' betena ipe'. Ipe' pembale'efa God panda' waf bu'unai. Fowa' ipe' paso' opalefa God naloma enis epes wapoti'. Ea' dei' panda' maol lu'unai Godi. Ipe' ukup mape la'ifipa pehafa Dembinai Jisas Krais nifi'i. Ea' afa' wanda' beten nimeguf hiami ma ipe'.
Ipe' Kristen alupipei, God okom nainailipa. Ea' afa' ogawa Anan nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei si'ipa.

Basef amama bu'wami Godi fowa' ofa'ami, amama ina mataga na'a ma ipe' si'i anom basef wafimi, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda' basef amama mataga la'ifim ma pepel Ananinai ea' wafi'i wa'ipipam. Ea' manda' ukup ipe'imi la'ifim pembale'efana. Waf fowa' wape walomepa wanda'anai, ipe' pegawana.
Amama atom dei' pegawam paila Dembinai. Amamaga nimanimi matagamepa, ea' pefa' basef Godi, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela opalef ipe'imi pandanifel.
Ea' pihi'ambasa waf bu'unai epes isima hiesi enis amam nematawa sombale'efa Kraisi sape etap anama hiagoma biefigin Masedonia naloma Akaia.

Basef Dembinai ipe' pa'ipasami mogal ma'i mafe' si'i wata nalef mehip. Ina mafe' Masedonia naloma Akaia atogon, owa'. Anama hiagoma esis same' basefa ipe' pembale'efa God. Afa' ina wa'ipa epes isima, owa'. Ipe' pali' paso' opalefa God andeande'.

Dei' esis etis sa'i basefa ipe' pandanifel pa'i nemaf bu'unai ma afa' ea' pame' basef afa'imi fowa' afa' wanofa wafe'mago ipe'. Esis sa'i ipe' pakwaha amamaga amama ambagof awami fowa' ipe' panda' lotumami. Ea' pamboma opalef pafe'ma God. Ea' dei' panda' maola God endilisinai, owa' neaga'i, nape la'ela'ef.

Ea' esis sa'i ipe' pape pehafa Nogalomana Ananinai anona nemaf nekwaha heven notanima nifi'i. Anan Jisas, fowa' naga' ea' God nafelona wapoti'. Anona nemaf owagama God okom wandafunai ma emi egafis sanda' waf aonai. Ea' dei' Jisas nagalo'mapa ma okom anama wandafunai.
Alupipei, ipe' pegawa fowa' afa' wafe'mago ipe', maol anama afa' wanda'anai ina nalo, owa'.

Fowa' wali' wafe' wambel anama Filipai ea' sanda'afa aofa alop afa'inai, wame' nimanimi endilisi. Ipe' pegawa. Ea' God afa'inai nanda' opalef afa'imi la'ifim. Ea' afa' ina umbamahafa wandafa'ma esis naumbih, owa'. Afa' la'ififa wafo'o wawalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma ipe'.
Basef ofagema wa'ipipami ina wa'i onda' waf aonai ma ipe', owa'. Afa' ina waila basef amama falafumi baso'maimi wa'ipipam, owa'.

God atona nagwambafa natolofa wape andeande' ea' nase'afa maol afa' ma wawalapa basef bu'wami Ananimi. Ea' amama atom dei' wawalapam. Afa' ina wanda' maola epes sinifela maol afa' wanda'anai, owa'. Wanda' maola God atona nondanifela maol Ananinai, Anan atona nawaloga afa' nogawafa.
Ipe' pegawa basef wa'ipipami afa' ina wakikipipa, owa'. God natolofa nogawafa ea' afa' ina wanda' maol wambaho' basefa waf kowalasanai, owa'.
Afa' ina wanda' maola epes sefela agof afa'imi, o enis epes o ipe' wapoti' pinifelafa, owa'.

Afa' wape aposel Kraisi endilisi. Anan nasapa'afa ma onda' maol Ananinai. Ea' dei' wi'i a'e, wi'ipipa mehipa pese'afa anom amamaga gwa'aimi maim. Ea' owa'. Nogota nanima wape walomepa afa' wanda' waf so'umbilanai endilisi ma ipe', si'i ano'w nemata'w kumafi awasi akwa'usi andeande'.
Afa' ukup maimailipa endilisi. Ea' wase'epa basef bu'wami Godi. Ina wa'ipipa basef atom, owa' wase'epa opalef endilisi ma ipe'. Ea' wandandombam ma oga' wigiamabamepa.

Endilisi ipe' alupipei pegawa amama, afa' wanda' maol mehipa wawalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma ipe'. Ea' wanda' maol wapoti' umafi alop afa'inai ma gwa'aimi maim. Wanda' maol owamb alipa ina opoma ipe' etipa ma ofa' gwa'aimi maima ipe', owa'.
Ipe' patolom pegawam ea' God wapoti' natolom nogawam ea' waf wanda'ana ipe' pembale'efa Krais. Waf anama afa'inai bu'unai, ina aona, owa'.
Ipe' pegawa waf anama si'i ahalomas numafi awasi ananisi, ea' na'ama etin si'i afa' wanda'mepam ipe' atona etin. Afa' wafela ukup ipe'imi, wawalapa waf bu'unai so'umbilinai.
Wa'ipipam na'ama ma ipe' penda' waf nefe' andeande'ma God nitilipa ninifelipa. Ea' nofalepa pafi'i piwis pelomana wambel Ananinai howalogoma.

Fowa' ipe' pefa' basef Godi malogof afa'imi, pembale'efam. Basef amama ina pefa'am si'i basef epesi atom, owa'. Pefa' basef amama endilisimi Godi. Ea' basef amama magiambama opalef ipe'imi, dei' paila waf bu'unai. Ea' afa' wanifela God la'ela'efa ipe' pefa' basef Ananimi pembale'efana andeande'.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei, pefa' nimanimi na'ama etin si'i esis sombale'efa basef Godi sape etap hiagoma Judiai. Esis sombale'efa Jisas Krais, ea' sataga amam nematawa Godi. Amama atom dei' esis Juda sase'as nimanimi enisa alop asasinai na'ama etin si'i ipe' wambel atotona sase'epa nimanimi.
Esis Juda saha Dembinai Jisas naloma amam profet maga' ea' sanda' wandaf sali'amonafa. Sosambala waf God okom na'ianai sahambombaga epes hiesi.

Ea' sasopama eafa afa' i'ipasa basef Godi esis sololama Anani ma nofa'as sotanimani sope andeande'. Esis Juda sanda'as na'ama dei' sowatani waf aonai asasinai la'ela'ef nataga lu'una endilisi. Fowa' God natilis na'a ea' dei' okom wandafunai Ananinai nafi'i natagamas nemaf akutainai nonda'as awes higilalas.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei, esis Juda sali'amonafa nogota bandana ma wape si'i awasi mamasas a'asi. Endilisi afa' ina wati amagahipama, ea' ukup afa'imi mape malomepa. Amama atom dei' wanda' maol la'ififa endilisi ma uti anona eafa ofo'o uti amagahipama. Afa' ukup maimailipa endilisi ma utilipa.
Ea' dei' wa'i ofe'mago ipe'. Ae' Pol anda'am nimeguf hiami a'i efo'o, ea' Satan nahopamafa eaf.

Owagama Dembinai ape'inai nifi'i wapoti', ape' mitu naep Ananimi. Nemaf anama afa' ukup bo'om mopoma main? Ea' ondanifela amamaga maim bu'wami? Owa'etin. Nemaf anama afa' ondanifelama ipe' etipa. Nemaf anama ape' hiapai mefe' mope molomana.

Afa' dei' ina wame' anom basefa ipe' pape pa'imama, ata' owa'etin. Dei' wandaiwa'ma ata' ope nogota laona na'ae. Ea' wa'i afa' atofa biafa ope na'ae wambel lu'unai Atens, ea' wasapa' owalomafa afa'inai Timoti wanda' maol etin Godi nofo'o ma ni'ipasa basef bu'wami Kraisi. Wasapa'ana nafo'o nanda' ipe' la'ifipa nigiambamepa ma pembale'efa Dembinai la'ifipa.
Na'ama atuwasi enipa pendafa'ma amamaga amama nimanimi lu'wami, ea' pewa alafugaha God. Ipe' pegawa God atona nandandepapa ma mofa' amamaga amama nimanimi.
Fowa' afa' wape walomepa, wa'ipipa wa'i, “Owagama afa' ofa' nimanimi.” Ea' amama dei' matagamafa si'i fowa' wa'ipipa pegawam.

Ae' ina ata' epe ehafa ipe' wapoti', owa'. A'i efo'o. Ea' asapa'a anona aman nafo'o nogawa bale'ef ipe'inai ma nigiambamepa. Na'ama aman anama aonai Satan nakikipipa ma panda' waf aonai, ea' maol afa' wanda'anai nalo na'a.
Timoti nakwahepa dei' atef nafi'mai afa', nawalapa basef bu'wami ma afa'. Na'ipafa ma ipe' pembale'efa Kraisa ukup maimaila enis epes. Ea' na'i ipe' pa'i petolofa, afa' wapoti' wa'i utilipa.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei afa'ipei, afa' wame' basef amama ogawa ipe' pembale'ef pape. Ea' wandanifela ipe', wame' ipe' pembale'efana pape. Amama atom manda' afa' wataga la'ififa ma nimanimi hiami ofa'ami.
I'i ipe' pepe la'ifipama Dembinai, afa' wapoti' ope ondanifela ambal namunai endilisi.
Ea' afa' wandanifel endilisi ma naep God afa'inai. Ipe' pembale'efana la'ifipa. Ea' dei' afa' wanifela God.

Dendel owamb alip afa' wanda' betena ipe' mehipa wa'i uti amagahipama ogawa ipe' pembale'efana la'ifipa o owa'? Afa' wa'i ofo'o ma wigiambamepa peso' opalef ipe'imi ma God pape andeande'. Pol nanda' betena Goda nigiambamana nefe'mago esis
Afa' wanda' beten wahali' ahalomafa afa'inai God naloma Dembinai Jisasa monda' eaf nogal migiambamafa ofe'mago ipe'.

Afa' wa'i Dembinai nigiambamepa na'ama. Waf anama ipe' ukup maimaila ipe' hipei pandagigiambanama etin ea' ukup maimaila epes hiesi wapoti', waf anama notaga lu'una nikila' waf anama fowa' panda'anai. Penda'am na'ama si'i waf afa' dei' wanda'anai ukup maimaila ipe' endilisi nataga lu'una nikila' waf anama fowa' wanda'anai.

Wa'i ipe' penda' waf anama ma God nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa opalef ipe'imi. Ama anona nemaf Dembinai ape'inai netambel nifi'i nulumai esis hiesi sambale'efanai sape andeande' ma ipe' pepe bo'wepa andeande' basef a'epa ma naep Godi ahalomapa ape'inai.

Alupipei, fowa' afa' wa'ipipa wihi'ambepa waf ipe' pepe pefe' andeande' ma pilana, si'i God okom na'iami. Fowa' pailana dei' wapoti' pilana la'ela'ef. Ea' afa' wahali'ipa wafela ukup ipe'imi ma agel Dembinai Jisasa pilana penda'ana nefe' etin notaga lu'una.
Ipe' pegawa basef amama wawalapama ipe' ma agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
Okom Godi nape na'ama. Ipe' amam nematawa pepe bo'wepa andeande' ananipei etipa ma pindihi'ama waf anama so'a waolanai.
Ipe' amam hipei, maina nemaf pa'i peso' nematawa pila waf God na'ianai pese'ama pepe andeande'. Ukup mopaipa pimafi alop ipe'inai andeande' ma waf aonai so'a waolanai a'epa.
Waf anama na'ama. Opalef ipe'imi ina usihima waf aonai sanda' so'a waolanai, si'i isima sololama God sanda'anai, owa'. Hapainai.

Ea' ipe' amam ina penda' waf aonai ma esis sahin owan ipe'isi pefa' nematawa anom amami, owa'. Dembinai okom wandafunai napoma epes isima sanda' waf anama ma na'i nogwamasa waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai. Fowa' afa' wawalapa amama alihim wa'ipipam mehip.
Dembinai God ina nofalapa ma monda' waf anama aonai, owa'. Anan nofalapa ma mila waf bu'unai andeande'.

Basef Godi ma'i ape' ina monda' waf so'a waolanai, owa'etin. Ea' emi egafis sowa' alafugaha basef amama, ina sowa' alafugaha epes etis, owa'. Sowa' alafugaha God wapoti'. God atona nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai.
Dei' afa' ina ata' onda' anom basefa ipe' ma waf anama ipe' ukup mimila esis hiesi sahin owan, owa'. God nawalipa ipe' hipei andeande' ma waf anama.
Ipe' ukup maimaila esis sahin owan anama etap hiagoma Masedonia. Ipe' alupipei, afa' wa'ipipa na'ama wa'i, ipe' ukup mimila esis sahin owan isima penda' waf anama netaga nefe' lu'una.
Ipe' ukup matamea mefe la'ifipa pepe so'umbel pimafi amamaga ipe'imi andeande'. Penda' maol lagof ipe'imi si'i fowa' wa'ipipa.
Penda'am na'ama ma pefe' andeande' naep esis isima owa' ata' somboma opalef sotaga Kristen. Ea' penda'am na'ama ma ina kwahupa anom amamaga, owa'.

Ipe' sahin owan, afa' wa'i ipe' pegawa andeande'ma amam nematawa isima saga'i. Na'ama opalef ipe'imi ukup mimilas pelomas si'i isima sololama God sanda'am. Esis owa' sogawa ma sope sohafa nemaf anama saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti' hi'agilif.

Ape' mombale'efa Jisas, anan naga' sawana ea' notanima nohafel. Amama atom dei' mogawa mombale'efa Goda anona nemaf nofa'ai esis Kristen isima sombale'efana endilisi ma saga'i sohafel wapoti' sifi'i sulumai Jisas.
Afa' wawalapa basef Dembinai atoma ipe' na'ama. Anona nemaf Dembinai notanima nifi'i, ape' amam nematawa ata' mape etapi ambagof ata' mapaipai, ape' ina muli' ma esis saga'i, owa'.

Dembinai nifi'i ni'i mehip endilisi ea' ensel Dembinai noga ni'i basef la'ifimi mehip, nufapula alof lu'unai Godi nonda'am nogal mehip. Nogota anama Dembinai nokwaha heven nisila'i. Ea' sombale'efa Kraisi fowa' sali' saga'i, atuwasi sili' sohafel.
Ea' nemaf anama atona Dembinai nofa'apa amam nematawa ambagof mapaipai molata otaga ilif moloma amam nematawa isima miti Dembinai. Ea' ape' hiapai mope molomana la'ela'ef hihif.
Ea' dei' monda'epa motaga la'ifipa ma opalef ape'imi ma basef amama.
Ipe' amam nematawa afa'ipei alupipei, afa' ina onda' anom basef laumi ma wi'ipipa nemaf anama amamaga amama motaga, owa'.
Ipe' pegawa nemaf anama Dembinai niefi'ianai. Anan nifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i owamba pa'oh pelolamana.
Anona nemaf enis amam nematawa si'iam si'i, “Ea' dei' nemaf bu'unai ma mope andeande'.”
Esis si'iam na'ama, nogota anama atona amamaga mohambomba alop asasinai motagamas mehip, si'i nemata'w kwame' akep paha'w kola awani. Ea' esis ina sindihi'ama amamaga amama, owa'etin.
Ipe' alupipei, ina ata' pape owamb si'i isima sololama Dembinai, owa'. Ipe' ina gegelalasipa ma nemaf anama notaga si'i gegelalasipa ma aman nanda' wali nafi'i, owa'.
Ipe' epes hipei pape alip. Ina si'i epes sape owamb, owa'.
Na'ama ipe' ina penda'am si'i isima enis ukup mase'as sa'oh solola, owa'. Andeande'ma ape' ukup mope naep motawa motologon.
Ape' mogawa esis isima sa'ihi esis sa'oh owamb atona. Ea' isima sa' embela sahaga sagaoli sanda'am owamb atom.

Ape' mape si'i epes sape alipi, ukup mapaepa mumafi alop andeande'. Ape' mofa' waf anama mombale'efana la'ifipa ma moso' opalef enis, si'i sanda' wandafi sofa' walitah sanda' wandafa mahagasa wambawa. Ape' mogawa basef amama anona nemaf God nofa'apa motanimani. Ukup mopoma basef amama si'i mowalo' anona hat la'ifinai nili'akwa balagah.
Dembinai God ina nosahe'apa ma mofa' okom wandafunai ananinai nefa'apa, owa'etin. Anan nosahe'apa ma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nofa'apa motanimani.
Fowa' anan naga' ma nagiambamapa. I'i nemaf anama anan notanimani mope ambagof mopaepa o moga', mofe' mope namepa molomana.
Dei' ipe' hipei penda opalef ipe'imi motaga la'ifima pendagigiambanama etin si'i dei' pape panda'am.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei afa'ipei, afa' wa'ipipa na'ama, wa'i amam agufumi mumafi esis Kristen, anom manda' maol lu'unai malomepa magiambamepa. Ipe' pefe' owina amam. Dembinai nanda'am mape agufumi ipe'imi ma mogawa monda' ukup ipe'imi mope andeande'.
Ipe' ukup mopoma maol amam manda'anai, ea' ukup mimilam bo'om mopomam endilisi. Ea' ukup etifim etin mimilas sahin owan.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei afa'ipei, afa' wa'ipipago mehip wafela ukup ipe'imi ma pigiambamago isima ala'uta nasi la'ifipa pi'ipasa sokwahago waf ala'uta nasanai. Ea' enis ambagof mondolele'asi ma owa' si'i anom basefi, ipe' penda'as sotaga la'ifis sie'i basef. Ea' penda' esis enis owa' seambale'efana la'ifisi sotaga la'ifis. Penda' waf so'umbilinai ma esis hiesi.
Na'ama ipe' pegwamasa waf aonai enis epes sanda'mepana ipe'i, owa'. La'ela'ef pitu la'ifipa ma waf bu'unai atona la'ela'ef. Ea' penda'masana isima enis hiesi wapoti'.
Ipe' pendanifel la'ela'ef.
Penda' beten pihali' God la'ela'ef owamb alip.
Ipe' pinifelona amamaga hiami. Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisasi, God na'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai pinifelona ma amamaga hiami.
Ipe' ina pehefa nif amama ma maol Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'ami, owa'.
Ipe' ina pewa' alafugaha basef Godi Ambal Bu'unai nafelas sa'ipipami, owa'.
Pewaloga basef hiami, ma pembale'a basef bu'wami atom la'ifipa.
Ea' pindihi'ama amamaga awami mamumami hiami.

God anan ofagonama ukup awanem. Ae' a'i anan atona nonda'epa pepe bo'wepa andeande' ananipei etipa. A'i anan numafi ambagof moloma alop ukup ipe'imi andeande'ma waf aonai a'epa, pepe andeande' ma nemaf anama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais niefi'ianai.
God nofala ipe', anan bo'ona endilisi. Basef maloma maol main na'iam ea' ma nonda'anai, anan nonda'am andeande'.
Ipe' Kristen alupipei, penda' betena God nigiambamafa.
Ipe' pendase'ama lagof penda'ama nemaf bu'unai peloma esis Kristen alupusi hiesi.
Ae' a'ipipa mehipa agel Dembinai, ipe' pi'i basef mail pas amama ma esis Kristen alupusi hiesi.
Afa' wa'iam na'ama wa'i, Jisas Krais nigiambamepa na'a nonda'epa pepe la'ifipa. Ea' ma'um.

Ae' Pol aloma Sailas naloma Timoti wape na'ae. Ea' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' Kristen pape wambel Tesalonaika. Ipe' pape paloma God ahalomapa ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ipe' Kristen pape palomam ea' amamipei si'ipa.
Ae' a'i ahalomapa God noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais migiambamepa na'a monda'epa petaga la'ifipa ea' mope molomepago mese'epa opalef awanem.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei afa'ipei, afa' wa'i andeande'ma dendel wanifela Goda ipe'. Waf anama bo'ona. Dei' main, bale'ef ipe'inai nataga la'ifina endilisi ea' ipe' hipei atona etin ukup maimailipa atona etin. Ea' waf anama nataga nafe' lu'una endilisi ma ipe'
Waf anama atona dei' afa' wafela agof ipe'imi la'afena amam nematawa Kristen. Wa'iam na'ama wa'i esis Tesalonaika sofa' nimanimi hiami ea' sombale'efa Jisas saitu la'ifis.

Waf anama ipe'inai bu'unai, God nihi'ambafa na'ama. Anan nowaloga ape' ma waf ananinai bu'unai atona. Nonda'am na'ama ma ni'i ipe' bu'upei ma piowis wambel Ananinai. Dei' ipe' pefa' nimanimi hiami. God nambimb nonda'epa bo'wepa ma pepe wambel Ananinai
Anona nemaf God nonda' waf bu'unai na'ama. Nogwamasa nimanimi esis sanda'mepam ipe'i

Anan na'i notagaha nimanimi amama dei' ipe' pefa'ami ea' notagaha nimanimi afa'imi nonda'apa mopoma noma'w andeande'. Nonda'am nemaf anama Dembinai Jisas nokwaha heven notaga alihina nolomai nif lu'wami moloma ensel amama la'ifimi
Nemaf anama God nohambombaga esis isima sololama Anani soloma isima owa' sila basef bu'wami Dembinai ape'inai Jisas
Epes isima nemaf anama sofa' nimanimi awami na'ama. God nohambombagas la'ela'ef. Ea' sope laogona naep Dembinai, howalagon moloma pepel ananinai

Nemaf anama Dembinai notanimani nifi'i ma amam nematawa bu'wasi ananisi sefela agel ananinai noloma howalagon ananimi, ea' amam nematawa sombale'efana sondanifela anan sefela agel ananinai. Nemaf anama ipe' wapoti' penda'am na'ama etin. Dei' main, afa' wawalapa basef Godi la'afena ipe' ea' pembale'efa basef amama endilisi.

Afa' ukup ma'i amama ea' la'ela'ef wanda' betena God ape'inai ma nigiambamepa. Afa' ogawa God nofalepa ea' wanda' betena anan nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa endilisi si'i anan nofalepa penda'am. Afa' wanda' betena God nonda'epa pataga la'ifipa ma penda' waf anama bu'unai hianai pa'i pienda'anai, ea' pembale'efa Krais pembefa maol ipe' panda'anai

Afa' wanda' betena ipe' ma pefela agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisasi ma nonda'am na'ama etin nefela agof ipe'imi. Amama motagama God ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais migiambamepa na'a monda'epa pataga la'ifipa.
Ipe' Kristen alupipei, afa' wa'i wi'i basefa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais anona nemaf notanima nifi'i wapoti' ma ape' mondakolas molomana. Dei' wahali'ipa na'ama

Enis epes sa'ipipa sa'i nemaf Dembinai anona nemaf niefi'ianai nataga ea'. Ae' ine' egawa. Basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipanam enin epen na'ipi pas o enin epen na'iam okom ananinai atona o esis sa'i afa' wanda' basef amama wasapa'am mafo'o wa'ipasa basef amama? I'i peme'asa basef amama, ipe' ina pehafel gegelalasipa kwapete' mehip ea' ukup ipe'imi aom, owa'

Ipe' ina peme' enin epen nembaso'mepa ma anom basefa Dembinai notanimani, owa'. Nemaf dembinai niefi'ianai, ina nataga, owa'etin. Epes hiesi ata' sali' sosombala basefi sose'ana alafugah God ea' aman aonai nosambala mi'uli Godi notaga nondawalap. Aman anama owagama nefe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi ma'oma

Anan noham amamaga amama hiami epes sanda' lotumami sailam si'i Godi ea' nowa' alafuga ma amamaga amama. Ea' nefela agel ananinai atona lu'una, nonda' amamaga amama hiami mofe' owina anan. Ea' nuwis nupe ipat lu'unai Godi nowalapa basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' atowe Dembiwei God.”
Fowa' ae' ape alomepa a'ipipa basefa amamaga amama. Ipe' ukup mase'epama a'amon?
Ipe' dei' pegawa amamaga amama mahefa eafa aman anama aonai ma notaga nondawalap alihiguma nemaf anama God nandandepananai
Ipe' pegawa dei' pepel anama nosambala mi'uli Godi ata' nanda' opeh nandambaho' nape. Anama ata' napoma mondahama nogota anama aman anama nili'akwa eaf ananinai nofe'
Nemaf anama aman anama aonai nosambala mi'uli Godi notaga nondawalap. Ea' nemaf Dembinai Jisas niefi'ianai nohana naga'ma malogel ambip ananimi atom moloma mafifili lu'wami ananimi
Aman anama aonai nosambala mi'uli Godi notaga nondawalap alihiguma ma pepel Satani atona. Ea' waf baso'mainai Satani nonda' anan la'ifinai nonda' ikwaf naninani si'i God nanda'anai
Anan nanda' waf hianai baso'omunai ma waf aonai. Ea' nombaso'ma esis saila eaf sefe' higililasanai. I'i epes isima si'i aho'ma basef endilisimi, God nofa'as sotanimani sope andeande'. Owa', sandaiwa'
Ea' God nosapa'i amamaga amama mombaso'ma esisi ea' seme' basef amama kwamaimi baso'ami asasimi sembale'efam
Esis amam nematawa hiesi ina ata' sombale'efa basef endilisimi, owa'etin. Sondanifela sonda' waf aonai atona. Amama atom anona nemaf sofa' amamaga awami atom basef kot Dembinai God nonda'anai.

Fowa' gani dambadamba God nosahe'epa ma nofa'epa petanimani pambale'efa basef endilisimi. Ama pepel Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nanda'epa bo'wepa. Ea' la'ela'ef wanifela Goda ipe'. Kristen alupipei, okom Dembinai nainailipa
Nemaf anama afa' wa'ipipa basef bu'wami Godi ma anan nofalepa nose'epa nafifili Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi. Ma God nefela agola Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais noloma agof ipe'imi wapoti'
Ea' dei' ipe' Kristen alupipei pitu la'ifipa ma basef hiami Godi wa'ipipam malogof o wanda'mepago okwatih, amama ipe' pendanifel

Afa' wa'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais naloma God Ahalomapa ape'inai ukup amamumi maimailapa magiambamapa manda'apa mataga la'ifipa. Amam manda'apa na'ama la'ela'ef. Ea' magiambamapa mape mohafa God nonda'apa mope andeande'
Ea' dei' afa' wa'i amam biam monda'epa petaga la'ifipa migiambamepa penda' waf bu'unai hianai ma pi'ipasa basef bu'wami hiami.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei, afa' wa'i ata' wi'ipipago anom basef wapoti'. Ipe' penda' betena Goda nigiambamafa ma basef Dembinai mefe' mehip anama hiagoma mofa' agel lu'unai si'i fowa' manda'am la'afena ipe'
Ipe' penda' betena afa' ma God notagahofa ma lagofa epes isima sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' pegawa epes hiesi ina dei' sembale'efa basef Godi, ata' owa'
Ea' Dembinai naila basef ananimi andeande' nanda' amamaga ananimi andeande' ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa numafipa ma aman aonai owa' la'ifinama nomboma opalef ipe'imi
Dembinai nafela ukup afa'imi dei' ogawa ipe' na'ama. Waf hianai wa'ipipa ma pinda'anai, anama ipe' penda'ana endilisi. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' ina pindaiwa'mana, owa'. Pilana penda'ana la'ela'ef
Afa' wa'i Dembinai nonda' opalef ipe'imi ma pegawa God okom nainailipa endilisi. Afa' wa'i nemaf anama nimanimi motagamepa, pitu la'ifipa ma pepel Kraisi atona penda' waf bu'unai atona.
Ipe' Kristen alupipei, afa' wa'ipipa mehip na'ama ma agel Dembinai Jisas Kraisi. I'i enis alupusi ipe'isi sope etina owa' seme' basef amama wa'ipasam sieilam, ipe' pihi'amas pekwahis pefe'
Ipe' pegawa ma pila waf afa'inai. Fowa' wape walomepa, ina wape etin, owa'
Ina ofa' gwa'aimi na'a ma ipe', owa'. Watalom etin wa'am. Ea' wanda' opeh la'ifimi hiami wanda'am owamb alipa ina wapoma ipe' etipa pimafiafa, owa'
Afa' wi'i ofa' gwa'aimi ma ipe', God na'i andeande'ma okom ananinai. Ea' afa' wandaiwa'ma ofa' gwa'aimi ipe'imi, owa'. Afa' wanda'am na'ama ma ipe' pati waf afa' wanda'anai ma petolona pilana
Ipe' pegawa fowa' wape walomepa afa' wase'epa mi'uli na'ama. Na'i epen owa' nenda' maoli, ipe' ina pemafian pese'an anom gwa'aimi, owa', hapaini
Afa' ina wa'ipipa na'ama etin, owa'. Wame' basef enis sape la'afena ipe'i ina sanda' opeh, owa'. Sape etin. Esis sapoma basef atom usihimi ma amamaga enis epesi atom

Agel Jisas Kraisi Dembinai ape'inai afa' wa'ipipa mehipa mi'uli anama ma epes isima sape etini, wa'i ofela ukup asasimi ma sonda' waf na'ama. Esis ata' sope andeande'ma sonda' maola sotagama gwa'aimi asasimi atom dei'
Ipe' Kristen alupipei, ipe' ina ala'uta nepa ma penda' waf bu'unai, owa'

I'i enin epen owa' nila basef amama hiami afa' wanda'ami, ipe' pegawa epen inima andeande'. Ea' pihi'aman pepe laogona enin. Ama enin ambal aona ma waf ananinai. Dei' main, enin ina naila basef afa'imi, owa'
Ipe' ina pefalan pi'i nautamepa ipe'ini, owa'. Ukup mopoma enin si'i alupini ipe'ini ea' pi'ipana negawa waf anama aonai ma nekwahona.
Afa' wa'i Dembinai anan ofagonama opaf awanena la'ela'ef nose'epa okom awanena ma mamagoma ipe' pepe peafe'ma. Afa' wa'i Dembinai nope nolomago ipe' hipei.
Anan nanda' basefi nase'e pen ae' Pol anda' basef amama ma lagel ae'anai, a'i nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'. Ikwaf anama ae'anai ma basef amama hiami ae'ami, anda'am na'ama etin.
Afa' wa'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nigiambamepago ipe' hipei na'a.
Ea' ma'um.
Ae' Pol anda' basef amama. God nofa' ape' motanimani mope andeande' ea' mape mohafa anona nemaf miti Krais Jisas mope molomana. Amam biam mandandepe ma'ipi basef la'ifimi ma ape aposel Krais Jisasi.

Ae' anda'menago basef amama ine' Timoti, ine' nembale'efa God dei' nataga nogalome ae'inai endilisi. Ae' a'i God noloma Krais Jisas dembinai afa'inai miti uwahipina migiambamena na'a monda'ena netaga la'ifina ma bale'ef, opaf ine'inai nope awanena.

Fowa' ae' afo'o etap hiagoma Masedonia ma a'ipina dei' na'ama etin a'ipina wapoti'. Ine' ata' nepe la'ela'ef na'ama Efesusa ni'ipa anom amam mehipa ina mi'ipasa anom basef baso'maimi, owa'. Mi'ipasa basef Godi atom.

Ni'ipasam mokwaha basef fowa'imi wafimi, basef mamumami hiami ma'i agof amama bafapas ehasas asasisi. Basef amama mamboma ukup amamumi mafela ukup amamumi ma'i basef mandahihianamam. Amam amama ina manda' maol Godi mataga la'ifima bale'ef, owa'. Maol anama Godi natagama bale'ef atona.

Ea' mi'uli anama dei' a'ipinanai, i'i esis sombale'efana silana, basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipas mihi'ambasa waf esis sanda'anai ina aona, owa'. Esis sombale'efa God endilisi. Ama nambimb waf anama hianai nefela ukup asasimi mimila God noloma enis epes wapoti'.
Ea' anom amam ukup mase'ama waf anama bu'unai. Ea' dei' mamboma basef bu'wami ma'i basef wafimi atom.
Amam ma'i mopoma tisa mowalipasa mi'uli Godi si'i anom dembemi tisa ma'i, “Basef afa'imi endilisimi atom.” Ea' amam ina mogawa basef amama ma'iami mogawa ofagema, owa'.
I'i afa' ogawa mi'uli Godi wilana, na'ama andeande'.

Afa' ogawa amama wapoti', mi'uli anama ina nafi'mai epes isima sape andeande'i, owa'. Anama nafi'mai epes sanda' waf aonai, sosambala mi'uli anama owa' sope owina amam agufumi. Ea' enis seso' alafugaha Godi sanda' waf aonai. Enis sa'i waf Godi hapainai, ma saila waf etapanai atona. Ea' enis saha ahapas mamasas saga', saha enis epes wapoti' saga'.

Enis sanda' so'a wauli ma waf anama aonai, ea' enis sahambombaga enis amam nematawa si'i fowa' esis Sodom sanda'anai. Ea' enis sofa' enis epes safe' satalisa otamba sanda'masa maol. Ea' enis sambaso'ami, ea' enis sambaso'am sa'i basef endilisi gani ilif. Ea' enis sanda' waf anama naloma anona waf hianai aonai napa' naloma basef endilisimi. Mi'uli Godi nafi'i na'i epes isima sanda' waf aonai.
Basef amama mape basef bu'wami God nase'eam ae' ma ewalapam. Basef amama bu'wami ma'ipafa God bu'unai endilisi ofagonama danifel naloma mafifili.
Dembinai ape'inai Krais Jisas nase'e pepel, okom napoma ae' bu'uwai anda' maol ananinai nanda'e anda' maol anama, ea' anifelona.

Endilisi, fowa' la'ela'ef ae' anda' basef findiwami ma agel Ananinai, apa' aloma esis Kristen, anda' waf aonai ma Anan. Ea' ae' ina egawa andeande', owa' embale'efanai, ea' dei' anda' waf anama aonai ma anan la'ela'ef ape. Amama atom dei' nati uwahipiwi nagiambame.
Dembinai ape'inai nagiambame na'a nanda'e ataga la'ifiwi dei' embale'efana okom nainailana.

Anom basef endilisimi atoma epes hiesi some'ama sombale'efam. Basef amama na'ama. Krais Jisas nisila'i etap anae' ma nefa'ape epes manda' waf aonai nokwahomapana motanimani mape andeande'. Ae' ma'uwi ali' anda' waf aonai ikila' enis epes ea' ma'uwi ae' atowe.

Amama atom dei' God nati uwahipiwi ali' ma Krais Jisas na'i nih'iambasa Anan ina okom wandafunama ae' ulal, owa'. Ae' anda' waf aonai ikila' enis epes, ea' anan nape nohafe nogota launai ma etanima ifi'mai Anan. Ama owagama hiesi siti ae' ma esis wapoti' sombale'efana sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef.
Anan dembinai King nape la'ela'ef. Anan owa' neaga'i, epes owa' la'ifisa sotolona. Anan atona God endilisinai. Ae' a'i agel lu'unai pepel nafifili mopoma Anan atona la'ela'ef. Endilisi.

Nogalome ae'inai Timoti, dei' ase'enago basef amama nenda' maol. Ae' okom napoma basef Godi afagel nimbewa'inai amam profet Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela ukup amamumi ma'ipinami. Ine' nila basef amama, nenda' wandaf la'ifina andeande' neloma esis naumbih.

Wandaf anama ine' la'ifina nembale'efa God nenda' waf bu'unai andeande', ma basef mape opaf ine' nomoni ina ma'ipina anona waf aonai ine' nanda'anai, owa'. Enis epes soso' alafugaha waf anama bu'unai. Ea' dei' bale'ef asasinai aona si'i sip papalalana nail otamba aona nala naoh.

Epes sanda' waf anama, amam biam Himeneus naloma Aleksander. Bale'ef amamunai aona. Ae' andaiwa'mam ali'amonam mafe' lagof Satani ma mogawa gawa bu'unai. Anda'am na'ama amam ina monda' basef findiwama agel Godi, owa'.

Maol anama ae' a'i efela okom ine'inai nenda'ami, basef mali'i na'ama. Ipe' penda' betena God pihali'ana, pinifelona ma epes hiesi penda' betena anan nigiambama esis soloma amam king dembemi moloma gavman dembemi wapoti'. Ipe' penda' beten na'ama ma ape' hiapai mope opalef awanem, mila waf Godi bu'unai.
Beten anama bu'unai ma naep Godi, notanima nofa' ape' mope andeande'. I'i ape' monda' waf anama monda' beten, Anan nondanifela ma ape'.
Anan na'i nofa'ai epes hiesi sotanimamai Anan sope andeande'ma sogawa basef endilisimi ofagema.
Ape' mogawa God atotona nape. Ea' anona aman nape la'afena God naloma epes, anama aman endilisinai anan Krais Jisas.

Anan fowa' God nandandepana ea' nakwaha ambal ananai atona natala ape' epes hiapai nakwahomapa waf aonai motanimani. Nemaf anama dohamadohama Krais nihi'ambamapa God na'i nefa'ai epes hiesi sotanimani.
Ea' dei' God nanda'e ape aposela ewalapa basef bu'wami Ananimi. Ae' a'i endilisi, ina ambaso'am. Anan nanda'e ape dembiwei tisa ma enis epes hiesi sololama Godi ma sombale'efa basef amama endilisimi.
Ea' dei' ae' a'i epes hiesi wambel hiagoma sonda' beten. Ae' okom na'i esis hiesi sope bo'wes andeande', sokwaha ukup wandafumi moloma migimigah ea' sonda' beten.

Ae' a'i awau nematawa wapoti' onda' luwaguf maim bu'wami atom, mondahama awau dende'. Ina onda'am bandabandam endilisi motambel nimbifah, owa'. Awau ina ola sosaf anama ofalo'ma balagah alop si'ina ombahigis mamumami hiami moloma sosaf gol bu'wami, owa'. Luwaguf amama satalom otamba hiami otalom, hapaimi.
Ea' nematawa wa'i basef wa'i ope awasi Godi, awau onda' maol bu'unai hianai naninani. Maol anama si'i sosaf awaunai endilisinai.
Maina nemaf ipe' penda' lotu, nematawa awau owalipama wila waf anama so'umbilinai ea' osopama malogofa ofa' basef andeande'.
Ae' ina a'i aho'ma ano'w nemata'w kope dembe'wi tisa kope kwili' ma anona maol, owa'. Nematawa osopama malogof ome' basef atom.
Basef ofagema mape na'ama. Fowa' God nali' nanda' aman Adam, ea' nanda' Iv kwagi'.
Adam ina nombale'efa basef baso'maimi, owa'. Nemata'w kwambele'efa basef baso'maimi, ea' kwataga nemata'w kwanda' waf aonai.
Waf nematawa onda'anai anama. Awo ombale'efa God endilisi ea' ukup mimila enis epes wigiambamas, ea' ope bo'owa andeande' umafi awau andeande' waf aonai a'awa.
I'i ombale'efa waf anama wilana la'ela'ef, God nambimb nokwahomawa waf aonai awau wanda'anai nofa'awa utanimani ope andeande'. Maina nogota ola awasi, nigiambamawa olas andeande'.
Basef amama endilisimi. I'i emi aman ni'i nope dembinai numafi esis Kristen sios, anan okom na'i maol bu'unai endilisi.

Ea' emi aman nope numafi siosi nope andeande' endilisi ma epes ina siti anona waf aonai ma anan, owa'. Anan noso' nemata'w atoto'w. Ina nea' embel nohaga nogaol, owa'. Anan okom nopaina numafi alop ananinai andeande'. Anan nila okom bu'unai atona nonda' waf bu'unai hianai. Anan okom ni'i hiesi alupusi etis ananisi hi'ilas nose'as gwa'aimi. Anan nope notaga tisa bu'unai ma basef bu'wami atom.
Ina nea' embel laifimi hiami, owa'. Ina okom wandafuna mehip, owa'. Nonda' epes sa'osa'ombemas. Ina nohas etin, owa'. Ina okom ni'ini'i ma otamba.
Anan numafi awasi waulu'mana andeande' ea' nonda' awasi ananisi sila basef ananimi ma sonda' agel ananinai nope andeande'.
Emi aman owa' numafi awasi soloma waulu'mana andeande', anan ina notaga nope agilinai numafi sios Godi, owa'.
Aman anama nataga Kristen dambanai ina nope dembinai numafi sios, owa'. Na'ama nosambala basef Godi nogalo'mana si'i nagalo'ma aman aonai Satan.
Aman agel bu'unai ma amam nematawa sololama Godi, aman anama notaga nope numafi sios. I'i anan owa' agel bu'unai, anan ambal aona ea' nofe' nuwis esag anama Satani nofa'ana.

Ea' na'ama etina amam amama magiambama agufumi siosi, amam ukup mope andeande'ma maol amamunai. Amam ina mi'i malogof biam, owa'. Ina mea' embel la'ifimi hiami endilisi mohaga mogaol, owa'. Ea' ina mombaso'mas molomas mofa' otamba enis epesi, owa'.
Basef amama endilisimi fowa' mandambahi'i dei' mataga mandawalap alihim, amam mombale'ef la'ifim. Ea' basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipam basef mihi'ambamam waf amamunai ina aona, owa'. Bo'ona.
Pili' ata' piti maol amamunai. Ama piti monda'ana andeande', mope monda' maol siosi.

Ea' na'ama etina wauhiamam amamuwai ukup mopaiwa andeande'ma maol awau wanda'anai. Awau ina ondaha basefa enis, owa'. Ope andeande', ina wea' embel wainim la'ifimi hiami, owa'. Dendel onda' waf bu'unai atona.
Amam manda' maol siosi, wauhiamam amamuwai ato'w etin. Amom mumafi awo oloma awasi amamisi andeande'.
Amom mope monda' maola siosi, i'i monda' maol bu'unai, nambimb mofa' agof bu'wami. Ama la'ifim mowalapa basef bu'wami, mihi'ambas alihim amam mombale'efa Krais Jisas.
Endilisi ae' a'i efe'mago ine' mehip, ea' dei' ata' anda' basef amama mafo'mago ine'.

I'i owa' efo'o etaga ulal, ine' nitiago basef amama negawa waf anama esis sape andeande' ma wambota anama Godi. Wambota anama esis sios amam nematawa Godi ambal namunai napainai. Sios Godi si'i olaf la'ifinai nanda' basef endilisimi la'ifimi.
Endilisi, basef amama ofagema lu'wami endilisi. Mandambaho' mape mafe' mafe' dei' God nihi'ambafam alihim. Basef amama na'ama.

Anan nataga epen endilisinai nofa' alop epesi nataga nandawalap. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nihi'ambapa ma anan aman bu'unai nape andeande'. Amam ensel Godi matolona. Basef ananimi sa'ipasam mafe'ma kantri naninani hianai amam nematawa hiesi sololama Godi sembale'efana. Ea' God nofa'ana nalata heven nape nafifili ananinai.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'i basef alihim na'ama. Anona nemaf enis epes sokwaha sombale'efa basef endilisimi Godi. Ea' seme' basefa epes isima ambagof awami mambaso'ami sila basef ambagof awami ma'iami.
Anom amam mambaso'ami mawalipasa basef amama baso'maimi. Basef mape opalef asasimi nomon ma'iami mataga aom. Amam ina nambimb ata' momeme'ma waf aonai mogawana, owa'etin.

Nambimb muwalipasa basef amama ma esis sihi'ama waf sandaso'amainai sihi'ama anom gwa'aimi epes sagwa'ami. Gwa'aimi amama God atona nanda'ama ape' epes mombale'efana mogawa basef endilisimi. Amama ape' mofa'am minifela God mogwa'am.
Amamaga hiami God nanda'ami, bu'wami atom. Ape' minifelona, mofa'am, mogwa'am. Ina mokwahom, owa'.
Dei' main, basef Godi maloma beten manda' gwa'aimi amama mataga bo'om andeande'.
I'i ine' ni'ipasa basef amama esis Kristen alupusi, nambimb nepe epen bu'unai nonda' maol Krais Jisasi. Ea' nefa' pepel lu'unai ma basef mefela bale'ef ine'inai ma gawa bu'unai.
Ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i numunefisa basef atom wafimi, newa' alafugamam. Ina manda'ena nelafa waf Godi andeande' negawam, owa'.

Ine' negawa waf anama niwalipa alop si'ina nonda' maol alop neawi, amama la'ifim kwaikwaie' ma migiambamapa. Ea' ine' nelafa waf Godi, la'ifina endilisi ma nagiambamapa ma waf hianai bu'unai. I'i ine' nelafa waf Godi, anama la'ifina nagiambama ape' epes hiapai ma dei' mape etap nogota anae', ea' nigiambamapa owagama ilif heven wapoti'.
Basef amae' endilisimi atoma epes hiesi si'i aho'ma seme'am sombale'efam amama na'ama.

God anan ambal namunai napainai. Anan na'i nofa'ai amam nematawa hiesi sotanimani sope andeande'. Ea' dei' endilisi etis nefa'ai epes emi egafis sembale'efanai. Dei' mape mohafana ma'i endilisi nofa'apa. Amama atom dei' manda' maol lu'unai endilisi.
Ine' ni'ipasa basef amama mefe'mago esis amam nematawa niwalipas mehip silam.

Esis sati ine' ukup ma'i, ine' ata' awomina, ea' ina ni'i aho'ma si'i ine' aman falafinai, owa'. Ine' nepe si'i ikwaf bu'unai ma esis Kristen sila waf bu'unai ine' nanda'anai ma fe' pe ki bale'ef ine'inai, noloma waf anama okom na'ina'ianai noloma waf bu'unai.
Nogota anama ine' ata' nepe la'ela'ef nehafa ae', nenda' maol la'ifina ma nitalifa basef Godi alihiguma ma epes hiesi seme'am, ea' nefela ukup asasimi ma waf sonda'anai ni'ipasa basef Godi andeande'.

Fowa' agufumi mumafi siosi mawamona lagofa ine'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelam manda' betena ine' ea' anom amam ma'i basefa presen anama God nasi'inanai na'a. Dei' nenda' maol la'ifina nimafi presen anama andeande' God nali' nase'enana na'ai.
La'ela'ef ine' nimafi maol anama la'ifina nepomana. Ama epes hiesi siti waf ine' nanda'anai netaga bo'ona.

Nindumafuma andeande'ma waf ine' nanda'anai, ma basef amama niwalipasami. La'ela'ef nenda'am na'ama la'ifina. I'i ine' nenda'am na'ama, nambimb God nigiambamena neloma esis seme' basef ine' na'ipasami sailam, nofa'epa petanimani pepe andeande'.
Ina nenda' megah moham amam hagami ni'ipam basef la'ifimi, owa'. Nepe so'uso'umbel ni'ipama basef Godi, ni'ipam si'i na'ipa ahalomena ine'inai. Ea' ni'ipa awomimi si'i na'ipa owapena ine'imi.
Ni'ipa nematawa hagiwai si'i na'ipa mama'wena ine'ikwi. Ea' ni'ipa awiawai si'i na'ipa haniti'mina ine'ikwi ma waf bu'unai notaga bo'ona endilisi ma naep Godi.
Basefa nematawa alifiwai ma'i na'ama. Nematawa awama, i'i owa' enin epen numafiawa, ine' nimafiawa andeande'.

I'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi enis awasi akwa'usi o bafasa'w akwa'usi sope esis ata' sogawa andeande' na'ama. Maol asasinai nali'i sumafi ahapas mamasas asasisi etis ata' sili' ma sogwa wiaf fowa' esis somafias. Esis sonda'am na'ama saila basef Godi. God okom na'iana endilisi waf anama.
I'i ano'w nemata'w akwa'w ato'w kope alifi'wi, akwa'w kwanda'am na'ama. Ako'w kogawa endilisi God nambimb nigiambama'w ma waf bu'unai, kofala God la'ela'ef owamb alipa beten akwa'unai.
I'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwaila okom akwa'unai atona kwandagala ma alop atona kwanda' waf aonai, akwa'w si'i kwaga'i.
Ine' nefela ukup nematawai ma wila basef amama ma onda' waf bu'unai, ma awau upe andeande'. Ama enin epen ina ni'ipawa ni'i awau wanda' waf aonai, owa'.

Emi egafis owa' sumafi esis esimbel atom asasisi, esis ina nambimb simafi esis mamasas ahapas soloma batawisas. Epes isima sakwaha bale'ef sataga epes awasi endilisi sikila' isima owa' seambale'efa Godi.

I'i anowa nematawa wahupawa maga'i, awau ina onda' so'a waol, owa'. Ope andeande'ma enis epes sotolowa si'i wape andeande'. Onda' maol bu'unai ma umafi batawisawa, ose'as gwa'aimi epes wigiambama esis Kristen wambota Godi, umafi awasi awausi andeande' ope onda' maol hianai bu'unai naninani ofe' ofe' otagama afagof 60-peleim, andeande'. Nematawa wanda'am na'ama atowa ine' nenda' agof awaumi mil okwatiha nigiambamawa nese'awa gwa'aimi.

Ea' ine' owa' nenda' agofa nematawa awama awiawai alifiwai, owa'. Hapaiwai. Anona nemaf awau wi'i ugi'ma ukup awoumi ola alop awaunai atona wi'i oso' amam wapoti, ea' hapaiwai. Awau ukup amama mapaiwa, dei' wakwaha wafa basef bu'wami Kraisi fowa' ombale'efanai.
Dei' wakwaha basef bu'wami la'ifimi fowa' wa'iam waloma Krais. Wanda' waf anama aonai, na'ama ofagema awaumi.

Ea' anona waf awau wanda'ana wapoti'. Wanda' waf anama ala'uta nawa. Ea' wafe' wawis ifagw. Awau ina ala'uta nawa, owa'. Wakwalopa basef enis epesi wanda'am wafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' wawalapa basef mamumami ina andeande'ma ape' mi'iam, owa'.

Amama atom dei' a'i nematawa awama alifiwai ata' awiawai nambimb oso' amam wapoti' ma ola awasi umafias ope ifagw awaumi atom. Ae' a'i awau ina onda' anom amamaga awami motagama esis naumbih ma si'i anom basef awami ma ape', owa'.
Ine' negawa, anowa nematawa wahupawa maga'i, wakwaha eaf bu'unai wafe' waila aman aonai Satan.

I'i anona wambota nemata'w akwama akwa'w Kristen o anowa nematawa alifiwai ope, ea' nemata'w akwama Kristen kumafiawa. Akwa'w konda'am na'ama ma esis sios ina sonda' maol sope somafiawa, owa'. Na'ama andeande'ma sios esis amam nematawa Godi sumafi nematawa alifiwai kwahuwai endilisi awau atowa wapani.

Amam agufumi mumafi ipe' Kristen manda' maol andeande' endilisi, ipe' pinifelom penda'am andeande' pimafiam pese'am gwa'aimi maim bif etif mikila' peso' anom agufumi ma siosi. Agufumi manda' maol Godi mawalipasa basef ofagema Ananimi ipe' pimafiam na'ama etin andeande'.
Basef mape Buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“Ine' owa' nesopama malogofa bulmakau manda' maol mafa'asa wit, owa'.”
Ea' anom basef wapoti' na'ama ma'i,
“Aman nanda' maoli anan nofa' anom amamaga tu'wanima maol anan nanda'anai.”

I'i enin epen etitin ni'i, “Agilinai anama numafi esis Kristeni nonda' waf aonai, ine' owa' neme'anama basef ananimi, hapaimi. I'i epes bias o wenis si'i basef amama ma waf aonai anan nanda'anai, ine' neme'as.”
Ea' i'i anom agufumi monda' waf aonai, ine' ni'ipam basef la'ifimi ni'ipam naep esis Kristen hiesi. Nenda'am na'ama ma enis epes umbamohasa waf anama ma ina sonda'am na'ama.

Ae' a'ipina andeande'ma naep Godi naloma Krais Jisas maloma amam ensel God nandandepami. Ine' nila basef amama andeande'. Ine' owa' ninifala anom amam awomimi ni'ipam mehip. Ea' ina nenda' anom dembemi sa'ombemam ni'ipam so'umbel, owa'. Ni'ipa epes hiesi na'ama etin. Ina ninifala enis epes ea' nenda' enis alupusi sa'ombemas, owa'. Ni'ipas na'ama etin.

Ine' owa' nefa'anai anona aman mehip nenda'ana nope agilinai ma esis Kristen, owa'. Nili' notolona andeande' nanda' waf bu'unai o nanda' waf aonai. Na'ama enis epes sitilina nigiambama anona nanda' waf aonai, si'i ine' wapoti' nanda' waf aonai anan nanda'anai. Ine' nindumafuma nepe andeande'.
Ine' nekwaha waf anama na' embel wafimi atom. Andeande'ma nea' wain kwaie'una nigiambama opaf ine'inai ma netofa awes la'ela'ef nanda'inai.
Waf aonai enis epes sanda'anai nape alihina esis nafe' nali'as sogawana alihina. Ea' waf aonai enis sanda'anai nape nandambaho', anona nemaf notaga nendawalap.
Ea' na'ama etin anona waf bu'unai wapoti' nape nandawalap. Ea' anona waf bu'unai nandambaho' ea' ina nandambaho' la'ela'ef, owa'. Anona nemaf nondawalap.

Ipe' Kristen agof a'epa panda' opeh na'a pape owina enis epes, ipe' ata' ukup mopoma na'ama. Dembemi mumafi ipe'i, ipe' pinifelom pi'i bu'wami pefela agof amamumi peme' basef amamumi. Ama enis epes ina nambimb si'i basef awami ma agel Godi ma waf ipe' Kristen panda'anai, owa'.
Ipe' agof a'epa panda' opeh na'a ma amam agufumi dembemi anom Kristen, ipe' ina ukup mope na'ama pi'i, “Anom Kristen sahopafa atom ea' hapaimi, osambala basef amamumi.” Owa'.

Ipe' ukup mope na'ama pi'i, “Amom Kristen ea' afa' ukup mimilam, onda' maol amamunai andeande', ukila' maol wanda'ama amam agufumi owa' Kristeni.” Dei' main, ipe' agof a'epa pagiambama amam Kristen ipe' ukup maimailami.
Timoti, basef amama ine' niwalipasam nefela ukup asasimi nenda'as sotaga la'ifis.
La'ela'ef ine' niwalipa esis amam nematawa ma sonda' waf bu'unai, ea' nefelasa sonda'am.

Basef dembinai Jisas Kraisi mawalipapa andeande'ma waf Godi. I'i anona aman nokwaha basef amama ma nowalipa esisa anom basef owa' mefe' dende'ma basef amama bu'wami Jisasi, ape' mogawa aman anama na'i nosambala basef Godi. Anan ina nogowa andeande', owa'. Anan nomonas a'anai. Anan okom na'i basef nalomas sandahihianama. Sa'i basef amama, nafitap nalomasa basef amama ofagema. Basef amama atom mawalapa waf anama. Opalef aoma enis epes, sanda' findiwa ma sope ukup aom mopoma sahin owan.

Epes isima sanda' na'ama, ukup asasimi mahaga magaol endilisi ea' ina sombale'efa basef bu'wami endilisimi, owa'. Ea' sa'i basef sapa'am sandahihianama saloma enis. Ea' sa'i, “Eaf anama Godi eaf sofa' otambanai.”
Endilisi, emi egafis sila waf Godi ma esis ukup mopoma amamaga asasimi si'i, ea' ma'um dende'ma ape', opalef asasimi mape awanem mape andeande'.
Ape' mogawa, mamalapa olapa mataga etap anae', nemaf anama ape' ina mofa' anom amamaga mafi'i, owa'. Anona nemaf moga' wapoti' ina mofa' anom amamaga mefe' molomapa mokwaha etap anae', owa'.
Ea' anom gwa'aimi luwaguf maim mo'omapa, ape' mi'iam mi'i, “Ea' ma'um amama ea' dende'ma ape'.”
