Noa nembale'efa God dei' nihi'ambana basefa amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai, amamaga amama Anan owa' ata' notolom nogowami. Anan naila basef Godi nanda' anona sip lu'unai. Sip anama Noa nao'wa akwa'w kwaloma awasi ananisi safe' sawis sapaina sape andeande'. Ina saga', owa'. Sapan. Anan nembale'efa God. Amama atom si'i nanda'masa basefa esis amam nematawa sape etapi hi'alas. Anan nembale'efa God. Amama atom God nofalana na'i aman bu'unai andeande', si'i nanda'masam emi egafis sembale'efana.

Nemaf anama God nofala Abraham nakwaha wambel ananinai nafe' etap God na'i nease'anagoma ea' anan nembale'efana. Amama atom naila basef Godi nafe'. Anan ina nagawa anama neafe'ma, owa'. Ea' anan nembale'efana dei' nafe'.

Anan nembale'efa God ea' nafe' nape etap anama fowa' gani God na'i basef endilisimi atom na'i nease'anagoma. Anan nape etap anama si'i anan anona wambota. Nape ifagw selimi naloma Aisak naloma Jekop, amam biam anona nemaf mofa' etap anama molomanai, si'i fowa' God nali' na'i basef amama na'i endilisimi atom.
La'ela'ef Abraham okom na'i ata' niti wambel taun anama gani ilif olalef maim la'ifimi motawa. God atona gawainai Anan okom na'i nonda' wambel anama, ea' nanda'ana.

Sara akwa'w asa'w ea' ina kola awasi, owa'. Nemaf kola awasianai nafe' hi'alana. Ea' akwa'w kombale'efa God. Amama atom dei' God nanda'akw la'ifikwa kola awani. Dei' main, akwa'w kombale'efana endilisi ma basef amama anan na'i endilisimi atom, kwa'i anan nambimb nigi'mam nonda'am andeande' si'i na'iam.

Ea' dei' aman anama atotona, anan hagona ea' felefele'ma neaga' nataga ahalomas awasi ananisi hiesi endilisi anona nemaf sigi' seatagai. Esis sataga hiesi endilisi, sondahama ondowa motawa ilifi, maloma wesan na'oh naoh akata. Epes ina la'ifisa seambam, owa'.

Epes isima sembale'efa God la'ela'ef sape safe'ma saga'. Ina sali' sofa' amamaga bu'wami amama God na'i endilisi niese'asami nemaf anama sape, ata' owa'. Esis sembale'efana endilisi saitu laogon sandanifel si'i satolom. Ea' sawalapa basef sa'iam sa'i, “Ape' mape etap anae' si'i epes anona wambelipai. Ape' mafi'i mape nogota bandana etap anae' anona wambelipai.”
Epes sa'i basef amama, ape' mogawas sa'i sogolopa etap asasinai endilisinai.
I'i ukup asasimi ata' mape ma'i wambel anama fowa' sakwahona safi'i, dei' esis ata' eaf nafe' sotanima sefe'agon. Owa', sandaiwa'.

Ea' dei' esis ina sanda'am na'ama, owa'. Opalef asasimi mohafa anona etap bu'unai endilisi nikila' anama fowa'iguma. Anama heven atogon. Amama atom dei' God ina ambal aona ma epes isima sa'i, “Ine' God ape' manda' lotumanai, owa'.”
Anan nandomba anona wambel taun ma epes isima sembale'efanai sofe' seapoma.

Abraham nembale'efa God endilisi ma basef amama na'i endilisimi atom nalomanomi. Ea' dei' God nagwamba Abrahama nese'ana Aisak nondolalimana ma God. Endilisi, Abraham nape nohafa noha nogalomana ananinai nondolalimana.
Ea' God nali' na'ipana na'i, “Esis wambota Aisaki etis anona nemaf sofa' agel wambota ine'inai.”
Abraham okom na'i na'ama na'i, “I'i ae' ehana afuna, ea' hapainai, nambimb God nefelona wapoti'.”
Ea' dei' ape' mi'iam mi'i amama si'i God nafela Aisak netanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ma Abraham notanima nofa'ana.
Aisak nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nefalo'ma Jekop naloma Iso na'i God nonda'am la'ifima amamaga bu'wami na'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai.
Jekop nembale'efa God, dei' nemaf anama felefele'ma na'i neaga', nefalo'ma nogamana Josepi biam nanda'am mataga la'ifim. Anan nahapila bandan nandaha'amon naitu nandanifel ma God nanda' lotumana.

Josep nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' felefele'ma na'i neaga' anan na'i basefa anona nemaf esis Israel sokwaha etap hiagoma Isip sefe'. Ea' na'ipasa sowa bihiguf alop ananimi hi'agif gani anona etap esis Israel sefe' seapoma.

Mamasana Mosesi sembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' mama'wana kolana sambahe'ana nape aomb wanom. Dei' main, esis bias satolona bo'ona endilisi. Esis ina umbamahasa King dembinai Fero ma mi'uli ananinai, owa'.
Nemaf anama Moses nataga dembena, nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' okom na'i nandaiwa'ma esis sofalana si'i nemata'w akwama King Fero nogaloma'w, owa'.
Na'i nefa' nimanimi na'ama etin neloma esis wambota atona Godi. Nandaiwa'ma nila waf aonai ma nope nondanifel nogota anama bandana.

Anan okom na'i, i'i anan nofa' ambal aonai ma agel Kraisi, amama bu'wami endilisi mikila' otamba hiami maloma sosaf bu'unai hianai naninani esis Isipi. Dei' main, anan okom napoma amamaga amama bu'wami endilisi anona nemaf God na'i endilisi niese'anami.

Moses nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nohafel nakwaha etap hiagoma Isip. Anan ina umbamahana ma okom wandafunai King Feroi, owa'. Anan si'i nati aman anama esis owa' la'ifisa seatolona naep asasimi. Ea' dei' nape la'ifina.

Anan nembale'efa God dei' naila basef Ananimi ma gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova, naha sipsip nanda' lotuma God. Ea' nanda' esimbel nandisam utagw ilif wa'owa'ol nemaf anama ensel anama noha awasi amam esis Isipi ina atuwasi noha esis Israel, owa'.

Esis Israel sombale'efa God. Amama atom dei' satopa' naoh agilima Embel Akwahimi matopa' embel mambo safe' akata si'i etap fatauguma. Ea' esis Isip sati esis saitu la'afen, sagi'mas safe' ea' embel motanima mowambu'as mahas saga' hi'alas.
Esis Israel sombale'efa God, amama atom dei' safe' tulif sandanogamom endalelemb sanda' otamba sanda'ami wambel Jeriko sape wik si'inai, nimeguf 7-peleim, ea' endalelemb amama mandatal mowa etap.

Nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a waola amami Rahap, akwa'w kombale'efa God. Amama atom dei' amam biam mandambaho' mafi'i matologini kumafiam andeande'. Ea' dei' akwa'w ina afu'w kwaloma epes isima wambelisi sosambala basef Godi, owa'.
Ea' dei' ae' ata' iwatani maim basef wapoti'? Owa'. Nogota ina laona ma ata' i'i basefa Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jepta, Devit naloma Samuel maloma amam profet, owa'.

Amam amama membale'efa God. Amama atom dei' maitu la'ifim mikila' wandaf mahagofa soldia amam king dembemi hiami. Mape dembemi mumafiasa waf bu'unai ea' mofa' amamaga bu'wami God na'i niese'amami. Ea' masopama malogofa mafis amama laion wandafumi lu'wami.

Ea' mahefa nif lu'wami fandumi. Amam mafa' mafe'ma mindihi'ama bainah ea' ina mapisilam, owa'. Amam ina mape la'ifim, ea' nambimb mofa' pepel Godi. Ea' mataga la'ifim endilisi ma wandaf mahagofa amam soldia hiami epes esis anona wambota.

Anom amam maga'i motanima mohafel wapoti', mamasas amamuwai watolom wao'wam. Enis epes sanda' kalabus ea' esis naumbih sahambombaga alop asasinai endilisi, felefele'ma seaga'. I'i esis sila basef asasimi, nambimb sokwahis sefe' wafifis. Owa', esis ina saila basef asasimi, owa'. Esis ukup mapoma anona nemaf sotanima sohafel hi'agif sofa' ambal namunai, na'ama andeande' endilisi.
Enis sofa' nimanimi ma esis naumbih sa'i basef findiwaimi ma esis, sahas endilisi. Ea' enis sowa'as sen sanda'as sape sanda' kalabus.
Enis, naumbih sakwaha otamba sahas afis. Ea' enis, sanda'as awes endilisi. Enis sofa' so satopa'as alop asasinai biefis etis. Ea' enis, sahas bainah saga'.
Ea' enis sembale'efa Godi sowaho' alop mafis sipsipi meme si'i luwaguf safe'. Esis amamaga hiami a'asa alop asasinai. Ea' naumbih sanda'mas waf aonai endilisi sase'as nimanimi.

Ea' dei' safa' safe' ganigani sandambaho' etap wafiguma epes a'agoma. Enis sandambaho' etap magali, halafutagw, enis sandambaho' otamba lu'wami magal mawis nomoni, ea' etap fetauguma. Esis amam nematawa bo'wes endilisi. Amama atom dei' epes etapasi ina bo'wesa sope solomas, owa'.
Epes isima hiesi sembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' sefa' agof bu'wami ma naep ananimi. Ea' esis ina dei' sofa' amamaga amama bu'wami fowa' God na'iam endilisi niese'asami, ata' owa'.

Dei' main, fowa' gani God okom na'i nandondomba anom amamaga bu'wami endilisi ma ape'. Amamaga amama mikila' amamaga esis fowa'isi sembale'efanai sa'i sofa'ami. God nanda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf esis sotaga bo'wes endilisi sofa'am solomapa.

Dei' ape' monda' main? Epes fowa'isi sembale'efa Godi saitu salipapa si'i elagw lu'wami mase'alepa mindiwapapa sihi'ambapa waf sembale'efanai. Amama atom ape' dei' mokwaha amamaga amama manda' ape' nimanipai maloma waf aonai nowa'apai. Ea' monda' opalef ape'imi la'ifima mosagih mehip ma sagih bu'unai anama God nandandepana musagihanai meataga ikwaf.

Naep ape'imi miti Jisas atona anan ofagonama bale'ef ape'inai, nowataniana netaga andeande'ma mombale'efana la'ifipa la'ela'ef mope. Fowa' Anan okom napoma danifela anona nemaf na'i nofa'anai, dei' naitu la'ifina. Ea' nefa' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai naga'. Anan okom napoma nambimb nofa' nimanimi lu'wami noga' lawag anama, amama falafumi atom. Anan ina umbamahana ma ga' anama, owa'. Ea' dei' nape felefele'ma sia bu'unai Godi lagel da'isinai.

Ipe' ukup mi'i andeande'ma nimanimi amama fowa' nofa'ami. Epes isima sanda' waf aonai sowa'ana alafugah Jisas endilisi sanda'ana kwapete'ana. Ea' Anan naitu la'ifina endilisi. Ipe' ukup mopoma amama ma ina ala'uta nepa, owa'. Pepe la'ifipa.
Ipe' papa' paloma waf aonai ma pahagofana, ea' ipe' ina dei' papa' pafe' patagama wandaf lu'unai sahepa esimbel malipa paga', ata' owa'.
A'i ipe' ukup mase'epa ma basef amama God nanda'ama ipe' ma nefela ukup ipe'imi nenda'epa petaga la'ifipa? Anan dei' nofalepa batausana Ananipei na'i,

“Awasi ae'ipei, maina nemaf Dembinai nese'epa nimanimi ma nonda'epa pila basef ananimi, ipe' ina pi'i nimanimi amama anan nase'epami falafumi, owa'. Maina nemaf ni'i nese'epa nimanimi amama, ukup ipe'imi ina aom, owa'.

Dei' main, emi egafis Dembinai okom nainailas endilisi Anan nanda'as na'ama etina sonda' waf Ananinai bu'unai. Ea' emi egafis Dembinai numafias ni'i awasi ananisi, nahas nonda'as sila waf bu'unai wapoti' ma sogawana andeande' silana.”

Maina nemaf nimanimi lu'wami meatagamepa, ipe' pitu la'ifipa pi'i aho'ma God nonda'epa pila basef ananimi. Anan nanda'mepa waf anama si'i awasi Ananisi. Dei' main, ahapas amamusi ina mape matilis sanda' waf aonai, owa'.
Ahapas hiesi mahas manda'asa some' basef silam sope andeande'. I'i ahapepa owa' monda'epa pila basef amamumi, ipe' ina awasi amamupei endilisi, owa'. Ipe' si'i pataga etina amam hiami.

Ipe' ukup mopoma anom basef wapoti' amama. Ape' etapipai hiapai ahapapa ape'imi manda'apa mila basef amamumi ea' manifelom mefela agof amamumi. Amama atom dei' ape' andeande'ma mofe' owina Ahalomapa nape ilifi numafi ambagof ape'imi ma mofa' ambal namunai.

Amam ahapapa ape'imi etapami manda'apa maila basef amamumi nogota bandana atona, mandahama ukup amamumi. Ea' God nanda'apa mail basef ananimi ma nagiambamapa endilisi ma mofa' waf bu'unai Ananinai atona andeande'.

Ahalomapa nase'apa nimanimi ma nanda'apa mail basef ananimi, nemaf anama ape' ina mandanifel, owa'. Ukup ape'imi aom endilisi. Nahapa ma monda' waf bu'unai. Atuwasi monda' waf bu'unai atona, opalef ape'imi mope awanem.
Ipe' dowa lagof ipe'imi ama nigis la'ifima penda' maol Godi. I'i nembawa bo'wagah ipe'imi ekep pehepa, bo'wagah mokwaepa, ipe' dowam mehip pitu la'ifipa endilisi.
Ipe' penda' eaf ipe'inai bo'ona nefe'. Ama nambimb epes bo'wagah awomisi ina awes hi'ilas, owa'. Nambimb sotaga bo'wes wapoti'.

Ipe' dei' penda' maol la'ifipa ma pila waf opalef mope awanem peloma epes hiesi. Ea' pila waf anama bu'unai andeande', pepe Dembinai ananipei etipa endilisi. Epen waf anama a'ani, anona nemaf enin ina niti Dembinai, owa'.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin alupini ipe'ini newa ma waf aonai nelolama God nigiambaman etina nefa'an netanimani nepe andeande'. Na'ama enin alupini ipe'ini nenda' waf aonai si'i lawag aonai nail nola gwa'aimi awami, ea' nese'epa nimanimi ipe' nenda' ipe' hipei petaga awepa ma naep Godi.

Na'ama enin epen atitin nila waf aonai so'a waulanai. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen atitin nese'ana alafuga God si'i fowa' Iso nanda'ama natala gwa'aimi nogota bandana ea' nakwaha amamaga bu'wami ahalomana nandondombam ma'omanai.

Ipe' pegawa, Iso na'i notambel nefe'ma nofa' amamaga amama bu'wami ea' God na'i owa'. Iso napoma lef atona nofa'ai amamaga amama, ea' owa'. Eaf a'ana ma notanima nomboma okom nowa' alafugama waf aonai wapoti'.
Dei' ipe' ina pataga pape felefele'ma anom amamaga patolom pahapilam lagof ipe'imi, si'i halaf anama Sainai,

naloma alof nalef naloma anona malogel na'i basef. Esis amam nematawa Juda same' malogel anama nanda' basef, esis umbamahas sa'ipa Moses basef la'ifimi na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mandaiwa' ma meme'ana wapoti'.”
Dei' main, esis umbamahas endilisi ma basef amama God na'ipasami. Anan na'i na'ama na'i, “I'i enin epen o anona mafin nefe' felefele'ma halaf anama, ipe' pehan otamba ma noga'.”
Esis umbamahas kwapete' endilisi ma amamaga amama satolomi. Amamaga amama lu'wami endilisi manda' Moses umbamahana kwapete'ana ma natolom. Ea' na'i, “Ae' umbamahe kwapete'e ma atolom.”

Ipe' ina pataga ma amamaga amama, owa'. Ipe' pataga halaf Saion, wambel lu'unai taun God nape namunai la'ela'ef. Anama Jerusalem dambaiguma nape heven. Ipe' patagama ensel hiami endilisi mandatama mape mandanifel.

Ipe' pafi'i pandakolas paloma epes Godi, awasi ananisi sali'i. God nanda' agof asasimi mape wambel anama ilif. Ipe' pafi'i felefele'ma God, anan jas nowaloga epes hiesi saloma ambagof epes fowa' God na'i bo'wes andeande'.

Ea' pafi'i felefele'ma Jisas, Anan nape la'afen numafi basef dambaimi God na'i endilisimi atom. Ea' pafi'i esimbel ananimi fowa' neali'ama ipe', nanda' basef amama mataga la'ifim. Esimbel amama mawalapa anona eaf bu'unai endilisi. Basefa eaf anama nikila' endilisi basef Abeli. Dei' main, basefa esimbel Abeli mofala Goda nogwa waf aonai. Ea' esimbel Jisasi atom God nakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama pewa' alafugaha aman anama dei' na'i. Fowa' gani etap anae' God na'ipasa basef la'ifimi endilisi esis amam nematawa, ea' sesambala basef ananimi. Nogota anama fowa' sesambalom, esis ina la'ifisa sofa' sefe' sindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi, owa'. Fowa' God na'iam etap anae' ea' dei' nape heven na'i basef la'ifimi endilisi ma ape'. I'i ape' mowa' alafugaha Anan, anona nemaf ape' wapoti' ina la'ifipa ma mofa' mefe' mindihi'ama okom wandafunai Ananinai, owa'.

Fowa' God nase'ana mi'uli ananinai Moses, malogel ananinai nakoto'ma etap anae'. Ea' dei' na'ipapa na'i, “Owagama anona nemaf ae' ekoto'ma etap wapoti'. Ina ekoto'ma etap atona, owa'. Ekoto'ma etap noloma heven ilif wapoti'.”

Basef amama ma'i, “Anona nemaf wapoti',” mihi'ambapa na'ama. Amamaga fowa' God nanda'ami anona nemaf nokoto'mam mefe' hegililam hi'ilam. Ea' anom amamaga bu'wami ma pe bu'unai ina mokoto'ami, amama la'ifim mope la'ela'ef.

Amama atom ape' minifela God. Dei' main, dei' ape' felefele' muwis numafiapa wambel Godi, anama epes ina la'ifisa sokoto'magon, owa'. Ape' monda' lotumana mefela agel ananinai umbamohapa ma mila okom ananinai atona.
Dei' main, God ape' manda' lotumanai, Anan si'i nif lu'wami fando amamaga awami hi'alam.
Ipe' Kristen, ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi la'ela'ef.

Ipe' ina ukup mose'epama pigiambama epes anona wambelisi sifi'i ifagw ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' pegawa, fowa' gani enis epes sanda' waf anama ma sagiambama enis epes, esis sofa' anom ensel safe' sumafiam ifagw asasimi. Esis ina sogawa sa'i amam ensel mafi'i, owa'. Sa'i enis epes etapasi.

Ipe' ukup mopoma esis alupusi sape sanda' kalabusi si'i ipe' panda' kalabus palomas. Ea' ukup mopoma epes isima sofa' nimanimi alop asasinai, pigiambamas si'i ipe' etipa pefa' nimanimi alop ipe'inai pelomas.

Ipe' amam nematawa pandase'ama ea'i, penda' waf anama notaga nope andeande'. Ipe' ina penda' waf aonai, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa anona nemaf God nogwamipei waf aonai ma amam nematawa sanda' waf so'a waulanai saloma amam nematawa isima sahambombaga waf sandaso'amainai.
Ipe' ina pila waf aonai anama ukup mohafel endilisi ma otamba, owa'. Amamaga ipe' pahapilami, amama ipe' ukup mopomam na'ama mi'i, “Amama andeande'. Amama nambimb dende'ma ape'.”
Dei' main, God na'iam na'i, “Ae' ina anona nemaf okom nose'e ipe' ewa'epa alafuga, owa'.”
Ea' dei' ape' monda'apa motaga la'ifipa opalef ape'imi mi'iam na'ama mi'i,
“Dembinai nagiambama ape'. Ea' ape' ina umbamahapa, owa'. Nambimb epes la'ifisa sonda' maina ape'? Owa'!”
Ipe' ukup mopoma amam agufumi ipe'imi fowa' mawalapa basef Godi ma ipe'. Ipe' ukup mopoma fe' bu'unai amamunai ea' pefe' pila waf amam membale'efa God.
Jisas Krais nape na'ama etin si'i nambati', dei' wapoti', ea' nope anona nemaf la'ela'ef hihif.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama anom basef hiami mamumami mufi'i momboma opalef ipe'imi ea' pekwaha eaf Godi. I'i ukup ape'imi la'ela'ef mopoma God nagiambamapa na'a, na'ama andeande'. Opalef ape'imi ina motaga la'ifima mila mi'uli epesi ma mea' gwa'aimi mamumami, owa'. Waf anama saila mi'uli anama ina nagiambama amam nematawa sailanai, owa'.

Ape' anona balata nape sondolalima Goda, anama Krais atona nase'ana alop ananinai si'ina nondolalimana nase'anana God. Ea' amam pris mondolalima God ipat anama selinai sanda' lotuwanai, amam ina la'ifima ma gwa'aimi ma balata anama, owa'.

Pris anama dembinai nape nali' ma pris hiami anan atona nofa' esimbel amama nawis ipat nomon wa'ol, nape etina bo'wagon andeande' endilisi, nondolalima Goda nokwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai. Ea' mafis alop si'ina mefa'ana mawisi manda' nif maofam ande'ma anama esis Israel sapoma.
Amama atom Jisas wapoti' nofa' nimanimi naga' wambel endambel uta ande'ma nasa'opas nanda'as bo'wes andeande' ma esimbel ananimi.
Ea' dei' ape' wapoti' mefe'ma Anan endalelemb ande', ma monda' ambagof ape'imi aom si'i anan fowa' ambal aona.
Dei' main, ape' mogawa etap anae' ape' ina anona wambel taun nape la'ela'ef, owa'. Ape' dei' mape manda'am magolopa wambel taun anama anona nemaf na'i neatagai.

Amama atom dei' ape mefela agel Godi lu'una mose'ana danifela la'ela'efa agel Jisasi, monda'am na'ama si'i amamaga bu'wami mondolalimanami. Ape' mondolalimana na'ama. Mose'ana malogof ape'imi Anan ea' mowalapa basefa agel ananinai.

Ipe' ina ukup mose'epama penda' waf bu'unai esis amam nematawa, owa'. Ea' amamaga ma'oma ipe' pewalogam pese'ama tu'wanim epes isima amamaga a'asi. Dei' main, God okom na'iam endilisi waf anama si'i amamaga bu'wami ipe' paso'anama pindolalimanami.

Amam agufumi ipe'imi ma'i migiambamepa ea' mumafi ipe' la'ela'ef. Ama anona nemaf amam mowalapa basefa Goda maol hianai manda'ana mumafi ipe'. Amama atom dei' ipe' pila basef amamumi ea' pepe owina amam. I'i penda'am na'ama ma amam mondanifela monda' maol anama ma ukup amamumi ina aom mupan. I'i amam monda'ana moloma ukup awami, amama nambimb ina migiambamepa, owa'.

Ipe' penda' betena God nigiambama afa'. Afa' ogawa basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipasa basef mihi'ambafa waf afa'inai ina aona, owa'. Ea' dei' wa'i wila waf bu'unai andeande' nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef.
Ae' okom na'i endilisi ma ipe' penda' betena God nigiambame ma nambimb etanima efe'mago ipe' mehip.

God Anan ofagonama okom awanena. Anan nafela Dembinai ape'inai Jisas nohafel hi'agif wapoti'. Esimbel Jisasi malo manda' basef na'i endilisimi atom mape la'ela'ef motaga la'ifim. Esimbel anama atom Jisas nataga Dembinai numafi esis Kristen si'i amam mumafi sipsip.

Ae' a'i God nonda'epa la'ifipa nese'epa waf bu'unai hianai ipe' ma pila okom Ananinai atona. Ea' a'i Anan nonda' opalef ape'imi nomon ama mowalapa waf hianai bu'unai Anan okom na'inai ma pepel Jisas Kraisi atona. Ea' a'i epes hiesi sefela agel ananinai lu'una la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi.
Ipe' alupipei, ae' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi, peme' basef anda'ami ma efela ukup ipe'imi enda'epa petaga la'ifipa. Dei' main, basef amama ae' anda'ama ipe', amama basef bandami atom.
Ae' a'i ipe' pegawa esis sakwaha owalomapa ape'inai Timoti, ea' ina ata' nanda' kalabus, owa'. I'i anan nifi'i netagama ae' ulal, nambimb afa' biafa ofo'o etin utilipa.
Ipe' penda'mago nemaf bu'unai afa'inai ma amam agufumi hiami ipe'imi molomago esis amam nematawa Godi hiesi. Esis Kristen alupusi sape Itali sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'.
Ae' a'i God nigiambamepa na'a ea' nope nolomago ipe' hipei nonda'epa la'ifipa.

Ae' Jems, ape owina God naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais anda' maola amam atom. Anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' epes hipei Judaipei epes wambotogw loumi 12-peleim. Ipe' pakwaha wambel ofagama ipe'ima ma pafe' pape wambel hiagoma etap anae' pape panda' maol naninani. Ae' anda'mepago danifel nafe'mago ipe'.
Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, maim nimeguf amamaga meagwambipei motagamepa, ukup ipe'imi mi'i andeande' pendanifel etin pepan.
Dei' main, ipe' pegawa amama mogwamba bale'ef ipe'inai, amama manda'epa pitu la'ifipa ma nimanimi meatagamipei.
Ea' ipe' pitu la'ifipa ma waf anama neataga bo'ona ma ipe' ma anona nemaf petaga andeande' endilisi, waf aonai a'epa. Ama waf hianai Godi mope ipe', ea' ipe' ina anona waf bu'unai a'epa, owa'.
Emi egafis gawa bu'unai a'asi, esis sonda' beten sihali' Goda nose'asana. Dei' main, Anan nase'asa amamaga hiami na'a ma epes hiesi, ina ninifalis, owa'.

Epes isima esis sombale'efana endilisi ma sonda' beten sohali'a God. Ina sope ukup biambiefim, owa'. Esis sombale'efana la'ifis. Emi egafis sape ukup biambiefimi, esis ina sembale'efana la'ifis, owa'. Ukup asasimi si'i embel uf nalo naoh mohafel.
Epes isima ina ukup mi'i Dembinai nose'as anom amamaga, owa'. Ukup asasimi mandawal biefim mapoma waf hianai esis sanda'anai ea' ina sape ukup etifim, owa'.
Sahin owan Kristen emi egafis kwahusi esis sondanifel ma God nafelas nigiambamas dei' anona nemaf wapoti'.

Ape' Kristen emi egafis amamaga hiamisi, esis sondanifel ma God nanda'as safe' owina sembale'efa Krais. Dei' main, epes amamaga hiamisi anona nemaf soga' si'i afis mataga otalef mape nogota bandana ma mandala'of mowa.

Ipe' pegawa aon alipunai natefi ma owaf naha otalef amama ma ala'um hi'alam. Afis mataga mia'of ea' sosaf afisi nambimb mowa'. Epes isima amamaga hiamisi sonda'am na'ama etin. Nemaf anama sonda' maola bisnisi atom, soga' si'i sosaf afisi mowa.

Emi egafis saitu la'ifisa hiahaom meagwambasi matagamas, esis sondanifel. Dei' main, nemaf anama esis sikila' amama waf aonai naninani ea' hi'ilana, anona nemaf esis sofa' amamaga bu'wami si'i prais. Amama na'ama. Ambal namunai God na'i endilisi noso'asam emi egafis ukup maimaila anan.

Emi egalin amamaga meagwambipei motagamen ma nonda' waf aonai, enin ina ni'i God nanda' enin dei' nanda' waf anama. God ina nanda' enin epen nanda' waf aonai, owa'. Ea' ina enis epes la'ifisa sonda'ana nonda' waf aonai, owa'.
Ea' ukup awami ape'imi atom mafelapa makikipapa ma mafe' matolo'w isalef si'i anona mafin aolupunai nafe' natolo'w esag.
Ea' ukup ape'imi mohafel manda'apa manda' waf aonai. Anona nemaf waf anama aonai notaga lu'una, nonda'apa moga'.
Ipe' sahin owan, ae' okom nainailipa. Na'ama ipe' pembaso'ma ipe' etipa.

Amamaga bu'wami hiami si'i presen, amama ahalomapa ape'inai nase'apam misila'i heven. Anan nanda' mafifili aon alipunai owambunai maloma ondowa motawa ilif otaga. Owaf naluwi, ambagof laom bandam. Ea' God ina nandaho'of na'ama si'i ambogof, owa'. Anan nape na'ama etin la'ela'ef hihif.
Anan naila okom ananinai atona ma basef ananimi endilisimi ma ape' mataga mape mali'ma amamaga amama Anan nanda'ami.
Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama na'ama. Ipe' hipei pendandombam ulala peme' basef. Ea' ina pi'i anom basef pegwam ulal, owa'. Ea' ina ukup wandafum mehip, owa'.
Dei' main, waf anama epes ukup wandafumanai nilai waf aonai. Ina nawalapai waf bu'unai Godi, owa'.

Amama atom dei' ipe' kwahago waf aonai neloma waf aonai hianai hi'ilana. Waf anama aonai epes hiesi sanda'ana la'ela'ef. Ea' pinindifa ipe' pepe owina Goda pefa' basef amama ananimi mope opalef ipe'imi. Basef amama la'ifimi ma mofa'ai ipe' pitanima pifi'mai God.
I'i peme' basef Godi ina pailam, ipe' pambaso'ma ipe' etipa. Amama hapaimi. Ipe' peme'am pilam, andeande'.
Emi egafis seme' basef Godi owa' sieliam, esis si'i enis epes safela glas sati amagah asasimi.
Esis satolom ea', sandamboma safe', ina okokoma amagah asasimi, owa'.

Ea' basef mi'uli Godi matagahepa makwaha waf aonai, amama andeande'. Emi egalin niti mi'uli anama ofagema andeande' la'ela'ef nilam, epen inima God nofalo'man nonda'an nendanifela maina maol anan nanda'anai.

Emi egafin ni'i, “Ae' anda' lotu endilisi aila God” ma enin i'i owa' nimafi malogel ananinai andeande', epen inima nambaso'ma okom ananinai atona. Ea' dei' bale'ef ananinai ma lotu main falafunai atona.

Waf sanda' lotuwanai bo'ona andeande' ofagena a'ana naep Ahalomapa ape'inai Godi, anama na'ama. I'i enis awasi mamasas a'asi esis etis sope, o nemata'w alifi'wi akwa'w ato'w kwape kwahu'wi, ape' migiambamasa otamba gwa'aimi maim. Ea' mumafi pe ape'inai andeande' ma waf aonai etapanai ina nenda' opalef ape'imi motaga aom, owa'.

Sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' pembale'efa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, Anan Dembinai nafifili endilisi. Ea' dei' ipe' ina pigiambama epes isima agufisi etis ea' pewa' alafugaha epes agof a'asi, owa'. Penda'am na'ama etin.

Basef amama ofagema na'ama. I'i anona aman amamaga hiamunai nonda' trausis siot sosaf bu'wami nola ring gol faf ananinai ma nuwis ipat anama panda' lotuwanai nomon, ma i'i anona aman kwahuna ma otamba luwaguf maim nuwis wapoti', ipe' atuwasi penda' maina anan?

I'i ipe' penda' aman anama luwaguf maim bu'wami pi'ipana pi'i, “Ine' fi'i balata bu'unai na'ae”, ama i'i aman anama kwahunai nuwisi pi'ipana pi'i, “Ine' nitu gani”, o ni'i “Nepe gani etap felefele'ma bo'wagah ae'ami”.
I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama, atuwasi ofagema awami ipe'imi. Ipe' pawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma ukup ipe'imi, ea' ipe' ina pawalogas paila waf bu'unai na'ama etin, owa'. Ipe' pawalogasa ukup awami atom.

Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' peme'! God nandandepa epes isima kwahusi ma otamba hiahaom maim ma dei' sape la'ifis sombale'efana la'ela'ef sape bo'wes andeande' si'i epes isima amamaga hiamisi. Anan nandandepasa sofa' amamaga bu'wami wambel Ananinai. Amamaga amama na'i basef endilisimi atom la'ifimi noso' emi egafis ukup maimaila Godi.
Ea' ipe' panda' epes isima kwahusi ambagof aom. Emi egafis sanda' ambagof ipe'imi aom sase'epa nimanimi sanda'mepa basef? Esis amamaga hiamisi.
God nase'epa agel bu'unai Krais ea' ipe' Ananipei. Epes isima etis sa'i basef awami sanda' findiwama agel anama.

Dembinai King ape'inai numafi ape' hiapai, anan nase'apa basefa mi'uli Ananinai mape Buk Baibeli. Basef amama ma'iam ma'i, “Ipe' ukup mimila emi egafis sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipe' ukup maimaila ipe' atona etin.”
I'i ipe' pila mi'uli anama, penda' waf bu'unai andeande'.
I'i ipe' pigiambama enis epes, pewa' alafugaha enis, mi'uli anama atona nanda' kotimipa ma panda' waf anama pesambala mi'uli anama.
Dei' main, emi egafis sila basefa mi'uli hianai hi'ilana ea' sesambala anona mi'uli anama atotona anom basef tu'wanim kwaie'um, epes isima ofagema asasimi si'i sawala mi'uli anama hianai hi'alana.
Dei' main, anan na'i basef amama na'i, “Ipe' owa' peha enis epes soga'.” I'i ipe' owa' penda' waf anama so'a waolanai, ea' paha enin epen naga', ipe' pataga epes aopei pesambala mi'uli Godi.
Anona nemaf God nowaloga ape' ma anona mi'uli nanda'apa mope wafifipa. Ea' la'ela'ef ipe' pi'i basef penda' waf nondahama mi'uli anama.

Dei' main, emi egefis owa' siti uwahipis enis epes, owagama God ina niti epes isima uwahipisa nemaf anama nowaloga esisanai, owa'. Ea' emi egafis siti enis epes uwahipis, God anona nemaf ina nowaloga epes isima ni'i awes, owa'. Waf anama ape' mi'i uwahipisanai nikila' endilisi.

Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i enin epen ni'i, “Ae' embale'efa Krais” ma waf ananinai ina bo'ona, bale'ef ananinai falafunai atona. Bale'ef anama ina la'ifina ma anona nemaf God nofa'an notanimani, owa'.
Bale'ef anama falafunai nape na'ama. I'i enis sahin owan sape sala luwaguf awami o gwa'aimi a'as, ea'
enin epen ipe'ini ni'ipa epes isima ni'i, “Ipe' opalef awanem pefe' pefa'ai luwaguf ipe'imi pewahe'am pembaho' alop ipe'inai pefe' pea' gwa'aimi bu'wami!”
I'i ipe' pi'iam na'ama, basef amama ipe'imi ina mataga endilisi, owa'. Basef amama ipe'imi migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin. Falafumi atom.
Bale'ef na'ama etin. I'i enin epen nembale'ef etin ina nanda' waf bu'unai naloma bale'ef ananinai, bale'ef anama ananinai falafunai atona.
Ea' enin epen na'i, “Ine' epen nembale'efa Krais ea' ae' anda' waf bu'unai.”
Dei' a'ipa epen inima na'ama a'i, “Ine' nihi'ambe bale'ef anama ine'inai waf bu'unai owa' neataga nelomana. Waf bu'unai ae' anda'anai ihi'ambena bale'ef ae'anai.”
Ine' nembale'efana na'ama na'i, “God atotona nape.”
Ine' na'i na'ama, andeande'. Ambagof awami wapoti' mombale'efana na'ama etin ea' umbamaham bombol etin kwapete'am.
Ine' aman okom nahaga nagaolinai, ine' nembale'efa Jisas atona, ama ina nanda' waf bu'unai wapoti', bale'ef anama ine'inai falafunai atona. Dei' ine' na'i negawa anama ofagema? Dei' i'ipina.

Fowa' gani akunamapa ape'inai Abraham na'i nondolali ma nogalomana ananinai Aisak nondolalimana ma Goda balata anama sondolalima Goda. Amama atom dei' God na'ipana na'i anan aman bo'ona andeande'. Anan nanda' waf bu'unai dei' God na'ipana basef amama na'ama.
Ine' negawa o owa'? Bale'ef Abrahami naloma waf bu'unai anan nanda'anai amama manda' opeh etifigin. Ea' waf bu'unai anan nanda'anai nagiambama bale'ef ananinai nataga alihina andeande'.
Ea' basef amama mail buk Baibeli mataga alihim mandawalap. Basef amama ma'i, “Abraham nembale'efa God, dei' God nofalana na'i anan aman bu'unai andeande'.”
Ea' God nofalana na'i, “Anan alupunai Ae'anai.”

Basef amama mail buk Baibeli mihi'ambapa dei' ipe' pegawa bale'ef atona God ina na'i epes bo'wes andeande', owa'. Esis sombale'ef endilisi ma sanda' waf bu'unai wapoti', anan nofalas na'i epes bu'wasi andeande'.

Ape' hiapai anom nimeguf owa' mila basef Godi andeande', owa'. Ape' mowa ma anona waf aonai ape' manda'anai. I'i enin epen ina nanda' waf aonai ma basef ananimi, enin epen bu'wani. Enin la'ifina nimafi alop naloma okom ananinai hi'ilana wapoti'.
Ipe' pegawa ape' manda' waf anama ma hos. Ape' masape' ain nape malogof hosi
nomona monda' hos meme' basef ape'imi maila ukup ape'imi ma hos amama mefe' si'i ape' ma'i meafe'ma.

Dei' ipe' ukup mopoma sip lu'unai. Sip anama lu'unai ea' uf lu'unai nefa' sip anama ea' stia anama so'una. Kepten numafi sipi nambomana nafe' anama anan na'i neafe'ma. Nanda'am na'ama ma stia anama so'unai.
Ea' na'ama etina malogof ape'imi sa'om mape alop ape'inai nomon. Malagof amama ma'i basef mamumami hiami endilisi mafela agof epesi ma maol hianai esis sanda'anai.
Dei' ipe' okokoma nif. Nif fendom sa'om mataga lu'um la'ifim endilisi fendo aolop lawah lu'wami fendom hi'ilam.

Malogof amama ape'imi na'ama etin si'i nif fandumi mape la'afena alop ape'inai malogof amama mawalapa waf naninani aonai. Ea' manda' ukup epesi mataga aom sanda' waf aonai. Mawalapa waf hianai ape'inai ma fe' pe ki ape'inai aona endilisi si'i nif fandumi mataga lu'um. Nif amama mataga wambel aonai hel atogon.

Mafis mamumami aolupumi maloma amiguf maloma iguf maloma amamaga hiami mape naoh embel owini, epes sofa'ami sali'atam sanda'am mogawa mame'as mape owina esis. Dei' wapoti' esis la'ifisa sanda'am na'ama.
Ea' malogof epesi owa'etin. Ina enin epen la'ifina numafi malogol ananinai, owa'. La'ela'ef malogel nataneam nape la'ela'ef na'i basef awami si'i marasin aonai naha epes saga'i.
Malogof ape'imi atom mafela agel Dembinai Ahalomapa ape'inai ea' ma'i basef awami wapoti' mahambombaga sahin owan ape'isi God nanda'as sape na'ama etin si'i Anan.
Malogof amama atom ma'i basef bu'wami mafela agel Godi ea' ma'i basef awami wapoti'. Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, penda'am na'ama, owa'.

Sahin owan ae'ipei, anom basef womun etin na'ama. Ina embel bu'wami maloma awami motah ifata atotona, owa'. Ea' anona lawag fik ina nail nola anom su'utip oliv, owa'. Ea' anom mandelef su'utip grep mailami ina mail mola anom su'utip fik, owa'. Na'ama etin si'i embel naoh ina mandamboma motaga embel bu'wami, owa'.

Ipe' emi egafipa gawa bu'unai hianai napaipei, ipe' pepe na'ama. Fe' ipe'inai nihi'ambas gawa ipe'inai enis epesa penda' waf bu'unai noloma maol bu'unai. Maol anama ipe' panda'anai pepe owina epes pila waf gawa bu'unainai.

Ukup ipe'imi ina kowalepa ma pefa' amamaga hiahaom otamba maim enis epesi, owa'. Ipe' ina pefela agof ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' penda' waf anama pi'i ipe' etipa gawaipei, ipe' pambaso'mas. Na'ama hapaimi. Gawa anama ipe'inai ina endilisinai, owa'.
Gawa anama ina nafi'i heven, owa'. Nataga etap anae' ma opalef apimi maloma aman aonai Satan atona.

Emi egafis ukup mopoma esis etis si'i kowalas ma sofa' agof lu'wami ma amamaga maim hiami enis epesi, epes isima ina sape andeande', owa'. Esis ina sandatama sape etifigin saloma enis epes, owa'. Sanda' lopa' fitap etina sanda' waf naninani aonai.

Ea' gawa nafi'i heveni nawalapa waf bu'unai na'ama. Waf nape nali'i, ukup epesi mope bo'om andeande'. Ea' waf bu'unai hianai wapoti' na'ama. Epes sape opalef awanema opalef etifim maloma enis epes. Ea' sanda' waf so'uso'umbilinai sati uwahipis endilisi ea' sanda' waf bu'unai ma sagiambama enis epes. Esis ina malogof biam sa'i anom basef, owa'. Sa'i basef endilisimi atom. Esis ina sanda' waf biefina sanifela enis sosambala enis, owa'. Esis ukup ma'i epes hiesi na'ama etin.

Emi egafis sanda' maol sawalipa epesa sope opalef etifim isima si'i ape' mawa gwa'aimi aof. I'i esis sonda' maol anama ma waf opalef mape etifim, maol anama nowalapai waf bu'unai andeande' si'i gwa'aimi mataga bo'om aof.
Maina waf ofagena ma nanda' ipe' panda' lopa' fitap pape la'afena ipe'? Ukup awami atom mafela ipe' dei' panda' lopa' fitap la'ela'ef opalef nomon, alop ande' wapoti'. Ea' amama atom.

Ipe' ukup ma'ima'i amamaga hiami mamumami ea' ipe' ina pefa'am, owa'. Ea' dei' ukup aom paha epes saga'. Ipe' gegelalasipa ma amamaga hiami enis epesi, ea' ipe' ina la'ifipa pefa'am, owa'. Ea' ipe' panda' lopa' fitapa pa'i pefa'am. Owa'etin. Dei' main, ipe' ina pahali' Goda amama, owa'.

Nemaf anama ipe' panda' betena pefa' amamaga amama, ipe' ina pefa'am, owa'. Dei' main, ukup ipe'imi ina mape bo'om etifima pahali' God, owa'. Ipe' ukup ma'i pefa' amamaga penda'am pefa'am pekwahom amama ukup ipe'imi atom.

Ipe' pakwaha waf Godi ea' pafe'ma waf aonai si'i amam nematawa sakwaha waf bu'unai dase'amainai ma sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai. Ipe' pegawa amama. Emi egafis ukup maila waf etapanai, esis sanda' naumbih saloma God. Dei' pegawam. Emi egafis ukup maila waf etapanai, esis dei' sanda' naumbih saloma God.
Ipe' ina pi'i basef Godi mail buk Baibeli falafumi, owa'. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Ambal anama napaipai God nase'apana nanda'apa ukup matamea ma mofa' amamaga mamumami hiami.”
Ea' God nagiambamapa na'a nanda'apa mataga la'ifipa. Waf anama Godi nikila' waf aonai si'i basef mail Baibeli ma'iami,
“God nosambala epes isima sasambala basef Ananimi ea' nagiambama epes isima sanda' esis safe owina Anan.”
Ea' dei' ipe' pefe' owina God. Ipe' pewa' alafugaha Satana anan nokwahipa nofa' nefe'.

Ipe' pifi'i felefele' endilisi ma Goda Anan nifi'i felefele' endilisi ma ipe'. Ipe' panda' waf aonai, pekwaha waf anama ipe' panda'anai si'i epes sasa'opa lagof asasimi mataga bo'om. Ipe' epes malogof biamipei, ipe' pekwaha waf anama ea' penda' ukup ipe'imi motaga bo'om.

Ipe' panda' opalef ipe'imi aoma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, pelef mehipa waf anama pekwahona ea' hapainai. Ipe' dei' panda' iafi, pemboma opalef pelef. Ipe' dei' pandanifel, ipe' penda' opalef ipe'imi aoma waf anama aonai.
Ipe' pefe' owina Dembinai ma Anan nefelepa nenda'epa petaga la'ifipa.

Ipe' ina piti waf sahin owan ipe'isi sanda'anai pi'i aona, owa'. Epen ni'i basef awamima enin alupini o newaloga sahin owan ananisi, epen inima enin na'i basef awami nawaloga mi'uli Godi. I'i ipe' pi'i basef awami pewaloga mi'uli anama, ina ata' paila mi'uli anama, owa'. Ea' pape si'i dembipei jas pawaloga mi'uli anama.

God atona nawalapa mi'uli Ananinai ea' Anan atona jas nowaloga epes. Anan atona la'ifina ma nefa'apa mokwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai motanimani ea' la'ifina ma nohapa wapoti'. Ea' dei' ipe' emi egafipa ma pi'i basef pewaloga epes isima sape felefele'ma ipe'? Na'ama hapaimi.
Enipa ipe' pa'i na'ama pa'i, “Dei' o naman afa' ofe' wambel lu'unai taun ope onda' maola bisnis afagol atotona ofa' otamba hiami.”
Ipe' pa'iam na'ama, peme' basef ae'ami.
Ipe' ina pegawa maim amamaga naman meatagamepa, owa'. Ambagof ipe'imi ata' mape namum la'ela'ef hihif? Ipe' si'i nogoh mataga mape nogota bandana mafe' hi'alam nemaf atotona.
Ipe' ukup mi'i, “Okom Godi ni'i a'e, ope namofa onda' opeh amama o anom opeh.”
Pi'iam na'ama, andeande'.
Ea' dei' ipe' pa'i diga lu'unai pa'i ipe' etipa la'ifipei pafela agof ipe'imi atom. Waf anama na'amainai aona.
Ipe' pegawa andeande'. Emi epen negawa ma nenda' waf bu'unai ma enin owa' nonda'ana, enin nanda' waf aonai.
Ipe' amamaga hiamipei, ipe' peme' ae' dei' a'ipipa! Ipe' ukup mopoma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf motagama ipe' ea' pelef mehip.
Amamaga ipe'imi hiahaom sosaf maim ipe'imi pepe'atam mape ea' sopafowa matotopa' luwaguf maim ipe'imi hi'alam.

Moni ipe'inai gol siliwa nowa'w nasagiham aom. Nowa'w anama si'i enin epen ni'ipipa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai nataga nandawalap. Ea' nowa'w anama nonda' alop ipe'inai si'i nif fandumi. Ipe' piwaniam hiahaom otamba maim ma nimeguf akutaimi motaga felefele'ma God nonda'mepa basef.

Ipe' peme'. Ipe' ina pase'am otamba amam manda' opeh mala' gwa'aimi aof ipe'inai, owa'. Ipe' pefa' otamba amamumi, pati amam malopa otamba amamumi. Amam malopa otamba amamumi ea' God la'ifinai ma amamaga hiami name' lef amamunai.
Nogota ipe' pape etap anae', pe ipe'inai bo'ona pefa' amamaga bu'wami endilisi pa' gwa'aimi hiami manda'epa pataga lu'ulu'upa. Ea' nemaf anama si'i saha mafis lu'wami anona nemaf notaga nehepa.
Ipe' panda' basef baso'omaimi pambaso'ma epes bu'wasi pahas saga'. Ea' epes isima basef a'as. Ina sagwamepa wandaf, owa'.

Sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' pitu la'ifipa opalef awanem pehafa nemaf anama Dembinai niefi'ianai. Ipe' ukup mopoma anona aman nafomona aofi. Anan nohafa anona nemaf gwa'aimi bu'wami sotalom otamba hiami notaga. Anan opaf awanena naitu la'ifina nape nohafa nogota laona ma asaf nilai nonda' gwa'aimi hiami motaga aof ananinai.
Ipe' wapoti' penda' opalef ipe'imi la'ifim ea' pepe opalef awanem. Dei' main, nemaf Dembinai notanima niefi'ianai felefele' notaga.
Ipe' ina piti waf sahin owan ipe'si sanda'anai pi'i aona, owa'. Na'ama anona nemaf God nowaloga ipe'. Jas nape felefele'ma uta.
Sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' ukup mopoma amam profet fowa' mawalipasa basef Godi ma agel Dembinai. Amam opalef awanem maitu la'ifima nimanimi lu'wami matagamami.
Ape' ukup ma'i amam maitu la'ifim dei' ma'i amam mandanifel.
Ipe' pegawa aman anama Jop. Anan naitu la'ifina opaf awanena ma nimanimi matagamana. Nape la'ela'ef nogota laona, Dembinai nagiambamana. Dembinai na'i uwahipipa ape' endilisi ea' okom nainailapa.

Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, basef mali'i ipe' pielami amama. Ipe' owa' pi'i heven ilif o etap anae' o anom amamaga penda' basef ipe'imi mataga la'ifimi, owa'. Ipe' ina penda' basef ipe'imi la'ifimi endilisimi pi'i gani ilif, owa'. Ipe' ukup mi'i, “A'e” pi'i, “A'e”. Ipe' ukup mi'i, “Owa'”, pi'i, “Owa'”. Ama God ina nowaloga ipe' ma basef amama ipe'imi.
I'i enin epen ipe'ini nefa' nimanimi, enin nenda' beten nihali' God. I'i enin epen nendanifel, enin nenda' awalefa nefela agel Godi.
I'i enin epen ipe'ini awen, enin nefala amam agufumi siosi mifi'i monda'man beten mohali' God ea' mokolo'wa wel bu'wami alop ananinai ma agel Dembinai. Ama nonda' epen inima bo'wen.
I'i amam mombale'ef endilisi ma monda' beten mohali' God, epen inima netaga bo'wen. Dembinai nigiambaman netaga bo'wen. I'i epen inima nali' nenda' waf aonai, God nokwaha waf aonai enin nanda'anai.
Amama atom dei' ipe' pewalapa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai atona etin ea' penda' beten ama ipe atona etina God nonda'epa bo'wepa. I'i enin epen bo'wen, beten ananinai la'ifina endilisi.

Aman anama Elaija fowa'inai, anan aman si'i ape' epes mape etapi. Anan okom napoma God ea' nanda' beten nahali'ana ma nasopama asaf, ea' ina nalai etap asasinai nogota laona afagof si'imi wanom tu'waninai.
Afagof amama mafe'ma ea', nanda' beten nahali' God wapoti', otaga akutina asaf nalai gwa'aimi mataga etap malo andeande' wapoti'.
Sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i enin epen ipe'ini nekwaha nembale'efa basef endilisimi Godi, ma enin epen nigiambaman nefa'an nitanimani, ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama.

Emi egafis sagiambama epen nanda' waf aonai ma nekwaha waf enin nanda'anai nitanimani, epes isima sagiambamani sefa'an natanimani nakwaha neaga'. Amama atom God dei' nakwaha waf aonai hianai enin nanda'anai.

Ae' Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, Anan nasahe'e aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa anan nosahe'epa ea'. Ipe' epes Godi pakwaha wambel ofagama pafe' pailas pape etap hiagoma wenifina biefina agufunama Pontus naloma Galesia, Kapadosia, Esia Bitinia.

Fowa' gani Ahalomapa God nogawepa nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei. Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona nanda'epa pataga Ananipei etipa bo'wepa andeande'. Anan nanda'epa na'ama ma pila waf Jisas Kraisi Anan nasa'opepa esimbel ananimi pataga bo'wepa.
Ae' a'i God nigiambamepago na'a nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa ma opalef ipe'imi mope awanema pepe si'ipa la'ela'efa waf anama.

Ape' mefela agel Godi, Anan God Ahalomana Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai. Anan okom lu'unai nainailapa nati uwahipipa endilisi. Ea' nafela Jisas Krais nohafel hi'agif, amama atom God nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ma mope namepa mogawa endilisi anona nemaf Anan nofa'apa motanimani.

Ea' dei' mape mohafana anona nemaf nose'apa amamaga bu'wami endilisi. Amama bo'om endilisi, ina anona nemaf aom folo'olam hi'ilam, owa'. Amama mape bo'om la'ela'ef, God nambe'am ma'oh mohafa ipe' otaga ilif.
Bale'ef ipe'inai atona God nahopepa ma anona nemaf nofa'epa petanimani. Anan na'i notanima nofa'ipei, anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihiguma nemaf akutainai.
Ipe' pandanifel endilisi ma nemaf anama, ea' dei' nogota ata' bandana hiahaom mamumami meagwambipei matagamepa ma mase'epa nimanimi.

Nimanimi amama matagamepa ma God nowaloga bale'ef ipe'inai nonda'ana notaga bo'ona la'ifina. Ipe' ukup mopoma otamba gol, amama buwami satalom otamba lu'wami. Ea' bale'ef ipe'inai nikila' gol amama bo'ona endilisi. Gol amama anona nemaf higililam, ea' esis saofam nifa motaga bo'om. Bale'ef ipe'inai na'ama etin anona nemaf notaga bo'ona la'ifina ma nimanimi amama meatagamipei. God nowaloga bale'ef ipe'inai ma nondawalap notaga bo'ona la'ifina. Ama anona nemaf Jisas Krais notaga nondawalap alihina, God nese'epa agof lu'wami moloma basef bu'wami ninifalipamami ma agel lu'unai.
Ipe' ina dei' pati Jisas, ea' pembale'efana endilisi. Danifel anama bu'unai endilisi nafi'i ilifi nikila' danifel hianai etap anae'. Ea' epes ina la'ifisa sowalapana sa'iana malogof asasimi, owa'.
Dei' main, ipe' pape pembale'efana dei' bale'ef anama ipe'inai nawalapa amamaga dei' pape pefa'am la'ela'ef. Amamaga amama na'ama. God nofa'epa nokwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai petanimani.

Anona nemaf God nofa'apa motanimani, amama fowa' amam profet ma'i basef amama ma Anan dei' nagiambamapa na'a mape andeande'. Amama amam ma'i anona nemaf motagama ipe', God nandandepepa ma pefa'ami. Ea' manda' maol la'ifim ukup mapoma basef amama ma'i anona nemaf anan nofa'apa motanimani.

Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape nomona amam na'i basef alihima anona nemaf Krais nofa' nimanimi hiami mamumami ma nofa' agel lu'unai. Ea' amam magolopa basef Godi mandahahali'ma ma'i, “Maina nemaf amama mifi'i motaga?”

Ea' God nihi'ambamam ea' amam ina manda' maol magiambama amam atoma basef amama, owa'. Manda' maol magiambama ipe', ma'i basef amama ma amamaga bu'wami anona nemaf meatagai. Ea' dei' amam mawalipipa basef bu'wami Godi ma'ipipa amamaga amama atom. Ma'ipipa ma pepel Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nisila'i otaga ilif. Amam profet amama, ina amam atom ukup ma'i basef amama mogawam, owa'. Amam ensel wapoti' ma'i mogawam.

Ea' dei' ipe' pendondomba ukup ipe'imi ma penda' maol bu'unai, pimafi alop noloma ukup ipe'imi pepe andeande'. Ea' pembale'efa God pepe ukup bo'om pehafa Jisas Krais anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihinama nigiambamepa na'a nofa'epa petanimani.
Ipe' pila waf Godi si'i awasi saila basef mamasasi. Fowa' ipe' gawa a'epa ata' pape waf anama aonai ukup mase'epa. Dei' ipe' ina ata' pila waf anama wapoti', hapainai.
God nofala ipe', Anan bo'ona andeande'. Ea' ipe' wapoti' pepe na'ama etin si'i Anan, pepe ananipei etipa andeande' ma fe' pe anama ipe'inai hi'ilana.
Dei' main, Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ae' ape andeande' bo'awe. Ea' ipe' wapoti' pepe Ae'ipei etipa bo'opa andeande'.”

Ipe' pefala God pa'i Anan “Ahalomapa”. Ahalomapa anama anan ina okom napoma agof ape'imi lu'um so'um ea' nawaloga ape', owa'. Anan nawaloga ape' na'ama etina ikwaf bu'unai atona ma waf ape' manda'anai. Amama atom ipe' umbamehepama God penda' lotumana pefe' bo'opa nimeguf hiami ipe' pailam pape etap anae'.

Ipe' pegawa fowa' ipe' ata' pape panda' waf aonai wafinai pefa'ana bafasepa ehasepa ipe'isi. Ea' dei' God natalipa natagahipa ma waf anama aonai. Anan ina natalipa ma amamaga anona nemaf motaga aom higililam si'i otamba bu'wami siliwa gol, owa'.

Anan natalipa natagahipa ma pepe wafifipa ma esimbel Kraisi atom. Esimbel amama bo'om lu'um endilisi. Krais naga' si'i fowa' gani esis saha sipsip noganai sondolalima God. Sipsip anama bo'ona endilisi ina anona melet natomana, owa'. Anan bo'ona endilisi.
God owa' ata' nonda' etap anae' notagae, Anan nandandepa Krais ea' ma naga' si'i sipsip anama. Nimeguf amama hiami dei' magi' matagai, Anan nataga nandawalap alihina ma nagiambamepa.

Anan atona nagiambamepa dei' pembale'efa God. Anan nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif nase'ana agel lu'unai Anan. Amama atom dei' pembale'efa God atona pegawa endilisi anona nemaf anan atona nofa'epa pitanimani.

Ipe' paila basef amama, amama atom dei' manda' opalef ipe'imi bo'om. Ea' dei' ipe' panda' waf anama ukup maimailasanai panda'ana endilisi. Ipe' ina pembase'am alupupei ma alop atona, owa'. Dei' penda' waf ukup maimailasanai la'ifipa pikila' fowa' panda'anai. Ea' ukup mimila Kristen hiesi pindagigiambanama peloma esis.

Dei' main? Ipe' ina pataga dambaipa si'i awasi sataga mamasas etapasi saga'i, owa'. Basef Godi atom Anan nanda'epa pataga dambaipa. Basef amama ambal namunai napainai nape namuna la'ela'ef, dei' ipe' pataga dambaipa ea'.
Si'i Baibel na'iam na'i,
“Amam nematawa hiesi si'i otalef ea' sosaf asasinai si'i afis mataga etap. Otalef alimi afis wapoti' mandala'of mowa, ea' basef Dembinai mape la'ela'ef.”
Basef amama basef bu'wami esis sawalipipami.
Ipe' pendombasa ipe' andeande' ma waf hianai baso'omainai pa'i malogof biamipei ukup kowalipamami maloma waf anama pi'i basef awami alafugaha enis epes. Waf anama aonai, ipe' pekwahona.

Ipe' pepe ukup mila basef Godi si'i awasi ata' solas dambaisi ukup maila sa' nomambeh atomi. Ipe' la'ela'ef eap nese'epama pi'i basef Godi atom bo'om andeande', owa' somboma anom amamaga awami mealomami. Basef amama manda'epa dembepa la'ifipa ma bale'ef ipe'inai bo'ona. Penda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf God nofa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande'.
Endilisi, ipe' pali' pegawa Dembinai ea' pegawana ma waf Ananinai bu'unai endilisi.
Anan si'i owap ambal namunai napainai. Ipe' pifi'mai Anan, owap anama esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'mana sanda'ana sagwasi'ana na'oh. Ea' God nosahe'ana na'i owap anama bu'unai endilisi.

Ipe' wapoti' si'i owah ambal namunai napaimi. God nape nanda'epa la'ela'efa pataga bo'wepa si'i anona ipat bu'unai ananinai dei' nape nanda'anai. Ama ipe' pepe epes bu'upei penda' maol pindalalima God. Ea' pindalali pese'ana ukup ambagof ipe'imi mofe'ma Anan. Ipe' pindalali penda'am na'ama, okom Godi na'i amama andeande'ma maol anama Jisas Kraisi nanda'anai.
Dei' main, basef fowa' God na'iami mail buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i,

“Peme', Ae' anda' anona owap lu'unai na'oh etap. Owap anama bu'unai satalona moni lu'unai nape nali'i ma nonda' ipat la'ifina. Dei' ae' ambe' owap anama na'oh wambel lu'unai Saion. Emi egafis sombale'efa Anan, esis ina anona nemaf ukup aom, owa'.”
Owap anama bu'unai endilisi agel lu'unai ma ipe' pembale'efanai, ea' epes isima owa' sombale'efanai anom basef mapomas ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“Owap anama amam mala' ifagwi mandaiwa'mana melefatana na'ihi, dei' nandamboma nataga owap nape nali'i nanda' ipat anama la'ifina.”
Ea' anom basef Godi wapoti' ma'iam ma'i,
“Anona nemaf owap anama nonda' enis epes sowa.”
Esis sondasisi'ip sowa. Dei' main, esis ina same' basef Godi sailam, owa'. Sosambalom si'i fowa' God nali' nandandepasa sondasisi'ip sowa.

God nosahe' ipe' ea' pape epes Ananipei. Ipe' panda' maola dembinai king Jisas Krais pendilalimana si'i pris. Ea' pape amam nematawa Godi etipa epes hiesi ganima hiagoma. God nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei etipa ma pewalapa pepel bu'unai naloma agel lu'unai Ananinai. Anan nofalepa nanda'epa pakwaha owamb pafi'mai nafifili bu'unai Ananinai.

Fowa' ipe' ata' pape epes falafipei, ea' dei' pape epes Godi etipa. Fowa' ipe' ina pegawa God nati uwahipipa ma dei' pape andeande', ata' owa'. Ea' dei' pegawa God nati uwahipipa nagiambamepa pape andeande'.

Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef la'ifimi, ipe' si'i epes anona wambelipei pafi'i pailas pape nogota bandana ma etap anae'. Dei' ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf aonai ukup awami mohafamanai, na'i nopa' noloma ambagof ipe'imi.

Ipe' penda' waf bu'unai andeande' ma naep esis sololama Godi. Penda'am na'ama ma maina nemaf esis si'i basef awamima ipe', atuwasi siti waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai ea' sinifela waf anama si'i bu'unai. Penda'am na'ama, ea' nemaf akutainai Anan niefi'ianai ma esis sefela agel Ananinai lu'una.
Ipe' hipei pefe' owina agufumi dembemi hiami mape dembemi ma etap anae'. Pepe owinam pila waf Dembinai. Pepe owina dembinai gavman nali'ma esis Romi.
Amam gavman dembemi wapoti', God atona nanda'am mapoma moha epes isima sanda' waf aonai sofa' nimanimi, ea' mefela agofa isima sanda' waf bu'unai.
Okom Godi na'i ipe' penda'am na'ama. Anan na'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma nesopama malogofa epes isima ukup mahaga magaoli sa'i basef gawa a'anai.

Ipe' ina agof a'epa pape owina enis epes, owa'. Ipe' pape wafifipa ea' pape owina God atona. Ipe' pegawa amama pepe andeande' si'i pape wafifipei. Ea' ipe' ina pembaso'am pewalo' waf anama sape wafifisanai bu'unai nese'ala waf aonai pandambaho' panda'anai, hapainai. Ipe' pepe andeande' si'i pape panda' maol Godi.

Ipe' pendanifel pefela agofa epes hiesi penda'as andeande'. Ea' ukup mimila esis Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi. Ipe' umbamehepama Goda penda' lotumana andeande'. Ea' pefela agel king gavman dembinai nali'ma esis Romi.

Ipe' panda' maola enis epesi pefe' owina dembemi amama ipe'imi ma maol hianai. Ipe' peme'am ea' umbamehepamam pefela agof amamumi. Ipe' ina penda'am na'ama ma amam bu'wami manda' waf so'umbilinai atom, owa'. Penda'am na'ama ma anom manda' waf aonai wapoti'.
God anona nemaf nofalo'mepa ma amama i'i ipe' pitu la'ifipa pila okom ananinai ma nimanimi esis sese'epam etini.

Ea' i'i ipe' penda' waf aonai sohepa ma waf anama ma pitu la'ifipa pitilis, anona nemaf ipe' pefa' maim bu'wami ma waf anama? Owa'. Ea' i'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, God okom ni'i waf anama ea' nofalo'mepa ma amama.
God nofalai ipe' ma pila waf anama pefa' nimanimi ma waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai. Dei' main, Krais atona name' nimanimi ma nagiambamapa. Ea' nihi'ambepa waf anama bu'unai ananinai ma pilana.
“Anan ina nanda' anona waf aonai, owa'. Ina na'i anom basef baso'maimi ma malogel ananinai, owa'.”

Nemaf anama esis sanda'ana findiwana Anan ina nagwamasam nanda'as findiwas, owa'. Nemaf anama Anan nefa' nimanimi lu'wami Anan ina naumbelis, owa'. Anan naso' Anan atona hi'alana nafe'ma lagof Aman anama nowaloga epes andeande'i.

Krais anan atona naga' nail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' nofa' waf aonai ape' manda'anai ma alop ananinai. Anan nanda'ama ape' mope si'i saga' sakwaha waf aonai hi'alana. Ama ape' mope namepa ambal namunai nupaipa mila waf bu'unai hianai.

Esis sahambombaga alop ananinai sanda'ana melegw matomana, amama atom dei' nanda'apa bo'opa wapoti'. Fowa' ipe' pelolama eaf si'i sipsip owa' sumafiami. Ea' dei' ipe' petanima pafi'i ma Dembinai numafi ipe' paloma ambagof ipe'imi andeande' si'i anona numafi sipsipi numafiam andeande'.

Basef amama mali'i ma'i ipe' pepe owina dembemi gavman moloma agufumi ipe' panda' opeha amam. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' nematawa paso' amami pepe owina amam wauhupipa ipe'imi. I'i anom owa' ata' mila basef Godi, ipe' pihi'ambama waf bu'unai atona la'ela'ef. Ipe' ina pi'ipam anom basef, owa'. Ea' pihi'ambama miti waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai, ma amam mila basef Godi mombale'efana.
Dei' main, amam anona nemaf miti ipe' nematawa umbamahepa ma Goda pila waf bu'unai atona pefe' andeande' ma amam momboma opalefa God.

Ipe' ina pendefalo'ma sosaf naninani alop atopanai ma monda' ipe' piti bo'opa si'i pefalo'ma balagah ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' ina pefalo' endilisi sosaf atona wafinai si'i ombahigis maim bu'wami o gol monda' gambigambis o luwaguf sosaf bu'unai nailami ma hiesi sitilipa bu'upei, owa'. Hapaimi.

Sosaf ipe'inai na'ama, ipe' pefalo'ma opalef ipe'imi nomona ukup ipe'imi ma waf bu'unai endilisinai. Sosaf anama ina anona nemaf aona, owa'. Nope la'ela'ef na'ama. Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem ea' ambagof ipe'imi mope andeande'ma waf so'umbilinai. Sosaf anama bu'unai endilisi ma naep Godi.
Nematawa Godi fowa'iwai ombale'efana wape wa'i endilisi God anona nemaf nila basef ananimi andeande'. Sosaf awaunai na'ama, wanda' waf bu'unai opalef nomon ea' wafe' owina wauhupawa awaumi.

Sara kwanda'am na'ama etin. Akwa'w kombale'efa aman akwa'unai Abraham ea' kofalana kwa'i Dembinai akwa'unai. I'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma owa' umbamehepama amamaga maim mi'i meatagamepei, ipe' dei' ehamawa ako'uwai.

Ipe' amam wauhupawa wapoti' pimafiawa ma gawa bu'unai, ukup mopoma alop awaunai ina la'ifina, owa'. Ipe' penda'awa andeande' pefela agof awaumi. Dei' main, awau wapoti' dei' walomepa ofa' ambal namunai God nose'epana. Ipe' penda'mawam na'ama ma ina anom amamaga mili'akwa beten ipe'inai, owa'.
Basef amama motambel na'ama. Ipe' hipei pepe opalef etifim ea' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi.

Ipe' ina pegwa waf aonai, owa'. I'i esis si'ipipa basef findiwaimi, ipe' ina pegwamasam, owa'. I'i esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, ipe' pegwamas penda'mas waf bu'unai atona pi'ipas basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas. Dei' main, God nofalepa ma pefa' amamaga bu'wami anona nemaf nofalo'mepa.
Si'i basef Godi mail Buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“Emi egafis si'i sendanifela Ambal namunai ma ukup mi'i siti nemaf bu'unai, esis simafi basef nili'akwa malogof asasimi andeande' ma ina si'i basef baso'maimi.
Esis sondamboma sofa'ma waf aonai, ea' sonda' waf bu'unai atona. Ea' esis ukup mila opalef mope awanem moloma God noloma epes ea' sonda' waf anama nefe' nepe la'ifina.
Dei' main, Dembinai anan nape naep maila epes isima sope andeande' ma waf bu'unai ea' numafias andeande'. La'ela'ef Anan neme' beten asasinai, ea' isima sanda' waf aonai Anan nanda' okom wandafuna.”
I'i ipe' ukup mimila endilisi ma penda' waf bu'unai atona, ina enin epen la'ifina nenda'mepa waf aonai nehambombagepa, owa'.
I'i ipe' pefa' nimanimi ma waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai, ipe' pendanifel endilisi. Ipe' ina umbamehepama epes ea' ina ukup aom, owa'.

Ipe' ukup mopoma Krais atona nope Dembinai andeande'ma opalef ipe'imi penda' lotumana. Ea' pendandombam pepe la'ela'ef ma pewalapa basef ofagema alihim pegwamasam emi egafis sohali'ipamami ma amamaga bu'wami pape pehafami.

Ea' ipe' pegwamasam peloma opalef awanemi ea' penda'as andeande' pinifelis. Ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipipa basef mihi'ambepa waf ipe'inai ina aona, owa'. Penda'am na'ama ma esis si'ipipa basef awami ma pe bu'unai paila Kraisi ma esis ambagof aoma basef amama awami esis sa'ipipami.
Dei' main, andeande'ma ipe' pefa' nimanimi ma waf bu'unai. Amama mikila' wafa pefa' nimanimi ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. I'i okom Godi ni'i ipe' pefa' nimanimi amama ma waf bu'unai, andeande'.

Ipe' ukup mopoma Krais anan naga' nemaf atotona nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ea' amama ma'um. Aman atotona bu'unai naga' ma nagiambama epes hiesi sanda' waf aonai ma nofa'as sefe'ma God. Alop ananinai, sahana naga'. Ea' ambal ananinai, nohafel nape namona.
Ambal ananinai atona nafe' nawalapa basefa ambagof amama sowa'am la'ifim mape, epes isima
fowa' sosambala basef Godi. Anan nanindifa okom nape nohafa nemaf anama Noa nanda' sipanai. Sip anama epes kwaie'wis sawis sape andeande', 8-peleis ina saga' ma embel lu'wami, owa'.

Embel amama lu'wami mondola'wifa sofa' baptais migiambamepa pepe andeande'. Amama ina masa'opa alogwa alop atona ande', owa'. Amama anom basef endilisi la'ifimi ape' ma'iam maloma God, amama mataga mape opalef nomoni bo'om andeande'. Amama mofa'epa petanimani ma pepel anama atona Jisas Krais notanima nohafel.
Anan nafe' nalata ilif otaga nape wa'ol lagel da'isinai Godi. Ea' amam ensel hiami maloma agufumi mumafi ilifi mape owina Anan atona.
Krais nofa' nimanimi alop ananinai ea' ipe' wapoti' ukup motaga la'ifim na'ama etin si'i Anan. Dei' main, emi egafis ipe'isi sefa' nimanimi ma alop asasinai, esis sakwaha waf aonai.
Ea' dei' nogota anae' ipe' ata' pape etap anae', ipe' pefe' pila okom Godi atona nahopepa pefe' pefe' petagama pega'. Ea' okom aonai nehafema waf aonai, owa'. Hapainai.

Fowa' ipe' pape nogota launai ea' pafe' paila waf naninani aonai esis sololama Godi ukup ma'ianai. Waf anama na'ama, waf aonai so'a waolanai, ukup mahaga magaolasanai, ukup mohafela waf aonai ea' sa' embel la'ifimi ma ukup mahaga magaol ea' sa' gwa'aimi embel la'ifimi nogota launai ea' sandatama etifigin sa' embel la'ifimi mamumami sosambala basef Godi ma sanda' waf aonai, sanda' lotuma god baso'omunai. Nogota pafe' paila waf anama dei' hi'alana.
Dei' epes isima sololama Godi gegelalasis sati ipe' owa' pendao'oma pelomas penda' waf anama hianai aonai. Na'ama dei' sa'ipipa basef awami findiwama ipe'.
Anan nandandombam nowaloga epes isima sapani soloma saga'i. Esis anona nemaf sowalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai sogwamana basef Anan ama waf anama ofagena esis sanda'anai.

Amama atom fowa' basef bu'wami Godi mafe' matagama epes isima saga'i wapoti'. Ama God nowaloga esis si'i anona nemaf nowaloga epes hiesi hi'ilas. Basef amama bu'wami mafe' matagama esisa sope namis ambagof asasimi si'i God nape namona.
Nogota amamaga amama ma'i hi'ilamanai nafi'i felefele'. Amama atom ipe' ukup mope andeande' ea' pimafi alop ipe'inai andeande'ma ipe' la'ifipa ma penda' beten.
Basef lu'wami mape mali'ma basef hiami amama. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi la'ifipa endilisi. Dei' main, waf anama ukup mimilasanai nase'ala waf hianai aonai ea' nikila' waf hianai hi'alana.
Ipe' pi'i aho'ma pigiambama enis alupusi deindei'as sifi'i ifagw ipe'imi pimafias andeande'. Ipe' ina opalef aoma esis, owa'.
Ipe' hipei atona etin pefa' presen naninani bu'unai hianai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasi'ipanai. Ea' pimafi presen anama ipe' atona etin andeande' ma pigiambama esis sahin owan. Pimafiana na'ama.

Emi egafis sowalapa basef, esis si'iam si'i sawalapa basef Godi atom. Ea' emi egafis sonda' maola sigiambama enis epes, esis sonda'ana pepel anama God nase'asanai. Ama epes hiesi siti maol anama hianai bu'unai sondanifel sefela agel Godi ma Jisas Krais atona. Agel lu'unai noloma pepel nafifili hianai Ananinai atona la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi etis.

Ipe' Kristen alupipei endilisi, anom hiahaom meagwambipei mi'i motagama ipe', ipe' ina pi'i amama anom amamaga awami matagamepa pehafel gegelalasipa ma amama, owa'. Nimanimi amama ipe' pefa'am paloma Krais.
Ea' ipe' pendanifel pefa' nimanimi amama. Ama anona nemaf agel lu'unai ananinai noloma nafifili ananinai notaga, nemaf anama ipe' pendanifel endilisi.
I'i enis siti ipe' pitu la'ifipama Kraisa si'ipipa basef awami findiwaimi, andeande', ipe' pendanifel. Dei' main, nimanimi amama mihi'ambepa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafifili dei' napaipa.

Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma enin epen ipe'ini neha enin epen nega' o nenda' wal o nenda' waf aonai naninani o ni'i nepe nilinili' ma maol enis epesi, owa'. Ae' andaiwa'ma enin epen ipe'ini nenda' waf aonai ma sose'ana nimanimi. Amama owa', aom.
Ea' i'i ipe' pefa' nimanimi ma pataga Kristen, andeande'. Ipe' ina ambagof aoma amama pefa'am, owa'. Ipe' pinifela Goda pepan epes Kraisi.

Nogota anama mataga ea' ma dei' God nowaloga epes hiesi Ananisi ma basef lu'wami. I'i God nili' nowaloga ape' mili', anona nemaf nigi' nowaloga epes isima sosambala basef bu'wami Ananimi sope si'imama? Esis sofa' nimanimi lu'wami.
Si'i basef Godi mail Baibeli ma'iam ma'i,
“I'i ahifima God nofa'ai epes bu'wasi sotanimani, dei' epes isima sowa' alafugaha Godi soloma isima sanda' waf aonai anona nemaf sope si'imama? Esis sope awes sofa' nimanimi lu'wami.”

Ea' emi egafis sofa' nimanimi ma saila okom Godi, isima sonda'am na'ama. Esis sope sonda' waf bu'unai atona ea' soso' esis sofe'ma God numafias. God nanda' epes hiesi sataga sapan. Ea' naila basef Ananimi andeande' la'ela'ef.

Ipe' agufipei pimafi esis Kristeni, ae' a'i efela ukup ipe'imi enda'epa petaga la'ifipa. Ae' wapoti' ae' agiliwei imafi esis Kristen. Fowa' aitu ati Krais nofa' nimanimi egawam. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' itu elomepa ma miti nafifili lu'unai Ananinai notaga. Dei' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi na'ama a'i,

ipe' pimafi amam nematawa God nasi'ipasi andeande' si'i amam mumafi sipsipi mumafiam. Ipe' ukup mohafel endilisi ma pimafias si'i okom Godi na'i penda'am. Ipe' penda' maol ananinai andeande', ina penda'ana ukup mopoma pefa' otamba atom, owa'. Opalef ipe'imi mohafel endilisi ma penda' maol Godi.
Ipe' owa' pepe si'i epes sofa' agof lu'wami ma pepe dembipei pi'ipas basef la'ifimi esis amam nematawa isima Godi ipe' pimafiasi, owa'. Ipe' pepe andeande'ma esis sitilipa sila waf ipe' panda'anai.

Ama dembinai numafi amam nematawa si'i sipsip Godi notaga nondawalap alihinama ipe', pefa' amamaga bu'wami mope andeande' la'ela'ef, agel lu'unai. Amama ina anona nemaf aom higililam, owa'. Mope la'ela'ef.

Ea' na'ama etin ipe' amam awomipei wapoti', ipe' pinindifa ipe' pefe' owina amam amama agufumi dembemi mumafi ipe'i. Ea' pefa' waf anama pinindifa ipe' pefe' owina amam sahopepa ipe'imi pigiambama waf bu'unai. Dei' main, basef mail buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
“God nowa' alafuga epes isima sasombala basef sefela agof asasimi atom. Ea' anan nigiambama epes isima safe' owina enis epes ma sape so'umbil.”
Ea' dei' ipe' penda' ukup ipe'imi pefe' owina God, pepe owina pepel Ananinai. Penda'am na'ama ma maina nemaf Anan okom nie'ianai notaga, nefela agof ipe'imi ninifelipa.
Amamaga nimanimi monda'epa aopai, pese'anam mofe'ma God atona. Dei' main, Anan bu'unai la'ifinai numafi ipe' andeande'.

Ipe' pimafi alop ipe'inai pindumafuma andeande'. Satan aman aonai nautamepa ipe'inai anan si'i mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion nape aolopi. Anan nafe' noga na'i mehipa na'i niti enis epes nohas nogwa'as.
Ipe' pitu la'ifipa ma pewa' alafugahana pili'amonana. Dei' main, sahin owan ipe'isi sape etap hiagomai esis sofa' nimanimi na'ama etin.

God anan ofagonama waf anama nigiambamepa na'a. Ipe' pepe la'ifipa peloma Jisas Krais, amama atom dei' God nofalepa ma pepe nafifili pepel ananinai nape la'ela'ef. Ea' dei' ipe' pame' nimanimi nogota bandana. Anom nimeguf mofe'ma ea', anan Atona nonda'epa pataga bo'wepa ea' nonda'epa pitu la'ifipa si'i olaf la'ifinai nanda ipat notawa la'ifina.
La'ifimi hiami ananimi atom la'ela'ef.

Ae' a'ipa owalome Sailas nanda'ago basef amama ae'ami bandami mafe'mago ipe'. Ae' ati anan nanda' maol Kraisi andeande'. Ea' a'ipipago basef amama endilisimi God nigiambamapa na'a. Dei' pitu la'ela'ef ma amama. Anda' basef amama a'i efela ukup ipe'imi enda'epa petaga la'ifipa.

Esis amam nematawa Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi sape wambel Babiloni, God nasehe'as salomepa. Esis sasapa'ago danifela basef bu'wami mafe'mago ipe'. Nogalome ae'anai Mak wapoti' nandanifel ma ipe' ea' nasapa'ago basefa danifel ananinai ma ipe'.
Ipe' Kristen pendase'ama logof alupipei hipei atona etin, ama penda' waf anama ukup maimailasanai.
Ae' a'i God nonda'epa opalef awanem, ipe' emi egafipa pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Kraisi.

Ae' Saimon Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, anan nandandepe aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef amama ma ipe' amam nematawa pefa' bale'ef bu'unai na'ama etin si'i afa' ofa'anai. Bale'ef anama ipe' pefa'ana waf bu'unai Jisas Kraisi, Anan God ape'inai nofa'apa motanimani.
God nagiambamepa na'a nanda' opalef ipe'imi mape awanem. Ae' a'i amama mope si'ima ipe' ma eaf anama pegawa God naloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.

Krais nofalepa ma pefa' pepel howalagon ananimi atom pelomana. Ama pepel God nase'anami atom anan nase'apa pe bu'unai amamaga amama bu'wami hi'alama mope andeande' mila waf Godi. Krais nanda'apa na'ama ma eaf anama mogawa anan atona.

Pepel Ananinai naloma howalagon amama atom Anan nase'apa basef ananimi na'i endilisi atom. Basef amama lu'wami bu'wami endilisi. Basef amama atom ipe' pataga la'ifipama pefa' ambal namunai ma waf Godi pelomana. Ama pefe' pihi'ama waf aonai naninani nataga nanda' ukup mohafel endilisi ma waf aonai nape etap anae'i nanda' epes sataga awes.
Ipe' ukup mopoma amamaga amama penda' maol la'ifimi endilisi dende'ma ikwaf pepel ipe'inai piwatania bale'ef ipe'inai penda' waf bu'unai. Ea' piwatania waf anama bu'unai ma pefa' gawa bu'unai.

Ea' piwatania gawa anama bu'unai ma waf ukup mopeipa pimafi alop andeande'. Ea' piwatania waf pimafi alopanai ma waf pitu la'ifipa nemaf anama nimanimi meatagamipei. Ea' piwatania waf pitu la'ifipa ma penda' waf pefela agel ananinai.
Ea' waf anama hianai bu'unai nali'i piwataniana noloma waf ukup mimila sahin owan atona etin pigiambamas. Ea' waf anama ukup maimailasanai piwatania waf bu'unai pigiambama sahin owan ipe'isi.

Ipe' pegawa Jisas Krais dembinai ape'inai anan ofagonama waf anama hianai hi'alana. I'i waf anama nope ipe' la'ifipa notaga lu'una endilisi nikila' pali' panda'anai, gawa anama ipe'inai ina nambimb nepe na'a, owa'. Nambimb notaga nefe' lu'una nowalapai waf bu'unai hianai.
Emi egafis waf anama a'asi, esis ina nambimb siti anom amamaga mape laogoma, owa'. Esis si'i naep mase'asi ea' ukup mase'asa God nasa'opas nakwahomasa waf aonai hianai esis sali' sanda'anai.

Ea' ipe' penda' waf bu'unai pepe la'ifipa endilisi pikila' fowa' pali' panda'ana paila basef amama fowa' God nofalepa nosahe'epa ma pape ananipei etipa. Penda'am na'ama ma pegawa endilisi God nofalepa nosahe'epa. I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama la'ela'ef, nambimb ina pewa ma anona waf aonai, owa'.
I'i ipe' pilam, anona nemaf God nonda' eaf nogal alihina pendanifel pefe' piwis wambel Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nape la'ela'efa. Anan atona nofa'apa motanimani.
Endilisi, ipe' pegawa amamaga amama ma basef amama mali'i pembale'efam la'ifipa ma basef amama endilisimi paitu la'ifipamam. Owa'etin, ae' a'i ata' i'ipipa efela ukup ipe'imi ma pilam andeande'.
Nimeguf hiami ae' ape namowe alomepa etap anae', okom na'i i'ipipa timbi tambela efela ukup ipe'imi ma pila basef amama. Ipe' ina ukup mose'epamam.
Ae' egawa nogota bandana nape ma nambimb sehe ega' si'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nihi'ambe ea'.
Amama atom dei' a'i enda' maol lu'unai dende'ma ikwafa pepel ae'anai enda' anona eaf ma anona nemaf ae' ega' ea', ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama hiami ae' a'ipipami pepe pegawam.

Afa' wa'ipipa ea' pegawa pepel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi ma anona nemaf notanima nifi'i noloma pepel lu'unai Ananinai. Afa' ina waila anom basef numunefin epes gawaisi sa'iami wa'ipipa basef amama Kraisi, owa'. Afa' watolona endilisi nofa' pepel la'ifinai bu'unai Godi ma naep afa'imi, amama atom dei' wa'ipipa.

Nemaf anama afa' wape walomana halaf anama, wati Anan nofa' agel lu'unai naloma pepel howalagon bu'unai ma lagel Ahalomana Godi. Nemaf anama anona malogel na'i nataga God napoma nafi'mai Jisas na'i, “Anama Nogalome Ae'anai okom nainailana endilisi. Okom Ae'anai bo'ona ma Anan.”
Afa' wape walomana halaf anama God nandandepagoma bo'wagoma ea' wame' basef amama malogel anama na'i nataga ilif.

Afa' atofa ukup mapoma basef amama God na'iami wame'am nemaf anama wape halaf anama. Basef amama God na'iami manda basef fowa' amam profet ma'iami mataga la'ifim wahapilam la'ifim wa'i endilisimi atom.

I'i ipe' peme' basef amama amam profeti ipe' okokomom pepan, andeande'. Dei' main, basef amama si'i anona nagwapin fandonai nafifil nape la'afena owamb. Ea' howalagon nape la'ela'ef nafi'i nataga lala. Ama ondo'w kuhimbitainai lala'wan mafifil opalef ipe'imi nomon.
Ea' ipe' ata' pegawa basef amama la'ela'ef. Ina anona profet atotona naila okom ananinai atona dei' na'i anom basef ofagema amam profet fowa' manda'am mail buk Baibeli, owa'.

Dei' main? Fowa' ina enin epen atitin na'i anom basef mofa'ama Godi ma okom ananinai atona, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nafela ukup amam profeti mail okom Godi atona ea' mofa' malogel Ananinai ma'i basef amama.

Fowa' anom profet mambaso'ami mataga la'afena esis amam nematawa Israel mambaso'masa basef baso'maimi. Dei' na'ama etin anona nemaf anom amam mambaso'ami mohafel la'afena ipe' wapoti' ea' mondambaho' mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'ipipa basef mamumami hiami baso'maimi mahambombaga epesi. Dembinai Anan fowa' naga' ma natala amam amama natagahoma waf aonai amam manda'anai ma mope andeande'. Ea' owa'. Amam mase'ana alafugah Dembinai. Nambimb monda'am na'ama etin, ea' mehip amam motaga aom.

Amam manda'am na'ama nambimb enis amam nematawa hiesi sila waf naninani aonai amam manda'anai. Ea' enis siti waf aonai amam mambaso'ami manda'anai ea' sosambala basef bu'wami si'i basef awami atoma waf bu'unai endilisi Godi.

Amam amama kowalami endilisi, amama atom nambimb monda' basef baso'maimi ukup amamumi atom ma'iami ma mofa' otamba maim ipe'imi. Fowa' gani God nogawa nandandepa anona nemaf mapomam ma nowaloga amam mofe' wambel aonai hel. God nandondomba anom amamaga mohamboga amam endilisi ata' mape la'ela'ef mohafa amam. Ina ma'oh, owa'.
God ina niambali' amam ensel amama fowa' manda' waf aonai, owa'. Anan nakwahom mowala wambel aonai hel. Ea' nowa'am la'ifim mape la'ela'ef anama mape mohafa anona nemaf God nowalogama basef lu'wami.

Anan ina niambali' esis amam nematawa fowa'isi saso' alafugahanai sape andeande', owa'. Anan nanda' embel lu'wami matef mahas afis hi'alas. Anan numafi Noa atona nawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi nofa'ana naloma epes 7-peleis wapoti' nofa'as sotanimani sape andeande'.

Ea' nahambombaga epes hiesi sape wambel biefina lu'unai Sodom naloma Gomora wapoti'. Epes isima wambel anama God nahagon naofagon nif lu'wami dei' agambeh atom ma'oh. Anan nagwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai nanda'as si'i anona ikwafa nimanimi lu'wami emi egafis sosambala basef Ananimi anona nemaf seafa'ami.
God nagiambama aman anama bu'unai Lot numafiana nofa'ana notanimani nape andeande', ina naga', owa'. Anan okom aona endilisima waf aonai so'a waolanai amam Sodom manda'anai, mosambala basef Godi.
Aman anama bu'unai Lot nape nalomas la'ela'ef name'ama waf aonai amam manda'anai natolom. Okom ananinai aona endilisi ma waf anama amam mosambala basef Godi manda'anai.

Basef amama ma'ipapa alihim ma'i Dembinai numafi epes bu'wasi saila waf ananinai andeande'. Maina nemaf amama meagwambasi motagamas, anan nogawa ma nili'akwas sope andeande'. Ea' Anan nahapila esis sanda' waf aonai ma nogwamasa nimanimi ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai sape la'ela'ef sofe' sotagama nemaf anama Anan nowalogasanai.
Basef amama endilisi atom mapoma emi egafis ukup mohafema waf aonai alop atona ma ukup ma'i basef Dembinai sa'i falafumi. Epes isima anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.
Amam mambaso'ami matotopa' basef Godi maila ukup amamumi atom mafela agof amamumi atom. Amam ina umbamahama manda' amam mape ilif heveni findiwam, owa'.
Ea' ensel bu'wami la'ifimi mikila' amam amama mambaso'ami, amam ina magwam manda' ensel amama awami findiwama naep Dembinai, owa'.

Amamaga amam mambaso'ami owa' mogawame, amam ma'i basef awami ma amam. Amam mambaso'ami si'i mafis mape aolopi owa' ukup bu'wami miapaimi mape aolop atona. Mafis amama enis epes sagolopam satolom saham afum hi'alam ea' na'ama etina amam amama wapoti' anona nemaf aom hegililam.

Amam manda' waf naninani aonai mase'as nimanimi enis. Ea' anona nemaf God nogwamam mofa' nimanimi wapoti'. Amam okokoma sa' gwa'aimi embel maim maloma waf aonai so'a waolanai ea' sandanifel endilisi ma sanda' waf anama alip. Nemaf anama ma' gwa'aimi maloma ipe', waf aonai amam manda'anai si'i anona ikwaf aonai la'afena ipe'. Amam mape malomepa mandanifela waf aonai amam manda'anai.

La'ela'ef naep amamumi mati nematawa wanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef ma monda' waf aonai molomawa ea' amam ina makwaha waf anama, owa'etin. Amam makikipa enis epes mombomefas sonda' waf aonai. Amam mogawa endilisima waf anama aonai kowalasanai ma amamaga enis epesi. Anona nemaf God nohambombagam endilisi.
Amam maso' alafugaha eaf bu'unai, amama atom dei' ukup mase'ama waf bu'unai. Amam maila waf anona aman Balami, Beor nogalomana. Anan okom nohafela nanda' waf aonai ma nofa' otamba hiami.

Ea' neme' basef la'ifimi ma'ipana mehipa nokwaha waf anama aonai. Basef amama donki ananinai atona noga na'ipanam si'i epen na'i nasopama eafa waf anama aonai ukup mase'asanai profet anama na'i nonda'anai.
Amam na'amaimi si'i ifatagw amama magal mowala etap embel a'ami. Amam si'i elagw uf lu'unai nufapusam nawalom mafe' deindei'. God nandondomba akot lu'unai endilisi ma anona nemaf amam mopaigon.

Amam amama matotopa' basef Godi ma'i ma'oh etina basef falafumi awami amamumi. Amam ma'ipa enis epesa waf ukup mohafemanai ma so'a waola waf naninani aonai alopunai. Amam manda' waf anama ea' mambomefa enis epes ata' dei'aol sataga sa'i sokwaha waf aonai epes isima sololama Godi sanda'anai ea' mambomefas saila amam.
Amam ma'ipa enis epes ma'i, “I'i ipe' pila basef afa'imi, nambimb ipe' pepe andeande'ma ina anom amamaga mowa'ipai, owa'. Pepe wafifipa.”
Ea' owa'. Amam mape owina waf aonai, anama nombalo'am la'ifim. Dei' main, i'i anom amamaga mombomefa enin epen, nambimb epen inima la'ela'ef nape owina amamaga amama mambomefani.

Emi egafis sokwaha waf aonai etapanai nanda' epes awes ma sogawa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nofa'as sotanimani, ma i'i waf anama aonai nomboma esis wapoti' ma nombale'as la'ifis, anona nemaf sope la'ela'ef na'ama. Sali' sape la'ifisa sonda' waf aonai, ata' sape awes kwaukwawie'. Ea' dei' satanima sanda' waf aonai wapoti', awes endilisi sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef.
I'i esis ina sogawa mi'uli bu'unai Godi, ata' sope awes kwaukwawie'. Ea' dei' saso' alafugahana, anona nemaf sope awes endilisi.
Waf anama natagamas si'i anom basef endilisimi epes gawaisi sa'iami ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Nombat notanima nafe' na' nagu'omi ananimi wapoti'.”
Anom basef wapoti' ma'i, “Bol nafe' nasa'of ea', natanima nafe' nasa'of wambu' awagom wapoti'.”

Ipe' alupipei endilisi, basef amama mafe'ma bifi anda'am mail okwatih mafe'mago ipe'. Basef amama biefim mali'i maloma amama ase'epam ipe' ma mefela ukup bu'wami ipe'imi ma pegawa basef amama andeande'.
Ae' a'i ipe' ata' ukup mopoma basef amama fowa' gani amam profet Godi mawalapami. Ea' ukup mopoma basef la'ifimi Dembinai nofa'apa motanimani, ipe' pefa'ama lagof afa' aposel ipe'ifai.
Ipe' ata' ukup mogawa amama muli'. Nimeguf amama akutaimi anom amam monda'iafipei motaga mila ukup awami amamumi ma waf amam manda'anai. Ea' monda'iafipa na'ama

mi'i, “Anan na'i basef endilisimi atom na'i nifi'i wapoti'. Ea' dei' anan ata' nape eti? Nogota fowa' dambadamba bafasapa saga'anai amamaga amama hiami hi'alam ata' mape la'ela'ef na'ama etin si'i fowa' dambadamba etap anae' nataga mafi'i mataga dei'.”

Ea' ukup amamumi mandaiwa', dei' owa' mogawa amamaga amama, owa'. Amam ina ukup mapoma ma fowa' gani God na'i etina nanda' etap naloma otaga mataga mape, owa'. Anan nanda' etap nataga nape la'afena embel.
Ea' God nanda' embel lu'wami mataga etap maofeniagon hi'alagon maha epes maloma amamaga mape etapi hi'alam.

Basef Godi amama atom dei' mili'akwa amamaga mape ilifi maloma epes maloma amamaga mape etapi hi'alam dei' ata' mape la'ela'ef mohafa nif fandumi nemaf anama God nowaloga epes isima saso' alafugaha anani ma nonda'as hegililas.
Ipe' alupipei endilisi, ipe' owa' ukup mose'epama anom amamaga atom. Okom Dembinai na'i nemaf atotona si'i afagof hiami 1,000-peleim ea' afagof 1,000-peleim si'i nemaf atotona.

Dembinai ina nanda' maol so'uso'umbela nowalapai amamaga anan okom na'i endilisi etina nienda'ami si'i enis epes ukup mapoma maol sanda'ana so'uso'umbel, owa'. Anan nandaiwa'ma enin epen atitin higililan. Anan okom na'i epes hiesi hi'ilas somboma opalef sefe'ma Anan. Amama atom dei' Anan okom napoma ipe' dei' nape nohafepa palomas.

Nemaf Dembinai niefi'ianai anona nemaf nifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i. Nemaf anama otaga dilulu bugwalagw mehip higililam. Ea' amamaga amama hiami mapeinai wapoti' fendom mefe' hi'ilam. Etap anae' wapoti' neloma amamaga hiami sanda'am mape etapi anona nemaf nif fendom fesopamam hi'ilam.
Endilisi amamaga amama anona nemaf mefe' hi'ilam na'ama. Ea' ipe' penda' main? Ipe' pepe pila waf bu'unai atona pila waf hianai Godi.

Ipe' penda'am na'ama ukup mopoma nemaf lu'unai Godi neataga, penda' maol Ananinai la'ifipa pewalapa nemaf anama neataga. Nemaf anama notaga otaga fendona hi'ilana ea' nif lu'wami endilisi fendo amamaga amama hiami mape otagai hi'ilam motaga mumbul mofe' si'i embel.
God na'i basef endilisimi atoma nonda' otaga etap dambaimi ma waf bu'unai atona nupe la'ela'ef. Ape' dei' ukup mopoma mohafa amama meataga.
Alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ipe' ukup mope mohafa amamaga amama meataga. Ea' ipe' penda' maol la'ifipa pimafi ipe' pepe bo'wepa andeande'ma waf aonai a'epa ma naep Godi, pepe opalef etifim peloma God.

Dembinai ata' nape nohafa ape' epes hiapai hi'alapa. Ea' dei' ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama anan nefa'apa motanimani. Amama si'i basef amama hiami sahalomapa Pol ape' ukup maimailanai nanda'am mafe'ma ipe'. Anan nanda' basef amama ma gawa bu'unai endilisi God naso'ananai.

Basef hiami anan nanda'ami ma nemaf anama Dembinai niefi'ianai nanda' amama atom. Ea' anom basef nanda'am mail buki ahifim endilisi ma mogawa ofagema. Basef amama ahifimi, epes isima gawa a'asi ma owa' situ la'ifis isima samboma basef amama maloma anom basef hiami wapoti' mail Baibeli. Ea' esis sahambombaga esis etis anona nemaf hegililas hi'ilas.
Alupipei endilisi, ipe' pegawa amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Ea' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama amam amama mambaso'ami ma mosambala mi'uli Godi momboma opalef ipe'imi pewa ma waf aonai.

Ea' ipe' pepe pila waf anama Dembinai Jisas Krais nagiambamapa na'a nofa'apa motanimani. Ea' pitu la'ifipa ma waf anama noloma gawa anama Kraisi pikila' fowa' pali' pape panda'am. Ae' a'i agel bu'unai atona dei' la'ela'ef nopomana nefe' anona nemaf owagama wapoti'. Endilisi.
Afa' wanda' basef amama ma anona aman agilinama Basef
Ambal anama
Amamaga amama afa' watolom wame'ami dei' wa'ipipam ipe' wapoti' ma pepe ukup etifim pelomafa. Afa' wape wambota atona waloma Ahalomafa naloma Nogalomana ananinai Jisas Krais.
Afa' wanda' basef amama ma anona nemaf danifel ape'inai notaga lu'una ma ape'.
Basef amama afa' wame'ama anan na'ama. God anan nafifili afitinai. Ina anona owamb nailana, owa'.
I'i ape' mi'i mope ukup etifim molomana, ama ape' ata' mape manda' waf aonai si'i mape owamb atona, ape' mambaso'ma ape' atepa ma basef ape'imi maloma fe' ape'inai.

Anan nafifili afitinai. I'i mope mififil si'i anan waf aonai a'apa, ea' mope ukup etifim moloma sahin owan hiesi. Jisas Nogalomana Godi. Ea' esimbel ananimi masa'opa waf aonai ape' manda'anai hianai hi'alana mataga bo'opa.
I'i ape' mi'i waf aonai a'apa, ape' mambaso'ma ape' atepa ea' basef endilisimi ina mapaipa, owa'.

I'i ape' mowalapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai alihina, atuwasi Anan nokwahomapa waf hianai aonai ape' manda'anai nosa'opapa motaga bo'opa andeande'. Basef fowa' na'i endilisimi atom nonda' waf bu'unai andeande'.
I'i ape' mi'i, “Ape' owa' monda' waf aonai”, ape' mofala God ma'i anan aman na'i basef baso'maimi. Ea' basef ananimi ina mape opalef ape'imi, owa'.
