Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa, anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' ma ina penda' waf aonai, owa'. I'i enin epen nenda' waf aonai, enin anan niegiambamani nape. Anan Jisas Krais bo'ona andeande'. Anan nahali' Ahalomana ma nokwahoman waf aonai epen anama nanda'anai.
Anan atona nahagofa okom wandafunai Godi naga' nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Ea' ina nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai atona, owa'. Anan nakwaha waf aonai ma epes hiesi etapasi hi'alas.
I'i ape' mila basef Godi la'ifipa, ape' mogawa anan endilisi.
Emi egafis sa'i, “Ape' mogawa God andeande'”, ama esis owa' sila basef Godi, esis sambaso'ami. Ea' basef endilisimi ina mape opalef asasimi, owa'.
Ea' emi egafis sila basef Ananimi, esis ukup si'im maila God endilisi. Ea' ape' mogawa ape' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas.
Emi egafis sa'i, “Ape' mape la'ifipa maloma God”, pe asasinai notaga bo'ona si'i pe Jisas Kraisi.

Alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa. Dei' ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe', ina anona mi'uli dambainai, owa'. Ae' a'ipipa mi'uli anama atona fowa'inai, fowa' damba damba pegawana. Mi'uli anama basef ipe' pame' ea'.

Basef la'ifimi ma mi'uli anama dei' anda'am mafe'mago ipe', amama dambaimi. Ea' mataga alihima Krais nailam dei' ipe' wapoti' pailam. Dei' main, owamb dei' na'i nofe' ea' nafifili endilisinai nataga nape.
Emi egafis si'i, “Ape' mape nafifili,” ama esis opalef aoma sahin owan asasisi, epes isima ata' sape owamb la'ela'ef.
Emi egafis ukup maimaila esis sahin owani, esis sape nafifili. Ea' epes isima ina ata' anona waf aonai napais nanda'as sowa, owa'.
Ea' emi egafis opalef aoma sahin owan asasisi si'i naumbih, epes isima ata' sape owamb ea' safe' owamb atona sasopama naep asasimi. Ea' ina sati eaf sailana, owa'.
Ipe' awasi ae'ipei, God nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai hi'alana ma agel Kraisi. Amama atom dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'.

Ipe' ahape, ipe' pegawa aman anama andeande' fowa' damba damba nape la'ela'efi. Ea' dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'. Ipe' awomipei, ipe' pali'amona wandaf aman aonai pikila'ana. Amama atom dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'.

Ipe' awasi, ipe' pegawa Ahalomapa andeande'. Ea' dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mepago. Ipe' ahape pegawa aman anama fowa' damba damba nape nafi'i nafi'i la'ela'ef nape. Amama atom dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mepago. Ea' ipe' awomipei, ipe' la'ifipei ma penda' waf bu'unai. Ea' basef Godi dei' mape nomon opalef ipe'imi. Ipe' pali'amona wandafa aman aonai pikila'ana.
Ipe' ina ukup mimila waf etapanai o anom amamaga awami mape etapi, owa'. I'i ipe' ukup mimila waf aonai etapanai, ipe' ina ukup maimaila Ahalomapa, owa'.

Ape' mogawa epes saloma amamaga hiami mape etapi amama na'ama. Amamaga amama opalef apimi mohafemami maloma epes saloma amamaga amama epes satolom opalef kowalasami maloma amamaga amama enis satilis safela agof lu'umami, amamaga amama ina mafi'i Ahalomapa, owa'. Amama mataga etap anae'.
Waf etapanai naloma amamaga hiami epes ukup mohafemami anona nemaf hegililam, ea' emi egafis saila basefa okom Godi, epes isima sape la'ela'ef hihif.

Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom maimailipa, dei' nemaf na'i hi'ilana. Fowa' ipe' pame' basefa naumbih Kraisi ma'i motaga. Ea' dei' naumbih Ananimi hiami mataga ea'. Ape' mogawa dei' nogota na'i hi'ilana.

Enis epes sakwaha ape' ea'. Fowa' epes isima ina ape'isi endilisi, owa'. I'i ape'isi endilisi, esis sope solomapa la'ela'ef. Owa'. Esis sakwahepa ea'. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawas andeande', epes isima hiesi ina epes ape'isi, owa'.
Ea' ipe' Krais nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Godi ea'. Dei' ipe' hipei pegawa basef endilisimi.

Ipe' ina pelolama basef amama endilisimi ma dei' enda'mepago basef amama, owa'. Ipe' pegawam. Ea' pegawa basef baso'maimi ina mawalapa basef amama endilisimi, owa'. Amama atom dei' anda'ago basef amama ma ipe'.
Aman nambaso'masi anan emi? Anan aman anama nambaso'mas na'i Jisas ina Krais, God nasapa'ana nafi'i, owa'. Aman anama naumbih Kraisi. Anan nowa' alafugama Ahalomapa naloma Nogalomana wapoti'.
Emi egafis sowa' alafugaha Nogalomanai, esis sowa' alafugaha Ahalomana wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis saso' opalefa Nogalomanai, Ahalomapa nape nomona opalef asasimi.

Basef amama fowa' damba damba ipe' pame'ami, amama hapilam opalef ipe'imi la'ifipa. I'i ipe' pembale'efa basef amama pali' pame'ami opalef ipe'imi la'ifipa, ipe' pepe la'ifipa peloma Jisas Nogalomana Godi noloma Ahalomana mope la'ela'ef molomepa.
Krais na'ipapa basef endilisimi la'ifimi, Anan anona nemaf nose'apa ambal namunai mope andeande' la'ela'ef.
Ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' awalapa waf epes isima sa'i seambaso'mipei.

Ea' ipe', Krais nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai. Ea' Ambal Ananinai nape nalomepa opalef ipe'imi nomon. Amama atom dei' ipe' ina gawa a'epa ma enin epen newalipipa, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Kraisi nawalipapa ma amamaga hiami ina nambaso'mapa, owa'. Dei' ipe' pembale'efa Krais pape la'ifipa paloma anan.
Ipe' awasi ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa a'i pepe la'ifipa peloma Anan ama anona nemaf notaga nondawalap, ape' ina ambagof aom, owa'. Ape' mitu la'ifipa ma naep Ananimi.
Ipe' pegawa Krais Anan bu'unai andeande' endilisi. Ea' pegawa anom basef wapoti', emi egafis saila waf bu'unai andeande', esis awasi Godi.

Eh! Ahalomapa God okom nainailapa endilisi. Ea' Anan nofalapa awasi ananipai. Endilisi, ape' awasi ananipai atepa. Isima sandaiwa'ma Godi sape etap anae', esis ina sogawa God, owa'. Amama atom dei' esis ina sagawa ape' wapoti'.

Ipe' alupipei, ae' okom nainailipa. Dei' ape' mape awasi Godi. Ea' anona nemaf mope mi'imama, amama ape' ina dei' mogawam, ata' owa'. Ea' ape' mogawa anona nemaf Krais notaga alihina, nemaf anama motolona notaga nope endilisi si'i Anan nape.
Emi egafis sape sohafa Anan nufi'i, esis sape sandondombam opalef asasimi la'ela'ef ma sope bo'wes andeande' si'i Krais nape.
Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, esis sosambala mi'uli Godi. Dei' main, sanda' waf aonai atona dei' satopa' mi'uli anama.
Ipe' pegawa Krais nataga ma nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai hi'alana. Anan ina nanda' anona waf aonai, owa'.
Ea' emi egafis sape la'ifis saloma Anan, isima ina ata' sape saila waf aonai, owa'. I'i emi egafis saila waf aonai, ukup asisimi ina mati Krais sogawana, owa'.
Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, pindumafuma andeande'! Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa. Emi egafis sanda' waf bu'unai, esis sape andeande' si'i Krais nape.

Satan nanda' waf aonai fowa' damba damba nafi'i nafi'i dei' ata' nape la'ela'ef. Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef sapomanai, esis epes Satani. Nogalomana Godi nafi'i nataga nandawalapa main? Ma nohambombaga opeh Satan nanda'ami.
Emi egafis sape awasi Godi, esis ina sape sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, owa'. Dei' main, okom Godi nape opalef asasinai ea' esis awasi Godi. Ea' esis ina la'ifisa ata' sonda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, owa'.
I'i ape' mi'i mogawa epen emi egalin, nogalomana Satani o nogalomana Godi, ape' mogowas na'ama. Emi egalin owa' nanda' waf bu'unai ma owa' okom ninila alupusi ananisi, enin ina epen Godi, owa'.
Basef fowa' damba damba ipe' pame'ami amama. Ape' ukup mimila esis sahin owan endilisi.

Ape' ina mila waf Keini, hapainai. Kein wambota aman aonai Satani ea' naha owalomana Abel naga'. Dei' maina nahana naga'? Anan kowalana ma opeh bu'wami owalomana nanda'ami dei' nahana naga'. Ea' opeh ananimi aom.
Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i esis sape etapi sowa' alafugaha Godi sindaiwa'mepa, ipe' ina gegelelesipa, owa'.

Ape' ukup maimaila esis sahin owan, amama ape' mogawa dei' makwahona waf anama ga'inai mataga mofa' ambal namunai. Dei' main? Ape' ukup maimaila esis sahin owan endilisi. Emi egafis owa' ukup mimila sahin owan asasisi, esis ata' sape la'ela'ef waf ga'inai.
Emi egafis ukup aoma sahin owan asasisi, esis si'i saha enis amam nematawa saga'i. Ea' ipe' pegawa epes saha enis saga'i, esis ina dei' sefa' ambal namunai sapaina sope andeande' la'ela'ef, owa'etin.
Waf anama ape' ukup mimila enis epes mogawana na'ama. Krais nakwaha ambal ananinai ma nagiambamapa. Amama atom ape' wapoti' mokwaha ambagof ape'imi ma migiambama sahin owan ape'isi.

I'i emi egafis amamaga hiamisi ma siti sahin owan amamaga a'ani ma esis owa' ukup mimila sahin owan, epes isima ina ukup maimaila God, owa'. Dei' maina epes isima sa'i, “Ukup ape'imi maimaila God”? Owa', esis sambaso'am.
Alupipei ae'ipei, ape' ina ukup maimaila esis alupisi ma mi'ipasa basefa malogof atom wafimi, owa'. Ape' ukup mimilas endilisi migiambamas monda' waf bu'unai endilisinai mihi'ambamasana.
I'i ape' monda' waf anama ma ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi, ape' mogawa maila basef endilisimi. Waf anama nanda' opalef ape'imi awanema mope la'ifipa ma naep Godi.
I'i basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipapa basef mihi'ambapa waf ape' manda'anai aona, God dembinai nikila' ukup ape'imi ea' nagawa amamaga hiami.
Alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa. I'i basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipapa basef mihi'ambapa waf ape' manda'anai ina aona, ape' mefe'ma God opalef ape'imi la'ifim.
I'i ape' mi'i monda' beten mohali'ana ma anom amamaga, anan nose'apami. Dei' main, ape' maila okom ananinai manda' amamaga anan nandanifel ma ape' manda'ami.
Basef la'ifimi Godi ma'i na'ama ma'i ape' mombale'efa agel nogalomanai Jisas Krais ea' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi si'i Anan na'ipapa basef la'ifimi.
Emi egafis saila basef Godi la'ifis, esis sope la'ifis soloma God ea' God nape la'ifina nolomas. Anan nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai dei' mogawa God nape la'ifina nalomapa.

Alupipei ae'ipei, amam profet mambaso'mami mafe'agon anama etap hiagoma. Ipe' ina pembale'efa epes isima hiesi sa'i, “Ae' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaiwei.” Owa'. Ipe' ata' pegwaloga ambagof amama hiami pendendomam ama pegawa amam mataga mafi'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi o owa'?
Ipe' pegawa Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ama. Emi egafis sa'i, “Endilisi, Jisas Krais nafi'i nataga epen endilisinai”, epes isima Ambal Bu'unai Godi napais opalef asasimi.

Ea' emi egafis owa' si'iam na'ama ma Krais, Ambal Bu'unai Godi ina nape esis, owa'. Ambal nape epes isima anan nanda' naumbih naloma Krais. Fowa' pame' basefa ambal aonai na'i nonda' naumbih noloma Kraisi nifi'i dei' nafi'i nape ea' etap anae'.

Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ipe' epes Godi ea' panda' wandaf paloma amam profet awami mambaso'mami pikila'am. Dei' main, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape nomon opalef ipe'imi anan la'ifinai nikila' aman aonai nape etap anae'.
Epes isima saila waf etapanai sa'i basef etapami atom, epes etapasi sembale'efam. Dei' main, esis isima etapasi etis.

Ea' ape' epes Godi. Emi egafis sogawa God, esis seme' basef ape'imi. Ea' emi egafis owa' epes Godi, isima ina same' basef ape'imi, owa'. Ea' amama atom dei' ikwaf anama nihi'ambapa ma mogawa epes isima. I'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi endilisinai nupais, seme' basef ape'imi. Ea' i'i ambal nambaso'mami nupais, ina seme' ape', owa'.
Ipe', ae' okom nainailipei, ape' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi. Dei' main, waf anama nafi'i God. Emi egafis ukup maimaila sahin owan, esis awasi Godi ea' dei' segawa God saila basef Ananimi.
Emi egafis owa' ukup mimila sahin owan, esis ina sogawa God, owa'. Dei' main, God okom nainaila epes hiesi.
God nihi'ambapa anan okom nainailapa na'ama. Anan nasapa' Nogalomana Ananinai atotona nafi'i etap anae' ma ape' mofa' ambal namunai ma Anan.

Basef ofagema ma God okom nainaila ape' amama. Ape' ina mali' ukup maimailana, owa'. Anan nali' okom nainailapa ea' nasapa' Nogalomana Ananinai nafi'i ma nanda' okom wandafunai Godi naga' nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
Ipe' alupipei, waf anama atona nihi'ambapa God okom nainailopa endilisi. Ea' ape' wapoti' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi endilisi.

Ina enin epen nati God, owa'. I'i ape' atepa ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi, God nope la'ifina ma ape' ea' okom ananinai nainaila ape'i atuwasi nope nolomapa opalef ape'imi nomona monda'am na'ama etin ape' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi.
Dei' ape' mogawa ape' mape la'ifipa maloma God ea' anan nape nalomapa. Dei' main? Anan nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape nalomapa.
Ea' ape' mogawa Ahalomapa nasapa' Nogalomana ananinai ma nofa'ai epes hiesi sape etapi sotanimani ma anan. Ape' mati amamaga amama ma anan nofa'ai epes sotanimai ma'ipasam.
Emi egafis sawalapa basef alihiguma sa'i, “Endilisi, Jisas anan Nogalomana Godi”, God nape la'ifina nalomas, esis wapoti' sape la'ifisa Anan.
Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa mombale'efa God anan okom nainailapa endilisi.
God Anan ofagonama okom nainaila epes hiesi. Emi egafis sape ukup maimaila God naloma epes hiesi la'ela'ef, esis sape la'ifis saloma God ea' Anan nape la'ifina nalomas.

Waf ukup maimaila esis Kristen alupusi endilisi, amama mataga bo'om endilisi ma ape' mitu la'ifipa nemaf anama lu'unai ma God nowalogapa. Dei' main, Anan napaipa nomon, ea' mape etap anae' si'i Krais nape. Ape' ina umbamahapa ma nemaf anama God nowalogapa, owa'.

God okom nainailapa, ape' wapoti' ukup maimailana. Ea' ina umbamahapa, owa'. I'i waf anama notaga bo'ona endilisi ma ape', anama natofa waf umbamahapamanai nowala hi'alana. Dei' main, epes umbamahasa amamaga nimanimi anona nemaf God nowalogasa waf aonai nose'asami. Emi egafis umbamahas, waf ukup maimaila God ina nataga bo'ona endilisi ma esis, ata' owa'.
God nali' okom nainailapa endilisi. Amama atom dei' ape' ukup maimaila anan naloma epes hiesi wapoti'.

I'i enis epes si'i, “Ape' ukup maimaila God,” ama esis ukup wandafuma Kristen alupusi, epes isima sambaso'mami. Dei' main? Ina enin epen atitin nati God, owa'. Emi egafis sati alupusi asasisi ma owa' ukup mimilas, epes isima ina la'ifisa ukup mila God owa' seatolona naepi, owa'.
Amama Krais na'ipapam la'ifimi amama. Emi egafis ukup maimaila God, epes isima ukup mimila sahin owan asasisi wapoti'.
Emi egafis sembale'efa Jisas anan Krais God nasapa'ana nafi'i, epes isima awasi Godi. Ea' emi egafis ukup maimaila ahalomas, esis ukup maimaila awasi ananisi wapoti'.
I'i ape' ukup mimila God ama mila basef la'ifimi Ananimi, anona nemaf ape' mogawa ukup maimaila awasi Ananisi wapoti'.
Waf ofagema ma ape' ukup maimaila God anama. Ape' maila basef mi'uli la'ifinai Ananinai, ina ahifina endilisi, owa'.
Dei' main, emi egafis sape awasi Godi nanda'as sataga dambais, epes isima la'ifis sahagofa waf etapanai aonai. Ape' mombale'efa God dei' ape' mikila' wandaf mahagofa waf etapanai aonai.
Emi egafis sikila' wandafa waf aonai nahagofa waf aonai etapanai? Epes sembale'efa Jisas sa'i anan Nogalomana Godi, esis etis sikila'ana.

Jisas Krais ma'una aman anama nafi'i. Ea' Anan nefa' baptais embel sahana naga' esimbel Ananimi malo. Anan ina nafi'i ma waf nefa' baptaisa embel atom, owa'. Anan nafi'i ma waf sahana naga' esimbel ananimi malo. Ambal Bu'unai Godi ofagonama waf endilisinai hi'alana. Ea' Ambal anama nawalipasa basef amama ma Krais endilisimi.
Ambal Bu'unai Godi naloma embel maloma esimbel, amama wenifim mawalapa basef ofagema amama atom.
Ape' mombale'efa basef epes sawalipasami. Ea' basef God nawalipapami la'ifimi mikila' basef epesi. Dei' main, basef amama ma'i Nogalomana ananinai.

Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa Nogalomana Godi, basef amama endilisimi mape nomon okom ananinai. Ea' emi egafis owa' sombale'efa God, epes isima na'i God aman nambaso'mami. Dei' main, isima ina sembale'efa basef amama God na'ima Nogalomana Ananinai, owa'.
Ea' basef amama endilisimi ma'i na'ama. God nase'apa ambal namunai ma mape andeande' la'ela'ef. Ambal namunai anama Anan nase'apana Nogalomana Ananinai atona.
Emi egafis sape la'ifis saloma Nogalomanai, isima dei' sefa' ambal namunai. Ea' emi egafis owa' sope la'ifisa Nogalomana Godi, isima ina sofa' ambal namunai ma sope andeande' la'ela'ef, owa'.
Ae' anda' basef mafe'mago ipe' pembale'efa agel Nogalomana Godi. Anda'ama ipe' pegawa dei' pefa' ambal namunai pape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.

Ape' mogawa, i'i ape' mila okom Godi atona monda' betena maim amamaga, Anan nome' beten ape'inai. Ea' maina nemaf mefe' felefele'ma Anan monda' beten, ina umbamahapa ma Anan, owa'. Ukup ape'imi mape la'ifim.
Ape' mogawa Anan name' betena maim amamaga dei' mahali'anami. Ea' mogawa dei' mape si'i mofa' amamaga amama ea'.

Epes sanda' waf aonai sawala basef Godi la'ifimi. Ea' waf hianai aonai ina nanda' epes saga', owa'. I'i enin epen niti enin sahin owan ananini nenda' anona waf aonai owa' nenda' epen inima nega' higililan, epen inima nanda' waf anama nenda' betena God, nese'an ambal namunai. Endilisi, anona waf atotona aonai nanda' epes saga' hegilalas.
Ape' mogawa emi egafis sape awasi Godi, esis ina sape sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, owa'. Dei' main, Nogalomana Godi numafias andeande'ma pepel ananinai ma aman aonai ina nahambombagas, owa'.
Ape' mogawa ape' awasi Godi, ea' isima owa' awasi Godi sape owina aman aonai Satan anan dembinai asasinai.

Ape' mogawa Nogalomana Godi nafi'i ma nose'apa gawa ma mogawa anan God endilisinai. Ape' mape la'ifipa ma Anan endilisinai naloma Nogalomana Ananinai Jisas Krais. God anama endilisinai anan ofagonama ambal namunai napaipa mape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Awasi ae'ipei, ipe' pepe la'ifipa pewa' alafugaha god baso'mainai hianai. Ea' ma'um.
Dei' main, basef endilisimi mape ukup ape'imi amama anona nemaf mope la'ifipa ape' la'ela'ef.

Ae' a'i Ahalomapa God noloma Jisas Krais Nogalomana Ananinai miti uwahipipa migiambamapa na'a monda'apa la'ifipa ea' monda' opalef ape'imi awanem. Amam biam monda'apa na'ama moloma waf endilisinai noloma waf ukup maimaila sahin owananai.
Ea' dei' a'ipa ine' nemata'w
na'ama. Ape' hiapai ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi. Ae' ina a'ipina anom basef la'ifimi dambaimi, owa'. A'ipina basef amama atom fowa' gani ape' mogawam mombale'efam.
Basef ofagema ma ape' ukup maimaila sahin owani amama. Ape' mope mila basef amama Godi la'ifimi la'ela'ef. Basef amama si'i fowa' dambadamba pame'am. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi.
Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma pefa' amamaga bu'wami amama panda' maol pa'i pefa'ami. Na'ama ipe' anona nemaf ina pefa' amama, owa'. Andeande'ma pefa'am hiami hi'ilam.

Emi egafis sakwaha basef Kraisi ma simbisila' sefe' sila anom basef, God ina nape opaf epes isima, owa'. Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Kraisi la'ifis la'ela'ef, dei' Ahalomana naloma Nogalomana wapoti' mape la'ifim maloma epes isima nomon ukup asasimi.

Emi egafis sifi'mai ipe' ma ina sefa'ai basef amama Kraisi, ipe' ina pigiambama epes isima pi'ipas sofe' solomepa siwis ifagw ipe'imi, owa'. Ina pinifalis pi'ipas penda'mas, “Nemaf bu'unai” esis, hapaisi.
Emi egafis sinifala epes isima anona nemaf solomas okom atotom sigiambamas sonda' waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
God nandandepa owamena
ine'ikwi nosahe'akw anani'wi ato'w. Ea' awasi owaminai sanda'menago nemaf bu'unai ma ine'.
Ea' ma'um.
Ae' agiliwei imafi esis Kristen, anda' anom basef mafe'mago ina' alupinai Gaius. Ae' okom nainailina endilisi.
Basef mafe'mago ine', anda' betena Goda amamaga hiami ine' nanda'ami motaga bo'om andeande'ma awes a'ena nepe andeande' si'i ambal ine'inai nape andeande'.
Fowa' ae' ame' basefa anom alupumi mafi'i matagame ma'ipi waf ine' nanda'anai ma'i ine' naila basef endilisimi andeande'. Ame' basef amama andanifamena endilisi.
Ae' andanifel endilisi ma awasi saila basef endilisimi. Ea' ae' ina andanifel ma anom amamaga mikila' andanifela awasi ae'asi saila basef endilisimi, owa'.
Alupinai ae' okom nanailinai, opeh hiami ine' nanda'ami ma nagiambama amam sahin owan, amama ine' nanda'am andeande' endilisi. Amam ina nati nogonaepima negawam, owa'. Ea' ine' natolom numafiam etin.

Amam hiami ma'ipa esis Kristen sape na'ae ma okom ine'inai nainailam nigiambamam. Ae' ahali'ina ma nigiambamama gwa'aimi otamba maim mofa'am etin mofe' anagon monda' opeh Godi si'i okom ananinai na'iam.
Dei' main, amam mafe' manda' maola agel Kraisi, ea' ina mofa' gwa'aimi maima esis isima sololama Godi, owa'.
Amama atom ape' migiambamama gwa'aimi maima monda' maola basef endilisimi Kraisi molomam.
Ae' anda' anom basef mafe'mago esis Kristen, ea' Diotrefes anan okom na'ina'i endilisi ma nope dembinai nili'i. Anan ina naila basef ae'ami, owa'.

Maina nemaf ae' efe'mago ine', ae' ewalapa basefa waf hianai anama anan nanda'anai. Anan nambaso'mas na'i basef mamumami awami findiwama ae'. Ea' ina nanda' waf anama atona, owa'. Nanda' anona waf wapoti' na'ama. Nowa' alafugama amam sahin owan mawalipasa basef Godi ma'i mifi'mai anan. Ea' anona waf wapoti' na'ama. Nasopama enis Kristen sa'i sigiambama amam amama nanda'as safe' sape ande' ma sios.
Ine' alupinai, ina nila waf aonai, hapainai. Nila waf bu'unai atona. Emi egafis sanda' waf bu'unai, esis epes Godi. Ea' emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, esis ina segawa God, owa'.
Epes hiesi safela agel Demitriusi. Waf ananinai endilisinai nihi'ambapa anan aman bu'unai. Ae' wapoti' a'i anan bu'unai ea' ine' negawa basef ae'ami endilisimi.
Ae' a'i i'ipina basef hiami hi'ilam, ea' ae' andaiwa'ma enda' pen enda'am mil okwatip mefe'mago ine', owa'.
Ae' okom ma'i anona nemaf efo'o itilina, ea' afa' biafa ondatima wi'i basef amama.

Ae' a'i opaf ine'inai nope awanena nepe andeande'. Alupusi ine'isi sape na'ae sanda'menago danifel nolomago ine'. Ine' da'masago danifela ae'anai wapoti' nefe'mago esis sape wambel ine'imi atona etin.
Ea' ma'um.

Ae' Jut anda' maol ape owina Jisas Krais, ae' owalomana Jemsi. Ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa God nandandepepa ea'. Mafe'mago ipe' Ahalomapa God okom maimailipei, ipe' Jisas Krais atona nili'akwapa.
Ae' a'i God nonda'epa pepe la'ifipama dahowe ananinai opalef awanem pegawa okom ananinai nainailipa. Ae' a'i waf anama nupeipa si'ipa.

Alupipei endilisi, ae' okom nainailipa. Ae' ali' a'i enda' anom basef mil okwatip mefe'mago ipe' ma God nefa'apa motanimani. Anan nefa' ipe' peloma ae' wapoti'. Ea' owa. Dei' a'i ata' enda' anom basef i'ipipago efela ukup ipe'imi ma penda' maol la'ifipa pimafiago basef endilisimi Kraisi ape' mombale'efami. Ama pehagasa naumbih amama mahagofa basef amama Kraisi. Bale'ef anama God nase'apana ape' hiapai amam nematawa Ananipai nemaf anama atotona mape la'ela'ef.

Dei' main, anom amam mandambaho' mawisi la'afena ape' Kristen. Fowa' gani basef mail Buk Baibeli ma'i amam amama anona nemaf God nowalogama basef lu'wami ma kot. Amam mowa' alafugaha God maho'ofa basef bu'wami Anan nagiambamapa na'a ma'ipas anom basef manda' waf naninani ukup mohafela waf aonai so'a waolanai nataga la'ifina.

Endilisi, ipe' pegawa basef amama fowa'imi mail Baibeli. Ea' dei' ae' a'i efela ukup ipe'imi ma pegawam wapoti'. Basef amama mape na'ama. Fowa' Dembinai nofa' esis amam nematawa Ananisi Israel sakwaha etap hiagoma Isip nofa'as safi'i. Ea' Anan naha epes isima owa' sombale'efa Anani saga'. Amam mowa' alafugaha aman anama Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai numafi pepel hianai.

Dei' ipe' ukup mopoma amam ensel amama wapoti', amam ina mumafi maol anama naloma agof lu'wami God nase'amamanai andeande', owa'. Amam makwaha wambel amamunai heven. Ea' dei' God nowa'am sen la'ifinai nape la'ela'efi. Ea' mape la'ela'ef wambel anama akot nape la'ela'efa. Mape mohafa nemaf anama lu'unai God nowalogam moloma epes hiesi wapoti' hi'ilas.

Dei' ipe' okokoma epes isima fowa' sape Sodom naloma Gomora maloma wambel anama hiagoma mape felefele'ma anama. Esis sanda' waf aonai na'ama etin si'i ensel amama. Amam amama Sodom naloma Gomora manda' waf so'a waolanai ea' ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi ma manda' so'a waola waf aonai maloma amam amama atom. Dei' God nagwamama nimanimi lu'wami amam ma nif lu'wami fandom mape dendel la'ela'ef. Amam mape si'i anona ikwaf ape' motolona mogawa ape' ina mila waf aonai amam manda'anai, owa'. Hapainai.

Amam amama mandambaho' mawisi malomapa manda'am na'ama etin. Koh nandondo'oh hianai amamunai nafela ukup amamumi ma manda' waf aonai ma alop amamunai. Amam masombala basef Dembinai ape'inai manda' anom ensel dembemi mape heveni wapoti' findiwam.

Ea' amam ensel mape ilifi, amam ina ma'i basef findiwaimi si'i amam amama, owa'. Ensel anama dembinai nape nali'i Maikel wapoti' ina nanda' basef findiwama enis epes na'ama, owa'. Fowa' anan na'i basef nandahihianamam naloma Satan, ma'i anona nemaf emi nofa' alop Mosesi. Ea' Maikel ina nagwamana basef Satan nanda'ana findiwana, owa'. Anan nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai atona nogwamenam.”

Ea' amam amama mandambaho' mawisi malomapa, amam ma'i basef awami ma amamaga hiami amam owa' mogawa ofagema. Waf ukup mohafela migi'ma alop atona inai mogawana andeande'. Waf anama amam manda'ana si'i mafis amama ukup a'emi manda'ami. Amam manda' waf anama atona nahambombagam endilisi.
Amam manda' waf ambagof awami, anama nataga si'i naoh embel mohafel lu'um endilisi matoma ufun matagam. Ea' mape manda' waf anama aonai mandahama ondowa
motawa otagai ina magawa eaf la'ela'ef mafi'i anai. God nandomba anona wambela amam owamb lu'unai napoma anona nemaf mope la'ela'ef.
“Ipe' peme'! Dembinai anona nemaf nifi'i noloma ensel ananimi tausen hiami endilisi

ma nowaloga epes hiesi nogwamasa nimanimi lu'wami ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ama nihi'ambamas alihisa waf aonai hianai esis sanda'anai ofagema asasimi atom. Epes isima sanda' waf anama aonai na'ama. Esis sowa' alafugaha God endilisi, sosambala basef, sa'i basef sosambalom mamumami awami ma anan.”

Amam amama mambaso'ami mawisi malomapa ina mape andeande' opalef awanem, owa'. Amam mondowamba' ma amamaga hiami ea' mosambala basef Godi. Ukup amamumi mohafel na'ana'a ma waf aonai ukup mohafemami ea' magi'ma amama. Amam ma'i basef mamumami mafela agof amamumi atom. Amam ma'ipa enis epesa basef usihimi ma mamboma ukup asasimi saila basef amamumi.
Ea' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ipe' ukup mopoma basef fowa' amam aposel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi ma'ipipami ma amamaga maim anona nemaf nigi' neatagai.

Fowa' amam aposel ma'ipipa na'ama ma'i, “Anom nimeguf akutaimi motaga, anom amam monda' iafa waf Godi mifi'i mope. Amam mowa' alafugaha God, ea' ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi na'ana'a ma waf aonai atona ea' mila amama.”
Amam amama atom manda' ipe' Kristen pandawal. Amam maila ukup epes etapasi etis, Ambal Bu'unai Godi a'am.

Ea' ipe' alupipei endilisi, la'ela'ef ipe' penda' opalef ipe'imi la'ifim pembale'efa God, Anan ofagonama bale'ef ipe'inai. Ea' la'ela'ef ipe' pihali' Ambal Bu'unai Godi ma nonda'epa la'ifipa numafipa ma beten ipe'inai.

Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pila waf Godi andeande'ma Anan nihi'ambepa andeande' okom lu'unai ananinai nainailipei. Ipe' penda'am na'ama pepe pehafa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, Anan nati uwahipipa anona nemaf nonda'epa pepe namepa ma pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
Enis epes sape ukup biambiefima sombale'efa Kraisi, ipe' piti uwahipis pigiambamas penda'as sotaga la'ifis.

Enis epes sowa' alafugaha Godi si'i sape nif fandumi la'afen, ipe' mehip gwasi'as sotanimani. Ea' enis epes sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, ipe' umbamehepamas. Na'ama sohonde'epa pefe' nif. Ea' piti esis uwahipis pigiambamas. Waf apinai aonai asasinai si'i sowaho' luwaguf alogw la'ifimi mailami. Ea' ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf anama aonai pendafa'mana endilisi.

Ae' a'i ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una na'ama. Anan la'ifinai ma nili'akwapa andeande'ma anona nemaf ipe' ina pewa ma waf aonai, owa'. Ama anona nemaf nofa'epa nokolasipa pepe andeande' pendanifel endilisi, ofagema ma waf aonai a'epa ma anama Anan nape nafifimagoma.

Anan atona God, nefa' ape' motanimani ma lagel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Nafifili naloma agel lu'unai pepel lu'unai naloma waf anama nape la'ifinai numafi amamaga hiami, amama ananimi atom nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' anona nemaf owagama wapoti' nope na'ama etin la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' ma'um.

Fowa' gani basef amama mape mandambaho' ea' dei' Jisas Krais nanda'am mandawalap alihim. God nase'anam Jisasa nowalapam nihi'ambapa anom manda'mana opeh Godi ma mowalapa amamaga mape mandambahi'i motaga ulal. Anan nase'e gawa afa' wanda' opeha Anan ma amamaga amama. Ea' dei' nasapa' ensel ananinai nafi'mai ae' Jon. Ae' dei' anda'mana maol Godi, ea' Anan nase'e basef amama ae' wapoti'.
Ae' atolom ea' amamaga amama awalapam a'iam alihim basef Godi maloma basef amama endilisimi Jisas Krais nanda'ami mandawalap alihim.

Emi egafis setalifa basef amama Godi mail buk anama ma malogof asasimi ma amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai, esis God nonda'as sondanifel. Ea' emi egafis some' basef amama ma ukup asasimi, esis sondanifel wapoti'. Dei' main, nemafa amamaga amama migi' meatagai felefele'ma motaga.

Ae' Jon anda' basef amama ma ipe' Kristen pape wambel 7-peleimi etap hiagoma Esia. God fowa' gani nape, dei' nape, anona nemaf owagama nope la'ela'ef hihif. Anan naloma Jisas Krais maloma ambagof bu'wami 7-peleim mape felefele'ma balata bu'unai Godi. Ae' a'i amam migiambamepa na'a monda'epa petaga la'ifipa mose'epa opalef awanem. Jisas Krais Anan naila basef ananimi nanda' maol ananinai andeande'. Ea' nawalapa basef hiami Godi andeande'. God nali' nafelona nohafel hi'agif. Ea' nape nali'ma anona nemaf esis saga'i God nofelas sohafel wapoti'. Jisas Krais Anan atona dembinai numafi amam king Dembemi mape etap.

Anan atona okom lu'unai nainaila ape' hiapai, ma esimbel ananimi atom natagahepa ma waf aonai ape' manda'anai mataga wafifipa. Anan atona nanda'apa dei' mape dembipai malomana mumafi epes hiesi si'i amam king. Ea' nanda'apa mape pris si'i mondolalima God manda' opeha God Ahalomana ananinai. Ae' a'i nafifili noloma pepel hianai Ananinai atona nope la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi.
Dembinai God pepel hiamunai Anan na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ae' atowe ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef hihif ape ali'i, ape agi'i endilisi.”
Ea' Ae' atowe fowa' gani ape, dei' ape, anona nemaf owagama etanima ifi'i.
Anona nemaf Dembinai Sande Ambal Bu'unai Godi numafi ae' ame' anona maf na'i mehip nandame' si'i safapula alof, na'i nataga alafuga ae'anai.

Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ine' da'a basefa amamaga amama nambimb neatulumi mil buk. Ea' nenda' basef amama mil buk anama mefe' amam nematawa Godi sios 7-peleim sape wambel anama 7-peleina atona etin. Wambel anama agofuguma amama. Efesus, Smerna, Pergamum, Taiataira, Sardis, Filadelfia, Laodisia.”
Ea' ae' andamboma a'i iti anama na'ipa ae'i. Ea' ati lamifah 7-peleim matoma gol 7-peleim.

La'afena gol amama ati anona aman nalomam naitu. Anan nandati si'i anona dembinai nataga epen endilisinai. Nala luwaguf laumi mowala mambaho'wa bo'wagah ananimi ea' nowaho' let sanda' gol sanda'anai mafata ananinai.
Balaga naloma auf malonai afitim endilisi si'i auf malo sipsipi o si'i elagw amama afitimi. Naep ananimi fandom si'i nif ilelowa.
Ea' bo'wagah ananimi manda' gambigambis endilisi mandati si'i bras kapa batafunai saofam nif lu'wami. Ea' ame' malogel ananinai nanda'am si'i embel mawis mehip kululu' etin.
Anan nahapila ondowa 7-peleim nahapilam lagel da'isinai ananinai. Ea' anona bainat hi'alina wa'owa'ili nawisi nape malogel ananinai. Amaga ananinai nafifil endilisi si'i owaf naluwi la'ifina.

Ae' atolona ea' ewa a'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi andati si'i aga'i. Ea' anan nasa lagel da'isinai ananinai ma ae' na'ipi na'i, “Ine' umbamehena owa'. Ae' ape dembiwei la'ela'ef ape ali'i ape agi'i endilisi.
Fowa' aga', ea' dei' ape namowe la'ela'ef hihif. Ae' ape Dembiwei ali' ape agi' ma amamaga hiami maloma epes. Ea' ahapila ki ma wambel saga'i sapoma.
Ea' ae' a'i ine' nenda' basefa amamaga amama dei' ine' natulumi, nenda' basefa amamaga amama dei' mapani maloma amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai wapoti' nenda'am mil buk.

Ine' nati ondowa awama 7-peleim wape lagel da'isinai ae'anai waloma lamifah amama 7-peleim matoma gol amama 7-peleim. Amama mondola'wifi atom. Basef ofagema amama. Ondowa mondola'wifa ensel mumafi sios amam nematawa hiesi Godi 7-peleim, ea' gol amama mondola'wifa sios amam nematawa Godi amama 7-peleim.
aman ahapila ondowa amama 7-peleim lagel ae'anai da'isinai afe' la'afena gol amama lamifah matomami 7-peleim. Ae' anda'mepago basef amama ipe'.

Ipe' paitu la'ifipa la'ela'ef ma epes isima sandaiwa'ma agel ae'anai ma sanda'mepa waf aonai, ina patanima, owa'. Ae' egawa ipe' panda' opeh ae'ami lu'wami la'ifipa ea' ina umbamahepa pakwahom, owa'etin. Ipe' paitu la'ifipa pefa' nimanimi amama.
Ea' dei' anom basef awami mapomepa. Fowa' dambadamba ukup ipe'imi maimaila Ae' pembale'efa Ae' andeande', ea' dei' owa'etin.

Dei' ukup mi'i' waf anama bu'unai fowa' pali' panda'anai. Ea' pemboma opalef pilana penda'ana pigi'mana wapoti' si'i fowa' dambadamba panda'ana. I'i ipe' owa' pemboma opalef, anona nemaf ae' ifi'i etagamepa ili'amona gol amama ipe'imi lam natamonomi.
Ea' dei' anona waf bu'unai ata' napaipa. Enis epes hiesi agel sa'i Nikolas Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma waf esis sanda'anai, ea' ipe' wapoti' pewa' alafugahas pandaiwa' endilisi ma waf esis sanda'anai.
Emi egafis situ la'ifis sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, anona nemaf Ae' i'i aho'ma esis sea' su'utip lawag anama epes se'am sofa' ambagof namumi. Lawag anama notawa aof Godi agiliguma Paradais.
ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef hihif ape ali', ape agi' endilisi. Fowa' aga', dei' ehafel wapoti' ape namowe ambal napaiwe. Dei' anda'mepago basef amama ipe' a'i,

Ae' egawa nimanimi amama matagamipei ea' Ae' egawa ipe' pape kwahupei otamba hiahaom maim a'epa. Owa'etin. Ipe' amamaga hiami ma'omepa gani ilif heven. Ae' egawa basef amama awami enis epes sa'iama ipe'. Amam nematawa isima sambaso'mepa sa'i, ‘Afa' Juda.’ Ea' esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sambaso'mepa. Esis wambota Satani etis. Ae' egawa amamaga amama.

Ipe' ina umbamehepama nambimb pefa' nimanimi, owa'. Ipe' peme'! Nambimb Satan nonda' enipa penda' kalabusa nogwamba ipe' pefa' nimanimi amama nimeguf 10-peleim. Ea' kwawie', ipe' pembale'efa Ae' pitu la'ifipa ma enis si'i sehepa pega', pitu la'ifipa pembale'efa Ae'. Ama Ae' anona nemaf ease'epa ambal namunai ipe' si'i amamaga bu'wami esis sasagih sikila' sefa'ami.

Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei, peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen. Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, anona nemaf ga' anama neafe'ma bifi ina nohambombagas nonda'as sefe' wambel aonai, owa'.
Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Pergamumi. Ae' ahapila bainat launai hi'alina wa'owa'ili. Ea' anda'mepago basef amama ipe' a'i,

Ae' egawa wambel ipe'inai. Satan atona ata' nape dembinai ma wambel anama. Ea' ipe' pahapila agel ae'anai la'ifipei pembale'efa Ae'. Ipe' ina pakwaha pembale'efa Ae', owa'. Fowa' aman anama Antipas anan nawalapa basef Ae'ami andeande'. Ea' sahana naga' wambel ipe'inai Satan napoma. Ea' nogota anama ipe' ina pakwaha pembale'efa Ae', owa'.

Ea' Ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basefa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai dei' ata' napomepa. Enis amam nematawa sape salomepa Pergamum, esis ata' saila waf anama si'i anona aman Balam fowa' nanda'anai la'ifis. Waf aman anama na'ama. Fowa' gani anan nihi'amba anona aman Balak nambaso'mana nanda' esis amam nematawa Israelisi sowa sanda' waf aonai. Ea' Balak nafela ukup esis Israeli ma sagwa' mafis maloma gwa'aimi amama saso' god baso'omunai sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai.
Ea' na'ama etin enis amam nematawa saloma ipe' esis ata' saila waf anama aonai enis epes hiesi sa'i agel Nikolas sanda'anai.
Ipe' pemboma opalef pekwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. I'i owa', Ae' felefele' a'i etagamepa epa' eloma epes isima owa' somboma opalef sifi'mai ae'i ehas bainat nape malogel ae'anai.

Ipe' aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen. Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, Ae' anona nemaf ese'asa gwa'aimi Ae'ami bu'wami mandambaho' mape heveni. Gwa'aimi amama agilima mana. Ea' ese'asa anom otamba bu'wami afitimi atona etin, ea' enda' anona agel namunai nil otamba amama. Ina enin epen negawa agel anama, owa'etin. Epen nefa' otam anama, enin etin negawana.

Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Taiatairai. Ae' nogalomana Godi, naep ae'ami howalagon endilisi si'i nif fandom la'ifim endilisi, bo'wagah ae'ami howalam gambigambis endilisi si'i bras howalagon.

Ae' egawa ma waf hianai bu'unai ipe' panda'anai. Ae' egawa ipe' ukup maimaila God naloma epes wapoti' pembale'efa Ae' panda' opeh hiami pagiambama epes hiesi. Ae' egawepa paitu la'ifipa ma nimanimi matagamipei. Ae' egawa maol anama bu'unai ipe' fowa' panda'anai. Ipe' dei' panda' maol anama bu'unai hianai pikila' fowa' panda'anai.

Ea' Ae' anom basefa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. Ipe' pati nemata'w akwama Jesebel kwape kwalomepa. Akwa'w kwa'i, ‘Ae' profet a'i basef Godi mandambahi'i.’ Owa', kwambaso'mepa kwawalipa ipe' panda' maola ae'i panda' waf so'a waolanai aonai ma pa' gwa'aimi amama sondolali saso' god baso'omunai.
Ae' a'i akwa'w komboma opaf, amama atom dei' Ae' ata' animbalo'w kwape anom nimeguf, owa'etin. Akwa'w ina kwa'i komboma opaf kowa' alafugama waf anama aonai so'a waolanai, owa'.

Ea' dei' peme'! Nambimb ikwaho'w kowai balata ese'akwa nimanimi lu'wami moloma bumbilita lu'unai. Ea' esis amam nematawa saila waf aonai akwa'unai wapoti' sofa' nimanimi amama. I'i esis owa' somboma opalefa sowa' alafugaha waf anama sanda'anai, ese'as nimanimi amama lu'wami.

Esis isima saila basef akwa'umi wapoti', nambimb ehas soga'. Ama esis amam nematawa hiesi Godi sogawa Ae' awaloga nomonas maloma ukup epes hiesi andeande'. Ea' anona nemaf egwamepa amamaga ipe' atona etin, mondahama waf ipe' panda'anai.

Dei' ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef ipe' enipa amam nematawa pape wambel Taiatairai, ipe' owa' pila basef amama awami akwa'umi, owa' pila waf anama sofalana sa'i, ‘Basef mandambahi'i ma waf Satani,’ owa'. Ae' a'ipipa na'ama. Ae' ina nambimb ese'epa anom nimanimi wapoti' ma ipe', owa'.
Waf hianai bu'unai ipe' pagi'manai, anama ipe' pembale'ef la'ifipa pefe' ma petaga nogota Ae' iefi'ianai.

Ipe' emi egafipa pitu la'ifipama wandafa pili'amona waf aonai ma pila okom Ae'anai pefe' petaga nogota hi'ilana, Ae' anona nemaf ese'epa pepel ipe'. Ama pepe dembipei ma amam nematawa hiesi. Na'ama etin si'i fowa' Ahalome nase'e pepel ma ape Dembiwei imafi epes hiesi. Ipe' wapoti' pepe dembipei pefa' pepel pimafi enis amam nematawa wapoti' na'ama. Ipe' pimafias la'ifipa si'i anona aman nahapila kalamuta sanda' ain sanda'anai, si'i anona aman nawala malep papalalana.
Ea' ese'epa ondo'w kuhumbitai'wi lala'wan.
Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.
ahapila anom ambagof bu'wami Godi 7-peleim ea' ahapila ondowa amama 7-peleim.
Ae' egawa waf hianai ipe' panda'anai. Esis sa'i basefa ipe' na'ama sa'i, ‘Ipe' ambal napaipa.’ Owa'etin. Ipe' si'i saga'i.

Ipe' hafel pekwaha pa'oh pandondo'ah! Waf hianai aonai ipe' panda'anai ata' napaipa la'ela'ef na'i nehepa pega'. Ea' anona waf bu'unai kwaie'una ipe' penda'ana notaga la'ifina nape. Dei' main? Waf hianai ipe' panda'anai, Ae' ina ati anona ata' bo'ona ma naep Ahalome Godi, owa'.

Ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama Ae'ami fowa' pali' pame'am pefa'am ea'i. Pigi'mam pemboma opalef pekwaha waf aonai pifi'mai Ae'. I'i ipe' owa' pehafel ulal pekwaha koh, nambimb Ae' ifi'i endambaho' etagamepa si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i nataga ea' ina pegawa maina nogota ae' eatagamepa, owa'.
Ea' ipe' enipa pape Sardisi owa' penda' luwaguf maim ipe'imi aom, anona nemaf pindawisa luwaguf afitimi dambaimi atom pefe' peloma Ae'. Dei' main, ati ipe' epes bu'upei ma pefa'am amama.

Ipe' paloma enis epes wapoti' sape ambal namunai la'ela'ef agof ipe'imi mail anona buk sa'i buk ambal namunai napainai. Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, Ae' ese'as luwaguf amama afitimi solam. Ea' ina anona nemaf egagaha agof asasimi mail buk anama, owa'etin. Mil la'elaef. Ewalapa agof asasimi ma naep Ahalome ae'anai noloma amam ensel Ananimi i'ipam i'i epes isima ae'asi.
Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.

bu'uwei endilisi dei' ahapila ki ma uta anama fowa' king Devit nahapilanai. I'i Ae' ewisi'ana, anona aman ina la'ifina ma nowalowana, ea' Ae' i'i ewalowana wapoti', nambimb enin epen ina la'ifina niwisi'ana, owa'. Ae' atowe a'ipipago basef amama ipe'.

Ae' egawa waf hianai dei' panda'anai hi'alana ea' egawa ipe' wapoti', ata' la'ifipa kwaikwaie' ma enis epes owa' some' basef ipe'imi. Ea' ipe' paila basef ae'ami andeande'. Ea' ina pambaho' agel ae'anai, owa'.
Ipe' piti, ae' anda' uta nagal napomepa, owa' anona aman la'ifinama nowalowana, owa'.

Ipe' peme'! Ipe' pegawa epes isima Satani. Esis sa'i basef sa'i esis epes Judai, owa'etin. Esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sambaso'ami. Ae' anona nemaf enda' epes isima sifi'i sindiwa nembawa sotawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ipe'imi ma sogawa ae' okom nainailipa.

Ipe' paila basef ae'ami andeande' paitu la'ifipa ma nimanimi amama matagamipei. Ea' Ae' dei' imafi ipe' ma nemaf anama amama meagwambipei motagama amam nematawa hiesi etap hiagomai ma God nowalogas waf bu'unai aonai. Amama ina anona nemaf motagama ipe', owa'.
Ae' ifi'i etagama ipe' mehip. Waf bu'unai ipe' pailanai dei', pilona la'ifapa la'ela'ef. Na'ama anona aman nondalombepa amamaga bu'wami mapoma ipe' ma anona nemaf pefa'ami.

Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, anona nemaf Ae' enda'as situ la'ifis si'i olaf nombalo' ipat lu'unai Godi Ae'anai. Ea' epes isima ina sokwaha ipat anama lu'unai sotanima suwisi ande' wapoti', owa'. Sope andeande' nomon la'ela'ef. Anona nemaf enda' agel Ahalome Godi nila esis noloma agel wambel anama lu'unai God Ae'anai Jerusalem, wambel namunai bu'unai. Wambel anama anona nemaf nokwaha heven God Ae'anai napoma nisila'i. Ea' agel namunai Ae'anai wapoti' enda'ana nila esis.
Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.
Ae'

ofagewe ma basef endilisimi awalapam mafe' andeande' basef hiami Godi. La'ela'ef awalapam andeande'. Ae' Dembiwei ma amamaga hiami God nanda'am mape ilif etapi maloma epes hiesi wapoti'. Ae' a'ipipago basef amama ipe'.
Owa'etin. Ipe' nifipa kwaukwawie'. Ipe' owa' nifipa endilisi ea' owa' poholepa endilisi. Ea' Ae' andaiwa'mepa a'i igu'upei malogel ae'anai.
Ipe' pa'iam na'ama pa'i, ‘Ape' moni hianai naloma amamaga hiami ma'omapa. Ape' ina anom amamaga a'apa, owa'.’
Ea' naep Ae'ami atilipa pape awepa endilisi ma enis epes sati owahipipa. Ipe' pape kwahupa endilisi naep mase'epa alop nape na'a. Ipe' owa' pegawa amama mowalapa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, owa'.

Ea' ese'epa gawa ma ipe'. Gol Ae'ami dei' fandom mataga bo'om endilisi. Andeande'ma ipe' petalom petaga bu'upei amamaga hiami endilisi. Andeande'ma petala luwaguf afitimi pelam muli'akwa alop ipe'inai ma esis ina siti alop ipe'inai nope wafifina ea' ambagof aom, owa'. Andeande'ma ipe' petala anona marasin penda'ana naep ipe'imi ma piti andeande'.

Epes hiesi emi egafis Ae' okom nainailas, isima Ae' enda' megah mohas ehas bolam ma enda' waf asasinai notaga bo'ona. Ea' ipe' wapoti' ukup mopoma waf ipe'inai hianai, pemboma opalef pekwaha waf aonai pifi'mai Ae'.
Ipe' peme', Ae' aha uta aitu. Emi egafis seme' malogel Ae'anai ma susi' uta, Ae' iwis nomon epe elomas ope atogon wea' gwa'aimi.

Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, Ae' anona nemaf i'i aho'ma esis sope solome ma sope dembesi balata king Ae'anai. Na'ama etin si'i fowa' Ae' aitu la'ifiwi ali'amona wandafa waf aonai. Ea' dei' ape aloma Ahalome Ae'anai ape balata king Ananinai.
Ipe' emi egafipa aligah peme' basef amama andeande' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.”

Amama mataga ea', ati gani heven anona uta nandawisi' nape. Ea' maf anama fowa' ae' ame'anai na'i basef amama si'i anona alof nalef ea' na'i, “Ine' lotowi na'ae ilif ihi'ambena amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai.”
Ea' mehip Ambal Bu'unai Godi nataga la'ifina ma ae'. Ati gani heven balata kingi ati anona aman Dembinai natoma balata anama nape.

Anan howalagon la'ifina si'i otam bu'unai agilina ma jaspa naloma otam akwahinai agilina ma konilian. Ea' anona elelina natoma balata anama king natomanai ea' ati elelina anama goloto'unai si'i anona otam bu'unai agilinama emeral.

Anom siaifah hiami bu'wami 24-peleim motawa tulif etina balata anama dembinai kingi. Ea' anom agufumi mala luwaguf afitimi atom matoma mandandamam siaifah amama 24-peleim. Mowalo' hagw dembemi atom mowalo'ami balagah amamumi sanda' gol sanda'ami.
Otaga holala natagai balata kingi diwala. Ea' anom amalemb lu'wami mala' wapoti' balata anama nape natologoma bagah 7-peleim fandumi mape mafifimana. Bagah amama Ambagof bu'wami Godi 7-peleim.
Ea' anama balata kingi notawa natologoma anom amamaga mape. Amama si'i embel naoh lu'wami. Amama mandati si'i mapelaga mati embel mati ambagof.
Ea' anom amamaga biamibiam ambal namunai napaimi mape la'afen anama balata kingi maitu. Amam mape naep hiami mapaim hi'alam maso'ala amagah opalef amamumi alafugah hi'alam.

Nali'i ambal napainai si'i anona mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion. Nagi'i anan si'i bulmakau suwafunai. Nafe'ma wanomi anan amaga nandati si'i amaga epeni. Ea' nafe'ma biamibiami nandati si'i anona komon lu'unai nufia' nafe' ilifi.

Ambagof namumi mapaimi bihinagof wanom wanom mape mandandam. Ea' alop amamunai si'ina naep atomana hi'alana. Ea' owamb alip amam ma'i la'ela'ef na'ama ma'i, “Dembinai God Anan la'ifina bo'ona endilisi! Fowa' gani Anan nape dei' nape, anona nemaf owagama wapoti' nope la'ela'ef.”
Amam ina mapoma noma'wa ma'i basef amama, owa'. Manda'am la'ela'ef.
Amam mandanifela God natoma balata kingi nape ambal namunai la'ela'ef. Ea' mafela agel Ananinai manifelona.

Ama nimeguf hiami maina nogota amam manda'am na'ama, agufumi amama 24-peleim mindiwa nembawa ma naep Dembinai kingi, natoma balata kingi. Ea' amam manda' lotuma Anan nape la'ela'ef. Amam mowali hagw amamumi golim makwahom mondola'wifa mape owina Anan Dembinai amamunai. Hagw amama mafe' mowa felefele'ma balata kingi notawa natologoma ea' ma'i,

“Ine' God afa'inai Dembinai afa'inai. Ine' la'ifinai bu'unai endilisi ma epes hiesi sondanifela ine' sofela agel ine'inai lu'una. Ine' la'ifinai. Dei' main, ine' nanda' amamaga hiami. Okom ine'inai atona na'iam nanda'am mataga. Ea' dei' amamaga amama hiami mape ambal napaim.”

Ea' ati aman anama natoma balata kingi nahapila anona buk lagel da'isinai ananinai. Buk anama amef mail nomon ande'. Ea' sanda' tep si'i blasta sowa' buk anama. Tep tu'wanina 7-peleina sowa'ana buk anama.
Ea' ati anona ensel la'ifinai noga na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Emi epen bu'wani ma atuwasi la'ifina nehape' tep anama nowa' buk anama?”
Owa' anin epen atitin nape heveni o nape etap anae'i o nape etap owini la'ifina nehape' tep anama nowa' buk anama nati nomonana, owa'.
Ae' ati esis ina sati anin epen la'ifina nefa' buk anama niti nomonana, owa'. Ea' ae' dei' okom nimanina amama alef ega a'i mehip.

Ea' anan agilinai na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Ine' owa' nelef! Neme'! Anona aman natagama wambota anama launai esis Judai, aman anama ma'una Dembinai nataga wambota anama bafalomepa Deviti. Anan si'i anona mafin wandafunai laion, nikila' wandafa waf aonai. Amama atom dei' atuwasi Anan la'ifina ma nehape' tep anama 7-peleina nowa' buk anama naufeniana.”

Ae' ati amama biamibiam ambal napaimi maloma amam agufumi mape malipa anona mafin sipsip noganai. Anan naitu, nandati si'i sahana afuna. Anan naitu felefele'ma balata anama kingi. Wambawa mataga balagana 7-peleim ea' naep 7-peleim. Naep amama ma'i Ambagof Bu'wami Godi 7-peleim nasapa'am mafe'agon hi'alagon etap anae' hiagoma.
Sipsip anama noganai nafe' nofa'ai buk anama nape lagel da'isinai Ananinai natoma balata anama kingi.

Nofa' buk anama ea', amamaga amama biamibiam ambal namunai napaimi maloma agufumi amama 24-peleim mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma sipsip anama noganai. Agufumi amama hiami atona etin mahapila anona musik si'i gitai naloma anom dis gol si'inama sanda amama nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami. Sanda amama alogw ambul mataga malata ilif si'i beten esis amam nematawa Godi.
Ea' manda' anona awaf dambainai na'ama ma'i,

“Ine' bu'winai endilisi ma nefa'ai buk anama nahape' mandof tep anama hianai mowa'anai. Dei' main, esis sahena naga', esimbel ine'imi matala epes isima wapoti' sotanimani nase'anas God. Ine' natala esis amam nematawa hiesi hi'alasa epes hiesi wambotagw hiami mamumami, diga naninani hianai, alop naninani hianai ma epes sape etap hiagoma wambel hiagoma ma sotanimani.
Ine' nanda' epes isima hiesi sataga si'i pris mondolalima Godi ma Anan nope Dembinai ma esis numafias sonda' maol Ananinai. Ea' esis anona nemaf sope si'i king sumafi epes hiesi sape etapi.”

Ae' atologon ame' malogof ensel hiami endilisi siambam namba amamunai hiami handet milian tausen, hiami endilisi. Amam maitu malipa balata anama kingi maloma amamaga amama ambal napaimi maloma amam agufumi.
Amam ma'i ma'oh mehip ma'i,

“Anama ma'una sipsip noganai, fowa' esis sahana naga'i. Anan bu'unai endilisi ma nofa' namba agel lu'unai noloma amamaga hiami bu'wami otamba hiahaom maim moloma pepel lu'unai noloma gawa bu'unai noloma howalagon. Anan bu'unai endilisi ma epes hiesi sefela agel Ananinai sondanifela Anan sinifelona.”

Amama mafe'ma ea', Ae' ame' diga ma amamaga hiami maloma epes hiesi God nanda'as ambagof mapaisi hi'alas. Hiesi sape heveni sape etap anae' saloma sape etap owini saloma sape naoh embel owini. Ame' amamaga amama hiami maloma epes isima hiesi sape anama hiagomai sanda' anona awaf na'ama sa'i,

“Dembinai nape balata anama Kingi naloma sipsip noganai wapoti', amam biam bu'wami ma mofa' danifel anama hianai naloma agel lu'unai naloma pepel naloma howalagon. Amam biam bu'wami ma mofa' amama nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef hihif.”
Ea' amamaga amama biamibiam mape namumi ma'i, “Endilisi!”
Ea' agufumi amama 24-peleim mindiwa nembawa manda' lotuma God naloma sipsip noganai.

Ae' ati sipsip noganai nahapila buk anama tep 7-peleina nowa'ana nahape' tep nali'i. Ea' ame' anona ma amam amama biamibiami na'i basef diga ananinai ame' si'i otaga diluluwagala. Anan na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”

Atologon wapoti', ati anona mafin hos afitinai epen natomanai nahapila kopa'w. Esis sase'ana anona hat si'i sanda' wandaf sali'amonana sofa'ami. Ea' anan la'ifina nafe' dei' nali'amona wandaf okom la'ifina nape la'ela'ef na'i nonda' wandaf lu'unai nikila' epes hiesi.
Sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nafe'ma bifi nowa' buk anama ea' ame' anona ma amama biamibiam nafe'ma bifi na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”

Ea' anona hos akwahinai howalagon endilisi nataga, anona aman natoma hos anama. Amam amama biamibiam mase'ana pepel aman anama natoma hosi. Ea' la'ifina ma nili'amona nogota bu'unai ma amam nematawa etap anae'isi. Ea' esis lupulupa' so'oh soga'. Ea' mase'ana anona bainat lu'unai ma nonda' wandaf.
Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nafe'ma wenifi wapoti' nowa' buk. Ame' anona ma amama biamibiam nafe'ma wenifi na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”
Ae' atologon wapoti' ati anona hos alialinai. Aman natomanai nahapila anona skel si'i ikwaf dende'ma nowaloga gwa'aimi nihi'ambasa ikwaf dende'.

Ea' ame' anona maf si'i anona malogel na'i la'afena amam biamibiam na'i, “Ine' nesaho' anona malep sala su'utip witimi ma 3 kina. Ea' nesaho' maloh sa'umi wanom bali si'i wit napaimi ma otamba 3 kina. Ine' owa' nehambombaga wain noloma wel hi'ilam, owa'!”
Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep nafe'ma bifibifi nowa' buk, ea' ame' malogel anona ma amam ambagof mapaimi nafe'ma biamibiami na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”

Atologon wapoti' ati anona hos batafunai, aman natomanai agel ananinai ga'. Ea' anona aman numafi wambel esis saga'i sapoma nagi'mana nafi'i. Amam biam mowala amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi sotaga wambotagw biamibiam ea' amam motaga la'ifima moha enis amam nematawa hiesi sape anona wambota atotona soga'. Ea' amam biam moha enis soga' bainat amamunai ea' enis nolomohas soga' ea' enis awes naninani nonda'as soga' ea' mafis amama wandafumi mape aolupi moha enis soga'.

Sipsip noganai nahape' tep anama wapoti' nafe'ma wenif bifi nowa' buk, ati ambagof enis epes saga'i sape owina balata sondolalima Godi. Fowa' epes isima sombale'efa basef Godi la'ifis sawalapam sa'iam sa'ipasama Jisas Krais nagiambamas. Ea' isima sandaiwa'ma Godi sahas saga'.
Ea' ambagof amama ma'i mehip na'ama ma'i,
“King dembinai nahapila ilif etap, ine' nape bo'wena, ine' endilisinai! Afagof ma'um mefe' hi'ilam muli' ma ine' nenda' kotima esis amam nematawa sape etapi, ma negwa esimbel ape'imi?”

Ea' God nase'ama anom luwaguf afitimi laumi atona etin na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' ata' pepoma noma'w nogota bandana. Anona nemaf esis naumbih soha sahin owan isima ipe' pandao'oma panda' maol atonai soga', si'i sahepa paga'. Anona nemaf dohandohama esis naumbih sohas soga' sotaga ma ikwaf ae' a'ianai, egwa esimbel ipe'imi.”

Ae' ati sipsip noganai nahape' tep anama nafe'ma wenif wenifi nowa' buk dei' atef sowambon lu'unai nakoto'ma etap, aon alipunai nataga nandamboma alialina si'i lowaf alinai apinai. Ea' aon owambunai nataga akwahina hi'alana si'i esimbel.
Ea' ondowa mape ilifi mowai etap si'i su'utip mail lawah figi owa' ata' akume uf nakoto'mam mowai.
Ilif wapoti' nafe' hi'alagon si'i samagwia mat sowa'ana. Ea' halafutagw hiami maloma ailan hianai makwaha anama mapoma mindiki'ah mafe' anagon.

Ea' amam king dembemi etapami maloma agufumi maloma amam kepten dembemi mumafi amam soldia maloma amam amamaga hiamumi maloma amam amama aguf lu'wamumi maloma epes isima hiesi sanda' maola otamba saloma isima hiesi agof a'asi sape owina enis epesi, esis hiesi sawis sandambaho' sape hul maim mape etapi ea' mape nomona owah lu'wami mape halafutagwi.
Ea' sofala halafutagw amama hiami maloma owah hiami sa'i,
“Ipe' mehip kwa'ilipei pewai pepei'apa ma pembahe'apa ma amaga anan natoma balata kingi naloma okom wandafunai ma sipsip noganai.
Dei' main, nemaf anama lu'unai ma ukup amam biam wandafuma mogwa waf aonai dei' nataga. Atuwasi emi la'ifina nitu nikila' amam? Owa'etin.”

Amama mafe'ma ea', ae' ati ensel biamibiam maitu wa'owa'ola biefigin biefigin etap nafe' netambela, mahapila uf hianai etapanai ma uf ina la'ifina nehapusa etap o naoh embel lu'wami o nefa' anona lawag nenda' felifal, owa'.

Ea' ati anona ensel nafe' nalata ilif aon natefima. Anan nahapila ikwaf la'ifinai Godi nape namunai na'i nosaho' epes sanda' maol Godi. Ea' nofala ensel amama biamibiam God nase'ama pepel ma mohambombaga etap naloma naoh.

Anan na'ipam mehip na'i, “Dei' ipe' ina pehambombaga etap noloma naoh moloma lawah maim, owa'. Ata' owa'. Afa' wa'i osaho' epes isima sanda' maol God ape'inai osahe'as uli'. Nambimb andeande' pehambombaga amamaga amama.”
Ea' ame' esis sa'i esis amam nematawa isima ma'uma'wis ensel anama nasahe'as. Esis nasahe'as ea'i sataga na'ama 144,000. Esis amam nematawa hiesi wambotagw hiami epes Israeli.
Dei' esis 12,000 epes hiesi esis wambota Judai saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Rubeni saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Gati.
Ea' esis 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Aseri saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Naptali saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Manasei.
Ea' 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Simeoni saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Livai saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Isakari.
Ea' 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Sebuluni saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Josepi saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Benjamini.

Amamaga amama hi'alam, ae' ata' atologon wapoti' ati esis amam nematawa hiesi endilisi safi'i sondowa'anima sape. Ea' ina enin epen la'ifina niamba epes isima sataga ma'uma'wis, owa'. Esis hias endililsi. Epes isima sape etap kantri hiagoma ea' epes hiesi sape wambotagw hiami ma alop anama naninani, diga hianai naninani, isima hiesi hi'alas.
Esis saitu anama God natoma balata king ma naep sipsip noganai. Sala anom luwaguf afitimi laumi, sahapila bagah lagof asasimi.
Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'ama sa'i,
“God ape'inai Anan natoma balata kingi naloma Sipsip noganai, amam biam mofa'apa motanimani ma makwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.”

Ensel amama hiami mandatama hi'alam maitu anama balata kingi ea' agufumi amama 24-peleim maloma amamaga amama biamibiam mape namumi mape mitimalo' mati etap felefele'ma balata kingi manda' lotu mandanifela God.
Amam ma'iam na'ama ma'i,

“Endilisi! Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma God ape'inai mafela agel ananinai lu'una! Anan Dembinai ofagonama howalagon. Anan nomonas hiami bu'wami mapaina ea' ape' manifelona mafela agel ananinai! Anan pepel hiamunai endilisi! Pepel lu'unai napoma Anan! Amama hiami ananimi atom la'ela'ef. Endilisi!”
Ea' anona amam agufumi amama 24-peleim nahali'i na'i, “Esis isima sala luwaguf afitimi, esis emi egafis? Esis safi'i enima?”
Ea' agwamana basef a'i, “Dembinai ae'inai, ine' etina negawas.”
Ea' Anan na'ipi na'i, “Epes isima fowa' sape etap sofa' nimanimi lu'wami ma lagof esis naumbih. Esis sasa'opa luwaguf asasimi ma esimbel sipsip anama noganai, dei' mataga afitim.
Ea' saitu balata king Godi natologoma. Owamb alip sanda' opeh ananimi ipat ananinai. Anan nape balata anama kingi, anan atona anona nemaf nope nolomas nili'akwas.
Esis ina anona nemaf nolomohas wapoti', ina soga'ma embel iap nose'as wapoti', owa'. Owaf ina anona nemaf la'ifina nohas, ea' ina anom nif lu'wami mihihi'as sope, owa'.

Dei' main, sipsip noganai naitu felefele' endilisi ma balata kingi, anan nope numafias. Anan no'was safe'ma embel amama mataga anona ifata ma sofa' embel amama ambal namunai napaimi. Ea' God anona nemaf nupati'amasa embif hiami naep asasimi ma esis ina ata' selef wapoti', owa'.”
Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep anama nafe'ma 7i nowa' buk anama ea' ina ata' owa' anom amamaga monda'am, owa'. Ea' ina anom basef mataga heven mape mafe' mafe'ma nogota si'i awa tu'waninai, owa'.
Amama mafe'ma ea', ati ensel amama 7-peleim la'ela'ef maitu naep Godi mofa' biugel anama 7-pelaina nandandam.

Ea' anona ensel nafi'i naitu felefele'ma balata sondolali ma Goda. Nahapila anona plet gol ama nonda' nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami. Esis sase'ana sanda hiami ma nonda' nogoh amama ma anan nokolasom moloma beten amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Ea' nanda' ofa ma God balata anama sanda' gol sanda'anai notawa felefele'ma balata kingi.
Ea' nogoh maloma sanda amama alogw ma'ami maloma beten esis amam nematawa Godi, amama mandatama etifigin malata ilifa naep Godi.

Ea' ensel anama nofa' plet anama do'ok sanda amama malami ea' nofa' nifa balata sondolalima Godanai nowalam plet, ea' nakwahom muwai etap. Anan nakwahom ea', otaga holala, anom amamaga mataga manda'am, howalagon nafe' sowambon lu'unai nasol etin nape.
Ea' ensel amama 7-peleim mahapila biugel anama 7-pelaina mandandombola mufapula biugel anama.

Ensel nali'i nofapula biugel ananinai ea' ais afitimi si'i otamba pohalami maloma nif maloma esimbel lola'am mataga heven ea' nokolo' ais maloma esimbel mowai etap. Amam mawaloga etap hiagoma naloma lawah hiami mataga wenifigin. Ea' nif fando etap wa'agon ea' biefigin nape. Ea' otalef hiami maluwi amama wapoti' ea' nif fandom hi'alam.

Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma bifi nofapula biugel ananinai, esis sakwaha anom amamaga si'i halaf fandonai nandegia nafe' nowala naoh. Ea' sawala naoh mataga wenifigin ea' wa'am mandamboma mataga esimbel biefigin nape bo'wagon.

Ea' sawaloga amamaga amama hiami mape naohi ambagof namumi mapaimi sawalogam mataga wenifigin ea' wa'am maga' biam mape bo'om. Ea' sawaloga sip hiami mafe' naohi wapoti' sawalogam mataga wenifim ea' wa'om aom biam mape bo'om.

Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanomi nofapula biugel ananinai, anona ondo'w lu'unai nandegia heven fandona fofol etin si'i nemba'w fandonai nowai etap. Esis sawaloga walembeh hiami maloma embel hiami motah etapi sawalogam mataga wanom ea' ondo'w anama nafe' nowala embel tu'wanim motah wa'ili. Wa'el aom ea' wa'ol biefigin mape bo'om.

Ondo'w agili'nama anama sa'i, marasin Anama Numbutinai. Ea' sawaloga walembeh embel hiami sawalogam mataga wanom, ea' wa'om mataga si'i marasin numbutinai. Ea' biefigini mape bo'om. Ea' epes hiesi sa' embel amama awami maofa opalef asasimi saga' hi'alas.

Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma biamibiam nufapula biugel ananinai, esis sawaloga aon owambunai alipunai naloma ondowa sawalogam mataga wanom. Ea' sahambombaga wa'om mataga akutim. Ea' nemaf a'ipanama sowalogana wanom. Etifigin akutigin, biefigin howalgon. Ea' owamb tu'wanina na'ama etin si'i alip.
Ea' ati anona komon lu'unai nufia' nafe' la'afen gani ilif ame'ana na'i mehip na'i,
“Uwahipis uwahipis endilisi esis amam nematawa sape etapi ma nimanimi lu'wami wapoti' motagamas. Dei' main, anom ensel wanom ma'i mufapula biugel amamunai ma nambimb nimanimi amama motagamas!”

Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom biami nufapula biugel ananinai, ati anona ondo'w nakwaha heven ilif nowai etap. Ondo'w anama anona ensel. Ea' esis sase'ana ki utainai ma anona hul nagal nowala etap owin. Hul anama owa' nefe' notambili nowala nafe' etin.
Anan nawisi' uta hul anama ea' nogoh lu'wami mataga si'i nogoh malo nif lu'wami. Ea' nogoh amama malo mase'ala aon ilif, ea' aon alipunai naloma owambunai mataga akutim.
Ea' anom asagof si'i kwamu'wis lu'wami makwaha nogoh amama mowala etap. Ea' ensel anama nase'am pepel si'i pepel sipiawa mape etapi maha epesi.
Ea' mofa' basef na'ama ma'i,
“Ipe' ina pehambombaga otalef o amamaga mamumami mataga etapi o anom lawah, owa'. Ipe' pehambombagago epes amama atom ikwaf Godi owa' notoma amagah asasimi.”

Ea' amam amama la'ifima mose'asa nimanimi epes isima mefe' mondahama aomb wanom biam, ea' ina mofa' pepel ma mohas soga', owa'. Ea' mase'asa nimanimi lu'wami endilisi ma epes isima si'i sipiawa maha epes same' nimanimi lu'wami.
Nemaf anama epes hiesi sogolopa eafa si'i seaga', owa'. Ina sati anona. Ga' nambimb nondafa'mas sofa' nimanimi lu'wami sope la'ela'ef.
Ae' ati asagof amama si'i hos mandondombol ma'i mopa'. Balagahima mandati si'i hagw dembemi atom mowalo'ami sanda' gol sanda'am matoma balagah amamumi. Ea' amagah amamumi si'i naep epesi sanda'am.
Balagah amamumi auf laomi si'i balagah nematawai. Nalelef amamumi si'i nalelef mafis wandafumi laionim.
Mafatagw amamumi mala siaogw si'i dunduwif si'i agofum pepel ea' behenagof amamumi manda'am mehip si'i hos mahondo' wilkar lu'unai hianai masagih mafe'ma wandaf.
Ahagwalef mailam si'i sipiawa ea' nalelef motawama moha hiesi mose'asa nombot aonai sefa' nimanimi lu'wami. Amama mape ahagwalef. Ahagwalef amamumi pepel ma moha epes aomb amama wanom biam.

Amam anona king amamunai numafiam. King anama anan ensel numafi hul anama nagal nowala gani owin endilisi, nafe' etini. Diga esis Hibrui sa'i agel ensel anama sa'i, Abadon. Diga esis Griki sa'i, Apolion. Ofagema ma'i, “Aman nohambombaga amamaga hiami.”
Nemaf aonai ma nimanimi lu'wami mali'i hi'alam. Ea' peme'! Nimanimi biefim ata' mapani nambimb motaga migi'.
Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom wanomi nufapula biugel ananinai, ame' anona malogel na'i natagai balata sondolalima Goda sanda' gol sanda'anai da'malifinama to'wan to'wan notawa naep Godi.
Malogel anama na'ipa ensel anama nufapula biugeli na'ama na'i, “Ensel amama awami biamibiam manda' kalabusa walemb lu'unai Yufretis, ine' nekwaha amam mofo'o.”

Ea' nakwahom mafe'ma nambimb meamba esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi mowalogas sotaga wenis ea' moha epes hiesi wa'ol soga', biefis sope bo'wes. God nanda' ensel amama mandondombol mape mohafa aua anama ma nemaf anama ma aon anama ma afagel anama atona ma monda' opeh amama.
Ae' ame' soldia hiami endilisi 200 milian matoma hos amamumi. Ame' seambam mataga hiami endilisi.

Ape si'i a'oh andondo'ah ati amam matoma hosi. Amam soldia mala siaogw kapaimi atom. Siaogw amama akwahimi alimi kolotuwaimi maloma batafumi. Balagah hosim si'i balagah mafis wandafumi lu'wami laionim. Ea' nif fandom nogoh mataga otamba batafumi salfa fandom mataga malogof amamumi.

Amam meamba esis amam nematawa hiesi mawalogas sataga wenis ea' maha wa'ol afisa amamaga amama awami wenifim, nif maloma nogoh maloma otam salfa fandumi mataga malogof hosi. Ea' epes hiesi biefis sape bo'wes.
La'ifimi hosi mape malogof maloma ahagwalef amamumi. Dei' main, ahagwalef amamumi si'i iguf, balagah mandandam. Ea' dei' maha epesa ahagwalef amama amamumi.

Enis epes hiesi ina afisa amamaga amama awami wenifim, ina samboma opalefa sakwaha waf aonai, owa'. Esis ina sowa' alafugaha amamaga amama sanda'am lagof asasimi, owa'. Esis ina dei' sakwaha waf anama sanda' lotuma ambagof awami maloma god anama baso'omunai sanda' goli siliwa, bras otamba o lawah hiami maim sanda'ami, amamaga amama ina mati o maitu mafi'i, mame' basef, owa'.
Epes isima saha enis epes saga'i, sanda' ma'akw sanda' ufiali ea' saila waf so'a waolanai, sanda' wali. Ea' esis ina samboma opalefa sowa' alafugaha waf anama aonai, owa'.

Amama hi'alam, ati anona ensel la'ifinai nisila'i heven. Anan nandambaho' elagw ea' elelina naloma balaga ananinai. Amaga ananinai nafifil howalagon endilisi si'i aon alipunai nalatawi ea' bo'wagah ananimi si'i nif fandom malata ilif.
Anan nahapila anona buk so'unai lagof ananimi, nandauf na'oh. Anan nawamona bo'waga ananinai da'isinai natoma naoh ea' aonai nahaponana etap wata'ita.
Ea' nogal na'i mehip endilisi si'i mafin lu'unai laion nanda'am. Nanda'am na'ama ma ea', otaga dilili bugwalag 7-peleif. Ma'i si'i anona malogel na'i.

Otaga dilili bugwalagw 7-peleif ma'i basef ea', a'i enda' anom basefa amama, ea' ame' anona malogel na'i nataga heven na'i, “Basef amama otaga dilili bugwalagw 7-peleif, amama ine' nembaho'wam mope okom ine'inai atona. Ina nenda'am mil buk, owa'.”
Ea' ensel anama ali' atolona naitu naoh maloma etap wata'itai anan nasa'ma lagel da'isinai nalata.

Ea' na'iam endilisi gani ilifa agel Godi nape namunai la'ela'ef hihif. Anan nanda' ilif naloma etap naloma amamaga hiami ambagof mapaimi maloma amama ambagof a'ami mape ilif etapi maloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma amamaga amama hiami mape naoh owin wapoti'.
Ea' ensel anama na'i, “Nogota mape mohafanai dei' hi'alana.

Nemaf anama ensel anama nafe'ma 7i ni'i nufapula biugel ananinai, amamaga amama God nambahe'ami motaga alihim. God felefele' nonda'am endilisi si'i basef fowa' nase'amam amam profet manda' opeh ananimi.”
Ea' malogel fowa' ame'ana heveni na'ipi wapoti' na'ama na'i, “Ine' fo'o fa'ai buk anama nandauf nape lagel ensel naitu naoh maloma etapi.”
Ea' afe'ma ensel anama a'ipana a'i, “Ine' se'e buk anama so'unai.”
Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ine' fa'ana nea'ana. Anan atuwasi usihina si'i aupimbel malogel ine'inai, ea' opaf ine'inai numbutina.”
Anan na'iam ea', afela buk anama so'unai lagel enseli agwa'ana. Ea' malogel ae'anai usihina si'i aupimbel hani. Agwa'ana ame' numbutina opaf ae'anai.

Ea' ame' anom basef sa'ipi sa'i, “Ine' newalapa basef Godi wapoti' ma amamaga nambimb motagama epes amam nematawa alop naninani hianai ma diga anama hianai naninani ma amam king dembemi hiami wapoti'.”

Ea' esis sase'e ikwaf ae' ma indila'wifa amamaga dende'am etin sa'ipi sa'i, “Ine' hafel nembe' ikwafa ipat lu'unai Godi noloma balata anama sondolalima Goda. Ea' neamba esis amam nematawa sanda' lotu ma Anani sataga ma'wis.

Ea' ina nenda' endalelemb amama mape ande'ma ipat anama, owa', hapaimi. Dei' main, endalelemb amama esis amam nematawa sololama Godi sofa'am. Ama esis anona nemaf sotaga sohambombaga wambel lu'wagoma Godi bu'unai sope sefe' sondahama aomb 42-peleim, afagof si'imi wanom tu'waninai.
Ea' nambimb Ae' God esapa'o amam amama biam ae'ami enda'am la'ifim mowalapa basef Ae'ami. Ea' amam nambimb mowaho' begah wa'ami
si'i luwaguf awami ea' mi'ipasa basef Ae'ami mofe' mondahama nimeguf 1,260-peleim, afagof wanom tu'waninai.”
I'i enis epes si'i sonda' amam biam aom, atuwasi nif motaga malogof amamumi fendo esis naumbih amamisi endilisi. Endilisi, emi egafin ni'i neham, waf anama atona enin nega'.

Amam biam la'fima mosopama otaga ma asaf owa'etina nimeguf hiami mawalapa basef Godi. Amam agel lu'unai ma momboma embel hiami motaga akwahim si'i esimbel ea' mofa' pepel lu'unai ma moha esis amam nematawa etapasi ma amamaga awami mamumami. Maina nemaf amam mi'i monda'am na'ama, amam la'ifima monda'am.

Ea' alop amamunai no'oh eaf lu'unai taun anama lu'wagoma, ape' ma'iagon basef womun etin ma'i agel Sodom naloma Isip. Anama taun anama etin fowa' esis saha Dembinai amamunai naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.

Enis epes alop hianai naninani sape wambel etap hiagomai saloma esis diga hianai naninani, epes hiesi siti alop amam biami la'ela'ef sondahama nimeguf wanom si'ina tu'waninai. Ea' esis ina si'i aho'ma enis epes sowam hi'agilif, owa'.

Ea' esis amam nematawa etapasi sondanifel ma amam maga' ea' sonda' gwa'aimi sea'am sealemb ea' sandaso'ama amamaga bu'wami maloma alupisi asasisi. Dei' main, profet amama biam mase'asa nimanimi lu'wami amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi.
Ea' mome' anona malogel ni'i notagai heven nofalam mehip na'ama ni'i, “Ipe' bipa letowi na'ae ilif!”
Ea' mofe' heven muwis elagw nomon esis naumbih situ sotolom mofe'.

Nogota anama atona, sowambon lu'unai nokoto' taun anama lu'wagoma tu'wanigin pe'ogon ea' 9-peleigin ata' nope bo'wagon. Ea' esis amam nematawa 7,000-peleis soga' ma sowambon anama. Ea' esis enis amam nematawa seapani esis umbamahas endilisi, sefela agel God nape heveni.
Amamaga nimanimi lu'wami mafe'ma bifi amama mafe' hi'alam, ea' peme'! Nogota bandana ma nimanimi lu'wami mafe'ma wanomi motaga.
Ensel anama nafe'ma 7i nufapula biugel ananinai, anom malogof moga ma'i mehip matagai heven na'ama ma'i,
“Dembinai ape'inai naloma Krais Amam biam dei' mefa' pepel mataga king dembemi etap anae' hiagoma mumafiagon. Ea' Anan nope king Dembinai la'ela'ef hihif!”
Ea' amam amama agufumi 24-peleim natoma balata lu'unai amamunai ma naep Godi mape etap mindiwa balagah amamumi mati etap manda' lotu mandanifel ma God
ma'i,
“Dembinai, ine' God pepel hianainai. Fowa' gani endilisi ine' napani, dei' ine' nape. Ine' dei' nefa' pepel hianai ine'inai nape king Dembinai numafi epes saloma amamaga hiami. Ea' afa' wanifelina.

Esis sololama Godi opalef aom ukup numbutim, ea' dei' okom ine'inai wandafuna nataga ea'. Dei' nemaf ine' newaloga esis saga'i ma sotagama kot. Dei' nemaf ine' nose'asa amamaga bu'wami ma amam profet manda' opeh ine'imi. Dei' ine' nose'asa amamaga bu'wami esis amam nematawa ine'isi saloma isima hiesi sanda' lotuminai sape owina ine', esis agufisi saloma isima agof a'asi wapoti'. Dei' nemaf ine' neha epes isima saha epes sape etapi!”

Amam ma'iam ea' ipat lu'unai Godi nape heven nandawisi' ea' bokis bu'wami amama mi'uli Godi napaimi amama mataga ma'oh alihiguma nomon ipat Ananinai. Ea' otaga holala pelepele', dilili bugwalagw nafe', etap nalemb etin asaf lu'unai ondowa lu'wamunai si'i otamba mambip mowai.

Ea' anona ikwaf lu'unai nataga heven nape na'ama. Ano'w nemata'w kwape kowaho' aon alipunai alop akwa'unai si'i lowaf. Ea' aon owambunai nape owina bo'wagah akwa'umi. Ea' anona hat awau agufuwai atowa owalo'omi natoma balaga akwa'unai. Ondowa 12-peleiwa wailana.
Ea' akwa'w opafu'w kwame' nimanimi amama matagama'wa kola awani. Ea' kwawal kwalef kwa'oh mehip.

Ea' anona ikwaf nataga heven nape na'ama. Anona kwambon lu'unai nape. Anan akwahinai balagah 7-peleim mandandana, wambawa mataganai 10-peleim. Ea' hagw 7-peleim dembemi atom mowalo'ami matoma balagah ananimi.

Andep kwambuni nambefa wa'am sawaloga ondowa mape ilifi sawalogom mataga wenifim nambefam mowai etap. Ea' dei' biefim mape ilif la'ela'ef. Ea' kwambon anama nafi'i naitu naep nemata'w kwa'i kola awani, naitu nohafa akwa'wa ata' kolani, mehip nogwa'an.

Ea' nemata'w akwama kola awani aman. Awani inima anona nemaf owagama la'ifina numafi esis amam nematawa hiesi sape kantri hiagoma. Anan la'ifina nohapila bandan sanda' ain sanda'anai nope dembinai numafias. Akwa'w kolan, mehip esis sofa'an safe'ma balata king Godi nape andeande'.
Ea' kwasagih kwafe' anagon wafiguma fatauguma. Anama God nandondombagona akwa'w. Ama nambimb enis epes sumafia'w sose'akw gwa'aimi akwa'w dahama dahama nimeguf 1,260-peleim, afagof wanom tu'waninai.

Dei' wandaf lu'unai nataga heven. Ensel dembinai Maikel naloma amam ensel ananimi mapa' maloma kwambon anama lu'unai. Ea' kwambon anama nao'wa amam ensel awami ananimi magwamama wandaf amam mapa' malomam wapoti'.
Ea' kwambon naloma ensel ananimi amam ina la'ifima muli'amona wandaf, owa'. Dei' amam ina ata' mapani gani heven wapoti', owa'.

Ea' amam ensel Godi makwahai kwambon anama nisila'i. Kwambon anama fowa' ganinai dei' esis sa'i aman aonai Satan. Anan aman nambaso'ma esis amam nematawa hiesi etapasi. Amam makwahai anan nafi'i etap, makwahai ensel awami ananimi wapoti' misila'i malumanai.

Ea' ame' anona maf na'i mehip nataga heven na'i na'ama na'i, “Dei' God ape'inai nefa'apa mutanimani pepel ananinai nataga nandawalap alihiguma ma nope Dembinai king! Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i Anan la'ifinai nefa' agel lu'unai ea'. Dei' main, aman anama nambaso'ma alupusi sahin owan ape'isi owamb alip na'ipa God ape'inai na'i esis sanda' waf aonai. Ea' dei' amam ensel Godi makwahona nisila'i ea'.

Esis alupusi sahin owan ape'isi sofa' pepel ma esimbel sipsip noganai sawalipasa basef ananimi endilisimi. Esis sanda' waf anama. Amama atom dei' silai'ipa wandaf sali'amona naumbih ma amama. Esis ina ukup ma'ima'i endilisi ma sope andeande' etap anae', owa'. Esis ina umbamahasa naumbih sohas soga', owa'.

Ipe' hipei pape heveni, ipe' pendanifel! Ipe' pape etapi paloma sape naoh embeli, uwahipipa! Dei' main, nimanimi lu'wami ma'i motagamepa. Satan nisila'o ma ipe', anan okom wandafuna endilisi. Dei' main, anan nogawa nogota bandana ma nope nonda' opeh ananimi, felefele' higililana.”
Amam ensel makwahai kwambon anama lu'unai nisila'i etap dei' nagawa anan nafi'i nape etap nati nemata'w akwama kola awani aman natofa'w.

Ea' sase'akw behenagof biam lu'wami komonimi akwa'w la'ifikwa kufia' kofe' wambel akwa'unai etap wafiguma fatauguma. Ama ata' kope laogona kwambon anama lu'unai ma esis sumafia'wa gwa'aimi solaga'w kofe' kofe' kotambel afagof wanom tu'waninai.

Ea' kwambon anama lu'unai nagu'wai embel malogel ananinai. Embel amama mataga si'i anona walemb lu'unai kolo' etin mafe' magi'ma akwa'w. Kwambon anama na'i embel amama mondahago akwa'w kofe' hegilila'w.
Ea' owa'. Etap nagiambama'w na'ama. Malogel etapi nagal alihina na' embel amama kwambon nagu'ami malogel ananinai hi'alam.
Ea' anan okom numbutina endilisi ma akwa'w nafe' na'i nonda' wandaf noloma enis batawisa'w akwa'usi, esis amam nematawa isima saila mi'uli hianai Godi sawalapa basef Jisasi sailam.
Ea' kwambon anama nafi'i naitu naoh akata.

Ea' ati anona mafin nape aolupi nataga naoh embel. Wambawa mataganai 10-peleim ea' balagah 7-peleim mapaina. Wambawa amama mowalo' hagw dembemi atom mowalo'ami matoma wambawa mandandam. Balagah ananimi sanda' anom agof mail mandandama balagah amama. Agof amama ofagema na'ama. Basef mamumami awami findiwaimi ma God.

Mafin anama dei' atolona, anan si'i anom mafis lu'wami wandafumi wanom. Anona mafin agel lepat ea' bo'walelef ananimi si'i bo'walelef anona mafin bea, malogel ananinai si'i malogel anona mafin laion. Ea' kwambon anama nanda' mafin aolupunai nataga la'ifina ma pepel lu'unai ananinai. Anan nanda' mafin anama nataga dembinai ma numafi epes hiesi fowa' anan numafiasi.

Mafin anama balagah 7-peleim anona melet natomana si'i sahana afuna. Ea' balaga anama nambo'wana dei' wafi'igin, ambo'ona wapoti'. Ea' epes hiesi sape etapi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'asa mafin anama aolupunai owa' afunae, sailona.

Kwambon anama nase'ana pepel ananinai mafin anama aolupunai. Ea' esis hiesi sanda' lotuma kwambon anama naloma mafin anama aolupunai wapoti' safela agel ananinai sa'i, “Emi nandati na'ama etin si'i mafin aolupunai anama? Owa'etin. Emi la'ifina nepa' nelomana? Owa'etin.”
Ea' dei' God nape nati mafin anama na'i mehip na'i basef awami findiwama God. Anan la'ifina nape dembinai ma nanda' waf anama nape nogota laona aomb amama 42-peleim, afagof wanom tu'waninai.
Malogel ananinai noga na'i basef awami nanda' findiwama God. Anan nanda' agel Godi findiwana wambel Godi naloma wambota anama ananisi sape heveni.

Ea' God ata' nape nati anan ata' nape la'ifina nefela wandaf nopa' noloma esis amam nematawa Godi ea' naitu nanda' wandaf nahagofas. Anan nofa' pepel ma kwambon anama ea' la'ifina ma nope dembinai la'ifinai ma esis epes hiesi sa'i diga anama hianai ma etap anama wambel hiagoma, alop naninani.

Anona buk ambal namunai napainai na'oh. Esis sanda' agof epes Godi etis mape buk anama ma nogota anama fowa' gani God nanda' etap anae'. Buk anama sipsip anama noganai fowa' esis sahana naga'. Amam nematawa hiesi etapasi agof asasimi owa' mope buk anama, epes isima hiesi sanda' lotuma mafin anama.
Ipe' epes aligah magalipei, ipe' peme' basef amama na'ama.

I'i esis si'i sonda' enin epen nefe' nenda' kalabus, enin nefe' nenda' kalabus. I'i esis si'i soha enin epen noga'ma bainat, enin noga' ma bainat. Endilisi waf anama nimaninai atona anona nemaf notaga. Ipe' amam nematawa Godi pepe la'ifipa pembale'efa God la'ifipa andeande'.

Ea' ati anona mafin aolupunai wapoti' nohafel nawisi etap owin nalatawi ilif. Wambawa biam matagana si'i wambawa mataga sipsip nogami, ea' basefa diga ananinai si'i malogel diga anona kwambon lu'unai.

Mafin anama naitu aolupi na'i nafe'ma bifi nefa' pepel ma mafin anama nali'i ma numafi epes hiesi. Ea' nanda' opeh la'ifimi ma naep mafin anama nali'i. Anan nanda' opeh la'ifimi endilisi ma nonda' esis amam nematawa sape etapi sonda' lotuma mafin anama nali'i, fowa' sahana sa'i nombo'ma noga' dei' wafi'ina ea'.
Mafin anama nagi'i, anan nanda' pepel lu'unai naninani. Pepel anama lu'unai na'ama. Naep esis amam nematawai, nanda' nif makwaha heven misila'i etap anae'.

God ata' nape nati anan nanda' pepel anama naninani ma naep mafin anama nali'i. Ea' anan nagi'i nanda' waf anama ma nahambombaga esis amam nematawa etapasi. Na'ipas mehip na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pendomba ambala mafin anama nali'i nil anona lawag maina ma pefela agel ananinai lu'una. Mafin anama nali'i ma'una anama fowa' bainat nahana ata' nape namunai la'ela'ef.”

God nape nati mafin anama nagi'i na'i aho'ma anan nase'ana ambal ambagof mapaimi ma ambal anama mafin aolupunai sanda' lawag sanda'anai. Ea' ambal anama noga na'i basef ea' la'ifina ma noha epes sandaiwa'ma sonda' lotuma anani soga'.

Ea' mafin anama nagi'i la'ifina nasasapa' epes isima hiesi sonda' anona ikwaf nepe atona etin esis lagof da'isimi o amagah asasimi. Ikwaf epes isima agufisi soloma epes agof a'asi soloma isima otamba hiamisi soloma isima wafisi. Ea' enis agof a'asi sanda' maola enis epes soloma enis agufisi wapoti'.

Ea' epes hiesi sofa' ikwaf anama ma agel mafin anama nape aolupi. Ea' enis sofa' anona namba ma mafin anama agilinama. I'i emi egafis owa' sefa' ikwaf anama, esis ina nambimb sotala amamaga epesi, ea' esis wapoti' ina nambimb sotala amamaga asasimi, owa'.
Ape' ukup mope la'ifim andeande'ma amama. Emi egafis segawa, esis seamba namba mafin anama aolupunai andeande'. Namba anama basef womun etina anona aman. Namba anama 666.

Ae' atologon wapoti' ati sipsip anama noganai naitu halaf Saion ea' amam nematawa hiesi endilisi 144,000-peleis saitu salomana. Agel sipsip noganai naloma agel ahalomana ananinai agof amama mail amagah asasimi.
Ea' ame' anom amamaaga manda'am mafi'i gani heven si'i embel mowa kululu' etin mafe', si'i otaga dililuwala mehip. Ae' ame' maf anama si'i epes saha gita naloma musik manda'am.

Esis sanda' anona awaf dambainai ma anama balata lu'unai Godi notawa natologoma, ma naep amamaga biamibiam mape namumi maloma naep agufumi 24-peleim. Amam nematawa isima hiesi endilisi 144,000-peleis, God natalis la'afena epes hiesi etapasi, amama atom la'ifisa sogawa awaf anama. Ina enis epes wapoti' la'ifisa sogawana, owa'.

Epes isima sape bo'wes endilisi. Amam ina manda' waf aonai maloma nematawa, owa'. Mape bo'om. Wambel anama sipsip noganai na'i neafe'ma, esis sagi'mana same' basef ananimi sanda' maol ananinai. God natalis la'afena esis amam nematawa hiesi etapasi sape sali'i si'i ofa bu'unai nali'i God naloma sipsip noganai mofa'anai.
Esis ina sanda' anom basef kwamaimi baso'maimi, owa'. Esis basef ofagema ma waf aonai a'as.

Ae' ati anona ensel nufia' nafe' gani ilif. Nofa'ai basef bu'wami Godi mape la'ela'efi nanda' opeh amama ma na'ipasa basef amama esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi. Nawalapama epes hiesi sape kantri hiagoma gani etap hiagoma sa'i diga naninani ma alop naninani hianai.

Anan noga na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Nogota nataga ea' ma God nowaloga epes hiesi ma kot. Ipe' umbamehepa ma Anan pila basef ananimi, pefela agel ananinai. Ipe' penda' lotuma God, Anan nanda' heven naloma etap naloma naoh embel maloma embel amama hiami mataga etap owini.”

Anona ensel nagi'mai ensel anama nali'i nafi'i na'i anom basef na'i, “Wambel lu'unai Babilon anama aona ea'! Anan awagon ea'!
