Epes sape wambel anama sanda' esis amam nematawa hiesi ma saila waf anama sanda' so'a waolanai. Waf asasinai aona si'i wain la'ifinai nanda' epes ukup mase'as. Wambel anama Babilon nase'as embel wainim amama epes hiesi wambel hiagoma sagwa'ami.”

Ea' anona ensel nagi'ma amam biam nafi'i. Ensel anama nafe'ma wanomi noga na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Emi egafis sonda' lotu ma mafin anama nape aolupi ma ambal ananinai sandombanai ma nefa' ikwaf anama amaga lagof asasimi,

esis nambimb sope si'i sogwa' anona wain. Wain anama basef womun etina okom wandafunai Godi. God ina nati uwahipis, owa'. Anan okom wandafunai lu'una endilisi. Anan anona nemaf nese'as okom wandafunai epes isima ma nogwa waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ama epes isima sofa' nimanimi lu'wami ma nif fandumi mahihi'asi ma otamba agel salfa nifimi ma naep amam ensel bu'wami Godi moloma naep sipsip noganai.

Nogoh mataga nif amama mase'asa nimanimi epes isima sanda' lotuma mafin anama aolupunai naloma ambal anama ananinai. Epes isima ina anona nemaf sopoma noma'w owamb alip, owa'. Nogoh amama molomolata ilif la'ela'ef mopani.”
Nemaf anama nimanimi amama motaga, enis amam nematawa Godi situ la'ifis. Esis amam nematawa isima saila mi'uli Godi ma sombale'efa Jisas la'ifis andeande'.
Ea' ame' anona malogel na'i nafi'i heven na'i, “Ine' da'a anom basef na'ama. Esis amam nematawa sombale'efa Dembinai saga'i, dei' nimeguf hiami anona nemaf owagama wapoti' sondanifel!”

Ambal Bu'unai Godi wapoti' na'i, “Esis anona nemaf sokwaha opeh lu'wami amama esis sanda'ami sopoma noma'w. Esis ina sope etin, owa'. God nambimb niti waf bu'unai esis sanda'anai ea' nogwamasa anom amamaga bu'wami esis. Waf bu'unai esis sanda'anai anona nemaf nondawalap alihina.”

Atologon wapoti', ati otaga atotona afitinai nape ea' anona epen ambal napainai nape otaga anama. Enin si'i anona dembinai nataga epen endilisinai. Anan nowalo' hat bu'unai nafifili si'i gol balaga ananinai nahapila anona nogwatop hi'alina endilisi lagel ananinai.

Ea' anona ensel nape ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nawisi ande' nofala aman anama natoma otagai mehip na'i, “Ine' topa' gwa'aimi amama maufi ma nogwatop anama ine'inai! Dei' main, gwa'aimi hiami etapami maof ea'. Amama atom dei' nogota anae' pela' gwa'aimianai.”
Ea' aman anama nape otagai nahapila nogwatop ananinai nakwahona etap, natopa' gwa'aimi maufi etap anae'.
Ea' anona ensel wapoti' nawisi ande' ma ipat anama lu'unai Godi nape heven. Anan wapoti' nahapila nogwatop hi'alinai endilisi.

Ea' anona ensel wapoti' nakwaha balata anama sondolalima Goda nafi'i. Ensel anama la'ifinai ma numafi nifi. Nofala ensel anama nahapila nogwatopi nofalona mehip na'ama na'i, “Ine' fa'ai nogwatop anama ine'inai hi'alina endilisi, netopa' su'utip gwa'aimi maufi mail mandelef waini etap nekolasom mo'oh! Dei' main, gwa'aimi amama hiami maof ea'!”

Ea' ensel anama nahapila nogwatop ananinai nakwahona etap, natopa' gwa'aimi su'utip akumi mail mandelef waini natamam motawa. Ea' nafela gwa'aimi amama nakwahom mowala otam tang lu'unai nomona safo'asom wain embel. Amama mondola'wifa okom wandafunai Godi ma epes isima sosambala basef Ananimi.

Ea' safo'asom waina otam tang anama lu'unai nape ande'ma taun anama wambel lu'unai. Esimbel maluwi tang ande' kolo' etin mafe' laogon si'i 300 kilomita si'i walemb embel mafi'i matef mataga ilif motambel ain nape malogof hosi.

Ati anom amamaga laifimi matagai heven ea' okom natanea ma amama. Ati ensel 7-peleim mape ea' amam mahapila amamaga awami endilisi mandandama epes. I'i anona nemaf amamaga amama awami hi'ilam, ina ata' anom motaga wapoti', owa'. Dei' main, amamaga amama awami 7-peleim, amama okom wandafunai Godi ea' hi'ilana endilisi.

Ea' ati anom amamaga si'i naoh embel lu'wami mandati si'i glas amama sanda'am maloma nif. Epes isima saitu la'ifis sali'amona wandafa waf aonai sahagofa mafin anama lu'unai nape aolupi naloma ambal ananinai maloma ikwaf ananinai 666, esis saitu naoh amama da'malifima si'i glas. God nase'as anom musik si'i gita sahapilam.
Esis sanda' awaf Moses nanda'mana opeh Godi naloma awaf sipsip noganai. Awaf anama na'ama.
“Dembinai, ine' God pepel hianainai. Opeh hiami ine' nanda'ami, amama la'ifimi ea' afa' watolom ukup matameamam hiahiam! Ine' king numafi epes hiesi ea' waf ine'inai bo'ona endilisinai hi'alana!

Dembinai, ine' etina nape bo'wena. Dei' emi egafis owa' umbamahasa ine'? Owa'etin. Hiesi umbamahasa ine' sanda' lotu ma ine' etina. Emi egafis owa' sefela agel ine'inai? Owa'etin. Epes wambotagw hiami ma etap hiagoma anona nemaf sifi'i sonda' lotu ma ine' etina. Dei' main, waf bu'unai ine'inai nataga alihiguma nandawalap.”
Amama mafe'ma ea', atologon wapoti' ati ipat bu'unai Godi notawa gani heven. Ipat anama nagal alihina ati nomon ipat anama nape sanda' sel sanda'anai God napeinai.

Ea' ensel amama 7-peleim mahapila amamaga awami endilisi mandandam nohambamboga epes, makwaha ipat anama mawisi ande'. Ea' mowaho' luwaguf afitimi bu'wami endilisi howalagon mafifil endilisi. Mowaho' legw si'i goli managam mefetagw amamumi.

Ea' anona la'afena amam biamibiam mape namumi nase'ama dis lu'wami 7-peleim sanda' gol sanda'ami mandandama amam ensel atona etin. God nape namunai la'ela'ef okom wandafunai ananinai nape si'inama dis amama 7-peleim.

Ea' nogoh amama mataga mafifili ma pepel Godi, amama si'ima ipat anama Godi. Ea' ina enin epen la'ifina nefe' nuwis ipat anama nomon, owa'. Esis sape sohafa ensel 7-peleim monda' opeh hi'ilam amamaga amama awami mahapilam mandandami ata' mili'.

Ame' anona malogel na'i natagai mehip ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Malogel anama na'i nofala ensel amama 7-peleim na'i, “Ipe' pefe' pekolo'wa dis amama 7-peleim okom wandafunai Godi napaimi ma kolo'olam mofe' etap.”

Ea' ensel nali'i anama nafe' nakolo'wa dis amama ananimi mafe' etap ea' maselis mamumami lu'wami endilisi mataga etap epes isima ikwaf anama mafin aolupunai nailas ma epes isima sanda' lotuma ambal ananinai.
Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma bifi wapoti' nafe' nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel naoh lu'wami. Ea' naoh amama mandamboma mataga si'i esimbela epes hiesi saga'i. Ea' amamaga mape nomon naohi maga' hi'alam.
Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wenifi nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel walemb lu'wami maloma anama embel motah mahagofowa. Embel amama hiami mandamboma mataga esimbel.
Ea' ame' ensel anama numafi embel naohi walemb hiami na'i, “Ine' bu'winai endilisi, nanda' kot ine'inai andeande' naila ikwaf bu'unai atona nawaloga esis sanda' waf aonai.

Dei' main, esis amam nematawa hiesi saha amam nematawa bu'wasi Godi ine'isi afis saloma profet ine'imi wapoti' ea' esimbel asasimi malo. Ea' dei' nase'asa esimbel epes isima sanda' waf aonai ma sogwa' embel. Ine' nagwamasam mandahama waf aonai esis sanda'anai.”
Ea' ame' anona maf nataga balata anama sondolalima Godanai noga na'i, “Endilisi Dembinai, ine' God pepel hianai napainai. Ine' nowaloga epes ma kot ea' kot ine'inai endilisi bu'unai hi'alana.”
Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma biamibiami nakolo'wa dis ananimi ma aon alipunai ea' God nape nati owaf naofa epes nif.

Nif amama lu'wami nigisigeim endilisi ma epes isima. Ea' sa'i basef findiwaimi awami ma God numafi amamaga amama awami. Esis ina samboma opalefa sakwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai ma sefela agel Ananinai, owa'.

Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom biami nakolo'wa dis ananimi balata kingi lu'unai anama mafin aolupunai. Ea' owamb lu'unai nataga anama mafin aolupunai nahopogoma. Ea' esis sail waf ananinai sofa' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' sogwa afegah asasimi nalelef tilili talala' sondola'wifa sofa' nimanimi lu'wami.
Esis ukup mapoma nimanimi maloma maselis asasimi, dei' sa'i basef awami findiwaimi ma God nape heveni. Ina samboma opalef sowa' alafugaha waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.
Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom wanomi nakolo'wa dis ananimi walemb lu'unai Yufretis. Ea' walemb embel mafa' hi'alama mondondomba eaf amam king dembemi mufi'i anama aon natefima.
Ea' ati ambagof awami wanom mandati si'i kwahowa lu'wami matagai malogel kwambon anama lu'unai naloma malogel mafin anama aolupunai naloma malogel profet anama nambaso'ami.

Ambagof amama awami endilisi manda' ikwaf pepel naninani ma esis sotolona sogawana. Amam mafe'ma amam king dembemi mumafi epes hiesi sape wambel hiagomai. Amam ma'i mokolasa amam atogon monda' wandaf nemaf anama lu'unai ma God pepel hianai napainai.

“Peme'! Anona nemaf ae' etagamepa si'i sanda' wali safi'i sataga. Atagamepa anona nemaf ipe' owa' pegawa pi'i ae' iefi'ianai. I'i epes ukup matamea sope sowaho' luwaguf asasimi andeande'ma owa' so'oh, esis ina sofe' alop atona wahifina solomas siti alop asasinai ambagof aom, owa'. Isima sondanifel.”
Ea' ambagof awami makolasa king hiami anagon etap tu'wanina diga Hibrui sa'i Armagedon.
Ensel anama nafe'ma 7i nakolo'wa dis ananimi ea' uf nofa'am. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai balata king lu'unai nomon ipat lu'unai Godi na'i mehip na'i, “Amama dei' ea' hi'alam!”

Ea' otaga holala nafe', pelele'ala nafe' ea' otaga dililu bugwalagw, sowambon lu'unai nakoto'. Sowambon anama anan lu'unai endilisi ma nimeguf hiami epes sape etapi ina same' anona sowambon nakoto' lu'una fowa' si'i anama, owa'.

Taun anama wambel lu'unai nandawal wenifigin. Ea' wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma kantri awagon hi'alagon. Ea' God okom napoma epes sanda' waf aonai sape taun anama lu'wagoma Babilon, dei' okom ananinai wandafuna nanda' esis sa' embela kap wain nalami nahas kwapete'as. Wain anama womun etina okom wandafunai Godi.
Ea' ailan hianai nafa' nafe' higilalana hi'alana ea' ina ata' anona halaf atotona nape, owa'.

Ea' asaf ondowa lu'wamunai si'i otamba ais afitimi mowai mahas. Asaf ondowa lu'wamunai nimanimi endilisi si'i beg kopi lu'unai atona etin. Ea' sa'ipana awagon God ma asaf ondowa lu'wamunai mowai maha esis.

Anona ensel atotona la'afena amam ensel 7-peleim mahapila dis amama 7-peleim nafi'i na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Ine' fi'i! Nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a wauli kwatoma embel lu'wami ilif anona nemaf kofa' nimanimi lu'wami akwa'umi. Ae' a'i ihi'ambena amama.

Amam dembemi king etapami manda' waf hianai aonai so'a waolanai maloma nemata'w akwama. Ea' epes etapasi hiesi wapoti' sanda' waf so'a waolanai saloma'w. Ea' sataga sahaga sagaol si'i epes sa' embel wainim la'ifimi ukup mahaga magaol.”

Ambal Bu'unai Godi nataga la'ifina ma ae' ame' si'i na'oh nandondo'oh. Ensel anama nofa'e afe' etap wafiguma fatauguma. Anama ati ano'w nemata'w kwatoma anona mafin ilif nape aolupi akwahinai. Mafin anama agof hiami mail alop ananinai hi'alana. Agof amama basef awami findiwaimi hiami mamumami ma God. Mafin anama balagah 7-peleim mandandana wambawa 10-peleim matagana.

Nemata'w akwama kwala luwaguf akwahimi biam ina mandati na'ama etin, ea' sosaf naninani gol maloma sosaf esis sanda' otamba sanda'anai naloma ombahigis salatamam otamba lu'wami. Akwa'w kwahapila kap gol lagel akwa'unai. Waf hianai aonai nape kap anama nomoni anama. Waf naninani aonai hi'epina endilisi ma naep Godi, waf naninani aonai endilisi ma waf anama so'a waolanai ma nemata'w akwama kwaloma amamaga amama hiami awami mape si'ima kap anama.

Ea' amef akwa'umi ma agel akwa'unai nail amaga akwa'unai. Agel anama basef mandambahi'i ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Taun lu'wagoma Babilon, anama nondofala mama'wawa nematawa hiawai wanda' so'a wauli ma waf hianai aonai endilisi ma etap anae'.”

Nemata'w akwama kwaha esis amam nematawa Godi sembale'efa Jisasi sawalapa agel ananinai saga'. Ea' ati akwa'w kwa' esimbel asasimi kwataga kwahaga kwagaol. Ati akwa'w gegelalasowe kwapete'e endilisi okom natanea hiahian.

Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Dei' maina ine' gegelalasina kwapete'ena? Na'ama owa'. Atuwasi ihi'ambena basef ofagema mape mandambaho'ma nemata'w akwama kwaloma mafin anama nofa'akwi. Mafin anama balagah 7-peleim mapainai ea' wambawa 10-peleim mataganai.

Mafin anama nape aolupi, ine' natolona ea'. Fowa' anan nape, dei' ina ata' nape, owa'. Anona nemaf nokwaha hul anama nowala owa' notambili nolatowi ilif ea' nefe' higililana owa'etin. Enis epes etapasi God ina nanda' agof asasimi mape buk ambal namunai ma nemaf anama fowa' dambadamba anan nanda' etap, owa'. Amam nematawa isima anona nemaf siti mafin anama nape aolupi gegelelesis kwapete'as. Dei' main, fowa' anan nape, dei' owa', anona nemaf, anan notaga wapoti'.
Epen emi okom bu'unai napainai, enin nogawa amamaga amama andeande'. Balagah amama 7-peleim basef womun etina halafutagw 7-peleim nemata'w akwama kwatomam.

Ea' balagah amama 7-peleim womun etina anom king dembemi 7-peleim wapoti'. Wanom biam ea' maga', anona dei' nape dembinai numafi amamaga. Ea' anona ina dei' nataga dembinai king, ata' owa'. Anona nemaf notaga, anan atona ata' nope dembinai nogota bandata.
Mafin anama nape aolupi fowa' napani, dei' owa' nopani, anama si'i king dembinai anama nafe'ma 8i. Anan amam wambota atotona naloma king amama 7-peleim ama anona nemaf higiligalana.

Ea' wambawa amama 10-peleim ine' natolom ea'i, amama basef womun etina anom king dembemi 10-peleim. Ina dei' mataga king dembemi, ata' owa'. Ea' amam anona nemaf mofa' pepel moloma mafin anama nape aolupi, motaga king mope dembemi nogota bandata si'i awa atotona.
Amam king amama ma'i basef mandame'mama ukup etifim ma'i anona nemaf moso' pepel amama amamunai hi'ilana mafin anama nape aolupi ma mome' basef ananimi.

Anona nemaf mopa' moloma sipsip noganai. Ea' sipsip noganai nikila'am. Epes saila fala ananinai naloma basef ananimi andeande', isima nandandepas ananisi etis, epes isima anona nemaf la'ifisa solomana sigikila' wandaf anama.”

Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Ine' natolom embel amama lu'wami nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli kwatomami. Embel amama basef womun etina esis amam nematawa hiesi epes afa'isi sandatama etifigin sape ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi alop naninani saloma diga hianai naninani hi'alas.

Ea' wambawa amama 10-peleim ine' natulumi, amama moloma mafin anama ukup amamumi wandafuma nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a wauli. Anona nemaf mofa' amamaga hiahaom maim akwa'umi ma akwa'w ato'w kope etin alupusi a'akw. Ea' mowalima'w luwaguf akwa'umi moha'w koga' mea' ambegw akwa'umi mofa' alop akwa'unai nif fendona hi'ilana.

Dei' main, God atona nafela ukup amamumi ma monda' amamaga amama motaga. Fowa' anan na'iam na'i, Anona nemaf amam ukup etifim ea' pepel anama mape dembemi kingi mose'anana hi'ilana nofe'ma mafin anama nape aolupi. Ea' monda'am na'ama etin mefe' motagama nemaf anama God nanda'am mandahama amamaga amama Anan nali' na'iam.
Nemata'w akwama ine' natolo'wi, akwama basef womun etina taun anama wambel lu'unai nape si'i dembinai nape nali'ma amam king ma etap anama hiagoma.”
Amama mafe'ma ea', ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anan pepel napainai endilisi, sosaf ananinai howalagon nanda' etap hiagoma mafifil howalagon.

Anan noga na'i mehip endilisi na'i, “Nemata'w akwama ao'w hi'alakw. Akwa'w basef womun etina wambel lu'unai Babilon agel lu'unainai awagon hi'alagon! Dei' nataga wambel aonai ma ambagof awami maloma amiguf awami mapaigon.

Dei' main, fowa' esis wambel anama sa'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sasasapa'as sa' wain asasinai numbutinai. Wain anama basef womun etina waf hianai aonai so'a waolanai esis sandanai. Ea' amam dembemi king etapami hiami wapoti' manda' waf anama so'a waolanai maloma esis wambel anama. Ea' epes etapasi sanda' bisnis sofa' otamba hiami ma waf naninani aonai esis wambelisi sanda'anai.”

Ea' ame' anona malogel na'i natagai heven na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa ae'ipei, kwaha wambel anama piwisi ande'. Na'ama ipe' nambimb pendao'oma peloma wambel anama pefa' nimanimi lu'wami ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
Waf anama aonai lu'una endilisi si'i mahanip notawa ilif nalata gani heven. Ea' God okom napoma waf anama.

Ipe' pegawa waf anama nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a wauli kwanda'anai. Ipe' pegwa waf akwa'unai dende'ana endilisi piwapanima'w waf wamanai wapoti'. Akwa'w kwakolefa waf aonai kwanda'anai nataga endilisi. Ea' pekolefa nimanimi lu'wami hiami mikila' waf akwa'inai ma pegwam mafe'ma akwa'w. Akwa'w kwamboma embel la'ifimi mala kap anama. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' awi pekolefa embel la'ifimi pese'akwam akwa'w kwea'ama kome' nimanimi awami mogwam mofe'ma akwa'w mondogwama.

Nemata'w akwama kwafela agel akwa'unai atona kwanda' waf hianai naninani ma kope andeande'. Ea' ipe' pese'akw nimanimi hiami akwa'w mondahama aligah mase'akw. Ea' penda' akwa'w konda' kwelef etin. Akwa'w okom na'i na'ama kwa'i, ‘Ae' ataga ape kwin dembiwei. Ae' ina si'i alifiwei, owa'. Nimanimi ina nambimb motagame ma elef, owa'.’

Ea' amamaga mamumami awami endilisi nambimb motagama wambel anama anona nemaf atotona. Awes lu'unai hianai notaga ea' epes hiesi nambimb selef kwapete' nolomeahas lu'unai notagamas. Ea' nif motaga fendo wambel anama Babilon hi'ilagon. Dei' main, Dembinai God nawaloga wambel anama nagwamasa nimanimi lu'wami esis. Anan pepel lu'unainai la'ifinai endilisi.
Amam king etapami manda' waf so'a waolanai aonai maloma akwa'w ea' manda' waf hianai aonai maloma'w. Nambimb amam king amama miti akwa'w feando'wa nogoh lu'wami motaga'w ea' melef kwapete'.

Anona nemaf amam umbamoham kwapete' endilisi ma nimanimi amama akwa'w kofa'ami. Ea' mitu laogona akwa'w mi'iam mi'i, ‘Owahipipa owahipipa endilisi ma wambel Babilon! Ipe' taun wambel la'ifinai! Nogota bandana atona si'i aua atotona mehip ipe' pefa' nimanimi amama ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai!’
Ea' epes sape sanda' opeh bisnis etapi ukup mopoma wambel anama ea' solopagon sope opalef nimanimagon sope. Dei' main, ina nambimb enin epen netala hiahaom ananimi wapoti', owa'etin.

Hiahaom maim amama, gol bu'wami satalom otamba hiami siliwa maloma anom otamba bu'wami, ombahigis bu'wami malatamam endilisi, luwaguf bu'wami akwahimi mamumami maloma anom luwaguf silk sahapilam gogwafim maloma lawah amama amamaga alogw bu'wami ma'ami maloma amamaga hiami esis sanda' nalelef elefanim sanda'ami, amamaga amama hiami sanda' lawah satalom otamba lu'wami sanda'ami maloma amamaga sanda' bras howalagon bu'wami sanda'ami maloma amamaga sanda' ain sanda'ami maloma anom amamaga sanda' otamba bu'wami sanda'ami.

Ea' hiahaom na'ama. Lawah nembawa sagwa'ami agilima sinamon maloma paura nogoh alogw bu'womumi maloma gris sa'i mer maloma sanda amama bu'wami frankinsens maloma wain naloma wel sanda' su'utip oliv sanda'ami maloma plaua maloma wit maloma bulmakau, sipsip, hos maloma karis si'i wilkar maloma epes wapoti'. Epes isima agof a'asi sanda' maol etini sape owina enis epes. Epes isima anom dembemi ma'i esis ina epes bu'wasi. Ea' maso'asas sotalis si'i satal hiahaom maim. Amamaga amama hiami esis ina nambimb satalom wapoti', owa'.

Epes sanda' maol bisnis si'ipas na'ama si'i, ‘Gwa'aimi amama opalef ipe'imi mohafema pefa'ami, amama hiami makwaha ipe' mafe' ea'. Amamaga hiami bu'wami atom, otamba maim lu'wami atom maloma sosaf maim ipe'imi amamaga hiami amama makwahipa mafe'. Ama ipe' ina piti amama mope wapoti', owa'.’
Ea' epes isima sanda' bisnisa amamaga amama ma sofa' otamba hiami wambel anama esis umbamohas endilisi ma nemanimi awami wambel anama sofa'ami. Esis situ laogona anama opalef nimanim selef sope.

Ea' si'i, ‘Owahipigin, owahipigin endilisi wambel anama lu'unai Baibilon! Fowa' epes sape wambel anama sala luwaguf sosaf bu'unai atona afitimi maloma luwaguf akwahimi mamumami sofalo'ma alop asasinai ma gol maloma otamba bu'wami maloma ombahigis bu'wami salatamam endilisi.
Nogota bandana atona amamaga amama hiami otamba maloma sosaf maim amama ea' aom hi'alam.’

Ea' kepten hiami mumafi sip, maloma epes hiesi satala sip sofe' anona wambel, saloma epes isima hiesi sanda' boskru ma sipi, saloma epes hiesi sanda' maol bisnisa naoh embeli, epes isima hiesi situ laogona wambel anama.
Nemaf anama situ siti akwa'w wambel anama fendona nogoh molo, ea' si'i mehip na'ama si'i, ‘Wambel lu'unai enima nape nandati na'ama etin si'i wambel anama? Owa'etin.’

Ea' esis sela walombuf balagah asasimi sondahomagon selef mehip opalef aoma wambel anama awagon. Ea' si'i, ‘Owahipigin, owahipigin endilisi ma wambel anama lu'unai! Ama amam hiami mumafi sipi maloma amam matala sip mafe' naoh embeli amam mefa' otamba hiami endilisi ma otamba hiami wambel anama. Owahipigin endilisi. Ama nogota bandana atona awagon hi'ilagon!’

Ipe' pape heven ilifi peloma ipe' amam nematawa Godi paloma ipe' aposel paloma ipe' profet, ipe' hipei pendanifel ma amamaga amama dei' matagama wambel lu'unai anama. Dei' main, God nawaloga wambel anama lu'unai ea' nagwa nimanimi lu'wami ma anama. Anan nagwa waf anama aonai esis sape wambel anama Babilon sanda'anai.”

Basef amama hi'alam, ati anona ensel la'ifinai nafela anona owap lu'unai si'i owap lu'unai soka'isa witanai. Anan nafela owap anama nakwahona nafe' nowala embel naoh. Ea' na'i, “Ea' na'ama etin anona nemaf esis sefela wambel anama lu'unai Babilon sokwahogon mehip notaga awagon nefe' nowa si'i owap anama nowala naoh ama epes ina sotologon wapoti', owa'etin.

Ea' gita anama ape' mofala musik anama hianai naninani moloma batagwi alelef, maguf anama ina anona nemaf ata' peme'am wapoti' wambel anama, owa'. Ea' epes isima gawaisi sanda' opeh mamumami, ipe' ina anona nemaf piti epes isima sope wambel anama wapoti', owa'. Maf owap anama lu'unai noka'isa olelemb witi, anona nemaf ina ata' some' anona wapoti' wambel anama, owa'.

Elelowa lamifah ina anona nemaf ata' mififil mope wambel anama wapoti', owa'. Ea' malogel aman anama na'i neaso' nemata'wi o malogel nemata'wi kwa'i kweaso' amani, ipe' ina anona nemaf ata' peme' esis wambel anama wapoti', owa'.
Fowa' epes wambel anama sape sanda' bisnis sape dambesi etapasi. Ea' esis wambel anama sambaso'ma epes hiesi ma aop ufial baso'omunai naninani sanda'ami.

God nati wambel lu'unai anama naha profet hiami maga' maloma amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Amama atom dei' ofagema mapoma wambel anama. Ea' epes hiesi sape etap anae' esis naumbih sahas saga'i, ofagema amama wapoti' mapoma anama atogon.”

Amama mafe'ma ea', ame' anom amamaga mame' si'i mif lu'wami esis amam nematawa hiesi sape heven ilifi. Esis sa'i na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una! God ape'inei atona nefa' ape' motanimani. Anan agel lu'unainai, pepel lu'unainai, nafifili napeinai.

Basef lu'wami ma kot, anan nawaloga epesa waf endilisinai bu'unai andeande' hi'alas. Nemata'w akwama dembe'wi kwanda' so'a wauli kwasapala esis amam nematawa hiesi etapasi ma sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai saloma'w. Ea' God nanda'makwa basef. Akwa'w kwaha esis sanda'mana maol Godi saga'. Ea' dei' God nagwama'wa ofagema amama akwa'umi mafe'ma akwa'w.”
Ea' esis sakolasa mif wapoti' na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una wambel anama lu'unai fandona nif nogoh malo. Amama malo malata ilif la'ela'ef hihif!”

Ea' amam agufumi dembemi 24-peleim maloma amama biamibiam ambal namunai napaimi mindiwa nembawa balagah motawa manda' lotuma God natoma balata lu'unai. Amam ma'iam mehip ma'i, “Endilisi, ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una!”

Ama balata lu'unai Godi anona malogel na'i nafi'i na'i, “Ipe' panda'mana maol Godi ma umbamahepama Anan paila basef ananimi, ipe' epes agof a'epa paloma epes isima agufisi, ipe' hipei pekolasa pefela agel Godi! Anan God ape'inai!”

Ea' ame' anom amamaga si'i basef hiami matagama epes amam nematawa hiesi sandatama sapani. Sape sa'i mimil si'i embel mowa kululu' etin. Ea' anom amamaga manda'am si'i otaga dilulu bugwalag, maf anama na'iam mehip na'ama na'i, “Ape' mefela agel Godi! Dembinai anan God ape'inei. Anan pepel hianainai! Dei' anan nataga king endilisi ma numafi amamaga hiami hi'alam.
Dei' ape' mondanifel mefela agel Ananinai. Dei' main, nemaf nataga ea' ma sipsip noganai na'i noso' nemata'w. Ea' nemata'w anani'wi kwandandombol kwape.
God nase'akw luwaguf afitimi bu'wami mafifili endilisi. Akwa'w kwala amama ma alop akwa'unai.”
Luwaguf amama mondola'wifa waf bu'unai esis amam nematawa Godi sanda'anai.
Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Ine' da'a basef amama. Epes isima God nofalas sofi'mai gwa'aimi lu'wami ma sipsip noganai noso' nemata'w akwama, isima esis sondanifel.”
Ea' anan na'ipi wapoti' na'i, “Basef amama basef Godi endilismi.”

Ea' ae' indiwa nembawa balaga etawa felefele'ma bo'wagah enseli ma enda' lotumana, ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ina nenda'am na'ama, owa'. Ae' alupuwei ine'iwei aloma ine' naloma sahopena ine'imi, afa' wandao'oma wanda' opeh Godi atom waloma esis hiesi sembale'efa basef endilisimi Jisas nawalipasami. Ine' nenda' lotuma God atona. Ape' mogawa basef amama endilisimi Jisas nawalapama ipe'ami, amama mafela amam profet mawalipasa basef Godi.”
Ea' ati otaga heven nandawisi' nogal, ati anona hos afitinai nape. Epen natomanai agel ananinai sa'i, “Epen numafi opeh ananimi andeande', nanda' waf endilisinai atona.”
Anan naila waf bu'unai atona nowaloga esis amam nematawa ma basef lu'wami ea' nanda' wandafa waf bu'unai atona.

Naep ananimi si'i nif fandumi ea' hagw bu'wami hiami si'i dembemi king atom mowalo'ami mape balaga Ananinai. Anom amef mail alop ananinai, anama agel ananinai. Anan atona nogawa agel anama, enis epes owa'.
Esimbel masa'opa luwaguf ananimi laumi nalami. Ea' esis sofala agel ananinai sa'i, “Basef Godi.”
Anan nape nali'ma amam soldia mape heveni matoma hos amama afitimi amamumi mailana mafe'. Alop amamunai esis sowaho'mama luwaguf afitimi bu'wami endilisi.
Ea' anona bainat hi'alina endilisi nape malogel Ananinai nawisi ande'. Anan na'i noha amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagomai ma bainat anama.
“Anona nemaf Anan numafi epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma. Numafias la'ifina si'i nahapila anona bolam sanda' ain sanda'anai.”
Anan nofa'asa su'utip wain ma otam tang anama waini, amama mondola'wifa okom lu'unai wandafunai Godi, Anan la'ifinai ma amamaga hiami.
Anom amef agel Ananinai mailana nimbe naloma luwaguf ananimi. Agel anama na'ama. Dembinai king ma amam king hiami, Dembinai ma dembemi hiami.
Ea' ati anona ensel naitu felefele'ma aon alipunai nape natalogoma. Anan na'i mehip na'ipa amiguf hiami mufia' mafe' ilif otagai na'i, “Ipe' pindowa'anima pifi'mai gwa'aimi anama lu'wami Godi!

Ama pea' alop amam king dembemi noloma mafis amam kepten mumafi amam soldiai moloma mafisa amam amama dembemi la'ifimi moloma mafis hosi moloma mafis epes hiesi satumami wapoti'. Ipe' pea' mafis epes hiesi hi'ilas na'ama. Epes hiesi, enis agof a'asi sanda' opeh sape owina enis epes, enis agufisi sumafi enis epes sanda' opehi, enis dembesi agufisi, enis agof a'asi.”
Ea' ati mafin anama lu'unai nape aolupi naloma dembemi king amama etapami maloma soldia amamumi mandatama mape. Amam ma'i mopa' moloma aman anama natoma hos afitinai naloma soldia ananimi.

Aman anama natoma hos afitinai nikila' mafin anama nape aolupi naloma profet anama nawalapa basef baso'maimi nikila'am nanda'am manda' kalabus. Profet anama fowa' nanda' pepel si'i God atona nanda'anai ma naep mafin anama nape aolupi. Waf anama atona nambaso'ma epes sofa' ikwafa mafin anama nape aolupi ea' sanda' lotuma ambal atona ananinai. Mafin anama naloma profet anama nambaso'ami amam biam ata' mape ambagof namumi sokwahom mafe' nif lu'wami fandom otam batafumi agel salfa hul lu'unai nowala owa' notambili.

Anom soldia maila mafin anama aolupunai maloma profet anama nambaso'masi, amam ata' mape. Ea' aman anama natoma hosi naha amam soldia amamumi maga'. Anan naham bainat anama launai nape malogel ananinai. Ea' amiguf hiami mafi'i ma' alop amamunai ea' opalef amigufi elihim endilisi.
Ea' ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anan nahapila ki utainai ma hul anama launai nogal nowala gani ma owa' notambili. Ea' nahapila sen lu'unai wapoti'.

Anan nahapila kwambon anama du'utinai la'ifinai, kwambon anama fowa'inai endilisi. Anan “Aman nambaso'ma epes hiesi.” Anan Satan. Ea' ensel anama nowa'ana sen nape nanda' kalabus nandahama afagof 1,000-peleim.

Ensel anama nakwahona nafe' nowala hul anama launai ea' nowalowamana uta ilif la'ifina. Ea' Satan ina anona nemaf la'ifina ma nombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi wapoti', owa'. Anan ata' nope nohafa afagof 1,000-peleim ama ata' hi'ilam ea', ensel anama notagahona wapoti' nefe'agon ganigani ma nogota bandana.

Amama mafe'ma ea', ati anom balatagw lu'wami kingi ma'oh ea' enis epes satoma balatagw amama. God nase'asa agel lu'unai ma sowaloga waf esis amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai ma kot. Ea' ati ambagof epes isima hiesi. Esis owa' sonda' lotuma mafin nape aolupi naloma ambal ananinai sambalonai, ea' owa' sofa' ikwaf aonai mafin anama amagah lagof asasimi. Epes isima sembale'efa basef Godi la'ifis sawalapa basef endilisimi Jisasi. Waf anama atona sanda' opeh bu'wami, dei' esis naumbih satopa' bagafowas afis. Sohafel wapoti' sofa' ambal namunai sope dembesi king soloma Krais sope sondahama afagof 1,000-peleim.
Nemaf anama nili'i ma esis saga'i sili' sohafel hi'agilif. Ea' epes isima fowa' saga'i ina sofa' ambal namunai nemaf anama, ata' owa'. Esis ata' sope sohafa afagof amama 1,000-peleim mefe'ma hi'ilam.

Epes isima sotanima sohafel nemaf anama nali'i, esis sandanifel sope bo'wes andeande'. Ea' ga' anama niegi'i ina la'ifina nohagofa epes isima, owa. Esis sope pris Godi sope pris Kraisi sondolalimam. Ea' sope dembesi soloma Kraisa sumafi enis epes afagof 1,000-peleim.
Afagof amama 1,000-peleim hi'ilam, uta nindausi' ma kalabus ea' Satan nokwaha kalabus ananimi nuwisi ande'.

Anan nuwisi ande'ma nombaso'ma epes amam nematawa hiesi sape etap anae' hiagoma biefigin biefigin nafe' notambela, esis epes hiesi Gok saloma Magok. Ea' Satan nokolasa esis sonda' wandaf. Epes hiesi asasisi isima hiesi sandahama wesan na'oh naoh akata.

Ea' sefe' ganima etap hiagoma laogoma sondowasa' saitu tulif sindiwapagon anama amam nematawa Godi sapoma, anama wambel taun anama God okom ma'iana endilisi. Ea' nif misila'i heven fando soldia amama Satani hi'alam.

Amama mataga ea', God nokwaha aman anama Satan nambaso'masi nefe' hul anama nowala owa' notambili nif fandom lu'um otam salfa la'ela'ef mapani. Amam ensol mali' makwaha mafin nape aolupi naloma profet anama nambaso'ami mowala mape hul anama. Amam biam moloma Satan mope anama la'ela'ef hihif mofa' nimanimi owamb alip anama nif fandumi mapoma.

Ea' ati balata lu'unai kingi afitinai notawa, anona aman natoma balata anama. Etap anae' naloma otaga ilif mafe'ma Anan ea' owa' anagon ma amam mopaigon, owa'. Epes hiesi ina anona nemaf sotolom wapoti, owa'.

Ea' ati esis saga'i sape, epes isima agufisi saloma isima agof a'asi saitu naep balata kingi. Ea' aman anama natoma balata anama nefa' anom buk ea' naufam. Ea' naufa anona buk wapoti', agof esis sofa' ambagof namumi mailanai. Ea' nati amef mail buk amama, ma'i maina waf esis sanda'anai nawaloga esis saga'i sandahama waf hianai esis sali' sanda'anai.
Wambel saga'i sapoma naloma naoh embel makwaha epes isima saga'i sotanimani ma nogota anama. Ea' Anan natoma balata kingi nawaloga esis hiesi atona etin sandahama waf hianai esis sanda'anai.
Ea' nakwaha ga' naloma wambel saga'i sapoma mafe' mowala hul anama launai nif lu'wami fandumi mapeinai. Hul anama si'i ga' nafe'ma bifi notagama epes hiesi.
I'i Anan natoma balata kingi owa' nieti agel anin epeni nope buk anama, nefelen nokwahin newala hul anama nif amama fandumi mapeinai.
Dei' ae' ati etap naloma otaga dambaimi mape. Heven ilif naloma etap apimi mafe' higilalam hi'alam. Ea' naoh wapoti' ina ata' motah, owa'.

Ea' ati taun wambel bu'unai Godi, anama Jerusalem dambaiguma. Ati taun anama nape naloma God, nakwaha heven ilif nisila'i. Wambel anama nanda' sosaf bu'unai atona nandandombol si'i nemata'w kwa'i koso' amani kwanda' sosaf bu'unai atona ma koso' aman akwa'unai.

Ea' ame' anona malogel nataga balata kingi na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Peme'! Dei' ipat lu'unai Godi notawa naloma epes. Ama Anan nope la'afena esis ma sope amam nematawa ananisi ea' Anan nope God esis sanda' lotumanai. Endilisi, God Anan atona nape nalomas.

Anan anona nemaf nopati'masa embif hiami ma naep asasimi. Ama ina anona nemaf soga' wapoti' opalef nimanim ea' esis ina selef some' nimanimi wapoti', owa'etin. Dei' main, amamaga amama fowa'imi mafe' mowala higilalam hi'alam.”
Ea' aman anama nape balata lu'unai kingi na'i, “Peme'! Dei' Ae' anda' amamaga hiami mataga dambaim hi'alam!”
Ea' na'ipi wapoti' na'i, “Ine' da'a basef amama. Dei' main, basef amama endilisimi atom ma sembale'efam endilisi.”

Ea' na'ipi wapoti' na'i, “Ae' anda' amamaga amama dambaimi hiami mataga hi'alam. Ae' atowe ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef hihif ape ali' ape agi' endilisi. Ae' ofagewe ma ahapila amamaga hiami hi'alam ea' ape agi' anda' opeh hiami ae'ami hi'alam. Emi egafis si'i iap nose'as, anona nemaf ese'as embela ifata embel ambal namunai napaimi. Ea' ese'asam na'a si'i presen bu'unai.
Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, esis anona nemaf sofa' amamaga amama hiami bu'wami do'ok a'ipipami. Ea' ae' epe God asasisiwei, esis sope awasi ae'asi.

Epes isima umbamahasa sotanima, isima owa' sombale'efa Godi, epes sanda' waf naninani aonai endilisi soloma epes isima saha enis saga'i soloma epes isima sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai soloma isima sanda' mu'uhupi soloma epes isima sanda' lotuma god anama baso'mainai, soloma epes isima hiesi sambaso'omi, epes isima hiesi sofa' wambel asasinai ma hul anama lu'unai nif lu'wami fandumi otam salfa napoma. Hul anama launai si'i ga' nigi' neatagai.”

Ea' anona ensel nafi'mai ae'. Ensel anama atotona ma amam ensol 7-peleim mahapila dis amamaga mahambombaga epesi malami mandandam. Amamaga amama awami meagi'i endilisi. Anan na'ipi na'i, “Ine' fi'i, ma ihi'ambena nemata'w sipsip noganai waulu'mana.”

Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'anai, ensel anama nofa'e afe' alata anona halaf launai gani ilif. Ea' nihi'ambe taun wambel anama bu'unai Godi Jerusalem, anama nape naloma God ea' nakwaha heven nafi'i ata' nisila'i etin.

Wambel anama nafifili la'ifinai si'i nagwapin Godi mafifil taun anama. Elelowa nafifili Ananinai anona nafifili si'i otam bu'unai satalona otamba hiami. Endilisi, nafifili anama si'i otam jaspa pelele' endilisi si'i glas.

Taun anama endalelemb lu'wami laumi endilisi malata ilif. Endalelemb amama utagw 12-peleim ea' ensel 12-peleim maitu felefele' mandandama utagw amama. Ea' agof amama mandahama wambotagw 12-peleim esis Israeli mail mandandama utagw amama.
Endalelemb wa'am titi gani wa'ol aon natefima utagw wanom. Ea' wa'ol aon natopa' nonafama sanda' utagw wanom ea' gani aon natopa' nomba'ma sanda' wanom ea' wa'ol aon nowalama naso'ma sanda' wanom.
Endalelemb amama ma taun anama, otamba lu'wami 12-peleim mape mosohapa endalelemb etapama. Ea' agof amam aposel 12-peleim sipsip noganai mail mandanda otamba amama.
Ea' ensel anama nalome na'i nahapila bandan gol si'i ikwaf nosaho' taun anama ma endalelemb naloma utagw.

Taun anama lu'wagoma. Endalelemb amama dindiwaisa biefigin biefigin ea' usi'im endilisi. Wambel anama tef wala, wa'ol wa'ol na'ama etin. Ensel nosaho'agon nondola'wifa taun anama ma ikwaf ananinai ea' wambel anama tef wala ikwaf nataga 2,400 kilomita. Ea' wa'ol wa'ol biefigin biefigin tasa ikwaf na'ama etin 2,400 kilomita. Wambel anama dogwala owin nalata nataga ilif, ikwaf anama nataga na'ama etin 2,400 kilomita.

Anan nandandepa endalelemb nondola'wif wapoti' etap nalata nataga ilif. Ea' ikwaf endalelembi nikila' nataga 144 alogof bandami mita. Mita anama, anan si'i epes sondola'wifa hiahaomanai si'i rula. Ea' ensel nondola'wifa endalelemb amama ma ikwaf anama atona.
Endalelemb mili'akwa tauni amama God atona nanda'am otamba amama jaspa. Ea' taun anama God nanda' gol atom nanda'ana. Taun anama howalagon nafifil endilisi si'i glas.

Endalelemb owinama ma taun anama, God nofalo'mama otamba mamumami bu'wami sataloma moni hianai. Otam gologowinai bu'unai nali'i nombalo' endalelemb owinama agel jaspa. Otam nagi'i kolotu'unai agel sapaia. Ea' anona nagi'i ma wanomi afitinai agel aget. Ea' anona nafe'ma biefinai biefina ulitinai agel emeral.

Ea' anona nafe'ma wanom biefinai agel sandonikis, anama anan nanda' apohi akwahina afitina. Ea' nafe'ma wanom wanom anan akwahinai agel konilian. Ea' nafe'ma 7-peleinai batafunai agel krisolait. Ea' nafe'ma 8-peleinai anama ulitinai anom mandati na'a agel beril. Ea' anona nafe'ma 9-peleinai batafunai nandati na'a agel topas. Ea' anona nafe'ma 10-peleinai agel krisopres anama nanda' apoh batafunai ulilitinai. Ea' nafe'ma 11-peleinai anona kolotu'unai nandati na'a agel haiasin. Ea' anona nafe'ma 12-peleinai anama anona akwahinai agel amatis.

Utagw amama 12-peleim si'i ombahigis afitimi 12-peleim salatamam endilisi. Anona uta sanda'ana anona bahigin lu'unai atotona. Taun anama eaf atotona. Eaf anama gol atom mafifili howalagon pelele' endilisi si'i glas sanda'ana.

Ae' ina ati ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai notawa taun anama, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai God la'ifinai nikila' la'ifimi hiami hi'alami naloma Sipsip Noganai, amam biam mape si'i ipat lu'unai Godi ma taun anama.

Ea' taun anama aon owambunai alipunai maol nanda'anai owa' ma wambel anama howalagoma, owa'. Dei' main, mafifili lu'wami Godi atom mumafiagon manda'agon howalagon. Ea' Sipsip Noganai anan atona si'i nagwapin anama.
Epes etapasi hiesi hi'ilas anona nemaf sofa' nafifili atoma taun anama ea' sefe'. Ea' amam king mumafi etapi anona nemaf mofa'ai sosaf otamba maim amamumi mifi'mai wambel anama.
Alip esis ina sowalo utagwa endalelemb amama, owa'. Magal la'ela'ef mape. Dei' main, owamb ina aonona nemaf notaga taun anama wambel lu'unai, owa'.
Sosaf bu'unai noloma otamba moni maim ma'oh wambel kantri hiagoma epes hiesi anona nemaf sofa'am suwisa wambel anama sombe'am.

Ea' amamaga awami moloma epes emi sanda' waf naninani aonai soloma emi egafis sa'i basef baso'maimi soloma emi egafis sanda' waf aonai nanda' epes ambagof aom, epes isima ina sefe' siwisa wambel anama, owa'. Sipsip Noganai nanda' agof enis epesi mail buk anama agof epes sofa' ambal namunai mailanai, epes isima etis anona nemaf sefe' suwis wambel anama.

Ea' ensel anama nihi'ambe anona walemb lu'unai. Walemb anama howalagon pelele' endilisi si'i glas. Walemb anama nandambe nafi'i balata lu'unai Godi natomanai naloma balata lu'unai Sipsip Noganai natomanai ea' kolo' etin nafe'.

Walemb anama nafe' la'afena eaf lu'unai ma taun wambel anama lu'wagoma. Walemb fisanai fisana lawah biam ambal namunai motawa. Amam mail mola su'utip danda la'ela'ef mandanda aomb atona etina afagof hiami atona etin. Nohotagw 12-peleim mandahama aomb 12-peleim. Emi egafis sogwa' su'utip amama, esis sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef. Soh apulima monda' epes hiesi awes nanda'asi sape kantri hiagoma sotaga bo'wes.
Wambel anama amamaga hiami God nandaiwa'mam endilisi ma na'i nili'amonami, amama ina nambimb mope wapoti', owa'.
God noloma Sipsip Noganai, amam anona nemaf motoma balata lu'wami kingi mope mumafi epes isima. Esis sanda' opeh Godi sope sonda' lotumana sefela agel ananinai.
Anona nemaf siti amaga Ananinai ma nonda' agel ananinai nil amagah asasimi.

Anona nemaf owamb ina notaga wapoti', owa'. Ea' ina ata' anom mafifili moloma lam nogwahis o owaf aon alipunai, owa'. Amama opeh a'am. Dei' main, Dembinai God nififima esis, sope si'i king sumafi enis epes la'ela'ef.

Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Basef amama hiami mape buk anae' endilisimi atom andeande'ma epes hiesi sombale'efam. Dembinai God naso' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai amam profet. God Anan nasapa'ai ensel Ananimi ma mihi'amba esis sanda' maola Anani ma amamaga amama felefele' meatagai.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anona nemaf Ae' ifi'mai ipe' mehip. Basef Godi mape buk anae', basef amama amamaga hiami ma'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Emi egafis sila basef amama, esis sondanifel.”
Ae' Jon ame' basef amama ati amamaga amama ame'am ea'. Ea' indiwa nembawa etawa felefele'ma ensel anama nihi'ambe amamaga amama ma enda' lotuma anan.

Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Ine' owa' nenda'am na'ama, owa'. Ae' ina dembiwei, owa'. Ae' alomena wandao'oma wanda' opeh etini waloma sahopena ine'imi profet fowa'imi maloma epes isima hiesi saila basefa buk anae'. Ine' nenda' lotu ma God atona.”
Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Basef amama Godi mape buk anama, ina nembaho'am nesapamam mope, owa'. Dei' main, nogota God na'i nonda' amamaga amama, anama felefele'ma notaga hi'ilana.

Emi egafis sonda' waf aonai, esis sonda'ana la'ela'ef. Emi egafis sonda' waf aonai endilisi, esis sonda'ana la'ela'ef. Emi egafis sonda' waf bu'unai, esis sonda'ana la'ela'ef. Ea' emi egafis sepe epes bu'wasi Godi, esis sope bo'wes Ananisi na'ama etin la'ela'ef.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anona nemaf Ae' etaga mehip. Ea' ifi'i eloma amamaga bu'wami awami, ewaloga esis amam nematawa hiesi egwamasam atona etin mondahama waf esis sanda'anai.
Ae' atowe ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef, ape ali'i ape agi' endilisi. Ae' ofagewe ma amamaga hiami enda'am efe' efe' embefam andeande' hi'ilam.

Esis amam nematawa sasa'opa luwaguf asasimi ma sataga bo'wes, esis sondanifel. Esis isima anona nemaf God na'i esis bo'wes ma sefa' gwa'aimi ma lawag anama ambal namunai napainai ea' la'ifisa sefe' suwis uta anama ma wambel anama bu'unai.

Epes sanda' waf aonai si'i bogof nombagw manda'anai soloma epes isima sanda' mu'uhupi, epes isima sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai soloma epes saha enis saga'i soloma epes isima sanda' lotuma god baso'mainai soloma epes isima hiesi ukup maila waf baso'omunai maimailana, epes isima anona nemaf sope ande'ma wambel anama Godi.”

Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' asapa' ensel ae'anai nafe'mago ipe' ma nowalapa basef amama ma ipe' sios amam nematawa Godi. Ae' atowe ae' dapana nandala nombaf lawag Deviti, bafalomana ananiwei ataga wambota ananinai. Ae' si'i ondo'w anama lala'wan mafifili endilisi nalatawi kuhimbita.

Ambal Bu'unai Godi naloma nemata'w Sipsip Noganai nose'akwi esis sa'i, ‘Ipe' fi'i!’ Ea' emi egafis seme' basef amama, esis si'i basef amama atom si'i, ‘Ipe' fi'i.’ Ea' emi egafis iap nose'asa embel, esis sifi'i. Emi egafis sa'i sogwa' embel, esis sifi'i sea' embel ambal namunai napaimi si'i presen bu'unai God nose'asana na'ai, owa' sotalona otambai.

Ipe' epes emi egafipa pame' basef Godi ma amamaga amama mail buk anae' anona nemaf meatagai, Ae' a'ipa ipe' hipei mehip, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. I'i emi egafis siwatani anom basef wapoti' moloma basef Godi, anona nemaf amamaga amama aom endilisi God na'iami ma buk anae', amama anona nemaf God nokolefamanam esis.

I'i emi egafis sogagaha anom basef tu'wanim Godi ma'i amamaga anona nemaf meatagai ma nili'amonama buk anae', anona nemaf God nili'amona epes isima nogalo'mas. Ea' esis ina anona nemaf la'ifisa sefa' gwa'aimi ma lawag anama ambal namunai napaimi, owa'. Anona nemaf ina la'ifisa sefe' sepe andeande' wambel anama bu'unai buk anae' na'iagoma, owa'etin.”
Ae' Dembiwei a'i basefa amamaga mail buk anae', Ae' a'i amama endilisimi atom. Ea' dei' a'i, “Endilisi, Ae' anona nemaf ifi'i mehip!”
Endilisi, Dembinai Jisas, ine' nifi'i!
Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas nigiambamepa na'a nope nolomepa, ipe' God Ananipei. Endilisi.
